34a2(rgyud): drug pa yin//lan gnyis bzlas pa'i tshig tu ni//shin tu mnyam par gzhag ste btu//de nas ge rims bzlog pas bzung //raM mig las ni dang po nyid//bzhi pa'i
34a3(rgyud): mtha' dang yang dag ldan//de bzhin bcwo lnga pa dang bcas//chos don 'dod dang thar pa yi//tshig ni gsum pa yin par bshad//raM mig gnyis pa'i sa bon dang //re myig
34a4(rgyud): sum cu drug pa nyid//de bzhin nyi shu drug pa yang //sum cu gsum pa yang dag blang //re mig bcu gsum pa yang ldan//raM mig las ni bcu pa nyid//go rim bzlog
34a5(rgyud): pas sgrub pos blang //re mig las ni bcu dgu pa//rI mig nyi shu gsum pa la//re mig gnyis par yang dag ldan//steng du thig les rnam par rgyan//de nas chu yis
34a6(rgyud): don gzung //brgyad pa yang ni de bzhin te//me yi bu yis khyad par dbye//yi ge hUM gIs mtha' ru sbyar//'di ni khams gsum rgyal zhes bya'i//sngags tshig bzhi yis
34a7(rgyud): rnam rgyan pa'o//oM ni kun la gsal byed yin//hUM dang phaT ni mtha' ru sbyar/rig rgyal 'khor los bskyang ba'i sngags//'di ni ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur//de nyid bsdus/
34b1(rgyud): dang dpal mchog dang //bde mchog rdo rje 'jigs byed pa//khra ba bzhi dang yang dag ldan//skad cig gis ni sku brgyad 'gyur//bde ba'i dkyil 'khor srung don du//gdug pa thams cad khyad par
34b2(rgyud): /da ni rnyed pa sa m+b+his kyang //brtug mi dgas par mchi bar 'gyur//lel la'i sbyor bdog nyid kyis baH//de ma kyu kun gyi 'bris skyed saHni suMts+tsha hU~M da/
34b3(rgyud): oM br-ih+Na br-ih+Na huM hUM phaT/gr-i na~M gr-ih+NA pa ya/oM A nA ya ho//bid+yA rA dza huM hUM phaT/dpal he ru ki'i nges par brjod pa lAs rdza rnga bcing ba'i sngags btu bi'i le'u ste sum nu paM'o//
34b4(rgyud): de nas shi tshon thams cad kyi//'dzin byed rdo rje deskyed shin bshad//'di ni gdug pa thams cad kyi//'jigs byed mi bzad par bshad do//'di ltar khyi dang phag gi sha/zangs kyi
34b5(rgyud): gtsug pud can de bzhin//mngon spyod kyi ni bya bA la//gza' dang sbyin bsreg gtor ma bya//bya ba rnam spyod med par bya//me lus lus pa med grub cing //rgyal srid thams cad rab
34b6(rgyud): grub 'gyur//dung dang nya phyis mu ti sha~M gi/rgyu mtshan gsum po 'byung ba yis//chos kyi sku yi lus can gyi//thod pa la ni su zhig smod//dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba cam//zla ba
34b7(rgyud): phyid pas rgyan du byas//rnam pa de ltar gyur pa nyid//dpa' bo'i dbang phyug yin par bshad//badz+ra ni lnga po bstan pa dag/sgrub pa po yi lag g.yon gyis//'di ni dpa' ba'i
35a1(rgyud): granas yin te//brda rnams kyi ni rab 'jug pa'o//khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu dang //'gro kun g.yon las byung ba yin//rdo rje sems dpa' mthe bong
35a2(rgyud): bzhugs//lcug mar de bzhin rnam snang mdzad//go cha'i rnam pa de lta bur//gtso bor pad+ma gar mdzad de//brtan par dngos grub thams cad ni//rang gsol pa yi dpa' bo bzhug
35a3(rgyud): mthe'u chung la ni mkha' snying po//mi zad sku dang ldan pa nyid//sen mo'i ngos ni rta mgrin gyi//gan su gyur par bshad pa yin//'di dag thams cad dpa' bo ni//g.yon pa
35a4(rgyud): las byung rgyu yin//lag mthil shrI he ru ka yi//phag mo'i 'dus pa dga' byed yin//rgyab tu shin tu nges byas nas//bdag nyid lnga po bstan par bya//'di dag lag tu dgod
35a5(rgyud): pa ste//mdza' ba thams cad 'dus pa yin//rnam pa de lha'i cho ga yis//dpa' bo ngom pa mchod par bya//sa ni spyan zhes bya bar bshad//chu khams mA ma kI ru brjed//
35a6(rgyud): me ni gos dkar mor bshad de//rlung ni sbrel mar rab tu brjod//tsu pi ka ni stong pa ste//de bzhin pha rol phyin pa yin//dbus su dpa' bo kun gyi gnas//mkhas pas rgyab
35a7(rgyud): tu gshegasu gsol//gsang ba 'di ni mi bshad cing //rab tu 'bad de sba bar bya//de ltar brda bya dpa' bo rnams//gcig tu zas la brtsam par bya//dpa' bo thams cad/
35b1(rgyud): mnyam sbyor ba//mkha' gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin//dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las bza' ba dang sbyin sreg dang gtor ma'i bya la lan pa'i brda'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gcig
35b2(rgyud): pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshud bya ba//bza' dang ston mo 'dus pa ste//yang dag cho ga gang gis ni//dngos grub myur du rab 'jug pa'o//phyugs rnams kyi ni dgug pa
35b3(rgyud): nyid/sgrub pos sngar bstan rim pa 'dis//phyugs rnams dang ni de bzhin lnga//bong du ru sbrul mi rnga mo//le spyang rta la sogs rnams kyis//dngos grub sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor du//
35b4(rgyud): phyugs 'di dag ni sgrub yan lag/rigs rnams las ni rigs mchog phyugs//rkang bzhi rnams las glang por brjod//'dab chags rnams las dang po nyid//dud 'gro rnams las
35b5(rgyud): dud 'gro phyugs//lho rnams las ni mchu g.yo ba//rnam pa de ltar brjod pa ste//dngos grub sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor du//phyugs de dag ni rnam par bshad//khwa dang chu skyar lce sbyang dang //
35b6(rgyud): skye gnyis blon po chen po dang //khrung khrung bzhad dang ka dra mA pa//bza' dang sbyin sreg gtor bya bas//'dod pa dag ni 'grub par 'gyur//khyi nag po yi 'o thug nI//mau shra'i 'bras
35b7(rgyud): ni nag por ldan//'dod pas dogs pa med pa ru//ji srid brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar//ro yi khar ni sbyin bsreg bya//de nas yi dgas langs nas ni//sgrub po de la 'di byed de//
36a1(rgyud): ci bgyi zhes ni sgra 'gyur zhing //sa 'og las sam ral bri 'am//tshar gcod pa na 'dogs nyid dag dang //mal du mig sman gter rnams sam//rkang mgyogs dag
36a2(rgyud): gam bcud kyis len//dngos 'di de bzhin gcig byin nas//'gro bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du min//steng du 'og tu pha nya 'grub//rgyud 'dir the tshom med pa yin//ba lang gnas dang
36a3(rgyud): lding ba nyid//lhag ma skam po rtsa de nas//bde ba chen po'i ngo bor bya//yang na ru sbal dag gi'o//'di de dngos grub sbyin 'gyur zhing //phyag bzhi pa dang zhal bzhi pa//ji srid
36a4(rgyud): phyag ni 'dul gyi bar//su ni dkar da'i khro bo che//de nus drag shul gzugs 'chang ba//rdo rje phag me la gzigs pa//de yi sku mdog mtshon cha 'chang //dpa' bo thod pa
36a5(rgyud): phreng ba can//sgyu lnga thal bas nye bar byugs//ral pa'i cod bran mdung dang ldan//phyag rgya yis ni sku la rgyan//zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs//yi dgas chen po gdan du
36a6(rgyud): bye//sgrub pa bi yis dus rtag tu//sngags de shes nas bsgom par gyi//de lta'i yon tan khyad 'phags pas//'did pA yi ni dngos grub 'gyur//dpal hUM ru ka'i nges pa
36a7(rgyud): rjod pa las/dud 'bri/sa dang ro lnga sgrub pa dang /daspyad pa'i rim pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o///de nas sgrub po'i mchog kun na/
36b1(rgyud): sbyor ba kun la med pa'o//bza' dang bcu' dang nya sha sogs//nus pa ji bzhin bya ba ste//med par gyur kyang bza' ba ni//lnga po nyid du bya ba yin//bza' dang bca' ba rgya che ba/
36b2(rgyud): rtog tu mtshan mo nyid du bya//de nas pho nya rab sbyin zhing //khyad par du ni sgrub pa po//rang gi spang du mag bzhag la//dpa' bo gnyis med rab tu mchod//ma 'am yang na sring
36b3(rgyud): mo 'am//nu mo 'am yod na chung ma gnyen//rnam pa 'di lta'i cho ga yis//bcings pa las ni rab grol bya//de nas sngags 'di 'grub 'gyur te//ji srid 'byung bya yodapar
36b4(rgyud): du'o//gle dpon lus legs gnas te//smyud bye blo las mchod pa len/dpa'i ba rnaMms kyi spyan dag da //phyug rgya nyid du kyi ma myud/
36b5(rgyud): sgyeb po shin tu mnyam gzhag pas//glu dang gar la sogs pa bya//ji srid lus can thams cad kyang //rnal 'byor ye shes zhen ma gyur//sri la bor bar 'khor 'gyur zhing /
36b6(rgyud): sdug bsngal mya ngan gyis g.yengs 'gyur//dngos po kun gyis slob pa pos//de nas phyag rgya mchod par bya//mchod pas mchod par 'dod pa ste//brnyas pa yis ni nges par sreg
36b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor rgyud du mi rnams kyi//phyag rgya chen po dang po 'grub//rab tu 'bad paso mchod par bya//phyi nas dpa' bo rnams kyi ni//dpa' bo nyid la spyad par bya//de ltar mtsha
37a1(rgyud): byas dunas na//sa 'ag sgrub po langs pa dang //zha ba nyid dang rgyas pa dang //dbang dang dgug pa dag dang ni//bsnyud dang bskrad pa la sogs dang //rnags
37a2(rgyud): dang rangs pa de bzhin te//dbye ba nyid dang tshar bcad dang //las kyi dngos sgrub mchod par bya//gang ci'ang rung ba'i las gyur la//ston mi rmongs par 'grub 'gyur te//the tsham
37a3(rgyud): med par sgrub pa po'i//dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//dpal he ru ka' nges par brjod pa las gsang ba'i mchod ka dang bsnyen bkur gyi mchod pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa
37a4(rgyud): gsum po'o///de nas mkha' gro mu dra ba'i//'khor lo zhes pa'i cho ga rgyas//las gang ci yang de myur ba pa rtsub pa po ni the tshom med//dpa' bo kun dang rnam
37a5(rgyud): 'byor ma//pad+ma'i lte bar nges par sbyar//smin ma'i dbus su gzhug par bya//a br-i d+hU tI'i gnas de bzhin//dpa' dro'i 'tshal bar byas chags par//bza' ba yang na de
37a6(rgyud): nas swAH/go mr-i saM dang ru d+hA rA//'bad pas bsreg bye lnga dag bye//de nas 'bar ba 'i byin zu la//bsreg thugs dgu ni sbyin par bya//'bar phreng rgya mtsho blta bar bya//kun nas
37a7(rgyud): sgra yi 'khor lo nyid//dpa' bo'i dbang po zhal bzhi pa//dpa' bo dpa' mo'i gnas de bzhin//'dab la pho nya mo ban yin//dpa' bo kun dang gnyis med bde//cho po
37b1(rgyud): na rnam pa las//khat+tAr te bya ba na//rang gi gardzagasunam zhugs pa//'khang la 'dangasu blta bar bya//'khar 'a 'di dag gsal ba//ya /bdun /gra
37b2(rgyud): las de bzhin//mdor bsdus nas ni gsungs pa yin//pho nya gnyis med sbyar ba'i bdag/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med//dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjed pa las pho nya mo'i skyon sren
37b3(rgyud): dang las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o///de nas las kyi rab mchog ni//ji bzhin rim gyis mtshon pa ste//mchod pa gnyis med sbyor ba'i bdag/l+r-in
37b4(rgyud): ser sbyar bar bya//gang dag rab grub byung pa'i sngags//de yi dbye ba rim bzhin bshad//kha dog po nya stsogs sngags gang //mda' yi shugs kyis yong su 'khar//na tshun mdud
37b5(rgyud): rgyud dpa' nga ni//yul kyis ni phye ba'o//snga bon phred bas de nas bzang //hU~M ni mthar du gnas pa yin//bsgrer bya 'grog par gyur pa ni//gos pa gtsug kyang mi 'ok+ka'o//khwa
37b6(rgyud): byer gyur pa dang/lkog rgyud bcings pas// ba nyid da/de bzhin snar ltu //smyigs pa nyid kyis dpag pad+ma//gdun shing gis bskyed de na
37b7(rgyud): da kyis 'debs par bshad//de bug la mdas ni sbyar bya ste//dus min 'tsho ba bsrub la//yan lag kharje dag dang sbyor//thod pa'i mchod yin snod du ni//zhal du mtshan
38a1(rgyud): nges par gyur//dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las gnyi su med pa'i las dang dus ma yin par 'chi ba da slu ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o//
38a2(rgyud): de nas phyag rgya'i mchod chen dang //sngags kyi dgod pa rab tu grags//myur du dngos grub byed par ni//phyag rgya'i mchod 'di the tshom med//mtshan ma gnyis la sngags sbyar te//
38a3(rgyud): mkha'agro dpa' bo gnyis med pa//snying po rnams kyis de bzhin du//sngags pas mkha 'gro ma la sbyar//blo ldan mkha' 'gro ma bsdu bya//dag pa'i lus ni rang 'dod pa//dpa'
38a4(rgyud): mchod pa rnams byas nas//las ni 'byed pa nyid kyis bya//rnam dbye rang dgas sngags pa ni//phyin ci log tu nges par sbyar//tshar gcod phan 'dogs don rnams pa las kyi dngos por
38a5(rgyud): rnam par sgom//de nyid dbye bar phye nas ni//rtse yi lam du sbyar bar bya//rab tu sgrub pa'i sbyar don la//'di yis myur du lha dang ni//lha min mir bcas bsgrub par bya//dpal he ru
38a6(rgyud): ka'e nges par brjod pa las de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa dang las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o///de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//gzugs ni gnon pa'i
38a7(rgyud): tsha ga ste//phan tshun sbyar ba'i gsang sngags ni//mkha'agro ma dang gcig tu sbyar//bzal ba zos mid da nas ni//bzlas pa'i mthar ni skyug par bya//mtshan mi ban
38b1(rgyud): sna pa dang //ba' dang brtang bdag la sgyur//'di mas ji seM 'dzi y-i bal+la/yang du 'gro bar po ts+tshom med//sor sbya mar na 'jungs nas//bzlas pa'i mthar ni sprug par bya//de mas
38b2(rgyud): rang gi gdang bsdus naste//gal te rtag tu sa gyur pa//mdzang bcom gyis der du 'byum// ma ngas su btogs pa dang //lda ni pas sus ni bskus gyur cing // ma/
38b3(rgyud): sngags pas byas nas ma/ pa la~M nA~M pAts+tsha m+b+ha //glub te lngas 'dis nga //de srid 'tsho ba ga byung 'gyu ge dag ni thos nas// tshur bzlas spyugs
38b4(rgyud): da/ shang bdang ldan pa//las skyes skye ba'i srin du ni//rang gi zug da brtan sanas ni/ rje ba hU~M s+yA //ba 'a sa laH//Sh+T+r-i/
38b5(rgyud): du ratu sbyar/'di yis ji spyod yi Sh+Te5/yU gyur bar gdon myi smug / sa sa nA m+b+harnams rgyu
38b6(rgyud): gi tI ma ni u~M 'dzi 'gyum//dan nyid du khyimadu du ni/ rnams nas mi sa pasbyin btsug ni ga tamam //mas gsam/ cig gis tshugs pa/
38b7(rgyud): na bdun gyis ni 'gru zer 'gyur//ga rten gi sum na nid dag /du tshig ga tu rang sngags smras pa mas//ra tu ga
39a1(rgyud): bya//sgras don rnyed par mi 'gyur zhing //skal pa dman pas 'bru mi 'gyur//bsod nams chung ba'i sgrub pos kyang //nga mnyes byas pas rnyed par 'gyur//
39a2(rgyud): dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las nang gi bdag nyid kyi dadang du bya ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa tshe///de nas brda' ni mkha' gro ma'i//
39a3(rgyud): lus kyi mtshan nyid gang yin dang //dbang po'i yan lag dbye ba ni//grub par gyur pa de grub 'gyur//dpa' bo'i dbang phyug mi bri zhing //rnam pa kun tu sba bar bya//
39a4(rgyud): gang gi thad du'ang mi gdon te//g.yon pa'i kun spyod sgrub pa pos//gsang ba'i mtshan nyid mkha' gro yi//sngags rnams bag med pas 'don na//de la nga ni mi blta ste//mkha'
39a5(rgyud): 'gro stong phrag du ma yis/ngan pa'i bdag nyid can do za//dam tshig 'joms shing ngan spyod de//bram ze gsod par the tshom med//sdig spyod rmongs pa'i bdag nyid can//lus gyur ngan
39a6(rgyud): pa'i bdag nyid de//mkha' gro ma yis zos gyur kyang //de la nga ni skyob mi byed//gsang ba pA yi nang na ni//sgrub po de ni phyugs dang 'dra//bla ma dam tshig la 'khu ba//sangs rgyas
39a7(rgyud): 'jig rten de las lhung //he ru ka dpal lta dka'i rgyud//gang zhog srung bar byed pa ni//mkha' gro mar bcas dge sdong zhes//de la nga ni rje su 'dzin//bla ma la ni bsnyon//
39b1(rgyud): bkur byed//gsong bar byed pa'i sgrub pa po//mkha 'bro ma la rtag dgra' ba//de la dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur//sgrub pa po ni dpa' nyid 'gyur//khams gsum mkha' la rgyu ba'i bdag/
39b2(rgyud): sgrub po dpa' bo nyid 'dod pa//thams cad du ni mchod par 'gyur//de ni rnal 'byor la rab 'jug//yang dag sbyin pa'ang rig par 'gyur//he ru ka yi brtul zhugs 'dzin//slob dpon dpa' bo
39b3(rgyud): mthong gyur pa//mthong zhing mthong zhing kun tu dga'//sgrub pa pos ni sngags 'di yis//dpa' bo'i rtsa ba'i gsang sngags mchog/lan bdun du ni brjod par bya//rab sngags hUM
39b4(rgyud): la sogs pas phye//de rnams 'bad de phyag byas na//sangs rgyas la sogs thams cad mchod//rtag pa nyid du dpa' chen dang //rol par ldan pa the tshom med//de yi thugs kar gnas phag
39b5(rgyud): mo//nga dang dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma//pho nya rnams dang lhan cig bcas//de dang gang zhig legs skyes pa//srog chags bsod nams mthong ba yin//'bab chu'i 'gram dang
39b6(rgyud): rgya mtsho dang //ri bo dang ni bzhi mdo dang //steng ka dang ni khron pa mtshe'u//kha stong dang ni lam srong dgra/thams cad du ni mkha 'gro ma//kun tu zhen par lte la gnas//
39b7(rgyud): 'jigs pa chen po dur khrod du//mkha' spyod de bzhin sa 'og dang //ro langs kyang ni du ma zhig/'jigs pa'i gzugs rang stobs chen pos//de dag lhan cig dpa' bo che//ci bde
40a1(rgyud): bar ni rol par mdzad//ri dul tshang tshing grasang ba dang //rnal 'byor mya dang gsang bu'i me//phyogs ni de dang de dag tu//sgrub pa po dang sa steng ro
40a2(rgyud): dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub pa'i sa dang gsang ba'i dpa' bo'i gnas kyi cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o//
40a3(rgyud): de sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor che//sngags kyi rnam pa brgyad kyis dgon//de nas 'di lnga yang dag mthong //gsol bar 'gyur bar gdon ma zlo//'jigs pa'i sgra ni rnam mang po//mi
40a4(rgyud): bzong mkha' gro 'jigs byed pa//dpa' bo 'jigs par gyur na ni//skrag cing rnam par 'byed par byed//gal te dpa' bo mi 'jigs na//lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas
40a5(rgyud): ni//rang gi gan su khyer na su//mkha' gro ma ni de dag dang //rtag tu mngon par rtse byed de//bde ba can gyi gnas 'gro 'gyur//he ru ka dpal gus 'dod pas//mkha' la 'gro//
40a6(rgyud): ba'i gnasu khyer//sgrub pa po ni sngags lus can//'khor bar 'chi dang rgyu ba mod//dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las blta ba dang ha har dgod bya'i cho ga'i le'u ste
40a7(rgyud): sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o///da ni rab tu bshad bya ba//gang gis sa stengs dbang du 'gyur//dpa' bo'i sngags kyi zla ba yin//rnal 'byor cho ga gnas pas
40b1(rgyud): 'gyur//sgron ma myom byed bcas pa dang //nya mo sha dang ldan par ni/dpa' dbang gnas skabs thams cad du//nyi ma bdun gyis sgrub pa po'o//mtshan ma'i sbyin sreg byed la gzhol//dngos grung /
40b2(rgyud): rgya chen gsol bar 'gyur//brgya dang rtswa brgyad ldan nyid kyis//thun gsum du ni sgrub byed na//rgyal po dpung dang bcas par ni//nyin bdun gyis ni dbang du 'gyur//phyed kyis dang/
40b3(rgyud): po blon po ste//de yi phyed kyis blon po yi//rgyal phrin la na sum cu gnyis//sreg pa'i ro mi gyis sbyin bsreg bya//nyi shus bram ze nyid la ni//nyi ma bdun gyis spyan bsrog bya//de
40b4(rgyud): bzhin rgyal rigs dag lnga/bdun//sbyin sreg lnga po rje rigs la//rmang rigs la ni sbyin sreg gsum//tha mu la ni sbyin sreg gcig/de ltar dpa' bos rigs rim gyis//zla ba gcig/
40b5(rgyud): ni yang dag spyad//sngags kyi mu 'i sgrub pa pos//'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya//dpa' bos cho ga snga ma yis//'dod pas bsten na thub par 'gyur//sa stengs 'dod pa'i dbang phyu
40b6(rgyud): bzhin//dngal ldani skyel pa bzung por 'gyur//sgrub po mkha' gyi ma rnams kyi//yid 'ong 'gyur bar gdon mi za//dpal he ruM kA'i nges par brjod pA las rigs lnga po dbang du
40b7(rgyud): ba dang phyag rgya chen po bsten pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o//de nas las kyi mchog rab ni//gang gis shes na sgrub po'os//dbang dang dbug dang dbye 'o/
41a1(rgyud): dang //bsad dang bskrad pa la sogs dang //rmugs dang rengs par bya ba dang //rmongs dang de bzhin phung bus gdang//tshig 'brog lkugs par 'gyur ba dang
41a2(rgyud): 'on dang de bzhin long ba dang //ma ning nyid du bya ba dang //gzugs ni yongasu 'gyur ba ste/las chen bcu gnyis 'di dag ni//rtag tu sgrub pa po yis bsgrubs//dngos grub sgrub pa
41a3(rgyud): po la ni//dran pa 'grub 'gyur gdon mi zo//thams cad bla ma'i gnas la sogs//mkha 'gro mas ni thams cad khyab/ye shes ldan pa'i rang skye gnas//yul dang yul du mngon par
41a4(rgyud): skye//rdo rje dkyil 'khor gtso mo yin//de rnams mkha' gro mA ru bshad//ku lu ta dang dgon po dang //sin+da d+hA'i yul dang grong khyer dbang //gsor gyi gling dang sau raSh+Ta//de bzhin lta
41a5(rgyud): yi khyim dang ni//yi dgas grong dang kha ba'i gnas//kAny+tsi 'am lA pa ka li yul//ka ling ka dang ko sa la//tri shwa ku nai au tra dang //kA ma ru pa mA la we//lha mo'i mkhar da
41a6(rgyud): /rA mau'i dbang //go da ba ri a rA bu tar//u d+yana? dzA lan+d+ha ra dang //pu la'i re ma lA ya sogs//yul 'di dag gi bu mo gang //dpa' po gnyis med rnal 'byor ma//de kun//
41a7(rgyud): 'dod pa'i gzugs can rte//yid kyi shugs kyis 'jug pa yin//rnal 'byor ma drug ku lu tar//mya ngan yul na ma mo rnams//sen+d+hu'i yul na lA ma ste//rigs kyi
41b1(rgyud): gtso mo na ga rop+tA/lAM ba ka dang sau sh+tsArA/rigs kyi lha mo rnams yino//yi dgas grong dang nagra chen por//mkha 'gro ru pI ka ru bcas//kha ba rI dang kA ra ni//byis bcas ma ru bshad pa/
41b2(rgyud): skye//pAny+tsa la yi yul dag na//khyim gyi lha mo ka ling kA re//brtul bzhugs 'dzin pa rnams yin/ko sa lar ni shwa za ba//yi dgas grong du de bzhin du//rdo rje mkha 'gro sbom dbang phyug tri shwa ku/
41b3(rgyud): nor du ma skyes mA//pu lir ma la ya de bzhin//gser rir sme shu can rigs skyes/bud med stong phrag nyi shu cig/lhag ma gzhan dang /ji srid pa//dpal ldan he ru kA yi ni//'khor lo'i
41b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma yino//he ru ka dpal sbyor ba che//de yi dkyil 'khor gtso mo yin/mkha' 'gro nyi shu rtsa bzhi 'dis//rgyu dang mi rgyu 'jig rten ga/sum//'gro ba kun ni 'di yis khyab//mkha' gra/
41b5(rgyud): ma yi dam tshig 'di//sprul pa sgom pa nyid yin te//bsam gtan la sogs gang ci'ang rung //sa stengs na ni rdzogs 'gyur ba'o//g.yon gyi spyod pa gcer bu yin//mtshan mo rtag tu mnyam
41b6(rgyud): gzhag pas//skyes pa 'am gal te g.yon pa kun//rnal 'byor ma kun dpa' po 'gro//phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa yis//rang 'byung rtag tu mchod na ni//ma lus lus pa med grub cing //
41b7(rgyud): g.yon pa'i mchod pa la rang 'jug/dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i dkyil 'khor dgod pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o////de nas
42a1(rgyud): dpa' ba me tog chu//'thungs nas sngags 'di rjes dran bya/rtag tu 'di ltar bya ba nyid/phyag rgya lhan cig sgrub pa pos//mtshan mo rtag tu sha bza' ba//sngags
42a2(rgyud): 'di nyid kyis lan gsum bsngags//myur du bde ba thob par 'gyur//'thungs dang de bzhin byin pa dang //reg nas bzhag ni gtso mo che//bden pas tshangs par spyod pa dang //thog
42a3(rgyud): mar bzhed pa'i phyag rgya yis//blta ba'i bsnyems pa grags ldan pa//mtshan mo'ang de bzhin nyin mo ni//'dis ni bzhad pa dag tu bya//gzugs dang las kyi gsang ba gang //ji ltar gnas/
42a4(rgyud): pa dpa' bo nyon//rtag tu de yi mchi ma 'byung //dad pas de yi spyi yang ldang //rdo rje la ni 'gom mi byed//de bzhin gcer dus mchod pa ste//'dod pa'i dbang phyug thams cad kyi//phyag
42a5(rgyud): rgya'i tshogs kyi rim pa nyid//dbu gas 'byin bskul dang dgod pa dang //sgeg par gar ni ngo mtshor bas/sna tshogs gang dag mdun byed cing //phyag rgya sngags ni rjes dran bya//
42a6(rgyud): h+ya ha he he rnam brgyad bzhed//sna tshogs dbang phyug mchog tu dag 'a//d+hU tA zhes bya 'di nye bar//rtag tu mchi ma 'byung ba dang //de nyid kyis de dgar 'gyur zhing //bsam gtan
42a7(rgyud): gyi sngags legs par spyod//gitso mo rnams dang dpa' bo ni/spu ldang ba dang lhan tsog bde//rdo rje 'gom par mi bya ba//g.yon pas yongasu brtags pa yin//dpal he ru ka'i ngos
42b1(rgyud): par brjod pa las bzhad pa'i sngags dang mkha'aphro ma'i gzugs kyi sgyu ma'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o////de nas spyan ras rigs bshad de//dpa' bo dang ni gnyis
42b2(rgyud): med mi//gnas kyi dbye ba cho ga shes//sgom la rtag tu mngon par dga' ba'o//lam gyi bzhi mdo 'o ma khyim dag gam//dpa' de'i gnas dang ri bor ni//mkha 'gro ma yis dam tshig grama?
42b3(rgyud): ring po nas kyang gzigs par 'gyur//phyag rgyas gcer bu mchod pa yi///lag pas go 'phang dam pa ste//gos nyid kyis ni bkab pa 'am gzhan//'dod pa rnams kyi gos mi
42b4(rgyud): 'gyur/de bzhin sgra grol gtsor gyur pas//las rnams thams cad brtsams par bya//rtsa ba'i sngags dang de bzhin gzhan//phyogs bcing bar ni 'jug pa yis//lha dang lha
42b5(rgyud): yi tshogs kyis kyang //ma mthong bar ni mchod par gyis//snyim pa me tog gis bkang ste//mkha' la spyod la gyen du mthor//me tog de dag ma lhung zhing //me tog sa la ma mthong na//
42b6(rgyud): gnas kyi khyad par la gnas dang //mkha' la 'gro ba stong phrag gi/gnas la dbang ni byed par 'gyur//dog gi dbang phyug ma rnams dang //dag gyi nabyeng phyug 'gugs par 'gyur//
42b7(rgyud): lha dang lha yi gtam shes shing //rim pa ji lta bzhin du'o//skar ma'i rgyu ba shes par 'gyur//grong dang grong dang de bzhin dgon//grong khyer dang ni bzhi mdo dang //shing gcig dang
43a1(rgyud): ni dpa' bo'i khyim/ri rtse dang ni mtshan drung du//snying po'i nye snying rtag dran na//lha dang mi yis mthong mi 'gyur//de bas yul phyogs 'di dag tu//sgrub pa po ni rtag tu
43a2(rgyud): gnas//yi ge bdun gyi bdag nyid can//shing rtser kha dog dmar bsams nas//myur du lhung ba mi phyed par//sa rnams kyang ni gzhan du min//bdag gi lus la rnam bkod do///
43a3(rgyud): sa la ku sha'i stan du nyal//yi ge bdun gyis bdag nyid sngags//brgya rtsa brgyad ni nyid du bzlas//rmi lam du ni bya ba kun//yid la 'dod pa ston par 'gyur//dus min 'chi dang
43a4(rgyud): bcom dang nyams//bya ba kun tu gang gyur dang //rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang //thams cad rmi lam dag tu ston//de bzhin sngags bzlas ral gri chu//mthe bong mA me me long la
43a5(rgyud): sngags pa bdag nyid rtag rnal 'byor//p+la se ni ni 'bebs par byed//bsgoms nas lan bdun bzlas brjod pas//dge dang ming gi snyan par 'gyur//de nas dpa' bo'i yi ge bdun///
43a6(rgyud): sngags dgod dbye ba nyid kyis to//nyi ma'i dbusu bsams nas ni//stong gi bar du bzlas par bya//shal gyi rnam pa lta bur ni/nad kyis gdungs la bstan par bya//mthong ba tsam
43a7(rgyud): gyis mod la no//nad kun 'jigs par the tshom med//nad las rnam par grol 'gyur na//ston ka'i dus kyi zla ba 'dra/zla ba'i dbus rnam bkod cing //lag pa g.yon par 'khor/
43b1(rgyud): lo nyid//yi ge shel go mdog ltar snang //nad rnams kun la dgod par+ya ba//rims dang gdon srogs brjod byed dang //gzer sogs kun dang mdze can dang //dug gis zin sogs nad rnams
43b2(rgyud): drang //nad kun the tshom med par ni//zla gzugs yi ge bsams nas ni//phyogs bcur rnam par 'byer bar 'gyur//mtshan mo gsang ba la gnas te/buM mIng sa ni mngar gsum btags//
43b3(rgyud): yig bdun gsang sngags shes pa dang //stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas//sngags pa nang par dus ni//gser srang stong ni rnyed par 'gyur//sbyin sreg stong phrag bcu yis ni//yul
43b4(rgyud): 'khor dam pa rnyed par 'gyur//yang na gsang sngags rgyal po ni//gnas ni gang du bsams pa dang //de dang der ni de yi tshe//skye bar 'byung bar gdon mi za//dkar po yis ni zhi bar 'gyur//nag pos
43b5(rgyud): skad cig dag gis bsod//dmar pos dbang du 'gyur ba ste//'phral du nges par 'gugs par 'gyur//ser pos thams cad gnon 'gyur te//'di ni bstan bcos nges pa yin/ser pos
43b6(rgyud): dpung ni gnon pa dang //bru dang 'khrul 'khor glang po gnon//dkar po bsam pa tsam gyis ni//'chi ba nges par grol bar 'gyur//sbrul chen brgya yis zin pa ni//de yang myur du blo
43b7(rgyud): bar byed//dub gis nga rgyal ba rnam mthong na/rab tu sad pas sad par 'gyur//rims dang gdon dang brjed byed ni//lag pa mthong bas 'jigs par 'gyur//g.yul gyi dus khu tshure bcings///
44a1(rgyud): 'di la rtag tu zlos byed na//khu tshur mu bkro ba de srid du//bya ba thams cad sgrub par 'gyur//dgra bo gal te lag na ni//mtshan cha 'phyar bar byed pa yang //
44a2(rgyud): ji srid khu tshur ma bkrol bar//mtshon cha gtor bar mi nuso//gzhan yang bye bA thams cad ni/de bzhin nyid du sgrib par byed//'bras bu me tog 'dab ma dang //so rtsi de
44a3(rgyud): bzhin zas rnams la//lus kyi sbyor ba dang po ste//de bzhini gnyis pa nus pa yin//gsum pa dag ni ngag nyid//bai ni pa dmigs par mi 'gyur te/sngags kyi rgyal pos
44a4(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur//sa bzhi shring dang bcas pa dang //rgya mtsho ske rags btags de la//'dir ni 'grub par the tsham med//dems gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu'i bar//dmod 'debs phan 'dog
44a5(rgyud): nus pa yin//dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las nye ba'i snying po'i las sgrub pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o///de nas pheM nya la bsten te//yi ge bdun
44a6(rgyud): pa dang ldan pa//gang du las la yang drag brtsams//de yi mod la myur du 'grub//yi ge bdun pa'i cho ga yis//rnal 'byor ma drug rnam par dgod//'khor lor legs par
44a7(rgyud): gnas pa drug/rnam pa de lta'i cho ga yis//g.yon pa nyid du bskul dang btsos//gang gis gzung 'dzin bsams nas ni//kha nas gsang sngags rgyal po zlos//gang la lag pa de
44b1(rgyud): bstan pa//de ni nges par 'gugs par 'gyur//tsan dan dmar po'i rdul dang ni//de bzhin ske tshe lan tshwa dang //bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang rjes la//gcig tu byas nas brtag par bya//lag pa
44b2(rgyud): gnyis kyis mnyes nas ni//rnal 'byor ma la sbyin bsreg bya//mtshan mo rme sha can mi 'am//dur khrod ma la phyi ma sreg/bsgrub par bya la mngon phyogs te//sbyor ba 'di ni brtsam par bya//
44b3(rgyud): ji srid brgya yi bar du bzlas//des ni nges par 'grogs par 'gyur//bslab par bya ba'i bdag nyid dang //nor dang skye bo dbang du 'gyur//sbyor ba 'di ni grub pa ste//gzhan du na ni nga mi smra//
44b4(rgyud): rdul de nyid ni blangs na su//lcags phye dang ni rnam par bsres//dur khrod ras la btums nas ni//lani bdun bzlas la bzhi mdo ru//sor brgyad tsam dus brkos nas//dgra yi ming dang
44b5(rgyud): bcas par ni//gang gi ming smos spos 'gyur ba//de ni myur du gnon par 'gyur//phye ma de nyid bzlas na du//'bad de ba yi 'o ma yis//de ni slar yang gsos gyur na//'grub pa nyid du the
44b6(rgyud): chom med//phye ma de ni blangs ni sa ni//myos byed lnga dang ldan pa ru//de ni dur khrod ros kyis bcings//dgra yi ming yang bri bar bya//bzlas brjod lan brgya byas nas ni//dur khrod du ni ngos spras na//
44b7(rgyud): bsgrub bya skyo bo nyid du 'gyur//bton pa nyid kyis thar par 'gyur//bton ni sa pa yi 'o ma yis//'bad pas de bzhin bkru bar bya//slar yang gso ba de dag ni//'grub pa nyid du the tshom med//dpal
45a1(rgyud): he ru kA'i nges par brjod pa las rnal 'byor ma drug gi yi ge bdun gyi lus kyi cho ga'i lo'u s+t+waM stan bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o///de nas las kyi rab mchog ni//ngag gi/
45a2(rgyud): dngos grub byed pa'o//ka ra bi ra'i me tog dmar//brgya rtsa brgyad ni blangs na su//'bad de ba yi 'o ma dang //bzlas brjod rgya yang bya ba yin//lan re bzlas pa'i me tog gis//ling ka'i spyi bor
45a3(rgyud): bsnun par bya//de ltar shin tu mnyam gzhag pas//nyi ma bdun du bya ba yin//de nas nyin zhag bcu gcig par//me tog dag ni blangs na su//chu bo chen por song nas ni//re re nas ni chu la dor//de
45a4(rgyud): dag thams cad rims bzhin du//lan re bzlas nas rab tu bya/chu bor me tog tha ma ni//rgyun las bzlog ste rab 'bab na//chu dang bcas par blangs nas ni//
45a5(rgyud): sos ma reg par de 'thungs na//gsang ba'i rgyud las byung ba yi//sgrub po'i tshig ni 'grub par 'gyur//de nas skye gnas rgya bcings la//brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas ni//sngags pa
45a6(rgyud): bsgrub byar mngon phyogs na//bsgrub par bya ba'i lto bar gnas//de la yid kyi gnas bzhin du//blo ldan thun gosum mthe'u chung bskyod//bram ze gsod pa drug gis kyang //zhag
45a7(rgyud): bdun brgya byin sogs nges 'bugs//tsan dan dmar po'i rdul las ni//bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs byas la//tsha ba gsum gyis lus la bsku//pra tshil gyis kyang rab tu byug/
45b1(rgyud): sgrub pa po yi gsang gnasu//zangs ma'i khab kyis phug nas ni//seng ldeng mdag ma du med la//mkhas pas nyi ma bdun du bsro//lan brgya bzla te \u0f88\u0f90 I phar//mi yi bdag po mdun na 'don//btsun
45b2(rgyud): mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa ni//nges par 'gugs par byed pa yin//mi yi bdag po 'khor bcas pa//gro ga'i 'dab mar bI bya bA/gi wang dag gis bris nas ni//ming dang sbrel nas gang
45b3(rgyud): la ni/mngon par phyogs te brgya bzlas nas//seng ldeng me la de gdungs shing //dur khrod me steng sgrub phyir bshad//ji srid pra tshil ma zhu bar//bsros par gyur na rgyal po ni//'khor los
45b4(rgyud): bsgyur dang bcas par yang //nges par 'gugs par 'gyur ba yin//bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang rjes las//tsan dran dmar po nyid dang ni//dur khrod lhag ma thal bas spyos//sgrub pa po
45b5(rgyud): /yis gcig bsdus la//seng ldeng me ni du med la//rab tu 'bad pas bsre bar bya//rdul de lag pa gnyis kyis ni//mnyes nas sbyin sreg byas nas ni//ji srid du ni bsregs byas 'grug/
45b6(rgyud): rdul de blangs nas ma yengs par/dbugs mi 'byin par sbas na ni//brgyal bang sems dang bral 'dra la//myos shing skyon rmongs pa nyid dang //rlung gi shugs kyis 'ongs nas ni//sgrub
45b7(rgyud): ba bo yi steng du lhung /phyugs sam yang na pho nya mo//mkhas pa yis ni dbye ba yin//de nas las kyi pho nya mor//bya ba 'di ni 'dzin pa nyid//ka ra bi ra'i lcug ma ni/rlan bcas dpung pa'i/
46a1(rgyud): tshad mnyam blangs//'bar 'gyur bsregs me la dor//ji srid de ni mtshig pa//myur du song ste de blangs la//rig pa lan bdun bzlas nas ni//gang zhig bzlas te bskor
46a2(rgyud): nA ni//de ni dri yi skad cig la//skyes pa 'am bud med rang gzugs can//rlung gi shugs kyis 'ongs par 'gyur/ka ra bi ra'i me tog dmar//brgya bzlas rgyal gyis sbyor ba las//sgrub
46a3(rgyud): ge wang gis phyugs lnga//me tog tshu la gnas pa la//chu bo chen por zhugs nas ni//lte ba man chod chur 'dug ste//lag pa sbyar ba'i dbus gnas la//rig pa stong du bzlas nas ni//
46a4(rgyud): lag pa gnyis kyis phyir blangs te/chu dang bcas par btung bar bya//de nas sgrub pa po de yis//tshig gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur//rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i chung ma ni//yid kyis nges
46a5(rgyud): par 'gugs par 'gyur//lhar bcas lha mi mi rnams ni//myur du dbang du byed par 'gyur//khros pas tshig gis gsod 'gyur zhing //dbye dang bskrad pa nyid kyis dbye//sgrub pa po yi tshig
46a6(rgyud): nyid kyis//char gcod par ni byed par 'gyur//tshig tsam gyis ni chu bo'i dang //shing rta 'khrul 'khor rgya mtsho dang //glang po tsA dang de bzhin sprim/skyes bu 'am yang na bya yang gnom//
46a7(rgyud): yid kyis yid la gang 'dod pa//tshig gis thams cad byed par 'gyur//dgug pa yi ni sbyor ba dag/bud med thams cad rmongs byed pa/ka ra bai ri'i me tog ni//dmar po yang dag
46b1(rgyud): blangs nas//rig pa lan brgya bzlas pa dag/skye gnas dbus gzhugs par bya//me tog de ni kha sbyar byas//gsang ba'i gan su nges par sbyar//gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor ldan//sngags pas
46b2(rgyud): brgya phrag gcig tu bzlas//skye gnas dbus kyi me tog dang //sgrub pa po yis gcig blangs la//me tog gis ni gang bsnun pa//de ni mod la dbang du 'gyur//brgyal zhing sems dang
46b3(rgyud): bral ba yang //yan lag tshogs kun gzhan dbang ste//mngon 'gyur sems ni bzlog pa ru//skad cig gis ni dbang du byed//'di ni yid ches dngos grub ste//don yod dbang du byed pa
46b4(rgyud): yin//dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las rnal 'byor ma drug dang tshig gi dngos grub lung bstan pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o////de nas yi ge ha lnga ni//las
46b5(rgyud): /rnams thams cad sgrub byed pa//gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni//myur du dngos grub rab 'jug pa'o//haM hau ho ha/yi gro ha lnga 'ag pA yis//bskul dang ldan pas mnyes nas ni//
46b6(rgyud): kha nas kyang ni khrag 'jog cing //dgra bo de yi mod la 'chi//rang gi khrag ni thod gnas pa//srin lag gis khrag mnye bar bya//ji srid bskams kyi bar du ste//des ni bsgrub bya rnam
46b7(rgyud): par 'jig/gal te khro ba 'bar baM dang //mog dmar ba yis bzlas na ni//dpung tshogs gzhon par bcas pa yis//rgyal po myur du 'chi bar byed//bye la dang ni ne'u le dang //
47a1(rgyud): khra dang wa dang chu skyar ni//mkha 'gro ma la stobs can sbyar/'di dag myur du grub yin par//rgyud 'di la ni the tshom med//ri bong la sogs spu las ni//srad bu
47a2(rgyud): byas te lan stong bzlas//gang gis mgul du bcings gyur pa//de ni de dang 'dra bar 'gyur//log par bzlas brjod stong byas te//ka rA bi ra'i me tog dang //yi gau re re mngon bzlas
47a3(rgyud): lotsA sbrum ma la ni rig gyur na//mngal ni rnam par 'pho 'gyur te/bang na thar bar 'gyur ba yin/gang la bsdigs ma dzub byas te 'chi//slar yang 'tsho bar byed pa yin//dpal ci ru
47a4(rgyud): ka'i nges par brjod pa las yi ge ha lnga'i las kyi cho ga'i lo'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o////de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/mkha' gro kun gyi snying po ste//'di ni brjod pa
47a5(rgyud): tsam gyis kyang //dngos grub thams cad bskyed byed yin//de nas mkha'agro mo'i rig pa chen po bzlas na rigs thams cad dbong du byed par 'gyu ro//rtag tu bzlas brjod byas pas
47a6(rgyud): ni dpal chen po bskyed par 'gyur ro//mi rus kyi rgyu la phur bu sor drug pa byas la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas nas gang gi sgor spros pa de'i rigs brgyad rnams gcod par
47a7(rgyud): 'gyuraro//zheng dang ra~M ba dang ma he dang glang po che dang /rta'i gnasu brkos te sbas na thams cad sbas par 'gyuraro//de nas rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i blon po dbang du bya bar 'dod na
47b1(rgyud): rgyal ba'i sgor sa la byas pa'i gzugs brnyan sar brgyad pa byas la/mkhas pas bzhag nas nyin zhag dang po la ma tu lung ka'i me tog dang 'bras bu rnams dang ku su ma byasres pas smyan
47b2(rgyud): sreg brgya stong byas nad dbang du 'gyur//sngags 'di nyid kyis dgug pa dang /skems pa dang /rmongs pa dang /tshig 'phrog pa dang /long bar byed pa dang /dag pa nyid dang /slar gtong bar byed do//de
47b3(rgyud): nas skyes pa bud med du bya bar 'dod na skyes pa'i ro'i me tog dang /kA ga an di ka'i 'bras bu dang /khwa'i snyen mo dang /rkang pa'i 'og gI lpags pa cha mnyam par byas la ri bong gi khrag
47b4(rgyud): dang btags te ril bu bcu gcig byas la grib ma la ska mo//de bzhin du zhag bzang po la lag pas bcings te nyi ma gnyis pa la gang gi spyi bor phye ma bzhag pa de bud med du 'gyur ro//de nas/
47b5(rgyud): skyes pa khyer bya bar 'dod no gonam lcags ni'u lde'i mgo bor bzhug la mtshan mo bdun gyi bar du brgya stong sbyin sreg byas la nyin zhag brgyad pa la gur gum dang mnyam por sbyar te//lan
47b6(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas nas phye ma'i sbyin sreg byas la de'i thal ba gang gi spyi bor bzhag pa de khyir 'gyuraro//slar gso ba ni mtshan mo'i dusu mkha 'gro ma rnams la mchod pa
47b7(rgyud): chen po byas te gtor ma byin na de'i 'og tu rnal mar 'gyur ro//rdzas rdzas ma yin par bya bar 'dod na/gsor gyi 'bras bu sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na rdzas ma yin par 'gyuraro/
48a1(rgyud): A ru ra'i sbyin sreg byas na rnal mar 'gyuraro//de nas skyo bar bya bar 'dod na bya chen po gnas kyi sbyin sreg byas na nyi ma bdun pa la spyo bar 'gyuraro//slar bzlog pa ni/
48a2(rgyud): 'bras kyi phub ma'i sbyin sreg byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro//byi la'i spu zla ba gzas zin pa'i tshe bsdus la gang gi ming nas smos nas sngags kyi sbyin sreg byas nas thal ba de gang gi
48a3(rgyud): spyi bor bzhag pa de byo lar 'gyuraro//slar bzlas na rnam par zhi bar 'gyur ro//bya rog gi rgyus pa la srad bu byas pa bzung la mngon par bzlas te gang gi mgul du bcings pa de bya
48a4(rgyud): rog tu 'gyur//gang dang gang gi rgyus pa sna srad bu byas pa la mngon par bzlas te mgul du bcings pa de de dang 'dra ba 'gyuraro//de bzhin khra dang thi ba dang rma bya dang //chu skyar dang /
48a5(rgyud): 'ug pa dang /khwa dang bya rgod kyi gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro//ba lang gi spu la srad bu byas la lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas te mgul du bcings na de ba lang du 'gyuraro//rgong
48a6(rgyud): bzhi pa la sogs pa gang dang gang gi spu lngas srad bu byas la mngon par bzlas te mgul du btags na de de'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyu ro//bkrol na thar par 'gyur ro//'bras so/
48a7(rgyud): ba la bzlas la nor gyi bdag po chen po'i khyim du bcug la lhag mas bdag nyid dang dbang bskur na mtshan bdun gyis so ba thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur//dpal he ru
48b1(rgyud): ka'i nges par brjod pa las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mkha' gro ma'i sngags kyi las thams cad kyi cha ga'i le'u ste bcwa bcu rtsa bdun pa'o//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/
48b2(rgyud): mkha' gro kun gyi dge gang ba'i//snying po rnal 'byor ma kun gyi//'dod do thams cad sgrub byed pa'o//gang zhig dran pa tsam gyis ni//'jig rten gsum po ga yo byed cing //rdza su dran pa tsam
48b3(rgyud): gyis kyang //yang dag dngos grub rim gyiso//hwA s+t+wa~MT pa hUM yo nI r+N+Na ba dz+nyA ba yA nI ki DA bud+d+ho trAs oM//sngags 'di bklags pas grub pa ste/las rnams kun byed dge ba yin//mkha'agro
48b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma rnams dang //khaN+Da ro he lA ma sogs//mkha' 'gro ma ni thams cad kyi//sngags ni 'di nyid yin par grags//sa 'og yang ni mtho ris sam//de bzhin mi yul
48b5(rgyud): dag tu yang //las ni gang dag yod pa dag/sngags kyis de dag thams cad sgrub//dngos grub kun byed dge ba yin//dngos grub thams cad rab stsol pa//'di las shin tu mchog
48b6(rgyud): gyur med//'jig rten gsum na ci yang med//gang phyir 'di ni bla med de//las rnams thams cad sgrub byed yin//mkha 'gro ma ni kun gyi gnas//mngor bshad rgyas par
48b7(rgyud): ma yinano//me tog 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi//ri bo bzang po bri bya zhing //de yi steng du rtag bsgom pa//mkha' 'gro de bzhin lA ma dang //khaN+Da ro he rnal 'byor ma//dpa' bo rnams kyi
49a1(rgyud): da' bo nyi//ha ha ha haM zhes bya ga dpa' bany+tsa shu d+d+ha bzhi yi//mkha 'gro d+hU ba'i bud mchog yin//rdo rje sems dpa' rnam snang mdzad//de bzhin du
49a2(rgyud): gar dbang dang //shrI hUM ru ka nyid dang ni//mkha' snying dang ni rta mgrin nyid//rin chen rdo rje stobs po che//mig mi bzang dang 'jigs byed dang //rdo rje bzang dang rab bzang dang //rdorje
49a3(rgyud): hUM mdzad dpa' chen po//dbezhin rdo rje ralnga pa can//myu gu can dang rdo rje'i lus//rdo rje 'dre ni nyid dag dang //'od dpag med dang lha yi dag/de bzhin mche ba rnams gtsigs dang /
49a4(rgyud): keng rus keng rus chen po dang //thod pa'i dum b+hu la sogs pa//dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa ba ni yis//'gro ba 'di dag thams cad khyed//dpa' bo rnams dang mkha' gro nyid//rnal 'byor ma
49a5(rgyud): ni rab gtum sogs//bya ba kun la sgrub pa pos//'khor bar zhugs par blta bar bya//grub 'dod shin tu mnyam gzhag pas//'khor lo'i bdag nyid rtag tu sgom//sngor bshad/
49a6(rgyud): pa yi cho ga yis//ma/'gro dri bya'i blo mchog brjod//'khor lo chen po grub kun gnas//de bzhin dngos grub kun gyi bzhi//'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba dang //dpa' bo byi bas
49a7(rgyud): legs par gsungs//mkha' gro ma ni re re yi//'khor ni bye ba dag tu 'gyur//rnal 'byor ma ni mkha'agro nyid//gzugs can ma dang dum skyes mo//de bzhin lA ma la sogs ni//
49b1(rgyud): dngos grub kun byed dag pa yin//dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las dpa' bo dang mkha'agro ma thams cad kyi gnas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o//
49b2(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//ji bzhin cho gas phyugs bsgrub bya//gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni//myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'o//sngags pas 'bras kyi phye ma las//rim
49b3(rgyud): /bzhin du ni phyugs gzugs bya//mi dang rus sbal rnga me dang //bong bu spyang ku rta la sogs//de ltar sna tshogs phag dag ste//phyugs 'di dag tu shes par bya//mtshan nyid ji ltar gyur pa dang //
49b4(rgyud): 'di rnams las ni bshad par bya//skye ba gcig dang skye ba gnyis//gsum mam bzhi 'am lnga nyid dam//skye ba drug dang 'dun gyur pa//phyugs rnams ni gdon mi rba//gang gis kha yi dri zhim
49b5(rgyud): zhing //mig mi 'dzum par rnam par br-il+la//badren par spro zhing mthong na dga'//rtag tu dam chos dgar 'gyur zhing //rang gi skye ba shes pa dang //lus kyi dri ni rtag tu zhim//mtshan nyid 'di dag
49b6(rgyud): ldan par ni//skye ba bdun du 'byung ba yin//de ni zos pa tsam gyis ni//lha yi gzugs ni 'dzin par 'gyur//bsnams po 'am reg pa tsam gyis sam/gang gis thig le byed pa ste/
49b7(rgyud): med la 'grub par 'gyur ba ste//'di ni rang dga'i gzugs 'chang 'gyur//de yi snying ka'i ro tsa na'o//mkhas pa yis ni blangs nas ni//snying po'i sngags ni bzlas na su//de yi
50a1(rgyud): thig le bya ba yin//sems can gang dang gang gi ni//gzugasu byed par 'dod pa na//de dang de yi gzugasu ni//thig les 'gyur bar the tshom med//mkhas pas shing lo khu ba ni//
50a2(rgyud): /ro tsa nar bcas blangs na su//dpral ba thib le byas nas ni//de gzugs 'gyur ba the tshom med//phyugs nyid kyi ni ba spu yis//lag pa spyi bor bcing bar bya//de yi yan lag lngar ldan zhing //
50a3(rgyud): de yi spu dang rnam bsres la//lag pa spyi bor bcing na ni//de yi gzugs 'gyur the tshom med//rnal 'byor pa ni bsgoms shing zlos//mi rnams nus pa ldan yin yang //dka' zhing nyon
50a4(rgyud): mongs la dga' ba//dngos grub lam ni 'grog pa yin//glang po rta dang bong bu dang //ru sbal nga mo phag dang wa//khA dang 'ug sogs bya rgod dang //khrung khrung khA dang sa ra la//gzugs bzang
50a5(rgyud): ba dang gzugs den dang //lha yi gzugasu de 'gyur ro//rnal 'byor dpa' chen rang dga'i gzugs//skye 'gyur 'di la the tshom med//'di bas shin tu mchog grub pa//'jig rten gsum na
50a6(rgyud): yod ma yin//dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las skye ba bdun pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs yongasu brje ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o////de nas sbyin sreg cho ga ni//
50a7(rgyud): nges par dbang du byed 'gyur ba/yang dag che ga gang gos ni//myur du dngos grub thob 'gyur bshad//go mAng sa ni myos byed bsre//lag pa g.yon pas sbyin sreg byas//sangs rgyas kyang
50b1(rgyud): ni dbang 'gyur na//phran tshegs mi ni smos ci dgos//kha chu so shing dag dang ni//de bzhin rang gi lus brnyes pa//myos byed mi dang bcas pa yis//khams gsum po ni dbang du 'gyur//zla mtshan gyi ni khrag
50b2(rgyud): dang ni//zos nas rlon pa'i zas dag dang //mi yi sgra dang ldan pa yis//mod la 'gugs par 'gyur ba yin//rang gi lus las skyugs pa 'am//mkhas pas rang skas sbyin bsreg bya//nim pa'i
50b3(rgyud): shing la rab sbyar nas//mod la dbye bar 'gyu ba yin//mnyam par gzhag pas d+ha du me//nyungs mang mtshan deraru bsgres pA yI//bya rog bshog pas sbyin bsreg byas//'phral du 'chi ba 'am
50b4(rgyud): skrod par 'gyur//nyal dang ma nyal 'dug pa 'am//zas dang sbyor ba sogs rnams la'ang /mkhas pas rtag tu rmo d+yod na//dwe l+r-i bgegs ni yod ma yin//wa yi sha yis sreg blugs brgyas//
50b5(rgyud): yang dag bsregs blugs byed pa'i me//de ni zla ba gsum rjes la//rigs kyi dbul ba 'jigs par 'gyur//sho tshon dag gis la la zhig/myos byed ldan pas sbyin sreg byed//brgya rtsa brgyad
50b6(rgyud): kyi bar du ni//sgrub pa pa ni thun gsum byed//ma lus sa rnams spyod pa dang //zla ba drug gis dbang du 'gyur//tshim 'gyur mkha' phro ma de la//rgyal srid ster bar gdon mi za//lha rnams thams
50b7(rgyud): cad bsgoms nas ni//thun gnyis bar du sbyin sreg byas//rang gi lus ni de nyid kyis//mkha' la 'gro ba nyid thob 'gyur//go yu ba yi sha chang gis//phyi dang nang gi sbyin bsreg bya//myur du de
51a1(rgyud): yi lag tu 'gyur//dngos grub thams cad rab tu 'jug/sngag kyi bzlas brjod mtshan mo bzlas//yul 'khor yang ni 'gugs par byed//de ltar nyin re byas na ni//rgyal po
51a2(rgyud): nyid du de byed 'gyur//'di las rab mchog gzhan dag ni//'jig rten gsum na yod ma yin//rnal 'byor chen po rang dgas 'chi//sna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin cing rol//bil ba de
51a3(rgyud): bzhin pa la shwa/u dum bA ra nyid dag ni//sbyin sreg 'bum byas myur du ni//nor gyi bdag po chen por 'gyur//go mAngs dang myos byed ba sre//rgyal srid 'dod pas sbyin bsreg bya//rnal 'byor
51a4(rgyud): dbang phyug mnyes byas na//dbul po nyid du ga la 'gyur//kau ma yuM ni bsreg byas pas//ci bde bar ni 'grub par 'gyur//gau ma yu yis sbyin sreg gis//myur du nor bdag mnyam par
51a5(rgyud): 'gyur//brtul zhugs gtsang sgra med ni yang //bstan pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur//lhag pa'i tshe dang sku sman TaM//mun ga ma sha tsi na ka/sbrang rtsi gtsigs ma skye tshe dang //khyim/
51a6(rgyud): gyi ta ma la 'dab blangs//ga btsongs par ni 'gyur ba yin//ci rung spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa//gang du dga' bo der gnaso//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//rnal 'byor ma yi so
51a7(rgyud): dang gnas//he ru ka dpal rgyu yan lag/thams cad brtan g.yo'i bdag nyid can//gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa//de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med//zhing 'dir 'od byed shes par
51b1(rgyud): /bya//nywa nga'i zhing ni 'od 'phro ba//tshen do ha ni mngon 'gyur zhing //nye ba'i tshwan do spyang dka' ba//'dus pa ring du song ba yin//nye bar 'dus pA mi ba yo ba//dur khrod legs pa'i blo bros nyid//nye ba
51b2(rgyud): dur khrod chos kyi sprin//shrI he ru ka gzhung spyod pa yi//'di ni nang gI bdag nyid sa//pha rol phyin bcu sa rnams ni//rnal 'byor mA yI brda yi skad//mtho ris sa steng sa 'og tu//dpa' bo'i
51b3(rgyud): yin lag brtan g.yo'i bde//pu lIr la sogs gang bstan pa//phyi nas bdag nyid can du gnas//dpal ldan khrag 'thung rgyal po che//'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug gtso//kun tu phyag dang
51b4(rgyud): zhabs ldan zhing //thams cad du ni spyan zhal dbu//kun tu thos ldan 'jig rten na//thams cad g.yogs te rnam par bzhugs//de nas dngos grub bsgrub bya ba//bsam gtan ldan pa'i
51b5(rgyud): sems kyis te//sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir//gsang ba 'di nyid gsungs pa yin//dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las dang gi sbyin sreg dang gnas la sogs pa'i sa bstan pa'i
51b6(rgyud): cho ga'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o///de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//man ngag shin tu rnyed dka' ste//dpa' bo'i brda yi skad du na//nga yos rgyud tu sbas pa yin//gos dang phyag rgya lU la
51b7(rgyud): sogs//shes rab yan lag phur bu dra//A li ki li zhes brjod pa//rgyu la sogs stong sngon 'gro ba//'jug pa sgra la sogs pa nas//ji srid bsdus pa'i sbyor ldan pa//bdud rtsi tshem
52a1(rgyud): byed mya ngan 'das//lag pa'i mchod pa'i dbang bskur ba//go cha chen pos yang dgra srung //sngags rnams kun gyis mchod par bya//de ltar de nyid bcu bzhi ni//mdor
52a2(rgyud): bsdus nas ni bshad pa yin//maM mchog gang zhig kun spyod pa//sdig pa thams cad rnam dag bdag/de bzhin gshegs pas 'thob cing //skye dong skye bar bde gshegs kyi//rigs
52a3(rgyud): skyes rgyal po chos ldan 'gyur//ji ltar sngon sogs sdig pa yi//mtshan nyid thams cad dman pa ste//gang zhig 'di ni rtag sgom pa//sa la 'dod po kun dbyung phyug/dper na mar gyi
52a4(rgyud): gang ba'i snod//me yid bus su bzhag no ni//myer snar steng du zhu 'gyur zhing //snod kyi dri ma 'jigs par 'gyur//de bzhin shrI hU~M ka yi//mtshan gyi sdig pa 'jig par 'gyur//bsam/
52a5(rgyud): gtan sems dpa' tsam gyis sam/klog cing khaM ta~M ni dris pa yis//mtho ris longs spyod thob 'gyur ba//yang ni 'khor lo smai bsgyur ba 'thob//rnal 'byor pa rnams 'pho bya'i
52a6(rgyud): tshekhrag 'thung dpal sogs rnal 'byor ma//la thu na me tog sna tshogs thogs//rgyal mtshan pa de ni sna tshogs dang //rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang //sna tshogs gru yi mchod
52a7(rgyud): pa yis//'chi ba zhes bya rnam rtog 'di//mkha' spyod gnasu khrid par byed//de 'dra'i dpa' chen rnal 'byor ma//sa stengs na ni rnyed par dka'//dpal ldan he ru ka'i rgyud
52b1(rgyud): chen//gang zhig shes nas ma dad pa//dbul po sdug bsngal gyis gdungs par//de la rtag tu 'byung bar 'gyur//mgul rgyun gdu bu dpung rgyan dang //rna rgyan tshangs pa'i skud pa dang //do shul
52b2(rgyud): mgo byed ba dang //sgrarag sa stsol la m+b+ha hU~Mgs te/rings sna tshogs IM li ka /kar mi dag pa rnam gnan cing //rdo rje dril zlas sprul la b+ha
52b3(rgyud): rtsa bzhi'i phyed ldan pa'i//dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs dang //he ru ka dpal rgyal po che'i//go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya//dpa' byo kun dang rnal 'byor ma'i//'khor bcas dbusu
52b4(rgyud): sbyor ldan pa//thams cad dgyes shing gnyis med gyur//'byin dang sdud par mdzad pa yin//mos pa du ma'i sems can la//spyod pa sna tshogs ston mdzad do//sna tshogs tshul gyis gdul bya/
52b5(rgyud): gau/thabs ni sna tshogs ston pa yin//zab mo'i chos ni ston pa la//gal te mos par ma gyur kyang //smod pa dag tu mi bya ste/chos nyid bsam mi khyab drin bya//gang gis 'dir bdag
52b6(rgyud): yul min pa//gang gisna chos nyid mi shes yin//rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de'i sras ni//bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis mkhyen//sangs rgyas rnams ni byung gyur tam//ma byung na yang
52b7(rgyud): rnam kun tu//bsam mi khyab pa'i chos nyid ni//'phel 'grib spangs pas gnas pa yin//de ltar rnam par bzhag nas kyang //'jig rten pa kun yong mi smad//de yi bgrod pa
53a1(rgyud): bsam yas shing //sangs rgyas rol pa bsam mi khyab//mdo sde bya ba spyod pa rnams//rnal 'byor gsang mtha'i dbye ba nyid//sems can mos pas 'jug
53a2(rgyud): pa rnams//de dang de la dga' ba bzhin//dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa 'bum pa'i nang nas phyung ba grub pa'i rtog pa rlud du byung ba ngo mtshar dang bcas par byed pa bstan
53a3(rgyud): chos thams cad kyi rgyal po dpalA he ru ka dpA'o chen po bklags pas grub pa gzhan thams cad kyi mi thub pa gdod nas grub pa bla ma yi no//dpal he ru ka'i nges par
53a4(rgyud): brjod pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las le'u lnga bcu gcig pa rdzogaso////rgya gar pa Na chen pad+ma ka ra dang //grags pa yid 'ong rgyal mtshan
53a5(rgyud): mtho ldan pa'i//rin chen dang mtshungs rin chen bzang po yi//mkhas pa pad+ma ka ra'i zhal sngar ni//rig pa'i 'byung gnas kha che'i dpe las bsgyur//lhag pa'i tshul khrims dri
53a6(rgyud): yis bsgos gyur cing //dri med dka' don 'thad pa dang bcas par//rtogs pa dang ldan grags pa'i zhal sngar ni//sgra sbyar dge slong pradz+nyA kIrti dang //mar pa sgra sgyur chos kyi dbang
53a7(rgyud): byug gis//mkhas pa'i 'byung gnas yul dbus kyi bla ma nA ro pa'i phyag dpe dang gtugs pa'o///rgya gar skad du/oM b+hi d+ha na ut+ta ra tan+ta nA mo//bod skad du/mngon
53b1(rgyud): par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma zhes bya ba//bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje mkha'agro la phyag 'tsha'o//ji srid 'gro ba drug gi mthar//sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par 'byung //rdo rje sems dpa' yis
53b2(rgyud): ni byed//chos kyi dbyings la phyag 'tshal bstod//dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni//sku gsum ye shes lnga yi dngos//mkha' gro ma yi 'khor lor bzhugs//'gro ba sgrol la phyag 'tshal bstod//
53b3(rgyud): ji srid rdo rje mkha' gro ma//kun tu rtog pa'i bcings pa bcad//'jig rten bya ba rab tu 'jug/de srid rtag tu phyag 'tshal bstod//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus tsog na/bcom ldan
53b4(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro ba dang /mkha' gro dang /mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi gsang ba'i snying po la rnam par bzhugs te/der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
53b5(rgyud): pa thams cad pa bcom ldan 'das thog ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro bo dang mkha' gro
53b6(rgyud): dang /mkha' gro ma'i dra ba mngon par brjod pa'i bla ma'i snying po ngas bshad kyis/lag na rdo rje khro bo chen po'i bdag po 'khor sna tshogs par rnam par 'phrul pa rgyas par bshad kyis
53b7(rgyud): legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig/de la bcom ldan 'das la log so//zhes gsol te/thal mo sbyar ba btud pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/de nas gsang ba
54a1(rgyud): bshad bya ba//mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas par min//dpal he ru ka yang dag spyod//'dod par dan kun sgrub byed lan//bla ma lngas kyang bla ma ni//mngon par brjod pa'i phyi ma ste//ma
54a2(rgyud): 'bro ma yi dra ba'i sdom//gsang ba mchog gi bgyes pa na//thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs//mkha' gro sgyu ma sems dpa' ni//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/'dir ni rang
54a3(rgyud): 'byung bcom ldan dpa'//mkha' gro dra ba'i sdom pa yin//thog ma med pa'i tshul chen 'di//b+ha gar srid sgra gzugs skyes gnas//dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul yin//thog mar dbus mthar//
54a4(rgyud): dri ma med//'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba//bsrub dang bsrungs par yang dag spyod//gang la de la ji ltar bzhin//rang bzhin dag pa 'od gsal ba//gsang ba'i gnas las byung ba
54a5(rgyud): yin//rtag tu nyes bral zhi ba ste//na mkha' dang ni mnyam gyur pa//spro dang bsdu bo byed pa yin//rang bzhin dag pa rang 'byung ste//rnal 'byor ma yi bde ba ster//bzlas dang bsam gtan
54a6(rgyud): ldan pa dang //sbyor nyid cho ga'i ye shes kyi//de dag rgyud las gsungs pa dang /gsang ba'i bdag po rab tu nyon//dbugs 'byin par ma mchog dag dang //dri yi chu dang bcas pa drag/
54a7(rgyud): mkhas pas rol bur byas nas ni//'khor gi dkyil 'khor dag la mchod//'byung ba'i dus kyi khyad par la//pho nyas lhan cig skyes pa 'grub//mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma ste//
54b1(rgyud): mthar thug dngos grub thams cad 'byung //dga' ba yid la 'dod pa yi//dngos grub kyang ni 'grub par 'gyur//rasa? rdzas thig les sangs rgyas drang //byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya//rang gi lha yi sbyor
54b2(rgyud): ba yis//rang dang gzhan yang mchod par bya//mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang //thos pa dang ni dran pa yis//sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur te//de ltar 'di la the tshom med//rnal 'byor pa nyid bsod
54b3(rgyud): nams mchog/dag byed sdig pa 'jig par byed//bzlas dang bsam gtan dag pas kyang //skye ba 'di la dngos grub 'gyur//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dam tshig la 'jug/
54b4(rgyud): pa'i gsang ba sbas po bsten pa ste le'u dang po'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings la rnam par 'khrul pa zhes bya ba khro bo chen po'i ting 'dzin la snyoms
54b5(rgyud): par zhugs nas dngos grub thams cad kyi gsang ba gsungs pa/chags pa med cing chags pa dang bral ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems
54b6(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'di lta ste/dpa' bo chen po gzugs rdo rje zhes bya ba dang /dpa' bo chen po tshur ba rdo rje zhes bya ba dang /dpa' bo chen po 'du shes rdo rje zhes bya ba dang /
54b7(rgyud): dpa' bo chen po 'du byed rdo rje zhes bya ba dang /dpa' bo chen po rnam par shes pa rdo rje zhes bya ba dang /chos kyi dbyings kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gtso bo rdo rje dbong phyug chen po
55a1(rgyud): dang /dpa' bo chen po gti mug rdo rje dang /dpa' bo chen po na pa rdo rje dang /dpa' ngo chen po rdo rje dang /da' bo chen po chags pa rdo rje dang /dpa' bo chen po phrag dog rdo rje dang /
55a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug shes bya ba'i dpa' bo chen po dang /dpa' bo chen pos rdo rje dang /dpa' bo chen po chu rdo rje dang /dpa' bo chen po me rdo rje dang /dpa' bo chen po rlung
55a3(rgyud): rdo rje dang /dpa' bo chen po mkha' dbyings rdo rje dang /'di lta bu la sogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa mtha' yas pa rnam par 'phro ba'i gsang
55a4(rgyud): ba'i snying po 'byung bas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sna tshogs 'dus pa gsang ba gsum gyi dam tshig gi 'khor lo dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/dpa' bo chen po rdo rje thod pa'i dum bu
55a5(rgyud): dang /dpa' bo chen po rdo rje keng rus chen po dang /dpa'i bo chen po rdo rje keng rus dang /dpa' bo chen po rdo rje mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang /dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rtsa dgra dang /dpa' bo chen
55a6(rgyud): po rdo rje dpag med dang /dpa' de chen po rdo rje 'od dang /dpa' bo chen po rdo rje lus dang /dpa' bo chen po rdo rje myu gu dang /dpa' bo chen po rdo rje ral pa can dang /dpa' bo chen po rdo rje dpa' bo
55a7(rgyud): chen po dang /dpa' bo chen po rdo rje hUM mdzad dang /dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rab bzang dang //dpa' bo chen po rdo rje bzang po dang /dpa' bo chen po rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po dang /dpa' bo chen po
55b1(rgyud): rjemig mi banang dpapa' mchen rdo rdo rje stoms pache dang da' ngo chen pordo rje rin chen dang /dpa' ngo chen po rdo rje rta chog dang /da' ngargyan pa rdo rje rnam pa d+har po dang /da 'di rgyan dro dz+nyAn+da
55b2(rgyud): dpal he ru ka chen po dang /dpa' bo chen po rdo rje pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang /dpa' ngo chen po rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad dang /dpa' bo chen po rdo rje sems dpa' dang /'di lta bu la sogs pa'i
55b3(rgyud): dpa' bo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis na mkha'i khams thams cad yongasu grang bar mthong ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig
55b4(rgyud): gnyisu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/rang gi gsang ba'i dam tshig gsang ba'i b+ha ga las 'byung brnal 'byor ma dang /dpa' bo'i gsang ba'i dam tshig gnyisu
55b5(rgyud): med pa'i sbyor ba'i dam tshig chen po gsungs pa 'di lta ste/rnal 'byor mtshan mo ltung byed ma zhes bya ba dang /rnal 'byor ma chen mo gsod byed ma zhes bya ba dang /rnal 'byor ma chen mo//
55b6(rgyud): 'bugs byed ma zhes bya ba dang /rnal 'byor ma chen mo pad+ma'i dra ba mo zhes bya ba dang /mkha'agro ma tshan mo rdo rje mkha' gro ma zhes bya ba dang /mkha' bro ma chen mo rdo rje lA ma zhes bya ba
55b7(rgyud): dang /mkha 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje dum skyes ma zhes bya ba dang /mkha' gro mtshan mo rdo rje gzugs can ma zhes bya ba dang /rnal 'byor ma chen mo rab gtum ma zhes bya ba dang /rnal 'byor
56a1(rgyud): ma chen mo gtum mig ma zhes bya ba dang /rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'ong ldan ma zhes bya ba dang /rnal 'byor ma chen mo sna chen mo zhes bya ba dang /rnal 'byor ma chen mo dpa' ba'i
56a2(rgyud): blo gros ma zhes bya ba dang /rnal 'byor ma tshan mo mi'u thung ma zhes bya ba dang /rnal 'byor ma chen mo lang ka'i dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba dang /rnal 'byor ma chen mo shing grib ma zhes bya
56a3(rgyud): ba dang /rnal 'byor ma chen mo sa dasrungs ma zhes bya ba dang /rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'jig byed chen mo zhes bya ba dang /rnal 'byor mtshon mo rlung gi shugs can ma zhes bya ba dang /rnal
56a4(rgyud): 'byor ma tshan mo chang 'thung ma zhes bya ba dang /rnal 'byor ma chen mo sngo bsangs ma zhes bya ba dang /rnal 'byor ma chen mo rab bzang ma zhes bya ba dang /rnal 'byor ma chen mo rta rnam zhes bya ba
56a5(rgyud): dang /rnal 'byor ma tshan mo bya gdong ma zhes bya ba dang /rab 'byor ma chen mo 'khor lo'i shugs can ma zhes bya ba dang /rnal 'byor ma chen mo dum skyes ma zhes bya ba dang /rnal 'byor ma
56a6(rgyud): chen mo tshang 'tshong ma zhes bya ba dang /rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'khor lo'i go cha ma zhes bya ba dang /rnal 'byor mo tshan mo rab dpa' mo zhes bya ba dang /rnal 'byor ma chen mo stobs chen
56a7(rgyud): ma zhes bya ba dang /rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'khor los bsgyur ma zhes bya ba dang /rnal 'byor ma chen mo brtson 'grus chen mo zhes bya ba dang /de lta bu la sogs pa sna tshogs pas
56b1(rgyud): na mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug par hUM dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs pa/gar sna tshogs byed cing rang gi dam tshig dang 'khyud pa dang /tsum b+ha nas snying rje chen po'i ro yongasu rdzogs pa'i dpa' bo dang /rnal 'byor ma
56b2(rgyud): rnams kyis gang bar mthong //mthong nas zhus te/dpa' bo'i mchog rnams kyis dam tshig rje su dra no//dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang /mkha 'gro ma rdo rje phag mo'i dam tshig gnyisu med pa'i ye
56b3(rgyud): shes yang dag par 'byung zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyi rigs dang gsang ba gsungs pa 'di lta ste/rdo rje ma
56b4(rgyud): me khA gdong ma zhes bya ba dang /rdo rje ma mo 'ug gdong mo zhes bya ba dang /rdo rje ma mo khyi gdong ma zhes bya ba dang /rdo rje me mo phag gdong ma zhes bya ba dang /rdo rje ma mo gshwan r+d+he bsrug
56b5(rgyud): ma zhes bya ba dang /rdo rje ma mo gshin rje pho nya ma zhes bya ba dang /rdo rje ma mo ga shin rje mtsho ba ma zhes bya ba dang /rdo rje ma mo gshin rje 'joms ma zhes bya ba dang /'di lta bu'i ma mo'i tshog
56b6(rgyud): kyi mchog thams cad kyis na mkha'i khams thams cad gang ste/rigs kyi bdag po rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gnyisu med pa'i ye shes 'byung ba dpal ha ru
56b7(rgyud): ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bdag nyid dam tshig chen po rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig yin te/chos rnams thams cad dngos po med//mtshan nyid thams cad rnam par spangs//
57a1(rgyud): bdag nyid chos las yang dag byung //'di ni dam tshig mchog yin//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnyis gnyis med pa'i rdo rje go cha zhes bya ba'i rdo rje dmatshan
57a2(rgyud): gsungs pa 'di lta ste/rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje sems dpa' dang /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje dang /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po pad+mag/
57a3(rgyud): gyi dbang phyug dang /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje tAM rA ka dang /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje nyi ma dang /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen de rdo rje rta mchog dang /rigs drug
57a4(rgyud): pa de ni yan lag drug tu dgod pa ste/srung ba gnyi su med po'i dam tshig gi mchog de ni thabs dang shes rab gnyi su med pa las byung //rnal 'khyer chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba skyes
57a5(rgyud): pa bshad par bya ste/rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo rdo rje phag mo dang /rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo ya mi ni dang /rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo rmongs byed ma dang /rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo g.yo
57a6(rgyud): byed ma dang /rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo sgrub byed ma dang /rdo rje dbang phyug chen po tsaN+Di ka ste/'di lta bus yang na mkha'i khams dang /chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi gnyi su med
57a7(rgyud): dom tshig yang dag par srung ba'i sbyor ba'i thugs gsang ba chen po ste/de lta bu sna tshigs du ma'i rnal 'byor ma rang gi lag pas khrag dron mo tshig gi mchod pa byas nas thal
57b1(rgyud): mo sbyar te/mos pa mchog gi spyi bos gtug so//de nas dam tshig chen po rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/rang gi ba spu'i bu ga nas sems dpa' sna
57b2(rgyud): tshetshogs spros te phyung nas gdul ba du ma la thabs sna tshogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings yongasu gang bar byas te/sna tshogs pas mdun gyi na mkha' yongasu gang bar mthong ///
57b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs sna tshogs pa'i snying rje chen po'i khro bo'i cha lugs 'dzin cing sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir gnyi su med pa'i ro dga' ba sna tshogs kyi cho 'phrul rdul snyed
57b4(rgyud): dang mnyam pa bstan te/khams gsum gyi bdag pos gsungs pa/chu dang me dang rlung dang /dbang chen gyi steng du sna tshogs pa'i ri'i rgyal po'i rab sna tshogs rin po che sna tshogs pa'i gzi brjid kyis/
57b5(rgyud): mdzes pa/de'i steng du dpal rdo rje sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings las rdo rje khro bo chen po phyung nas spros te/rdo rje chen po'i gzhal yas khang dkyil 'khor chen por sprul pa la kun tu bzang po chen
57b6(rgyud): po byung ste/rdo rje 'khor dang lhan cig byung nas brtan par bzhug so//phun sum tshogs pa sna tshogs pas rgyan pa/rdo rje rin po che'i rgyan gyis spud pa/zla ba dang nyi ma'i mdog ltar sdug pa/dril bu
57b7(rgyud): dang /rnga yab dang /rgyal mtshan dang /g.yer ka'i dra bas mog mangs ro su dris pa/rdo rje dam tshig srad bu chos kyi 'khor lo la 'jug po'i sgra sgrogs pa sna tshogs pa'i lha dang /klu dang /
58a1(rgyud): gnad sbyin dang /srin bu dang /'byung po dang /yi dgas dang /sha za dang /smyo byed dang /brjed byed dang /grib gnon dang /ma rungs pa dang /shin tu gdug pa dang /
58a2(rgyud): langs dang /ro dang /ro sreg pa dang /khyi dang /lce spyad dang /lce spyang mo'i sgra sgrogs pa/dpo' bo dang /mkha' gro dang /mkha 'gro ma'i sgra phreng dang /a la la'i sgra sgrogs pa/dril bu dang /
58a3(rgyud): cang te'u'i sgra sgrogs pa mgo bcad pa gar byed pas nye bar rgyan po/bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyod pa dang /dge ba'i las kyis grol ba sems can thams cad la snying rje'i ros
58a4(rgyud): phan 'drogs pa/rnam par 'khor bas bskor ba/pad+ma'i gar gyis gar byed cing thal mo sbyor ba/g.yos brkyang pas gnas pa/lag pa'i thal mo sbyar ga sangs rgyas thod pa'i
58a5(rgyud): dum pa'i chos kyi mchog zab mo'i'o tshul dang /khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i 'dod pa ston po/sku lus chen po 'dzin pa/zab mo'i sgra sgrogs pa/rang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ca
58a6(rgyud): mngon par brjod pa'i bla ma chen mo nye bar 'byung gi mkha' gro dang mkha' gro me'i sdom pa'i rgyal po'i dra ba'i dra ba can/chos sna tshogs pa'i rjesu bstan pa'i ston pa/sems can/
58a7(rgyud): gyi bsam pa sna tshogs kyi bde ba ster zhing ston par byed pa sems dpa' chen po legs leg so//lag na rdo rje legs par nyon cig/mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/
58b1(rgyud): zhu ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rdogs pa'i snying po gsungs pa/snying kar zla ba bsgoms nas ni//rdo rje phra
58b2(rgyud): mo'i rnam 'phrul pa//bang gshegs thams cad gsang ba ni//mkha' gro mu yi dra ba'i sdom//der ni gsang ba byin rlabs pa//snying po mchog ni legs pa nyon//bla ma yi yang bla ma ste//mkha'agro
58b3(rgyud): ma yi dra ba'i sdom//oM swa b+ha ba shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho&haM/oM shu n+ya tA dz+nyA ne badz+ra swa b+hA bu At+ma ko&haM/oM badz+ra shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA badz+ra shud+d+ho&haM/oM yo ga shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHyo ga shud+d+ho/
58b4(rgyud): haM/oM dz+nyA na shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+ma dz+nyA na shr-i d+d+ho haM/aM sa ma y+ya shud+d+heHsarba d+harmAHsa ma ya shud+d+ho&haM/oM sarba ta thA ga ta shU n+ye tA ai nu rA ga NaM badz+ra swA b+hA bA At+ma ko&haM/oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA su b+h+yAM
58b5(rgyud): tibi shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA d+hA tu dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA bA At+ma ko&haM/oM sarbe man+ta shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHsarba man+ta shud+d+ho&haM/oM kro d+ha shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+maHkro d+ha shud+d+ho&hUM/oM tsit+taM shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHtsit+ta shud+d+ha&haM/oM
58b6(rgyud): bA ka shud+d+heHs+yarba d+har+m+ma bA kaM shud+d+ho&haM/oM kA ya shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+maHka yaM shud+d+ho&haM/oM dz+nyA na o mr-i ta shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+ma dz+nyA na a mr-i ta shud+d+ho&haM/oM nA nA sa ma ya shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA nA nI pa myA ya
58b7(rgyud): shud+d+ho&ti/au tsAr+ya na ya shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+maHtsAr+ya na yaM shud+d+ho&ho/au tri yo ga pa ri shud+d+ha/sarba d+har+m+maHtri yau ga pa raM shud+d+ha&taM/oM a b+hi ShaM ka shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+maHa b+hi She ka shud+d+ha&haM/oM pu
59a1(rgyud): dza shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+har+m+maHpU dza shud+d+ha tsa/oM sar+b+ba tathA ga ta a dA ya pu dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/oM maN+Da lA shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+ma maN+Da la shud+d+ho&haM/oM a d+hi pa ti shud+d+haH
59a2(rgyud): sarba d+har+m+ma a d+hi pa ti shud+d+ho&haM/oM b+h+r-i ra shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+ma bi ri shud+d+hi&haM/oM yo g+hi ni shud+d+haHsarbaM d+har+m+ma yau gI ni shud+d+ho tsaM/au tAt+ma shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHtatra shud+d+ho&hi/taM i ti he tu a ba gau
59a3(rgyud): sarba d+har+m+ma ti tu A pa ga tai haM/ru i ti rU ka ra a pa ga ta sarba d+har+m+ma d+h+r-i ka ra a pa ga te taM/kaM i ti nA kA tsit+taM skr-i t+yA sarba d+harmA nA kA tsit+taM s+tho to ha/oM d+hi Ti ta kA raM shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+maHdz+ha Ti ta
59a4(rgyud): kA ra shud+d+ho te/au s+yA b+ha ba shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+maHswa b+ha ba shud+d+ho&haM/oM dzA la shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+ma dzA la shud+d+ha&ha~M/oM A hA raM shud+d+haHs+yArba d+har+m+ma A ha raM shud+d+ho&haM/oM b+hik+Sha shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+ma
59a5(rgyud): b+hik+Sha shud+d+ho&haM/au a sa mA hi ta shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+ma a sa mA hi ta shud+d+ho&hau/au si saM paM da na shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+ma si sai be da nai shud+d+ho&haM/au dwe Sha shud+d+hiHsarba d+har+m+ma dwe ShaM shud+d+ho&haM/
59a6(rgyud): oM maM ta shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+maHmo ha shud+d+ho hau/au rA gr-i shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+ma r-I ga shud+d+ho&haM/oM mA nA shud+d+hiHsar+b+ba d+har+m+ma mA na shud+d+ho&haM/oM i ra shud+d+heHsar+b+ba d+har+m+maHi ra shud+d+ho&haM/au kha
59a7(rgyud): badz+ra shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+maHkha rbadz+dza nid+d+ho&haM/oM tr-i tsakr-i bai ri shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHtr-i tsakra pa ri shud+d+heShi haM/oMny+dzi kau ni shud+d+hoHsarba d+har+m+ma DA ki ni shud+d+ho&ha~M/oM ku la shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+ma
59b1(rgyud): ku la shud+d+ha&ta/oM mA tri shud+d+haHsarba d+hur+m+maHmA tA~M shud+d+ho&haM/oM pi tri shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+harmAHpi tri shud+d+ho&hU~M/'di ltar ji nye ba'i dur khrod kyi bar thams cad rnam par dag par shes par bya'o//bu dz+ra o a gro
59b2(rgyud): ra de ma kaM o tri ko ka le ka hi pre grI so saM su na si mo kuM/sa bcu rnam po dag pa'i bdag le ro ma phyin bcu'ang de bzhin to//shes pa bcu yang rnam dag bdag/bcu po de dag rnam par bsgom//'kho
59b3(rgyud): lo gsum yang yongs dag phyir//nyi shu rtsa bzhi bdag nyid dag/dus dang tshod rnams rnam grol bas//rnal 'byor ma yi yid dga' ba//sum cu rtsa bdun rnam dag don//mngon man+to he ru ka las
59b4(rgyud): byung //mngon brjod rgyud ni bla ma'i blo//gsang chen mchog gi dam pa'o//g.yon dang g.yasu bskor ba yis//dgod cing mchod dang bskor bar bya//gang gis de nyid shes pa yis//brda ni
59b5(rgyud): pa bstan par bya//gang yang dbang bskur med pa la//gzhan du de nyid ma bstan gcig/mngon brjod rgyud la bla ma yis//dbang bskur slob ma dag la sbyin//gzhan du slob ma skyo ba dang //brgya la
59b6(rgyud): dang rmongs pa dag tu 'gro//ma ner med 'jigs pa chen po dang /ngan pa der ni ltung bar 'gyur//glegs bam pa shes min la ster ba//ngan pa de mu thig tu 'chi//phel mig rims dang dug
59b7(rgyud): dang nad//mkha' gro gdan gyis gtses par 'gyur//mi srun bgegs dang tshigs bdag gis//gsod cing dmyal bar ldang bar 'gyur//ji srid 'bad pa thams cad kyis//bla ma sgo
60a1(rgyud): mas rim bzhin du// nyid rtag tu smras nan//myur du sngags kyi dngos grub 'gyur//bla mas thams cad rim bzhin du//mngon brjod rgyud kyi rim pa basbyin//b+hU y-i
60a2(rgyud): rnal 'byor la sbyor ba//gnyi su med pa'i ye shes 'gyur//de ma thig tu byang chub ste//mchog ni nges par rnyed par 'gyur//mI yi bu mo 'di 'dra spang //bdag gi dam tshig mi shes
60a3(rgyud): shing //drag cing log ltar rang bzhin dan//mi srun snying rje med pa dang //brkam chags ser snar ldan pa dang //spang zhing ngan lce phrag dog can//skyes pa gzhan la chags pa dang //
60a4(rgyud): rnam par rtog pa mang ba dang //'di 'dra'i phyag rgya spang bar bya//sbyor ba'i dngos grub ring ba yini//puk+ka sI ni mdzes sdug blang //gzugs sdug bzhon pas rnam par rgyan//sbyor ba la ni
60a5(rgyud): gcig tu sems//brtul zhugs brtan zhing dam tshig shes//dpa' zhing chags bral ngo tsha med//nga rgyal med cing ser sna med//sngags pa rang gi spyod pa ste//rig ma brtul zhugs
60a6(rgyud): khyod kyis long //phyag rgya lnga ni rtag tu 'chang //mgo la thod pa'i rgyan yang byas//thod pa dang ni khaMT+wA~M 'dzin//sprul ba'i rdul gyis rnam par byugs//rtag tu maM hA mAM sa bza'o//thanas
60a7(rgyud): cad btung bas myos pa dang //ro yi gdan la 'dug pa dang //lpags pa chen po gosu gyon//rje su 'thun pa'i bza' ba za//zhag dang khrag gis tshim pa dang //grong ngam dgon pa
60b1(rgyud): dag tu yang //gang zhig yul du 'gro ba na//rtag tu chags pas mi gnas shing //rtag tu dur khrod spyod byed la//yang na tsheng 'dus gnas pa dang //nyan thos 'jig rten skal med pa'i//
60b2(rgyud): mi shes gti mug gis khyab pa//nyan thos yongasu longs spyod pa'i//gtsug lag khang du gnas mi bya//ji ltar skyes bu dbul po bzhin//byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gnas//
60b3(rgyud): rdo rje gar gyis rnam par rol//rtag tu dur khrod la gnas shing //dri cheni sha chen za su bza'//myos byed btung bar ldan pa yi//dpa' ba'i gtso bos rtsa gcig pa'i//
60b4(rgyud): sems kyis rab tu bsgom par bya//phyag rgya chen po ma rnyed na//g.yeng ba thams cad rnam spangs pa'o//de ni ye shes 'byung gnas te//shes rab pha rol phyin las 'byung //gzu
60b5(rgyud): dang 'dzin pa mi dmigs pa'i//gnyisu med pa nyid la gnas//rtse gcig sems ni byas nas kyang //sgom pa'i spyod pra la gnas na//bde la dga' ba'i dngos grub 'gyur//shes
60b6(rgyud): rab thabs kyi cho ga'i rim//phyag rgya chu dang nges par rol//sgom pa mngon du gyur po yis//rnam grolnga sangs rgyas thams cad kyang //skye ba'i 'di la dngos grub 'gyur//g.yon pa'i
60b7(rgyud): spyod pa shes rab ste//gams po de bzhin thabs yino//sgom par ldan pa'i mthu stobs ni//sum cu'i dbang phyug la dbang byed/rnal 'byor ma ni dngos grub deng //gnod sbyin
61a1(rgyud): yi bu mo dang //gzhan yang sna tshogs dri za mo//'dod pa'i 'dra ba spyod dgu la spyod//de nyid gsang ba'i mchog gyur pa/A li ka li rtag tu sgom/rang gi lha yi sbyor du/
61a2(rgyud): yis//thams cad de bzhin rnam par brtag/dpa' ngos brda' rnams bstan pa ni//rnal 'byor pa yi lag g.yon gyis//brda' rnams la ni 'jug par bya//dpa' bo'i gan su gyur pa 'di
61a3(rgyud): rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum//'gro kun g.yon las byung ba yin//rdo rje sems dpa' mthe bong nyid//mdzub mor rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs//gung mor pad+ma gar dbang gnas/
61a4(rgyud): srin lag dpa' bo dngos grub can//tha ma la ni mi zad sku//sen mo'i ngos la rta mgrin gnas//g.yon pa'i rgyu lngas byung ba ni//dpa' bo thams cad yin par bshad//lag mthil
61a5(rgyud): nya 'dus pa'i mchog/rgyab tu shin tu nges byas te//brda ni lnga po bstan par bya//sgrub pa po yis shes par gyis//sa ni spyan zhes bya bar bshad//me ni gos dkar mo ru bshad
61a6(rgyud): rlung ni sgrol ma dag tu grags//'o byed ma ni stong pa ste/de bzhin pha rol phyin pa yin//dbul gyi dpa' bo thams cad ni//mkhas pas rgyab tu gshegasu gsol//gsung pa
61a7(rgyud): nom bstan cing //rab tu 'bad de sba bar bya//de ltar brda yis dpa' bo rnams//de dang lhan cig bza' bas bza'//dpa' bos thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/mkha' gro dra
61b1(rgyud): ba'i bde mchog yin//phan tshun rjes 'gro thams cad kyi//sna tshogs brda nI bshad par bya//mkha 'bro ma yi mtshan nyid dang //pho nya rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang //sgrub pa po la phan pa'i//
61b2(rgyud): phyir//de dag thams cad bshad par bya//ras ris drang nI sku gzugs dag/'dri na de bzhin dam tshig dang //sku mdog gi nI khyad par gyis//gang gis sgrub pa po 'grub pa//sna tshogs
61b3(rgyud): sngags kyis mdzes pa yi//phun sum tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang //lha yi dam tshigs yid 'ong ba/rnal 'byor ma ni sna tshogs mchog/dpa' bo sna tshogs yid 'dra ba'i//
61b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma ni yang dag 'dus//mkha'agro ma yang yang dag 'dus//rang rigs sna tshogs mchog dam pa//bla ma brgyud pa'i bka' bzhin du//slob ma la ni phan pa'i phyir//bdag
61b5(rgyud): po'i lus la shin tu mkhas//sngags dang rgyud la legs par bslabs//gzhan yang cho ga'i rim pa dang /mngon brjod bla ma ri las la mkhas//phyugs kyis mtshan nyid sngags
61b6(rgyud): bas rtogs//sna tshogs rigs kyi khyad par dang //rnal 'byor mA yI spyod pa dang //mkha' gro ma yang de bzhin te//phyi rol ma mo'i phyag rgya dag/phag mo yi ni rigs las byung //dpa' to
61b7(rgyud): kun gyi spyod pa dang //'khor lo'i spyod pa shin tu bslabs//phyi yis rnal 'byor dbang phyug gi/mtshan nyid spyod pa dag la mkhas//he ru ka dpal rigs las byung //dge ba'i spyod pa
62a1(rgyud): dag la bslabs//yul gyi spyod pa'i khyad par dang //slob dpon spyod pa dag la mkhas//rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud spyod dang //rnal 'byor rgyud ni rgya cho ga/bya ba'i rgyud kyi dbye ba
62a2(rgyud): rim/thams cad rgyud rnams rnam par shes//'grub po'i lung dang bstan bcos dang //mdo sde skyes rabs de bzhin te//bla na med pa'i spyod pa dag/shes rab pha rol byin las byung //
62a3(rgyud): rol bstan bcos yongs la mkhas//phun sum tshogs pa slob dpon mchog/sbyor ba'i sgom par ldan pa dang //yid gnyis med pa nyid kyis ni//bza' ba thams cad bza' ba bya//yi ge
62a4(rgyud): brgya pas thams cad du//gsang sngags brtan par bsgoms nasu//rang gi ming dang ldan par ni//gcig tu spel nas bzlas par bya//rtag tu phreng ba'i sngags kyang bzla//don rnams thams
62a5(rgyud): cad 'grub par 'gyur//bla ma las kyang bla ma ste//mkha 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom//gsang sngags btus pas go cha dang //snying po dang ni nye snying dang //gsang sngags btus par rje su
62a6(rgyud): srung //dkyil 'khor shin tu mdzes pa la//yi ge'i dkyil 'khor legs bkod nas//dpa' bo rnal 'byer ma rnams bskyed//'di ni gsang sngags thams cad//ma mo rnams kyi
62a7(rgyud): dam pa mchog/gsang ba dga' ba sbas pa ste//gsang sngags thams cad bsdus pa yin//gsang sngags kun gyi gnas yin//'gro ba 'byung ba'ang ma mos khyab//de nyid 'di ni
62b1(rgyud): mi bstan te//dngos grub 'joms par 'gyur ba yis//sgom pa 'di ni mchog yin te//'dod pa'i dngos grub bla na med//skye 'gros 'di ni bsgoms tsam gyis/rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang rnyed//
62b2(rgyud): byams pa'i go cha bgos pa ste//snying rje chos kyi go cha yin/shes rab mtshon char ldan pa yin//nyon mongs bdud ni rnam par spangs//phyir bzlog chen mos srung ba dang //rdo rje zhal bzhis
62b3(rgyud): rnam par mtshan//sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis//kha sbyar ba sum gyis rdo rjes mtshan//thams cad mchog gi srung ba che//dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol//bka' yi 'khor
62b4(rgyud): lo srung ba che//phur bus bgegs mdo dngos grub 'gyur//srung ba mchog ni 'di dag gis//sgrub pa po la byang chub stsol//rdo rje phur bus ra ba dang //rdo rje'i sa dang dra ba dang //
62b5(rgyud): steng gi gur dang bla re yis//gdug pa'i bdud ni bskrad byas nas//mi gsod gsod pa med pa yin//gang gis rang sems thul ba yis//bdag gri sems ni bcings pa yin//
62b6(rgyud): gang la gang gis bsod pa yin//mnyam pa'i sems ni dri yin te//gru bzhi pa ni byug pa yin//tsan dran dkar po lus yin te//mnyam par gnas pa nyid yinano//me tog
62b7(rgyud): bzod pa rnal 'byor pa//'byed pas gtor ba yin par bshad//rang bzhin dag pa bdug pa ste//mnyam pa'i sgom pa bdug pa yin//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma chen po las
63a1(rgyud): de kho na nyid kyi snying po'i don dam pa bstan pa ste le'u gsum pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha'agros de kho na nyid kyi gsung ba gsungs s+ho//de nas/
63a2(rgyud): yang dag bshad bya ba//mngon brjod rgyud ni bla ma'i bla//bla ma brgyud pas bshad pa bzhin//phyi rol rnam rtog spangs nas ni//mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog dam pa//rtog pa med
63a3(rgyud): cing dpyod pa med///'jigs pa thams cad rnam par spangs//tshes grangs med cing skar ma med//bslab pa'i cho ga'ang yod ma yin//gtsang sbra med cing mi gtsang med//dag pa'i
63a4(rgyud): bya ba'ang yod ma yin//dus dang tshed las rnam par grol//dag pa'i spyod pa rnam par spangs//rang gi sngags rgyud sbyor ba shes//sems can kun gyi don yang byed//ril bu dang ni
63a5(rgyud): ri rtsi dang //chu bo chen po'i ngogs dag dang //rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gra mo dag dang //shing gcig dang ni dge ti'i gonas//ma mo'i khyim mam dur khrod dam//sna tshogs dam pa'i
63a6(rgyud): ldum ra dang //lha khang dang ni mchod rten gnas//khyim mam bzhi mdo dag tu ni//sgrub pa po yis sbyor bsgrubs na//'dod pa kun gyi 'bras bu stir//gnas ni brtag pa byas nas
63a7(rgyud): kyang //yid ni gang du dga' ba der//sna tshogs bde mchod dam pa ni//de ru bsgrubs na dngos grub 'gyur//sems sbyor med pa nyid las ni//du mar dbye ba'i sgom pa yis//ye
63b1(rgyud): shes lnga yi bdud rdzis ni//s+yA nI byAka b+ha byAs+thA nas kyang //bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa yi//me tog 'bad pas dgum bAr b+ha//sna rgyags phyag rgyu yid 'ong gdan//mnyam par gzhag pas
63b2(rgyud): rgya cher bya//rtse gcig pa yi sems kyis ni//bsam gtan pha rol phyin po skyug/tshangs b+hI gan ba ni la gan+da te//bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po bya//dge ba bcu yang dmigs nas ni//sems
63b3(rgyud): can kun gyi don yang bya//phyi dang nang du bltas na ni//chos rnams thams cad stong pa yin//byang chub tshogs kyi mchog dam pa//sems tsam la ni rab tu gnas//rang gi snying kha
63b4(rgyud): mkha' dkyil du//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor glenas par sgom//de steng de nyid mchog gyur pa//ye shes lnga po zhi ba yin//sna tshogs 'od zer gsal ba yi//rnam par 'phro byas kun
63b5(rgyud): tu khyab//sngon grub pa rnams bskul nas ni//byin gyis brlabs pa'ang byed pa yin//na mkha'i khams ni sgom dga' bas/dkyil 'khor mchog ni mthong ba yin//til gyi
