63b6(rgyud): gang bu lci bu yi//lha dang khro bos khyab par mthing //sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //byang chub sems dang bla ma'i gtso//lha mo sna tshogs mthong nas ni/bdag gi
63b7(rgyud): mchod cing brjed par bya//sangs rgyas spros te sprul pa'i tshegs//khro bo'i rgyal po rnal 'byor maso//'gro ba rigs drug sems can rnams//sangs rgyas gnasu dgod par
64a1(rgyud): byed//namatha'i dkyil ni kun khyab pa'i//mchog de mthong nas bsdus nas//thams cad gsum la skyabasu mchi//byang chub mthar thug par du ni//sems can ma lus gyur pa/
64a2(rgyud): narnams//sangs rgyas gi 'dangs de la blun gi/de la sgrub pa pos gsol gang nga//dge ba'i las las byung ba la//ga tu bdag ni skyob su mchi//rmongs pa'i gzugs can nga rgya lnga dang /
64a3(rgyud): gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang /'du byed rnam shes de bzhin//b+h+rUM s+t+waM hrIHhoHhUM hrI//de ni rnam par snang mdzad dang //rdo rje nyi ma gar dbang phyug/rdo rje rgyal pos khyab pa yin//
64a4(rgyud): sems dpa' mchog de bzhin//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni//hi ru ka dpal rdo rje yi//mig dang rna ba sna dang ni//lce dang reg pa yid de bzhin//oM hUM traM aM kha~M haM//gti mug dang
64a5(rgyud): no zhe sdang dang //de bzhin phyag dge 'dod chags dang //ser sna dang ni rmongs pa nyid//skye mched dag ni thams cad la//dbang phyug rdo rje nyid yin//sa dang chu deng de bzhin mo//rlung dang
64a6(rgyud): namakha' nyid dag go//l-Im+me b+h+rUM tAM khAM/ltung byed me dang gsid ma dang //'gugs byed dang ni gar dbang dang //pad+ma'i dra ba mo skya'o//mkha' mnyam na mkhe'i lta bu'o//de ltar phung
64a7(rgyud): khams dang ni//skye mched rnams ni rnal 'byor pas//tha mal dngos po'i rang bzhin no//yongasu dag par shes par bya//tha mal chos kun yongs dag ste/bdag kyang yongasu dag pa yin/
64b1(rgyud): de nas gsum pa skyabasu 'gro//sngags kyi sku ru 'gyur ba yis//he ru ka dpal dag g+hurar+ya nas//sems can kun gyi don yang byed//he ru ka yi go 'phang mchog/thob nas sems can ma lus pa/
64b2(rgyud): 'di la 'jig cing 'god par shong //au pra kr-i ti pa ri shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+maHpr-i kr-i tI bi ri shud+d+ho&haM/oM swe b+ho baHshud+d+hoHsarba b+har+m+maHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho&haM/lan gsum bar du bzla bar bya//
64b3(rgyud): dngos med mdun sogs phyogs bcu ru//snying po'i phreng ba spro bar bya//des na snying po de mthong nas//dra bar ba de bzhin te//rdo d+hi sa sogs byin gyis brlabs//bla re mda' yi dra ba dang //
64b4(rgyud): /rdo rje me ni 'bar bar bskor//phyi rel ring nas dgod par bya//oM mai di ni badz+rI b+ha ba badz+ra baM d+ha hUM/oM badz+ra prA ka ra hUM baM hUM/oM badz+ra pany+dza raM hUM paM hUM/oM badz+ra bi tA na hUM khaM hUM/oM badz+ra
64b5(rgyud): sha ra dzA la tAM shaM trUM/oM badz+ra dzI lA na lArka hUM hUM hUM/he ru ka yi bka' 'khor lo//gratse be brgyad po 'bar ba dag/de mthong nas ni legs pa ru//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus bzhugs
64b6(rgyud): pa/rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom//zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste//dag pa'i shel dang zla mdog 'dra//phyag rgya chu dang mnyam par ldan//shes rab skyil krung lugs par
64b7(rgyud): bzhugs//thod pa'i phreng 'dra ldan pa'i dbu//mi bskyod pa ni dbu rgyan bzhugs//rgyan rnams thams cad yongasu rdzogs//thams cad mtshan mas mtshon me yin//dpe byad
65a1(rgyud): kun gyis rgyan pa ste//thod pa kha ts+tsha pa 'dzin cing //rdo rje dril dus lags par 'khyud//zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin mdzad cing //dpa' chen bde ba'i go 'phyang bzhugs//
65a2(rgyud): dkar zhing ser la ljang ku ste//zhal gdong gnyis pa rnam par 'gyur//lug su 'byung dang bzlog tshul gyis//dwe yi khro bo brgyad dag spro//rdo rje drag po na larka//rdo rje gtsug tor
65a3(rgyud): de bzhin te//thab sbyor rdo rje gnod sbyin dang //rdo rje nag po stobs po che//rdo rje 'jigs byud ces bya ba//khro bo 'di dag rnam par dgod//sngo zhing ser la de bzhin dmar//ljang
65a4(rgyud): ku du bi'i mdog can te//dkar zhing gnag lja gur bum mdog/rab 'dzegs thod pa'i dbu rgyan can//zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa//thams cad ra'i rus pa yi//rgyan
65a5(rgyud): gyis spud pa rab tu 'bar//g.yas brkyang po yi zhabs kyis ni//sna tshogs pa'i nang bzhugs shing //nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs//'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po dag/
65a6(rgyud): zhabs kyis mnan par rnam par bsamo//thod pa dang ni kha nAM 'dzin//zhags pa lcags kyu mchog kyang 'chang //thams cad dril bu cang te'u//shes rab bde bas legs par
65a7(rgyud): 'khyud//dmar ser dbu skra dag gis rgyan//mchi ba rnams gtsigs 'jigs pa can//stag gi lpags pa go su ban bas//'jigs pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan can te//des ni
65b1(rgyud): bdag nyid rgyan du byas//rdo rje d+hu mdzad rnam par skor//khro lding 'bar lnga g.yo bya dang //drag d+hi 'jigs la rnam par 'gyur//rgyun rnams kun gyis legs par brgyun//g.yas brgyung
65b2(rgyud): ba yi gnas pas bzhugs//lcags kyu zhadas baM kha T+wA~M 'chang //dril bu rdo rje thod pa 'dzin//mgo yi do shAl sku la 'chang //thong pa'i phreng ba'i ske rags can//gdug pa thams
65b3(rgyud): cad zhabs 'og mnan//thabs dang shis rab mnyam par ldan//rdo rje sems dpa' dbu rgyan can//rdo rje 'jigs byed bsgom par bya//khro bo gnyis po rnam par sgom//steng du
65b4(rgyud): gtsug gtor 'khor sbyar te//rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam par sgom//'og tu rdo rje sa 'og go/dkar la sngo ba'i mdog can yin//thod pa dang ne kha T+wAM 'dzin//'khor lo dang ni mdung
65b5(rgyud): 'dzin cing //zhags pi lcags kyu dril rdo rje//g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs//phur bu khro bo byas na su//de ni phyogs bcur rnam pari spro//de la bka' lung bsgo ba ni//
65b6(rgyud): bgegs ni myur du med par gyis//gsang sngags rjes dran nas//phyogs bzhi dag tu mnyam par gzugs//mthe bong bsdigs mdzub sbyor ba yis//phyogs bcu dag tu se
65b7(rgyud): gol brda ga/oM su~M d+ha ni suM b+ha hUM hUM phaT shar du'o//oM gr-ih+Na br-ih+Na d+h+r-i hU~M phaT byang du'o//oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM hUM phaT nub tu'o//oM a na ya hoHb+ha ga baM bi d+ha rA dze hUM hUM
66a1(rgyud): phaT/lho phyog su'o//gsang sngags rgyal po 'di yis ni//bgegs kun gyi ni glad pa la//rdo rje phur bus dgod cing mnan//lug su 'byung dang bzlog pa yin//oM g+ha
66a2(rgyud): b+hA ta g+hA ta pag+hA ta pa sarba duSh+Ta bo b+h+re hUM phaT/oM kI li ya kI la yA sarba pA paM hUM hUM phaT/hUM hUM hUM badz+ra kI la ya badz+ra d+ha ro A dz+nyA sarba duSh+TAn pA ya ti kA ya bAk+tsi t+ta badz+ra kI la ya hUM phaT/
66a3(rgyud): phur bu rdo rje khro bo ru//bltas nas yongasu brtags par bya/lugasu 'byung dang bzlog yis//dngos grub rdo rjes brdung bur byi//oM hUM bad+d+ha mung+ga ra badz+ra kI la ya A kau TaH
66a4(rgyud): ya hUM hUM phaT phaT//mkhas pas rdo rje khro bo'i tshig/gsang sngags tshig ni drag tu bzla//oM kha badz+rA d+h+r-i ka badz+ri hUM badz+ra hUM phaT//oM badz+ra tsaN+Da badz+ra hUM phaT//oM badz+rA a na lArka badz+ra hUM
66a5(rgyud): phaT/oM badz+ra uSh+NI Sha badz+ra hUM phaT/oM badz+ra kuN+Da li badz+ra hUM phaT/oM badz+ra yak+Sha badz+ra hUM phaT/oM badz+ra kA la badz+ra hUM phaT/oM badz+ra ma hA ba la badz+ra hUM phaT/oM badz+ra b+hU Shi na badz+ra
66a6(rgyud): hUM phaT/oM badz+ra uSh+NI Sha tsakra brti badz+ra hUM phaT/oM badz+ra pA tA la badz+ra hUM phaT/bka' 'di dag ni sgrub pa ni//de ma thag tu bgegs med 'gyur//mAng sa rkang dang khrag kha chu//
66a7(rgyud): shu kra rak+Sha lhan cig sbyar//rnal 'byor pa yis ril bur byas//zos na dngos grub nges par 'gyur//sngo zhing ser la ljang ku ni//rdo rje hUM mdzad rang byas te//ser zhing gnas
66b1(rgyud): la ljang klu dang //dud ka ser la ser skya dang //dkar zhing ser la ljang ku dang //dmar zhing ser la ltung ba drug/de ltar bzhin bdag po bzhin//mi bskyod dbu rgyan dam tshig can//bsgom
66b2(rgyud): bsna rdo rje 'dzin pa dgyes//'di ltar khro bo thams cad kyang //dam tshig las ni 'gal ma byed//'di ltar sna tshogs du ma yi//gtso bo'i bko' ni blong bar gyis//rnal 'a
66b3(rgyud): pa yi ge re gnas bya//dgegs rnams thams cad med par mthong //gcer bu 'am yang ni mi gcer ba 'am//sgra grol thal bas yan lag byugs//d+hI ltar ji snyed ma nga'
66b4(rgyud): bar//'khor lo dag gi bzlas pa bya//stong pa'i ye shes rdo rje ni//dad pas dran zhing mnyam par gzhag/oM shU n+ya t+yA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/oM a ni ma~Mt+ta dz+nyA na bad+d+ha
66b5(rgyud): s+ya b+hA ba At+ma kro haM/oM ya pri Ni ho ta dz+nyA nA badz+rI swa b+hA ba At+ma kotrA~M/smyig skye tsam gyi ye shes ni//sem+b+has tsam duni rnam par brtag/'di ni mkha' dang mnyam pa yi//chos
66b6(rgyud): med chos min pa yang med//namakha'i gos pa med pa ltar//dngos po med cing dmig su med//gang gi snying ka khaM sbyor dbus gnas gsal//phra bar lta ba rang byung myong ba'i
66b7(rgyud): sems 'jug pa//khams gsum ma lus gnyis med par ni nye bar 'gro//gsal ba chos kyi dbyings mchog de la bdag phyag 'tshal//dbang po'i g.yo ba rta kun nang du//
67a1(rgyud): nges sbyar ba'i//ye shes rgyal ba ma lus 'dus pa'i snod gyur pa//khams gsum ma lus gnyis med par ni nyer 'gro ba'i//mthong ba mkha' dang 'dra
67a2(rgyud): bar dri med dpal du gyur//sangs rgyas rjes dran rnal 'byor gyis//chas ni rje su dran pa sgom//chos rjes dran pa'i rnal 'byor gyis//chos kyi sku ni rang byung 'gyur//dbus na
67a3(rgyud): gsal byed rnam par shes//ye shes mchog ni shes rnams kyi//shin tu gsal bar bsgoms pa las//'bar ba 'di ni the tshom med//rtag tu snying la gnas pa yis//
67a4(rgyud): thig lce gcig pu yi ge med//skyes bus de ni bsgoms gyur na//ye shes skye bar gyur pa mchog/sems pa rjes dran rnal 'byor gyis//sems dpa' rje su dran par bsgom//sems
67a5(rgyud): dpa' rjes dran chos kyis ni//chos kyi sems dpa' khyad par 'byung //bdag ni snying rjes phan 'dogs pa//smon lam dbang gos mthong ba dang //mthong nas ji srid 'og tu ni//
67a6(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbusu ni//rdo rje sems dpa' kun mkhyen dag/dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar//sngon po yi ni zhal dang bzhi//rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam//
67a7(rgyud): yi ge yaM las yang dag 'byung //sngo ba'i mdog can gzhu lta bu'o//rgyal mtshan gyis ni mtshan mar sgom//dud pa'i phreng ba khyab par dmigs//de yi steng du yi ge raM/
67b1(rgyud): me yi dkyil 'khor mchog dam pa//gru gsum pa la dmar ba'i mdog/'bar ba'i phreng ba 'bar bas khyab//nyi ma bye ba 'od mtha' yas//rdo rjes mtshan pa bsgom par bya//da yi steng
67b2(rgyud): du chu nyid de//yi ge baM mchog las byung ba//du sha ra yi mdog 'dra ba//zlum la 'od zer phreng ba can//de yi steng du sa dkyil 'khor//lam las byung ba ser po ste//zur bzhi/
67b3(rgyud): pa la rdo rjes mtshan//'od zer ser po khyab par 'khrigs//rnal 'byor de steng sgom pa ni//ri rab lhun po mchog gyur pa//zur bzhi pa la rin chen bzhi//rtse mo brgyad kyis
67b4(rgyud): rnam dzar mdzes//yi ge sum las legs par byung //'od zer gauzi brjid mchog dam pa'o//de yi steng du bsam pa ni//bruM ni dkar po las byung ba//de steng 'khor lhor
67b5(rgyud): bcas pa dag/khang pa brtags pa rnam par bsam//zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//rta babs bzhis ni rnam pa raM rgyan/dra ba dra phyed kyis mdzes shing //ba dan phreng bas rnam par
67b6(rgyud): rgyan//zur gyi cha ni thams cad dang //sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnamasu//rdo rje rin chen gyis rgyan cing //phye yid kyi la 'khor thig gdab bo//de yi nang du 'khor lo ni//brgyad po
67b7(rgyud): dkar po'i mdog can la//de yi dbusu pad+ma tsha//sna tshogs mdab ma brgyad pa la//lte ba ge sar gyis khyab pa//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbusu ni//rdo rje sems dpa' rig mar
68a1(rgyud): bcas//dkar ba srir bad bston//dum dang ltung ka nal pan+d+ha /gang dag dang khro bdang //rnam par du shin tu 'jogs d+hAH
68a2(rgyud): mnyam par ldan//mdu dang dgra sta cang te'u dang //gri gug thod pa kha T+wAM ga//tshangs pa'i lpags pa go suM ban ngas//zhaga'i batshangs de'i man ba dag/b+hak+ka ni bcu gnyis de bzhin
68a3(rgyud): tAM/sems dpe'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs//dbu rgyan thod pa'i cod pan cen//rgyan rnams thams cad yong su rdzogs//dpe byung mtshan dang yang dag ldan//thugs kyi ye shes pa
68a4(rgyud): tshig sas//cod pon rdo rje 'dzin pa sbyin//ji ltar thabs bzhin shes rab de//phyag rgya lnga po byin gyis brlangs//rigs kyi dbye bas phye nas ni//rdo rje dbyidas kyi dbang phyug man
68a5(rgyud): dade ba chen po'i thabs sbyor bas//spu ni gnyi su med par thim//mnyam pa nyid las byung ba'i sgo//ma'i 'gro'i 'amadzin dpa' bo dang //rnal 'byor ma dang babs par byung //bdus
68a6(rgyud): brgyad g.yon brgyang tshul gyis badzugs//dkar sngon ser dmar zhal mdog ste//'khor lo dril dum 'khyud ba'i phyag/sngar hU~M rdo rje sems sogs pa'i//phyag mtshan rim
68a7(rgyud): pa 'dzin pa yin//thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan dang ni//mgo bo'i phreng ba rlon pas spyad//zla ba byed pa rab 'dzin pa//zhal bzhi mchi ba rnam par gtsigs//spyan gsum bya/
68b1(rgyud): ni bcu gnyis pa//tshangs pa la segs lha zhabs kyis gnon pa/na ra'i rus pa'i rgyan can/rnam par snang mdzad kyi dubu rgyun can/phyag rgya drug gis rgyan pa/stag gi lpags pa
68b2(rgyud): bgos pa/sangs rgyas mkha 'grems dbang du 'khyud pa/sku la thod pa dang gdug pa la bsdigs mdzub kyi 'khor lo 'dzin pas 'khyud pa/byin pa gnyis kyis 'khru
68b3(rgyud): ga bde ba dang dgyes pas mos pa/khams dang /phung po dang /skye mched rnams byin gyis brlangs te sa'i khams ni lAM ste ltung byed ma'o//chu'i khams ni me ste gsod byed
68b4(rgyud): ma'o//ma'i khams ni raM ste 'gugs byed ma'o//rlung gi khams ni yaM ste gar gyi dbang phyug ma'o//na mkha'i khams ni khaM ste bad pa'i dra ba ma'o//ser ba dang /snga
68b5(rgyud): dang /dmar ba dang /dud ka dang /sngo ba'o//gzugs kyi phung po rnam par snang mdzad/oM mdog dkar po//tshor ba'i phung po rdo rje rin chen te aM ga se re gtse ma'i
68b6(rgyud): mdog lta bu/'du shes hI ste pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dmar po//'du byed rdo rje rgyal po ho ljang ku/rnam par shes pa rdo rje sems dpa' hU~M dkar po/de bzhin gsheg//
68b7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid ni dpal he ru ka ste haM mdog nag mo//mig bru~M ste gti mug rdo rje dkar po/rna ba hUM zhe sdang rdo rje sto nag po'o//sna ni khaM phrag dog rdo rje ste ser po'o//
69a1(rgyud): dag chags pa rdo rje ste a dmar po'o//reg pa ni ser sna rdo rje ste hUM ljang ku'o//skye mched thams cad dbang phyug rdo rje sde taM dkar po'o//lus ni hUM ste dkur/
69a2(rgyud): po'o//ngag ni AHste dmar po'o//yid ni oM ste sngon po'o//de ltar lus ngag yid gsum gyi bar byin gyis brlab cing dmig so//de la shar gyi mdab ma'i mkha' gro ma ni
69a3(rgyud): sku mdog sngon po'o//lho phyogs kyi mdab ma lA lA me ni ljang ku ste sngo bsangaso//nub phyogs kyi mdab ma la du ma skyes ma dmar mo//byang gi mdab ma la gzugs can ma gser
69a4(rgyud): gyi mdog ser skya zhal gcig pa/phyag bzhi pa/spyan gsum pa/skye grol ba phyogs kyi gos 'chang ba/g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa/'jigs pa'i rnam par 'gyu ba//
69a5(rgyud): phyag rgya lngas rnam par rgyan pa/thod pa dang kha T+wAM ga dang /cang te'u dang gri gug 'dzin pa/zhal gdong rje su chags pas gnas pa/dgyes pa'i chags pas lta zhing reg pa'o//
69a6(rgyud): mtshams bzhir bdud rtsi lnga'i bum pa'i steng du byang chub kyi sems kyis gang ba'i snod bzhi bzhag/shar du pre ta pu ri ra stobs po che dang //'khor lo'i shugs can ma nag
69a7(rgyud): po//byang du gr-i ha de bai tar rdo rje rin chen dang /dum skyes ma ser po//nub tu sau raSh+Ta ra rta mgrin dang /chang 'tshong ma dmar po'o//lhor su bar+Na dwI bar na mkha'i snying po dang /'khor
69b1(rgyud): lo'i go cham ljang ku'o//mer na ga rar dpal khrag 'thung dang /rab dpa' bo dmar po'o//bden bral du sin dur pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang /stobs chen ma ste zla ba dang /sar d+ha/
69b2(rgyud): rlung phyogs na me ru tar rnam par snang mdzad dang /'khor los bsgyur ma dud ka'i mdog dang /dbang ldan du ku lu tar rdo rje sems dpa' dang /brtson 'grus chen mo dkar po'o//
69b3(rgyud): stabs po che la sogs pa'i dpa' bo ni zhal gcig pa/phyag bzhi pa/ral pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/phyag gnyis la 'khor lo dang dril bus 'khyud pa/phyag gzhan la kha
69b4(rgyud): T+wAM ga dang cang te'u 'dzin pa/phyag rgya lngas rgyan+da pa/g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa'o//'khor lo'i shugs can mA la sogs pa'i lham+ba ni gdong gtsug pa/phyag gnyis pa/
69b5(rgyud): thod pa dang /bsdigs mdzub 'khor lo 'dzin pas 'khyud pa/spyan gsum pa/drag po'i gzugs can/skra grol ba/gcer bu gnyi su med par sbyor bar mnyam par gnas
69b6(rgyud): pa/phyogs kyi gos can ma mgrin pa'i nor bu dang /gdu bu dang /dpung rgyan dang /sna cha dang tshangs pa'i skud pa dang /mgul brgyan dang /mgo'i 'phreng ba dang /g.yer
69b7(rgyud): ka sa 'og pago byas pa shar dang /byang dang /nub dang /lho'i spor khra gdong ma dang /'ug gdong ma dang /khyi gdong ma dang /phag gdong ma rnamaso//me dang /bden bral
70a1(rgyud): dang /rlung dang /dbang ldan du ni gshin rje sreg ma dang /gshin rje'i pho nya mo dang /gshin rje mche ba ma dang /gshin rje 'joms ma rnams//ji ltar mkha na/
70a2(rgyud): ma bzhin khwa gdong ma la sogs pa'i dbye ba yang de bzhin//mtshams kyi lha mo gzugs gnyis pa/yid 'phrog pa'i tshul can/yi dgas kyi gdan la bzhugs pa/drag po chen
70a3(rgyud): po thugs rjes sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o//dpa' bo 'di dag thams cad kyang dpral bar 'khor lo 'brel ba cano//'di dag ni sku'i 'khor lo sa 'og na gnas pa'o//bcom
70a4(rgyud): ldan 'das dkyil 'khor la bzhugs te/dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnam pa sna tshogs pa chags pa'i mig gis lta zhing /sna tshogs ro bcud bde ba ste/chags pa'i bde ba
70a5(rgyud): chen po ni//de ring du ni bdag gis rnyed//a la la ho dgyes pa che//bde ba chen po de nyid yin//bde gshegs lha ni shin tu mdzes//glu 'di blangs pa tsam gyis ni//
70a6(rgyud): dga' bas srid pa dag las grol//bde bar gshegs pa dag pa ste//dkyil 'khor du ni rnam par brtag/mngal skyes glu yi dbang gyur par//rnal 'byor kha cig 'dod pa yin//
70a7(rgyud): mngal skyes sku yi 'khor lo ste//ye shes dkyil 'khor bltas nas ni//mchod dang bstod pa byas nas gzhug/spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis//dngos dang dngos med rnam par
70b1(rgyud): stan / na dudu/ nas smra/lta //smra /su 'o rgyunaklan
70b2(rgyud): sub+hA ts+tsha Ta/DAkaun+d+he dU spya/mi d+hI baid+d+ha dwa hA
70b3(rgyud): sa hU~Mkr-iN+Di m+b+hing /Ik+Sh+ma m+b+ha d+hU ba la n+d+hi Ta/oMm+b+ha/'aM b+h+r-i nAdz+haiM ts+tshad+hI
70b4(rgyud): ha ya k+Sh+mI hU~M hrI trUM Ta nad+hA ni m+b+hi r+b+he ng+ge oM hU~M swA k+Sha sh+tsaN+Ti kyi /k+Sha pa b+h+ya/oM ni d+hI drukaM kI lid+d+he d+hU hU~M/smr-i sr-i
70b5(rgyud): \u0f7f/oM s+t+rai m+b+hi br-id+hA nIrnA b+hA paT+Te/ai mi d+hIT+Ta hrI \u0f7f d+hI hrI p+tAH/ ma hu~M trUM prAH/ai dz+ha li badz+dzi sata
70b6(rgyud): tsUd+d+ha hrIn+te nI hU~M ts+yai d+h+r-ip+tA/k+ShIkl-i s+yA d+g+hadz+dza.oMsl-ik+Sh+mI k+ShA s+t+rai d+hu d+g+ha b+h+yaH/oM shAn+d+haM s+yA nr-in+d+ra r+m+ma e b+hUk+ShA R+Sham+b+ha yA ma d+h+ya nA~M mad+d+he
70b7(rgyud): yim hU~Mh+ne bi ts+tsha dz+dza ma /oM seM m+ba m+bi b+h+r-i n+ti mi ts+tsha ng+ge hU~M d+hI oM Sh+T+r-i hU~M b+h+ru~M dz+dza we/ ts+yai tu hU~M phreM/
71a1(rgyud): dzAd+d+hi len d+hA phaT/mA 'gro mkha 'gro ma sogs la//thog ma pad+mal gnas nas//mdang bya zhing sngags kyang ba0//rtag tu bdag nyid lnga po dag/'gyu
71a2(rgyud): par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min//zhi ba dang ni dbang nyid dang //nongs par byung du gnan pa dag/hU~M la kha' skyes byed pa ste//dngos pa dum pa 'gyur bar 'gyur//dmachog
71a3(rgyud): can dag langs dusu/na laswA d+hagrA t+yA bzlam b+ha //rnam dag ye shos mig gis mi/dpa'i byon la 'byon ma rnams pate/oM ha ka la//na ma ti min dA la/
71a4(rgyud): duspyi gtsug la//oM bau Sh+Ta/go che'o//d+hU d+hU hU~M mig la'i//phaT haM yan+ta la thA kun gyi mtshon cha'o//dka ba sa dang dam rab dang //hU~M dang ljang du dung 'ad //yid kyi
71a5(rgyud): mdog drug rnam par s+t+wa~M//oM ba sangs rgyas ma'i 'gro ma ste lte ba la'o//hA ya~M ya mi ne ste snying ka 'a'o// mo'i rmongs byed ma stu kha la'o//hreM hrI ga byed ma ste mgo bo 'i'o//
71a6(rgyud): hU~Mts+tsha trA~M hU~M mA Sh+Ta gtsu wA//m+bu btsun ma tsaud+h+r-ikaskye yan lag thams cad kyi natshan cha'o//dpa' bo rno'i DUSh+Ta ma thams cad //mkha' sgo rnams na bzhugs na
71a7(rgyud): //rong gi lce lo sbyor ba yis/thams cad 'di las rnam par brtag/'chi med ye shes lnga brda zhing //ji ltar 'de bar gnas par bya//rdo rje dam tshig ni
71b1(rgyud): mchod nas//dus bzhi dag tu bsnyen pa bya//mngon par brjod bya'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las sku'i sdom pa'i rgyo ga'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshang bya
71b2(rgyud): ba/gsung gi dkyil 'khor rnam bsgoms te//sngar gyi dkyil 'khor dbus ngag tu//gsung gi 'khor lo rnam par sgom//rtsibs brgyad dmar po'i mdog can la//nang
71b3(rgyud): bi mdab ma snga ma bzhin//rdo rje sems dpa' bla med pa//gsung gi rdo rje rnam par sgom//gdong bzhi pa la phyag bcu gnyis//g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs//
71b4(rgyud): pad+ma'i mkha'agro mas 'khyud cing //rtag tu bde ba che la bzhugs//pad+ma dril bus mnyam par 'khyud//dbang phyug chen po'i spags pa ni//phyag gnyis dag gis brgya
71b5(rgyud): bar gnas//lhag ma lnga pa'i rim pa bzhin//dbang phyug chen po'i mthar thug par//zhabs 'og mnan par rnam par blta//dmar zhing sngo la de bzhin ser//g.yon pa
71b6(rgyud): dkar la spyan gsum pa//ral ba'i dbu rgyun drag gis rgyan//thod pa'i phreng bas dbu la mdzes//zla ba phyed pa 'chang ba dang //sna tshigs pad+ma rnam dgod cing //'chi ba rnam
71b7(rgyud): ber btsigs pa dang //'jigs pa'i zhal ni rnam 'gyur zhing //sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldano//stug gis lpag pa gosu bgos//mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng ba cam/
72a1(rgyud): mgul rgyan gdu bu rna cha dang //man du'i phreng bas rnam par rgyun//mchod phyir phyogs dang tham s+ho//byug r+b+ha drug tu rab tu grags//de dag pa ro
72a2(rgyud): byin drug ste//phyag rgya drug gis rgyas btab po'o//de yi pang na bcom ldan ma//pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ma rang mdog/zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa//gcer bu sgra ni grol
72a3(rgyud): dum rgyun gyi sgra rags can//phyag g.yon rdzod 'dzin lce ltung pa dang //bdug pa'i bdud m+b+hi khrag 'chang b+h+ring //bad ldan log pas phyogs kun tu//gdug
72a4(rgyud): bsnyen la bsdogs mdzub byed//drag cing bskal ba'i me yI ga N+DI//zhal nas kyang ni khrag 'jig cing /byin pa gnyis kyis rnam par 'khril//bde ba chen po thugs
72a5(rgyud): bdag/mkha' gro ma sogs sngar bshad bzhin//pad+ma la sogs phyogs bkod na//dngos grub thams cad rab tu gsol//sngar bshad mdog tu gnas pa ste//'on
72a6(rgyud): kyang mang 'gro ma dkar po//dem skyes ma ni de bzhin gnas/lho mo gnyis po mdog de bzhin//phyag g.yon khI n+d+ha thod pa dang //g.yas pa tsang te'u gri gug 'dzin/
72a7(rgyud): mtshams ni bzhi po dag tu yang //'chi med lnga po'i bum steng suM//byang chub sems kyi snod kyang bzhig/gsung gi 'khor lo'i shar du kA ma ru ba ni myu gu can dang /
72b1(rgyud): sa srung ma ste dkar po'o//byang du u dre na rdo rje ral pa can dang /'jigs byed ma chen mo ste dmar po'o//nub tu ti shra ku naM na dpa' bo chen po dang /rlung gi shugs can ma ste nag
72b2(rgyud): bo'o//wA ru ko sa lar rdo rje hUM mdzod dang /'chang 'thung ma ste gnom mdog ljang kuM'o//me phyog sA la ka ling ka na rab bzang dang /sngo bsangs ma ste ser po dang dkAr/
72b3(rgyud): skya'o//bden bral du lAM pa ka na rdo rje bzang dang /rab bzang ma ste dkar ba'o//rlung phyog su kau/bi rtsi na 'jigs byed chen po dang /rta rnam ste lhung ku'o//drabang ldan lnga ni
72b4(rgyud): hi ma la ya na mig mi bzang dang /bya gdong ma ste gnam mdog sngo bsangaso//gsung gi 'khor lo sa la spyod pa'o//myu gu can la sogs pa'i dpa' bo ni zhal gcig pa/
72b5(rgyud): phyag bzhi pa/spyan gsum pa/ral-i pa'i cod pan can/phyag gnyis na pad+ma dang /dril bus 'khyud pa/g.yon pa'i phyag na khA T+wAM ga/g.yas na cang te'u/phyag rgya
72b6(rgyud): l-I la sogs pos rgyan pa g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas paso bzhugs pa'o//dpa' ba la sogs pa lnga ma bzhin//lha mau rnams ni phyag gnyis pa/zhal gcig pa
72b7(rgyud): thod pa dang /sdig mdzub pad+ma can gyis 'khyud pa/mgul rgyan dang /gdu bu dang /dpung rgyan dang /rna ba tshangs pa'i skud pa dang /mgrin pa'i rgyan dang thod pa'i phreng
73a1(rgyud): 'og phrag dag gis su rags can//sngar bshad sgo srung la sogs bzhin//gshin rje sreg sogs lha mo rnams//mtshams bzhi 'di ltar shes par bya//
73a2(rgyud): dpa' bo 'di dag thams cad kyang //dpral pa pad+ma'i phreng ba can//phung po skye mched khams rnams kun//sku gsung thug su rnam par brtag/sngar bshad pa yi cho ga bzhin
73a3(rgyud): yi ge rnams ni dgod cing sgom//thugs ni AHste dmar po yin/gsung ni oM ste dkar por bshad//rdo rje sku ni hU~M yin te//na mkha' zla ba lta bu'o//dkyil 'khor
73a4(rgyud): dag ni thams cad kyang //thams cad sbyor zhing bsgoms nAs//ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas//dbang bskur bas ni gzhug par bya//thams cad byung ste thim na su//
73a5(rgyud): thams cad sgom zhing bsam par bya//sku gsung thugs kyi rim+b+ha pa yis//spro bsdu dag gi sbyor bar bya//oM shrI b+hu ka DA k+ki A ro lika hU~M phaT/hUM hAM DA ki nI dz+wA la shaM bA r+ya swAhA/
73a6(rgyud): snying po'o//oM U ro lIka hrIHhUM diT/nyaM br-irI snying po'o//oM pad+mA DA ki nI ye hrIHhuM hUM phaT swAh+ma/snying pa'o//oM sarba pad+ma DA ki nI yai ai huM tsU phiT/nye ba'i snyi
73a7(rgyud): bai 'o/de.au DA ki nI ye hu~M hUM phaT/oM kAM me huM hUM phaT/oM kheN+Da ro he huM hUM phaT/oM rU pi NAM ye huM hUM phaT/oM phaT aM ku ri ka phaT huM hUM phaT/oM ai rA ba tI m+le tsu
73b1(rgyud): phAH/oM da ha badz+ra dza nI la du hu hu~M hU~M phaT/oM ma hA b+hai ru b+hI yo tsu hUM phaT/oM pa tsa ma hA bi rU pa tsa tsu hUM phaT/oM b+hA yu be ge huM hUM phaT/oM b+hak+Sha badz+rA hU~M kA ra b+hAk+Sha b+h+ya sa
73b2(rgyud): dr-id+h+r-iR+ShA yAn+d+ham+b+ha lA ba ts+tshi nets+tsha hU~M phaT/oM s+'u ra~MHk+Shi yAM hu~Mn+d+re g+ha~M/oM brId+d+ha sud+g+ha dr-i g+h+r-id+b+ha sak+Sh+ma b+h+r-i tA ge krA t+yA dza~M ka swAdza~M trA~M/tur+dz+dza ya tiSh+Tha.Ar+g+haM d+hU phaT
73b3(rgyud): mU de b+hI ye hu~M hU~M phaT/oM a kaMr+t+r-i bAd+d+he su dra A~M kAn+thi hu~M hUM hrIn+ti/oM su b+hA dwe huM hU~M phaT/A~M d+hA ma hA b+hai re ba hrI huM hU~M phaT/oM ha yai kAN+Do hU~M hUM phaT/auMdz+nyAM da ru~M b+hUk+ShA yAM
73b4(rgyud): huM hUM phaT/UM khaM g+hA nAM ne huM hUM phaT/oM k+ShA kA s+yA hu hU~M phaT/oM u lU kr-I s+yai hu~M hU~M phaT/oM shrI nA myaM hu~M hUM phaT/oM sU ka ra s+yai hu hUM phaT/mu~M ya~M ma drA r+d+hA yai hUM/
73b5(rgyud): hUM phaT/oM ya mu du tI yai hu~M hUM phaT/A~M ya maM daM Sh+T+r-i NI yai huM hUM phaT/oM yau ma mAni di yai huM hUM phaT/rdo rje dam tshig gis mchod nas//bzlas pa'i cho ga rab tu bye//dgug
73b6(rgyud): pa dang ni rgyas pa nyid//sna tshogs las ni 'grub par 'gyur//chos can yid 'ong gyur pa ste//ngag gi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur//mchog dang bar mya thams cad dang //
73b7(rgyud): tha ma thams cad mthar gnas la//de la thams cad gnas pa ste//sna tshogs gdul ba'i mchog dam pa//'dod pa'i chags pas rje su chags//'dod pa'i dga' bas
74a1(rgyud): myos pa dag/bdag nyid chen po sgrub pa po//de yi dbang du gnas pa yin//sna tshogs pad+ma mdzes gnas nas//rnal 'byor chen po rnam par spyod//b+hur bu
74a2(rgyud): 'dod chags chos kyi bdag/bde ba tshe la rnam par bzhugs//langs pa'i dusu dam tshig ni//dri tshun rdo rje chu bza' zhing //chos kyi phung po rdzogs gyur nas//rig pa'i
74a3(rgyud): rgyal po la sogs 'grub//oM ha snying ka la/na maHhi mgo la/s+phAt+ka hA A ro li ka s+thi gtsug la bau ShaT haM go cha/hAM hAM ho mig la'o//phaT haM mtshon cha'o//chos kyi rdo rje
74a4(rgyud): dang /rnam par snang mdzad dang /pad+me gar gyi dbang phyug dang /rdo rje 'jigs byed dang /rdo rje nyi ma dang /rta mchog ste/dmar po dang /ser ba dang /dkar ba dang /sngo ba dang /dmar bya dang //
74a5(rgyud): gur gum gyi mdog dang /ljang ku ste bye brag gro//oM ba pad+ma'i mkha'agro ma ste lto ba la'o//haM oM pad+ma ya mi ni dang /hI mau pad+ma'i rmongs byed ma dang /hr-i hU~M pad+ma'i g.yo byed ma dang /
74a6(rgyud): hUM hUM pad+ma skrag byed ma dang /phaT phaT haM pad+ma tsaN+Di ka ste/snying ka dang /mgo dang /spyi gtsug dang mig dang /chos kyi mtshon cha rnams//dmar ba dang /sngo ba dang /dkar ba
74a7(rgyud): dang /ser ba dang /ljang ku dang /dud kha'i mdog cano//bzlas pa'i du su dgod pa ste//ji ltar bde bar spyad par bya//dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi//go 'phang gnas
74b1(rgyud): ni bzhugs pa yin//mnyam par gzhag pas drod 'byung ba//rtse gcig dmigs pas blang bya ste//gsung gi rdo rje mnyam pa nyid//rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yi//chos rnams thams cad
74b2(rgyud): rab tu brtag/rdo rje chu dang rnam snang dang //sbrang rtse mar dkar lhan cig sbyar//lce yi dam tshig sbyor ba yis//snying po'i ye shes de nyid do//bdag po dbu rgyan la bsgoms la//ci bde
74b3(rgyud): bar ni bza' ba bza'//lha yi gzugasu gyur na su//'dod pa'i lha yi bdag por skye//bza' ba'o ma'i btung ba yis//nad dang rga ba rnam par spangs//sems can rjesu
74b4(rgyud): chags pa yi//lha mo glu 'dis bskul ba yis//byang chub chos rnams thams cad kyi//sems can don ni bla med mdzad//brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa yis//thugs rje
74b5(rgyud): bskyed cing bstan par mdzad//gsang ba'i chos ni bstan nas kyang //ngag gi dngos grub mchog kyang 'grub//sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir//ji lta bar ni bstan pas
74b6(rgyud): grol//de nyid rnal 'byor mas bskul nas//sna tshogs du ma myang ba yi//dam tshig mchod pa ngo mtshar rmad//mig bye nas ni bstod pa ni//A ba ra ta ru su ra ta su kha
74b7(rgyud): d+hA tA su kha me tra so bya mo ya/sa ma yaM ra ma ra mi ho//su ra ta sau Sh+ya ya traM sa ma tsa raM ti/su gta sAn+ta ma ya pra bi bi bi ku n+da bi kuR+Ya/su ra ta di ya pad+ma dz+wa le/pr-i
75a1(rgyud): dza~Mm+ba dzim+b+ha/su ra tot+ta su kha bad+ma dz+wA la/prA be nan+ta nan+ta su khA sa da na pad+ma dz+wa laM/pra bi marda su ra ta ma ba s+yai bi sh+tsA dza le ho ha d+hA ha ha ho//dza ya ma hA su khA
75a2(rgyud): su kha te dze ma ya ra ma ra ma ho//su ra kaM tu su khA ba hUM bi ti tAM dza muM kra dza ya te dza ra/ha ni ta ho ba rA ha/sa su kha ho hUM ho ho su ra to tA ra ga su khaM rA tri rI dzI na pa rA ma sh+tsa
75a3(rgyud): ti ho//pa ra ma te tu ma hA su kha he//su kha ma nu yo na ra~M ba ra mai shwa ra he//ho b+ha ga bAn ma hU~M su khaM hUM ho//ba hU~M bi ti bo sh+tsa dz+wA la ri te bi shra ma ho//su ra ti su khaM ga tsid+b+ha pa
75a4(rgyud): ra ma ma hA su kha ho//su kha ma nu gr-i h+na ho//su ra ta ut+ta ma san di su khaM a A ro li ka/a ma hA su kha gre h+yA ho//glu 'di dwag ni blangs tsam gyis//dga' zhing bde ba yang
75a5(rgyud): dag 'dus//bde ba chen po yid 'dod pa//dngos grub kyang ni dathob par 'gyur//'khar chags chen po byin rlabs nas//dkyil 'khor chen po dgyes pa che//pad+ma draH
75a6(rgyud): sdom pa yin//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma las gsung gi sdom pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o////de nas pa gzhan yang bshad bya ba//thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa
75a7(rgyud): sten gzhal yas rdegra ma'i dbus ngag tu//'khor lo mchog ni dgod par bya//sngon po'i mdog can gzi brjid che//gsang ba los byung rtsibs brgyad pa//de yi dbu
75b1(rgyud): pad+ma ni//sna tshogs pad+ma ga par can//mdab ma brgyad tu bshad pa ste//rnam dag gdan du byas pa yin//de yi dbus zla bsgom//der ni zla ba khyab par ni//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che//lha mchog
75b2(rgyud): grol zhing bzhengs par 'gyur//oM hUM a ma hA su kha a la la ha~M//myA hA suM ra tas+t+r-i su ra ta su kha bi yo ka su ra ta mut+ma bo d+hi su ShaM/su khA ma nu sid+d+hi ho//su ra ta ba la so khya ma ya a~M
75b3(rgyud): AHhUM hoHb+ha ga wAn ma hA su Sha ut+ta ra ut+ta ra/sar+b+ba ud+d+ha ma sau khya ma ya hUM/a la la ho//ma hA su kha stAM/ba ra ma su khA ma lai du bi br-i ut+ta ma dzA la su khaM a la la ho//
75b4(rgyud): su ra ta sau khyi ma ya/bcom ldan bde ba chen po ni//'khor dang bac+doMs byar mnyam par bzhengs//thugs kyi 'khor lo zhal bzhi pa//phyag bcu gnyis pa/g.yas brkyang
75b5(rgyud): g.yon bskum pa'i zhabs kyis bzhugs pa/spyan gsum pa/mtshu brgya ma par gtsigs pa/sngo pa dang /kor ba dang /ser ba dang /dmaN bA'izhal/rdo rje dang dri khe bus
75b6(rgyud): 'khyud pa//khyab 'jug gi mgo bro phyag na bsnams pa/khyab 'dzu b+h+r-i lpags pa rlon pa brkyang nis phyag gzhan gnyis na bsnams pa'o//lhag ma sku'i mkha 'gro dang mtshub
75b7(rgyud): sa 'i snod pa'i phreng ba rjen//mna'i phreng ba'i chang ba/mgro'i slong bas sgra rags pa cings pa/rjesems pa'i dbu rgya na cas//zla phyid 'i rkyen yang ga
76a1(rgyud): tshogs rdo rje gcod pan gnon//stag gi lpags pa gsu banabs//phyag rgya drug gis rnam par rgyun//mdun gyi mkha'agro ma ni zhal gcig pa/phyag
76a2(rgyud): gnyis pa/spyan gsum pa/skra grol ba/gcer bu dum bus rgyan pa ske rags can/phyag g.yon pa thod pa thogs pas 'khyud pa/g.yas pa rdo rje bsdigs mdzub ca
76a3(rgyud): ska rags g.yor kA'i sgra sgrogs pa//chos kyi sgra ni yid 'ong ba//'byung dar 'gyur ba bye ba snyed/chos kyi dbyings te stong pa yin//mnyam pa nyid dang so sor rtog/bya
76a4(rgyud): byed pa yang de bzhin sgom//sbyor ba mchog gi dam pa ste//rnam dag legs par brtag na su//mnyam nyid chos kyi ro gcig byas//'khor lo la ni rnam par blta//
76a5(rgyud): shar gyi mdab mar mkha' gro dang //lho phyogs lA ma de bzhin te//nub phyogs dum skyes ma dang ni//byang phyogs gzugs can ma de bzhin//dkar dang ser dang de
76a6(rgyud): bzhin dmar//ljang ku'i mdog can mchog dam pa//thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin//cang te'u gri gug de bzhin te//spyan gsum pa la gzhin rnams bsgyur//gcer bu
76a7(rgyud): skra grel 'jigs pa can//g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs//'dod pa'i chags pas legs par myos//cung zad ngo tsha'i mig zur dang //nu ma rab rgyas
76b1(rgyud): dga' ba 'dzin//zhal byi mche ba cung zad gtsigs//phyag rgya lnga yis rgya yang gdang //mtshams bzhi ru ni bum pa dag/ye shes bdud rtsi gang bas dgod//de steng byang chub sems
76b2(rgyud): sa ni//yongasu gang bar 'azhag par bya//thugs so la 'i'i shar phyogs//pU li ram la ya na~M dza de pa'i dum bu dang /rab gtum me ste da/9//khyod duM dz+wA lan+d+har+ya
76b3(rgyud): na keng rus chen po dang /gtum mig ma s+t+rai ser po'o//nub tu u d+yan ni keng rus can dang /'di ldan mA s+t+waM dmar po'o//b+he phyog su er bu dan mcho ga rnam par tsag+sa
76b4(rgyud): pa dang /sna chen ma ste ljang gu'o//me'i phyogs na go d+hA ba r-i na lha dgra dang /dpa' ba'i blo gros ma na mkha'i mdog can ma'o//bden bral du nA mad shwa ra na 'ang dpag med
76b5(rgyud): dang /miru thung ma ste/dkar skya'o//rlung gi phyogs na dIbi ko Ta na rdo rje'i 'od dang /lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ste ljang ku dang //mu tikA lta bu'o//dbang ldan na ma la khe na rdo rje
76b6(rgyud): lus dang shing grib me ste pad+ma dang ser smai'o//thugs kyi 'kho la ni mkha' la spyod pa'o//thod pa'i dum bu laM sogs pa'i dpa' blo ni gdong gcig be/phyag bzhi pa/
76b7(rgyud): ral pa'i cod pan thugs rjes khro zhing 'jigs pa/rdo rje dang dril bu'i phyag gi nyis 'khyud pa/g.yon pa dang g.yas pa'i phyag gnyis la khA T+wAM ga dang /cing te'u 'chang ba
77a1(rgyud): phyag rgya lnga yis rgyan pa/g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa'o//rab gtum ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni zhal gcig pa/phyag gnyis pa bsdigs
77a2(rgyud): mdzub kyi thod pa 'khyud pa/spyan gsum pa/ser skya'i gzugs can//skra grol ba/gzugs gnyis pa/gnyi su med par mnyam par ldan pa/phyogs kyi gos can rnam
77a3(rgyud): par rol pa/mgrin pa'i nor bu dang /gdu bu dang /dpung rgyan dang /rna cha dang tshangs pa'i skud pa dang /mgul rgyan dang /mgo bo'i phreng ba dang /g.yer ka'i sku rags
77a4(rgyud): can/sgo dang zur gyi lha mo rnams//kha gdung gshin rje sreg la sogs//ji ltar mkha' gro mdog bzhin du//kha gdong la sogs de bzhin//mtshams rnams lha mo
77a5(rgyud): de bzhin te//gzugs gnyis 'dzin cing yod 'phrog pa'o//phyag sogs de ltar sgom nas ni//dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol//ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas/
77a6(rgyud): mchod dang stod dang dbang yang bskur//sgom pa rtse gcig byas ni ni//bdag med ma yi ge 'phangs gnas//snying po ye shes dam tshig ni//sgrub pos 'dod pa kun gyi phyir//
77a7(rgyud): sku gsung thugs la rnam bkod nas//sangs rgyas mchog ni rnam pa spro//rtag tu dam tshig brkyang bya zhing //ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsi chu//dam tshig mchod pa'i sbyor ba
77b1(rgyud): yis//cho ga bzhin du bzlas pa bya//oM shrI tsit+ta DA ki d+hi kA a khaM huM hUM phaT/DA ki nI dz+wA lA shaM bya ra swA hA/snying po'o//oM hUM ha ha huM hUM phaT/nye ba'i snying po'o//oM badz+rA DA ki
77b2(rgyud): nU hU~M hUM phaT swAH/nyi 'i snying po'o//A~M sin bidz+re DA kI nI ye badz+ra bir+t+ti n+d+ri yai hU~MtrU~M dzaTe/snying po dang ny+tsi ba'i snying po'o//ma~M TI kin+ti~M ya~M hu~M hUM wAH/oM mA mai hu~M hU~M phaT/A~M khaH
77b3(rgyud): rero hi huM hUM phaT/aM rU pi NI huM hUM phaT/oM ka raM khaN+Da ka pA l+ya ka ra hUM hU~M phaT/oM pre tsaN+De hu~M hUM phaT/oM ku ru myA hA kaM kA la ku ru hu~M hUM phaT/oM tsaN+Da k+She ye huM hUM phaT/oM ban+d+ha
77b4(rgyud): kaM kA la ban+d+ha huM hUM phaT/oM pra b+hA byA tI ye huM hUM phaT/oM tA sa yai bi ke Da dr-i Sh+Ti Ni twAM sa yaM huM hUM phaT/oM me hA nAM se huM hUM phaT/oM k+Sho b+ha ya su ra b+hai ri Na k+She b+ha ya huM hUM/
77b5(rgyud): phaT/oM bI rA ma tI yai huM hUM phaT/oM hriM oM mai tA b+hU hr-i huM hUM phaT/oM kharba nI ye huM hUM Ta/oM tI badz+ri b+hA tra huM hUM phaT/oM l-i ke shwA rI ye huM hUM phaT/oM pheM prat+saM dr-i ha pheM
77b6(rgyud): huM hUM phaT/oM dru mets+tsha ye hUM hUM phaT/oM kA kA s+ye hu~M hUM phaT/oM u lU kA s+ye huM hU~M phaT/oM shA nAM s+ye huM hUM phaT/oM sU ka rA s+ye huM hUM phaT/oM ya ma d+yar+b+hi ye huM hUM
77b7(rgyud): nr-i/oM ya me du tI ya tuM hUM phaT/oM ya mi dauSh+Ti NAM ye huM hUM phaT/oM ya mau ma thaM nI ye huM hUM phiT/bzlas pa sgom par ldan byos nas//spro dang bsdu ngo'i rim pi yI///
78a1(rgyud): sngags pa myur du 'grung ba ste//rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang rnyed//mnyam pa'i dam tshig dam tshig mchog/thugs kyi rnyed pas khyab pa la//rnal 'byor
78a2(rgyud): chen po rnam par spyod//mkha' la spyod pa nyid thob 'gyur//'di ni khams gsum thams cad du//go 'phang mchog la legs par bzhugs//langs pa'i dus du dam
78a3(rgyud): tshig can//yan log drug tu sbyor ba bshad//A~M haHsnying kha ste rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po//na ma hi mgo la ste/rnam par snang mdzad ser po//swAt+na tu spyi gtsug la
78a4(rgyud): pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ste zla ba~M dang ser skya'o//bau ShaT ha go tshwa ste he ru ka na mkha'i mdog can//hUM hUM ho mig la ste/rdo rje nyi mA gser bcom lta bu'o//phaT haM ni yan
78a5(rgyud): lcug thams cad kyi mtshon cha ste rta mchog ljang ku ser skya'o//oM baM lte ba la ste/rdo rje mkha' gro na mkha' dang ser skya'o//haM yau snying ka la yang mi ni dkar mo'o/b+hI
78a6(rgyud): mau kha la ste/rmongs byed mo dmar mo'o//hra hrI mgo la ste g.yo byed maM ser po'o//oM hUM hUM spyi gtsug la ste skrag byed ma sngon pa'o//phaT phaT yan lag thams can
78a7(rgyud): kyi mtshan cha ste tsaN+Di kaM dmar ser ro//ji ltar bde bar tshig bzhon du spyad cing gnas//'gro baM du ma'i bsams pa la//thugs kyi rdo rje tshul can 'di//gnyis med
78b1(rgyud): sbyor ba mtha' yas pa//srid pa kun gyi dngos por gnas//dri ma med cing nga rgyal med//yi ge med cing brjod du med//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma las thugs kyi sdom pa
78b2(rgyud): dang bla ma'i bsnyen bkur gyi le'u ste drug pa'o///de nas gzhan yong bashrad bya ba//dkyil 'khor dam tshig mchog gyur pa//'dod pa'i gsang ba kun ster ba//
78b3(rgyud): shin tu gsang ba'i dngos grub stsol//sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir//sgrub pa'i don ni bshad par bya//dkyil 'kho' snga ma'i dbusu ni//pad+ma mdab ma brgyad pa bri//sna tshogs
78b4(rgyud): mdog can ge sar bcas//'dod pa kun+tiM gyi 'bras bu ster//do yi dbusu yi ge hUM//rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bad+ma ma//mtshan rnams thams cad yongasu rdzogs//dpe byad
78b5(rgyud): kun gyis rnam par brgyan//dgyes pa chen po'i sbyor baM yis//gnyis med gnyisu med pa'i mchog/byang chub sems kyi rgyu las ni//byang chub zla ba dri med pa//de mthong
78b6(rgyud): lha mo langs nas ni//glu 'di yis ni bskul bar byed//hUM rol cig rol cig dgyes pa to//bde ba chen po'i rdo rje ni//rjod pa chen po ro nyid las//'di nyid du ni bzhengasu
78b7(rgyud): gsol//a la la ha dgyes pa che//khyod ni bde ba'i mchog yin te//khyod kyi zhal ni lums tsam gyis//bdag gis 'dir ni ro cig rnyed//kye ma'o bcom ldan 'ad
79a1(rgyud): chan dgyes//oM rdo rje sems dpa' lugs dgyes khyod//ro dang ro mchog thams cad de//dgyes pa chen po bde ba rnams//rtag par dngos grub kun la
79a2(rgyud): yang //rol gcig rol cig lha mo la//rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad dang //bcom ldan rdo rje chen po ni//lha mo'i pad+ma dgyes pa rol//hUM a la la ho dgyes pa che//bcom
79a3(rgyud): ldan 'dod la dgyes pa khyod//'dod pa'i dngos grub legs par stsol//pad+ma mchog la dgyes par rol//oM la la ho dgyes pa che//tshogs kyi bde bas dus rtag tu//rdo rje
79a4(rgyud): mchog ni 'dzin pa yis//pad+ma'i zhal mchog bya ba yi//pad+ma la ni rol par mdzod//ji ltar bung bas sbrang rtsi bzhin//lha rnams pad+ma nyid la rol//kye ma grogs po dgyes
79a5(rgyud): chen 'dir//rdo rje mchog ni bde bar sbyar//dus kun bde ba'i 'dir mdzod cig/de ring dus ni 'di nyid du//yang dag byang chub 'dus pa yin//a la la ho dgyes pa che//bde
79a6(rgyud): chen kun tu dgyes mchog rol//a la la haM dgyes pa che//glu 'di dag gis bskul nasu//mnyam nyid las ni bcom ldan 'das//sdom pa'i rdo rje bzhengs par gyur//
79a7(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas par gzigs nas ni//bcom ldan 'das ni zhal bzhi pa//sngo ba dang /ser ba dang ga/dmar ba dang /ljang ku'i zhal te/spyan gsum pa/phyag bcu gnyis
79b1(rgyud): g.yas brkyang ngos 'jigs byed chen po dang dus mtshan zhabs 'og tu mnan pa/phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams pas dam tshig rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud pa/phyag gzhan gnyis
79b2(rgyud): po na tshogs bdag gi lpags pa 'dzin pa/g.yas pa'i gsum pa na cang ti'u/bzhi pa la dgra ste/lnga pi la gri gug/drug pa la rdo rje mdung bsnams pa/phyag g.yon pa'i
79b3(rgyud): gsum na rdo rje kha T+wAM ga/bzhi pa la khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa/lnga pa la rdo rje zhugs pa/drug pa la bdud bzhi'i mgo bo bsnams pa'o//ril pa'i cod pan rgyan cha can//
79b4(rgyud): dbu la thod pa'i phreng ba 'chang //zla ba phyed pa dbu la 'dzin//dbu la sna tshogs rdo rjes med na//'jigs pa'i mche ba rnam sbyar zhil//sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan//stag
79b5(rgyud): gi lpags pa gosu brlabs//mi yi mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin//mgrin nor gdu bu rna cha dang //mgo yi nor bus rnam par rgyan//tshangs pa'i skud pa thal bya ste//phyag rgya drug tu
79b6(rgyud): rab tu grags//de yi phang na bcom ldan ma//dam tshig rdo rje phag mo ni//sku mdog de dang 'dra bar bya//zhal cig pa la phyag gnyis pa//spyan gnyis pa la skra grol ba//
79b7(rgyud): gcer bu ska rags 'og phog gis rnam par rgyan pa/phyag g.yon pas 'khyud pa ste/bdud kyi khrag gis yongasu gang ba'i thod pa bsnams po/g.yas pa na bsdigs mdzub
80a1(rgyud): rdo rje dang bzlas pas phyogs bcur bsdigs par byed pa/bskal nga'i me yi gzi brjid can//khrag la dgyes gling zhal nas 'dzad//byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par
80a2(rgyud): 'khyud//thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can//chos kun gnas ni dge ba yin//A li kA li las byung ba//rnam par rtog pa med pa ste//chos dang chos min rnam par spangs//pad mda' lta
80a3(rgyud): mo dgod pa yis//dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol//mkha'agro ma dang lA ma dang //dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma//g.yon phyogs bskor ba'i dgod pa yis//rnal
80a4(rgyud): 'byor ma la dngos grug stsal//gnag cing ser la de bzhin dmar//ljang ku drag po'i gzugs can te//thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug pa//spyan sum g.yas brkyang
80a5(rgyud): gnas pas bzhugs//gcer bu dbu skra grol ba ste//bdud bani zhabs kyis gnon pa dang //chags shing zhen pas myos pa dang //thod pa dag gi dbu rgyan can//phyag rgya lngas
80a6(rgyud): ni rnam par rgyan//gnag cing sgro la ldang ba dang //shin tu 'jigs shing sdang mig can//ser zhing gnag la ljang gu skye//snying rje'i ro ni yongasu rdzogs//dmar zhing gnag
80a7(rgyud): la ldang ba dang //sgeg pa la sogs nyams kyi 'khor//ldang zhing gnag la ser ba dang //'jam zhing khro bis 'jigs pa deng //thod pa dang ne kha T+wAM 'dzin//g.yon pa//
80b1(rgyud): bad te'u gri gug ste//mtho bo rdo rje mdung g.yas na//mtshams ni bzhi po dag tu yang //bum pa bdud rtsi lnga yi chus//yongasu grang ba'i steng du yang //byang chub sems kyis gang snod
80b2(rgyud): gzhug/khwa gdong la sogs lha mo rnams//g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs//gnag dang sngo bsangs dmar ser skya//zhal gcig pA la phyag bzhi pa//spyan gsum
80b3(rgyud): drag po'i gzugs can la//skra grol ba yis rnam par rgyan//thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan//gcer bu yi dgos gdan du mnon//'dod
80b4(rgyud): pa'i snying rjes rnam par myos//g.yon par mgo bo kha T+wAM ga/g.yas na thod pa gri gugo/mtshams ni bzhi po dag tu yang //gshin rje sreg segs mkha 'gro mA//zhal gcig
80b5(rgyud): ba la phyag bzhi pa//g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs//spyan gsum pa la yi dgas gdan//skra grol ba yang rab tu 'jigs//thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//
80b6(rgyud): phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan//gcer bu sna tshogs gzugs can la//dga' zhing bde bas rnam par myos//g.yon la thod pa kha T+wAM ga/g.yas la cang te'u gri bug ste//gre yon//
80b7(rgyud): nas bskor zhing dged byas na//mtshams kyi dngos grub stsol bar 'gyur//khwa gdong la sogs sgor dgod pa//g.yas nas bskor zhing dgod par bya//khams dang skye mched
81a1(rgyud): phung po rnams//sku gsung thug su rnam par bsgom//sngar bshad rim pa'i sbyor ba yis//go cha bzhin du dgod par bya//dbang chen dang ni chu dang ni//me dang rlung grwa
81a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi//de yi dbus bkod pa ni//sa phyogs bzhi po drag yin//ltung byed ma dang gsod ma nyid//'gugs byed ma dang gar ma dag/de nyid na mkha'i khams yin
81a3(rgyud): te//pad+ma'i dra ba stong pa yin//gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad yin//tshor ba rdo rje nyi ma yin//'du shes gar dbang rgyal po ste//'du byed rdo rje rgyal po yin//rnam shes rdo
81a4(rgyud): rje sems dpa' ste//bde gshegs kun nyid he ru ke/mig ni gti mug rdo rje ste//rna ba zhe sdang rdo rje yin//sku ni phyug dog rdo rje ste//lce ni chags pa rdo rje yin//lus ni
81a5(rgyud): ser sna rdo rje'o//skye mchid kun dbang rdo rje'o//hUM ni thugs kyi rdo rje ste//A zhes bya ba gsung du 'gyur//oM ni sku ya rdo rje ste//he ni rdo rje ye shes yin//lus sogs rim
81a6(rgyud): pa'i sbyor ba yis//dngos po thams cad rnam par bsgom//bde ba'i chags pa bcom ldan 'das//chags pa med pa'ang de bzhin te//ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas//mchod
81a7(rgyud): dang bstod dang dbang yang bskur//rjesu chags pa'i sbyor ba dag/'jug pas mnyam pa'i bcud du 'gyur//dngos dang dngos med rnam bsgoms nas//spro dang bsdu ba'i
81b1(rgyud): sbyar byas nas//sbyor ba'i dam tshig mchod pa yis//cho ga bzhin du bzlas par bA//oM shrI badz+ra te he ru ru kaM huM hUM phaT/DA krin+ni dzA la saM ba rA swA hA/snying po'o//oM hrIHha t+ta huM hUM phaT/
81b2(rgyud): nye ba'i snying po'o//oM badz+ra bAts+tsha ni ye huM hUM phaT swA hA//oM sarba bud+d+ha DA kI nI yai badz+ra wAr+N+Na nI ye huM hUM phaT/pheg mo'i snying byi dang /nye ba'i snying po'o//oM DA ki nI huM hUM phaT/oM
81b3(rgyud): lA me huM hUM phaT/oM khaN+Da ro tse huM hUM phaT/oM ru pi NI ye huM hUM phaT/oM kI kA s+ye huM hUM phaT//oM u lU kA s+ye huM hUM phaT/oM shwA nA s+ye huM hUM phaT/oM su ka rA s+ye hu~M hUM paM/oM ya
81b4(rgyud): ma dA D+hi yai huM hUM phaT/oM ya ma d+hU tI ye huM hUM phaT/oM ya ma~M daMSh+Ti NI ye huM hUM phaT/oM ya ma ma tha nI ye huM hUM phaT/spros dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis//sgom pa mchog ni bsgom
81b5(rgyud): bar bya//'di ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi//mchog tu gsang ba smras pa yin//cu drug cha ni yongs rdzogs pa//sngags dang gsang sngags kun gyi gtso//sgom pa'i dus las
81b6(rgyud): langs nas ni//go cho gnyis ni rnam par dpyod//oM hA rdo rje sems dpa'i snying ka la//na maHhi rnam par snang mjed mgo bo la//swAhA tu pad+ma gyur gyi dbang phyug smai gtsug
81b7(rgyud): la bau ShaD+ga ha khrag 'thung ste dpung pa la'o//hUM hUM ho rdo rje nyi ma ste mig la'o//phaT haM rta mchog ste yani lag thams cad kyi mtshon che'o//oM baM rdo rje phag mo ste sto
82a1(rgyud): lar//ta yoM ya ma ni ste snying ka la'o//dri mo rmongs byed ma ste lho la'o//dzahU~M g.yo byed ma ste mgo la'o//hUM hU~M skrag byed ma ste skye gtsug la'o//phaT hU~M btum
82a2(rgyud): mo ste yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon tshwa'o//'di ltar dngos dang dngos med mnyam//thams cad tshe su ro gcig ste//mnyam pa nyid la rnam par bzhugs//mnyam po'i yaM
82a3(rgyud): shos lnga po 'di//rnal 'byor dam tshig can gyis skyongs//dus bzhi 'am yang na dus gsum du//ci tsam nus pa bsrung ba bya//'di ni gsang ba'i mchog yin te//gang ba yang ni
82a4(rgyud): bstan mi bya//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma chen po las sdom pa'i dam tshig bstan pa ste le'u bdun pa'o////de nas cho ga'i gzhung bzhin bshad//pad+ma med pa brgyad legs
82a5(rgyud): par mdzes//sna tshogs mdab ma yid byung na//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang spyan//pad+ma'i rgyal po rnam par bsgom//ste bar sna tshogs rdo rje ste//rdo rje rjeme lnga pa'o//de yo
82a6(rgyud): ba'i dbus ni//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis mtshan pa//de steng A li ka l-i ste//dbus reg bya stong pa yin//rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gis khya'o//bdag nyid he ru ka dpal
82a7(rgyud): nyid//zhal gdong lnga la phyag bcu gnyis//spyan gsum rnam par 'gyur ba ste//g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs//g.yon brkyang ba yang de bzhin bzhugs//
82b1(rgyud): 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan nyid//zhangs kyi 'og tu munan par bri//stag gi lpags pa gsu ban pas//thugs rje khro bos rnam par rol//thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan
82b2(rgyud): can//ral pa'i cod pan rgyan du thogs//zla ba phyed pa'i spyi gtsug la//sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la man na//sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan//mi mgo'i phreng ba 'dzin pa
82b3(rgyud): ste//thod rlon phreng bas rnam par rgyan//mgul rgyan gdu bu rna che dang //thod pa'i phreng bas dbu la rgyan//tshangs pa'i skud pa thal ba ste//phyag rgya drug po rnam par sgom//
82b4(rgyud): phyag gnyis thod pa'i dril bu yis//phag mo la nI rnam par 'khyud//phyag gzhan gnyis po dag gis ni//'jigs byed chen po'i lpags rlon bsnams//g.yas pa'i phyag
82b5(rgyud): gsum pa la rdo rje gsor zhing ba dan gsum pa 'dzin pa/phyag bzhi po la mdung rtse lnga pa/lnga pa la dgra sta/drug pal rdo rje cang te'u rnam so//g.yon pa'i phyag gsum po
82b6(rgyud): rdo rje kha T+wAM ga/bzhi pa la rdo rje zhags pa/lnga pa la gri gug/drug pa la drag po'i mgo bo/pang nu gnas pa'i phag mo ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mdog can phyag gnyis pa/
82b7(rgyud): zhal gcig pa/spyan gsum pa/skra grol ba/gcer bu dum bus rgyan pa'i ska rigs can/phyag g.yon pa la byang chub kyi sems kyis gang ba'i thod pa bsnams pas 'khyud pa/
83a1(rgyud): b+ha bla ga ras dA'i bsgribs mdzub kyis gdug pa kun la phyog su bsdigs mdzub byed cing gri gug 'dzin pa//bskal pa'i mo yi gzi brjid can//khrag la dgyes
83a2(rgyud): shing khrag 'dzag pa//byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khrig/bde ba'i mchog gi dam pa'o//drag po'i gzugs can rnam par 'gyur//thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par rol//
83a3(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan can//he ru ka dpal rnam par sgom//na mkha'i mdog can ser ba dang //dmar dang ljang ku ser skya'o//khro dang bzhad dang sgeg pa dang //rngam drang zhi
83a4(rgyud): bar ldan pa dang //khams dang skye mched phung po dang //reg pa'ang de bzhin sgom pa ste//mkha' gro lA ma de bzhin te//dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma//phyag bzhi pa la
83a5(rgyud): gdong gcig pa//spyan gsum po la drag po'i gzugs//skyil mo krung ni phyed par bzhugs//phyogs kyi gos can mchog yino//thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//skra
83a6(rgyud): grol ba yis rnam por rgyan//lha mo phyag rgya lnga 'chang zhing //'dod pa'i rnam grol rab tu ste//shar dang lho dang nub dang ni//byang gi phyogasu rnam par dgod//dkar
83a7(rgyud): dang ser ba de bzhin du//dmar dang ljang ku chags pas myos//thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin//dril bu cang te'u gri gug 'chang //mtshams bzhi dag tu bum pa bzhi//
83b1(rgyud): ye shes lnga yis yongs gang ba//thod pa 'o mas yongs gang bas//bum pa'i steng du bzhag par bya//g.yon nas bskor zhing bkod nas kyang //ye shes sems dpa' bkug
83b2(rgyud): nasu//mchod dang bstod dang gzhug par bya//yid dag lus la bkod nas ni//go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya//hUM AHoM ni rnam par sgom//gsang sngags ji bzhin
83b3(rgyud): bzlas na ni//dngos grung thams cad rape tu stsol//oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru kaM hUM hUM phaT/DA ki nI dz+wA la saM ba rA swAhA//oM hrIHhe hA hUM hUM phaT/snying po dang /nye ba'i snying po'o//
83b4(rgyud): oM badz+ra bai ro tsA nI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA//oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badz+ra brta ni ye huM hUM phaT swAhA//lha mo'i snying po dang //nye ba'i snying po'o//oM DA ki nI huM hUM phaT/oM lA
83b5(rgyud): me huM hUM phaT/oM khAN+Da ro d+hi hU~M hUM phaT/oM rU pi NI ya huM hUM phaT/khro bo sprul pas spros nas ni//'gro ba gsum po rdzogs par byas//sgom par bzlas par ldan pa yis//
83b6(rgyud): bdag gis spo dang bsdu bar bya//khams gsume ma lus kun tu yong //lus ngag yid gsum ci bder spyad//dam tshig can bsgoms ljongasra nas ni//go chu gnyis
83b7(rgyud): po bgo bar bya//oM hi rdo rje sems dpa' sti snying ka la'o//na maHti rnam par snang mdzad ste mgo bo lo'o//swAhA hUM pad+ma gar dbang ste spyi gtsug la'o//bau(
84a1(rgyud): hU~M dang lwa khrag 'thung ste dadung pa gnyis la'o//d+hu trUM hU~M rdo dz+ye ny+dzi ma s+the mig la'o//phaT haM rta mchog ste yan lag thams cad kyi go rgyu'o//oM baM rdo rje dragA mo sgyu
84a2(rgyud): ste lnga'o//haM yau ya mi nI ste sgying ka lalo/d+d+hi mo rmongs byed mya ste khA'i'o//hriM h+ni g.yo byed ma ste mgo bo la'o//hUM hU~M skrag byed ma ste spyi gtsug la'o//phaT phaT o ni tsaN+Di ka s+t+wa~M
84a3(rgyud): yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha'o//'di ni dam tshig ngo bo ste//dngos po kun gyi rang bzhi no//sngags dbyings tshes bdag rnal 'byor ni//bdag nyid cho su sbyor ba yis/
84a4(rgyud): ji ltar bde bar spyad par bya//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma las gnas kyi rim pa ste le'u brgyad pa'o////de nas gzhan yang ba shad bya ba//dpa' bo gcig
84a5(rgyud): bu'i cho ga ni//sngags pas lte bar rnam bsam smra bo//rlung dang me yid dadu su ni//de'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma/de'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor/de'i steng du thod pa ye
84a6(rgyud): shes lnga'i bdud rtsis gang ba/de'i dbu su a li ka li lug su 'byung ba dang /lugs las bzlog pa'i tshul du gnyis ltab tu byas la/hUM byin gyis brlabs
84a7(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba dga' zhing dgyes pa las byung ba ni dpal thugs rje'i bdag nyid he ru ka chags pas rnam par 'khor bar sgrim mo//de yang zhal
84b1(rgyud): bzhi pa drug bcu gnyis la zhangs g.yas pa brkyang ngas bzhugs pa/mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa/spyan gsum pa/zhal rnam par 'gyur ba/rjod pa'i phreng ba can/
84b2(rgyud): dpa' de'i phyag rgyu drug gis sgra lus phyag rgyas btab pa/'jigs byed chen po dang /dus mtshan gnyis kyi mgo dang nu mi mnan po//stag gi lcags pa brlabs pa/
84b3(rgyud): snying rje'i res 'khor ba/rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud pa'i phyag la//rdo rje rtse dpu /rdo rje dril bu/phyag bzhan gnyis la tshogs kyi bdag po'i lpags pa'i stobs 'dzin pa g.yas
84b4(rgyud): pa'i phyag gsum pa la rdo rje mdung //bzhi pa la lcags kyu/lnga pa la rdo rje bri gug/drug pa la rdo rje cang te'u/phyag g.yon pa'i gsum pa na/thod pa rkang gis yongasu gang
84b5(rgyud): ba//rnal 'byor gyi mchod phyir thogs pa dang /rdo rje kha //steng du rtse mi lji pa'i rdo rje rab tu 'jigs pa'i rdo rje dril bu rab tu 'phyang ba/sna tshogs pa dan rab tu sbyangs
84b6(rgyud): ba/dbusu sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa/ShaMg nas rdo rje rtsa gcig paM/bzhi pa la rdo rje zhags pa/lnga pa la chings pa'i mtsho go//drug pa li dgra sta bsnams pa zhal
84b7(rgyud): mdog sngo bai dang /ser ze dang /dmar ba dang /ljang ku rang tu 'jig su rung ba sgeg pa dang /dbod pa dang /'bring bag can du bzhugs pa'o//de'i mdun du A li ka
85a1(rgyud): li las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje phag mo 'khyud nas bzhugs te/sku mdog dmar po/phyag bzhi pa/zhal bzhi pa/spyan gsum pa/dbu skra
85a2(rgyud): grel pa/gcer bu dum bu'i ska rags can//phyag g.yon pa na thod pa/byang chub kyi sems dang gdug pa'i bdud kyi rak+tas yongasu gang ba/g.yas pa'i bsdigs mdzub can la//
85a3(rgyud): rdo rje gri gug thogs pa/phyag gzhan gnyis la cang te'u dang /kha T+wA~M ga bsnams pa/bskal pa'i me ltar gzi brjid can/zhal khrag 'dzag cing khrag la dga' ba/byin pa
85a4(rgyud): gnyis mnyam par bsnol ba/bde ba chen po'i snying rje'i bdag nyid ca na//dmar ba dang /ljang ku dang /sbyor ba dang /sngo ba'i zhal/gdug cing 'jigs par mdzad pa'o//
85a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal dang /sku mdog ji lta ba phyag dang sku mdog kyang de bzhin du bris te/'di la rnal 'byor pa mchog gis nang gi gnas la sogs pa'i rim
85a6(rgyud): par dgod do//pu ste thod pa'i dum bu dang //rab gau tum ma ni mgo la'o//dzA ste kaMng rus chen po dang /gtum ma'i mig can ma ni/spyi gtsug la'o//o ste ker
85a7(rgyud): rus can dang /'od ldan ma ni rna ba g.yas par ro//a ste mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang /sna chen ma ni spyi bo'i rgyab tu ste gnas//gau ti lha dgra dang /dpa'
85b1(rgyud): bo'i blo gros ma ni rna ba g.yon pa'o//rU ste smin pa'i dbu su ni 'od dpag med dang /mi thung ma'o//de ste mig gnyisu ni rdo rje'i 'od dang /lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o//mA ste dpung
85b2(rgyud): rtsar ni rdo rje lus dang /shing grib ma'o//nyi ba'i gnas te thugs kyi dkyil 'khor na mkha' la spod baM'o//kU ste 'chan khung gnyi su ni myu gu can dang /sa srung ma'o//oM ste nu ma
85b3(rgyud): gnyi su rdo rje ral pa can dang 'jigs byed chen mo ste zhing //tri ste lte ba'i dbusu stobs po che dang /rlung gi shugs tsan ma'o//ko s+t+rI snA rtse ra ni rdo rje hUM mdzad dang /chang thung
85b4(rgyud): ma ste nye ba'i zhing //ka ste kha la ni rab bzang dang /sngo bsangs lha mo'o//lA ste mgrin par ni rdo rje 'od dang /rab bza ma ste tshan ngo ti'o//ka ste snying la ni rdo rje 'jigs
85b5(rgyud): byed dang /rta rna ma'o//hi ste bshad sgo la mikri mi bzang dang /bya gdong ma ste nye ba'i chen do ha'o//gsung gi 'khor los la spyod pa'o//phre ste mtshan ma la ni stobs po che
85b6(rgyud): dang /'khor lo'i shugs ma'o//gri ste gzhung la ni rdo rje rin tshon dang /dum skyes ma'o//'dus pa ca no//so ste brla gnyi su rta mgrin dang tshang 'tshong ma'o//su ste byin pa
85b7(rgyud): gnyis la ne na mkha'i snying po dang /'khor lo'i go cha ma'o//nye ba'i 'dus pa tsa no//na ste sor mo rnams la ni dpal he ru ka dang /shin tu dpa' mo'o//si ste rkang pa gnyis
86a1(rgyud): rlan/nI ng+ga gar gyi dbang drug dang /stongs rgyun rgyu'o//dur khrod nga//mudz+dza mAn nga gnyis la ni rnam par snang mdzad dang /'khyor 'os bskur smrag/
86a2(rgyud): guste dbus mo gnyis rdo rje sems dpa'i dang /btsun 'dres chen nu'o//nye ba'i dur khrod de sku'i 'khor las 'og na gnas pa'o//mkha' bre mA ni rdo rje/lhami ni dril du
86a3(rgyud): dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma ni gling po che'i dwabus pa 'dzin pa'i khu tshur//khA gdeng mo ni rdo rje mdung /thug gdong ma ni lcags kyu/khyigadeng ma ni g+h+ri gug/phag
86a4(rgyud): gadrong ma ni cang ti ru/gshin rje sreg m+b+ha ni thod pa'i khA T+wAM ga ma/gshin rje po nyan ni zhags pa me/gau shin rje mche ba ma ni tshangs de'i mgo bo ma/gshin rje 'joms
86a5(rgyud): ma ni dgra sta ma/byang chub sems kyi snod ni zhal bzhi'i ngo bo//sa'i khams ni 'bebs ma/chu'i khams ni gsod ma/me'i khams ni 'bugs ma/rlung gi khrims ni
86a6(rgyud): blar myi dbang skrag ma~M/nAm tha'i byas ni pAng+gASh+Ti dra ba can//gzugs kyi phung po ni rnam par snang mdzad//tshwar bI'i phung po ni rdo rje nyi ma/'du shes kyi phu nI pad+ma ga
86a7(rgyud): myi dbang phyug/'du byed kyi phung po ni rdo rje rgyal ba/rnam par shes pa'i thu rje zi ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste/de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid ni dpamarje
86b1(rgyud): rje he ru ka'o//mig gnyis ni gti mug rdo rje/rna ba gnyis ni zhe sdang rdo rje/s+thA nI ser sna rdo rje/kha ni 'dod chags rdo rje/reg bya ni phrag dog rdo rje/skye mched thams cad la na
86b2(rgyud): dbang phyug rdo rje/yid ni mi 'khrugs pa/ngag ni tshe dpag med/lus ni rnam par snang mdzad do//oM hA snying la rdo rje sems dpa'/ne maHhi mgo la rnam par snang
86b3(rgyud): mdzad de/swAh+na hUM spyi gtsug la pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug/bai Sha Ta he dpung pa gnyis la he ru ka/hUM hUM ho mig gnyi su rdo rje nyi ma/phaT haM yan lag thams cad du rta michog
86b4(rgyud): gi go cha'o//oM bo lte ba la rdo rje phag mo'o//haM yau snying la ya mri nI'o//hI mau ni khu la rmongs byed ma'o//hr-i h+ni ni mgo la skyod byed me'o//hUM hUM spyi gtsug la skrag byed ma'o//
86b5(rgyud): phaT phaT tsaN+Di ka ste yan lag thams cad kyi go cha'o//mdzub mo mdud byas gud mo nges par sbyor//mthe bong rdo rje brtan por rab tu sbyar//dr-i yau dpral ba'i dbu su r-i ba
86b6(rgyud): bzhag nas//bskor zhing bskor bas kun tu bskor bar bya//rkang pa mAnan cing steng du blta//gyen du pheM gi sgra sgrogs shing //phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs
86b7(rgyud): pa'i//dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams 'gugs//dzaHhUM paM ho/\u0f7frdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sbyor bas dgug cing rab tu gzhug ste bcing la dbang du bsdu'o//dpa'
87a1(rgyud): bdang rnal 'byor madros napa la 'khor yong su gang bar mthong bzhin du spyod pa 'dud cu lngas yongasu dang bas sbyangs thabs dang thAHskapas dang
87a2(rgyud): bskud dbu'o//ji ltar bltams pacom gyis kyang //de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol pa//lha yi chu ni dag pa yis//de bzhin bdag gis khrus bya'o//oM sarba ta thA ka
87a3(rgyud): ta ma~M d+hi ShaM k+Sha tA sa ma ya shrI yA huM d+h+waM/rlung dang me dkyil 'khor gyi steng du zid pa/der yi ge a bskyed pa la/ye shes lnga'i bdud rtsis yongasu gong ba/zla ba'i cha bcu
87a4(rgyud): drug pa la yo ge hUM dang /AHoM rgyas byin gyis brlabs d+d+he/yi ge gsum pa'i spro ba las 'khor lo gsum 'byung bar sgom/oM sa ma mA shud+d+ha/sarba d+harmAHsa ma ya shud+d+he
87a5(rgyud): /chos thams cad kyi bzed mnyam por gnas pa byas mo//ye shes lnga yi sbyor ba yis//rdo rje bdud 'i chu btung //oM badz+ra amr-i ta I t+yA ka trU tha dzA tra a khats+tsha
87a6(rgyud): me/ye shes bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis//'khor lo mchog ni rnam par spro//dung chen phreng ba blangs nas ni//de nas de la bzlas par bya//rang srog stsol ba bas+ye nas ni/
87a7(rgyud): bsgoms pas de ma thag tu 'bar//oM badz+ra shI he he ru ru ka hu~M hU~M phaT/a TI kon+d+re dz+nyA la saM ba ra swAt+ma/oM ts+tshiHha ta shuhU~M phaT/snying po dang /nye ba'i stong za na/
87b1(rgyud): badz+ra bai ro tsa nI ye huM hUM phaT/oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badz+ra bar+d+ha nI ye hu~M hUM phaT swAt+ma/lha 'i snying po dang /nye ba'i snying po'o//ci ste ngal bar ma gyur na/de ltar bzlas
87b2(rgyud): shing bsum gtan bya//ngal bar gyur ni rnam dag sgom//de la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun te gang zhe na/lus dran pa nye bar gzhug pa ni mkha' gra
87b3(rgyud): ma'o//tsher ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni lA ma'o//chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni dum skyes ma'o//sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni gzugs can ma'o//'dun pa'i rdzu
87b4(rgyud): 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni rab tu gtum//brtson 'grus kyi rdzu'i 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni gtum pA'i mig can ma'o//dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni 'od ldan ma'o//sems kyirdzu phra/
87b5(rgyud): rkang pa ni sna chen mo//ye shes kyi pasmr-i rnam par sbyang ba'o//dad pa'i dbang po ni brtan pa'i blo chen ma'o//brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni ma'u thung ma'o//dran pa'i dbang po na/
87b6(rgyud): lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o//ting 'dzin gyi dang ngo bo ni shing brib ma'o//thugs kyi 'khor lo rnam par sbyang ba'o//shasma rab kyi dbang po ni swA srung ma'o//dad du'i stobs na
87b7(rgyud): 'jigs byed ma'o//brtson 'grus kyi stobs ni rlung gi shugs can ma'o//dran pa'i stobs ni chang 'thud ma'o//ting 'dzin gyi stobs ni sngo bsangs lha mo'o//shes
88a1(rgyud): rab kyi stobs ni shin tu bzang mo'o//ting 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rta rnama'o//brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni khwa gdong
88a2(rgyud): ma'o//gsung gi 'khor lo rnam par sbyang ba'o//dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o//shin tu sbyongs pa yang dag byang chub kyi
88a3(rgyud): yan lag ni dum skyes ma'o//chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chang 'tshong ma'o//dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i go che ma'o//
88a4(rgyud): btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni shin tu dpa' mo'o//yang dag pa'i lta ba ni stobs chen ma'o//yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni 'khor los bsgyur ma'o//yang
88a5(rgyud): dag pa'i ngag ni dpa' mau chen mo'o//sku'i 'khor lo rnam par sbyang ba'o//yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni kha gdong ma'o//yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni 'ug pa'i gdong
88a6(rgyud): can no//yang dge ba'i rtsol ba ni khyi'i gdong cano//yang dag pa'i dran pa ni phag gi gdong ma'o//rnam par thar pa bzhi'i sgo'o//yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin ni bcom
88a7(rgyud): ldan 'das dpa' he ru ka ste/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i rang gi ngo bo ni bdag kho na'o//dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa
88b1(rgyud): ni gshin rje sgeg ma'o//dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par srung ba ni gshin rje po nya ma'o//mi dbye ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par spong ba ni gshin rje mche ba ma'o//
88b2(rgyud): mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa ni gshin rje 'joms ma'o//dam tshig gi 'khor lo'i rnam par sbyong bya'o//'di ltar ma lus pa bsgoms na//sgrub pos nges
88b3(rgyud): par 'grub par 'gyuraro//sems can dron du rnal 'byor bdag/mnyam nyid dam chi ba dam pa'o//'khor lo ldi po so so yi//cho ga so so'i dbye ba sgom//mngal skyes
88b4(rgyud): so so'i dbye ba dag/'khor lo lnga yi mtshig nyid can//rnal 'byor ma sogs gtsor bsgom pa//so so'i dbye ba'i dbye ba yin//ji ltar rdo rje he ru ka/de bzhin lha
88b5(rgyud): mo'i dbusu ni//sangs rgyas mkha'agro ma sbyor ba//rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor de bzhin//rdo rje sku yi dpa' bo dag/b+ha ga'i dbusu rnam par sgom//ji ltar sgom pa'i rim
88b6(rgyud): pa yis//de ltar 'khor lo gsum du sbyor//b+ha ga lnga po bdag gis sgom//dbusu mkha' gro ma sbyor dang //prAng+ga'i mkha' gro mI'i sbyor dang //rdo rje mkha'agro ma da la/
88b7(rgyud): b+ha ga'i dbusu 'khor lo gsum//he ru ka ni mchog nyid sgom//dam tshig 'khor lo bsgoms pa la//dam tshig mkha' gro ma'i dkyil 'khor//ye shes ma ra'agro ma'i
89a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor//sna tshogs pad+ma la sogs dbus//ye shes 'khor lo'i sbyor ba da//de 'di b+ha ga'i dbus dag tu//'khor lo lnga pa dag la sgom/
89a2(rgyud): po gcig su te ru//ji 'azhin pa 'i ma de bzhin du//sku mdag zhal dang phyug dang mtshan//de nyidi sna rmugs pad+mar ma/nyid pa'i des
89a3(rgyud): rAk+Sha ni mchog nyid bsgrim//thod pa lhun TIg mnyam par ni//lnga yi dbyeb bdag sbyor te//rnal 'byor mi pi rim+b+ha pa \u0f88\u0f90m+b+ha/grwa'i dbu su rnam+b+ha par s+thA maM/
89a4(rgyud): 'khor lo'i bdag po mthong ma gyur//'khyud pa yi ni phyag rgya can//dpa' bo 'khor lo de la bosam//rang rang gi ni rnal 'byor ma//snying du sbas pa rnam par sgom//tshogs
89a5(rgyud): 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor ni//phyag bzhi yas ni rnam par mdzes//gnyis ni 'khyud pa'i phyag yin te//gzhan ni sna tshogs mtshan ma 'dzin//phyag gnyis dag ni 'khyud
89a6(rgyud): pa dang //de yi b+ha ga'i dbus ni//dpa' bos sgom pa ma mthong //kun rdzob sbas pa'i sbyor ba ni//sgom pa'i mchog kyang ma mthong //sgo nga las skyes rim sbyor ba'i//
89a7(rgyud): sgom pa'i rnam par sgom pa ni//lnga po brkus pa'i bsam pa ste//slong skyes mchog ni sgom pa'o//'khor lo'i dbye ba'i dbye ba yis//'di ltar rnal 'byor sgom pa'o///
89b1(rgyud): ji ltar bsam pa'i bye brag gis//de ltar 'dod pa sgom pa'o//bdag po'i dbye ba'i dbye ba yis//rigs kyi dbye ba rnam par sgom//lha mo'i dbye ba'i dbye ba yis//bdag po yang
89b2(rgyud): ni rnam par sgom//mig gi dbye ba'i dbye ba yis//mkha 'gro ma yi sgra lo sbyor//yong na sku gsum dbye grong gis//de ni bdag por bya glong yin//bdag po la sogs dbye/
89b3(rgyud): ba yis//'khor lo'i dbye ba'i dbye ba yin//rigs kyi dbye ba thams cad kyis//dpa' bo rnal 'byor mo yis dbye//mngal skyes glo yi sbyor ba yis//sgom pa rnams ni
89b4(rgyud): yongasu brtag/sgong skyes glu ni med pa ste//sgra dang sgra nya mos spangs pa'o//'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'dra//rnal 'byor bde ba'o mchog drum pa//kha cig ni rnal 'byor 'dod//kha cig
89b5(rgyud): rnal 'khyer 'dod min te/glu sgro la sogs/spangs pa yi//dngos po med pa'i go 'bad bzhugs//phra zhing mi zad dngos po med//gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa'o//glu sgra la
89b6(rgyud): sogs bcas pa yis//go 'phang mchog gi longs spyod ni//glu sgra la sogs spangs pa yi//dngos po med pa'i glo 'phang bzhugs//phra zhing mi zad dngos po med//
89b7(rgyud): gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa'o//go 'phang mchog gi lang spyad ni//glu sgra la sogs bcas pa yi//'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad kyang //phan dang snying brtse
90a1(rgyud): bdag gis bza'//sems can dan la btsun pa yis//bzod pa brtson dbus mchog dam ga/rnal 'byor ngas k+Sha ma smad cing //mkha' broms ni ngan
90a2(rgyud): par dgyes//ho srid pa gsum na bde brnyes gtso//a la la to/rgyal po 'di can drang ba'i tshogs//pad+ma la ni rdo rje rol//a la la ho/bde gshegs bral bya'i bzhung
90a3(rgyud): las grol//bdag blo dkris pa kun gyi bcud//tshugs pas rab tu dgyes mdzad cing //srid pa gdu min tshogs kyi bcud// la la ho//dgyes pas mngon par gro
90a4(rgyud): ba be//bdag ni 'dod las rang grol mdzod//a lI las ni byung ba yis//pad+ma yi ni rnal 'byor pas//glu yi rgyal po 'ang blangs pas//rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bde ba ni//pad+ma
90a5(rgyud): dra ba las bzhengaso//'dis bskul bas ni mgon po rnams//bde chen bde phyir gzhal yas nas//sangs rgyas thams cad bzhengs 'khrungs te//rgyal ba ma lus skye
90a6(rgyud): darar+ya 'gyur//glu dang bcas pa'i dngos po med//sgo nga skyes cha ni sbyangs pa yis//de yi gzugs ni ma mthong ste//bde ba med cing sdug bsngal med//gnyi sa med ci
90a7(rgyud): dngos po med//brtag pa'i spyod yul rnam para'artag/chos dang chos las rnam grol zhing //sdig pa nyes pas mi goso//thams cad gnyis med rnam grol ba'i//snong
90b1(rgyud): skyes dngos po dang bcas yim//sgras ni gnyis las sad byas na//rmongs pas mkhas bla ma smad do//ma rtogs pa dang rtogs t+ya ri drI //sems can don du sangs rgyas//zhing sgras na
90b2(rgyud): cog skyes lha mo//gnas skyes rnal 'byor ma de bzhin//rigs skyes ma mo skyes lha mo//mi snang mkha' spyod ma de bzhin//tha mamo'i skye ba mchog nyid do//bar mo sna tshogaso dam
90b3(rgyud): yin//sum cu pa ni sa lo spyod//sa 'og spyod pa 'og na gnaso//gnod sbyin ma dang bla mo dang //mi 'om ci myo dro za mo//lha mo thams cad sngon grub dang //gzhan ya
90b4(rgyud): bde gshegs bsam pA tsa na//dkon mchog gsum la bdug dga' bo//thams cad phyi yi dkyil 'khor lo//sna tshogs glu ni nyer spyad cing //rtag tu glu ni blang bar gyu/
90b5(rgyud): sna tshogs ro yi bde ba yis//lha mo mkha' gro'i gtso bo mchod//rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas nas//sku yi 'khor lo rnam par sgom//mkhas pas chu la rab gnas nas
90b6(rgyud): gsung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par sgom//me yi dkyil 'khor la gunas nas//thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bde ba che//dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas nas//dam tshi
90b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mchog dam pa//ye shes dkyil 'khor de nyid ni//de las bsam zhing rnam par sgom//b+ha ba'i dkyil 'khor dbusu ni//sna tshogs pad+ma'i rnam par
91a1(rgyud): sgom//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dngu du ni//dpa' bo gcig pu rnam par sgom//'khor lo pad+ma rdo rje phreng //'khor lo gsum po yong su bskor//ji ltar dam tshig
91a2(rgyud): mchog 'khor lo//sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng gis bskor//yi dgas rnam pa lngas de bzhin//phyi rol dkyil 'khor yongasu bskor//phyi rol dur khrod ma rungs pa'i//sna tshogs
91a3(rgyud): mdog can mchog dam pa//sna tshogs shing ni nyams dga' ba//khyi dang lce spyang 'jigs pa dang //bya reg 'ug pa chu skur dang //bya rgod dang ni si bi ka/sreg pa'i sa yang
91a4(rgyud): de bzhin te//keng rus gsal zhing bskyon pa dang //rag rog bsregs pa rnam par 'phyang //de bzhin phyed chog phyed mo tshig/mgo bo thod pa rje ngar dang //khog pa lag pa mgo
91a5(rgyud): bo dang //lce spyang sgra ni sgrogs pa dang //sbrul ni sna tshogs dga' bar gnas//seng gi phag dang stag dang ni//ra dang lug dang de bzhin te//glang po khyi dang bong bu glang //rje me
91a6(rgyud): sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog/bza' ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang //chung gi btung ba'i mchog rnams dang //dpa' bo 'dus pa'i mchog dag dang //rnal 'byor ma ni mchog sna
91a7(rgyud): tshogs//thod pa kha T+wA~M gA 'dzin cing //gri gug cang te'u mchog rnams dang //sna tshogs lha yi rnga dag dang //ro mchog bza' ba sna tshogs dang //sna tshogs tsum
91b1(rgyud): A l-i ka/ku shU la mchog dam pa dag/da lta bu ya dur khrod du//gnod sbyin ro langs srin po la//gtor ma de la sbyin bya zhing //he ru ka ya gzugs rnams skom//cang te'u rdo rje
91b2(rgyud): dril bu dang //sil snyan gar rnams rab tu bya//phyogs kyi gos can phyag rgya sbyor//hUM phaT ca co'i sgra 'byin cing //zhabs g.yas brkyang ba'i sbyor ba yis//'bar ba'i phyag rgya
91b3(rgyud): bcings nasu//kha ni dam tshig gis bkang nas//'di la gsang sngags rjes dron bya//oM A ra mi to dzaHhUM baM ho//bAdz+ra DA ki nI sa ma ya ste dr-i sh+ya to//'di ni gsum me bzhi lnga
91b4(rgyud): ru//yang dang yang du brjod par bya//lug su 'byung dang bzlog pa yis//thod par de rnams la yang sbyin//rdo rje thal mo gyen phye nas//'di la gsang sngags gdab par bya//oM kha
91b5(rgyud): kha khA ti khA hi//sarbaM yak+Sha rak+Sha sa b+hU ti pre ta pi shA tsa un mA da a pasmA ra DA ka DA kI n+yA da yaHi maM bi laM grih+Na nu sa ma ya rak+ShaM tu/ma ma sarba sid+d+him+bi prA yats+tshan+te/ya thai baM ya
91b6(rgyud): theSh+TaM/b+huny+dza tha bi ba thaM dzi g+ha tha/mr-i ti kra ma tha/ma ma sarbe kAn+ta yA ma da su khe bi shud+d+ha ye sa ha yi kaM b+ha bin+taM/hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA//cho ga 'di yi rim pr-i yis//thun mtshama?
91b7(rgyud): bzhi ru sbyin par bya//gcig pu bde bar gnas na su//ma hA man sa don bya bsten//rnal 'byor mnyam par gzhag nas ni//'di la thams cad bza' bar bya//nges par brjod
92a1(rgyud): shrI rgyud b+hU na'i tham lus gnyis med pa'i 'khor ba'i rlom par b+h+yo ba bstan pa ste lon dag bar///de nas gzhan yang bshad b+ha ba//dag pa'i gnas
92a2(rgyud): kA ste//gsang ba'i cho ga'i gsang bAn+ti//myukhri brim mi snying po mchog/gsang sngags kun gyi gnas sbyor ba//dngos grub rnams dud ts+tshom po yin//de nas
92a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dbang phyug chen po'i rdo rje 'khor dang /mjug gzhug dang bcas pa mkha' gro chen po dang /mkha 'gro ma'i tshogs rnams dang /gzhan
92a4(rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams rang gi bdag po la phyag byas te gsol pa/e ma'o bde ba'i sems dpa' khyod//e ma'o bde
92a5(rgyud): ba'i gtso bo yi ste//mkha gro ma yi gsang zla mchog/rang gi dkyil 'khor bshad du gso la//sangs rgyas rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che//rdo rje rnal 'byor mchog gyur pa//
92a6(rgyud): rang gi gsang pa'i dkyi 'khor gsungs//'jig rten gsum gyi bde ba 'byung //rdo rje rin chen byud che//sna tshigs spyor deng sna chags gar//rang gi dkyil 'khor drug
92a7(rgyud): pa gsungs//rdo rje rnam snang las 'byung ba//gzhal yis zur bzhi rab tu mdzes//sgo bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan//rkyen rnams thams cad yongasu rdzogs//dkyil
92b1(rgyud): 'khor bde ba las byung ba//de yi dbusu 'khor lo gnyis//thugs dang gsung gi 'khor lo mchog/rtsings brgyad pa la sngo dang dmar//rdo rje prad+mas rnam par bskor//phyi rol 'khor
92b2(rgyud): los bskor bar bri//dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog gi ni//phyi rol rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs//glu dang gar gyis rnam par rol//phyi rol yi dgas phreng ba yau//sna tshogs
92b3(rgyud): mdog ni mchog dam pa//lag pa'i gar gyis gar byed pa//gdong ni rnam sgyur lce yang bskyod//de dbus stong par gyur pa ste//zla bar yi ge hUM mchog yin//der ni rdo rje
92b4(rgyud): khyab pa ste//rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom//zhal gsum phyag ni drug po ste//sku gsum snying rje'i nyams dang ldan//phyag rgya che dang yang dag ldan//rdo rje'i skyil mo
92b5(rgyud): krung gis bzhugs//sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan steng su//zla bi'i dkyil 'khor dbu su ni//dkar zhing sngo la gur gum zhal//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi//thod pa dang ni
92b6(rgyud): khA T+wAM 'dzin//rdo rje dril bus yang dag 'khyud//cang te'u tshangs pa'i mgo bo 'chang //mi bskyod pa ye cod pan 'dzin//mkha 'gro'i gnas ni dgod bya ste//dpa' bo'ang de bzhin
92b7(rgyud): dgod par bya//khams dang phung po skye mched rnams//sku gsung thugasu rnam par sgom//lha mo'ang de 'dra'i gzugs can te//phyag rgya chen po bde ba yin//snying dkar maM
93a1(rgyud): zhes can no//zla dwa'i dkyil 'khar dbus rab tu//ho gnyis dang ni bcus pa ru//sngon du dngos grung rje sa dun nus//b+hakla r+b+ba 'di yos rgyas btab s+ho//dam
93a2(rgyud): thag tu lha mo yi//snying ka'i gsang ba'i pad+ma la//chags par spyod par gyur nas//mgon po chen po tshigs pa yis//rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba ches//de dang lhan cig
93a3(rgyud): rol pa ste//dbang po gnyis ni sbyor bar 'gyur//dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi//yid ni dga' bar gyur nas//dga' ba y-i ni bsams pa yis//cang ti'u'i sgra yis bskul/
93a4(rgyud): na ni//mnyam nyid dga' las bzhengs par 'gyur//A li ka li mnyam sbyor ba//bde ba chen po dgyes par gyur//de nas na mkha' dang chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' gtugs pa
93a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa dang /gsang ba'i dpa' bye dang /mkha'agro ma dang bcas pas khyab pa/byang
93a6(rgyud): chub sems dpe'i tshogs chen pos mdun du bdar ba/ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i mkha' 'gro dang /mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs dang /phyi'i rigs ma'i bdag nyid
93a7(rgyud): po nya dang /pho nya ma'i tshogs rgya che ba rnams ngo mtshar du gyur nas mig gis lta zhing mnyam par 'khyud de/gar gyi rnam par 'phrul pa yis//dga' ba chen pos
93b1(rgyud): langs nus ni//spyi bor thal mo sbyar byas nas//byin gyis brlabs kyi dgyes pa yis//mgon po chen po dgyes pa yis//glu 'di dag gis bskul bar bya//e ma'o don tshar/
93b2(rgyud): rmad kyi chos//oM ma'o ngo mtsharo rmad kyi lugaso//e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi gsang //e ma'o bde ba las byung ba//oM ma'o kun tu bzang po'i don//e ma'o bde ba
93b3(rgyud): yang dag 'dus//e ma'o bde chen dag pa ste//e ma'o bde ba bde ba'i mchog/e ma'o gsang sngags mnyam sbyor ba//e ma'o thugs kyi spyod pa ste//e ma'o/
93b4(rgyud): mnyam nyid phyag rgyar ldan//e ma grub pa yang dag 'byung //e ma pha rol phyin pa yis//a ma rig pa rjes chags po//e ma sna tshogs las chen po//e ma kha sbyar
93b5(rgyud): gsum drug po//e me rdo rje mnyam la sbyor//e ma pad+ma rnam 'byed pa//oM ma dbang po gnyis mnyam ldan//e ma rmad byung mnyam pa ste//e ma dag pa'i gar tshon te//
93b6(rgyud): e maM dri med glu re legs//e mA rol mo legs sbyor ba//e ma phaT kyis mun sel ba//e ma me tog na bza' mdzes//e ma bdug pa g+ha ti bdug/e mu sgron ma
93b7(rgyud): gti mug sel//e ma dri mchog bsil ba ste//e mau rnal 'byor mnyam sbyor ba//e ma sgyu 'phrul mkha' lta bu//e ma gdod nas sangs rgyas gdod nas rdo rje ste//e ma
94a1(rgyud): gdod nas rin chen bde ba rab stsol ba//e ma gdod nas pad+ma gdod nas bris pa ste//e ma sna tshogs sgyu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa yin//e ma nga
94a2(rgyud): mtshar rmad sangs rgyas//e ma ngo mtshar 'di nyid rmad//e ma ngo mtshar sems can rnams//e ma ngo mtshar lha mo yin//'dis bskul ba ni mgon po rnams//mchog tu
94a3(rgyud): sbyor ba'i snga bon las//gur gum gyi ni mdog lta bu//rdo rjes mtshan pa 'byung bar 'gyur//zhal drug phyag ni bcu gnyis pa//phag mo yis ni rnam par rgyan//dpa' chen
94a4(rgyud): 'jam pa'i rdo rje ni//skyil krung byed par yang dgra gnas//spyan gsum pa la rab tu bzhad//drag cing 'jigs la rngam pa dang //snying rje gar gyi nyams can te//'jig
94a5(rgyud): byed dang ni dus mtshan dog/zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan par bzhugs//yang na g.yas brkyang gnas pa yi//rnal 'byor 'byung ba chen po skyes//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
94a6(rgyud): dbu su ni//sna tshogs pad+ma dag la bzhugs//ge sar sar pa'i mdog can la//phyag rgya des ni rnam par rgyan//sngo zhing ldang la ser ba dang //dmar zhing dkar la zhi
94a7(rgyud): ste//rjed pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//sangs rgyas gzugs kyis rnam par mdzes//rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan//lha mo'i ku tsa 'tshir ba dang //tshangs pa'i
94b1(rgyud): budrub 'dzin mdzad cing //dag pa'i 'jigs byed lpags pa na//rkang par chi zhing bzhugs pa yan//rgod pa rnaM ba 'dun cing //ray+YAr+m+ma ud dpal mdab byas mas
94b2(rgyud): shing //lcags kyu zhang+gas pa cang te'u//mgo bo gzhu yang de byan no//de yi sku mdog phyug mtshan bzhin//rdo rje dge mo chen mo ni//tshogs pa chen po'i go 'phang
94b3(rgyud): gnas//byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril//dga' ba chen po yid 'ong ba//mgro bo'i phreng gas su lus rkyen//phyag rgya drug gis rnam par mtshan//'di ltar
94b4(rgyud): sngags pas sgron byaswA t+ye//'dzam bu'i rdo rje bde ba che//gnas sogs bdag por sbyor ba yis//ye shes la sogs bdag po kun//mkha'agro dra ba'i sbyor ba ste//sdom pa
94b5(rgyud): sdom pa'i mchog yino//thog mya thugs kyi 'khor lo ste//shar phyogs kyi rtsib su pu l+lI ra ma la ye na thod pa'i dum bu dang /rab gtum ma ste/dkar ba dang /
94b6(rgyud): sngo ba dang /ljang gu'o//t+yang phyog su dza l-in+d+ha ra nA keng rus chen po dang /gtum mo ga me ste ser ba dang /sngo bA dang /ljang ku'o//nub phyog su uR+YAn na ked+da rus
94b7(rgyud): can dang /'od ldan ma ste/dmar ba dang /spro ba dang /ljang ku'o//lho ruM ar bu dan mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang /sna cheni mo ste/ljang ku dang /spyir
95a1(rgyud): dang /dmar ba'o//me'i phyogs la gong pa rnying lha dgra dang /dpa' bo'i blo gros ma ste/dmar ba dang /ser ba dang /ljang gu'o//bden bral du rA me
95a2(rgyud): shwa ra na 'od dpag med dang /mi thung ma ste/dkar ba dang /ser ba dang /ljang ku'o//rlung gi phyogasu daM bi ko trar+thA rdo rje'i 'od dang /lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ste na mkha'i
