95a3(rgyud): mdog can/sar ba dang /ljang ku'o//dbang ldan du mA la ba na rdo rje lus dang /shing gring ma ste/ljang ku dang /si po dang /sngo ba'o//thugs kyi 'khor lo ste thod pa'i dum bu
95a4(rgyud): la sogs pa'i dang bo ni rab tu ma le sogs pa rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pas mkhyud pa'o//gnyis pa gsung gi 'aldeng ts+tsha yang shar phyogs kyi rtsib su kA ma ru pa na myu gu can dang
95a5(rgyud): sa srung ma ste/dkar ba dang /sngo ba dang /ljang ku'o//byang phyogasu o traM na rdo rje ral pa can dang 'jigs byed chen mo ste/ljang ku dang /sor ba dang /sngo ba'o//nub tu tri sha
95a6(rgyud): ku ne na dpa' bo chen po dang /rlung gi shugs can ma ste/sngo ba dang /ser ba dang /ljang ku'o//lho ru ko se la na rdo rje hUM mdzad dang /chang 'thung ma ste/dmar bA dang /
95a7(rgyud): sor ba dang /ljang gu'o//rmen phyog su ka ling kar rab bzang dang /sngo bsangs ma ste/ljang ku dang /ser ba dang /dmar ba'o//bden bral du lAM pa kan rdo rje'
95b1(rgyud): dang /rab bzang ma ste ser ba dang /sngo ba dang /ljang gu'o//rlung phyogs kAny+tsi na 'jigs byed chen po dang /rtarnam ste/dud pa'i mdog dang /ser ba dang /sngo ba'o//dbang ldan gyi phyog tu
95b2(rgyud): hi ma la ya na mig mi bzung dang /bya gdong ma ste/gnam gyi mdog dang /ser ba dang /ljang ku'o//gsung gi 'khor lo ste myu gu can la sogs pa dang /sa srung ma la sogs
95b3(rgyud): pa ni pad+ma dang /pad+ma'i dril bu 'dzin pas 'khyud pa/de ltar mkha' la spyod pa dang /sa la spyod pa'i 'khor lo gnyis po yin no//gsum pa'i sku rdo rje 'byung ba ni zur bzhi
95b4(rgyud): pa la sgo bzhi pa ste/shar phyogs kyi sgor pre ta pu ri na stobs po che dang /'khor lo'i shugs can ma ste/sngo ba dang /ser ba dang /ljang ku'o//byang phyogs kyi sgo la gr-i ha de ba
95b5(rgyud): tA na rdo rje rin chen dang /dum skyes mo ste/se ri ba dang /sngo ba dang /ljang ku'o//nub kyi sgor so so rASh+Ta ne rta mgrin dang /chang 'tsheng ma ste dmar ba dang /ser ba dang /
95b6(rgyud): ljang ku'o//lho'i sgor su wor+t+ta dI pa naM na mkha' snying po dang /'khor lo go cha ma ste/dkar ba dang /sngo ba dang /ljang ku'o//me'i phyogasu na ga ra na khrag 'thung ma bas
95b7(rgyud): rab dpa' mo ste/na mkhi'i mdog dang /ser ba dang /ljang ku'o//bden bral du sin+d+hu na pad+ma gar gyi darang phyug dang /stobs chen ma ste/ser ba dang /sngo ba dang
96a1(rgyud): ldeng ku'o//rlung gi blogasum ru tan rnam par snang mdzad dang /'khor los bat+tAr ma ste/dkar ba dang /sngo ba dang /ljang kur//dbang ldan du ku lu tA na rdo rje
96a2(rgyud): sems dpa' dang /brtson 'grus chen mo ste/dkar ba dang /sngo ba dang /ljang ku'o//sku'i 'khor mi stobs po tsha la sogs pa ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma l-i saM ga pA'i
96a3(rgyud): 'khor lo'i dril bu la sogs pas 'khrud pa'o//dpa' bo 'di thams cad gi yas brkyang pas bzhugs pa/spyan gsum pa/zhal gsum pa/phyag drug pa thod pa dang /
96a4(rgyud): T+wAM ga dang /tsAng te'u dang /gri gug bsnams pa/ci ltar dpa' bo'i phyag dang /phyag mtshan bzhin du mkhye gro ma rnams kyang de bzhin te/thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyun
96a5(rgyud): nin//rang gi rigs kyi mchog gis rgyan//thams cad phyag rgya lnga 'dzin cing //stag gi lpags pa gosu banabs//lha mo dbu skra grol ba ste//byin pa gnyis kyis
96a6(rgyud): legs par 'khril//thams cad phyogs kyi gosna 'chang zhing //skye lugs 'jig suM pa rnam par sbyar//de'i dbus 'jam pa'i rdo rje ni//zla ba phyed pa 'dzin pa'i
96a7(rgyud): mchog/sna tshogs rdo rje rnam gnon pa'o//phagi mo dbu skra grol ba ste//gcer bu 'og pag sku rigs can//ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas ni//snga ma'i cho ga
96b1(rgyud): rim pa bzhin//bcug nas thim par rnam par sgron//spyod pa bzhi ru byin gyis brlabs//dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma thams cad//gnas la sogs pa'i rim par dgang//khams dang phung
96b2(rgyud): bopo skye mched rnams//sku gsung thugs kyi dam pa ste//snying po ye shes mchog gyur pa//dbang bskur yang ni dbul bar bya//de nas go cha dgod bya ste//mkhas pas ye shes bzlas
96b3(rgyud): de nas dam tshig sems dpa' ni//cho ga duzhin du bzlas pa bya//oM shrI many+dzu badz+rA d+h+r-i kr-i AHhaM hU~M phaT/DA ki nI dz+ha la saM pau raM hUM phaT swAhA/oM badz+ra bA rA ti hU~M hUM phaT swA hA/
96b4(rgyud): oM ka ra ka ra khaN+Da kA pA li huM hUM phaT/oM pr-i tsaN+DA hUM hUM phaT/oM ku ru ku ru ma hA kai kI la huM hUM phaT/oM tsat+ta kri ye huM hUM phaT/oM ba ni d+hi ban d+ha kaM kA la huM hUM phaT/oM pr-i b+ha ba
96b5(rgyud): trI ye huM hUM phaT/oM tA smA ya tA~M sA yA bI ke T+Ta daMSh+NI N+yai hu~M hU~M phaT/oM mA hA nA se hu~M hU~M phaT/oM k+Sho b+hA ya k+Sho b+haM yaM su rU bai rI N+yai huM hUM phaT/oM bI ra mA tI yo huM hU~M phaT/oM tra~M hU~M a
96b6(rgyud): mi tA b+h+r-i hu~M hUM phaT/oM kha dza~M rI ye huM hUM phaT/oM hr-i tra~M badz+ra pra b+hA hu~M hU~M thainr-i oM lat+ne shI r-i ye hUM hU~M phaT/oM pheM pheM badz+ri dai hi hu~M hU~M phaT/oM druM mats+tshe ya~M huM trUM phaT/oM
97a1(rgyud): /phaT tA d+hu ri karba hU~M phaT/oM ai rA bat+ti ye huM hUM phaT/oM dA ha da hA badz+ra dza Ti l+yA dzu hUM phaT/oM ma hA b+hai ra b+hi hu~M hUM phaT/oM btsa pa tsa mahA dr-ir hu~M hUM phaT/
97a2(rgyud): oM bA yu be ge huM hUM phaT/oM b+haMk+Sha b+hak+Sh+ma badz+ra hUM kA ra bA saM ru d+hi ra in+ta mA ShAM pai ni huM hUM phaT/A~M su raM b+hak+Sh+mI huM hUM phaT/oM h+yAt+taM gr-ih+Na su b+ha dra sap+ta pA tA la g+hA ta d+hA dzaM ga sarbaMH
97a3(rgyud): sh+tsa ta rdA yai huM hUM phaT/oM sh+yA me dr-i dz+nyI hUM hU~M pheMTe/oM A kan+d+ha A kaMD+D+h+ya badz+ra b+ha dr-i huM hU~M phaT/oM swat+tadwe tsaM hU~M baT/oM d+h+waM d+h+r-i mi hAM b+hai ra bi d+hud+d+hi phaT/aM ha yaM kAr+N+Ne hu r+thaM
97a4(rgyud): phaT/AM dz+r-IM dzI bi ru prA k+Sha huM hUM phaT/oM kha g+h+r-i nA ne huM hUM phaT/oM k+Sh+mAM k+ShiM ma hA ba la huM hUM phaT/oM tsakre br-i gi huM hUM phaT/oM hai ha~M rat+na badz+ra huM hU~M pheMT/oM khaN+Da ro he hu hUM
97a5(rgyud): phaT/u~M hUM h+ni ta ya gr-I bI hu~M hU~M phaT/oM shot+taM nI ye huM hUM phaT/ Shi hUM trAM A kA sha gir+b+ha huM hUM phaT/oM tsakra bar+m+ma NAM ye huM hUM phaT/oM ki l-i ki lI he ru ka huM hUM phaT/
97a6(rgyud): AM pru bi re hu~M hU~M phaT/oM sau khI si li pad+mi nan+taM shwa rau hu~M hUM phaT/oM mahA ba le huM hUM phaT/oM te li hi li bai ro tsA nI huM hUM phaT/oM tsakra bar+t+ta nI ye huM hUM phaT/oM d+hi
97a7(rgyud): bir+t+ti'i badz+ra sitwa huM hUM phaT/oM mahA Sh+T+rIn+yai huM hUM phaT//dung chen phreng ba blangs nas ni//gsang sngags cho ga bzhin du baizla//dus bzhir sbyor ba byas nas ni/
97b1(rgyud): bzlas dang bsgom pa rtse gcig bya//rnal 'byor myur du grub nas ni//gsang sngags grub pa'i rim pa yis//bdab nyid phyag rgyar ldan byas nas//sngags pas rtag tu
97b2(rgyud): mchod par bya//sngags pas dkyil 'khor zhugs nas ni//sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor sgrom//rang gi lha yaM sbyor ba yis//dkyil 'khor mchog ni 'grub pa
97b3(rgyud): yin//dkyil 'khor lha yi sbyor ba yis//dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i yid bla ma las 'khor lo gsum gyi dkyil 'khor
97b4(rgyud): gyi cho ga'i rim pa ste le'u bcu pa'o///de nas gzhan yang bai shang bya ba//rigs kyi dbye ba'i mchog dam pa//gnas sogs sbyor ba'i rim pa yis//
97b5(rgyud): phyogs kyi rim pa rnam par dbye//thams cad mchog gi sbyor chen po//rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab tu 'grub//rdo rje skulas nges 'byung ba//dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor dam pa'o//
97b6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /yang dpa' bo dang /rnal 'byor ma thams cad 'dus shing 'ongs nus sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
97b7(rgyud): bde ba chen po'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dang /mig yangs dga' bas gar byed cing //myur bas bsdus pa'i rim pa yis//rkang pa g.yas deng g.yon gyis
98a1(rgyud): ni//mdun du gom skyabs spros pa yis//'di ltar rnam sbyar khros pa'i spyan//smin ma 'degs dang 'khor bar ldan//skye med phyag rgyur 'gro ba
98a2(rgyud): dag/mig gi phyag rgyas phyag 'dzilA~M tAM//rdo rje sems dpa' chen po waM rnam pa dri mas bskul nis zhus te/rnal 'byor ma chen mo thams cad dkris pa'i dkyil 'kho
98a3(rgyud): gsungs pa/bcom ldan 'das kyi de nyid dang //dkyil 'khor mchog ni mdzes pa ste//dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje ni//thams cad sangs rgyas bde ba che//rol pa'i bde ba/
98a4(rgyud): tshun po ni//de ring du ni bdag gis rnyed//a la la ho//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi//bde ba chen po mchog tu dgyes//klu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis//shin tu
98a5(rgyud): srid pa nges ldog pa/de bzhin gshegs pa dag pa che//dkyil 'khor du ni rnam par brtag/de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa' dgongs shing sbyin
98a6(rgyud): rnam par phye ste/'khor bzhi rnam par 'khor ba'i gar gyis smin ma 'debs shing //mdun du gzigs shing brim stabs kyis//dregs pas snyems par rnam 'khor dzi'i/
98a7(rgyud): sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje rang //de nyid 'di la bzhugs pa yin//dkyil 'khor dang ni dkyil 'khor ming //rdo rje mi shes thugs la gnas//rtag pa med par bdag sbyor
98b1(rgyud): rdo rje dkyil 'khor mchog yin//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog yano//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang ba ni//dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje'o//ri mo mkhan gyis dkar po ltar//byang chub
98b2(rgyud): sems mchog 'di lta bu//sngo zhing 'bar ba sna tshogs pa'i//rlung gis bskyod pa'i me lta bu//zla ba byed pas bdag nyid mdzes//rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dag la bzhugs/
98b3(rgyud): cha brgyad dkyil 'khor yid 'ong ba//'brang ba'i nyi ma dang bcas pa//dkyil 'khor rdo rje rin chen de//bde ba mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur//pad+ma mdab brgyad kha phye ba//
98b4(rgyud): lte ba ge sar gyis khyab pa//pad+ma pad+ma nyid las ni//dga' ba'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ba yin//dkyil 'khor mchog ni mthong ba na//byin za 'bar ba ji bzhin du//lus
98b5(rgyud): kyi rdo rje dkyil 'khor du//las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//'di ltar de dag mtha' yas pa//dkyil 'khor du ni rab tu brtag/gang du gang la sprul pa ni//
98b6(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' las byung yin//thams cad bdag nyid kun tu bzang //mkha'i khams ni kun tu khyab//mkha' dbyings sa yi mchog gyur par//khang pa brtsegs///
98b7(rgyud): par rnam par sgom//khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbus dkyil du//dkyil 'khor lnga ni rnam par brtag/sna tshogs pad+ma mdzes pa la//ji lta'i gnasu rnam par dgod//
99a1(rgyud): dbus ma'i dkyil 'khor dbun ni//he ru ka ni rnam par skom//sngar bshad sku mdag gnas rnams dang //phag mo'i 'di la rnam par gnas//shar du bu
99a2(rgyud): lI ra ma la yar thod pa'i dum bu dang /rab gtum ma'o//byang du dze Shin+d+ha rar kang rus chen po dang /rab tu mA ma'i mig can ma'o//nub tu ur+yan la keng rus can dang /
99a3(rgyud): 'di ldan ma'o//lho ru a raM bu dar mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang sna tshon ma'o//dbus ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i shar gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbu su gau dA pa rir lha dgra dang /
99a4(rgyud): dpa' bo'i blo gros ma'o//shar phyog+sa su rA mye shwa rar 'od dpag med dang //mi'u thung ma'o//byang phyog su de bi ko Ta na rdo rje'i 'od dang /lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o//nub
99a5(rgyud): tu mA lA ba na rdo rje sku dang //shing grib ma'o//lho phyogasu kA ma ru pa na myu bu can dang /sa srung mo'o//byang phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbusu tre na rdo rje ral pa can
99a6(rgyud): dang 'jigs byed tshan mo'o//shar du tri sha ku na na dpa' bo chen po dang /rlung gi shugs can ma'o//byang du ko sa la na rdo rje hUM mdzad dang /chang 'thung ma'o//
99a7(rgyud): nub phyogasu ka ling ka na rab bzang dang /sngo ngasangs lha mo'o//lho phyogasu lAM paM ka na rdo rje rab bzang dang /shin du bzang mo'o//nub kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
99b1(rgyud): kI tsi na 'jigs byed chen po dang /rta rna ma'o//shar phyog su hi ma la ya na mig mi bzang dang /bya gdong ma'o//byang du pre tA pu rir stobs po n+de dang /'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o//
99b2(rgyud): nub tu gr-i ha de bA tA na rdo rje rin chen dang /dum skyes ma'o//lho ru sau rASh+Ta na rta mgrin dang /R+Sha 'tsheng ma'o//lho phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbu su war+Na dwI pa na na mkha'i snying po
99b3(rgyud): dang /'khor lo'i go cha ma'o//shar du na ga ro na dpal khrag 'thung dang /rab dpa' mo'o//byang du sid+d+h+ya na pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang /stobs chen mo'o//nub tu ma ru na
99b4(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad dang /'khor los bsgyur ma'o//lho ru ku lu tA na rdo rje sems dpa' dang /brtson 'grus chen mo'o//thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa'i dpa' bo dang /rab tu
99b5(rgyud): gtum ma la sogs pa thams cad kyang gzugs sna tshogs pa/zhal gsum pa/phyag drug pa/spyan gsum pa/g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa/phyag rgya lngas
99b6(rgyud): rgyas btab pa/lha mo bcer bu skye grol ba/thod pa dang /kha T+wAM ga dang /cang te'u dang /gri gug dang /rdo rje dang /dril bus khyud pa/lha mo'i byin pa gnyis kyis
99b7(rgyud): 'khril pa/dgyes pa chen po'i dga' ba'i ros rnam par myos po'o//dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dpa' bo yin//zur bzhi bum pa'i steng du ni//byang chub sems kyis
100a1(rgyud): yod pa blang ba'i//thod pa'i snod ni dazhag par bya//dkyil 'khor gzhan gyi zur la ni//bum pa'i thod pa gnyis po dgod//mtshams kyi char mkha'
100a2(rgyud): 'gro ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi po gzugs phyed pa bud med dbang phyug ma ste/zhal gsum pa/spyan gsum pa/g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs pa/phyogs//
100a3(rgyud): kyi gos can/skra grol ba/phyag rgya lnga brtan por 'dzin pa'o//rdo rje phreng bas yongs bskor ba//dkyil 'khor lnga yi phyi rol tu//'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bri//
100a4(rgyud): dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyang sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du yi dgas kyi gdan la bzhugs pa/sgo bzhi'i shar phyogasu khwa gdong ma khros pa'i mig can/
100a5(rgyud): shel mig khros pa'i zhal mang ba/gri gug dang /mgo bo dang /thod pa dang /kha T+wAM ga dang /dril bu dang /cang te'u 'chang ba/spyan gsum pa/zhal gsum pa/sgra gros
100a6(rgyud): gagacer bu sna tshogs pa'i mdog can g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa/yi dgas dang sna tshogs pad+mal bzhugs pa/'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na bzhugs te/b+h+ya
100a7(rgyud): rgya rdzas rnam pa de ba rgyan pa'o//'ug gdong ma dang /khyi gdong ma dang /phag gdong ma ni ji ltar khA ga dong ma'i mdog dang /phyag dang /'dug sbyangs dang /gang rgya
100b1(rgyud): bzhi no//bong bu dang /rnga mo dang /ra dang /byi la'i zhal te/shin tu drag pos mngon du gsol ba'o//gshin rje sreg ma nas/gshin rje 'joms ma'i bar ni gar byed pa'i
100b2(rgyud): dbang phyug ma ste/zhal gsum pa/phyag drug pa/spyan gsum pa/g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa/phyogs kyi gos can/skra grol ba/sna tshogs pad+ma dang yi
100b3(rgyud): dgas mnan pa/phyag rgya lngas byin gyis brlabs pa/thod pa dang /kha T+wAM 'dzin po/mgo bo dang /gri gug bsnams pa/cad te'u dang /rdo rje dang /mdung 'dzin pa/
100b4(rgyud): mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa/'jig su rung ba/thams cad kyang mi mgo'i thod pa'i phreng ba rgyan du 'chang ba/thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/rdo rje sems
100b5(rgyud): dpa'i dbu rgyan can//cod pan rdo rje'i phreng bas byas//rdo rje las byas rgyan can te//sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed kyis//dbu la mnan cing rgyan pa yin//ji ltar
100b6(rgyud): bcom ldan mdog bzhin du//rdo rje phag mo'i zhol mdog phyag/phyag rgya 'dug stangs las kyang de//gtsir bu s+tha ni blol ba ste//dumo bu'i ska rags rgyun can te//
100b7(rgyud): 'on kyang rdo rje phag mo yi//steng gi zhal gdong dkar po ste//mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'o//ji ltar gnas kyi rim pa dag/'bum pa mngon brjod rim pa//
101a1(rgyud): da/ rna pa sa//'du rdzum pa shA/sman du rlom du dang //man / s+ho/
101a2(rgyud): sa da kyi//'dri ltar gzhan du da//Sh+ThA 'i phyogs bzhin du//them du rnam pa sna rdzogs pa//snum pa chags chag bzhin//gser dIng da ma las byas pa m+b+hi
101a3(rgyud): 'brus na gis rnam par mjug/ dzer phyogs dang ma rgyams rnam //snyam m+b+ha shAkug ng+gA kyang //mu sbyin sgra myu ga skye mad//khru
101a4(rgyud): sa kyinas na b+hU la smra/ sa rab maud sku rlu / mi dgas byed yas phyi la sa
101a5(rgyud): mi phyi rol su khyod bya//dbu bu ma ma sun hU~M//phyi tshal sgra rags kyi sa byor ba/dur 'od rnam par 'jigs pa dag/sgra tshogs rlo mas rnam pa sa
101b1(rgyud): mtshan/rgyu tsuganas na /na du nga / smra byung ma/ma na
102a1(rgyud): praHn+ta hU~M hUM phaT swAhA//oM mahA kak+ShA la ku ru ku ru hu~M hUM phaT swAhA//oM tsat+tA k+Shi ye hU~M hU~M paT+Ta sU hA//mo kaM kA la ban+d+ha ban+d+ha huMhUM phaT swA hA/oM pra b+hA ba
102a2(rgyud): tI ye huM hUM phaT swA hA/oM bak+ShA Tu d+h+r-iSh+NI Na tra sa ya tra sA ye huM hU~M phaT swA hA/oM ma~M hA nA s+yai huM hUM phaT swAhUM/oM su ra bI ra NAM k+Sho b+hA ya k+Sho b+hA ya~M swA hA/oM bI ra mA tI ye huM hUM
102a3(rgyud): phaT swAhU~M/oM e mi tA b+hU tra~M hriM hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/oM kharba ri ye huM hUM phaT swA hA/oM badz+ri pra b+hA hr-i hra huM hUM phaT sAt+ma/oM l-i ke shwa rI ye huM hU~M phaT swAhA/oM badz+rA de ha
102a4(rgyud): pheM pheM huM hU~M phaT swA hA/oM br-idz+dzi drA mAts+tshi yai huM hUM phaT swAhA/oM aM ku rai ki phaT huM hUM phaT swA hA/oM ai rai ba tI yuM huM hUM phaT swAhA/oM badz+ri dza Ti yai de ha da ha huM hUM phaT/
102a5(rgyud): s+yAhA/oM ma hA b+hai ru bI yai huM hUM paT sAd+h+waM/oM ma hA b+hai ra bA tsa pa tsi huM hUM phaT swA hA/i bA yu be ge hUM hUM phaT swA hAM/oM badz+re hUM kA ra b+hek+Sha b+hak+Sha ba sA ru d+hi ra An+d+ra mU lAM ba lA
102a6(rgyud): na tu d+ha bAnA swA nAM/oMskA ra r+b+hur+m+mA maidz+haiM hU~M / s+'u rbA hU~M sa~Md+d+hi bAng+ka lpA ga tA dzaM b+hU s+yA N+yainA tAr+dz+dza mai hU~Md+hU pa ni swA/ shrI mdo ShAM rI sa
102a7(rgyud): swAhA/oM badz+ra b+ha dr-i A kaD+D+h+ya oM kiD+D+h+ya hu~M hU~M phaT swA tAM/oM suM b+hai dr-i hu~M hU~M phaT swAr+thaM/oM ma hA b+hai ra ba hri hri hu~M hUM phaT sItA/oM ha ya kaN+DihuM hUM phaT sAhA/oM bai rU
102b1(rgyud): m+b+ha/oM khakAn na n+yAd+g+ha yA krAt+ma/oM mahA ba lar+N+Nag+h+nAn+tad+ha mA s+yA/man+tan+ta nakaN+Dad+d+hA sh+tsa swAH/s+yo ra/g+hA tu r+m+mAd+b+ha pha s+yAH/ rakAn+na h+mA /
102b2(rgyud): oM haM yaM pre be hri hI huM hUM phaT swAhA/oM shaid+d+hi nI yai huM hUM phaT swA hU~M/r-i'aM oM A kA sha gar+b+ha hUM hUM huM hUM phaT swA hA/oM tsakra warmi NI ye huM hU~M phaT swA hA/oM he ru ka ki li ki
102b3(rgyud): huM hUM phaT swA hA/oM su dI re huM hUM phaT swA hA/oM bed+ma nan+te shwa ra si li si lI huM hUM phaT swA hA/oM mA~M hA ba laM hu~M hUM phaT swA hA/oM bI ro tsa nu hai li hi laM huM hUM phaT swA hA/oM tsakra warte nI ye
102b4(rgyud): hu~M hU~M phaT swAng+ge/oM badz+rI sa twa d+hi la~M d+hi laM huM hUM phaT swA hA/oM mUhA bIr+ye huM hU~M phaT swA hA/oM DA kI nI ye huM hUM phaT swA hA/oM lA me huM hUM phaT swAhA/i khaMN+Da ro he huM hU~M phaT swA hA/
102b5(rgyud): oM rU pi NI piM huM hUM phaT smA hA/oM kAM kA s+yai hu~M hUM phaT s+t+rait+tha/oM u lU k+Sha s+yai huM hUM phaT swA hA/oM shA nAM s+yai tuM hUM phaT swA tAM/oM skr-i kA rU s+yai huM hUM phaT swAh+ma/I ya me dUr+t+ti/
102b6(rgyud): ye huM hUM phaT swA hA/oM yaM me dU tI yai huM hU~M phaT swA hA/i ya ma diSh+To r+t+r-i yai huM hUM phaT+Te swAhA/oM ya ma ma thi nI yai tu hUM phAT swA hA//'di ni ji lta'i rimi pa yis//gzhan la
102b7(rgyud): phan phyir dam chog can//mchod dang bsgom dang bzlas pa bya//zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa 'phel//yid du 'ong ba'i dngos grub thob//sgong skyes dbye ba'i mchog dam
103a1(rgyud): ga/sbyor bas 'dod pa thams cadaHpa//d+yak+tadz+dza las rnams byas nas na//'brub par yang ni the tshom med//sbyor ba'i dngos grub dam pa'o
103a2(rgyud): mchog/sgyu ma'i ngag las rnyed par 'gyur//gzhan yang rnal 'byor maM yi gnas//borgyud pa'i rim pa'i mchog byung ba//yang ni sngon gyi dngos grub ni//rmi lam du
103a3(rgyud): ni ston pa yon//gzhan yang bla ma'i go 'phang brnyes pa ni//rnal 'byor ma yis rab tu stsol//dam tshig mchog gi gsang ba dang //smras pa 'di ni bstan mi bya//
103a4(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma yi thugs dang ni//sangs rgyas thugs ni mchog gyur pa//mkha' gro ma yi snying po gsang //rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i mchog yin//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyu
103a5(rgyud): bla ma'o zlum pas dngos grub kyi rim pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o////de nas sbyor ba bshad bya ba//'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa//bla ma las kyang bla ma ste/
103a6(rgyud): mkha' gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom//phag mo bdag mo chen mo ni//rnal 'byor ma yis legs bsgrubs pa//'di ni kun gyi rnal 'byor te//rnal 'byor snying po bsdus
103a7(rgyud): ba yin//pad+ma mad ba brgyad la bri ba//sna tshogs mdog can mchog dam pa//lte ba ge sar bces pa la//thams cad yongasu dag pa'i gad no//de yi dbu sa zla
103b1(rgyud): ba'o cha//de bzhin dag cing dri ma med//de steng A li kA li ste//dbusu po gyis rnam par rgyun//de dbus lha ma bzhengs pa ni//rdo rje drug ma rnal 'byor ma//zhal dan pa la byug
103b2(rgyud): bcu gnyis//spyan gsum pa la zhal rnam bsgyur//skyil mo krung ni phyed par bzhugs//gar gyi rnam par legs rgyan cing //phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba//phyed ni bud ma
103b3(rgyud): dbang phyug zhal//dkar la dmar ba'i gzugs 'dzin cing //thod pa'i cod pan rnam par rgyan//rdo rje dril bu phyag na 'chang //pad+ma 'khyil bas rnam bskor cing //dpral ba
103b4(rgyud): yonI phyug rgyu 'bar//gnyis kyis mi yau lpags pa banabs//thod pa dang ni khye T+wAM 'chang //zhags pa lcags kyu mchog kyang 'dzin//cang te'u gri gug tshangs pa yi//
103b5(rgyud): mgo bo gdong ni bzhi pa ste//sngo zhing ser la ldang ba yis//zhal gyis lha mo rnam par rgyan//zhal gdod mche ba rnam gtsigs shing //zla ba phyed pas rnam par rgyan//
103b6(rgyud): sna tshogs rdo rje dbu rgyan mtshan//dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol//phyag rgya drug gis rgyas btang cing //lha mo dum bu'i ska rags rkyen//g.yer ge'i sku rags sgra
103b7(rgyud): nga ldan//rkang gdub dag gis legs par rgyan//dpung rgyan dag gis rnam par mdzes//dpral ba la ni rdo rje'i phreng //rdo rjes mtshan ma'i phyag rgya can//sku du
104a1(rgyud): mangs shang yad 'phrog pa'o//shAr gyi 'dab mar mkha 'gro ma//seng ge'i gdong ste rnam par 'jig/g.yon du phyag gi gdong can to//lha mo lA ma rang
104a2(rgyud): 'jigs ma//nub tu lha mo glang po'i gdong //dum skyes ma ni dbar ma'o//lho ru lha mo'i tshul can//gzugs can ma ste rta yis gdong //spyan gsum pa la sna tshogs
104a3(rgyud): gzugs//thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing //mgo dang gri gug phyag na bsnams//gcer bu dbu skra grol ba la//gar gyis kyang ni legs par mdzes//yi dgas rgyu ba la skyil
104a4(rgyud): krung phyed//bzhin rnams bsgyur zhing rab tu 'jigs//'dzegs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/lha mo'i zhabs kyis 'og tu mnan//me sngogs mtshams ni bzhi po la//
104a5(rgyud): byang chub sems la sogs pa'i snod//bum pa'i steng du rnam par dgod//dung dang kun da zla ba'i mdog/'khor lo rtsibs ni drug pa bri//mkhas pas de dbus bri ba
104a6(rgyud): ma mo'i rigs ni bzhi pa ste//mA ma ki dang sprin dang ni//lha mo sgrol ma gos dkar ma//sngo dang dkAr dang dmAr ba ste//lha mo rdo rje rigs dbang phyug/dkar
104a7(rgyud): dang sngo dang dmar ba'i zhag/lha mo rtag pa'i rigs mi ni//sdang dang dkar dang dmar ba yi//lha mo las kyi rigs yin//dmar dang sir dang ljang ku lo//lha mo
104b1(rgyud): pad+ma'i rigs yin//spyan gsum pa la sgra grol zhing //phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa yin//rgyan rnams thams cad yongasu rdzogs//phyag rgya drug gis rnam par rgyan//
104b2(rgyud): thod pa dang ni kha nAM 'dzin//rang gi phyag mtshan bzhi pa ste//rdo rje 'khor lo kun rdo rje//pad+ma dmar po mchog dam pa//thams cad de bzhin dral bu 'dzin//thod pa
104b3(rgyud): 'khyil bas rnam par bskor//bdud bzhi zhabs kyis rnam gnon cing //gar dang glu yis bzhad pa'i zhal//sna tshogs pad+ma zla dbus bzhugs//rigs kyi dngos grub
104b4(rgyud): rab ster ba'o//phyag na mgo be cing te'u bAsnams//rdo rje gri gug gis rnam rgyan//thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbus rgyan can//mgo yi phreng bas rnam par rgyan//zur gyi
104b5(rgyud): cha ni thams cad du//gnas la sogs pa'i rim pa dgod//shar du rtsibs drug 'khor lo la//ji lta'i rjes 'byung ste mo dgod//thog ma'i zur la pu l+lI re//ma la
104b6(rgyud): ya nu ra ba ga tum ma'o//gnyis pa dza lAn+d+ha ra na ga tum mig ma'o//gsum pa uR+YAn na 'od ldan ma'o//bzhi pa ar bu dra na sna chen ma'o//lnga pa go da bA ri na dpa'
104b7(rgyud): ba'i blo gros ma'o//drug pa rA ma shwa ra ni mi'u thung ma'o//gnyis pa byang gi 'khor lo'i drug pa dang po de ba'i ko DA na lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o//gnyis pa mA la ba na
105a1(rgyud): shing gleb ma'o//gsum pak+Sha mA rU pa na sa srung ma'o//bkri pa ma dun 'jigs byed na'o//lnga pa tI sh+tsaSh+Ta/ni ni drung gi shugs can ma'o//drug pA ko sa
105a2(rgyud): lan chung 'thung ma'o//nub kyi 'khor lo gsum po'i rtsibs drug gi shu ra dwa kA ling ga na rje bsrungs lho ma'o//gnyis pe laM po ka ni rab bzung ma'o//gsum+b+ha pr-i k+ShA ts+tshin
105a3(rgyud): nA ma'o//bzhi pat+ti mA la yan bya gdod ma'o//lA pA prA ta pu rin 'khor ngo'i shugs ca na ma'o//drug pa br-i h+Na de brtan dum skyes ma'o//lho'i 'khor lo thozhi pa'i cis
105a4(rgyud): drug gis shar yA sau rASh+TAn tshong 'tshong ma'o//gnyis pa na su par+Na dwI pa na 'khor lho'i go cha na'i//gAbum pa na rang tu da'o ma'o//bzhi pa sin+dan stobs chen na'o//
105a5(rgyud): lnga pa myu ru tA na 'khor lhos bsgyur ma'o//drug pa ku lu tA ni brtson 'grus chen ma'o//thog ma dkar zhing ldang ba dang //yod pa dang ni khAT+wAM ga/'khor lo cang te
105a6(rgyud): gri gugo/gnyis pa byung ni sngo l-i sri ra//rdo rje thod pa kha T+wAM ga/cang teTi dang ni gri gu go/gsum pa nub ni dmer ba ser//thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ge/pad+ma cang te'u grwa
105a7(rgyud): gug go//ni pa smr-i yI lha me no//ser dmar sna tshogs rdo rje dang //cang te'u gri gugazod pa dang //kha T+wAM ga yang yongasu 'dzin//lha mo de dag thams cad kyang //
105b1(rgyud): byed ni bud mod dbang phyug ma'o//spyan gsum pa la phyag 'an pa//gtsor bu na grol ba dang //rgyal mo krung byed gar bcas pas//yo dgus rgyu rtul zhabs kyis bzhugs/
105b2(rgyud): thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyun can//phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyun//rkang rgyan dang ni skra rags dang //dbu rgyun rdo rje mtshan pa'o//'khor lo de yi rgyab tu ni//shar du rdo rje phreng
105b3(rgyud): ngas bskor//byang du 'khor lo'i phreng ba ste//nub tu sna tshogs rdo rje phreng //wA ru pad+ma'i phreng ba'o//dbusu rdo rje phreng bas rgyan//zur gyi cha ni thams cad du//sna tshogs rdo rje
105b4(rgyud): mnyam par bri//de rgyu ba yi dgas sna tshogs ky-i//snying byis mkhas pas bskor bar hU~M//phyi rol dkyil lo khor sgo rnams dang //zur gyi cha ni bzhi po la//mkha'i glo 'dus pa
105b5(rgyud): gzugs de ni//mnyam par gzhig nas bri zhing dgod//khwa gdong shar du dgod pa ste//sngo la dmar dang yid 'phrog pa//'ug gdong byung sgor dgod pa ste//ldang zhing /
105b6(rgyud): dmar la legs par mdzes//khyi gdong nud kyi sgo lnga ni//ser zhing dud khA rab tu gdug/phag gdod lho ru dgod pa ni//ldang zhing sde bo'i gzugs cano//spyan gsum
105b7(rgyud): bzhin bsgyur rab gdug cing //dam pa phyogs kyi gos 'chang ba'o//mig g.yon dang ni gzugs mi sdug/g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis bzhugs//sna tsho /
106a1(rgyud): /d+ma ny-i sa pa zlugs//Ar+m+ma nam myur n+dan// ba / n+yam+b+ha/sgyu rmugs//nas can 'od 'jog pa//ga
106a2(rgyud): rnam par 'jig ste/ shin rje sgeg ma mato/ //me yi b+h+yogasmrarnam par bzhugs//gshin da phyi'i gdong //na dus ma par ba
106a3(rgyud): shin rje mche brna ma'i gdong //gdug pa rlung phyogs rab tu bzhugs//ka shin rje 'joms maN+Da yi gdong //'di dag chags pas rab tu mas//thod pa'i
106a4(rgyud): don ldan na//sna tshugs gzugs cani yang srog ma'o//gan+da brAng du/thal ba la// slong byed sti kA da ban sa
106a5(rgyud): hrI gsus pa la ga yo ba'i sa// tshog+sa swA d+hA'i ny-i sa 'azhugs//mi hUM ga rje sa rgyags pas sa//khams cad yi dwags snad na bzhugs//'khor lo sogs pa'i
106a6(rgyud): libuMr rnams//thod pa kha T+wA~M ga 'dzin ci //kri gug dang ni mgo bo 'tshong //phyag g.yas dog na cang Sh+mA yi/shin tu'i jigs de'i sgra yad sgrogs//phyir la ba
106a7(rgyud): ba'i tshul can//gzhan du rnam pa du ma mo//blo de shang gyi mchod pa dang //sna tshogs dam tshig dam pa yi//sa d+hi skyes dang ma
106b1(rgyud): lha yi gros kyi rnam pa dang //lha mo sil snyan mchog dam pa//phyi rol rnal 'byor ma dag mchod//de yi dbus mdun mtha' yas pa'i//thams cad du ni 'khor yongs kyis//
106b2(rgyud): nu mkha'i khams ni yongs gang ba'i//phagra mo'i mchog ni dam pa dang //rnal 'byor ma gdug rnams kyang mchod//mchog 'di dag ni gsang zhing sgra//su la yang
106b3(rgyud): ni mi brjod do//phyi rol yi dgas phreng ba yis//dkyil 'khor mchog gi ra bzhin ni//rnam par 'phrul pa dgod bya ste//ji lta'i rim pas rjesu dgod//sen mo sa
106b4(rgyud): nA rab gtum ma'o//skra dang spu ni gtum mig ma'o//lpags pa dang dri mu ni 'od ldan mA'o//sha nI sna chen ma'o//rtswa rgyus ni dpa' bo'i blo gros mA'o//rus pa ni
106b5(rgyud): mi'u thung ma'o//mkhal ma ni lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o//snying ni shing gri ba ma'o//mig ni sa srung ma'o//mkhris pa ni 'jigs byed chen mo'o//glo ba ni rlung gau shugs
106b6(rgyud): n+dan ma'o//sgyu ma ni chang 'thung ma'o//phranya ma ni sngo bsangs lha mo'o//lto ba ni rab bzangs lha myo'o//ldung pa ni rta rna ma'o//sgo mtshams ni byA gdong ma'o//bad kan
106b7(rgyud): ni 'khor li'i shugs can ma'o//rnag ni dum skyes me'o//khrag ni chang 'tshang ma'o//rdul ni 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o//tshil ni shin tu dpa' mo'o//mchi ma ni stobs
107a1(rgyud): chen ma'o//mchil ma ni 'khor los bsgyur ma'o//snru bas ni brtson chen ma'o//pul+lI ra ma la yA ste mgo bo la rab gtum ma'o//dz+wa lan d+hA ra ste spyi gtsug lnga gtum
107a2(rgyud): ma'i mig can ma'o//ur+yan te rna ba g.yas par 'od ldan ma'o//ar bu da ste spyi bo'i rgyab tu sna chen ma'o//go da ba ri ste rna ba g.yon par brtan pa'i blo can ma'o//rA me shwa
107a3(rgyud): ra ste smin ma'i dbus me'u thung ma'o//de bI ko Da ste mig tu lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o//mI la ba ste phrag pa gnyi su ni shing grib ma'o//kA ma rU pa ste mig gnyis la se
107a4(rgyud): srung ma'o//au tre ste nu ma gnyi su 'jigs byed tshen mo'o//tri sha ku nI ste lte bar rlung gi shugs tsan ma'o//ko sa la ste sna rtse re ni chang 'thung ma'o//kA ling ga ste khar
107a5(rgyud): ni sh+yA ma de ba'i'o//laM pA ka ste mgrin par shin tu bzang mo'o//kI tsi ste snying kar ni rta rna ma'o//ha ma la ya te 'dom su ni bya gdong ma'o//pre ta pu ri ste mtshan mA
107a6(rgyud): la ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o//gr-i ha de ba tA ste gzhang la ni dum skyes ma'o//sau rASh+Ta ste brla gnyis la ni chang 'tshong ma'o//su bar+Na dwI bA s+t+waM rje rar gnyis la ni/
107a7(rgyud): 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o//na ga ra ste sor mo rnams la dpa' bo'i blo gros ma'o//sin+d+hu s+t+waM rkang pa'i ngol la stobs chen ma'o//ma ru s+t+waM mthe bong gnyis la 'khor
107b1(rgyud): sgyur ma'o//ku lu tA ste pus mo gnyis la brtson chen ma'o//sa'i khams ni 'bebs ma/chu'i khams ni gsod ma/me'i khams ni 'gugs ma/rlung gi khams ni gar gyi
107b2(rgyud): dbang phyug ma'o//na mkha'i khams ni pad+ma'i dra ba ma'o//gzugs kyi phung po ni rnam par snang mdzad/tshor ba'i phung po ni rdo rje nyi ma/'du shes kyi phung po ni gar gyi dbang phyug
107b3(rgyud): 'du byed kyi phung po ni rdo rje chags pa/rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni rdo rje sems dpa'i/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni rdo rje shrI he ru ka'o//mig ni
107b4(rgyud): gti mug rdo rje/rna ba ni zhe sdang rdo rje/sna ni phrag dog rdo rje/ngag ni chags pa rdo rje/lus ni phrag dog rdo rje/skye mched thams cad ni dbang phyug rdo rje/yid ni mi 'khrug
107b5(rgyud): rdo rje/ngag ni dpag med rdo rje/lus ni snang mdzad rdo rje/'di dag dgod par bya ba ni//ye shes 'khor lo mthong ba yin//sbyor ba 'di la gnas na ni//de yis thams
107b6(rgyud): cad bsgoms par 'gyur//dbang bskur mchod dang dam tshig dang //sgom pa mnyam pa bcud du byed//de snying ye shes sems dpa' la//ye shes bdud rtsi bcud kyis
107b7(rgyud): mchod//lus dag yid kyi dam tshig rnams//sems dang sems min legs par brtag/bzlas dang bsgoms pa'i sbyor ba yis//rnam rtog thams cad spangs nas ni//
108a1(rgyud): dam tshig mchog gi bzlas pa yis//gsang sngags rgyal po mchog kyang bzla//oM pha ro tsa nI la tu hU~M phaT swAhA//oM sarba bud+d+ha DA kI nI ye badz+ra bar+Na NI
108a2(rgyud): ye huM hUM phaTaM swA hA//bstod dang ming du yang dge sbyor//hUM hUM phaT dang ldan pa yi//rab gtum ma sogs gsang sngags dge sbyar nas mchog gi bzlas pa bya//bzlas pa
108a3(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs nas ni//zhi ba'i btung ba mchog kyang btung //chos rnams thams cad yongs mnyam pa'i//mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog yin te//de bas de
108a4(rgyud): bsgom rnam par dag/sum cu bdun pa'i go 'phang mchog/bdag med chos dang lam dang ni//dkyil 'khor mchog la rab tu bzhugs//shes rab pha rol rnal
108a5(rgyud): 'byor ma//rnal 'byor las ni ngal bAsos nas//mtshan med go 'phang gnas nasu//mtshan med la ni mnyam par brten//chos rnams med cing mtshan ma med//
108a6(rgyud): chos min chos can dag kyang med//rten 'brel chos kyang mkha' dang mnyam//dngos po med cing mtshan ma med//de nyid bzhi la 'dir gnas na//ye shes mig gis/
108a7(rgyud): mthong ba yin//gnas sogs 'khor lo nges par yang //nyi zar rdul dang mnyam par mthang //skra yi rtse mo 'bum bshags pa'i//cha yang yang su rtogs
108b1(rgyud): shong mthong //b+ha gla'i dbus na bzhugs pa yis//ho ru rnal 'byor ma lhan cig/'khor los bsgyur ba rab sbyor ba//khwa gdong la sogs phyi rol dgod//he ru ka dpal bdag pa ni/
108b2(rgyud): mkhyu 'gro bzhi yis yongasu bskor//phan tshun bdag pos bya ba ni//rdo rje sems sogs sbyor ba ni//rnal 'byor ma dang thun mong 'grub//sbyor ba gsum ni dam tshig
108b3(rgyud): mchog/khams gsum bdag po chen po ni//rnam par spyod par mthong ma gyur//me 'grub 'khor los bsgyur ba dang //khams gsum bdag po'i rgyal por 'gyur/
108b4(rgyud): grub na de na rnal 'byor che//skyed pa gsum gyi bdag po 'thob//de bzhin cho ga'i sbyor ba yis//stobs kyis shi ba bza' bar bya//mtshams med pa ni byed pa dag/
108b5(rgyud): bkug la mkhas pas byin gyis brlab//gzhan du dngos grub 'jig par 'gyur//ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'tsho ba'i 'bras//phyugs bsad pa yi sbyor ba ni//rnal 'byor ma la
108b6(rgyud): zhus te bya//lha bshos sgrub pa'i sbyor bya'o//mAM dang snying mye lhan cig tu//mchog drang bar ma de bzhin te//gzhan du bu mo lhan cig tu//dbang po gnyis ni mnyam
108b7(rgyud): spyir ga//mnyam pa mchog gi sgrub pa'o//rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis//'dod pa lnga ni spyad par bya//phag mo ru ni bdag bsgoms te//lte bar bsdigs mdzub bzhin
109a1(rgyud): nas ni//mkha'agro ma sogs 'khor lor bzhugs//lha mo rab tu dang byas nas//sgo dgu la ni zhugs nas kyang //snying po pad+ma phug nus ni//rnal
109a2(rgyud): 'byor ma ni brgya ba tsam gyis//rma skyes mchog ni gtung bar bya//bsnun pa de yis zos na ni//sangs rgyas 'gyur gyi gzhan du min//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i
109a3(rgyud): bla ma las rnal 'byor ma'i gnas sgrub pa'i mtshan ma'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//rnal 'byor dpa' bo'i
109a4(rgyud): cho ga dang //rnal 'byor ma yi br-i nas 'byung ba//'dus pa bdag gis bshad par bya//dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma thams cad//bla mra'i bka' las gzhan du min
109a5(rgyud): thams cad mkha'agro ma rnams ni//nges par legs pa stsol bar 'gyur//re'u mig dgu pa dbusu ste//phyi rol du ni bcu drug bri//re'u mig dbus kyi dkyil du
109a6(rgyud): yang /shren tu mdzes pa'i pad+ma bri//sna tshogs pad+ma brgyad pa ste//lte ba dang ni ge sar bcas//de dbus zla ba blta byas te//a la sogs pa rnam par sbyar//
109a7(rgyud): A li ka li mnyam byas te//hUM ni nang du chud par bya//rdo rje sems dpas kun khyab pa//he ru ka ni rnam par sgomo//zhal lnga phyag ni bcu pa ste//phago me//
109b1(rgyud): yin ni yongasu rgyan//dkar zhing sno la de bzhin dmar//ljang ku ser po steng du ste//spyan gsum pa la 'jigs pa'i zhal//g.yas brkyang pa yi gnas pas bzhugs//
109b2(rgyud): 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan nyid//shin tu myos pas zhabs 'og gnon//thod po'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyun can//zla ba phyed pa 'dzin pos mdzes//sna tshogs rdo rje cod
109b3(rgyud): pan can//ral pa'i dbu rgyan dbu la 'ching //phyag rgya drug gis rgyas btab cing //sku la rdo rje rgyan gyis spyad//rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan//bde ba chen po'i 'dre
109b4(rgyud): ba mchog/rtse gsum dang ni cang te'u 'dzin//rdo rje gri gug de bzhin te//thod pa kha T+wAM chings pa'i mgo/dgra sta dang ni zhags pa'o//g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag la ni//
109b5(rgyud): na ra'i lpags pa gsu banabs//zhabs gnyis mnyam par 'khrilnga ba ni//phag mo yis ni khwa sbyar byas//de mdag phyag dang bzhugs stangs can//dbu skra grol zhing //
109b6(rgyud): gcer bu ste//stag gi lpags pa go su banabs//dum bu'i rgyan gyis ska rags can//drag po'i thod pa'i phreng ba can//thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par myos//shar
109b7(rgyud): gyi mdab la mkha'agro ma//byang du lA ma mkha'agro ma//nub tu du ma skyes ma yino//lho ru gzugs can mkha' 'gro ma//gnag dang sde bsangs dmar ser skya//phyogs
110a1(rgyud): kye gros 'chad g.yas brgyad bzhugs//zad pa'i phyung ba dat+ta rgan can//sgra grol gti su med pa ste//DUr b+h+rUM chen thams cad ste/byung chu
110a2(rgyud): sems kyi snad kyang bzhag/thod pa khA T+wAM dril bu dang //tsang te'u gri gug mgo bo thogs//zhal gsum spyan gsum bzhin rnams bsgyur//drug po chags pa'i tshugs
110a3(rgyud): pas myos//bcom ldan bde bas gzigs nas ni//bde ba tsha la rje suM chags//mgro bo'i do shal 'chang ba yis/he ru ka ni rnam par bsgom//'di ltar re'u mig
110a4(rgyud): dbus dkyil du//mchog de dag kyang bsgom par bya/de yi shar gyi r-i mig la pul+lI ra ma la yan thod pa'i dum bu dang /rab gtum ma ste ser po'o//byang du dz+ha
110a5(rgyud): lAn+na ra na keng rus chen lo dang /gtum mig ma ste sngon po'o//nub tu ur+yan ni kaMng rus can dang /'od ldan ma ste dkar po'o//lho ru ar bu da na mche ba rnam par
110a6(rgyud): gtsigs pa dang /smra chen ma ste ljang ku'o//me'i phyogasu gong pa ri na lha dgra dang /dpa' bo'i blo gros ma ste dmar po'o//bden bral du rA me shwa ra na 'od dpag med
110a7(rgyud): dang /mi'u thung ma sti pad+ma'i mdog can//rlung phyogasu daM bi ko Da na rdo rje 'od dang /lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ste dud ka sngon po'o//dbang ldan du mA la ba na rdo rje lus dang /
110b1(rgyud): shing grib ma ste ljang ku dang /mu tig lta bu'o//phyag na rdo rje dang dril brug 'khyud pa'o//de la re'u migu gnyis bya'i shar phyog su k+Sha mA rU pa na myu gu can drang sA s+yAng ma ste dAmar
110b2(rgyud): po'o//byang du i dre na rdo rje ral pa can dang /'jigs byed chen mo ste ljang ku/nub tu tri sha ku ni na dpa' bo chen po dang /rlung gi shugs can ma sngon po'o//lho phyogs
110b3(rgyud): ko s+ya la na rdo rje hUM mdzad dang /chang thung ma ste dkar po'o//me'i phyog su ka lIng ga ni rab bzang dang /sngo bsangs lha mo ste na mkha' ser skya'o//bden bral du l-i pA ka
110b4(rgyud): na rdo rje bzang dang /rab bzang ma ste dmar po'o//rlung gi phyogasu kwi po tsi na 'jigs byed chen po dang /rta rna ma ste ser po'o//dbang ldan du hi mo la ya na mig mi bzang dang
110b5(rgyud): bya gdong ma ste sngon po'o//pad+ma dang dril bu 'dzin pas 'khyud pa'o//re'u mig gsum po'i shar du pre tA pu ri na stobs po che dang /'khor lo'i shugs can ma ste na mkha'
110b6(rgyud): dang ser skya'o//byang du gr-i ha dI b+hU tA nA rdo rje 'od dang dum skyes ma ste ser po'o//nub tu sau rASh+Ta na rti mgrin dang /tshang 'tshong ma ste dmar po'o//lho phyogasu bar+N+Na d+hi pA nu
110b7(rgyud): na mkha'i snying po dang /'khor lo'o ge che ma ste sngon po'o//me'i phyogasu na ga re na dpal khrag 'thung dang /rab dpa' mo ste/dud pa'i mdog can//bden bral du sin+d+hun/
111a1(rgyud): pad+magar gyi dpung phyug dang /stabs chen ma ste ltung ku'o//rlung gA phyog su mA rU ta na rnam par snad mdzad dang /'khor los bsgyur ma rta ldan pa'o//dbang ldanadu
111a2(rgyud): ku lu tA na rdo rje sems dpa' dang /brtson 'grus chen mo ste dkar po'o//'khor lo da'i dril bu 'dzin pas 'khyud pa'o//gzhan yang thod pa dang kha~M T+wAM ga dang /cang te'u dang /gri gug
111a3(rgyud): dang /mgo bo 'dzin pa/phyag drug pa/zhal gsum pa ste/zhal ni man ngag gi rje su 'byung bas bstan//spyan gsum pa/g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa/phyag rgya lnga yis
111a4(rgyud): rnam par rgyan//stag gis lpags pa gosu banabs//mgo bo'i phreng bas rgyan pa ste//thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can//rdo rje phreng dang pad 'khor lo//ji lta'i rim pas dpral
111a5(rgyud): bar rgyan//lha mo skra grol gcer bu ste//byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril//ji ltar thabs bzhin shes rab ste//mtshan ma'i phyag rgya legs khyab pa//zur ba zhi
111a6(rgyud): pa la sgo bzhi pa//rta babs bzhis ni rnam par rgyun//dra ba dra phyud kyis rgyan pa//dar dang phreng bas rnam par rgyan//'khor lo'i gzugs can lnga bkod nas//ji ltar
111a7(rgyud): mdzes par rab tu brtag/ji ltar phyi yi 'khor lo yi//de la sgo srung rnams kyang dgod//mtshams dang zur du lha mo rnams//mkhas pas bri bar bya ba ste//cho ga dum
111b1(rgyud): dz+nyAs nas ni//'ad pas gcig tu bsdus pa yin//shar gyi sgor ni kha gdong ma//zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa//g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal gdung ni//bya rog chu skyur zhal
111b2(rgyud): yin te//mi'u thung la mi sdug zhal//byang ge sbyor ni 'ug su dang //'ug pa byi la rnam mdzes to//g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal gdong gi/lce bskyod 'jigs po'i
111b3(rgyud): gzugs can ma//nub tu b+hu ba gi zhes pa//khyi dang so ge'i gdong pa can//g.yon pa dang ni g.yas pa yi//lce bskyod shin tu mdzes pa'o//lho phyogs sa 'dzin lha
111b4(rgyud): mo ni//phag gdong ma he'i gzugs can te//g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal gdong ni//zab cing drag la 'jigs pa'o//thog ma khA gdong zhes bya ba//gnyis pa
111b5(rgyud): 'ug pa de bzhin te//gsum pa khyi yi gdong can la//bzhi pa dag ni phag nyid//sngo dang dud ku dkar po'i gdong //ljang ku ser po dmar po ste//ser zhing dmar la
111b6(rgyud): sngo ba'i zhal//dkar dang sngo dang ljang ku'i mdog/dang po me nas dbang ldan par//gshin rje sreg ma pho nya mo//gshin rje mche ba 'joms pa nyid//dmar dang ser
111b7(rgyud): deng ljang ku dang //sngo dang ser dang ljang ku dang //dud ka ser dang ljang ku dang //dkar dang ser dang ljang ku ste//de dag zhal gsum phyag drug ste//spyan gsum g.yas
112a1(rgyud): brkyang bas bzhugs//phyogs kyi gas 'chang gsus pa 'byung //dbu skra dag ni grol ba ste//phyag rgyu lnga yis rgyas btab cing //'khor lo dag ni thams//
112a2(rgyud): cad kyang //ye dgas steng du rnam par bzhugs//sna tshogs pad+ma nyi ma dang //zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la bzhugs//thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M ga/zhugs pa lcags kyu cang
112a3(rgyud): tweT dang /mgo ba gri gug phyag na 'chung //thod pa'i phreng byas rnam par rgyan//dga' zhing dgyes pas rnam par myos//rjesu chags pa'i zhal gdod ni//'jigs
112a4(rgyud): ba'i stang mig 'gyur ba'o//de nas gshin rje sreg sogs sgo//khwa gdong la sogs mtsham su ste//rang gi thabs dang mnyam par gzhag/sbyor ba'i rim pa
112a5(rgyud): bsgoms nas ni//'khor lo dpa' bo thams cad kyang //ji bzhin rdo rje mkha 'gro ste//snga ma'i rje su thams cad kyang //mkha' gro mu sogs kun de bzhin//ji bzhin
112a6(rgyud): bla ma'i bka' bzhin du//ji ltar 'dod pa gnas de bzhin//ji ltar sems kyi khyad par gyis//rnal 'byor ma yi dkyil 'khor sgom//bum pa sna tshogs sbyor ba
112a7(rgyud): yis//thod pa yis ni yongasu rgyan//'o mas bkang ba'i thod pa ni//bum pa'i steng du bzhag par bya//phyi rol yongasu bskor ba ste//sna tshogs mkha' gro ma
112b1(rgyud): gnas pa//klu dang gang ni nye ldan paste//sna rgyags lha mo rnam par sprul//btun 'du/sa sla r+yan dang //dri dang gang mchog dram pa ste//sna tshogs ngan chag
112b2(rgyud): zas//sna tshogs bza' ba chang gis mchod//dkyil 'khor sna tshogs mchog dam pa//phyi rol yi dgas kyis yongs bskor//dngos dang dngos med rnam par sgom/
112b3(rgyud): bla ma'i nani ngag bka' bzhin du//rdo rje phrad bskur 'khor lo ni//zur ba zhi bar ni rab tu gnas//mtshan su rdo rje byed pas mtshan//rdo rje ka kha'i mdun dbus/
112b4(rgyud): mig rdo rje snun par bya//sna tshogs pa yi cho ga mchog/gnas sogs rim byas dgod par bya//khams dang thu rje de bzhin te//skye mched drug kyang rnam par dgod//
112b5(rgyud): ye shes rdo rje rnam par sgrim//sku gsung thug su sbyor ba yis//ye shes 'khor lo mthong ba ni//A ni zhabs bsil dag gis mchod//dam tshig sna tshogs mchog
112b6(rgyud): dam+b+ha pa//sde tshegs pa yI khyad par rjeste//mU sa~M r-ik+ta drug gis mchod//cho ga gnyis po sbyor pa yis//phyag rgya ye shes mchag dam pa//ro gcig myi lus bsgoms
112b7(rgyud): na ni//ye shes 'khor lo rnam par rlom//rig pa yi ni khyad par gyis//mkhas pas sbyor ba gsum du sbyar//bsgoms pas rnam par dag pa'i don//ma' /
113a1(rgyud): sum cu rtsa bdun te//ye shes bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis//dam tshig gsum gyi mchog gis bza'//spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis//bzlas pa'i sgom pa rnams
113a2(rgyud): par sgom//dus bzhi dag tu dam tshig can//gnas sbyor mkhas pas bsrung bar bya//sa steng du ni mthong ba kun//thams cad he ru ka dpal gzugs//'gro ba drug bAM/
113a3(rgyud): srid pa sbyangs//sems can don ni gzhal med byas//thams cad zhugs te bzhugs sbyor bas//'dis ni thams cad gzhug par bya//'di ni sbyor ba nges pa ste//ngas
113a4(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur//dung chen phreng ba dag gis ni//dam cheg mchog gis bzlas pa bya//tshogs kyi go cha'i rim pa bzhin//rnalo 'byor pa yI sngags
113a5(rgyud): mchopa bzla//oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru kaM DA ki nI dz+wA la saM ba raM huM hUM phaT swA hA//oM hrIHhA ha hUM hUM phaT swA hU~M/snying po dang /nye ba'i snying po'o//oM badz+ra bai ro tsa nI ye huM hUM phaT swA hA/
113a6(rgyud): oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI yai badz+dzi wAr+Na nI ye huM hUM pheT swAhA//phag mo'i snying po dang /nye ba'i snying po'o//oM ka ra ka ra khaN+Da kU pA li huM hUM phaT swA hA//au pra tsat+te huM hUM phaT
113a7(rgyud): swAtwa/oM ku ru ku ru ma hA kAM ka la~M hu~M hUM phaT swA hA//oM tsaN+Dak+Shi ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/oM ban d+ha ban+d+ha kaM ka la huM hUM phaT/oM pre b+hA bai tI ye huM hUM phaT/oM tra sa~M Ta ya~M bi ka/
113b1(rgyud): n+ta da~MSh+TI huM hUM phaT/oM ma hA nA se huM hUM phaT/oM k+Sho b+hA ya k+Sho b+ha yA su ra bai ri NA huM hUM phaT/oM b+hI ra ma tI ye huM hUM phaT/oM hriM hU~M a mi tA b+hU hu~M hU~M phaT/oM kharbu rI ye huM hUM phaT/
113b2(rgyud): oM hA hraM badz+ra pA b+ha huM hUM phaT/oM li ke sh+tsa rI ye huM hUM phaT/oM pheM pheM badz+ra de ha huM hUM phaT/oM dru mats+tsha ye huM hUM phaT/oM pheMT phaT aM kuM re kaM huM hUM phaT/oM ai rA bai tI ye
113b3(rgyud): huM hUM phaT/oM da ha da haM badz+ra dza Ti la huM hUM phaT/oM maM hA b+hai ra ba ye huM hUM phaT/oM pa tsa pa tsa mai hA bI re huM hU~M phaT/oM thA yu be ge huM hUM phaT/oM b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha badz+ra hUM kA ra
113b4(rgyud): ba sai R+She d+hi ra an+d+ra mA lA ba laM bai ni hU~M hUM phaT/oM su raM b+hAklI ye huM hUM phaT/oM g+h+r-ih+Na gr-ih+na su b+ha dA sap+ta pI tA lag+na hU~M gsar+thaM brA tur+N+Na ya tar+N+Na yaM huM hUM pheT/oM sh+yA mai de b+h+r-i mr-i t+yun+d+ra/
113b5(rgyud): phaT/oM A kaD+D+h+ya A kAD+D+h+ya badz+ra b+ha dre huM hU~M phaT/oM su b+h+r-i dr-i huM hU~M phaT/oM hI hUM ma hA b+hai ra baM huM hUM phaT/au he ya kar+N+Ne huM hUM phaT/au dz+dzi dz+nye bai rU pAk+Sha huM hUM phaT/au khaH
113b6(rgyud): gA na ne huM hUM phaT/oM k+ShaM k+ShuM maM hA ba laM huM hUM phaT/oM tsak+Shu be ge hUM hUM phaT/oM haM hi rat+na pUd+d+he huM hUM phaT/oM khaN+Da ro haM huM hUM phaT/oM hri hriM ha ya grI b+he hU~M hUM phaT/oM shauN+Di nI
113b7(rgyud): yau huM hUM phaT/oM hUM hUM 'i r-i A kA sha gar+N+NaM huM hUM phaT/oM tsakra barmaM NI yai huM hUM phaT/oM kai li kau liM he ru ka huM hUM phaT/oM su b+hI re hu~M hU~M phaT/oM shai li shi li pad+ma nir+t+ti/
114a1(rgyud): shwa rI hUM hUM phaT/oM ma hA b+ha le huM hUM phaT/oM hi li hi li bai ro tsa nI ye huM hUM phaT+Ta/oM tsakra brti nI ye huM hUM phuT/oM d+hi wi d+hi li badz+rA satwa huM hUM phaT/oM ma hA
114a2(rgyud): b+hIr+ye huM hUM phaT/oM DA ki nI yAM hu~M hUM phaT/oM lAM me huM hU~M phaT/oM khAt+ta ro hA huM hU~M phaT/oM rU pi NI ya hU~M hU~M phaT/A~M kA kA s+yo hu~M hUM phaT/oM u lU k+ShA s+yai hUM hUM phaT/
114a3(rgyud): oM shwA nA s+ye huM hUM phaT/oM sU kai rA s+ye huM hUM phaT/oM ya ma dra D+hi ye huM hUM phaT/oM ya maM du trI ye huM hUM phaT/oM ye me daMSh+Ti nI yai huM hUM phaT/oM ya mA maM tha nI/
114a4(rgyud): ye huM hUM phaT/rnal 'byor cho ga bzlas tsam gyis//rdo rje bkug cing gnas na su//'khrug cing rab tu g.yo bo ste//lus las 'ad 'bar dgod pa dang //de yi mig ni
114a5(rgyud): 'bar ba dang //tshig 'jam pa dang 'bar ba dang //rnal 'byor pas ni bzlas tsam gyi//rdo rje 'jug pa mthong ba dang //sngags pa mnyam gzhag bzlas nas ni//
114a6(rgyud): dam tshig spyod pa ldan byas nas//srog dang rtsol ba bsdam byas te//gsal byed hUM ni brjod nas kyang //chos kyi dbyingasu spro bar bya//sems can kun la phan pa
114a7(rgyud): dang /gdul bka' ba dag gdul ba'i phyir//sangs rgyas chos rnams mdun du spro//khro bo'i go 'phang de mthong nas//khams gsum dag tu bsdu bar bya//
114b1(rgyud): lus ngag yid la bcug nas kyang //sa steng du ni spyad pa spyad//mnyam gzhag min pa'i rnal 'byor pas//snying rje brlan pa nyid kyis ni//sems can thams cad mthong ba ni//
114b2(rgyud): skyid pa gsum po he ru ka/sngags pa ci dang ci za ba//dam tshig mchog ni bsgoms nas kyang //thams cad chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal//mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas//dam
114b3(rgyud): tshig can ni langs du su//bla ma mchod pa rjes dran nas//byang chub sems kyi chus khrus bya//yid 'ong phyag rgya la gnas nas//khro bo sangs rgyas dpa' bo dang //rnal 'byor
114b4(rgyud): ma dang mkha' gro mi'o//go 'phang du ni byin brlabs nas//yid 'ong mchod pa dag tu bshad//mkha'o dbyings dkyil 'khor khyab pa la//smon lam dag ni bya ba yin//
114b5(rgyud): dri ma thag pa'i rnal 'byor gyis//rgyu dang mi rgyu mthong ba ni//rang bzhin dag pa bcom ldan 'das//rang bzhin yang ni dngos med byas//sems can rang bzhin dge pa ste///
114b6(rgyud): srid pa mchog tu byas pa yin//rdo rje phag mo bla med pa//phyag rgya ru ni byin brlabs nas//rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis//thams cad 'di ltar rab tu brtag/mngon par
114b7(rgyud): brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las re'u mig dgod pa dang //gnas bsdu ba bstan pa ste le'u bcu gsum pa'o////de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba/gnas dang 'dus
115a1(rgyud): ba mchog yin pas//dngos grub kun gyi rang bzhin ni//mnyam par 'dres pa bcud du 'gyur//gnyis med thos ni mnyam gzhag ste//'khor lo gsum
115a2(rgyud): mdog ldan par ni//dkyil 'khor gru bzhi'i dbus dag tu//nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i 'khor lo mchog/de yi dbus pad+ma che//sna tshogs pad+ma legs par mdzes//mdab ma brgyad
115a3(rgyud): ba lta bar bcas//gre sar dag gis nye bar mdzes//gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//rta babs bzhis ni rnam par rgyan//phreng ba dang ni phreng phyed rgyun//mtshan nyid kun dang yang
115a4(rgyud): dag ldan//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che//A li ka li zhu gyur las//ye shes lnga ni rnam par sgom//de yi yongasu 'phel 'gyur bas//rdo rje
115a5(rgyud): he ru ke rnam sgom//dus mtha'i mi chen 'tshal pa yis//gdul ka' thams cad rab tu bshog/'jig byed dang na dus mtshan dag/zhabs kyi 'og tu rnam gnon cing //zhal
115a6(rgyud): mche ba rnam par gtsigs//spyan gsum 'jigs pa rab tu 'jigs//sku lus dgu ni sngon po las//sngo zhing 'bar ba'i sku yang smra ba//thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/
115a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas lngas ni byin gyis brlab//sna tshogs rdo rje dbu rgyan can//zla ba phyed pa rnam par mdzes//zhal drug dpa' bo mi sdug pa//sgeg pa dang ni bzhad pa dang /
115b1(rgyud): drag shul 'jigs pa'i sku lus can//phyag rgya drug gis rgyas btab cing //sku ni sna tshogs rgyan gyis spyad//phag mo dang ni yang dag ldan//byin pa dag gis gnyis med 'khyud//
115b2(rgyud): g.yas brgyud ba yi zhangs kunas sh-ing yan brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ha ta mdzang cang d+hU d+hA mdzadu/ mdzadi cing 'dzugs pa can/hU~M hU~M mdza
115b3(rgyud): s+ya Ta tsa//a r+thaT+Ta yai s+thA n+d+ra m+b+ha/blo zhing sa la de bzhin du myur//ljang gA dkar po de bzhin steng gi nul gdong gdug pa che//zlasu gdugs pa longs spyod
115b4(rgyud): rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas//lha mo dag gi nu ma 'chir//drug ngo'i lkugs pa'i gas panangs shing /khrag rten 'jig pa ba gsal te//thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin//
115b5(rgyud): mdung dang byi gug lcags kyu dang //zhags pa dang ni mgo bo 'dzin//gdug pa gtum zhing cung te'u dang /mdung ni 'bar ba'i phyag rgyu can//'brel pa dag tu nye bar
115b6(rgyud): mA //de wASh+Ti b+hag dang sgra myadag blags//dbu sgra sgrol zhing gtsi thA ste//'di lta'i phyag rgya rnam par zlum//dum bu'i sgra rags kyis rgyun cing //phyug mo yang
115b7(rgyud): ni 'di 'drar smin//rnal 'i byom sa mnyi spangs nas ni//thabs dang shes rab mnyam ldan pos//thugs rje tshogs pa'i bde ba yis//sems can don gyi phyir byung /
116a1(rgyud): snang rje chen ngos brlan pa yis//na mkha'i sbyor ba'i longs spyod kyis//thugs rje chen po'i bcud bde bas//'gro drug sred pa rnam sbyangs nas//sems/
116a2(rgyud): da ni mchog nyid mdzad//spyong pa'i ye shes las byung zhing //rtags pa med pa'i gnas bzhi la//rang bzhin med cing mchog tu phra//thig le sgra ni rnam spangs pa//mnyam/
116a3(rgyud): paba'i dam tshig mthong nas ni//phyi dang nang gi mchog gyur pa//snying po ye shes dam tshig ni//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu//der ni phyag mtshan mdog mthong nas//zla ba'i
116a4(rgyud): rdo rje sa bon ni//de 'dir snying po bsgom bya ste//bsnyen pa'i rnal 'byor dag tu brtag/mkha' gro la sogs rim pa yis//pad+ma dag ni dgod par bya//shur du mkha' gro dgang
116a5(rgyud): par bya//byang du de bzhin lA ma ste//nub du dum skyes ma yon//lho ru de bzhin gzugs can ma//sngo dang ljang dang dmar ba dang //ser de de bzhin bzhi pa ni//gzhin rnams
116a6(rgyud): sbyar zhing spyan gsum gdug/skye grol phyogs ky-i gos can yin//rgyan rnams thams cad yong su rdzogs//phyag rgya lnga yis b+hUtab cing //thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/g.yon gyi
116a7(rgyud): dpung pa la brten cing //cang te'u gri gug mgo bo ni//mkha' gro ma yi dam tshig mchog/byang chub sems kyi chus gang ba'i//thod pa bum pa'i steng du bzhag/'khor
116b1(rgyud): lo dgod par bya ba ni//sngon du grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma//byin gyis brlab sogs rim pa yis//shar phyogs byang gi rim pa ste//pul+li ra ma la ya na thod pa'i dum bu dang /rab
116b2(rgyud): gtum ma ste nau mkha' seri skya'o//dzA lan d+ha ra nau keng rus chen po dang /gtum mig ma ste mdog se ro po'o//ur+yan na keng rus can dang /'od ldan ma ste mdog ljang ku'o//
116b3(rgyud): ar bu da na mche ba rnam por gtsigs pa dang /sna tshan ma ste mdog na mkha' ser skya'o//go daM ba ri na lha dgra dang /dpa' ba'i blo gros ma ste mdog ser po//rA mai shA
116b4(rgyud): ra na 'ad dpag med dang /mi'u thung ma ste mdog ljang kuM/de bI ko Ta na rdo rje 'od dang long ka'i dbang phyug ma ste/na mkha' ser skya'o/mA la ba na rdo rje lus dang /shing grib
116b5(rgyud): ma ste mdog ser po/kA ma ru bI na myu gu can dang /sa srung me ste/mdoge ljang ku/o dre na rdo rje r-il pa tsan dang /'jigs byed chen mo ste na mkha' dang ser skya/tra sha
116b6(rgyud): ku ni 'jigs byed chen po dang /rlung gi shugs can ma sti mdog ser/kaM se la na rdo rje hUM mdzad dang /tshang 'thung ma ste mdog ljang ku/kaM ling ga na rab bzang dang sde
116b7(rgyud): bsangs lha mo ste na mkha' ser skya/laM pA ka na rdo rje bzang po dang /rab bzang mo ste mdag ser//kAny+tsi na 'jigs byed chen po dang rta rna ma ste mdog ljang ku/hi me la
117a1(rgyud): yA na mig ma bzang dang /bya dong ma sten mkha' sar skya/pre ta pu rin stongs po che dang /'khor lo'i shugs can ma skye mdog ser/gri ha de byA tA nA rdo rje
117a2(rgyud): rin chen dang /dum skyes ma ste mdog ljang ku'//sau rASh+TaM na NA mgrin dang //chang 'tsheng ma ste na mkha' ser skya'o//su brti dI pa na mkha'i snying po dang /'khor lo'i go cha me
117a3(rgyud): ste mdog ser/na gau ra nu he ru ka dang /rang dpa' ma ste/mdog ljang ku/sin d+hA na pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyugo dang /stongs chen ma ste na mkha' ser skya/ma rU tA rnam
117a4(rgyud): papor snang mdzad dang /'khor los bskyung ma ste mdog ser/ku lu tA na rdo rje sems dpa' dang /brtson tshon mo ste mdog ljang ku/yang na sku gsung thugs kyi ni//
117a5(rgyud): 'dod mdog ni dbye ba bya//g.yon gyi rin pa ji lta bAr//sgo rnams dag ni bya ba ste//shar du khwa gdong ma/byab du 'ug gdong ma/nub du khyi gdong me/lho ru phag
117a6(rgyud): gdang ma/sngo byo dang /ljang ku dang /dmar bA dang /ser po'i mdog can//me'i phyogasu gau shin rje sreg ma mdog dmar po//bden bral gyi phyogasu gshin rje pho nya
117a7(rgyud): ma mdag sngon po/rlung gi phyogasu gshin rje mche ba ma dud ka 'am char sprin gyi mdog lta bu/dbang ldan gyi phyogasu gshin rje 'joms ma mdog dkar po ser skya
117b1(rgyud): thod pa'i bum bu la sogs pa'i dpa' bo dang /rab gdum ma la sogs pa 'dra bar gya dong gcig pa/phyag bzhi pa/zhabs g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa/thod pa
117b2(rgyud): phreng ba can/stag gi lpags pa brlabs pa/phyag rgya lnga 'chang ba/lha mo'o zhebs kyis 'khyud pa/go cer bu mgo bo'i phreng bas rgyan pa/spyan gsum pa/thod
117b3(rgyud): pa'i phreng bas dpral ba rgyan pa/rdo rje dang dril bus 'khyud pa/gnyi su med pa'i sbyor ba'i mnyam pa dang ldan pa/lha mo'i nu ma 'tshor bzod ba // rjedapa/tsang te'u
117b4(rgyud): 'chang ba/yang ni rigs gsum dbye bras rtsa ba'i mtshan ma 'dzin pa/thams cad phyogs kyi gos 'chang zhing //lha mo skra grol gdug pa mo//kha gdong la sogs
117b5(rgyud): lha mo rnams//skra grol phyogs kyi gos can la//g.yas brkyang pa yi gnas pas bzhugs//spyan gsum pa la zhal rnams bsgyur//thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu
117b6(rgyud): rgyan can//mgo bo'i phreng ba'i se ral rgyan//thams cad phyag rgya lnga yang 'chang //'dod pa'i chags pas rab tu myos//rlung gi thab sa dang lhan cig tu//mi g.yo ba
117b7(rgyud): dang de bzhin sbyor//lte ba 'phyang zhing log pa 'phyang //glu khros 'jigs shing gdong yang bsgyur//rab 'jigs nyim pad+ma yi//steng du sgrub par rab gnas nas/
118a1(rgyud): gang zhing ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin//rjes chags pas zhal nyid na//de lta bu yi bsam pa yis//rnal 'byor pas ni bsgom par bya//thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing /
118a2(rgyud): cad te'u gri gug mgo ba 'chang //dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad kun//yi dgas la ni bzhugs par sgom bu mkha'agro'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor lo/nye bsnyen rjes
118a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor te//dpa' bo'i yan lag sbyar ba yis//sgrub pa lhag pa'i snyoms par 'jug/sen mo dang so dag ni thod pa'i dum bu'o//skra dang spu dag ni keng rus chen
118a4(rgyud): po'o//lpags pa dang dri ma dag ni keng rus cano//shi ni mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'o//rtswa rgyus ni lha dgra'o//rus pa ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o//mkhal ma dag ni rdo rje
118a5(rgyud): 'od do/ sbyong ni rdo rje sku'o//mig ni rdo rje myu gu tsa no//mkhris pa ni rdo rje ral pA tsA no//glo ba ni dpa' bo chen po'o//rgyu ma ni rdo rje hUM mdzad//gnye ma ni rab tu bzang ba'i/
118a6(rgyud): lto ba ni rdo rje bzang po'o//srung pa ni 'jigs byed chen po'o//sgra mtshams ni mig mi bzang //bad+ma kan ni stobs po che'o//rno ga ni rin chen rdo rje'//khrag nI rta mgrin/
118a7(rgyud): rdul ni na mkha'i snying po'o//tshil ni dpal he ru ka'o//mchi ma ni pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug/mchil ma ni rnam par snang mdzad//snrubs ni rdo rje sems dpa'o//pul+lI ra ma la
118b1(rgyud): ya s+t+wa~M/mgo bor ni rab tu gtum ma'o//dzA lan+d+ha ra ste spyi gtsug tu gtum pa'i mig can ma'o//urban tI rna ba g.yas par 'od ldan ma'o//ar bu da ste skye bo'i rgyab tu sna chen ma stu/
118b2(rgyud): gnas pa'o//go dra bA rI s+ye rna ba g.yon par brtan pa'i blo can ma'o//ra me shwa ra ste smin ma'i dbusu mi'u thung ma'o//de bI ko Ta ste mig tu ni lang ki'i dbang phyug mi'o//ma la
118b3(rgyud): bste phrag pa gnyi su ni shing grib mya ste nye de'i gnas//kA ma ru ba ste mtshan khung drug tu ni sa srung mi'o//oM d+he ste nu ma gnyis 'jigs byed chen mo ste zhing //tI sha ku ni ste
118b4(rgyud): bAbar ni rlung gi shugs can ni'o//ko sau la sti sna rtser ni chang 'thung ma ste nye ba'i zhing //ka ling gi ste khar ni sngo bsaMng+ges lta na'o//le pA ka ste mgrin par ni shin tu bzang mo ste
118b5(rgyud): 'dus pa can//kAny+tsi ste skying dkar nI rta rna ma'i//hi ma la ya ste 'dom su ni bya gdong ma ste nye ba'i 'dus pa cano//pre ta puM ri ste mtshan ma la ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o//
118b6(rgyud): gr-i haM de ba tA s+t+waM ba shing pa'i lam la ni dum skyes ma'o//'dus pa ca no//sau R+ShaSh+Ta ste brla gnyis chang 'tshong ma'o//su baN+Di dI pa ste byin pa gnyis la 'khor lo'i gi cha ma'o//nye
118b7(rgyud): 'dus pa can//na gar ste sdor mo rnams lo ni shin tu dpa'i mo'o//sin d+hu sti rkang pa'i rol la ni stobs chen ma ste 'di dag ni dur khrod do//ma ru ste mthe bong dag la ni 'khor
119a1(rgyud): stos gyur ma'o//s+yA wut+tha ste dbus mo gnyis la n+d+ra brtson 'grus mchen mo'o//'di dag ni nye ba'i dur khrod do//sa'i khams ni ltung byed ma'o//rlu
119a2(rgyud): khams ni gseng byed ma'o//mo'i khams ni 'grogs byed ma'o//rlung gi khams ni bar gyi dbang phyug ma'o//namakhi'i khams ni pad+ma'i dru ba ma'o//gzugs kyi phung
119a3(rgyud): bo ni rnam par snang mdzad do//tshor ba'i phung po ni rdo rje nyi ma'o//'du shes kyi phung po ni pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyu'o//'du byed kyi phung po ni rdo rje rgyal po'o//rnam par
119a4(rgyud): shes pa'i phung po ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni dbul he ru ka'o//TI mig gnyis ni gti mug rdo rje'o//rna ba gnyis
119a5(rgyud): ni zhe sdang rdo rje'o//skye gnyis ni ser sna rje rje//kha ni 'dod chags rdo rje/reg bya ni phrag dog rdo rje/skye mche thams cad ni dbang phyug rdo rje/yid ni mi
119a6(rgyud): 'khrugs rdo rje/ngagi ni dpag med rdo rje/lus ni rdo rje rnam snang //'di dag sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor yin//rang snying lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis//ye shes 'khor la
119a7(rgyud): bkug nasu//de dag sprur cing bkod nas ni//ji lta'i rim pas dbang yang bskur//zhugs par gyur nas bcing bar bya//dgyes pas rje su chags pas sbyor/
119b1(rgyud): rlung gi ngo bo cig gyur nas//de la go cha gnyis po dgod//oM ha snying kA la rdo rje sems dpa'/na ma hi mgo bo la rnam par snang mdzad/swA hA hu spyi gtsug la pad+ma gar gyi dpung phyung //
119b2(rgyud): bau ShAT he phrag pu gnyis la he ru ka/hUM hUM hoHmig gnyis la rdo rje nyi ma'o//phaT haM lus thams cad kyi go che ste rta mchog go/oM ba~M lte bo la rdo rje phag mo'o//taM yau skyong ka la
119b3(rgyud): ya mi ni'o//hrI mau kha la rmongs byed me'i//hreM hU~M mgo la bskyong byed ma'o//hUM hUM spyi gtsug la skrag byed ma'o//phaT phaT tsaN+Di ka ste yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha'o//
119b4(rgyud): mdzub mo 'dud byas gung mo nges par sbyar//methe bong rdo rje brtan por rab tu sbyar//de ni da pral ba'i dbusu rab bzhag nas//bskor cing bskor bar kun tu sbyar bar bya/
119b5(rgyud): rkang pa phyed min na steng du blta gyen du pheM gi sgra sgrogs shing //phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i//dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams bkug/dzAHhUM bAM hoHsbyor
119b6(rgyud): bas bkog nas bzhugs pa dang //bcings nas dbang du bya ba yin//dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis//mkha' dkyil yongasu gang mthong nas//ye shes chu yi dadud
119b7(rgyud): rtsi yis//gang ba'i bum pa blangs nas ni//lag pas de la dbang bskur bya//glu dang gar gyi mchod pa yis//dbang bskur dag ni dbul bar bya//de la sngags ni oM sarba
120a1(rgyud): tA thA ga ta a d+hi Sho kA tA sa mA ya shri ya rbu trUM/glu ldid rlangs byas bskul ba 'am//yang na mkha 'gro mtshan mo rnams thugs dgyes pa dang /rab tu
120a2(rgyud): dgyes par gyur te/dbang bskur rol mo'i bde chen po//mkha' gro dri ba'i bde chen po//de gyes chen gsol ba'i bde chen po//mkha' gro dra ba'i bde chen po//bas
120a3(rgyud): mdzad bde ba chen pa ste//mkha 'gro dra ba'i bde chen po//a la la ho//mchog tu gyur pa bde chen po//mkha' gro dra ba'i bde chen po//a la la ho//bde chen ye
120a4(rgyud): shes dgyes nas ni//dam tshig dam tshig can la bzhugs//ye shes ro gcig bsgoms nas ni//ro gcig 'khor lo 'ang de bzhin sgom//rdo rje sems dpa
120a5(rgyud): dbu rgyan can//ye shes lnga dang yang dag ldan//rtswa ba'i sngags sogs dpa' bo gang //tshangs pa'i skud pa la sogs brtag/rdo rje phag mo'i sngags gang yin//
120a6(rgyud): mgul nas mgul du rnam par rgyan//lha mo'i snying po'i sngags kyis ni//phreng ba brgya phyed kyis rgyan cing //gsang sngags yi ge bdun pa yis//nor bu rna cha legs
120a7(rgyud): mdzes shing //sangs rgyas kun gyis mkha' bra mo//lpags pa'i gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/rnal 'byor ma drug gseng sngags kyis//ska rags rgyan du byas pa yin
120b1(rgyud): go cha drug po dag gis ni//phyag rgya lus ni rab tu mdzes//'khor lo kun gyi rnal 'byor ma//sngags kyi btung ba'i thod pa yin//rnam snang mdzad ma sngags gang gis//thod pas spyi gtsug
120b2(rgyud): rgyan du byas//dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis//lus kyi khams la rnam par brtag/de ltar bdag nyid rnam bsams te//tshing ngam sngags kyis legs par srung //tshangs
120b3(rgyud): par spyod pa brtag gyur nas//rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags kyis mchod//'jigs pa thams cad rnams spangs te//de ltar rnal 'byor bdag nyid bsam//spro dang bsdu ba'i
120b4(rgyud): ye shes sgom//snyoms 'jug ye shes bzlas pa bya//rnal 'byor chen po sgrub chen po//rdo rje khro bo'i thig le l+yas//khams gsum du ni spro bar bya//rdo rje'i sna yi rtse
120b5(rgyud): mo 'bar//spro bya na mkha'ar thig le las//rdo rje phra mo mthong gyur pa//ba spyi'i khung bu'i bar dag nas//rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu bar//khro bo sangs rgyu ste sprin rnams sgo//
120b6(rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i rnal 'byor ni//sum cu rtsa bdun rim pa yin//lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni mkha' gro ma'o//tsher ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni lde ma'o//chos
120b7(rgyud): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni dum skyes ma'o//sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni gzugs can ma'o//'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni rab gtum ma'o//brtson 'grus kyi
121a1(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni ma'u thung ma'o//dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni 'od ldan ma'o//sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni sna chen ma'o//dad pa'i dbang
121a2(rgyud): po ni dpa' ba'i blo gros can ma'o//brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni mi'u thung ma'o//dran pa'i dbang po lung ka'i dbang phyug ma'o//ting 'dzin gyi dbang po ni shing grib
121a3(rgyud): ma'o//shes rab kyi dbang po ni sa srung ma'o//dad pa'i stobs ni 'jigs byed chen mo'o//brtson 'grus kyi stobs ni rlung gi shugs can ma'o//dran pa'i stobs//
121a4(rgyud): ni chang 'thung ma'o//tinge 'dzin gyi stobs ni sngo bsangs lha mo'o//shes rab kyi stobs ni shin tu bzang mo'o//ting 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rta rna ma'o///
121a5(rgyud): brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni bya gdong ma'o//dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lho'i shugs can ma'o//shin tu sbyangs pa yang
121a6(rgyud): dag byang chub kyi yan log ni dum skyes ma'o//chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chang 'tsheng ma'o//dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag
121a7(rgyud): ni 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o//btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni shin tu dpa' mo'o//yang dag pa'i lta ba ni stobs chen ma'o//yang dag pa'i rtog
121b1(rgyud): ni 'khor las bsgyur ma'o//yang dag pa'i ngag ni dpa' bo chen mo'o//yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni bya rog gdong can ma'o//yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni 'ug pa'i gdong can rmar/
121b2(rgyud): yang dag da'i rtsol ba ni khyi'i gdong can ma'o//yang dag pa'i dran pa ni phag gi gdong can ma'o//yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin ni bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka'o//dge ba'i
121b3(rgyud): chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa ni gshin rje sreg ma'o//dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par srung ba ni gshin rje pho nya ma'o//mi dge tshe sa skyes pa rnams yang dag par
121b4(rgyud): spong ba ni gshin rje mche ba ma'o//mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa ni gshin rje 'joms mu'o//rnam tshig gi 'khor lo rnam par sbyang ba'i sgom pa'o//de nas dam
121b5(rgyud): tshig 'khor lo dag/mnyam par gzhig+ma ste bzlas par byo//hA ha/hUM hUM/hi to/phaT/hUM hUM/A a/oM shI tro dz+dza he he ru ru kaM hUM hUM phaT/DA ki nAM dz+wA laM shaM ba ra swAt+ma//oM \u0f7f
121b6(rgyud): hwA ta t+yA trAM phaT swAH/snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o//oM badz+ra hr-i roH ma huM hUM phan+d+ha swAnA~M/oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nAM yai bad+d+he bAdz+nyAn+taM yai huM hU~M phaT swA hA//lha mo'i snying po dang /
121b7(rgyud): nye ba'i snying po'o//aM TI ki nI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/oM lA me huM hUM phaT swA hA/oM khaN+Da ro he huM hUM phaT swA hA/oM rU pi NI yau huM hUM phaT swAny+dzi/oM khaN+Da ka pA li ni ka ra
122a1(rgyud): mr-i t+su b+hUdz+dza trA~M d+hu d+hA phaT/oM khar+thab+h+rUMs+t+rai d+har+b+hu kra~M/oM badz+ra tha d+hA hU~M phaT/ma~M le kI shwa r-I ye+e nr-id+b+ha wa~M/oM badz+rI h+ne pheM ba~M d+hid+b+ha phaT/oM d+ha ma
122a2(rgyud): d+hud+hU ba/oM ts+tsha Ta d+had+hu baH/ ya~M ra ba tI ye d+hu hU~M baTe/oM badz+rA dzA T+wA~M lai da ha dad+had+h+ya d+hA Te/oM main+ta b+hai ra bstu ts+tsha hU~M phaT/mA~M ma n+t+ra d+hA ra ba tsai hU~M trU~M
122a3(rgyud): d+h+ri mu rban d+ha nAM phaT/oM badz+rA hU~M kAr+yA \u0f7f k+Sha b+hUk+Sha bA s+'u ru d+hi ra ar+d+ha mU lA ba la~M bi na~M hUM hUM phaT/oM su~M ra d+hik+Shi m+me ts+tshan+d+ri phaT/oM su~M b+ha~M dre g+han+d+ha gr-id+d+ha sad+d+he b+hU tA la b+hU dzi ga/
122a4(rgyud): yadu yatrA~M hU~M \u0f7f/d+d+hot+tad+ya shwA Sh+T+r-i s+t+rai \u0f7f d+hid+d+hermAr+N+Na
122b1(rgyud): hUM phaT/oM khat+ta ro ha huM hU~M phaT/oM ha ya grI ba hi ho hu~M hUM phaT/oM naN+Da ni ya tu hUM phaT/oM A kA shA gar+b+ha huM hUM huM hUM phaT/oM tsakra brli NI ye huM hUM phaT/oM he ru ka kai li ki li huM hU~M phaT/
122b2(rgyud): s+'ur+ya b+hId+hI yod+h+ya dz+nyA phaT/oM pad+mA nar+t+ti shA ra~M sa~M ma~M sir+b+ba hU~M phaT/oM ma dz+nyA ba ma~M d+hu hU~M phaT/oM ba~M tsa~M na d+hi ma~M ti li hU~M hU~M phaT/oM nIk+kha d+hIn+d+ha ye ts+tsha hUM phaT/oM badz+ra sar+b+ba
122b3(rgyud): li ts+tshits+tsha paT/oMm+b+hi hA b+hin+ye nAM hUM phaT/oM k+ShaM kA s+ye r+g+haM hUM phaT/oM yU lpA kA s+ye hUM hUM phaT/oM shU nA swe d+haM hUM phaT/oM spr-i kA rA s+ye huM hUM phaT/oM ya ma dA r+t+ti maM hUM hUM phaT/oM ya ma~M d+ha/
122b4(rgyud): twe yi huM hUM phaT/oM ya me dr-iSh+Ti NI yai huM hUM phaT/oM ya ma me tha nAM yai hu~M hUM phaT/'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis//dung chen phreng ba blangs na su//leg g.yon mthe bong srin lag
122b5(rgyud): gis/gsang sngags dag ni bzlas pa bya//dus bzhin ji lta 'dod pa ru//rnal 'byor pas ni bzlas pa bya//bsgom pa rtse gcig bya ba ste//dam tshig dang ni dam tshig sbyor/
122b6(rgyud): bza' dang bzlas pa bsdus na su//cho ga bzhin du gtor ma sbyin//dkyil 'khor lo ni ci bde bar//gcer bu skra grol 'dug pa yis//brtul zhugs can gyis gtor ma sbyin//
122b7(rgyud): rkang pa g.yas brkyang ginas na su//mnyam par gzhag to phyag rgya bcing //mdzub mo 'dud byas gung mo nges par sbyar//mthe bong rdo rje brtan po rab tu sbyar//dpral po
123a1(rgyud): dbus kyi phyogasu rab gzhag nas/bcu zhing bskor nas 'di brjod do//oM A ra l+li hoHdzaHhUM baM hoHbadz+ra DA ki nI sa ma ya stA dr-i sh+tsa dz+dzaH'don
123a2(rgyud): gsum dang bzhi dang ni//lnga yi bar du brjod par bya//skra grol gcer bur byung ba yis//rnal 'byor mtho ba'i gnas nas langs//lho phyogs kha bltas gnas pa yi//mtshan
123a3(rgyud): phyed du ni gtor ma sbyin//ji lta'i las kyi rjes 'brangs nas//de nyid gsum gyis mngon bsngags te//rdo rje thal mo gyen phye nas//gsang sngags 'di dag rab tu brjod//
123a4(rgyud): au kha kha khA hi khAM hau/sarba yak+Sha rak+Sha sa/b+hu ta/pre ta/pi shA tsA/un mA da/a pasma re/DA ka DA ki n+yA da yA//i mau ba li gr-ih+Na tu sa ma ya rak+Shan+tu/sarba sid+d+him+me pra
123a5(rgyud): sats+tshan+tu/ya thaM gai ya theSh+TaM/b+huny+dzi tha/pi pa tha dzi g+hA tha/mA tI kra mo tha/ma ma sar+b+ba tA ra ta yA/seta su kha bi shud+d+ha ye/sa hA yi ka b+ha ban+tu huM hUM pheT sA hA/dpa'i ji
123a6(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma thams cad//bde chen mtshan gyis gar mdzad cing //bcom ldan sku gsung thugs la bzhugs//A li ka li mnyam byas te//der ni re pha'i sbyor ba
123a7(rgyud): yis//steng du 'bar ba'i re pha ni//'og tu 'dzag par byed pa yin//'dzag pa'i khu ba'i tshul can ni//'chi med thigs pa'i gzugasu 'gyur//bsrub dang
123b1(rgyud): bskyabs pa yang dgra sbyor//ye shes me la las kyi rlung //rab tu bskrad pas byas pa yis//lte ba'i dkyil 'khor dud pa 'byung //'od zer ni 'bar bar byed/dam tshig
123b2(rgyud): 'khor lo des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dag bsregs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi long spyod kyi 'khor lor song ste/thabs des lan gsum du brko/
123b3(rgyud): pa byas nas//smin mtshams kyi mdzod smra nas gnod 'byed pa'i sgo las 'das te/byung nas phyogs bcu ra 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs pa
123b4(rgyud): la ye shes lnga'i bdud rtsi blangs te/spyi bi'i gtsug gser sgo dzA lan+ta ra zhes bya bar zhugs te/so'i mtshams kyi bu ga'i nang du song nas longs spyod kyi 'khor lor ngal
123b5(rgyud): bsos nas bsregs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dga' ba bskyed nas lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du gnas par 'gyuraro//des skra'i rtse mo 'bumo du bshags pa'i cha
123b6(rgyud): tsam yang 'byung ba dang /'jug pa mthong ste/dga' zhing ji ltar bde bar gnas//rang lhag lha yi rnal 'byor gyis//thams cad 'di ltar rab tu brtag/bsam pa med la bsam/
123b7(rgyud): pa ste//sems kyang mtshon par bye ba min//bsam du med pa'i sgom pa yis//dngos dang dngos min rlom spangs yin//sems kyis bsams pa'i sems de ni//rnyed
124a1(rgyud): gang yin gzung bar bya//kha T+wAM ga nI l+yA yi sgra//rnam nu sgra shes rab yin//nyin mo bcom ldan dpar ba ste//mtshan mo rnal 'byer ma ru bshad//dgra par
124a2(rgyud): chos kyi sprul pa ni//phag mo dag gi gzugasu bstan//shrI ni gnyis med ye shes te//ha ni rgya tshogs rnam par stengs//ru ni bkod pa dang bral ba//ka ni gang na'ang mi gnas
124a3(rgyud): pa'o//rnal 'byor sems ni ngal bsos la//mya ngan 'das zhes bstan pa yin//rnal 'byor 'pho ba'i dus kyi tshe//he rA ka sems dpa' rnal 'byor//lag na me
124a4(rgyud): tog sna tshogs bsnams//sna tshogs rgyal mtshon ba dan can//sna tshogs rol mo'i sgra sgrogs shing //sna tshogs glu yis mchod par bya//'chi ba zhes bya'i rnam
124a5(rgyud): rtog 'di//mkha' la spyod pa'i gan su khyer//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla mA las/gnyisu med par sbyor ba'i gnas kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o///
124a6(rgyud): dri nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//ma mo'i bsgom pa dbye bar bya//gsong sngags kun gyi gnas sbyor ba//de bzhin gshugs pa kun gyi gnas//thams cad mkhyen
124a7(rgyud): cing thams cad mdzad//bde ba chen pos kun la bya'o//mgon po sangs rgyas kun bdag ste//sems can kun gyi snying la gnas//oM oM AM/oM ai/u uM/
124b1(rgyud): yo ma/ mo/a AHhUM//'don bcom ldan de nyid kyi//d+he ru ka ni dbang phyug mchog/mkha' la d+hI med zla ba ya//lte ba'i dbu su bsgom par bya//r-i r-I l-i k+Sh+mA~M/mkha' gro ma/
124b2(rgyud): ni pad mdab bzhugs//kau khaM gaM g+haM de/che dzi d+d+ho&/Ti nr-i NAM d+h+r-i NaM/t+te hrIn dz+nyA naM/paM phaM baM b+hU maM/de yi thod pa'i dum stsogs dang //gtum mig mu la gogs kun gyis
124b3(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo ste//dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol//yaM raM laM Sh+kaM/shaM ShaM saM ha~Mk+ShaM/de yi khA gdong la sogs dang /gshin rje sreg sogs kun gyi'o//
124b4(rgyud): yi ge k+Sha yi bdag nyid ni//bde ba chen po'i shu kra'i gzugs//thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs//sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas yin zhing //kun la khyab cing
124b5(rgyud): rtag tu stong //brjod du med cing phra ba'i dbus//'di ni tshad med rtag pa'i thugs//rang gi gzugs ni mkha' lta bu//'di ni bdag nyid bcings pa ste//'di ni dgrol
124b6(rgyud): la mkhas pa yin//'di ni lte ba'i dbus bzhugs shing //shu kra'i gzugs kyis bde chen gnas//sku gsung thugs kyis sbyor ba yis//'khor lo gsum gyi
124b7(rgyud): dbusu dgod//'di ni gsang ba mchog yin te//gang la yang ni bston mi bya//sngar bshad phyag dang phyag mtshan dang //go cha yang ni de bzhin te//sngar bshad bzhin du
125a1(rgyud): bkod nas kyang //rung po khams dang skye mched dag/dpa' ba'i yan lag rnam dag nyid//byang chub phyogs kyang de bzhin te//lug su 'byung dang bzlog
125a2(rgyud): nga yis//sngar bshad 'khor lo rnam par dgod//thams cad dkar ba'i mdog can la//'khor le gsum ni bcu drug/dpa' bo yang ni so sor dgod//rnal 'byor
125a3(rgyud): ma yang so sor te//rang gi thabs kyi sbyor ba yis//gnyisu med pa'i gnas pa yin//dpa' bo'i rang gi rig pa dang //gnyi su med par gnas pa yin//mkha' gro
125a4(rgyud): sregs dang khyi gdong sogs//rang gi thabs dang gnyis med gnas//de ni rdo rje snying po'o//rnal 'byor ma yi dam pa ste//mchog tu gsang ba sbas pa dag/rdo rje
125a5(rgyud): snying pos zhus nas ni//bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yin//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla mo'i bla ma las dpal he ru ka dang /mkha'agro ma dang /dpa' bo dang //
125a6(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma rnams sgom pas bskyed pa ste le'u bco lnga pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//dang po'i las kyi sgom pa ste//rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i
125a7(rgyud): mchogo gyur pa//gcig car du ni bskyed pa dag/rdo rje snying pos gsungs pa yin//phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa/spyan gsum pa la zhal rnams bsgyur//'jig
125b1(rgyud): byad dang ni dus mtshan dang /g.yas brkyang ba yis mgo la mnan//rgyan drug sna tshogs rdo rje dang //zla ba phyed pas rnam par rgyan//stag gi lpags pa go su bdabs//mgo bo'i phreng //
125b2(rgyud): bos rnam par rgyan//thod pa kha T+wAM ga bsnams shing //de ni rdo rje mchog kyang gsor//phag mos kyang ni rnam par 'khril//de yi mdog dang phyag gis gnas//byin pa gnyis
125b3(rgyud): kyis mnyam par 'khyud//thod pa rdo rje bsdigs mdzub kyi/phyogasu bsdigs shing skra grol la//dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can//'khor la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
125b4(rgyud): rnams//phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa ste//phyag rgya lnga nau mnyam par sbyor//spyan gsum pa la drag po'i gzugs//thams cad yi dgas gdan la bzhugs//sgrom
125b5(rgyud): pa mchog gi skom pa'o//dbusu khrag 'thung rdo rje ni//sngo ba'i mdog can bde ba tshe//pad+ma'i dbusu sgom pa ni//mkha' 'gro ma ni ser po'i mdog/thugs kyi 'khor/
125b6(rgyud): lo'i dpa' bo dang //mkha' gro ma yi khyad par ni//dpa' bo mdog ni nag po la//mkha' 'gro ma ni dkar ba nyid//gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo ni//dmar ba'i
125b7(rgyud): mdog can char 'bar ba/mkha'agro'ang de bzhin nag po ste//sku mdog gnyi su rnam par sgom//sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo ni//zla ba ser skya legs
126a1(rgyud): //rnarlangs/'am 'dzum yang dam/ri 'dod bzugs 'ang 'gyur ba yin//zhwa gdod la sogs kun ldang ku//gshin rje srog sogs kun du //
126a2(rgyud): de ltar mdog gi bye drug gis//sgom pa'i mchog gis shes par bya//mkha' blo mdzod kha T+wAM 'dzin//cang te'u gar gyi rnam par bzhugs//thams cad dbu skye grom
126a3(rgyud): bosti//phyogs kyi gos can bzhed pa'i zhal//thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams//rdo rje dril bus legs par 'khyud//rnal 'byor ma ni thod rdo rje//bsdigs
126a4(rgyud): mdzub dang ni lhan cig bcas//gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' blo rnams//rnal 'byor ma 'khor bsdigs mdzub can//pad+ma dril bus rnam par rgyan//rnal 'byor ma
126a5(rgyud): ni thaMd pad+ma//bsdigs mdzub dang ni lhan cig bcas//sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams//'khor lo dril bu rab tu 'bar//rnal 'byor ma 'khor bsdigs
126a6(rgyud): mdzub ca ni//thod pa rkang gis gadra ba'o//khwa gdong la sogs lha mo ni//thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM gA/gri gug dang ni bsdigs mdzub bcas//gshin rje sreg sogs
126a7(rgyud): lha mo ni//cang te'u mgo bo bsdigs mdzub dang /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//skyil krung byed pas gar dang bcas//dpa' bo g.yas brkyang gnas pa
126b1(rgyud): mkha' ma yi byin pas 'khril//gnyen myod par mnyam ldan pa//thugs rdo rgyags pa'i bdob mo//ye shes 'khor lo mnyam ldan pas//bde ba'i bde ba gcig tu 'gyu
126b2(rgyud): kyi ra la so yang dag 'byung //rid mings don dang bcas pa//phreng ba sngags dang men pA sbyar//gsal byed ma ba sgyur nas//hUM gnyis paT dang yang dag sbyar//dpa dri//
126b3(rgyud): gsang sngags yang dag sbyar//rnal 'byor ma yang de bzhin bshad//rang gi mi gis bon dbus//glas la byed dang ni mnyam par l+r-in+tu//hu~M hU~M phaT+Ta k+Shang de bzhin te//sdigs pa 'di
126b4(rgyud): lhur sbyar b+hur bya//dbu suM khrag 'thung rdo rje ste//gsang sngags 'di ni mkhas pas bzla//oM shrI bad+d+ha tI d+he ru ru kaM truM hU~M phaT/oMd+hI hrIt+tahU~M hU~M phaT/snying po dang nye ba'i sgra
126b5(rgyud): pa'o//oM badz+rI b+hA rA ha~M hu~M hU~M phaT/oM badz+re bai ro tsa ni yai huM hUM phaT/lha mo'i snying po dang /nye ba'i snying po'o//dus byini dag tu tshig bzhin//rnal 'byor pa yis bzlas pa bya/
126b6(rgyud): mdun du b+hU s+tha'i khyed las//chos dang longs sbed rnam par ste//sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir//chos kyi 'khor lo bstan par bya//'gro ba rigs drAg
126b7(rgyud): krol nas ni//bla med gnas 'dzegs par byed//sngags pas ji ltar 'dod sbyor ba//rigs lnga rnams kyi dbusu yang //gang gis rigs gsum de bus khyab po//
127a1(rgyud): khams gsum gyi ni bdag po ste//sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag 'dus//sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba'o//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las
127a2(rgyud): las dang po pa'i sbyor ba'i sgom pa bstan pa ste le'u bcu drug pa'o////rdo rje snying pos rab bshad pa//dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa ste//phyag bzhi po yi
127a3(rgyud): cho ga yis//dbang po bar ma rnam par sgom//gcig car bskyed pa'i sbyor ba yis//sgom pa dag ni rnam par sgom//phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa//spyan gsum
127a4(rgyud): drag po 'jigs pa ste//g.yas brkyang pa yis gnas pas bzhugs//'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan gnon//sku lus mi mgo'i do shal can//thod pa'i dbu rgyan
127a5(rgyud): mchog can te//zla ba phyed pa mdzes pa yin//sna tshogs rdo rjes rnam par mtshan//phyag rgya drug po drug po'i gzugs//sku mdog dkar po 'jigs pa ste//sngo
127a6(rgyud): zhing ljang ku dmar po ste//steng gi zhal gdong rnam par sgom//thod pa dang ni khA T+wAM 'dzin//rdo rje dril bu cang te'u dang //rdo rje phag mo mnyam par ldan//lha mo'i
127a7(rgyud): ku tsa 'chir ba ste//stag gi lpags pa go su banabs//phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste//skra grol dum bu'i ska rags can//de phyag zhal dang mdog gis
