127b1(rgyud): mtshan//mkha' bru ma ni dz+wal ser//ldum ljang dang por bste//dum skyes ma ni dmar la ldang //gzugs can man ser la dmar//thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin//gyi gug mag
127b2(rgyud): ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/cang tweru s+thA ni du me sgrogs//gcer bu sgra ni grol ba ste/thod pa dge gis cod byin byas//spyan gsum pa la drug po'i zhal//rang gi mdog dang bya
127b3(rgyud): de bzhin//skyil krung byed pa'i gar can te//bdud bzhi zhangs 'og gnon pa dang /'dod pas lta zhing rtog pa ste//thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo ni//sngo dang seR+Sha bAr
127b4(rgyud): rnam par sgom//de bzhin rdo rje mkha' gro ma'ang //dkar zhing sngo bar rnam par bsgom//thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin//rdo rje dril bus legs par 'khyud//cang te'u yi ni sna
127b5(rgyud): tshogs sgra//rdo rje s+thA ni yongasu rdzogs//thod pa dang ni bsdigs mdzub dang //bI gug dang ni mi thod 'dzin//lha mo'i phyag rnams de bzhin te//sbyin pa gnyis kyi
127b6(rgyud): legs par 'khyil//g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs//'jigs pa chets+tsha bo bzhin rnam bsgyur//rdo rje phreng po'i cid pan byas//dpa' bo rdo rje mtshan ma'o//
127b7(rgyud): gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dang //dmar zhing gnas la 'jigs pa ste//pad+ma'i dpa' bos rnam par khyab//rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa ste//pad+ma'i mkha' phro mo//
128a1(rgyud): de bzhin//ljang dang dkar nga' sku lus can//sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo yang //sar dang ldang ba'i sku lus can//'khor las dpa' ba yongasu
128a2(rgyud): khyab//'khor los bsgyur ba'ang ster bar byed//'khor lo mkha' gro me de bzhin//dkar dmar dang yid 'phrog pa'o//rang gi mtshan dang yang dag ldan//chos kyi
128a3(rgyud): 'khor lo rab bskor ba//khA gdong sogs bzhi mkha 'gro ma//sna tshogs mdog can yid 'phrog pa'o//thod pa dang ni khA T+wAM 'dzin//gri gug mgo bo cang te'u 'dzin//
128a4(rgyud): gshin rje sreg sogs lha mo ni//dud ka dmar po de bzhino//gshin rje dbyig to gri gug mgo/thod pa dang ni khru T+wA~M 'dzin//'khor gyi me sogs mkha' gro ma//
128a5(rgyud): dgas gdan la rnam par bzhugs//byin pa brany+tsi ni mnyam par 'khril//mkha' gro ma ni dgyes pa che//skra groli phyogs kyi gos 'chang zhing //thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu
128a6(rgyud): rgyun can//thams cad phyag rgya lnga 'dzin cing //dpa' bo mkha' gro ma yi 'khor//spyan gsum drag po rnam bsgyur ba//dpa' bo 'dod pa'i zas la rol//chags
128a7(rgyud): ba'i mig gis rnam par lta//sngar bshad cho ga'i rim pa bzhin//gesang sngags rang ming sa bon dang //dpa' bo gsang sngags 'di ru bshad//mkha' gro ma yang
128b1(rgyud): de bzhin te//d+hU ba'i gsung thugs 'di nyid ra//gsang sngags mchog kyang de bzhin//oM shrI badz+rA he he ru ru ka tu d+d+he phuT swAhA//oM hrIHha hA hu~M hU~M phaT//oM badz+ra b+hA r+yA hi ba hu hUM
128b2(rgyud): phaT swAt+ma/oM badz+ra bai ro tsAn+d+ra ya~M hU~M hU~M phaT/thams cad bsgoms te mthong ba ni//bdag pa dang ni 'khor lo sogs//ye shes 'khor l-i de mthong nas//legs par debang
128b3(rgyud): bskur gzhug par bya//sgom pas gcig tu byas nas nI//bdud rtsi mchog gis tshim par bya//ye shes bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis//khro bo tshogs mchog spros nas ni//
128b4(rgyud): dpa' bo mkha 'gro mthong ba na//sku gsung thugs kyi rim pa yAMs//dam tshig can gyis bzlas pa bya//'khor sogs dpa' bo mkha 'gro ma//'di ni kun gyi gsang sngags
128b5(rgyud): te//don dam bzlas par bshad pa yin//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dbang po bar ma'i sgom pa bstan pa ste le'u bcu bdun pa'o//
128b6(rgyud): donasu gzhan yang bshad bya ba//rdo rje snying po'i gsang ba ste//gang yang de nyid rim pa dag/sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir//dbang po rnon po'i sgom pa bshad//bsgreng
128b7(rgyud): pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba dag/sgom pa de yis bsgom par bya/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang //lam b+hi rnam mkhyen ye shes//A mi ka li mnyam sbyor ro//
129a1(rgyud): bdag nyid he ru kar yang bya//mngon po zhal gsum phyag drug pa//spyan gsum rnam par bsgyur ba'i zhal//g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs/
129a2(rgyud): 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan gyi//mgo bo la ni zhabs kyis gnon//na ra'i lpags pa gisu ban pas//zla ba phyed pas rnam par rgyan//sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mnan//
129a3(rgyud): thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//sku lus phyag rgya drug gis btab//rdo rje phag mo mnyam par ldan//gnyisu med par sbyor ba yi//rkyen pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril
129a4(rgyud): gcer bu skra ni grol ba ste//dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can//thod pa yi ni phreng ba ste//snying rje bde bas rnam par myos//rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pa//'dod pa'i
129a5(rgyud): chags pas bde bar dgyes//thod pa dang ni khA dz+nyA 'dzin//ral gri dang ni cang te'u 'chang //tshangs pa'i mgo bos phyag gzhan la//phyag rgya drug gis rnam par rgyan//
129a6(rgyud): de yi sku mdog zhal phyag mtshan//'on kyang yi sug 'dzin pa yin//gnam mdog ser skya dmar dang dkar//rnam par gsum dang sku gsum dang //thams cad
129a7(rgyud): 'khor sogs mkha' gro ma//dpa' po rnal 'byor ma mkha' gro//thams cad zhal gsumo phyag drug pa//spyan gsum g.yas brkyang gnas pas bzhugs//yi dgas/
129b1(rgyud): gdan la brtan par granas//gnyisu med pa'i sbyor bas bzugs/mkha' gro ma ni dkar sngo dmar//lA ma ljang ku sngo la dkar//dum skyes ma ni dmar dkar sngo//gzugs can ma na
129b2(rgyud): ster sngo dmar//'di dag ni spyan gsum pa/gcer bu skra grol ba/yi dwags kyi steng du g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa/thod po dang khwa T+wAM ga dang /rab gri dang /'khor lo dang /
129b3(rgyud): gri gug dang /mgo bo dang /cang te'u bsnams pa'o//thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dang /rnal 'byor ma rnams la shar du thod pa'i dum bu dang /rab gtum ma ste sngo ba dang /
129b4(rgyud): dkar pa dang /dmar ba'o//byang du keng rus chen po dang /gtum mig ma ste dmar ba dang /dkar ba dang /sngo ba'o//nub tu keng rus can dang /'od ldan ma ste dkar ba dang /dmar ba
129b5(rgyud): dang /ljang gu'o//lho ru mtsho ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang /sna chen ma ste ljang ku dang /dkar ba dang /dmar ba'o//me'i phyogasu lha dgra dang /dpa' ba'i blo gros ma ste dmar ba dang /
129b6(rgyud): sngo ba dang /dkar ba'o//bden bral du 'od dpag tu med pa dang /mi'u thung ma ste sor ba dang /sngo ba dang /dkar ba'o//rlung gi phyog suM rdo rje 'o dang /lung ka'i dbang phyug ma ste
129b7(rgyud): sngo ba dang /dkar ba dang /dmar ba'o//dngang ldan du rdo rje lus dang /shing grib ma ste ldang ba dang /dkar ba dang dmar ba'o//gsung gi 'khor lo'i shar phyog/suM myu gu can
130a1(rgyud): dngas spyad ma ste/dmar pa dang /sta~M ba dang /dkar ba'o//byung phyogasu rdo rje ral pa can dang /'dzegs byed chen no ste sto ba dang /dkar ba dang /dam //
130a2(rgyud): nub tu dpa' bo chen po dang /rlung gi shugs can ma ste ldang ba dang /dkar ba dang /dmar po'i//lce rje rdo rje nu mdzad dang /chang 'thung me ste/ser ba dang /sngo ba dang /dmar ba'o//
130a3(rgyud): mi'i phyog su rab bzang dang /sngo bsangs lha mo ste ldang ba dang /ser ba dang /dmar ba'o//bdeni bral gyi phyogasu rdo rje bzang dang /rab bzang ma ste sngo ba dang /dkar ba dang /
130a4(rgyud): dmyur ba'i//rlung gi phyog su 'jigs byed chen po dang /rta rna ma ste dmar ba dang /sngo ba dang /ser ba'o//dbang ldan du mig mi bzung dang /bya gdeng ma ste dkar ba dang /
130a5(rgyud): sngo ba dang /ljang ku'o//sku'i 'khor lo'i shar phyogasu stobs po che dang /'khor lo'i shugs can mu ste dkar po dang /sngon po dang /sor po'o//byung phyogs rdo
130a6(rgyud): rin chen dang /dum skyes ma s+ye ser ba dang /sngo bo dang /ljang gu'o//nub phyogasu rta mgrin dang /chung 'tshong ma ste dmar ba dang /sngo bya dang /dkar ba'o//lho phyogs
130a7(rgyud): na mkha'i snying po dang /'khor lo'i go cha ma ste sngo ba dang /dmar ba dang /ljang ku'o//me'i phyogasu khrag 'thung dang /rab dpa' mo ste/ljang ku dang /ser po dang /
130b1(rgyud): dmar po'o//bden bral du pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang /stobs chen mo ste dkar ba dang /sngo ba dang /ljang ku'o//rlung gi phyogasu rnam par snang mdzad dang /'khor los bsgyur ma ste//
130b2(rgyud): ldang ba dang /dmar ba dang /ser ba'o//dbang ldan gyi phyogasu rdo rje sems dpa' dang /brtson 'grus chen mo ste na mkha' mdog can sngo bsangs dang /ser ba dang /ljang ku'o//
130b3(rgyud): sher phyogs kyi sgor khwa gdong ma ste/sngo ba dang /ser ba dang /dmar ba'o//byang du 'ug gdong ma ste ljang ku dang /dmar ba dang /dkar ba'o//nub du khyi gdong ma ste ser ba
130b4(rgyud): dang /sngo ba dang /ljang ku'o//lho ru phag gdong ma ste dmar ba dang /sngo ba dang /ljang ku'o//me'i phyogasu gshin rje sreg ma ste dkar ba dang /sngo ba dang /ljang ku'o//
130b5(rgyud): bden bral du gshin rje pho nya ma ste sngo ba dang /dkar ba dang /dmar ba'o//rlung gi phyogasu gshin rje mtsho ba ma ste dud ka dang /dmar ba dang dkar ba'o//dbang ldan du gshin/
130b6(rgyud): rje 'joms ma ste dmar ba dang /sngo ba dang /dkar ba'o//thod pa'i dum bu la sogs dang /rab gtum ma lA sogs pa rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan pa ral gri dang /
130b7(rgyud): cang te'u dang /mgo bo dang /thod pa dang /kha T+wA~M ga 'dzin pa/pad+ma pad+ma'i dril bu dang //'khor lo 'khor lo'i dril bu ste//sku gsung dag ni gnyis po yang //thugs kyi
131a1(rgyud): 'khor ba ji lta ba'o//lha mo cang te'u ral gri dang //gri kug yang ni de bzhin te//khwa gdong la sogs pa ni ral gri dang /cang te'u dang /gri gug dang /thod pa
131a2(rgyud): dang /kha T+wAM ga dang /mgo bo dang /dril bu 'dzin pa'o//gshin rje sreg ma la sogs pa ni thod pa dang /kha T+wAM ga dang /ral gri dang /lcags kyu dang /cang te'u dang /dril bu dang /
131a3(rgyud): mgo bo 'dzin pa'o//de thams cad kyang spyan gsum pa/phyag rgya lngas rnam par rgyan pa/na ra'i lpags pa ban bas pa//dpa' bo rnams ni g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa//
131a4(rgyud): thod pa'i phreng ba can/rang gi rigs kyi cod pan can/yi dgas kyi steng na bzhugs pa/rnal 'byor ma'i byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril pa/gcer bu skra
131a5(rgyud): grol ba/dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can/khwa gdong ma la sogs pa dang /gshin rje sreg mo la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni gcer bu skra grol ba yi dgas kyi
131a6(rgyud): steng du g.yas brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis gnas pa/spyan gsum pa/phyag rgya lngas rnam par rgyan pa/thod pa'i phreng ba can/gsus pa rlob/skye gnas ring ba/mtsha/
131a7(rgyud): ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal mnga' ba/thugs rje'i chags pa'i ros rnam par myos pa/'jigs pa'i g.yo bas 'jig su rung ba/'di ltar ma lus bsgoms
131b1(rgyud): nas ni//ye shes 'khor lo mthong ba dang //ye shes chu sogs arka dang //dam tshig mchog gi mchod par bya//mthong ma thag tu dbang yang bskur//mchod nas thim par byas nas/
131b2(rgyud): ni//ye shes bzlas pa'i cho ga bzhin//btab nas 'thor thung rab tu bya//srog dang rtsol ba'i sbyor ba yis//'dod pa'i dngos grub thob pa yin//dam tshig 'khor lo bzlas
131b3(rgyud): byas nas//'chi med ye shes lnga lhan cig/gsang sngags khro bo'i tshig gis bzla//bde ba'i dngos grub ster bar mdzad//dkyil 'khor ma lus thams cad bya//mnyam
131b4(rgyud): par gzhag ste bzlas pa bya//shes rab thabs kyi cho ga bzhin//rnal 'byor bzlas pa don chen ster//rnal 'byor ma dang mkha'agro dpa'//mngon sum du ni mchog kyang stsol//
131b5(rgyud): oM shrI badz+ra ha haM ru ru kaM hu~M hUM phaT/oM a A/i I/u U/e ai/oM oM/oM aHhUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/oM d+hIHha ha huM hUM phaT/oM badz+ra bai ra tsi nI yai huM hUM phaT swA hA/
131b6(rgyud): aM sarbaM bud+d+ha DA kI nI ye badz+ri bar+N+Na nI ye hUM hUM phaT swAny+dza//dpal khrag 'thung dang /phag mo'i snying po dang /nye ba'i snying pa'i//auN+Da ki nI ye NAM huM hUM phuT/oM wI maM lA
131b7(rgyud): tuM hUM phaT/aM khaMN+Da ro he kha hu~M hU~M phaT/oM rU pi N+De yai dra hu~M hUM phaT/a~M ka ra ka ra kaM huM hUM phaT/oM pra tsaN+De huM hUM phaT/oM ku ru ku ru kaM huM hUM phaT/oM tsaN+Da k+ShI ye hUM hUM
132a1(rgyud): phaT/oM bar+d+ha Ta kuM hUM hUM phaT/oM pra b+hA ba ti ye huM hUM phaT/oM tA su ya trA sa ya baM huM hUM phaT/oM ma hA nA sa hUM hUM phaT/oM k+Sho b+hA ya k+Sho b+ha ya sa d+hu hUM
132a2(rgyud): phaT/oM bI ra ma hI ye huM hUM phaT/oM hU~M hriM AM huM hUM phaT/oM kharba rI ye huM hUM phaT/oM hraHhrIHbaM huM hUM phaT/oM laM kre shwa rI ye huM hUM phaT/oM pheM pheM baM huM hUM phaT/oM dru
132a3(rgyud): man+t+ra ye huM hUM phaT/oM phaT phaT oM huM hU~M phaT/oM oM ra ba tI ye huM hUM phaT/oM daM ha da ha baM huM hUM phaT/oM ma hA b+hai ra b+hi ye huM hUM phaT/oM pa tsa pa tsa maM huM hUM phaT/oM bA
132a4(rgyud): yu baM ge tsuM hU~M phaT/oM b+hak+Sha d+hak+Sha bA sa ruM d+hi ra an+d+ra mA l+ya be laM bi nI yai huM hUM phaT/oM su raM b+hak+ShI ye huM hUM phaT/oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na sap+ta pA tA la ga ta b+hu dzaM ga sar+b+baM pA tar+dz+dza
132a5(rgyud): sa tar+N+Na ya hu~M hUM phaT/oM sh+tsi mi daM bI yai huM hU~M phaT/oM A kaD+D+h+ya eT+TA bi huM hUM phaT/oM suM d+ha ts+li huM hUM phaT/au hr-i tr-i mau huM hUM phaT/au ha yA kAr+N+No hU~M hUM phaT/A~Mdz+dzA
132a6(rgyud): baM huM hU~M phaT/oM khA gA na nu huM hUM phaT/oM DAk+ShAM s+yai hu~M hUM phaT/oM tsik+Shu bai gaM tsuM hU~M phaT/AM haM hUM r-I ts+yai hU~M phaT/oM khyAN+Da ro he huM hU~M phaT/oM hUM hI haM tsuM hU~M phaT/oM shaMSh+Ta
132a7(rgyud): nI yai hu~M hUM phaT/oM huM hUM oM hu~M hUM phaT/r-i'i oM tsakr-i barma NI ye hu~M hUM phaT/oM ki li ki li hai tsu hUM phaT/oM su bI re hu~M hUM phaT/oM si li saM li huM hUM phaT/
132b1(rgyud): oM d+ha par+b+bo d+hU paT/Ar+N+Na hU~M la~M b+h+ya ts+tshan+d+rA daT/yo dkra bAdz+nyA tu /ats+tshats+tshadz+ha kha~M dz+nyA nu n+tu phaT/oM m+b+ha d+hA d+hId+har+m+mA d+hA /oMk+ShAk+Sha s+t+rair+m+mad+d+hA sa/oM su lpAk+Sha
132b2(rgyud): s+ye huM hUM phaT/oM shrI nA s+ye huM hUM phaT/oM sU ka rA kyai hu~M hUM phaT/oM ya me dA D+hi ye huM hUM phaT/oM ya ma dA tI ye hu~M hUM phaT/oM ye me daMSh+Ti NI yai huM hUM phaT/oM ya ma ma tha nI ye huM hU~M phaT/
132b3(rgyud): 'di dag ji ltar rim pa yis//bzlas dang sgom pa byas nas ni//ye shes bdud rtsi sgom byas nas//rang gi lha yi sbyor bas gnas//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las
132b4(rgyud): dbang po rnon po'i sgom pa rje su bstan pa le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o////rdo rje snying pos gsungs pa//de nas mchog gyi dam pa bshad//mnyaM pa sbyor ba'i sdom pa dag
132b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba//mkha' gro ma yi sdom pa mchog/gcig car 'jug pa mthong nasu//rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms nas spro//A liM ka li las byung ba/
132b6(rgyud): he ru kar ni bdag nyid byas//ser dang sngo dang ljang ku ste//steng ni dkar po zhi ba'o//dbu rgyan thod pa'i cod pan can//spyan gsum thugs rje drag po ste//phag mo yis ni
132b7(rgyud): rnam par rgyan//'jigs byed dang naM dus mtshan gyi//mgo la g.yas brkyang gnas pas bzhugs//drag po gdul dka' 'dul mdzad cing //bgegs rnams thams
133a1(rgyud): 'as pa mdzad//zla ba phyed dang ram pa 'ching //sna chags rdo rje rnam par gnon//ska la phyug cu drug gis mtshan//phyag rgya sdum pa mchog yin to//dz+nyAn rba/
133a2(rgyud): pag su sa/ phreng bas rnam par rnam//rdo rje gi mdun me///gangam+b+ha nga nis da sa /ga
133a3(rgyud): legs par 'khril//da du'i phreng ba'i dbye rgyun can//mchu dang mtshan pa de dam/g.yar y-in sku rags can//rigs kyi dga' bas rnam par myos/
133a4(rgyud): mnyam ldan pas//phag ma yin sa ci 'dzin//dzad pa dang ni khan+d+ha 'dzin//zhags pa lcags kyu mchog kyang 'dzin//changs d+ma'i lkugs pa brgyad nus no//mag be steng du
133a5(rgyud): ga gis 'dzin//rad d+ha sbyi na snyan pa d+ma//chos kyi skyes ni rab tu 'gre sa//g.yon dud gams kyi thad du ni//mkha gro hU~M pa rnam par zlas//g.yas phyogs
133a6(rgyud): mA ma// m+b+hisab+hU / //rmugs / shA h+mA hU~M//ra du snron/
133a7(rgyud): de ni rab tu che 'bar gyi'o//g.yos pa'i phyog du tho rnams na ni//dengs grub thams cad rib tu stso'o//yi ni phyogs dam dang sde da lding //dekau du
133b1(rgyud): gzhul de bzhin//ljang dang dmar po sor po ste//steng gi sngon po 'bang 'ang de//g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs//phyogs kyis gos mchog 'chang ba dang //sgra grol ban
133b2(rgyud): 'jigs pa ste//mig bo'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan/bdud bzhi po ni zhabs 'og gnon//phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan//thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin//rdo rje dadung ni phyag na
133b3(rgyud): bsnams//nai ra ni lcags pa gosu ban pas//dril bu ts+tshi te'u de bzhin te//man ba'i gri gug phyeg na bskums//g.yer ka'i sku rags sgra blugs te//ts+tsha dz+nyAn r+m+ma
133b4(rgyud): su ru lu'i sgra//sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du ni//nyi ma'i dkyil 'i khor dbus bzhugs te//gdon gcig lha ni rnam par bzhugs//snying la dam tshig ye shes ni//de mjug
133b5(rgyud): phyag dang phyag mtshan te//rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka/mi bskyod pa yi cod pan can//thams cad de ltar bsgoms nas ni//mergyan dang dpe byang dang bcas pa//ye shes gcig
133b6(rgyud): hU~M b+h+yas nas ni//ma pa 'gro ma yi sgom pa bzlas shrI/badz+ra \u0f7f ta ru ru keD+D+h+ya kin+ti dz+wA le shaM ba ra d+he dz+nyA phaT swAn+ta//s+t+rai d+hIHta ha dz+yod+d+he phaT/oM AHb+had+d+ha b+hU R+Sha
133b7(rgyud): ye /DA ki nAM dz+wA la shaM ba ra hU~M hU~M phaT swA/oM badz+ra bai ratsanI ye ts+yai trA~M wi hU~M hU~M/dpalaM khrag 'thung da/pazhi me'i snying po dang /'i steng b.re/oM badz+re d+h+r-i kar+m+ma
134a1(rgyud): dzaHd+hu rmA/ d+hAd+d+ha /oM /d+ha ra/ma nan+na r+N+Na ya s+yAt+ma//'di ga go//rnam pa yis//bzlas pa dang nA ma
134a2(rgyud): ba b+hu/dus bzhi'i rjes 'bring rim pa yis//dam tshig sdom pa gnyis med pa//mer me lnga yang 'aze' bar bya//rtag tu dur khrod nang du skom//nub bdun du ni ra
134a3(rgyud): ba yis//mi snang dngos grub nges par 'grub//mthong bar byed par yang kun 'gro//sna tshogs gzugs can bde ba che//bza' ba rnams ni bza' bya zhing //sgom gyi
134a4(rgyud): btung ba'ang de bzhin te//phyogs kyi gos tsAH gyis ni//myos shing myos pa lta bur gnas//grib ma yang ni med pa ru//rnal 'byor chen po rnam par spyod//ma hA ru d+hAr
134a5(rgyud): bcas pa yi//dri chen chun mnyam ldan pas//mA~M sa sna tshogs du ma dag/rtse gcig pa yi bza' ba bza'//nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas//rtag tu zhen pas 'gro bar
134a6(rgyud): bya/mnyam par m+b+ha gzhog sbyor ba'i bdag/ye shes mig gi sa mthong ba yi//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las mkhe 'gro ma bzhi'i sbyor ba'i sdom
134a7(rgyud): le'u bcu dgu pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//cho ga bzang po bzhin nang ni//zhol brgyad pa la phyag bcu drug/yang ni zhal ni bcu gnyis te///
134b1(rgyud): phyag ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o//yang na sna tshogs phyugs kyi zhal//phyag ni brgya dang ldan par bya//yang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs//byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo dang //mkha'/
134b2(rgyud): 'gro ma dang gzungs dang ni//pha rol phyin pa'ang de bzhin te//phan tshun bye brag can gyis zhal//mdog gi bye brag sna tshogs dang //phyag ni stong dang 'bum gyi bar//sna
134b3(rgyud): tshogs phyag mtshan 'dzin pa dang //sna tshogs pa yi zhal ldan pa//sna tshogs pa yi gar mdzad cing //g.yas bcing ba yi g.yengs pas bzhugs//'jigs byed chen
134b4(rgyud): po dang /dus mtshan la sogs pa dang //tshangs pa dang /dbang po dang /nye dbang dang /drag po dang /khyab 'jug dang /kun bged gzho nu dang /kaurti ka dang /nag po chen po
134b5(rgyud): dang /dga' byed dbang phyug dang /gshin rje dang /chu lha dang /ku be ra dang /zla ba dang /nyi ma dang /sna tshogs pa'i bdud dang /bgegs thams cad kha sbub tu zhabs kyis
134b6(rgyud): mnan par bltas te/'jig su rung ba/gzhin rnam par 'gyur ba/drag po mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa/bzhad pa/mi sdug pa/rab tu 'jigs pa/dpa' ba/
134b7(rgyud): sgeg pa/rngam pa/smin pa rnam par g.yo ba/snyems pa/zhi ba/g.yo ba/zhal mi g.yo ba//zhal rnam par gang ngas pa/rnam par rol pa/ljags rnam par
135a1(rgyud): ldan/spyod pa/snatshogs pa'i nyams kyis mchog gtor bAr mdzad pa'o//thod pa'i phreng ba dang /zla ba phyed dang / tshogs rdo rjes dbul mnan//sangs rgyas lnga
135a2(rgyud): yi cod pan can//rdo rje sems dpa'i spyi gtsug rgyun//spyan gsum stag gis lpags pa banabs//mgo rlon phreng bas sku lus rgyan//phyag rgya drug po sku la rdzogs//phreng
135a3(rgyud): ba'i rgyan gyis spud mdzad pa'o//sku laM phug mos 'khril mdzad cing //phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba//phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa//dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags
135a4(rgyud): can//thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyun can te//rdo rje bsdigs mdzub thod pas 'khyud//byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khyud//dga' bas khyab cing rnam par myos//rdo rje dril
135a5(rgyud): bus mnyam par ldan//lha mo'i ku tsi 'tshir ba dang //thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin//glang po'i lpags pa brkyang ba ste//lcags kyu zhags pa dgra sta dang //mdung rtse gsum pa
135a6(rgyud): mgro bo nyid//cang te'u dang ni gri gug dang //mda' dang gzhu yang de bzhin te//thod pa'i dbyig tho mdung thung dang //bsdigs mdzub dang ni gtum shing dang //'khor lo ra
135a7(rgyud): gri rin chen dang //pad+ma sna tshogs rdo rje dang /dbyug to yu ba rdo rje can//ga da mdung dang pa Ti s+ya//gshin rje dbyig tho chu gri dang //dung dang ru dung pa Ta he//pi bang gling bu
135b1(rgyud): dza//rnga rnga mtshon ma phyag mtshan bsnams//ts+tsho ma nu bar bltas nas//sgra tshogs phyug mtshan sna tshogs 'jung //dri srid phyug 'bum kyi bar//b+hag r+b+ha sna tshogs de bzhin/
135b2(rgyud): te/cho ga sna tshogs de bzhi no//mkha' gro ma sogs 'khor rnams dang //dpa' bo dag ni thams cad dang //rnal 'byor ma ni sna tshogs dang /mdog ni mtha' yas sna tshogs
135b3(rgyud): mdog/phyag mtshan sna tshogs 'dzin pa yin//phyogs kyi gos 'chang skra grol zhing //sna tshogs nyams kyis bde ba can//'jigs rung drag po ha ha bshad//sna tshogs
135b4(rgyud): gur gyi longs spyod cing //glu dang rol mo nyams de bzhin//sna tshogs dam tshig zas rnams dang //me tog sna tshogs yid 'ong ba//dri dang bdug pa de bzhin gos//mar me
135b5(rgyud): phreng ba yid 'ong ba//phun sum tshogs pa'i mchod pa rnams//mdog ni sna tshogs mchog dam pa//'di ltar sngags pas bsgoms nas ni//rnal 'byor mchog gis rdzogs
135b6(rgyud): byas nas//der ni phreng ba sngags kyang bzlas//yi ge nyi shu gnyis bsres nas//lha mo rdo rje phag mo ni//'di ltar de bzhin bsgom par bya//zhal gdong sna tshogs legs mdzes
135b7(rgyud): po//phyag mtshan sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste//phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba//byang chub pha rol phyin pa ste//sa 'dzin thams cad de bzhi no//'di ltar cho ga byas nas ni//
136a1(rgyud): slong sa nga gas rmA/NASh+TA du//klu gam+b+hak+Shas rba/spyu!/\u0f7fm+b+ha sarbA stA /N+DoT+Ta yaN+Do d+b+ha ya/dzAd+ha
136a2(rgyud): g+ne pAT sh+tsa/dat+ta da t+te/btsa pAH/b+hUk+Sha b+hUk+Sh+ma/bo saR+YA d+hI/An+t+ra mA skr-i ng+ge hrI/\u0f7fhrIH/said+d+hi b+hU tAM la kit+tad+d+hedz+nyA gA seH b+hU tar+t+ti m+me tAr+N+Na yaM/A kAD+D+h+ya
136a3(rgyud): kAr+d+ha/d+hI d+hI/dz+r-I d+h+waM/k+ShIts+tsha/d+hU trAM/hrIng+ge/d+hUd+h+waM/ka~M la~M ki li/bi wa~M sa~M ma~M/he l-i hi li/d+hi li d+hi ma~M/hu~MhU~M phaT/d+h+r-i ka~M nAM dz+wA la sau bai hu~M d+hu phaT swAhU~M/'di na snying po mchog yin
136a4(rgyud): las rnams thams cad byed pa dag/dpa' bos sa bon rang ming dang //rnal 'byor mo ba t+taMg bzlas na//mya lus lus pa med 'brung hU~M/'gyu ba'i gnasu 'gro ra
136a5(rgyud): byed//dus ni de ma thAg+ha d+ha stong+ge/m+b+ha bA man+do ga ni grub pa yin//rdo rje theg mo'i gsang sngags 'di//'dod de'i bde ba thams cad stso/oM badz+rA bAn+ta Ni/pra t+ye
136a6(rgyud): tog/tan d+ha nAM/prASh+TaM/kri ki Ni kai kI Ni/Shi ShI Ni khri lAn+ti/d+hunad+d+he nA~M/badz+ra tas+t+waM/sho Sha ya sho Sha ma/khan+d+ha ga ke pA la d+hA ri Ni/ma hA pi shwe te/nA snA sha nIm+b+ha n+da
136a7(rgyud): Sha a tA dz+nyA skr-iSh+Ta/sin+ni d+h+ya na ra si ra mA lA brin+na tat+tA ra~MH/s+'um+b+ha ni sum+b+ha/ha na ta na prAt+tA/sarba b+hA ba satwA na~M/sarba pa shrI nAM/ma hAm+b+ha sats+tshe da ni/kr-i d+ha r+m+mar+N+Ne /
136b1(rgyud): kAr+m+ma dz+nyAn+ta mA d+g+ham+b+hate/ts+tshin+tukad+ho /sa pra ma gyi'o//sanas shem/saHrbaT+TaH/kA tA swAHs+'u wAnAn+ta/d+ham+be sa/d+hAwAn+ma k+Sh+mad-ikA nadz+nyAn shAn+ti
136b2(rgyud): san/ma l-i t+taM/m+b+hi b+h+yAM kAk+thad+huH/rbasa?/ts+tshan+mat+mAnra/s+yAR+sham+b+ha r+ra/ga ni zi ta/dI//
136b3(rgyud): hU~Ms b+hI ra hA d+hA tet+tAn+nad+h+we/trai lo kya bau nA sha/ta s+'uhAsl-i kau r+m+ma ga tA pa r-id+hArIt+naHd+h+waM y+YA/saitwAr+yA ba~M khA/gA dzan+tu lok+ShA ud ro/s+yAm+b+ha dram+b+ha khaM la gras
136b4(rgyud): huM hUM phaT/b+hU rad+h+r-it+ti ts+yai hUM twet+ta mat+tab+h+rU~M shu mo d+hA ni/yok+Sha~M shA rIt+l-i nA kin+tI sar+b+ba lok+Shan+te/ nI/s+yAt+kAts+tshab+h+rU~M phaT/b+hU twAdz+nyA sa naM/sed+d+hi b+h+r-i ra ba rarA mye sid+d+ha ya~M g+h+raM
136b5(rgyud): phaT/hu~MhUM phaT swAhA/rdo rje phag mo'i rtsa ba'i sngags//'di ni rdo rje phag mo mchog/snying po mchog tu grub pa yin//gang gis bzlas dang skom pa yi//de yis las
136b6(rgyud): rnams kun g+hab ste/ma med par myod la 'grub//bdag nyid gnas mchod pa ste//phyi rol nam phyung ma yin//sgrub pa'i khrag 'thung de nyid kyi gsang stegs
136b7(rgyud): brgyad ldan po//oM na mo b+ha ga ba te bI ri shA ya hu~M hUM phaT/oM ma hA kam+mAk+Sh+mI si ni b+h+rU~M ya ts+yai hUM phaT/oM dza nA ma ku Tod+g+ha nA ya hu~M hUM phaT/oM dr-iSh+Ta ka rA la~M pra b+hI Sha na nu
137a1(rgyud): khA ya ts+ya hwA phaH/oM sahA swa b+hu dza b+hA surA ya huM hUM phaT/oM pa ra shu pA shrod+ha tA sh+tsA la khan+taM gar+b+ha rIHtuMtrUM Ta/oM byA b+hU dzaM n+nam+bA ra d+hA ra ya hut+tA drAn+ta/
137a2(rgyud): oM ma hA d+hu mAn+ta kA ra ba puShA ya huM hUM phaT/'di ni khrag 'thung gi gsang sngags te//bdag nyid bsgom zhing mchod par bya//oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/badz+ra bA ra ti ba huM hUM phaT/oM
137a3(rgyud): Ar+yA pa ra dza tai tr-i lok+Sha mA te bid+yA shwa ri huM hUM phaT/oM badz+ra sarba b+hU ta b+ha ya ba he ma hA badz+re huM hUM phaT/oM badz+ra A sa ne a pa rA dzaM te bA sh+yaM ka ri na tA b+hU ma Ni huM hUM phaT/oM shaM Sha Ni ro Sha Ni krod+hamA/
137a4(rgyud): rA li ni huM hUM phaT/oM san+d+hi sa ni mA ra Ni su pra b+he da ni pa rA dza~M ye huM hUM phaT/oM bi dzaM ye dza~M d+ha ni staM b+ha ni/me ha ni huM hUM phaT/oM badz+ra bA ra hi/ma hA yo gi nAM kA me shwa ri kha ge huM
137a5(rgyud): hUM phaT/na maHni thams cad du bya'o//gsang sngags 'di yis las kun bya//A li ka li rdo rje ni//phag mo re bdag nyid sgom byas na//rtsa ba brgyad kyi sngags ldan pas//
137a6(rgyud): bdag nyid kyang ni mchod par bya//zhal bzhi byin rlabs byas nasu//oM suM b+ha ni sum b+has mchod//yang na zhal bzhi kun rdo rje//de yi lte bar ha ru dpal//bdag nyid
137a7(rgyud): sgom pa byas na no//'khor dang bcas pa'ang de bzhin sgom//ba sha la sogs bza' zhing sgrub//bde gshegs bstan la 'gro ba 'dug/skye ba can ni ba shar grags//
137b1(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor 'phrog dang //mtshams med pa ni byed pa dang //gang zhig slob dpon smod pa dang //theg pa chen po smod pa dang //phyugs de rnams ni bsrad nas//
137b2(rgyud): kyang //rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig bza'//phyugs de rnams ni dgug pa yang //sgrub pas sngon du bskyed pas bya//phyugs bdun dang ni de bzhin phyugs//bong bu mi dang
137b3(rgyud): ru sbal dang //khyi dang rnga mo ce spyang rta//phyugs kyi mar me 'di rnams ni//sgrub pa'i dbye ba'i yan lago grags//rigs kyi kha dog dbye ba'i phyugs//rkang bzhi rnams la
137b4(rgyud): glang po che//bya rnams las ni dong sbyar te//dud 'gro rnams las mchu g.ye ba'i//lha rnams kha ru lha bshes te//'di ni phyugs kyi brtag par bshad//grub pa'i sgrub pa
137b5(rgyud): rnam bshad po//bya rog bya skya lce spyang dang //skye gnyis dang sngags chen po dang //krung krung bzhad dang kang bu ka/bza' dang sbyin bsregs gtor ma bya//dngos grub 'dod//
137b6(rgyud): pas bsgom bya ba//khyi mo nog mo'i 'o ma dang /sran ma nag po 'bras dang ldan//ro yi khar ni sbyin bsreg bya//sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad par bya//de nas ro de langs
137b7(rgyud): nas ni//ci bgyi zhes ni smra 'gyur zhing //sa 'og 'gro ba 'am ral gri 'am//tshar gcod phan 'odogs nyid dang ni//ril bu mig sman gser rnams sam//rkang
138a1(rgyud): /mgyogs dag gam btsud kyis 'on//gcig cig sbyin par nAs no//'gro bar shA m+WAr TIgazhan du min//stong dang 'og tu bo nya 'brug/rlung
138a2(rgyud): 'dir the tshom med pa yin//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las rnal 'byor gyi sdom pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/
138a3(rgyud): smad dang phyir bzlog rIm pa ni//rgyud gzhan las ni skyes pa yin//srung ba'i mchog ni rnyed dka' ba//rgyud 'dir rab tu bshad par bya//des brjod rgyud ni thA nA'i blo//
138a4(rgyud): the tshom bza' bar mi bya ste//sems can rjesu srung ba'i phyir//pad+ma mdab brgyad bri bar bya//pad+ma'i lte ba gaM sar can//de rgyab sna tshogs rdo rje ste//gnod mdzes
138a5(rgyud): gsang sngags yang dag sbyar//de yi phyi rol ska rags can//mdab ma bcu drug bri bar bya//der ni tshe rnams rnam bkod de//de yis phyi rol yongasu bskor//mkhas
138a6(rgyud): pas lte bar bri ba ni//rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa//de yi lte bar dgod pa ni//hUM nau 'jigs pa rnam 'jigs pa//hUM gi lte bar yi ge bAM//br-i nI lte ba yi ge
138a7(rgyud): gsum//bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel zhing gri//mkha'agro mo ni bzhi po dag/de yi g.yon nas dgad bskor ga/d+hI mAM kha~M d+h+r-i da~M ru dgod//r-i dz+dza mi l-I wAn cig tu
138b1(rgyud): mkha' gro dgod cing ming dang ni//rnam par spel zhing byi bar bya//thugs kyi 'khor lo'i rim pa ji bzhin//mkhas pas mdab mar dgod bya ba//khaM br-i shar gyi mdab mA la//byang
138b2(rgyud): du kaM tsA nyid yin te//nub tu kaM pAM kho na'o//lho ru baM maM nyid yino//me sogs dbang ldan phyogs rnamasu//su baM i khaM baM laM baM hr-i//'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis//yi ge
138b3(rgyud): hUM dang spel nas//sa bon dag ni bri bar bya//kaM khaM gaM g+haM /tsa tshwa dzaM/'di dag ni pad+ma'i ske rag su bri'o//rdo rje cha ni bcu gnyis pa//bskor la bin dus rnam par rgyan//
138b4(rgyud): mdabu ma'i phyi rol bcu drug tu//'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa bri//de 'dir shar phyogs lha sogs pa//g.yon nas bskor zhing dgod par bya//mkha' gro dang ni dpa' bo'o///
138b5(rgyud): a ai/bAM mau maM pAM baM suM suM shaM baM suM maM haM piM khaM/maM tsi r-i khaM haM si/aM tsaM haM suM paM maM paM/tsi baM maM/'di ni hri dang spel na su//au dang spel zhing bri bar bya//sgrub pa'i
138b6(rgyud): mi ni nang du bya//ji lta'i las kyi rjes 'brang bri//dz+haiM nyaM TaM rbaM NaM r+d+har+m+mA za hUMm/phyi rol tu smra rags bri'o//'khor lo'i phyi rol grub bzhi pa'i//nang du sgo ma
138b7(rgyud): 'brel bar br-i//ji ltar khwa gdong la sogs rim pa'i ba re//gshin rje 'joms sogs sa bon dgod//kaM oM shAM suM/yaM yaM yi ye/yi re le waM shaM ShaM saM haM/sbyar zhing //
139a1(rgyud): /hUM dang phaT dang rnam par spel//ming dang yang ni spel bar bya//sgro yi steng du rtse bzhi pa'i//rdo rje phyed pa bri bar bya//zur rnams ni nyi zla dang //rdo rje/
139a2(rgyud): phyed pa bri bar bya//de steng rkang brgyad kyis brjod pa'i//khro bo brgyad pa'i zhal du blta//phyi rol ske rags dbus dag tu//phyir bzlos 'di dag bri bar bya//na maHsa man+ta kA
139a3(rgyud): ya bak+ShIt+ta badz+re he ru kA nI/oM hU~M badz+rI he ru ka tsakrA brti sarba lo ki ka lo kot+ta rA Ni/yan+t+ra man+ta tan+t+ra tsur+N+Na pra yo ga d+hi n+ti l+yA na ke na tsit+tan tan+ta sarba ni A kaD+D+h+ya A kan+ti/
139a4(rgyud): tardza yai tardza ya/gr-ih+NA gr-ih+Na/b+hak+Sho yi b+hak+Sha ye/tA sa ya trA swa ya/ha na ha naM/da ha daM ha/pa tsaM ba tsi/k+ShaM k+tAM/dz+nyo dz+nyo/mra tha ma thaM/bi d+h+waM sa ya bI d+hA saM ya/shaM ta
139a5(rgyud): sa haM sr-i ha nur+N+Na yA D+b+hi mr-i au paT/badz+ri he ru koSh+Ti Sha tsikr-i bar+t+ti tAM s+ye ba mu khaM tsak+ShA ra ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/hUM hUM/a muM kaM s+yai/shAn+ti ku ru/hu hUM phaT/'di yis yongasu bskor
139a6(rgyud): byas nas//k+Sha yI lto ba'i dbusu dgod//yi ge k+Sha yi phyi rol du//tha yis yongasu bskor byas nas//dbyangs kyi mtshan nyid kyis yongs bskor byas nas//
139a7(rgyud): dbyangs kyi mtshan nyid kyis yongs bskor//he ru kar bdag bsgom byas nas//yi ge bdun po'i sngags kyang bzla//oM hrIHha ha a mu ka s+yA shAn+tiM ku ru huM hUM phaT/
139b1(rgyud): rigs ngan yang na bram ze 'am//rgyal po'i bu mo'i khyad par du//rang byung me tog blangs nasu//glang chen me tog dang bsres dang //byang chub sems ni mnyam ldan pa//ro tsa na dang
139b2(rgyud): lhan cig sbyar//pad+ma rdo rje chu de bzhin//mig sman chen po dang bsres nas//lha mchog 'khor lo bri bar bya//rdo rje phreng bas rnam par bskor//mi yi lpags pa 'am gro ga 'am/
139b3(rgyud): yang na yi dogs gos kyang rung //bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yi//mar dang 'o ma blangs na su//gsang sngags rkang pa brgyad kyi brjod//de bzhin brtul zhugs can gyis mchod//
139b4(rgyud): gser ram dngul gyi bum pa dag/ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsi chus//gang ba'i dbu su bcug na su//'khor lo srad bu dkar pos dkri//phreng ba'i gsang sngags de la bzla
139b5(rgyud): de nas dbang bskur sbyin par bya//nad yod pa ni nad med byed//nad med pa yang nad du byed//myos byed chang gi dbusu ni//mkhas pas de la bcug nas ni//na medra nad du byed
139b6(rgyud): pa ste/ji lta'i las kyi rjesu 'brang //gang yang rung ba'i las rnams la//phreng ba'i sngags kyis rnam par bskor//rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i 'khor lo ni//mgo bo'i nang du sbas
139b7(rgyud): nas ni//mkha 'gros de la byin rlangs ni//gdon mi za bar byed par gyur//ci 'dod thams cad 'grub 'gyur te//bgegs med pa re ni dngos grub 'gyur//mngon par brjed
140a1(rgyud): pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las srung ba'i phyir bzlog gi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o////de nas de yi sgom pa bshad//sems can kun la/
140a2(rgyud): ngan 'dogs pa'i//skad cig gis ni bdag nyid dag/lha mo phyir bzlog rim pa ste//zhal bzhi pa las phyag bcu drug/gdug pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i//bgegs ni
140a3(rgyud): bad+ma'i 'og mnan nas//g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus na gnas//dkar zhing sde la da mar dang ser//steng gi zhal gyis rnam
140a4(rgyud): bar rgyan//rgyan rnams thams cad yongasu rdzogs//na bza' dkar ba'i rgyan dang ldan//sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can//'chi ba yang dag 'tsho ba'i mchog/spyan
140a5(rgyud): gsum pa la 'dzum pa'i ngag/gzhan ni gtug cing gtum pa la//bsdigs mdzub rdo rje gsor mdzad cing //dril bu zhags pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/rdo rje ral gri mdung
140a6(rgyud): dang ni//dgra sta thod pa lcags kyu dang //gzhu dang kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing //med 'a ni dam pa 'gengs par byed//tho ba 'khor lo mi 'jigs pa//dngos grub thams cad ring
140a7(rgyud): stsol ba'o//yang na 'di la zhal brgyad pa//g.yas dang g.yon pa'i ngos dag ca//galas pa sngo zhing dmar la ser//drag shul ha har bzhad pa'o//g.yon pa ldang
140b1(rgyud): zhing dmar ba dang //dud ka dag gi mdog can yin//steng ni mdzes shing zhi ba ste//sku lus zla ba'i mdog cano//de yi thugs klor 'khor lo ni//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
140b2(rgyud): dbus dag tu//dad pas shan tu mnyam gzhag ste//'chi ba 'tsho ba'i rig sngags bzla//oM a mr-i tA sr-i dzI ba ni//ma hA a mr-i ta su mu khe dzI ba/pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/
140b3(rgyud): sarba badz+ra pad+ma sa ma yo ga mU ya/bo d+he tsit+ta bi thu bi ta mUr+N+Ne huM hUM phaT/A AM/A a swAhA//'di ni khri tsam bzlas byis pas//'chi ba thams cad 'tsho bar byed//
140b4(rgyud): dus min 'chi ba zhi 'gyur zhing //'chi ba las ni nges par slong //gzhan du rnal 'byor mi dgyes nas//rmad du byung bar mdzad pa ni//so so nas ni gang mdzad cing //
140b5(rgyud): hi ha ngag gis dga' ba dang //ho ho dag gi dgyes pa dang //he he dag gis chog tu smra//huM huM dag gis rdzogs pa'o//huM huM dag ni bsam gtano//phaT phaT dag gis gsod
140b6(rgyud): ba dang //huM hUM dag gi phur bu'o//dzaHdzaHdag gis legs par drongs//sa sra dag ni bAdwen+ma par byed//nges par leg so zhes b+hi sgrug/tuM bye dag ni gsod pa'o//hUM b+h+rUM hUM b+hU hUM hUM dag ni thal
140b7(rgyud): bar klog pa'o//ha ha dag gis gsal bar byed pa'o//b+huM b+h+r-i dag ni gzi byin byed//d+hI d+h+waM dag gis legs par dongs//t+yaM t+yaM dag ni mchod pa'o//so so dag gis
141a1(rgyud): dngos grung thar sa cad kyi 'bras bu ster nga'o//ti ti dag ni rmongs pa'o//le laM dag ni shis pa'o//de de dag ni 'dzin pa'o//dza dzAM dag ni legs par drong /
141a2(rgyud): huM hUM dag ni 'khor ba'o//hri tri dag ni gsod pa'o//dz+nyA dz+nye dag rmugs ngur mdzad pa'o//ho ho mdzad pa rdzasu chags par bya'o//haM hUM dag ni srung ba'o//ho hU~M dag ni dgyes
141a3(rgyud): de'o//TaM TaM dag ni gdug pa'o//b+h+rUM b+h+rUM dag ni me tog go//gi gaM ni dri'o//raM re ni gsang ba'o//'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis//zhi ba la sogs cho ga yi//rim pa 'di
141a4(rgyud): larje su gnas//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud b+h+ra mA'i bla mA lAs 'chi ba slong bar byed pa'i las thams cad byed pa sgom pa bstan pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//
141a5(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//sngags kyi de nyid cho ga'i rim//rdo rje snying pos bshad pa ste//gsang ba kun gyi mchog tu bshad//rnal 'byor ma yi bde ba mchog
141a6(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud pa'i rim//gsung zhing gsang la mchog tu gsung //bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis//bsam gtan sgom pa'i mchog yin te//bdag nyid
141a7(rgyud): he ru kor byas nas//mkha 'gro mas ni yongasu khyab//sku lus dmar po 'jigs pa che//ye shes lnga las nges byung ba//dmar zhing sngol ldang ba dang //ser zhing ni
141b1(rgyud): la steng zhal dkar//spyan gsum pa la phyag bcu gnyis//g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs//'jigs byed che dang dus mtshan dag/skyabasu 'ongs nas zhabs 'og
141b2(rgyud): gnon//phyag rgya drug dang zla ba phyed//sna tshogs rdo rje ral pa 'chang //glang po'i lpags pa po su banabs//rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan//rol gri mdung ni 'jigs pa'i
141b3(rgyud): mchog/thod pa dngo na kha T+wAM 'dzin//zhags pa lcags kyu 'chang ba'i mchog/cang te'u 'tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang //mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan//thod pa'i phreng
141b4(rgyud): ba'i dbu rgyan can//sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam pare rgyan//de mdun rdo rje phag mo nI//de yi mdog dang phyag mtshan 'dzin//zhags pa lcags kyu 'chang ba'i mchog/cang
141b5(rgyud): te'u tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang //mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan//byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khrol//gnyis med sbyor ba mnyam ldan pa//phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par
141b6(rgyud): rgyan//k+Sha yi ye shes las byung ba//de yi sku dang zhal phyag mtshan//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//ye shes sems dpa' rnam par sgom//bcu gnyis cha
141b7(rgyud): las nges 'byung ba//dam tshig sems dpa' bde ba che//thams cad mkhyen pa nges 'byung ba//sngags kyi rgyud ni 'di ru bzla//oM shrI badz+ra he hi ru ru ki/oM A/i
142a1(rgyud): I/u U/e ai/uM aHDA ki nI dzA la saM ba ra huM hUM phaT swAhA//oM a A aM aHhuM hUM phaT/snying po dang /nye ba'i snying po'o//oM badz+ra ba ra hi/
142a2(rgyud): a A/i I/u U/ai ai/o au/aM aHhuM hUM phaT swA hA/oM badz+ra bai ro tsa nI ye a A/aM AHhuM hUM phaT swAt+ma/lha mo'i snying po dang /nye ba'i snying po'o///
142a3(rgyud): oM DA kA nI ri huM hUM phaT/oM lA rA huM hUM phaT/oM khaN+Da ra~M he l-i tsuM hUM phaT/oM rU pi NI yai l-I huM hUM phaT/oM khyAN+Da kaM pa la~M ka~M huM hU~M phaT/oM praM huM hUM phaT/oM ke kA la
142a4(rgyud): kha~M hu~M hUM phaT/oM tsa~M huM hU~M phaT/oM ma hA kau kA l+yA kaM huM hUM phaT/oM praM hU~M phuT/oM bi ki TA daMSh+Ti NA g+haM hUM phaT/oM mAM hUM phaT/oM su r-I bai ra Ni daM dzi huM hUM phaT/oM bI hUM phaT/
