142a6(rgyud): oM badz+ra dza Te laM haM hU~M phaT/oM maM hU~M phaT/oM ma hA b+h+r-i r-i TaM hu~M hUM phaT/oM baM hu~M phaT/oM badz+ra hUM kA ra dza~M hU~M phaT/oM suM hUM phaT/oM su b+ha dra DaM hUM phaT/oM Sh+TaM hUM phaT/
142a7(rgyud): oM badz+ra b+ha dra D+haM hUM phaT/oM suM hUM phaT/oM ma hA b+hai ra ba Ne hUM phaT/oM haM hUM phaT/oM bi ru bA kA taM hUM phaT/oM khaM hUM phaT/oM ma hA baM la thaM hU~M phaT/oM tse hu~M hUM phaT/
142b1(rgyud): dud d+hA / d+hA d+hAn za d+ha d+haswA/k+Sha k+Shag gan+d+hats+tshat+yA yA/ma m+b+ha / d+g+ha g+sa/ suts+tsha na/ na
142b2(rgyud): s+yA Ta/A~M mr-i d+h+ya phaT/oM bA ra tsan d+h+r-its+tsha \u0f7f/e shrI d+b+ha paH/oMbyAdz+nyA saHd+hId+hA pat+l-i oM b-id+d+he ban+d+ha/mA~M mA t+ma sa/oM rahU~M phaT/ mi hU~M phaT/oM da d+h+ra dz+dza/
142b3(rgyud): hUM phaT/oMSh+Ta hU~M phaT/A~M su~M hU~M phaT/oM ts+tsha hU~M phaT/'di dag ni dpa' bo dang //rnal 'byi mya'i 'khor gyi snying po'i gseng sngags gsang ba'i mchog tu gyur pa/de nyid smras
142b4(rgyud): de 'khor lo ga ma gyi yin te/thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dmar//mkha' gro mo ni sngon po ste//rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan//'jigs byed chen po gzhin num /
142b5(rgyud): ge klung gis khyi dad chen po//gsung gi 'khor lo da 'bro k+Shar//ma 'bru ma ni dmar ba s+t+wa~M/dat+l-i dr-i'i bya mnyam par ldan//'dod chags kyis khyu rje
142b6(rgyud): sgra yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo ser//m-ing 'gro ma dkar me yaM mdog/gti mug gis khyab bde ba che//mi khe 'gro mA sogs lha mo rnams//sgra tshogs mdog can sted chen
142b7(rgyud): kho gdang la sogs lha mo rnams//dmar sor dkar la ljang gu'o//gshin rje sreg sogs lha mo rnams//sngo zhing ser l-i ldang ba dang //de bzhin dkar ba'i mdog can//
143a1(rgyud): 'khor la sogs pa thams cad kun//spyan gsum g.yas brkyang zhangs kyis bzhugs//dpa' bo stag gi lpags ban bsdu shing //lha mo thams cad
143a2(rgyud): gcer bu ste/skra gral ba ni rnam par mdzes//byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril//dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rigs can//thams cad thod pa'i phreng ba 'chang //phyag rgya lnga
143a3(rgyud): yis rnam par rgyan//thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing //dpa' bo dang ni lha mo rnams//thod pa rdo rje pad+ma dang //'khor lo yang ni de bzhin//mkha' gro ma sogs khri gdong dang //
143a4(rgyud): gshin rje sreg sogs lha mo rnams//thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin//me long dri dang ro dang reg/gos mchog yid du 'ong ba dang //cang ta'u dang ni dril bu 'dzin//mkha' gro
143a5(rgyud): ma ni thod pa dang //khra T+wAM ga yang 'dzin mdzad cing //dril bu cang te'u bri bug bsnams//kha gdong la sogs lha mo rnams//phyag mtshan 'di yis rab tu brtag/thams
143a6(rgyud): cad yi dgas gdan la bzhugs//phyogs kyi gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/thugs kyi 'khor lo drag po ste//gsung gi 'khor lo bskyod pa'i zhal//sku yi 'khor lo
143a7(rgyud): zhi ba ste//mkha'agro ma ni bzhin rnam sgyur//ji ltar 'dod bzhin bsgoms nas ni//dbus kyi gtso bor rnam par brtag/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'am
143b1(rgyud): khro bo sna chags du ma 'am//kha cig de bzhin gshegs la 'am//ma mo rigs kyi khyad par dang //'od zer can nam bskul byed ma//shes rab pha rol phyin de bzhin/
143b2(rgyud): gang dang gang dag sgom pa ni//yid kyi dbang po sbyor ba dag/de yis dregs par byas pa ni//sna tshogs gzugs can rin chen bzhin//yang na rdo rje sems dpa' ni//
143b3(rgyud): sna tshogs gzugs kyis 'gro bar gnas//thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad mdzad//bde ba chen pos kun khyab yin//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma
143b4(rgyud): las rnal 'byor ma'i gsang ba'i dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi sgom pa bstan pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//mkha'
143b5(rgyud): 'gro rigs kyi cho ga'i rim//sna tshogs du ma'i rigasu bshad//mdor bsdus na ni gsum dang ldan//drug tu yang ni rab tu grags//rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i bla ma ste/
143b6(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma 'khor la sogs kun//khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa//rigs las yang dag 'byung ba yin//sku kun so sor 'byung ba ste//gzhan du thams
143b7(rgyud): cad ma me'i rigs//dga' zhing dgyes la yid 'ong ba//yid las skye zhing 'byung ba yin//bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i rigs kyi bdag pos
144a1(rgyud): de kho na nyid kyis gsang ba'i snying po'i sa bon 'di bshad cing bstan pa/hUM pru ya~M hri kha bo//de nas sngags chen bshad pa yis//sangs rgyas kun
144a2(rgyud): gyi skyes po rnams//rab tu g.yo zhing brgyal nas kyang //rdo rje ye shes rje su dran//mi 'khrugs pa dang rtag pa'i rigs//rdo rje nyi ma de bzhin te//'od dpag med
144a3(rgyud): dang don yod grub//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che//'di ltar sangs rgyas sku lus kyang //rdo rje mkha' 'gro rab tu grags//thog mar rdo rje mkha' gro ste//gnyis pa
144a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas mkha' gro yin//gsum pa rin chen mkha' gro ste//bzhi pa pad+ma'i mkha' gro yin//lnga pa sna tshogs mkha' gro ste//drug pa rdo rje sems dpa' yin//
144a5(rgyud): lnga po he ru kAr shes bya//rdo rje dpa' bo yang de nyid//na mkha'i zas kyis longs spyod cing //zla ba'i zas kyi longs kyang spyad//sprul pa'i longs spyod na mkha' ste//
144a6(rgyud): pad+ma'i zas kyi long spyod sprul pa ste//sna tshogs long spyod sprul pa ste//sna tshogs rigs kyi mchog dam pa//mkha' mnyam dri med rnam par dag/gangs kyi rang bzhin lta
144a7(rgyud): bur bsil//dag po'i mdog can mtshig gi mdog/zla ba'i zer dang 'dra ba'i mchog/spyan gsum skal pa sna tshogs bzang //sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs//
144b1(rgyud): zla ba nyi ma'i dbus na gnas//rdo rje sgrol mo krung du bzhugs//thams cad ral pa rba nAHna//thod pa'i phreng ba'ang de bzhin te//phyag rgyu drug ni thams cad r+tha//rang ga/
144b2(rgyud): dan la legs par bzhugs//glang po song ge rta dang ni//rma bya dang ni na mkha' lding //de yi steng du yi dgas padan//bsgoms na dngos grub rab tu stso la//rdo rje lag gis sa la
144b3(rgyud): reg/rdo rje dril bu dkur brtan cing //zhal gyi mchu ni rnam par bsgyur//'khor lo dril bu 'gying dang bcas//rin chen dril bu'ang de bzhin te//pad+ma'i dril bu'i rim pa
144b4(rgyud): dang //dril bu sna tshogs rdo rje nyid//thams cad snyoms par rnam bsgoms te//rigs kyi rdo rje mchog dam pa//dkyil 'khor drug ni bri bar bya//sgo bzhi dang ni yang
144b5(rgyud): ngag ldan//rdo rje 'khor los bskor ba ste//rin chen pad+mas de bzhin bskor//sna tshogs rdo rjes bskor ba ste//dbusu rdo rjes bskor bar bya//phyi rol dkyil 'khor bri
144b6(rgyud): bar ni//khang pa brtsegs pa yid 'ong mchog/rigs drug dag ni rnam par dgod//der ni gnas sogs rim pa dgod//dkyil 'khor dbusu dgod pa ni//rdo rje
144b7(rgyud): sems dpa' bde ba che//de yi shar phyogs kyi sgo la//pul+lI ra ma la ya mthod pa'i dum bu dang //rab gtum ma'o//byang du dzA lan+d+ha ra nA king rus chen po dang /
145a1(rgyud): gtum mig ma'o//nub tu ur+yAn na keng rus can dang /'od ldan ma'o//lho ru ar bu da na mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang /sna tshon ma/
145a2(rgyud): ste dbus ni sa dang po rab tu dga' ba ste/dpa' bo sku mdog nag po//mkha' 'gro ma thal ba dang /sprin gyi mdog can/dpa' ba ni rdo rje dang /rdo rje dril bu dang /
145a3(rgyud): mkha' gro ma ni thod pa dang /rdo rje bsdigs mdzubo//rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor dbusu bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro bde ba chen po'o//shar
145a4(rgyud): phyogs kyi sgor go da ba ri na lha dgra dang /dpa' ba'i blo can ma'o//byung du me shwa ra na 'od dpakra med dang /mi'u thung me'o//nub du di b+hi kau Ta na rdo rje 'od dang /lang ka'i dbang
145a5(rgyud): phyug ma'o//lho ru mA la ba na rdo rje sku dang shing grib ma'o//dpa' bo'i sku lus dkar po//mkha 'gro ma ni ser po'o//dri ma med pa'i sa na dbus ma ste/sangs rgyas mkha'
145a6(rgyud): 'gro ma'o//'od byed pa'i sa'i debus na rin tshan mkha 'gro ste/shar gyi sgo ru kA ma r+yA pa ni myug gu can dang sa srung ma'o//byang du o dran rdo rje ral paM can dang /
145a7(rgyud): 'jigs byed chen mo'o//nub tu tri sha ku ni na dpa' bo chen po dang /rlung gi shugs can ma'o//lho ru ko sa la na rdo rje hUM mdzad dang /chang 'thung ma sti dpa' bo ser po//
145b1(rgyud): mkha' gro ma ljang ku'o//'od 'gro ba'i sa'i dbu su pad+ma'i mkha' gro//de'i shar phyogs kyi sgor ka ling ga nA rab bzang dang /sngo bsangs lha mo'o//byang du la bA ka na rdo rje bzang
145b2(rgyud): dang /rab bzeng mo'o//nung du kaM tsi na 'jigs byed chen po dang /rta rna ma'o//lho ru hi ma la ya na mig mi bzang dang bya gdong ma ste/dpa' bo dmar po//mkha'agro ma ni
145b3(rgyud): dkar mo'o//sbyang dka' byi'i dbusu rdo rje mkha'agro/de'i shar gyi sgor pre ta pu ri na stobs po che dang /'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o//byang du gr-i ha de ba tA na rdo rje rin chen dang
145b4(rgyud): dum skyes ma'o//nub tu sau rUSh+Ta na rta mgrin dang chang 'tshong ma'o//lho ru su bar+Na dwI pa na/na mkha'i snying po dang /'khor lo'i go cha ma'o//dpa' bo nag po//mkha 'gro ma
145b5(rgyud): srar mi'o//mngon du gyur pa'i sa' dbusu sna tshogs mkha 'gro/de'i shar phyogs kyi sbyor na ga ran he ru ka dang /rab dpa' mo'o//byang du sin d+hu na pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang /
145b6(rgyud): stobs chen ma'o//nub tu ma ru ta na rnam par snang mdzad dang /'khor los bsgyur ma'o//lho ru ku l+yA tA na rdo rje sems dpa' dang /bairtson chen mo ste/dpa' bo ni sna
145b7(rgyud): chags kyi mdog can la/mkha' gro ma dud pa'i mdog cano//dkyil 'khor de yi phyi rol tu//yi dgas phreng bas yongasu bskor//de yi phyi rol kun rdo rje//zur
146a1(rgyud): mang 'gro ma yang bri//mkha' ma dang ldu ma dang //dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma//thod pa bzhi ni mtsham su bri//dbus kyi dkyil 'khor mtshamasu na/
146a2(rgyud): ring du song ba mkha' gro mA//lA ma mi g.yo ba yis//legs pa'i blo gros du ma skyes ma//gzugs can ma ni chos kyi sprin//sngo zhing ser la ldang ba dang //bzhi pa
146a3(rgyud): dmar ba'i mdog cen yin//khe gdong la sogs mkha' gro ma//sna tshogs mdog can yid 'phrog ma//gshin rje sreg srogs mkha' 'gro ma//phyed ni bud med dbang phyug
146a4(rgyud): zhal//dpa' bo thams cad g.yas brkyang gnas//phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan//stag gi lpags pa go su banabs//mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan//phyogs kyi
146a5(rgyud): gos 'chang skra grol bA//yid 'ong mkho 'gre mA yi rigs//thams cad yi dgas stong du bzhugs//dkyil 'khor mchog ni rnam par bsgoms//pad+ma l-i gnas
146a6(rgyud): 'khor lo ni//dkyil 'khor sdom pa'i mchog yino//thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin//cang te'u ni phyag g.yas na//'di ltar mkha' gro ma yi gzugs//phyag mtshan dag
146a7(rgyud): gis rnam par rgyan//khwa gdong li sogs mkha' gro ma//lcags kyu zhags pa la sogs mtshan//g.yon par kha T+wAM g.yas par ni//ji srid zhags pa lcags sgrog
146b1(rgyud): //rlol nu yadun du gan+do//gakon rje srog stsogs mdu 'gro ma//ma long dngan po byang dang //dri dang rlan gams bA na//g.yon pa zad pa kha thA ga/dngos grub thams nad pa
146b2(rgyud): stsol ba'o//rang gi rigs kyi dbu rgyan can//thod pa'i steng na yang dag gnas//'khor lo sa so re bsgoms nas ni//'khor dang bcas pas yongasu khyab//ye shes sems
146b3(rgyud): dpa' thugs khar blta//rnal 'byor kun gyi sbyor ba yis//ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas//bsgoms pas thim par byas nasu//sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes kyis//dbang
146b4(rgyud): skur nas ni rim par ste/oM AHba~M hU~M/'od dag ji lta'i rim pa yis//srog dang rtsol ba rimA pas bya//mnyam par spros nas dbang bsgyur byin//dzA ltar rim pa'i sbyor ba
146b5(rgyud): yis//dogs pa med parar+ya bzlas bsgrim gyi//dzaM skar gas d+ma sngags rjes mthun par//dam tshig can gyis bzlas pa d+ha//nAM b+h+rUM/oM hrI khA ba/oM a \u0f7fn+d+he/
146b6(rgyud): mAny+dzu su khaM badz+nyA sat+kan+ta kin+thir+N+Na lau shaM b+hA rA d+h+waM phaT s+yAM/au smr-i bar+d+ha D+he ka A la la la a ts+tsha kain+d+re dz+nyA la sha dA ra hwA /me shrI rA D+hA kit+taM /
146b7(rgyud): DA ki nAM dzA la saM ba ra hUM phaT sweH/oM shrI bing+ga DA ki d+h+r-i tI ya r+g+haM oM ts+yai DA ki nI rdza la sha pab+h+yAM smInAM/oM shrI badz+rat+taM ke so+oHhUM baT d+h+r-i kai n+t+r-i dz+nyA laM shaM bar d+hu
147a1(rgyud): yA AH/oM sh+mi g+haH DA kanaSho mA dz+nyAHki na dz+ha la saM ba ra hU~M phaT swAH/oM kha~M d+hu phaT/oM br-i hU~M phaT/oM ko hU~M phaT/wa kaHhU~M phaH/so rman
147a2(rgyud): phaT/oM praM hUM phaT/oM baM hU~M phaT/oM maM hUM phaT/oM suM hUM phaT/oM bi hUM phaT/oM AM hUM phaT/oM khaM hUM phaT/oM baM hUM phaT/oM laM hUM phaT/oM baM hUM phaT/oM hUM hUM phaT/
147a3(rgyud): oM aM hUM phaT/oM ai hUM phaT/oM baM hUM phaT/oM maM hUM phaT/oM baM hUM phaT/oM suM hUM phaT/oM shAM hUM phaT/oM baM hUM phaT/oM suM hUM phaT/oM hUM phaT/oM paM hU~M phaT/oM khaM hUM
147a4(rgyud): phaT/oM maM hUM phaT/hU~M tsa hUM phaT/oM raM hUM phaT/oM khaM hUM phaT/oM hUM hUM phaT/oM sha~M hUM phaT/oM oM hUM phaT/oM tsa hUM phaT/oM haM hUM phaT/oM suM hUM phaT/oM baM hUM
147a5(rgyud): phaT/oM maM hUM phaT/oM phruM hUM phaT/oM tsa hUM phaT/oM baM hUM phaT/oM mo hUM phaT/oM NAM hU~M phaT/oM laM hUM phaT/oM khaM hUM phaT/oM hUM hUM phaT/oM kaM hUM phaT/oM U hU~M
147a6(rgyud): phaT/oM shi hUM phaT/oM su~M hUM phaT/oM yai hUM phaT/oM yo hUM phaT/oM ye hUM phaT/oM yaM hUM phaT/'khor la sogs pa thams cad kun//sgom la gnas nas bzlas
147a7(rgyud): pa bya//'khor los bsgyur drug lhan cig tu//mkha 'gro mkha' bro ma bzlas bya//dam tshig chen po'i sbyor ba yis//dam tshig dam tshig mchog gyur pa//gnyis
147b1(rgyud): mo 'khyud pa'i sbyor ba yis//gsang sngags bzlas na dngos grub 'gyur//zla drug nges te gzhan min par//'khor los bsgyur drug dngos grub 'thab//yang na rdo rje sems dpa'
147b2(rgyud): dang //rnam snang rdo rje nyi ma dang //pad+ma gar dbang rgyal po dang //dbang phyug rta mchog he ru ka/gnas sogs pa yi sbyor ba yis//mkhas pas nges par bsgoms nas ni//rim
147b3(rgyud): par sbyor ba'i rim pa dang //brgyud pa'i gnas kyi rim pa dang //rnal 'byor ma yi bka' dag ni//bla ma'i brgyud pas 'thob par 'gyur//gzhan du sngags pa 'khor byed cing //
147b4(rgyud): bka' ni nam yang mthong ma yin//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las rigs drug gi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bka'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o///
147b5(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//rnal 'byor lam ni rnyed dka' ba//rnal 'byor ma yi sbyor snying po//gzhan gyi rnal 'byor rjes mthun par//yi ge las byung gcig car
147b6(rgyud): tshul//gcig car mtshan ma phyag mtshan yin//gcig car rdo rje sems dpa' ste//bde ba chen po bla na med//de ru 'jug cing de yi tshul//gcig car he ru ka dpal
147b7(rgyud): mchog/ston ka'i na mkha' dri med ltar//zar ma'i me tog dang mtshungs pa//phyag brgyad pa la zhal bzhi pa//'jigs shing rab tu 'jigs par mdzad//g.yas
148a1(rgyud): brkyang ba la zhabs kyis bzhugs//spyan gsum rnal 'byor ma yau gaH//zhal gdong g.yon dkar g.yas dmar ste//stor gri zhal ni ser lnga mdzes/
148a2(rgyud): dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can//sangs rgyas lnga yi byin rlabs can//stag gi lpags pa gosu banabs//mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan//'jigs byed dang ni dus
148a3(rgyud): mtshan dag/zhabs kyis pad+mar gnod par bzhugs//rdo rje dril bu mnyam pas mkhyud//phag mo yi ni byin pas 'khril//gnyis med sbyor ba mnyam ldan pas//
148a4(rgyud): dbu skra grol ba phyogs gos can//sku mdog mnyam zhing mtshungs par ldan//dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can//de yi zhal dang phyag mtshan can//rnal 'byor
148a5(rgyud): dngos grub rab tu stsol//thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin//rgyal ba'i lpags pa steng du ste//tho ba mdung ste gzhan du ni//tshangs pa'i mgo bo rgyan pa la//zla ba phyed po zhi ba
148a6(rgyud): 'dzin//sna chags rdo rje dbu la rgyun//phyag rgyu drug gis sgyu la rgyun//rdo rje me chen ma drug gis rgyun//rdo rje phreng ba'i dbu rgyun can//'og pag dag gis sku reg
148a7(rgyud): byas//dpung rgyan rdo rjes mtshan pa ste/sngags po'i gtso bas gsang sngags ni//'di ltar cho ga'i snying po shes//phag mo bde bar gnas pa ni//rgyal ba
148b1(rgyud): lpags pa rnam par spangs//phag mo rnal de'i mtshan sogs las//n+yang te'u gri gug rnams kyis rgyan//bcom ldan 'das ni lto ba'i dbus//pad+ma med pa brgyad yod 'ang
148b2(rgyud): ba//sna tshogs pad+ma mdog mdzes la//thams cad rnam dag mchog dam pa//shar gyi mdab sogs phyogs cha la//mkha' gro ma sogs bzhi po dgod//shar du
148b3(rgyud): mkha'agro ma dgod cing //byang du lA ma de bzhin te//nub tu dum+b+ha skyes ma yin//lho ru gzugs can ma yin te//snga dang ster dang de bzhin dmar//ljang ku dang ni bani
148b4(rgyud): pa'o//zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa//spyan gsum drag po gzi brjid can//skyil mo krung ni phyed par bzhugs//skra grol ba ni yid 'ong ba//phyogs kyi gos cin mgo yi
148b5(rgyud): phreng //phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan//thod pa kha T+wAM gra 'dzin cing //dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang //de bzhin gzhu dang mda' 'dzin cing //rdo rje mdung mchog
148b6(rgyud): lcug na 'dzin//snyems pa'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing //thugs rje chags pas rnam par myos//sngo ba dang ni srer ba dang //ljang ku steng gi zhal dkar po/
148b7(rgyud): ser zhing sngo la ldang ba dang //steng gi zhal gdong drag la dmar//dmar dang sngo dang ldang ba dang //snying gi zhal ni dkar la zhi//ljang dang dmar dang sngo ba dang /
149a1(rgyud): steng gri zhal ni sor po mchog/bdud bzhi po ni zhangs kyis gnon//bcom ldan 'das la gdong gis lta//zur gyi char ni bum pa dang //ye shas
149a2(rgyud): bdud rtsis yongs gang ba//de yi steng du thod ba ni//byang chub 'o mas rab byung ba//phyi rol dam tshig gsum 'khor la//khang pa brtsegs pa legs par mdzes//shar
149a3(rgyud): phyog su ni gau rI ste//byang du de bzhin tsau ri ma//nub tu rab rmongs ma yino//lho ru yang ni ro langs ma//me la lbos byed ma yin te//bden bral du ni gtum mo yin///
149a4(rgyud): rlung phyogs sgre mo nyid yin te//dbang ldan he ru ka ma ste//de bzhin rnal 'byor ma brgyad ni//dkar mo ser la sngo ljang ku//skul byed dmar la sngo ljang ku//rab
149a5(rgyud): rmongs ma ni sngo ser ljang //ro langs ma ni dkar sngo ljang //lbos byed ma ni sna tshogs mdog/dmar dang sngo deng ljang ku'o//gtum mo yang ne ldeng sngo ser//
149a6(rgyud): sgre mo yang nI dud sngo ljang //he ruka ma sngo ljang dam re//'di ltar de dag thams cad kyang //spyan gsum pa le skra grol ba//phyogs kyis gos 'chang gar dang
149a7(rgyud): bcas//yi dgas gdan la legs pa re bzhugs//phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan//kha TI thod pa dril bu dang //tsong te'u zhags pa lcags kyu
149b1(rgyud): thags//rnams cad thod pa'i phreng byas rgyan//mi bskyod pa ye cod pan byas//'di ltar gnas dang nyo gnas kyo//dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol//'di ltar thubs kyi
149b2(rgyud): 'khor lo ni//lha mo dkar mo lce sogs pa//rnal 'byor mA nI rab tu bshod//bsnyen pas bka' drin stsol mdzad do//thogs pa med pa'i 'bras bu 'brug/lha mi mkha'
149b3(rgyud): spyod grub nas ni//mkha' la spyod pa'i bo 'phang rnyed//de yi phyi rol gsung 'khor lo//shar du paM'istangs 'das mA/byang du glid bu'i stangs thabs ma//nub du d+hu rnga che stangs
149b4(rgyud): thobs/lce ru rdza rnga'i stangs thibs te//sngo dang sor dang dmar ljang ku//me sogs rdo rje bzhid ma ste//rdo rje sgeg mo rdo rje glu//rdo rje bar te dmar ba dang //sde dang ser dang /
149b5(rgyud): sdung ku'o//de dag zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa//gcer bu dbu skra grol ba dang //thod pa yi ni phreng ba tsan//sbyin bsum pa la yod 'ong gi/thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin//tshem dam
149b6(rgyud): leg pa'i stangs thabs kyis//rdo rje dril bu stangs thabs can//khrig ma mnyam par byas nas ni//pad+ma bskor ba'i sbyangs thabs can//zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dang ni//chan
149b7(rgyud): dang ni tshan do ha//de dag 'od dpag med dbu rgyan//sku yi 'khor lo'i shar du ni//me tog ma byang bdug pa ma//nub tu mar me wA ru dri//ser dang dud ka dmar dkar gyi/
150a1(rgyud): mo long rI dang reg bya ches//me phyogs la sogs mtshams bzhi ste//zla ba'i mdog tsan+da dmAr ldang dkar//de dag spyan ni gsum pa ste//gcar du
150a2(rgyud): dbu skra grol ba dang //zhabs kyis kun tu bar byed cing //phyag tu mchod pa thogs nas ni//rjod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing //cang ti'u ni phyag ni bsnams//thod pa yi ni phreng
150a3(rgyud): bduni//lha mo de dag 'dus dang //nye ba'i 'dus dur khrod dang //nye ba'i dur khrod dag yin te//rnam par snang mdzad dbu rgyun byas//sgo rnams rdo rje lcags kyu dang /
150a4(rgyud): rdo rje zhags pa rdo rje sgrog/rdo rje dril bu de bzhin to//sngo dang ljang dang dmar dang ser//shar dang byung dang nub dang ni//lho yi phyogs kyang de bzhin//me las sogs
150a5(rgyud): pa'i mtshamasu ni//gshin rje sreg la sogs pa dag/demAr dang sngo dang dud ka ser//thod pa dang ni kha TAM ga/rang gi mtshan ma cang te'u dang //gri gug dang ni mgo bo
150a6(rgyud): 'chang //spyan gsum dbu skra grol ba ste//gcer bu gar gyis gnas pas bzhugs//thams cad phyag rgya lnga yis rgyan//thod pa yi ni phreng ba tsa na//rang gi rigs
150a7(rgyud): kyi cod pan can//ji lta'i rim pas rjesu gnas//de yi snying kar ye shes sems//sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo gsum//gtso bo'i bdag po bsgom par bya//
150b1(rgyud): dkAr dang dmar dang lta ba yod//draba' ba rnal 'byung ma stan cig/dzu lta bu yas brgyams pa na//dzA su dAn+d+han du rnam pa ltas// shos lcags kyu dag gis na//ye shes 'dzang /
150b2(rgyud): bkug nas ni//ji ltar rim pas mchod dbang bskur//gcig tu bsdus to sgrims nas//ji lce'i rim pa bsgoms nasu//ye shes bzlas pa dag kyang bya// bsdu
150b3(rgyud): srog dang rtsol ba yis//'thor 'byung rim pas b+h+yas buM yis//slob dang ni gyos kyi bzlas pa byA//oM AHhUM hUM//'di lta bu yi rim pa yis//grangs med por na b+h+ya sa nA //
150b4(rgyud): ji srid skye bar ma gyur par//gong gi dam tshig 'khor lo ni//mnyam par gzhag te bzlas par bya//dung sbyin+da phreng ba blangs nas ni//sgom pa maN+Dag gi bzlas pa b+h+yo//
150b5(rgyud): hUM/oM shrI badz+ra hi he r+ya rA kA huM hUM phaT/DA kI nI dz+wA la saM ba rA swAhA//oM badz+ra b+hA rA hI hUM hUM phaT/in+d+ra ki nI yai N+ye hUM phaT/oM lA me hUM hUM phaT/oM khaN+Da ro d+hI huM hUM phaT/oM rU
150b6(rgyud): r+t+ti s+t+re ts+tshan+d+ha paH/i ni tsaM hU~M da tr-id+h+waM phaT/au braM maih+nit+sad+b+ha tr-i.au l+r-id+d+ha sang+gesar+b+bad+b+ha /au ts+tshiHd+b+ha phaH/au ts+tsha
150b7(rgyud): phaT/oM he ru ka d+hA hu~M hU~M phaT/i badz+ra bin ts+yai hU~M phaT/oM badz+ra ba sha~M hu~M hU~M phaT/oM badz+ra rmo dag tu d+d+hi pharba oM badz+ra mu~M ra~M rje huM hUM phaT/oM badz+ri hA s+yai tsu hU~M dzaT/ma~M
151a1(rgyud): lA s+yo hu~M hUM phaT/oM badz+ra gI te huM hUM phaT/oM badz+ra n+dats+tshats+tsha hUM phaT/oM badz+ra pun+de hu~M ts+yai phaT/oM badz+ra d+hu p+no hu~M hUM phaT/oM badz+ra dwI ba tu hUM phan+tu/oM badz+ra gar+b+ha/
151a2(rgyud): huM hUM phaT/oM rU pa badz+ra hUM hU~M phaT/oM rA sa badz+rI hu~M hUM phaT/oM s+phar sha badz+rI hu~M hUM phaT/oM d+harma d+he tu badz+rI huM hUM phaT/oM badz+ra aM ku sha dzaHhu~M hUM phaT/oM badz+ra prA
151a3(rgyud): huM hU~M phaT/oM badz+ra s+pho Ta paM hu~M hU~M phaT/oM badz+ra AM bi shA hoHhuM hUM phaT/oM ya~M mA dAr+b+hi ye huM hU~M phaT/oM ya~M mA d+hu tI ye huM hUM phaT/oM ya ma da~MSh+Ti NI ye huM hUM phaT/oM ya ma
151a4(rgyud): ma thA nI yaM huM hUM phaT//dam tshig can gyis tshig dag pas//mos pa'i yid kyis rtag tu bzla//nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas//shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid can//
151a5(rgyud): rang gi thabs dang rigs pa'i lus//gnyisu med par mnyam pa'i bdag/khro bo sprul pa'i tshogs spros pas//'gro ba gsum po bcas par ni//he ru kar ni byas nas kyang //
151a6(rgyud): sa rnams gsum po ma lus par//thams cad der ni bsdus nas kyang //sku glo sung thugs la rnam par gnas//'di ni rnal 'byor cho ga ste//'khor lo sgom pa'i/
151a7(rgyud): bzlas pa'o//rang gi lha ya sbyor ba yis//rgyu dang mi rgyu mthong ba na//dam tshig can nyid langs du su//de bzhin gshegaso pa thams cad dang //dpa' bo dang
151b1(rgyud): ni rnal 'byor ma//ma nga 'gro dang ni mkha' 'gro ma//kun gyis gsol ba gdab par bya//khro bo bde ba'i dgyes pa yi//longs spyod las ni byung ba yi//rab rmongs ma yis bskor
151b2(rgyud): byAs nas//bde ba'i sbyor ba lA zhugs te//ra ma haM na Ta NA su ra A ma hA su hU ba ra dza a~M ni kA ma la su tu/a la la la ho//su ra a ud+d+ha ma ma hUM/ma hA sidz+dza/u ma
151b3(rgyud): dzaM i nI dza la ma ho//A I/A A ra ho//a ru te byi nu su byA ya nA hwA/su ra a ru hu de ti ba ran+ta i ni//dza la su hU bI sA pha na ta rau Na Na pe daM hi me hA su hU ma dz+yA
151b4(rgyud): mu hU mo k+ShA pa lag kha u//tud+d+ha sa hU na i su hUM/bidz+dzi u mo khu su hUM/i na i du/kha la tha oM mo khu su hu/ba su i paM ka u madz+dza ta nu na ba rA/A pa de tri/
151b5(rgyud): b+hu dz+r-i tA nr-i mun+d+ra hA su hA/I le dAR+sha yaM/u ma hU~M/a re b+hI a gi oM praM u ra s+yA/'di yis mgron po bskul nas ni//dkyil 'khor dngos skyob nges pa ste//sbyin cing 'jam
151b6(rgyud): dri'i mgrin bya'i dbyangs//dpyid kyi rgyal po'i glu blangs pas//mkha' gro'i dra ba dri med rnams//gzigs shing las kun mdzad pa yin//rdo rje pad+ma yid 'ong ma//
151b7(rgyud): sbyor bas dngos grub thams cod 'grub//dgyes pa 'di yis bskul na ni//bde ba chen po stsol ba yin//sbyor ba yi ni dus dag tu//rdo rje can gyis rab tu sbyar//thog
152a1(rgyud): ma dbus dang mthar thug par//yi ge brgya pa'i gsang sngags bzla//'khor lo dag ni brtan byas te//dpa' bo dang ni mkha 'gro ma//'di ni kun gyis
152a2(rgyud): gsung sngags te//khro bo sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs//thams cad snying kar brtan byas te//bsgoms pas thams cad brtan par 'gyur//gal te bdag nyid dngos grub
152a3(rgyud): 'dod//dngos grub thams cad gnas pa yin//oM badz+ra he ru ka sa ma ya ma nu pA laM ya badz+ra he ru ka/tretwe no pa tiSh+Tha/dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/su teSh+yo me b+ha ba/a nu rak+to mi
152a4(rgyud): b+ha ba/su bo Sh+yaM me b+ha ba//sar+b+ba sad+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha/sarba karma su tsa me tsit+taM shre yaHku ru hUM/ha ha ha ha ho//badz+ra he ru kA mA me muny+tsa he ru ko b+ha ba/ma hA sa ma
152a5(rgyud): ya satwa AHhUM phaT swAhA//'di ni baicom ldan kun khyab cing //yi ge brgya pa mchog gyur pa//he ru ka mchog rang nyid yin//phyir bzlog pa ni gang yin pa//
152a6(rgyud): bcu drug med pa ma le bkod cing //rje su bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor kun//bdag gis bsgoms shing brtan par bya//rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis//ji ltar bde
152a7(rgyud): bar gnas par bya//rnal 'byor 'di 'dra bsgoms na ni//khams gsum pa yang mthong 'gyur te//bdag nyid dpa' bo'i mtshan nyid de//de ltar srid pa'ang stong
152b1(rgyud): pU yin//bsgoms des bdag nyid yang dag gnas//'dir ni dka' thub bshad pa med//phreng ba mod cing sngags kyang med//gzungs dang sbyin srog las rnams dang //cho ga
152b2(rgyud): rim da'i gzhi yang med//rnal 'byor phyag rgyu byed pa'ang med//g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis rim pa'ang med//rdo rje chen po dngos 'dzin pa//rang byung dngos sgrub kun
152b3(rgyud): mdzad pa//'gog pa nyid kyang mdzad pa myed//bdag nyid bdag gis mchod par bya//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang ba ni//lte ba'i dbus rnam par sgom//yi gi gnas
152b4(rgyud): kyi mchog gyur pa//g+ha yi gzugasu sgom pa ni//de yi dbus rnam par bsam//sku gsung thugs ni 'dus pa can//de yi lus las 'das gyurate/sems kyi
152b5(rgyud): dngos kyang btsal du med//chags pa med cing chags bral med//chags bral dang ni ldan gyur pa//snying gi pad+ma'i dbus ni//brtags pas legs par rnyed pa
152b6(rgyud): ni//yid kyis da bsngos byas pa ste//rnal 'byor ma kun bud med yin//phyag rgya mchog tu bshad pa'o//zla ba'i steng du brgya byed rgyan//ye shes sems
152b7(rgyud): ni bsam pa ni//mchog ste spyod par bya ba med//bla ma'i men ngag lem dang no//sems ni mchog tu'ang yis//'di ltar zho zil gnas de ni//'jig rten
153a1(rgyud): //dus sa ma dz+nyAgs pa/b+hU dang sgyur ba zlas byas nas/glo 'a g+sa ga nas khyA b+hA ga//2dak+Sha byung chub 'dus bu nad par ba /
153a2(rgyud): dang bar byungs kyi yig las b+hung gzhan du yang //sdig na ga'ang lpags lags da'i zla gas du nyid na//mnad rab ring ba gzus btsun 'bras
153a3(rgyud): med//mngon par brjod par rgyud bla mo'i bla ma las sku gsung thugs kyi gnas kyi rim pa'i le'u sti nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o//de nas sbyar ba bsha
153a4(rgyud): byu ga/thod pa sangs rgyas mchog dam pa//de nyid sbyor ba kun gyis mchog/dngos grub thams cad rab stsal ba//gsang legs par swA bya zhing //gang
153a5(rgyud): gis su la 'ang mi bston to//de nyid mchog gi snum pa bzung //rnal 'byor ma yi snod lnga gnas//gang du ba bstan par swA bya zhing //tha mo'i ngag ni bsgom
153a6(rgyud): bar bya//dur khrod gnas nA yid 'ong ba//sgrub pA pa yis nges bstan po//bskyed pa'i rim bye sbyar ba yis//sa dang gnas kyi rim pa dag/rdo
153a7(rgyud): ba'i dbu su ni//yi ge hUM ni bsgom par bya//de yis khyab par bdag nyid ni//sangs rgyas thod pa tson gyi mchog/gnas med zhi zhing dag pa ste//rtog pa
153b1(rgyud): sa rgyad rnam sangs yi/kam+b+ha nas nga drang //gtas na du martag tu bA s+yA/ga gtus bya la zhal gcig ga/gar+b+ha drug gos rnam par nan//la
153b2(rgyud): mdag chen mnyam pas //'od zer phreng ngas kun tu 'khrigs//med pa rje sbed dri'i dbu rgyud can//spyad gsum po lnga de di ba zhes//sam sa dpa kun
153b3(rgyud): gyi sgom pa ste//gnyis med chos ni bla na med//stag gi lpags pa gsu pa na ngas/ni de'i lpags pa steng du bad+h+r-i //tha~Md pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin//g.yas pa mi 'dzegs
153b4(rgyud): byAr+b+hanAn//sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyun can//mig pa'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan//da yi phyag g.yon thaMd pa ni//rlung gis rab tu gleng ba dang //sems can+ta kun
153b5(rgyud): don gyi phyir//ye shes 'chi med ltas bsres pa//kha T+wAM ga ni lha'i rnal 'byor//dz+nyAd pa dpyo' brnal 'gyur ma//g.yas pa mi 'jigs dag pa ste//'jigs pa
153b6(rgyud): sus myi 'jigs grol//gdug cing 'jigs pa ma skyes ni//'di ni 'das kyis gnon par mdzad//gdug pas 'jigs pa thams cad sring//zlang byung
153b7(rgyud): bzhi pa 'dzin//sna tshogs rdo rje dbul mtshan//rdo rje phreng bas dpral ba mdzes//rkang rkyen yid 'ang rgyan mchen//sna chags pad+ma mda' brgyad /
154a1(rgyud): dbus nas bzhengs pa ni//'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dang/chags pa zhe sdang zhangs kyis gnon//ye shes sems dpa' de gzugs can//ya
154a2(rgyud): ge bruM las thung bar sgom//thugs kyi 'khor lo snying ka ru//he ru kaM ni rnam par sgom//gsung gis 'khor lo kha la sgom//sku yi 'khor lo snga ma bzhin//sngo dang dmar
154a3(rgyud): dang dkar ba dang //phyag drug pa la zhal gsum pa//rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan//sman gsum pa la bzhin rnam bsgyur//thod pa dang ni khe T+wAM 'dzin//rtse gsum
154a4(rgyud): pa dang thod pa 'chang //rang rig lus dang yang dgra 'dus//bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gnas//dkyil 'khor bzhi yi dbus dag tu//yi ge gsum sogs las
154a5(rgyud): byung ba//thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//rang gi mtshan ma'i mchog dang ldan//gnas la sogs pa'i rim sbyor ba//sdom pa gsum gyi mchog dam pa//
154a6(rgyud): 'gro ma dang lA ma dang / dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma//pad+ma'i phyogs kyi gnas la dgod//thod pa bzhi po mchog yin te//mkha' gro ma ni kha dog
154a7(rgyud): ser/lA ma pa la sha mi mdog/dum skyes ma ne sngon po ste//gzugs tson ma ni dmar la 'bar//thod pa dang ni kha TA 'dzin//g.yas pa mi 'jigs mchog yin te//
154b1(rgyud): sgra rnam su ni lha mo bzhi//khwa gdod la skyongs mkha' bru mo//sngo dang ser dang de bzhin dmar//ljang ku drag po'i gzugs dz+nyAno//mtsham su gashrIn rje sreg la sogs//rab
154b2(rgyud): 'jigs shin tu 'jigs pa ste//thod pa dang ne khaT+wA~M 'dzin//mi 'jigs mchog kyang de bzhin te//cang te'u dang ni kli gug nyid//bdud ni bzhi po'i steng na bzhugs//
154b3(rgyud): spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba//phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste//thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyani//me yong ro dang dri dang ni//reg
154b4(rgyud): go mtshad bu bzhi po ste//sa bcu dag ni rim pa dang //sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis//phyi dang nang gi chos rnams kun//byang chub phyogs kyis rnam par dag/ka la
154b5(rgyud): sogs pa nyi shu bzhi//mgo lo ban dus mnan pa ste//gsol byed hUM gnyis dang yang sbyar//mthu ni phaT dang rab tu sbyar//dnga'i bo kun gyi gsung sngags ni//'dod pa'i
154b6(rgyud): 'bras bu thams cad ster//gsal byed mkha 'gro ma ye ming //mthar na hU~M hUM phaT yin te//'di ltar rab gtum+b+ha mkha' gro ma//sngags kyi de nyid bde ba ster/
154b7(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni//hUM AHmo//'di ni rab tu gsang ba ste//pad+ma'i mdab la mkha' gru maM//gsal byed ma ning dang bcas pa//hUM ni gnyis pa nyid
155a1(rgyud): / khas pas many+dzu nI phaT dang sbyar//kha gdang la sogs gsang sngags ni//ya ra la phA/gsal byed dang ni bcas pa ste//mthar na/
155a2(rgyud): d+hU dang phaT dang sbyar//gshin rje sreg ma la sogs /sha~M Sha sa ta/gsal byed dang ni hUM gnyis dang //phan kyang de bzhin skyur por bya//da u sangs rgyas thad pa yi/
155a3(rgyud): gsang sngags de bzhin rje su dran//oM aM AM/oM AM/u AM/e aM/aM aHShA swA hA/khams dang phung po skye mched la//go cha rnams ni sbyar bar bya//ye shes
155a4(rgyud): 'khor lo dam tshig dang //mnyam pa'i ro yis mchod par bya//mchod pa bzhi po'i gsang sngags rnams//rang ming gsal byed hUM byas te//'di ltar dkyil
155a5(rgyud): 'khor dag dang sbyar//sangs rgyas thod pa las byung ba//rdo rje rgyan ni bgos pa ste//thams cad rim pa bzhin du sbyar//'thor 'thung du ni rab sbyar bas//
155a6(rgyud): gsang ba bzhi pa bzla bar bya//spro dang bsdu d+hA'i sbyor ba yis//'khor lo gsum b+hi rim pa dang //'dir ni che ga'i sbyor ba yis//dus ba'i dag tu sbyon nas//
155a7(rgyud): dam tshig 'khor lo'i bzlas pa bya//dam tshig mchog ni dngos grub 'gyur//dam tshig can gyi gsang sngags kun//sangs rgyas thod pa mchog yin to//
155b1(rgyud): mnyam par ma gzha ba sbyor ba yos//'di ltar thams cad rab tu brtag/dam tshig rtag tu bskyod d+ha spyod//sto shib tum mA m+b+ha yo mchog/yang na rang med bzlas
155b2(rgyud): sa kyis de ny-id bzlas paraH/oMSh+T+r-i d+had+hi krA b+hU sa~M d+b+haHn+nad+hA la shaM bA ra di ni yid 'di byur ba'i mcho ka/'ar m+b+ha y-i yAM shas rna chog/
155b3(rgyud): gang du dam tshig rnams pa la//sbyor ba 'di ni sbyin par gyi/zhi bI gyu nas thun med pa/ni ma byas dbang maung 'asgyur//du bzhi dag tu rim pa mos//
155b4(rgyud): gi chus khrus bya yang na ma tshig sa bai zlang //ma la ni gas la ba ga ga//da ma shes mongs pa ste//da ma tshig la sbyin 'gal zhing nyams//bla mo mtshan
155b5(rgyud): bos skyabs mdzad cing //gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa ste//thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can//'gro ba'i gtsul skyabasu mche//des ni za tsam med b+h+yas nas//nges par dngos
155b6(rgyud): na du 'gyur/mngon par brjod pa'i rlung du ma rnam mas dam tshig la sa snang ba sangs rgyas thad rje skyed pan+d+ha lan+na shA rtsa drug to//de na
155b7(rgyud): gzhan shid byug/gas nyid byed dkur ga/gsang sngags ca ni baspyad pa dang //kri ba'i gnas dang 'gro ba dang //rna'i 'byor ma dang dpa' btsun/
156a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyis gnas mchog yin//ma zad gnyid med rnam par dag/thob ma dbus mthar dri ma med//a yi ye shes las byung ba/rdo rje sems dang
156a2(rgyud): bde ba che//zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste//spyan gsum pa la thugs rje'i nyams//phyag rgya che dang yang dag ldan//rang bzhin dag cing dri ma med//ral pa zla phyed dpya
156a3(rgyud): la rgyan//sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mtshan//thed pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par rgyan//sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs//phyag
156a4(rgyud): rgya drug gis rnam par rgyan//rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan//ral gri lcags kyu phyag na bsnams//rin chen zhags pa mdzes pa 'dzin//dngos grub thams cad rab tu
156a5(rgyud): stsol//dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba'i zhal//rnam thar gsum gyi gnas kyi mchog/ye shes sems dpa' snying ka ru//'khor lo gsum gyi mchog kyang skem//hUM las
156a6(rgyud): thubs kyi 'khor lo ste//de yi phyag mtshan sngon po dang //AHlas gsung gi 'khor lo ste//de yi phyag mtshan dmar po'o//A~M las sku yi 'khor lo ste//de yi phyag
156a7(rgyud): mtshan dkar po yin//dpa' bo rnal 'byor mi mnyam sbyor//sku gsung thugs ni dri ma med//raM las phyag rgya chen po ste//lte ba'i dbus rnam par bsam//i las b+ha ga
156b1(rgyud): ste//byang chub zla ba dri ma mo hA//u ni snying kAr bA sam pa ste//oM na mgo la rnam par dgod//oM ni spyi gtsug dag tu dgod//oM ni mig tu dgod pa ste//i ni go char byas nasu/
156b2(rgyud): a ni mdun gyi mtshan che'o//li las lha mo spyan yin te/r-i l+r-is daR+Ya tshig sgrol ma yin//l-I las lha mo gas dkar mo//r-I las rin chen yang dag 'byung //rin chen sgron dang
156b3(rgyud): ye shes sgron//dkar zhir pa la sha yaM mdog/dmar zhing 'jom+bu chu bo'i mdog//zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa//sprin gsum dgyes pas rnam par myes//thams cad
156b4(rgyud): phyogs kyi gos can te//rang gi thabs dang mnyam par ldan//'khor lo sna tshogs rdo rje dang //pad+ma dmar bau rin chen dang //rdo rje dril bu lhan cig sbyar//'dod pa thams cad rab tu
156b5(rgyud): stsol//ral gri mda' dang lcags kyu 'dzin//gzhu ni 'gugs par 'dzin pa ste//mtshan rnams thams cad yongasu rdzogs//thod pa yi ni cod pan can//sna tshogs pad+ma'i
156b6(rgyud): dbusu ni//sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs//de dag sgo ru dgod pa ste//dbusu gtso bo'i zla ba'i gdan//zur la mchod pa rnam bzhi//phyogs kyi gos can skra gril
156b7(rgyud): ba//zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa//spyan gsum thod pa'i phreng ba can//me long dang ni pi wang dang //dri dang dung dang bcud kyis len//chang gi btung ba lag pas mchod//
157a1(rgyud): gzhan du ji ltar bdag po bzhin//rgyan rnams thams cadadu yongasu rdzogs//skyel krung phyed par legs par bzhugs//lag pa snyim pa'i thal mo yis//
157a2(rgyud): mchod pa lag tu thogs nas ni//'di lta'i cho gas thams cad mkhyen//a li de nyid dri ma med//gsong ba mchog ni rnyed dka' bA//rdo rje sems dpas bshad pa yin//sngags kyi
157a3(rgyud): de nyid cho ga dag/sku gsung thug su yang dag sbyar//oM shrI ma hA su khA badz+ra satwa a//a hUM TA ke nI dzA la shaM ba ra swA hA//oM sid+d+ha lo tsi ni lI aHhUM swA hA//oM sa ma ya tA re tut+ta /
157a4(rgyud): ror-I AHhUM swAt+ma/oM pad+me d+hA we pAN+Da rA ba sain+do si li AHhU~M swAhA/oM rat+na ku le ke ka rat+na dz+wA lo nI r-I AHhUM swAhA/oM rU pa badz+re bruM/oM shab+da badz+re hUM/oM gaM d+ha bidz+ri khaM/
157a5(rgyud): oM ra sa bodz+rI hrIHthams cad mkhyen pa dbang phyug mchog/b+ha ga'i dbus gnas pa'i sgom//a li rdo rje gsang ba ste//sems can kun gyi snying la gnas//gang gis
157a6(rgyud): dngos po kun gsang ba//de yi gsang ba bshad pa yin//rnal 'byor pa yis dus bzhi ru//bzlas dang bsgom pa ldan pab+h+yAM/som nyi thams cad spangs nas ni//sems dpa'
157a7(rgyud): chen po brtson 'grus brtan//ye shes 'khor lo mthong nas ni//dam tshig can gyis mchod dbang bskur//de dge gcig tu bstims na su//spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis//
157b1(rgyud): khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa//thams cad rdo rje 'dzin lta bu//'das pa dang ni da ltar dang //ma 'ongs pa yi dus gsum po//de ltar sems can gsum po la//rdo rje sems
157b2(rgyud): dpa'i go 'phang gnas//lhan cig skyes dga' dag pa'i bdag/thog ma med pa'i mchog yin//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa'i
157b3(rgyud): le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o////de nas mchog gi cho ga bshad//'jam pa'i rdo rje sgrub pa ni//maM gI ye shes las byung ba'i//'jam pa'i rdo rje bde ba che//zhal
157b4(rgyud): drug phyag drug zhi ba ste//sku mdog dkar po dri ma mad//spyan gsum rdo rje skyil krung can//phyag rgya drug ni 'bar bas rgyan//mi bskyod pa yi cod pan can//thod pa'i phreng/
157b5(rgyud): bas rnam par rgyan//zla ba phyed pa zhi ba 'dzin//ral pa'i tho ro tshugs pa cings pa ste//dkar dang sngo dang dur smrig nyid//sor dang ljang kro de bzhin te//steng gi zhal ni zhi ba ste//
157b6(rgyud): lha yi dngos grub 'bras bu stsol//rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan//ral gri po ti 'dzin pa ste//ut+pal dang lcags kyu nyid//ye shes lus can+da rnam par sgom//sku gsung thugs
157b7(rgyud): kyi snying po ni//'khor lo'i dbusu rnam par sgom//sngar bshad gnas kyi sbyor ba yis//ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa' lta//gsang sngags 'di ni rjesu dran//'jam pa'i rdo rje
158a1(rgyud): gsang ba ni//gsang gsum ye shes dam tshig can//dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma sbyor ba'o//oM shrI ma hA su kha many+dzu badz+ra a maM hUM DA kri nI dzA la saM ba rarA
158a2(rgyud): swAhA//rang gis dbang bskur byas nas ni//brtul zhugs chen po gsang sngags bzla//gsong gsum 'khor la spros nas ni//khams gsum dag ni bsdu bar bya//'di ni
158a3(rgyud): mchog tu gsang ba ste//gang gi su lnga'ang bstan mi bya//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las 'jam pa'i rdo rje sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o///
158a4(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//yi ge dgu pu sgrub pa ste//klu yi ye shes las byung ba//gdug pa thams cad za byed pa//za byed mkha' gro za byed cing //rnam rtog zos shing/
158a5(rgyud): zad par byed//mkha' mnyam stong pa las byung ngo //ne mkha'i long spyod za byed cing //zhal drug phyag ni bcu gnyis pa//spyan gsum pa la zhal rnam bsgyur//g.yas brkyang
158a6(rgyud): ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs//gdug pa'i bdud ni za byed cing //'jigs byed dang ni 'jigs byed ma'o//khas bub zhabs kyis mnan par bzhugs//stag gi lpags
158a7(rgyud): pa go su nganangs//mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan//thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes//sna tshogs rdo rje ral pa mnan//phyag rgya drug gi
158b1(rgyud): sku lus rgyan//zhal gyi mtsho ba rnam par gtsigs//'jigs byed rab tu cher 'jigs zhing //sngo dang dud ka ljang ku dang //dmar dang lnga pa ser po'o//drug pa dag ni bong bu'i mgo/
158b2(rgyud): steng gi zhal gdong rab tu 'jigs//thal ba sprin gyi mdog can la//gdug pa thams cad rab 'joms ma//rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan//dgyes pa'i longs spyod longs spyod
158b3(rgyud): cing //dbang du rdo rje phrag mo ni//de mdog steng zhal phag mgo ste//gnyi su med par mnyam par ldan//skra grol ba dang phyogs gos cen//byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam por
158b4(rgyud): 'khril//thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par myos//thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing //tshangs pa'i lpags pa banabs pa ste//rdo rje mdung dang cang te'u dang //gri gug zhags pa
158b5(rgyud): mgo bo dang //phyag du ral gri 'phyar ba ste//drag po gdug pa kun 'joms pa//snying kar ye shes mkha' 'gro ni//kha gdong la sogs yongs kyis khyab//'khor lo mdab brgyad
158b6(rgyud): dbus dag tu//g.yon nas g.ya su bskor nas ni//dur khrod dang ni nye dur khrod//mkha'agro mchog ni dgod par bya//yaM raM laM mAM/shaM ShaM saM ho/ye shes 'khor lo mkha'
158b7(rgyud): dgod//zhage 'dun par du bsgoms nas ni//gang yong thun ni bzhi yi rim//chu 'gram dang ni dur khrod du//ngo zlum pas dngos grub nges par rnyed//'brog pa dang ni bzod/
159a1(rgyud): byed cid//gang du las nI nI 'drud pa//mkha 'gro ma yi 'khor los 'grung//las 'dir yid gnyis dpyod pa med//s+t+wa~M dang ba la sha yi medog/dmar rang /
159a2(rgyud): bzhi pa ser po ste//gshin rje sreg sogs bzhi po ni//sna tshogs mdog can mdzes pa'i zhal//dmar dang sde dang dud kau ste//zhal mdog dkar po mchog tu mdzes/
159a3(rgyud): thams cad spyan gsum pa yi zhal//skra grol ba la phyogs gos can//khwa gdong g.yon dang g.yas kyi zhal//'ug gdong zhal yang de bzhin te//gsum pa khyi yi zhal
159a4(rgyud): gdeng yin//bzhi pa phag gi zhal gdong ste//g.yon dang g.yas pa'i zhal gdod ni//drag po'i gzugs can cho ga bzhin//gshin rje sreg sogs zhal gdong ni//g.yon
159a5(rgyud): dang g.yas pa gnyis de bzhin//thugs ri rnga mo rta dang ni//seng ge ra dang blang ma he//gzhan yang dom gyi zhal yin te//thams cad kyang ni mnyam par bya//thod pa dang ni
159a6(rgyud): kha T+wAM 'dzin//zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams//dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang //thod pa phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan//yi dgas
159a7(rgyud): gdon la gar gyis bzhugs//mi'u thung la skyes gnas ring //mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal//thugs rje'i ro yis rnam par myos//sku gsung thugs kyi
159b1(rgyud): gsang dun//nam skyong tu bzlum par bya//hA swAd+ha.A/bdan gsang bar bya shad pas//rdo rje dang 'khor lo dbus//ye shes myu 'bru s+t+wa~Mng kA ra//mang 'bru'o yi ga'i 'ar
159b2(rgyud): ni//ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas//mchod cing zlum bur rnam par sprom//mnyam par gzhag nas yi gyi rnams//srog dang rtsol bas gsang sngags bzla//rang gis thor/
159b3(rgyud): 'thung byas na su//gsang ba gsum gyi ye shes spro//oM shrIk+Sha DA ki nI dz+wA la saM ba ra hUM hUM phaT swA hA//thob mar gsal byed ming dang hUM//mthar ni phaT dang rnam par sbyar//
159b4(rgyud): mnga'agro zla bas bshad pa yi//'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad stsol//mchog 'di dag ni gisang ba ste//su la yang ni sbyin mi bya//zhag bdun gyis ni dbang 'gyur te//rtse gcig
159b5(rgyud): pa yis bsgoms nas ni//'khor lo gsum gsang mkha' gro mo'o//dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur//nges par durjod de'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las k+Sha'i mkha 'gro sgrub pa'i
159b6(rgyud): le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o///de nas mchog tu bshad bya ba//oM li mkha' gro sgrub pa ste//a li ye shes las byung ba//a li mkha' gro mchog dram pa/
159b7(rgyud): zhal brgyad pa la phyag bcu drug/spyan gsum 'jigs pa rab 'jigs pa//zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs//g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis bzhugs//zla ba phyed
160a1(rgyud): bA ral pa 'chang //thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par rgyun//sna tshogs rdo rjes spyi gtsug mnan//dpral ba la ni rdo rje phreng //stag gi lpags pa gsu
160a2(rgyud): ban byas//phyag rgya drug gis sku la rgyan//rnam par rtog pa 'jigs byed nyid//skyed dang pra dag dus mtshan nyid//zhabs kyi 'og tu gtsun par mdzad//gdul
160a3(rgyud): dka' thams cad 'dul mdzad cing //bgegs kyi mgo bo'i phreng ba can//sna tshogs mdog can legs par mdzes//dkar ba'i mdog can sked pa phra//lha
160a4(rgyud): yi gzi brjid 'bar ba can//sngo zhing ser la dud ka dang //g.yas pa'i zhal yang de bzhin te//ljang ku dmar dang ser skya ste//g.yon pa'i zhal yang sna tshogs
160a5(rgyud): mdzes//steng gi thal kha sprin mdog zhi//chags shing rje su chags pas lta//thugs rje'i ro ni yang dag rdzogs//sku lus ldem zhing 'jo bag can//a li
160a6(rgyud): mkha'agro ma yi sku//phyag gnyis pa la gcer bu'i lus//thod pa'i phreng bas dbu la rgyan//skra grol ba yis rnam par myos//spyan gsum nag po 'jigs pa
160a7(rgyud): can//de yi mdog can sku rags can//byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril//gnyis med sbyar ngas yang dag gnas//rdo rje dril bu yang dag ldan//lha mo'i ku
160b1(rgyud): 'tshar ba'o//ji ltar mkha' 'gro'i phyag rgya ltar//mkha'agro ma yang de bzhin sbyar//phyag gnyis dag ni brkyang ba la//khyab 'jug lpabs pa banabs pa yin//thod pa dang na
160b2(rgyud): kha T+wAM 'dzin//ral gri dang ni thod pa 'tshong //mdung rtse gsum bcang te'u nyid//dgra sta lcags kyu de bzhin to//zhags pa tshongs pa'i mgo bo dang //gri gug dang ni 'khor lo nyid
160b3(rgyud): snying kar rtsibs ni bcu gnyis pa'i//'khor lo'i rgyal po legs par mdzes//de yi lte ba'i dbus ni//ye shes mkha' gro rnam par skem//de mdog zhal dang 'dug stangs dang //phyag dang
160b4(rgyud): phyag rgya de bzhin te//shar du dam tshig mchog ces bya ba'i rdo rje mkha 'gro ma yi ge i'i rigs pas byung ba'o//byang phyogasu sna tshogs mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' gro ma yi ge
160b5(rgyud): I las byung te bzhugs pa'i//nub phyogasu na mkha'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' gro ma yi ge e dang sbyar bar bya'o//lho phyogasu gnas kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma
160b6(rgyud): yi ge ai las yang dag par bzhugs pa'o//me'i phyogs la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su mkha' 'gro ma bzhi po dgod par bya ste/thog ma che ba'i
160b7(rgyud): mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge u dang sbyor bar bya'o//bden bral du drag po mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge U dang sbyar bar bya'o//
161a1(rgyud): rlu sh+nu d+h+r-ig su dpa' blo'i mchog ces b+hU mang 'grom po klu au dang sgyur bar b+h+ya//dU ldan du khro ba'i mchog b+hA ba'i mahA
161a2(rgyud): ma yi yi ge oM dang sbyar bar bya'o//de bzhin 'dis ni mtshams bzhi ru//dbang ldan la sogs phyogs dgod pa//yi ge ri las dngos grub kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha'
161a3(rgyud): 'gro ma dang /yi ge li las dur khrod kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' gro ma dang //yi ge r-I las rnal 'byor gyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' gro ma dang /yi ge l-I las
161a4(rgyud): gtum pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' gro ma dang /mkha' gro ma ni de kun gyi//yan lag bcu gnyis rnam par dag/zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste//thams cad spyan gsuM
161a5(rgyud): rnam sbyar zhal//sku lus dkar po thams cad zhal//sngo dang ljang ku gnyis med pa de//g.yon dang g.yas pa'i zhal gnyis ni//mkhas pas rnam par bsgom par bya/
161a6(rgyud): phyogs kyi gos can gar dang bcas//skra grol ba la rab tu 'jigs//thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin//cang te'u dang ni gri gug mchog/mdung dang mgo bo thams cad kun//
161a7(rgyud): sna tshogs mdog dang phyag mtshan bsnams//ro yi mgo yi steng bzhugs shing //thugs rje'i ro ni yongasu rdzogs//phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa ste//thams cad
161b1(rgyud): zod 'i byung bas rgyun//mtho ba'i phyung ba 'dzin pa ste//thams cad A la lA yi sgra//oM ni thugs kyi rdo rje s+ho//AHni gsung du 'gyur ba yin//a ni sku yi rdo rje ste//
161b2(rgyud): pad+ma 'khod lo'i dbus/'di ni mchog tu gsang ba ste//rdul 'byor ma yi ster te mchog/rdo rje sems pas gsungs pa ste//rdo rje snying pos zhus pa yin//dkyil la
161b3(rgyud): 'khor lo'i mkha' gro ma//'khor la sogs pa thams cad dgod//ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas//gcig pu chos kyi ro yang sgom//ye shes bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis//
161b4(rgyud): ge sngags kyi mthor 'thung bya//nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas//'khor lo mchog gi tshogs dang spro//mchog de mthong na slar yang bsdu//yan lag bcu gnyis mchog dam pa
161b5(rgyud): sa ni bcu gnyis dag nyid de//rdo rjes ni bcu gsum pa//rab tu dga' dang dri ma med//'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro ba//sbyang dka' ba dang mngon du gyur//ring du song dang mi
161b6(rgyud): g.yo ba//lags pa'i blo gros chos kyi sbyin/gzugs med pa dang ye shes ldan//de ltar sa ni ducu gnyis po//'khor lo ri lha mi rnam par dgod//dgyes pa chen po 'di pa'i
161b7(rgyud): mchog zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sems dpas dbu su'o//'khor la sogs pa kun gyi sngags//maung dang gsal byed hUM byas te//de dag mthar ni phaT dang sbyar//sngags kyi gca
162a1(rgyud): bos gsang sngags na//rang snying rang gi sa don dgod//sku gsung thugs dang rnam par sbyar//ye shrIs 'khor lo 'di mthong nas//gcig tu bsdus
162a2(rgyud): te mchod par bya//bdag gis byi deng nang du yang //mnyam par gzhag ste mi sgra bzla//rang gi mthong 'thung byas nas ni//blo ldan srog stsom bzlas pa bya//oM shrI A
162a3(rgyud): iT+TA kA ma oMn+te kA n+ni dzAM pa sha~M ba ra hUM phaT swAH/srid pa ma lus thams cad dkun//dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te/sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdog nyid/
162a4(rgyud): byab yi ni bdag nyid rnams//sems can khams ni che gnas pas//rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis//bdag nyid sbyor zhing mchod par bya//mnyam par ma gzhag sems
162a5(rgyud): kyis ni/ sgom zhing rab tu bsgoms byas te//sngags dang dbyibs dang chos nyid do//chos gcig roni stong pa yin//chos rnams bdag med nyid yin te//rang
162a6(rgyud): bzhin med pa'i chos lha ni//rje su brtag par bya ba yin//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i b+h+ra ma las gsang ba chen de'i gsang ba A la'i mkha' gro sgrub pa ste
162a7(rgyud): le'u sum cu tham pa'o//de nas sbyor ba bshad bye ba//sna tshogs gar gyi dbang phyug mchog/thams cad mchog ste rnal 'byor che//dngos grungab chen po legs
162b1(rgyud): stsol ba//bskyod pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis//sgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbusu ni//si oM dr-i las rdo rje 'byung //de nyid yongs gyur bdag nyid de/
162b2(rgyud): gsal byed mkha' 'gro mchog gyur pa//sna tshogs dbang phyug sna tshogs mdog/thams cad rims kyi mchog dam pa//zhal drug pa la phyag bcu gnyis//spyan gsum
162b3(rgyud): pa la g.yo ba'i sgra//zla ba phyed pa zhi ba 'dzin//thod pa'i phreng bas spud pa ste//sna tshogs rdo rje dbu la 'chang //spyi gtsug ral pa 'ching ba ste//phyag rgya drug gis sku la
162b4(rgyud): mtshan/lha yi rgyan gyis spud pa ste//skal ngan mu stegs can rnams ni//zhabs kyi pad+ma'i 'og tu mnan//lnga po lnga yi rim pa dag/g.yas brkyang ba yi zhangs kyi tshanan//
162b5(rgyud): skyil krung phyed pa'i gar zhabs ce na//zhal drug gis ni rnam par rgyan//khyab 'jug gi ni lpags pa banabs//mgo bo'i phreng bas rgyan pa ste//rdo rje lha mos rnam par 'khyud//
162b6(rgyud): gcer bu 'og pag ska rags can//skra grol ba la spyan gsum can//mchu dang mchu ni rnam 'chir zhing //rdo rje dril bu mnyam par 'khril//byang chub yan lag gnas
162b7(rgyud): 'chir zhing //byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khril//thugs rje chags pa'i re yis bde//tshangs pa'i lpags pa yan lag ni//phyag gnyis dag gis brkyang nas
163a1(rgyud): 'dzin//thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'chang //dbang phyug chen po'i mgo bo thogs//mdung rtse gsum dang ral gro dang //cang te'u zhags pa lcags kyu
163a2(rgyud): bsnams//dkar dang sngo dang ldang ba nyid//ser dang dud ka dur smrig ste//g.yon dang g.yas pa'i ngos dag tu//pi la dang ni nye pi la//mkha 'gro ma ni gnyis po sbyar//
163a3(rgyud): chos kyi mchog ces bya ba yi//rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma nyid ni//yi ge dr-i las yang dag 'byung //g.yon gyi phyogasu dgod par bya//yi ge si las nges byung ba//rgya mtsho'i
163a4(rgyud): mchog ces bya ba yi//rdo rje mkha'agro ma gnyis ni//sna tshogs mdog can sna tshogs zhal//spyan gsum pa la gzhin rnam bsgyur//skyil krung phyed pas gnas pa ste///
163a5(rgyud): zhabs ni gar dang bcas pa'o//zhal lnga pa la phyag bcu pa//spyan gsum drag po 'jigs pa ste//'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan
163a6(rgyud): par bzhugs//mgrin pa dag ni drug dang bzhi//phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan//phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba//thod pa'i phreng ba'i sku rags can//kang rngub
163a7(rgyud): g.yer ka'i sil sgra can//thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbusu ni//'khyud pa yi ni mchog dam pa//rdo rje gsor zhing bsdigs mdzugab
163b1(rgyud): sa/gnyi su med par rnam par rgyan//thod pa gnyis med rnam rgyan to//zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams//thod pa dang ni gri gug mchog/sku gsung thugs kyi dbu la
163b2(rgyud): rgyan//dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba/ye shes mkha 'gro ma dbus//'khor lo gsum gyi thabs kyang skom//oM gyi ye shes mkha' bri ni//thugs kyi 'khor lo
163b3(rgyud): dbusu ste//sku gsung thugs kyi mkha'agro ni//rang gi snying kar de dag sgom//sngar bshad sbyor ba'i rim pa yis//gnas la sogs pa'i rjes rim pa//de ru bsam
163b4(rgyud): zhing rnam bsgoms te//gsum po'i rim pa rje su spro//des ni dngos grub gnyis med pa//mkha 'gro ma dang lhan cig sgom//ye shes 'khor lo'i ro rnams ni//bsgoms
163b5(rgyud): la gsang sngags bzlas par bya//oM shrI prA Na ba D+ha ka A A/oM hUM DA ki nI dzA la saM ba ra aM swAhA//oM tr-I d+harma ut+ta me/mahA badz+ra DA ki nI ye draM hUM phaT swAhA//au si
163b6(rgyud): sA ga rA ut+te me mahA badz+ra D+ha kau n+ti ye sau hu~M hUM phaT swAt+ma//gsang gsum ye shes bzlas nas ni//dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma bzlas bya//gsal byed rang mang hUM gnyis dang /
163b7(rgyud): mthar ni phaT dang sbyar bar bya//gsang gsum 'khor lo bsgoms nas ni//gsum po bsdu zhing bsgoms na su//dam tshig gsang gsum sbyor ba yis//b+ha ga'i
164a1(rgyud): dbusu bsgom par bya//byang chub zla ba dri ma med//thugs kyi 'khor lo nA da gsum//gtso bo dam ni gsum yin to//mkha'agro ma gsum
164a2(rgyud): gsum mkha' gro//sdud cing bskyed par mdzad pa ste//b+ha gar rdo rje phag ma ni//gsang ba gsum du rnam par sgom//de nyid sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis//de na nga rgyal
164a3(rgyud): rnams spangs nas//dus bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yis//de bzhin bsgoms dang bzlas pa bya//rtag tu dam tshig bskyang bya zhing //'o ma sna tshogs las byung ba//
164a4(rgyud): bram ze che dang sbrang rtsi mar//ma hA mAM so mnyam ldan pa//de nyid gsum gyis mngon bsdogs te//bza' ba dag ni bza' bar bya//'du 'dzi med cing sred pa med//
164a5(rgyud): yongasu bzung ba'i 'khor yang med//longs spyod min pas longs spyod la//'chi ba med pa'i zas bza' zhing //'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yang bstan//longs spyod
164a6(rgyud): med pa'i zas bza' zhing //rnal 'byor sgom pa'i skom yang brjong //gzhan du gang yang btung ba min//nang gi bdag nyid sbyar ldan pas//rang nyid byin gyis
164a7(rgyud): brlabs byas nas//bcom ldan mtha'o 'gro bi la ga/rnal 'byor ma pa li//thabs ni bi la bar shes bya//shes rab nye ba'i bi la ba//grong
164b1(rgyud): mthar ni pi la nyid//grong gi mtha' ni nyo pi la//zla ba nyi ma mnyam sbyor ba//pi la dang ni nye pi yin//skad cig sbyong ba bi la ba//dga' ba nye ba'i pi la ste//mthu stobs du ma ldan par
164b2(rgyud): ni/skye ba 'di la 'grub pa yin//pa shu thams cad bza' bya zhing //lha bshos dag kyang de bzhin sgrub//dpa' bo mkha' gro ma 'dus nas//dus la 'thun pa 'dus byas nas//
164b3(rgyud): bru dang gar dang bza' ba dang //'dus pa mchog gis mchod par bya//rtog pa thams cad rnam sbyangs nas//dam tshig gi ni skyed pa spyod//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i//
164b4(rgyud): bla ma las gsal byed mkha 'gro sgrub pa'i mtshan ma bstan pa stau le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o////de nas gzhan yong bshod bya ba//dngos grub sbyor ba'i rim pa
164b5(rgyud): ste/mkha'agro ma dang mkha' gro sbyor//dam tshig mchog gi sdom pa yin//chos rnams kun gyi sdom pa ste//mkha' gro ma yi bde ba che//mkha' dbyings rdo rdo'i dbus gnas
164b6(rgyud): paM/dkyil 'khor dam tshig mchog dam pa//de yi dbus 'khor lo che//dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par rgyan//dbusu nyi ma'i gdan yang mdzes//A lI kA lI mnyam pa
164b7(rgyud): ldan//sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan//dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rgyan//byin gyis brlabs pa byas nas ni//rang gi sa bon las bskyed//yi ge hi las yang
165a1(rgyud): dbu 'byung //dus mtha'i me ltar rab tu 'jigs//zhal gyi mtsha rnam par gtsigs//spyan gsum ljags ni bskyong ba'i zhal//gdug pa thams
165a2(rgyud): cad zhabs 'og gnon//khro ba dang ni bzhud pa'i zhal//bsgral pa'i mthar yang 'khrug pa ste//ral pa yi ni dbye rgyan can//g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs
165a3(rgyud): mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan//'jigs byed chen po'i lpags pa yis//rked par sku rags bcings pa yin//thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//sna tshogs
165a4(rgyud): zla phyed 'chang //dpral ba las ni rdo rje phreng //khro bo mthong nas rnam par brtag/lha rnams thams cad tshar yang gcod//klung rus can gyi brtul zhugs 'dzin//'chi ba
165a5(rgyud): 'tsho bar byed pa'i mchog/gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon//phyag rgya drug gis sku lus rgyan//sna tshogs rgyan gyis spyad pa ste//phyag drug pa la zhal lnga pa/
165a6(rgyud): sna tshogs ro yi bcud mchog can//sngo dang ser dang de bzhin dmar//ljang ku dkar po zhi ba ste//rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pa//phag mo yi ni sru lus khyab/
165a7(rgyud): lci chen lpags pa'i chen mdzad cing //bla re tshul du brkyang bar mdzad//thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin//drug pa na ni cang te'u dang //zhabs g.yon du ni dus mtshan
165b1(rgyud): nanan//sla pa yis na 'jigs byed de//zhabs kyis 'og tu mnan mdzad ring //rmongs shing rab tu rgyas par mdzad//rdo rje pho ma du mdag can//skra grol ba dang gnar custe/
165b2(rgyud): thod pa phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//dum bu'i rgyun gyiska rags can//sbyin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khrig//mgul pas 'khyud cing myos pa ste//de yi phyag mtshan phyag rgya bam+b+hasa?/
165b3(rgyud): bri gug tsang te'u mchog kyang 'dzin//drug pa la ni tshangs pa'i mgo/'di 'drar rdo rje mkha 'gro ni//mkhas pas re'u mig dbusu dgod//shar du sangs rgyas mkha 'gro ste//
165b4(rgyud): byang du las kyi mkha' gro yin//nub du pad+ma'i mkha 'gro ste//lho ru rin chen mkhye 'gro yin//dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba dang //ldeng ku dang nI se re bo'o//'khor lo dril gyi
165b5(rgyud): mnyam par ldan//g.yes brkyang ba yi zhabs kyi bzhugs//ljang ku ser po dmar po sngo//dkar po snying ltas dril bu dang //sna tshogs rdo rje bde chen 'khyud//g.yas
165b6(rgyud): brkyang ba yi tshul gyis bzhugs//dmar po sted dang ljang ku dang //dkar po yang ni de bzhin//pad+ma drim bus snyoms 'jug cing //lha mo'i nu ma 'chir du'o//ser po sngon po
165b7(rgyud): de bzhin dmar//ljang ku dkar po'i kha dog ste//rin chen dril bus snyoms par 'jug/g.yasi brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs//de dag mkha' gro lnga yin te//sdom
166a1(rgyud): /pa lnga yang de nyid do//me dang bden bral rlung dang ni//dbang ldan de ni bzhi po ru//sangs rgyas mkha'agro las mkha 'gro//pad+ma'i mkha'agro rin chen mkha'
166a2(rgyud): zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa//spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba//thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan//rgyan rnams thams cad yongasu rdzogs//phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par
166a3(rgyud): rgyan//phyogs kyi gos can gar mchog can//mgo yis phreng bas rnam par rgyan//thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin//rdo rje mda' la sogs pas rgyan//zhags pa lcags
166a4(rgyud): kyu phyag na mdzes//'dod pa thams cad stsol mdzad cing //thugs rje'i ri ni yang dag rdzogs//thugs rje'i 'dod pas rnam par myos//cung zad ngo tsha'i mig zur
166a5(rgyud): tsano//dgyes pa stsol bas bde ba ste//de ltar sna tshogs du ma yis//dkyil 'khor rnams ni yongasu khyab//du ma'i gzugs dang gzugs sdug mA//rdo rje
166a6(rgyud): mchu dang 'od byed ma//rta gdod drung ni drug pa'i gdod//rdo rje drag blo snyan grags ma//rdo rje pho nya rdo rje sar+b+ba//rdo rje gzhonu mA de bzhin//kwi bo ci yang
166a7(rgyud): bzhin to//rdo rje ro langs ma dang ni//rdo rje ma mo'ang de bzhin te//dri can ma dang 'jigs byed zhal//zla ba'i spyi gtsug de bzhin te//khro gnyer can dang sna tshogs
166b1(rgyud): gsugs//rdo rje gri glug de bzhin te//rdo rje lug rgyud dang ni//sgyu 'phrul lha mo grags byud ma//na lar ka dang ser sgyu ma//rdo rje 'bar ma thal sbyor ma//rdo rje 'jigs byed ma nyid de/
166b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor grub pa'i mkha' gro ma//mkha' gro mo ni de dag kun//spyan gsum pa lo zhal rnam bsgyur//gsus pa 'chang lnga skra grol ba//thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par rgyun//
166b3(rgyud): rgyun rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs//phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan//phyogs kyi gos can gang mchog ste//mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par rgyun//thams cad ro yaM
166b4(rgyud): gdan la bzhugs//sna tshogs gzugs can yid 'phrog pa//thod pa kha T+wAM go 'dzin cing //zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams//rdo rje mchog ni gsor byed cing /
166b5(rgyud): dril bu dang ni cang te'u mchog/zhal gsum dpa' zhing sgeg pa ste//thugs rje'i nyams ni yang su rdzogs//spyan ni zur gyis gzigs mdzad cing //dgyes pa'i
166b6(rgyud): stsol bas g.yo ba ste//dngos grub thams cad stsol mdzad cing //sgrub pa po kun rje su chags//zla ba drug gis sgrub pa bo//mkha' gro ma yi 'khor lo 'grub//yid
166b7(rgyud): gnyis med par dngos grub mchog/mkha' bro thod par byed pa yin/dus 'dir de ma thag tu yang //mkha' la spyod par ma tsham med//nang gi pho brang de nyid ni//
167a1(rgyud): re'u mig ku sogs sgo dang bcas//sgo ru lha mo bzhi bkod la//mkha' gro ma ni dngos grub ste//phyi rol dkyil 'khor lha mo bri//snam bu'i
167a2(rgyud): mtshams bA d+hA rA nA~M//lAm+b+hi nyi shu dgad zhing //mang gras sogs marnams rnams//DUr ba pa po sh+lo bA// m+b+ha 'khar dag hU~M ban+d+ha/
167a3(rgyud): rnams ni lha mo bzhi//'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad ster//rta babs bzhis ni rnam par rgyan//zur bzhi cha ni thams cad dang //sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnamasu//
167a4(rgyud): rdo rje rin tshan gyis rgyan cing //phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo//de yi nang du re'u mig dgu/sgo rnams kyang ni bya ba ste//'di ltar mkha' gro mkha'agro ma//dra ba'i
167a5(rgyud): sdom pa stong pa ste//byang chub phyogs ni sum cu bdun//chos kyi rnam par dag pa yin//dbusu sa ni bcu gsum ste//phyi rol gnas dang nye ba'i gnas//dur khrod
167a6(rgyud): deng ni nye dur khrod//'di ltar sbyor bas rnam dag par//sdom pa mchog ni bsgom par bya//de ni thugs kyi ye shes te//ye shes mkha' gro mkha' gro ma'o//phung
167a7(rgyud): po khams dang skye mched la//cho ga gnyis po sbyar bar bya//ye shes mchog gi sdom pa ste//gsang ba gsum gyi 'khor lo dgod//phyed dang phyed du rnam par dgod//
167b1(rgyud): mkha' gro gsum ni 'khor lo'i dbus//dam tshig rnal 'byor 'byung ba che//ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas ni//zhabs bsil byas nas gzhug par bya//ye shes chu yis dbang bskur
167b2(rgyud): nas//gtso bo dag ni rnam par sgom//bdag med chos kyi ro kun gyis/dam tshig mchog ni dri ma med//ba spu khung bu thams cad las//dam tshig gsang ba gsum spros nas//
167b3(rgyud): sems can ma lus dam tshig gi/mkha' gro ru ni rab gnas bya//'bad pa yis ni bsdus nas kyang //gsang ba gsum du gzhug par bya//sngon grub pa yi mkha' gro ne//
167b4(rgyud): byin rlabs gnas dgod par bya//'di ni rdo rje thag che te//mkha' gro spyod pa'i gnas la bzhugs//sdom pa mchog ni bzlas pa yis//bla na med pa'i go 'phang ster//
167b5(rgyud): dus bzhi dag tu ci 'dod par//skyo ba med par rtag tu sgom//lugasu 'byung dang bzlog pa yis//'khor lo mchog ni rnam par spro//ba spu'i khung bu las mdun du//bde
167b6(rgyud): mchog spros nas mchod par bya//rdo rje gsum ni dbang bskur nas//'gog pa'i khro bo rnam par sgom//ye shes khro bo lhan cig tu//sprin gyi 'brug sgra lta bur bzla/
167b7(rgyud): 'gro zhing 'ong ba sbyor ba yis//mi smra rdo rje brtul zhugs che//zhag bdun gyis ni nges par yang //mthu dang stobs ni 'grub 'gyur te//g.yo zhing ldeg par byed pa dang /
168a1(rgyud): ltukhrug cing g.yengs dang gzhug pa dang //nad med pa ni nad yod byed//nad yod pa ni nad med byed//de ltar sgom pa byas nas ni//las 'dir thA
168a2(rgyud): chom med pa yin//nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas//bsgoms dang bzlas la dga' ba dang //dam tshig zas la dga' ba ni//thogs pa med par tshe yang bstan//'di
168a3(rgyud): ltar ngang gi cho gas bzlas//sangs rgyas gan su legs par 'jug/der ni dam tshig 'khor lo ni//mkhas pas sgom mchod bzlas pa bya//gsang sngags 'di dag bshad
168a4(rgyud): par bya//oM shrI badz+ra DA ki ni AHhUM hU~M DA ki ni dzA l+yA shaM ba raM huM hUM phaT swAhA/oM shrI bud+d+ha DA kI nI A b+h+rUM hUM DA kI nI dz+nyAM la shaM ba ra hUM hUM phaT swA hA//oM shrI karmA DA kaM a
168a5(rgyud): khaM hUM DA ki nI dzI lA shaM pa ra huM hUM phaT swA hAM/oM shrI pad+ma DA ka a hrI hU~M DA ki nI dz+r-IM la shi bai raM huM hUM phaT/aM shI rat+na TA a ai hUM D+hau ki nI dzAM laM shaM ba rI tsu hUM phaT swA hA//
168a6(rgyud): mkha 'gro bzhi po de dag dang //mkha' bri ma dang lA mi dang //dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma//mgrin pa mnyam par bsnol ba ste//byin pa gnyis kyis lcogs par
168a7(rgyud): 'khril//de yi mdog dang phyag dang zhabs//phyag mtshan rnams kyang rnam par sgom//lha mo mngon du byas nas ni//snying po'i gsang sngags so so yin//oM shrI badz+ra d+ha
168b1(rgyud): u da/pa'i ga tsan+de lA//de yi ga seng dwags shAd pa yid//oM bad+hU ba ts+tshab suM kheng+ku d+hA hrIH/oM ra m+'u kha~M dza~M hU~M g+ne/ n+nad+hA d+had+d+ha
168b2(rgyud): hU~M ba~Mk+shi oM badz+ra ko ma hrI ts+tshatrUM dza~M/ dz+rag tsats+tsha m+b+ha / phyugs sbyin ma stsa la// me bani bai hU~M ma dag dam pa ban gyi rje sa men//oM
169a1(rgyud): lihu~M hU~M phaT/oM badz+ra sa ya kits+yai hU~M phaT/oM gan+d+ha ra~M hu~M hUM phaT/oM bi ma bdan tu hUM phaT+Ta/byang gi snam bu la lha mo bzhi sku mdog ljang ku de'i gas
169a2(rgyud): sngags bshad pa yin//oM tsir+N+Na shaM kha re hu~M hUM phaT/oM d+h+r-i kuTe hU~M hUM phaT/oM bai shwa d+hU pe huM hUM phaT/oM badz+ra kar+d+ha na ts+tsha hUM phaT/dbang ldan la stsogs pa'i mtshams
169a3(rgyud): bzhi ru lha mo bzhi po gzugs gnyis pa'i mdog cani te/de'i sngags bshad pa/oM shrI madz+dza kha li huM hUM phaT/oM shrI ma ye huM hUM phaT/oM shrI ya shaMHka ri hUM
169a4(rgyud): hUM phaT/oM shrI nA lA ra ki tsu hUM phaT/sgo rnams ne lha mo bzhi pa sna tshogs pani mdog can drag po'i gzugs ldan pa ste/de'i sngagasu bshad pa/shar du aM shrI badz+ra paM
169a5(rgyud): gai le dzaHdzaMHhuM hUM phaT/lho ru/oM shrI badz+ra dz+dza li ni hUM hUM hUM phaT/nub du oM shrI badz+ra kuN+Da li paM baM hU~M hUM phaT/byang du oM shrI badz+ra b+hai ra bi ho hUM hUM phaT/thams
169a6(rgyud): cad gsal byed mtha' ru ni//shrI ni sbyar zhing mchog rims bzhin//sngags pas de ltar bzlas na ni//mkha' 'gro mo ni dra ba yi//sdom pa'i dngos grub thob pa ste//
169a7(rgyud): zla ba drug gi bde dbang 'gyur// cig rgyu byas te bsdus na ni//rnal 'byor chen po gzi byin ca na//dra ba'i mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur//gsang sngags
169b1(rgyud): 'di dag thams cad ni//khri 'am 'bum du bzlas na ni//gdung sngags rgyal po 'grub pa yin//snying po dag na bzlas pa yis//dpa' ba mkha' gro ma grub cing //rang nyid ji ltar/
169b2(rgyud): 'dod par 'gyur//gzhan gyi lusu zhugs 'gro zhing //mi snang ba dag thob nas ni//rnal 'byor chen po rnam par spyod//sna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin pa yin//mngon par
169b3(rgyud): brjed pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma lwa dam tshig gi sdom pa las 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o////de nas gzhan
169b4(rgyud): yang bshad bya ba//sangs rgyas mkha' gro'i tshe ga'i rim//sngar bshad sangs rgyas mkha' gro yi//lung la sogs pa'i rim pa bya//rnal 'byor lung ni mi shes pa//
169b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas mu stegs can yin te//rtag tu lung ni sbrang mi bya//dkon mchog gsum ni mi spang zhing //sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la//rtag tu bdag ni skyabasu 'gro//
169b6(rgyud): shes rab pha rol phyin dmigs na//rnal 'byor b+h+yo dngos grub 'grub//gcig car 'jug pa'i sbyor ba yis//bdag gis lus ni rnam par bsam//sngo zhing dag la
169b7(rgyud): gzhan rnam bsgyur//gtum zhing 'jigs pa 'jigs par mdzad//zhal gyis mche ba rnam par gtsigs//ral pa zla phyed spyi gtsug 'ching //sna tshogs rdo rjes
170a1(rgyud): rnas pagan/ sa na d+d+ham+b+ha/rgyunanasarnams du su da na d+had+hA sa sa //phyug ts+tsha glu dang yang /
170a2(rgyud): dang yang dag ldam/steye shes yong dag mchog/gdug pa tsuni gyi med pa'i byed//dris mthara' las byung de shA la nAn//bladag pa kun ni rna
170a3(rgyud): 'og gnon/snrod sno 'dug sa da mgo ba dang //sred pa gti mug prA'i dashA ste//dus me can do ni 'gro zab la//badrAg pa'i gagags ni 'dzegs pacas/
170a4(rgyud): rnams cad lus kyi 'og tu gnano//rnam di ni sbyi drung // ba dang n-i deng byed dang //snang bu sbyang du s+yA 'i /dzA dzI pa thA s+yAnyam ldan pa
170a5(rgyud): bdag dang 'dra bsro 'a // r+b+he k+Sha swA da b+h+ri gi ste/rjes smyeni b+hai ro sa~M h+ne k+sha hU~M/skyes de'i byin rgyun zhes 'o//dang ste kyi na
170a6(rgyud): ka nyid len//zid pa dang ni ShaT+wAM 'dzin//chos kyi 'khor mo kha re sil dang //snang brjid mdung dang zhags pa dang //lca gas kyu man bcang te'u dang /
170b1(rgyud): gnas dang ga skyon d+hag+sa //nAra'o gas pa sgyud nas bsdusas/shA du mU twA go dang ts+tshad+h+r-i kA/dza ra/dang ka so//khaT ko du shA // ra
170b2(rgyud): ma ri k+She me rgyud pyod dag nAM// bzhin dam pas rnaM su dgod//sir da b+h+yo dang de bzhin demar//dud pa yi nI na dag can te//dmar dang ltu da du du ka'i mad/brgyad
170b3(rgyud): nyid yin//sgo rnamasan rgod byug/khrag 'thong rdo rje gtum myi dang //rdo rje srid mchog ma dang ni//rdo rje 'dzugs d+ma drug m+b+ha ste//gdul dka' thams cad
170b4(rgyud): gsal mdzad cing //thel po sprin mdog ljang gu dang //dmar dang sno dang lhag par 'jigs//brgyad pa'i dbus chos khar stsa le//thod pa cang sbyin+da bruM thug ste//phra
170b5(rgyud): 'i steng dru go 'dzin pa'o//sku rnam su ni skye mo bzhi/thod pa kha T+wA~M mi 'jigs bya//chos kyi khar stsol cang te'o//zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa//oM dgas gang
170b6(rgyud): gyi sted du ni//sbrul krung byed pa'i phyir gyis byazhugs//skyed snums pa dang rgyas gos gsum//pris mi len dang cig bla ba//bzhi ci bzhin dang skan cig de//thag ba ma
170b7(rgyud): dang shing du //donan po po dang dur khrod pa//khrod pa dang ni phying ba pa'o//'di dag ji lta'i rim po yis//sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnam dag sbom//ye shes mnyam pa'i
171a1(rgyud): dmachog//dbu TIg dun rnam+b+ha bA stem/mad+hu suSh+Ta badz+r-i hwe twe ru ru ka r+m+ma tsu hUM phaT/oM ma~M ma ta rmAts+tsha dz+dza sa/au bar+thatsA bin d+had+hA
171a2(rgyud): phaT//ai r-IR+Sha dza ki tuM hUM \u0f7f/au dr-i duk+tA sI ts+yai hUM/TaM/ai khAM kha tA kaswaM d+b+h+yAM dzaTaM/ai shr-i shA ba ri dzaM hUM ya/oM dzI dzI ba ri huM trUM phaT/oM saM saM ma ri tu hUM phaT/au ts+tsha h+ne ru kaM
171a3(rgyud): huM hUM phaT/aM baM badz+ra tsar+N+Na huM hUM phaT/oM hUM badz+ra rAk+Sha si huM hUM phaT/oM b+h+rU~M badz+ra b+hai ra b+hI huM hUM phaT/de kun gtsar bu skra gr-i la~M ga/spyan gsum pa la zhi ba ste//mche ba
171a4(rgyud): rnam gtsigs lce bskyod cing //phyag rgya lnga yis sku lus rgyan//thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//bzhad dang zhi dang snying rje dang //sgeg pa dang ni rngam pa dang //drag cing
171a5(rgyud): khro ba'i nyams can te//bzlas dang sgom pa spro zhing bsdu//lus dag yid la bde bar gnas//sems can mos pa sna tshogs pa//gdul ba'i thabs kyi bde ba yis/
171a6(rgyud): yul la yongasu spyod pa na//bla med ye shes 'bras bu'othob//sems can thams cad 'di yis bde//'chi med bde ba'i long spyod kyis//ye shes 'bras bu rnyed pa

171b1(rgyud): sta sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//char dbab cho ga'i rim pa ni//pad+ma mdab ma brgyad mchog gi/lte ba ge sar bcas pa la//de ma
171b2(rgyud): dbusu rdo rje che//mche ba rnam gtsigs 'dzegs pa can//phyag brgyad pa la zhal bzhi pa//spyan gsum 'jigs pa'ang rab tu 'jigs//rdo rje mtshon ni gsor mdzad cing //

171b6(rgyud): khro brla lta zhing 'jigs par gzigs//mdab ma brgyad la klu brgyad bri//mtha' yas dang ni nor rgyas dang //'jog po pad+ma pad+ma che//dung skyong dang ni stobs kyi rgyu//dga'
171b7(rgyud): bo dang ni brgyad yin te//dkar dang sngo dang dmar dang ldang //se raraM deng dud pa'i mdog can te//ljang ku dang ni ser po ste//thal mo sbyar bar byas nas ni//bcom ldan 'das
172a1(rgyud): la mngon phyogs pa//'jigs pas bkar dran slong bar byed//skrag pas lta ldeng gnas pa'o//bcom ldan sku lus sngon po can//'jigs shing/
172a2(rgyud): shin tu 'jigs par mdzad//br-i yas pa dud ka dmar po ste//g.yon pa ljang ku dung khwa'o//steng gi zhal ni mkha' lding gdong //zhal rnam bsgyur zhing 'jigs
172a3(rgyud): pa'o//nyi ma dmar po'i gzi brjed na//nyi ma bcu gnyis nyi mnyam 'od//phag mo dag gis mgul 'khyud cing //byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril//
172a4(rgyud): yang na phyag ni bcu gnyis pa//bde chen mchog ni bcu gnyis pa//gri gug tshangs pa'i mgro bo dang //rdo rje dril bu yang dag ldan//lha mo'i mchu ni rnam par 'chir
172a5(rgyud): gcer bu dbu skra grol ba dang //spyan gsum pa la sku rags can//'dzam+bu'i chu bo mchog gi sku//gnyisu med par sbyor bar gnas//klu ni rang gi chung mar bcas///
172a6(rgyud): chu lha'ang chung mer bcas pa dang //chu lha'i lus ni dkar po can//bka' drin dag ni slong bar byed//snying kar ye shes 'khor lo dag/de mdog phyag dang zhal yang //
172a7(rgyud): sgyid//de yi snying ka hUM nAM hUM dgod cing //lus ngag yid kyang de bzhin te//klu yi rang snying de nyid la//hUM nAM hUM ni rnam par dgod//gsang sngags rgyal po'i tshe
172b1(rgyud): ga ni//khro bo'i tshig lhur bzlas brjod bya//chu ba'i 'gram 'am rgya mtsho 'am//ljon pa 'am klu yi mtsho dang ni//rdzing bu lteng ka rnamasan//blo can khro nga'i bzlas pa bya//
172b2(rgyud): yang ra k+ku ye gnas ni//sgom pa bzlas pa dag la 'jug/oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru kaM ts+tshin+d+ran+ta ga bairaShA pa yan+d+raT+Ta kin+ni dz+haiM l-I sha b+hai ri hU~M phaT swA hA//'di dag bsgoms te khre tsam
172b3(rgyud): bzla//dus bzhi drug tu stong du'o//zhag bdun gyis ni nges par yang //sa nAm kun tu chur 'brub 'gyur//dam+b+ha tshig sbyin sdig mtshad dus//glu dang gAr ni nyaM sngar
172b4(rgyud): pas//'o ma dag ni bza' zhing btung //rnal 'byor pas ni klu brgyad bzla//'o ma'i khrus kyi cho ga yis//'o mas sbyin sreg bsregs blugs bya//'o ma'i shing gi bud
172b5(rgyud): shing bya//'o ma'i shing gi yAm+b+ha shing dang //'o mar bcas bis sbyin bsregs bya//bum pa'o mas yongasu dgang //mi stsogs mtshams dang phyogs rnamasu//'o myur
172b6(rgyud): bcas pa'i d+yAt+tor ma sbyin//oM aM a nan+ta yA ts+tsha nAM hUM stAt+ma//oM ba~M b+hA s+ye shaid+b+ha d+h+r-ir+N+Na s+thAn//oM taM tak+Sha kAt+te nA hUM swAhA//oM paM pad+ma ts+tsha nAM hUM swAhA//oM ma~M man+t+ra pad+ma d+hAn+nad+d+ha
172b7(rgyud): swAhA//oM sho shaM kha bA~M ma~M d+hun+da hUM swAH//oM shi ki na tsA hU~M nA~M d+hu swAt+ma//oM a i nan tid+d+had+hun d+hU swAhU~M/a nr-i Te ru NA ya nA d+hAdz+haiM dzoti ye nA~M ga ban+d+ha pa ma d+hI ts+tshi rI hU~M/
173a1(rgyud): pa 'di bzlas khro bo dang bcas pas//kun gyi bzlas pa khri tsamra bya//'o ma 'bras snying zasu bza'//dbang po thul cing yod mi smra//bri gzugs spangs pa'i
173a2(rgyud): mngon sum du//khri tsam bzlas na mngon du 'gyur//mngon sum du ni dngos grub cing //smras pa tsam gyis char 'bebs te//'dra la the tshom ma byed cing //dngul gyi snod kyi
173a3(rgyud): nang du ni//yungs ka ra dang ni chu glugs la//de la nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du yongasu bzlas te//sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs la dri chu dang 'o ma bsres pas khrus byas te//

173a6(rgyud): bde reg nas//phan tshun khri ba'i gzugs can ni//bdag bsgoms rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas//gang gi snying kha kho nar ni//he ru rdo rje bsgoms pa yi//cha rU pa yang
173a7(rgyud): ni 'bab par 'gyur//ri'i steng du 'dzegs te rtse gsum pa la yongasu bzlas na ser ba gcod par 'gyuraro//cang te'u la yongasu bzlas na ma mched pa'i me rengs

173b2(rgyud): yong su bzlas ni zhi bar byed//gri gug la seng su bzlas ni 'jig rten gang du gis per byed//rmon pa la yangasu bzlas ni 'che ba gleng bar byed de/
173b3(rgyud): gsor zhing yongasu bzlas na sa 'og gi dngos grub du 'gyur//dril bu la yongasu bzlas na mi dga' ba yongasu 'gugs par byed do//glang po che'i lpags pa la yongasu
173b4(rgyud): bzlas te bting na bar snang la 'phur bar 'gyur te//dpag tshad stong phrag brgyar 'gro zhing slar ldog go//phyag rgyu drug la yongasu bzlas nA pha rol gyi mdun du mi snang

174a1(rgyud): rgyan can//rdo rje phreng bas rnam par rgyan//sku la mgo ba'i do shal can//phyag rgya drug gis rnam par rgyun//stag gi lpags pa go su banabs//phag mo
174a2(rgyud): yas ni sku la rgyan//zhabs gcig pa ni bzhengs pa ste//g.yas pa ser la dud pa'i mdog/g.yon pa dmar la lhung ku'o//steng gi zhal ni rtag gdeng ste//dkar zhing

174a6(rgyud): de bzhin te//dang po khyi yi gdong yin te//gnyis pa 'ug pa'i gdong yang yin//gsum pa phag bi gdong yin te//bzhi pa khra yi gdong cano//gnas kyi dbyibs kyi
