179b7(rgyud): sa zhes bya ba gzhan mi 'gro//ra zhes bya ba khyo med mo//du zhes bya ba spyod ngan mo//su zhes bya ba skal bzang mo//ne zhes bya ba skal ngan ma//sa zhes bya ba dam tshig can//
180a1(rgyud): Sh+TAn+ta k+Sha zhes bya ba dam tshig can//U zhes bya ba dam tshig med//sI zhes byung 'ongs pa yin//na zhes bya ba ma 'ongs yin//so zhes bya ba chags pA yin//
180a2(rgyud): 'di dag yi ge'i brda' yin te//dbang bskur dusu rnal 'byor pas//bza' dang bza' med sbyin par bya//dbang bskur ba ni mchog yin te//dam tshig mchog ni shwAH
180a3(rgyud): pa dang //dam tshig can gyi dam tshig dus//dam chog 'khor lo 'dus pa dang //dad pa rnams la sbyin par bya//ma dad pa/sbyin mi bya//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i
180a4(rgyud): bla ma las brda'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//rnal 'byor ma yi mtshan nyid ni//gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni//sgrub
180a5(rgyud): pa po yis dngos grub thob//bud med pad rtsa ltar dkar zhing //pad+ma'i mdang ltar dkyus ring mig/rtag tu gos ni dkar la dga'//tsan dan sar pa'i dri dang
180a6(rgyud): wAn+ta//deklu shugs 'dus pa nyid la dku'o//de rigs las b+h+ring shes par bya//zung gang badzu ma rigasar 'dra zhing //dmar dang ser ba'i gos la dga'o/
180a7(rgyud): rdo ti tsam pa'i dri dang ldan//de yang bzang ba'i rjes 'gror 'gyur//thams cad ut+pawaM ltar sngo bsangs//dri dngags ni dz+wa la dka'//ut+pal sngon po
180b1(rgyud): yod pa//dono da' bo bzang rjes 'gro//bud yad pang dkar 'dra ma dog glang //rtag tu pad+ma'i rtswa ba dre//de yang ngo bzhi dpa' ma'i zo//dmar zhing ser skya'i bud med gang /
180b2(rgyud): gzugs bzang kos ni dmar ba dang //ma la ki drang ut+pal dri//de ni rdo rje'i rigs byung yin//ser zhing ldang ba'i bud med gang //gos ni dkar lo dga' ba dang /
180b3(rgyud): mgo la me tog dri dang ldan//de bzhin gshegs rigs rjes 'gro yin//bud med gang zhig kha dog dmar//de'i mdog can gyi gros 'chang zhing //rtag tu ga bur
180b4(rgyud): dri dang ldan//rnam snang rigs kyi rjes 'gro zhing //rnal 'byor ma yi rigs rnams ni//de ltar bdun po ngas bshad pA//g.yon pa'i kun spyod la rtag dga'//rang gi
180b5(rgyud): mdog gis rigs drug ldan//rigs kyi rigs pa'i yi ge yang //kha dog drug tu 'gyur ba yin//rang gi phyag rgya 'ching ba dang //ra rig los byung tshig tu smra/
180b6(rgyud): g.yon las 'gro ba'i bud med gang //rnal 'byor pa la g.yon la rtag/lag pa g.yon gyis mtshon pa dang //g.yon nas lta bas rnam par blta//lha mo rnams
180b7(rgyud): dang gar smra ba//de ni dam tshig ldan par bshad//bud med gang byas de nyan cing //rigs kyi sa bon rab tu smra//rigs kyi bya ba mi spong ste//rang gi bstan bsha
181a1(rgyud): mi 'dor la//rang gi rigs kyi rig pa zlos//de ni dam tshig ldan par gshad//phyag 'tshal ba ni gang 'ching ba/g.yon pa'i lus kyis rtag
181a2(rgyud): tu 'dud//lha mo rnams dang kun sgrub//de ni nges par bde bar 'gro//mthe bong g.yon pas sa la ni//rkang pasmA ri mo 'dri byed cing //mgo ni dbyug par byed pa dang //
181a3(rgyud): zlozu rgyas lta zhing lag paston//sgrud pa blo la khyad par du//de yis rang rig dran pa dang //'khrur ba 'am ko ko dwag dang ni//sna dag duni thal mo ston//zur rgyas
181a4(rgyud): lta zhing lan cig bsngags//zlos shing rigs lo rnam par lta//bden par 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor ma//nges par dam tshig can yin ni//de nas rnyed dka' rnal 'byor ma/
181a5(rgyud): de bzhin mkha' gro me rnams kyi//bdud rtsi lnga rnams yang dag 'byung //ya mi ni dang skrag byed ma//'dod ldan phag mo 'jigs gzugs ma//kun tu spyod pa
181a6(rgyud): bAM su re//rnal 'byor me ni rnam pa bdun//medor bsdus rang mtshan bshad pa yin//gzugs can ma dang nu ma bi ka/lA ma yongs gyur gyis btsas mi//
181a7(rgyud): mi sdig ma ti ka lho mo//mikha 'gro mo ni mdun du bshad//mngon par zhen pas lte ba dang //srin ma 'degs par ma byed cing //sngon bzhon gzugs ni
181b1(rgyud): byud la//phyis ni 'jigs par byed pa dang //gzugs can ma ni yin par bshad//gnyis mod dpa' bos bsnyen par bya//sdug pa 'am yang na mI sdug pa//byis bu 'khyud cu
181b2(rgyud): num pa ni//de ni tsum pa ki ro zhes bya//mkha' gro mchog kyang de nyid yin//zas mi lta bar zur du lta//khro gnyer dang ni gdong dag dang //smini ma sbyar zhing bsdigs mjug/
181b3(rgyud): dang /'di ni gzhan yang dbugs mi 'byin//'jigs par byed pa gang yin pa//de ni lA ma yin par bstan//phag dang dred dang byi la dang //ce sbyong rigs dang rta dag dang //
181b4(rgyud): thams cad der ni 'jigs byed pa//yongasu gyur par de bshad de//shin tu dga' bas dgod pa dang //song nas slar yang mi ldogro la//rje su chags pas gsal bar
181b5(rgyud): dgod//dum skyes mar ni dri bshad//yid ni kun tu skyo ba dang //rkang pa lag pas bong ba 'am//gos mtha' 'am yang na shing dag gI/des reg pa ni 'tsho mi 'gyur//
181b6(rgyud): mi ldog par no shes bya ste//sgrub min par ni de bshad//mkha' gro ma yi rigs phyag rgya//dpa' bos bsnyen cing mtshan ma blta//thod pa dgra sta mche ba dang //
181b7(rgyud): ral gri kun tu skrag byed yin//rdo rje dang ni dung nyid dang //rigs kyi phyag rgya yin pa ro bshad//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las rnal 'byor ma'i mtshan mi
182a1(rgyud): le'u ste sum cu rtsa dbu pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//mkha' bra rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni//gang zhig yang dag shes pa yis//
182a2(rgyud): mkha'agro'i dam tshig la gnas pa'o//dmar zhing ser ba'i bud med grang //pad+ma'i dri ni rnam par gtong //lha stangs rang bzhin zhi ba dang //zhen pas lta ba'i rjes 'gro
182a3(rgyud): ga ni bud med gang gi sen mo dmar//mig ni kun tu zhen pa dang //khyim du pad+ma 'dri ba ni//pad+ma gar dbang rigs 'byung yin//smin pa'i dbus na rtse gsum yod//
182a4(rgyud): lus ni sngo bsangs skye ba dang //rtag tu rdo rje rigs sgom pa//gang gi khyim du rdo rje 'dri//rtag par mchod pa byed pa yi//mkha'agro ma ste dpal ldan ni//he ru ka yas//
182a5(rgyud): rigs byung yin//gang gi dpral bar rtse gsum ni//mdung thung dag ni snang 'gyur zhing //mig dmar mdog ni dmar ser dang //de bzhin rkang pa lag pa dmar//ra
182a6(rgyud): skyes khyim bya dag la yang //rtag par mkha' gro ma de dpal ldan ni//de yi khyim du rdo rje mtshan//rtag tu gang zhig mchod byed pa//shrI ha ru ka'i rigs 'byung ba//
182a7(rgyud): mkha 'gro yin par gdon mi za//'khor lo gang gi dpral ba 'am//lag par yang ni snang 'gyur ba//sprin sngon dag dang 'dra ba ni//rtag tu dpral bar 'chad/
182b1(rgyud): yA ts+tsha sprul pa rgyan po kun tshogs shid //mchog tu bdun pa gang yin dang //khyil du 'khor lo 'dre blud cing //rtag tu de la mchod byed pa//rdo rje phag ma rigs 'byung ba'o//mkha'//
182b2(rgyud): 'gro ma ni stobs kyis dregs//gang zhig mig sman gnag 'dra zhing //son dkar zhing me tho ba dang //rtog tu gdug par gyur pa drang //sems stobs ldan par gyur pa dang //rtag tu khrus
182b3(rgyud): la dga' ba dang //mang du smra bar mi byed cing //khyim du rdo rje 'dre ba dang //rtag tu dge bas mchod byed /rdo rje phag mo'i rigs 'byung ba//stong phrag bcu dang lnga pa yin/
182b4(rgyud): ra zhing gsar gyi mdog 'drar snang //mrig ma~M ka s+yo zhing khA s+tha sar//rdo rje gang gis dpral ba 'am//lag par yang ni snang 'gyur ba//rtaga~M tu rgyal sring dag la gnas
182b5(rgyud): snyoms shing bden par smra ba dang //ma li ka yi dri 'byung zhing //gang gi khyim du rdo rje nI//rtag tu 'dri zhing cher mchod pa//dam skyes ma yi rigs las byeng //rnal 'byor ma
182b6(rgyud): yi dbang phyug mchog/gleng zhig rtag par shA la dag la/skyem zhing mig smon gnage po'i mdog/dbrel ba mdung rtse lta bu yid//gang zhig gdug pa'i las la dgo'//
182b7(rgyud): rtag tu du khrod dag tu 'gro/'jigs pa med cing rtse medo//gang gis dpral bar thig pa dang //khyim du thod pa 'dri zhing mchod//dpal ldan he ru ka de li/ma
183a1(rgyud): 'gra'i rigs las byung ba yin//sran gyi mdog 'dra ba'i budadu med gang //so na mo mnyam par gnas shong //rtag tu gdug pa'i lus la dgag
183a2(rgyud): g.yon gyi mche ba gtsigs pa dang //de yi khyim du dgra sta ni//'dri zhing rtag tu mchod byed pa//rnam par 'dren pa'i rigs 'byung ba'i//mkha'i grA mar ni the tsam med//
183a3(rgyud): mkha' gro ma yi tshogs 'di dag/shrI hUM ra kA'i rigs las byung //sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir//mtshan nyid yang dag bshad pa yin//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud
183a4(rgyud): bla ma'i bla ma las mkha' gre mitshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu pa///de nas gzhan yang bshad byug/sgrub pa po yis lA ma yi//mtshan nyid kyi ni khyad
183a5(rgyud): par dang //yan lag tshogs ni shes par bya ba'o//gang gi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor ni//kun tu zlum por snang 'gyur zhing //kha yi slar rtag tu yod//spu dang
183a6(rgyud): smin ma ring ba dang //gos bzang gtsang zhing zhi ba dang /mi 'khrug bden par smra ba dang //rtag tu dam pa'i chos la dga'//dpa' bo sring mor de shes bya//pang+ga'i
183a7(rgyud): phyag rgyar sbyin bya ba/yang na ru sbal phyag rgya bya//lpags pa bum pa spyi blugs nyid//phyag rgya'i lan du shes par bya//de ni tshes bcu'i res dag li//khyim du
183b1(rgyud): pad+ma 'dra bar 'gyur//lA yA yi ni bud med kyis mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin//gsus pa rlo zhing mig dkyus ring //mig ni dmar zhing ser skyar gnas//phyug cing bskal bzang
183b2(rgyud): dpal yan tan//ser zhing tsam pa lta bur snang //shin tu ring min thung ba'ang ma ni//sna tshogs pa yi gos la dga'//dpral bar ri mo gsum yod cing //mtshams
183b3(rgyud): kyi gyen du bltas pa nas//rgod cing dga' ba nyid dag dang //lam ni rnam par gnon cing gnas//g.yul du mchi ba rnams kyi ni//gtam dag la ni rtag tu dga'//de lta'i/
183b4(rgyud): rab dregs mthong na ni//mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya//rkang pa g.yon pa bskum pa yi//bdag nyid kyang ni bstan par bya//g.yon pa dag ni yongs bzlog pa//phyag rgya'i
183b5(rgyud): lan ni yin par bshad//bcu bzhi dang ni chos brgyad ni//de ni dus tshigs yin par bshad//khyim du mdung rtse gsum pa yang //bris nas de ni rtag tu mchod//
183b6(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang phyug lA ma yin//mtshan nyid gyur pa 'dri dag yin//gang gi mkhur chos dag tu ni//khung bur snang ba gnas gyur cing //de bzhin rtag tu dmar zhing
183b7(rgyud): ser ma/mig ni ljang ser dag tu snang //skra ni de bzhin 'khyil ba dang //mgo dang dpral bar dar bcings snang //ri mo gcig po rab tu gnas//de bzhin mgrin pa
184a1(rgyud): ring ba dang //rtag tu gros dmar la dga' zhing //dgod cing glu ni len pa nyid//lan dga' zhig ni khro ba dang //sems ni rnam par g.yo ba dang //rtsod pa lan
184a2(rgyud): dga' ba ste//'di 'dra'i rab dregs mthong na ni//mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya//gnyis pa nyid ni 'bad pa yis//dril bu'i phyag rgya bstan par bya//g.yon gyi phyog su ldog
184a3(rgyud): pa ni//phyag rgya'i lam ni yin par bshad//thung zhing byin pa sgom pa dang //rtag tu gos ser la dga' zhing //phrag pa dag na gos kyang 'phyang //de 'dra'i bud med mthong na
184a4(rgyud): ni//rdo rje'i phyag rgya bstan bya zhing //'bad pa yis ni gnyis pa yang //dung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya//g.yon nas yongasu bzlog pa ni//phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par
184a5(rgyud): bshad/bcu bzhi de yi dus yin te//de yi khyim du rdo rje 'dri//shrI he ru ka l-i mA yi//mtshan nyid gyur pa de dag yin//lus kun l-i ni ba spu yod//mig ni
184a6(rgyud): gnag tsang ser ba dang //sbom zhing rnam bsgyur mi bzod pa//bzhin 'phel che zhing kha che la//ma mchu rlo zhing kha dog gnag/mig zlum sna ni nyams pa dang //
184a7(rgyud): rtag tu glu ni mkhas pa dang //sprin gyi mdog can yid 'phrog pa//'di 'dra'i rab dregs mthong na ni//klu yi phyag rgya bstan par bya//gnyis pa yang ni 'bad pa
184b1(rgyud): ma nyim byu ba di shA /seMngan pa du de'i rgyud ng+ge na 'o//
184b2(rgyud): rnaMs na yang shAd b+h+ya/ sa rnams te/ ni ni sbyin dang phreng ba R+Wa//yang dag shes par 'aM/rA 'o//gang zhag lag gnan snyan
184b3(rgyud): ni//gsung por smra bsnun pa yin//gang zhig sbyin lhag rten zin gsang ba ni 'byor yin//gang zhe na brjengs pa ni//bdag ni bkres par smin pa yin//
184b4(rgyud): byed theg pa m+me bdenA pA n+te//nug par lAs ni la ma zhus pa'o//gling rnaM ni ni 'i da/ba ldan zhes nI s+thA dA na//gang zhig sbyin pa spyod pa dag
184b5(rgyud): sa ma la rigs// sa ni ston pa yin//ga la/ m+b+ha smra ba sbyin/ na kun
184b6(rgyud): /za zhes ni smra ba yin//lag pa g.yas pa sbyin pa yi//'di ster kyimi zhes sbyin pa yin//gang zhig ga ngas nas ni skyab tsha
185a1(rgyud): gang zhig mkha' lding ston pa ni//grol zhes ni ston pa yin//gang zhig khu tshur ston pa ni//de la pa tA ti bstan bya//gang zhig smra no snyan pa la/
185a2(rgyud): rnam par 'gyur ba bltas nas ni//khan+ta ga ni de la bstan//gang zhig yan lag bskyed pa dang //de la mchi ba bstan par bya//gang zhig lag pas lag pa ston//gtor ma za zhes
185a3(rgyud): smra ba yin//gang zhig lag pa g.yas pa ston//de ltar gyis shig smra ba yino//gang zhig rna ba la reg pa//gnas par bya zhes ston pa yin//gang zhig sen mos
185a4(rgyud): sen mo reg/shi yis khyer zhes bya ba yin//gang zhig sa 'dri dkyil 'khor du//de ring 'jug ces smra ba yin//gang zhig nu ma la reg pa//bdag gi bu ni
185a5(rgyud): bsrungs zhes bya//gang zhig mtho g.yon sa la 'dri//gnyen dag bsrungs shig pa ru bshad//gang zhig mig ni rnam 'dzums pa//de ltar bya zhes smra ba yin//
185a6(rgyud): gang zhig tshegs la reg byed pa//bde bar nyal zhes smra ba yin//pho nya ma ni gang yang rung //de dag kun gyis yang dag spyad//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla mi'i/
185a7(rgyud): bla ma las brda'i le'u stau bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o////de nas yan lag phyag rgya yi//mtshan nyid de yis bshad par bya//bud gang spyi gtsug
185b1(rgyud): reg byed pa/mgo bo de la bstan par bya//gang zhig dpral ba ston pa ni//de la khur chos bstan par bya//gang zhig so ni ston pa la//de la lce ni bstan par bya//gang zhig
185b2(rgyud): mchu ni ston byed pa//de la dpung pa bstan par bya//gang zhig rked rgyab ston byed pa//de las na bstan par bya//gang zhig nu ma ston byed pa//dr-i la kos ka bstan par
185b3(rgyud): bya//gang zhig lci ba ston byed pa//de la lte ba bstan par bya//gang zhig gsang ba ston byed pa//de la long ka bstan par bya//gang zhig brla ni ston byed pa//de la
185b4(rgyud): 'og ni bstan par bya//gang zhig pus mo ston byed pa//de la byin pa bstan par bya//gang zhig rkang pa ston byed pa//de la ling ka bstan par bya//gang zhig sor tshigs
185b5(rgyud): ston byed pa//de la sen mo bstan par bya//gong zhig sa ni ston byed pa//da la na mkha' bstan par bya//gang zhig na mkha' ston byed pa//de la nyi ma bstan par bya//
185b6(rgyud): gang zhig chu bo ston byed pa//de la rgya mtsho bstan par bya//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las yan lag gi phyag bya'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa
185b7(rgyud): gsum pa'o///de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa//yan lag je bzhin phyag rgya'i mchog/gang zhig shes pas spun nam ni//sring mor the tsom med
186a1(rgyud): 3\u0f7f/'gyur//sor mo gcig ni ston pa yis//legs par 'ongs zhes smra ba yin//sor mo gnyis ni bstan pa yis//legs 'ongs ldan ni smra ba yin/
186a2(rgyud): 'di ni rnal 'byor ma kun gyi//yan lag phyag rgyar rab tu bshad//mdzub mo gnyis bkug mig gi rgyu//sngags pas gang la de bsten te//de mod ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar//
186a3(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur bar the tsom med//gang zhig gung mo ston byed pa//de la 'dzub mo bstan par bya//gang zhig srin lag ston byed pa//de la lce ni bstan par bya//
186a4(rgyud): gang zhig pa nas ston pa//de la mdun ni bstan par bya//gang zhig spyi bo ston byed pa//de la mtshams kyi mtha' bstan bya//gang zhig sa ni ston byed pa//de la kha ni bstan
186a5(rgyud): par bya//gang zhig khro gnyer ston byed pa//de la mtshams ni bstan par bya//gang zhig so ni ston byed pa//de la mauchu ni bstun par bya//gang zhig mgrin pa ston byed
186a6(rgyud): pa//de la kha ni bstan par bya//gong zhig dpral ba ston byed pa//de la lta ba bstan par bya//'di ni rnal 'byor mA kun gyi//rims bzhin yan lag phyag rgyo
186a7(rgyud): yin//'di dag rtag bstan gsang ba pa//yang dag lta bar 'gro bar 'gyur//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las mkha' gro ma'i yan lag gi phyag
186b1(rgyud): len sna bzhi dan+d+ha na bzhi pal///de nas gzhan yang bya shad b+hA ba//mkha' ma yi mnan nyid do//gang gis rlung nas dpa' bo dang //dpa' ma skyod mar shA
186b2(rgyud): 'gyur ba'o//dam tshig can gang rjes chags pa//rnal 'byor ljongs spyod sa gzhi yin//gzhir ni sa gzhi byas nas//rnal 'byor pa yi sdom pa mchod//go bzlog pa yis//
186b3(rgyud): lta ba ni//bzhin ni rnam par 'gyur ba dang //rtag tu bzhin gyi smin ma gau yo//sna tshogs myur du shes bya ba//de bzhin mkhye 'gro las byung ba'o//rnam bsgyur 'khyil par shes
186b4(rgyud): bya ste//ri mo gsum pa yongasu zlum//mkha'agro ma rnams des 'gro ba'i//de yi mtshan mi shes par bya//gal te ldog par gyur nA nI//sngar bshud don no btad par
186b5(rgyud): 'gyur//de yi dngos ni 'jig gyur pa//rdo rje lta bus gsal ba yin//sgra ni khu zug skad lta bur//gsal ba de ni rtag tu gyur//'di ni mtshan ma'i khyim du ni//rdo rje lta
186b6(rgyud): bu me long bcas//ral gri 'dra ba'i me lang bcas//phyag mtshan mdung 'drar rtag tu 'byung //de gsal me ling yin zhes bya//mtshan myur byas pa'i gzugs dge
186b7(rgyud): ni//mtshan nyid 'di dag dang ldan pa//de ni mkha' gro mo rnams kyi//mchog yin par ni shes par bya//bo taM gi zhes bya ba ni//gsong por spro ba'o//pra ti po teg
187a1(rgyud): / ba srog slo pa smrad ma //kar+m+ma sa b+h+ya na nas sa//rtswa nas smyan//'drad zhes //\u0f7fzhes byu na
187a2(rgyud): na/zhes ma nas sa bani pa/ra hU~Mn skyed dan/ ni kauH/
187a3(rgyud): nr-i dz+dza)//kA rI rI ba//b+hU r+b+huk+Sha/thar maN+Din na du/Asmr-i ta s+thA na~M bstu sa~M pa 'aM//sam kI ma nu lom hU~M ma~M ka ni mra 'i 'gra ma'o//na kani dkyil la
187a4(rgyud): na du 'ad /likAn+ta/shAs gas/ d+hi ni rgyal rigs/d+hA rad+nade rje skyes ma mo/no//
187a5(rgyud): kan khyimam/TIkAn spyang mo'o//me lwa b+ha kar+m+ma rbAl/krI heraN ni rdo rje chu ga d+h+r-i ba'o//skye sa la dag pa ni lcags pa n+de / tra~MT+TA dAnra/
187a6(rgyud): gnas mig mo nas 'ong sa zhes bya'o//kri ran ni me tog/tu mU la ni rgud pa'o//tAn+da ni chur dbab pa bzlog du'o//trib+hU ni zhu bre ny-i ni phreng / ni seM di
187a7(rgyud): ba par/sa nu ni re ring//sa ta dru //mthu lan yan lag/bdun ni gding ngo //dza ti ka ni s+thi'o//auta ni ni sr-ik+ShI nau
187b1(rgyud): mtshan//tshan do ni phreng ba'o//tsa la ni rlung ngo //pa shu ni ri dag so//yan+tin dkyil 'khor ro//sha na ma ni 'azhi mdo'o//phal ku shi ni skye ba'o//ma hA k+Sha ra ba ni phyugs chen po'o//
187b2(rgyud): bA ni ra skyeso//na ni mi'o//go ni khyu mchog/ma ni ma haM'o//b+ha ni bza' ba'o//ha ni rnam grangaso//a d+h+ya na rgyal po'o//khA la reg pa ni zos zhes pa'o//lci la reg pa ni
187b3(rgyud): ngoms zhes pa'o//nasti ni snying po'o//hrin ngo tsha'o//mthun gyis shig pa'o//brla la reg pa ni stong po'o//steng du gcig/'og tu med pa'o//phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i
187b4(rgyud): lan//dpa' bo'i gsung gi gsang ba'i brda'o//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las mkha' gro ma'i brda'i tshi ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o///
187b5(rgyud): de nas rnal 'byor rgyud du ni//rnyed dka'i dam tshig nga yis bshad//skyes pa 'am bud med g.yon nas 'gro//'dod pa'i dngos grub stor bar byed//khyim dang zhing du rnam gnas
187b6(rgyud): pa/shin tu ring yang shes par 'gyur//ha ru ka las sbyor gzhan med//slob dpon rnal 'byor ma nyid ni//rgyud 'di ru ri sgrub pa'o//logs par gyur pa nyid yin te//
187b7(rgyud): brnyas mi bya zhing spang mi bya//nus pa yis ni mchod par bya//pho nya ma brgyad 'od dag ni//mos dang dad pa 'phel byed pa//rtag par dngos grub rnams kyi rgyu//dam tshig/
188a1(rgyud): namasaHd+ma spyod pa'o//l+h+wam bzhan da kunu sgyur bA'o//'du la rmongs par gyur ba dang //ga me dang thags myed drung //dam tshig spyad par spyad pa da /
188a2(rgyud): bud med dbang phyug shin tu sbyor//tshangs par spyod pa de bzhin gzhi//khro med rgyun gyi kun tu spyod//'di brgyad dmatshig kun spyod yin//sgrub pa la ni gnas pa yi//
188a3(rgyud): sgrub pa po yis rtag shes bya//rgyud kun gyi ni thun mong ste//rgyu med pa ni gzhom mi bya//dang po nyid kyis blang bya yi//mig dang log pas ma yin//gsang ba 'di ni mi
188a4(rgyud): basbyin cing //rab tu 'bad de ska ba dang //blo sbyi ni mthe chung bskyong bar ni//pho nya mo rnams yang dag gnas//ngag dang ma dge 'dres pa ste//sgrub pa po ni gsum du gnas
188a5(rgyud): mnyes byed rnam par dag pa dang //gsal byed smon ldan pa'i mo'o//yul yul du ni dku' thub ce na//po nya'i gzugs kyi mtshan ma rtag/pho nya ral gri so 'dra zhing
188a6(rgyud): dag byed bsod nams 'phel byed yin//de bzhin pa nye legs 'dres pas//sgrub pa po yis dngos grub thob//bzlas mchod bsam gtan med par yang //myur hA
188a7(rgyud): nyid du 'grub par 'gyur//sngags dang phyag rgya sgrub pa pas//mchod pa nyid la rab tu 'jug/'di las gzhan pa'i mchod med de//de ltar bstan bcos nges pa yin//

188b2(rgyud): pa'i rigs rnams ni//kun la nye bar spyang bya zhing //bza' min par ni mi brtag/'di nyid du ni de dbyer med//pho nya mo yi sgrub pa gnyis//dngos grub cho ga la spyod tshe//
188b3(rgyud): pho nya gcig pu kho na yin//byang chub phyogs kyi dngos grub ni//sgrub pa dag dang nye ba dang //bla mo brgyud rim gyis thob pa'i//dbang bskur bas ni sngags legs ldan//

188b5(rgyud): par langs//lus kyi bya ba kun byas te//lus la shin tu mtshon cha ni//lus la gnas par kun tu spyad//dag byed byas pa'i lus kyis ni//rtag tu sngags ni brjod par bya//

188b7(rgyud): bdag gi don dang gzhan don du//dam tshig spyod pa nyid du bya//'di la lhan cig long spyod bya//mtshan mau rtag par na mkha'i go/gnag dang dmar bar rtag 'gyur bya//srog

195a7(rgyud): zhi ba'i bdung bas bzhin myangs na//dngos grub rtag tu thob par 'gyur//'di ni mi mchi bcu phyed 'gyur//dngos grub thams cad 'jug pa yin//mchod bzhi de
195b1(rgyud): dpa' bo ni//dbang gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa yis//snyoms par 'jug pa'i de nyid 'dzin//mngon du bsnyen pa bya ba ni//cho ga bzhin du 'bum du bzla//'khor lo'i gsung
195b2(rgyud): sngags 'bum bzlas shing //rang gi lha'i yang 'bum du bzla//gzhan ni khri ru bzla bar bya//bka' bzhin 'khor lo bri bya zhing //mdangs ldan mi mchog dag gis ni//dkyil
195b3(rgyud): 'khor bri cing dgod par bya//sngar bshad gnas ni gang yin pa//dar ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bya//sa ni yongasu sbyang bar bya//brdung zhing legs par brdungs na su//mnyam zhing
195b4(rgyud): zug rngu rnam par spang //sa la ma lhung lci ba yi//dkyil 'khor sa ni nye bar byug/dur khrod thal bar ldan pa dang //mi 'chi bcu phyed bcas pa yis//dkyil 'khor sa ni
195b5(rgyud): nyer byugs te//der ni dkyil 'khor yang dag rtsam//dur khrod du ni kun spyod cing //ro bsregs sol ba'i phye ma dang //dur khrod brgyad dang ldan pa yis//slob dpon lags par
195b6(rgyud): mnyam gzhag ste//dkyil 'khor bzang po bri bar bya//slob dpon mtshan nyid thams cad ldan//mtshan ma ngan pa kun spangs shing //yang dag shes shing rgyud shes pa//
195b7(rgyud): dpal ldan khrag 'thung gsang sngags shes//khro med gtsang zhing mkhas pa dang //sbyor shis ye shes pha rol 'gro//thod pas spyi bor brgyan byas shing //yan lag thal
196a1(rgyud): bas byugs pa dang //gug skyed dag gis lus rgyan cing //rus phreng rus par yang dag gnas//dum gcig spyi bor rgyan pa dang //rus pa'i phreng bas rnam par
196a2(rgyud): rgyan//kha T+wAM ga ni lag na gnas//bdag nyid shrI ho ru kar ni//byas nas de yi 'og tu ni//dpal ldan he ru ka dran bya//'khor lo 'di yi snying khar dgod//de ltar bdag nyid go//
196a3(rgyud): bgos nas//ra ba rnams ni phyogasu dgod//'og tu'ang mtshon cha dgod par bya//'khor lo'i bdag nyid bkod nas ni//steng du mda' yi dra ba dang //bdag nyid mtshon cha'i dra
196a4(rgyud): ba bye//de ltar gro bgos sum cu ni//rtse gsum pas kyang gzhig mi nus//de lta bdag nyid rab kyi bsrungs shing //sngags dang phyag rgyas rnam rgyan nas//dngos grub
196a5(rgyud): thams cad rab ster ba'i//dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya//de nas sems med srad bu la//ru d+hi ra ni chen pos brlan//dpal ldan khrag 'thung grong mchog gi/
196a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa thig gdab bya//khru bzhi pa la khru brgyad pa//sgo bzhi kun nes zur bzhi pa//sngags pas nyis gyur rnam spyod cing //mkha' gro dra ba bden
196a7(rgyud): mchog bzlas//de yi dbus bzhag pa ni//mdab chags lte ba 'bar dang bcas//gaM sar yang dag ldan pa yi//sna tshogs pad+ma mdab brgyad pa//lte b.rare bkod
196b1(rgyud): bya dpa' bo ni//'jigs byed chen po'i gzugs can la//mdangs dang ldan zhing rab tu 'bar//ha ha zhes byar sgra cher bzhad//thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan dang ldan//bzang po spyan gsum
196b2(rgyud): zhal bzhi mnga'//glang po'i lpags pa rnam par bgos//smin ma bzang po rdo rje 'byes//phyag na kho T+wAM gaM bsnams shing //brgya phyed phreng bas rnam par rgyan//de mdun gnas pa'i
196b3(rgyud): lha mo ni//rdo rje phrag mo zhes bya ba//rab 'jigs 'jigs byed che la phyogs//spyan gsum drag po'i gzugs cin bya//ka pA li ni an+tes bkang //kha nas ru d+hi ra 'dzeg cing //
196b4(rgyud): lha dang lha min mir bcas dang //phyogs kun tu ni bsdigs mdzub cing //mkha 'gro min nyi shu bzhi//phag mo yi ni rigs las byung //phyogs dang phyogs kyi mtshams rnams ni//
196b5(rgyud): 'khor lo'i lte bar mchod par bya//de bzhin 'dir ni dpa' blo yang //'khor lor yang dag gnas pa mchod//sgrub po gal te dngos grub 'dod//gnyis med dpa' bo mchod
196b6(rgyud): par byed/de nas bum pa bya ba ni//rtsa ba nag po la sogs med//mu tig gser dang rin chen dang //byi ru dngul dang zangs ma ste//bza' ba kun gyis legs bkang bya'i//
196b7(rgyud): snod no steng du bzhag par bya//mgrin pa srad dus dkri ba dang //kha ni mdab mas brgyan par bya//gos zung gis ni legs dkris pa//brgyad ni sgo ru rnam par dgod//gos rlung
197a1(rgyud): gos ni dkris pa yi//bum pa dbu pa du su bzhag/byaser ram dngul lam rin tshun nam//mu tig rnams ni mdzes pad bya//dkyil 'khor kun tu/
197a2(rgyud): rin chen dang //gser rnams kyis ni mdzes par spyad//grong mchog yid 'ong mchod nas ni//grub pa nyid du the tsam med//bdag nyid kyi ni gdong lus kun//dri yi chu
197a3(rgyud): yis legs par bsang //gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na//mar me brgya ni dbul bar bya//na mkha'i mkha' gro ma rnams ni//yid kyi thams cad steng du dgod//sa
197a4(rgyud): stengs mkha'agro ma gang yin//dkyil 'khor kun tu dgod par bya//gang yang sa 'og rnamasu dgod//ma mo thams cad phyogs dang ni//phyogs mtshams rnamasu dgod
197a5(rgyud): par bya//gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na//dri dang me tog bdug spos dang //mar me brgya yang dbul bya zhing //dpal ldan khrag 'thung dkyil 'khor gnas//
197a6(rgyud): dpa' bo rnal 'byor me mchod bya//rgyal mtshan dmar dang de bzhin ser//dkar dang gnag dang ser skya dang //de bzhin gos ni sna tshogs dang //me tog phreng ba du ma
197a7(rgyud): dang /bla'i dag dang dar bcas pa'i//mda' ni shin tu mdzes pa dang //de bzhin bza' bca' btung ba yis//rab mnyam gzhag ste mchod par bya//de nas sgrub
197b1(rgyud): pos dngos grub kyis//dang por slob dpon mnyes par bya//grub 'dod shin tu mnyam gzhag pas//ci nus par ni bla ma mchod//dril dbyangs me tog spos kyis rgyan//shin tu sku
197b2(rgyud): snyan dril bu dkrol//sgrub pa po yis rnga brdungs shing //ha ha zhes ni brjod pa'ang bya//de ltar tshe ga bzhin dkyil 'khor//'dod pa kun ldan mchod nas ni//de yi bu sdug
197b3(rgyud): gdong la ni//dar gyi legs par bkab na su//me tog gis bkang thal mo dag/pad+mas gtor nas bskor ba ni//g.yon phyogs bskor nas phyag byas te/hUM dang phaT kye sgra
197b4(rgyud): yang brjod//g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis//dngos grub sras po bzhag par bya//thal mo me tog gtor nas ni//gang du babs pa'i bsam pa ni//bskor ba dag kyang byas nas//
197b5(rgyud): shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa yis//sgrub pa po yis byas nas gzhug/de nas yon thogs grong khyer du//g.yas pa'i phyogasu brten nas ni//snyim pa'i me tog dkyil 'khor
197b6(rgyud): dor//dkyil 'khor gang du me tog babs//de yi rigs ni bstan par bya//de nas slob dpon legs par ni//rab mnyam gzhag ste phyag rgya mchod//de nas slob ma gnyis pa la/
197b7(rgyud): mtshal chen lan gsum bzlas pa yis//de la thig le bya ba yin//de nas slob ma'i gdong phye la//dkyil 'khor dag ni bstan par bya//gang gi lha yi gnas gang yin//der
198a1(rgyud): de yang dag bstan pa bya//slob dpon dang ni lhan cig tu//rab tu btud pa byas nas ni//g.yon nas brnams pa'i rim pa yis//de nas bskor ba rab tu bya//dkyil/
198a2(rgyud): 'khor dang ni bla ma la//ji bzhin cho gas phyag bya'o//de nas bla ma dag la yon//de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa dbul//gser ni brgya stong dbul ba dang //rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs
198a3(rgyud): dang //ras ni zung gyur brgya nyid dang //glang po rta 'am yul 'khor ram//rna rgyan dang ni gdu bu dang //mgul gdub sor gdub dam pa dang //gser las byas pa'i mchod
198a4(rgyud): phyir thogs//chung ma bzang dang bu mo nyid//bran po bran mo sring mo rnams//phyag byas nas ni dbul bar bya//deng nas brtsams te bran du ni//khyed la bdag ni dbul lags/
198a5(rgyud): zhes//blo ldan kun nas dang ba yis//bdag nyid kyang ni dbul bar bya//de lhor nges par bya ba ni//sgrub pa po yis rab nges byas//de nas de la mkha'agro ma//rnal 'byor ma
198a6(rgyud): rnams mnyes par 'gyur//mkha'agro ma dang lA ma dang //dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma//sgrub pa mkha 'gro ma lhan cig/de dang rnam sbyong 'gro ba kun//sgrub pa po ni de
198a7(rgyud): dag gi/ji bgyi byed par the tsom med//rnal 'byor 'di ni grubo 'gyur na//'jig rten gsum du mi zlogs shing //mi snang phug dang gnos mkha' rgyu//rkang mgyogs de
198b1(rgyud): bzhin bcud kyis len//sgrub pa po ni 'dod tsam gyis//rtag par rgyun tu skyed par 'gyur//gzugs ni du ma byed pa dang //nam mkha' la ni 'gro dang 'gyur//mkha' phro rnams kyi khyad
198b2(rgyud): par du//nges gnon 'gro ba thams cad kyang //lan cig bltas pa'i sbyor ba yis/skad cig gis ni sbyor nyid skyed//sngags pa'i dkyil 'khor ma mthong bar//gang zhig rnal
198b3(rgyud): 'byor pa nyid 'dod//mkha' la khu tshur gyis rdeg dang //smig rgyu'i chu ni 'thungs dang mtshungs//rnal 'byor 'di ni mchog rab dang //sbyor ba kun gyi dam pa'i yin//gang
198b4(rgyud): zhig rtag tu 'dod gyur pa//de ni lha mi zil gnon 'gro//de nyid bsdus par gyur pa 'am//gsang ba 'am rdo rje 'jigs byed las//dkyil 'khor rnams kyu rgyal po 'dri/
198b5(rgyud): ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur//bshad dang ma bshad gang ci'ang rung //de kun dpal ldan khrag 'thung gnas/mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dkyil 'khor gyi cho
198b6(rgyud): ga'i le na ste zhing cuH dbu pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//sbyor ba'i mtshams dang yang dag ldan//chu med pa ni mchims yin te//gos pa med cing chags
198b7(rgyud): spangs pa//mtshamos ni 'byung po thams cad pa//de ni sems can thams cad de//mtshams ni srid pa dge ba ste//dbyangs spyong he ru ka nyid yin//rnal 'byar pa yis bsgom
199a1(rgyud): shing dbru/gcig car 'byung bar snang ba ste//dung dang kun da'i mdog kyang 'dzin//rgyan rnams thams cad yongasu rdzogs//mtshan rnams kun gyis mtshan pa ste/
199a2(rgyud): zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa//spyan gsum pa la thugs rje'i nyams//skra grol dpral bar thod pa ste//spyi gtsug tu ni zla ba'o//he ru ka dpal yang dag ldan//mtshams
199a3(rgyud): rnams grub pa'i mchog dam pa//thun bzhi ru ni bya ba'o//dga' ba bzhi po dga' ba dang //lte ba'i snying pad nu mi'i dbus//lce yi rtsa dang mgo steng du//dga' ba dang ni mchog
199a4(rgyud): dga' nyid//dam par dga' dang lhan cig skyes//dang po mdab ma drug cu bzhi//gnyis pa brgyad pa mchog yin te//gsum pa mdab ma bcu drug pa//bzhi pa sum
199a5(rgyud): cu rtsa gnyis mdab//phag mo'i lte ba'i cor gnas pa//lhan cig skyes dga' khrag 'thung mchog/sbyor ba'i dus kyi mtsham su ni//'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
199a6(rgyud): bsgom bya//sdug bsngal sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste//kun 'byung chos kyi 'khor lo yin//'gog pa long spyod 'khor lo ste//lam ni bde ba chen po yin//de
199a7(rgyud): ltar mtsham su byin rlabs nas//rnal 'byor nges pa byas pa ste//dkar dang sngo dang ldang ba dang //spyan gsum thugs rje stong pa'i nyams//rnam thar gsu
199b1(rgyud): dang sku gsum gyis//yongasu dag par rim par sbyor//rdo rje dri bu mnyam par ldan//thod pa drang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin//mgo ba gri gug phyag nu bsnams//sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du
199b2(rgyud): bzhugs//zla ba yi dgras pad dbus//skra grol phyogs kyi gos can yin//dgos pa'i nyams kyis mos pa ste//dus rtag tu ni mchim bsgom na/sdom pa mchog ni grub pa yin/
199b3(rgyud): dri chen rdo rje chu dang ni//rin chen snang ba mtha' yas dang //don yod grub pa'ang de bzhin te//de dag rtag tu bsres na su//rnal 'byor rtag tu mtshams la 'dud//gsang sngags
199b4(rgyud): 'di dag rtag tu yang //he ru ka ni dbyangs spyong mchog/A~M shrI hUM ruk+ShA ya bi me he bid+hi rA dza ya d+hIHma he ti no bI r+yA pra dzA da yA AHhU~M//rtag tu mtshams ni rnams bsgoms
199b5(rgyud): na//dbyangs skyong mchog gi bzlas pa bya//dbyangs skyong ming ni rig byed de//las rnams thams cad byed pa dge/dus min 'chi ba mon 'gyur zhing //zhi dang rgyas dang dbang
199b6(rgyud): yang grob//'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi//don ni sngags pa rtag tu smra//dngos grub 'di ni rab tu 'grub//de ma thag tu grub chen bcas//'jig rten gsum po
199b7(rgyud): grub pa yin//sgrub po'i dbang pos rnam bsgoms te//khrag 'thung cho ga bzhi ni shes nas//zhag gisum brtul zhugs la gnas na//lha yi gnasu 'gro ba yin//
200a1(rgyud): wA yi ye shes thob nas ni//lha yi lus kyi mchog kyang 'dzin//dgra rnams kun la dbang thob cing //thams cad mkhyen par gyur nas//rga dang 'chi ba/
200a2(rgyud): rnam par spangs//sangs rgyas lha yis bsten pa ste/srid par sangs rgyas rol par mdzad//nyin zhig gsum gyi bar du yang //phyag rgya lhan cig 'byung ba spyad//mthong nas sring mo
200a3(rgyud): yang dag sgrub//zhag gsum bar du mchod byas nas//rdo rje he ru ka dpal lha//thams cad kyang ni byon par 'gyur//pus mo sa la btsugs nas ni//de yis phyag ni byas nas kyang
200a4(rgyud): bskum pos rtag tu mchod pa bya//sgrub po 'dod la dga' bas ni//mod las dpa' bos thams cad mkhyen//gtso bo thams cad 'dzin pa ste//khams gsum kun tu rnam spyod
200a5(rgyud): cing //sgrub pa po ni mchog tu 'gyur//'di ni dpa' chen dpa' bo ste//gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs//de ni rnam par shes tsam gyis//sa gzhi ska rags kyis
200a6(rgyud): bskor ba/lha dang lha min mi rnams kyang //sgrub pa po ni de nyid kyi//mod la dbang du gyur pa yin//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dbyangs skyong gi mtshams
200a7(rgyud): kyi le'u lnga bcu pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//yi ge bdun pa sgom pa ste//yi ge hUM las yang dag 'byung //rdo rje mkha'agro bde ba che//phyag drug zhal
200b1(rgyud): gsum spyan gsum pa//mtshan rnams thams cad kyis mtshan cing //dpe byad bzang po brgyad cur ldan//A li ka li las byung gtso//phrag mo dang ni mnyam par ldan//stong zhing
200b2(rgyud): thugs rjes khyab pa ste//rdo rje dri bus mnyam par ldan//na ra'i lpags pa gosu banabs//thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing //g.yas pa'i phyag na mdung rtse gsum//'dod pa'i
200b3(rgyud): 'bras bu thams cad stsol//thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//sna tshogs rdo rje ral pa 'chang //zla ba phyed pa'i spyi gtsug gtsang //phyag rgya drug gis sku lus rgyan//'jigs
200b4(rgyud): byed chung mar bcas pa dag/g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis man ni//sna tshogs pad+ma nyid la bzhugs//'khor lo drug gi dbus bzhugs//rnal 'byor ma drug mnyam par sbyar//myur
200b5(rgyud): du dngos grub stsol ba yin//dang po khrag 'thung lha mo ste//gnyis pa rdo rje 'jigs byed ma//gsum pa drag gtum ma yin te//bzhi pa rdo rje nyi ma mo//lnga pa rdo rje drag mo ste//drug pa rdo rje/
200b6(rgyud): mkha' gro ma//g.yon gyi phyogs nas dgod par bya//lha mo de dag cher gtum zhing //spyan gsum dbu sgra grol ba ste//phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa yin//thams cad yi
200b7(rgyud): dgas nyi stengs bzhugs//sngo zhing ser la ldang ba dang //dmar dang dud ka de bzhin dkor//cang te'u dang dril bu 'dzin//thams cad na ra'i lpags pa 'dzin//thod pa'i phreng
201a1(rgyud): pa'i dbu rgyun can//g.yas brkyang g.yon brkyang tshul gyis bzhugs//yi ge drug las yang dag byung //lha mo gzigs pa mtshan pa yin//ji ltar mgon po
201a2(rgyud): mdog bzhin du//phag mo yang ni de bzhin te//phyag rgya phyag mtshan de bzhi no//sngo dang ser dang ldang ba dang //stag gi lpags pa gosu banabs//lha mo'i byin par mnyam par
201a3(rgyud): 'khril//mchog tu dga' bar rnam par mos//oM hU~MHha ha hUM hUM phaT/yi ge de las mkha' gro ma//yan lag drug pa rnam par sgom//bdun pa dbusu dgod pa ni//yi ge
201a4(rgyud): hUM las he ru ka/dbusu dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka'o//chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje he ru ka/
201a5(rgyud): ma'o//brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni//rdo rje 'jigs byed ma'o//dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni drag gtum mo'o//shin tu sbyangs pa yang
201a6(rgyud): dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje nyi ma'o//ting 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje drag mo'o//btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma
201a7(rgyud): ste/byang chub yan 'di bdun sgom//ji lta'i rim pas sbyor zhing sgom//gsang sngags gzhal med pa bzlas shing //khro bo kun gyi gnas mchog ste//bsod nams
201b1(rgyud): chung ba'i sgrub pos kyang //zla pad nang du dngos grub ste//rtag tu zhag re bsgoms pa ni//zhag bdun gyis ni the tsom med//dpyid zla tha chungs nya la ni//ma sring bu mo tsha ma dang //shes
201b2(rgyud): rab thabs kyi cho ga yis//nyin mtshan bzlas shing sgom byas pas//tho rangs dpal khrag 'thungs mnyam 'gyur//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las nye ba'i snying po
201b3(rgyud): bsgoms pas bskyed pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o////gzhan yang snying po bshad bya ba//sems can kun la phan 'dogs pa//hUM gi yi ge las byung ba//bde ba
201b4(rgyud): chen po bde las byung //sngo zhing dkar la drag po ste//zhal brgyad pa la shin tu 'jigs//spyan gsum pa la phyag bcu drug/mgo yi phreng bas rnam par rgyan//thod pa'i phreng ba'i
201b5(rgyud): dbu rgyan can//zla ba phyed pa'i ral pa 'chang //sna tshogs rdo rje dbu la mnan//phyag rgya drug gis sku la rgyun//'jig byed chen po 'jigs pa ni//g.yas brkyang ba yi
201b6(rgyud): zhabs kyis gnon//dus mtshan shin tu 'jigs pa yang //g.yon bskum pa yi zhabs kyis gnon//rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas//phag mo yi na ku tsha 'tshor//tshangs
201b7(rgyud): lpags bzhus nas rgyan du 'dzin//mdung rtse gsum dang dgra sta dang //kha T+wAM cang te'u gri gug mchog/brgyad pa la ni lcags kyu thogs//g.yas pa'i phyag rnams de
202a1(rgyud): /bzhin//thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/mgo bo zhugs pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/tho ba bsdigs mdzub dam pa ste//shrI'i ye shes yang dag rdzogs//phang du pag
202a2(rgyud): mo'i gzugs yin te//drag cing dam pa la dkar ba yin//byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril//skra grol ba la spyan gsum pa//thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan//de yi
202a3(rgyud): zhal dang phyag tu gnas//dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can//mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal//phyogs kyi gos can chags pas gzigs//rked pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya
202a4(rgyud): yang che//sngo zhing dkar la de bzhin dmar//ser zhing ljang la dud kha ste//du ba thal ba sprin gyi mdog/'di 'dra'i zhal dang gzugasu gnas//lha mo mnga' dang gzhu 'dzin tsong //
202a5(rgyud): tshangs pa'i lpags pa rnam par spangs//sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du ni//zla ba nyi ma'i dbu su bzhugs//'khor lo brgyad pa'i dbus bzhugs par//phyi yi dkyil 'khor rnam
202a6(rgyud): par sgrom//pad+ma'i lte ba'i dbusu ni//bcom ldani 'das ni nges par dgod//oM ni shar gyi mdab ma la//gsal byed mkha' 'gro ma yang dgod//ba ni byang gi mdab la ste/
202a7(rgyud): rta gdong mkha' gro ma yang dgod//dzA ni rdo rje drab mo ste//mkha' gro nub tu dgod par bya//he ru lho phyogs mda' la dgod//gser gyi mdog can mkha 'gro ma//ser dang sngo
202b1(rgyud): bsangs dkar dang dmar//zhal gsum rnam bsgyur drag po ste//phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba//ro yi steng du bzhugs pa ste/gra yas brkyang ba yis bdud bzhi 'joms//thod pa'i
202b2(rgyud): phreng ba drag po ste//pad+ma sbom po'i mdab ma la//chags pa con gyis gzigs shing bzhed//thugs rje'i nyams kyis bdi ba yin//mnga' dang gzhu yang 'chang ba ste//zhags pa
202b3(rgyud): lcags kyu 'dzin pa'i mchog/thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM bsnams//cang te'u ni sgra yang sgrogs//ser dang ljang ku sngo ba dang //sngo bsangs dmar dang dkar ba dang //dkar dang ljang khu
202b4(rgyud): sngo ba dang //dmar dang sngo dang ldang ba ste//'di ltar mdog ni khyad par gyis//dam tshig mchog ni bsgom par bya//mtshams bzhi ru ni bum pa dag/byang chub sems kyis
202b5(rgyud): gang bar gzhag/shar gyi phyog su ha yin te//ming ni he li ka zhes bya//byang gi phyog su ru yin te//mkha 'gro ma ni ru tsa ki/nub kyi phyogasu ru yin te//ru tsa ka ma li zhes
202b6(rgyud): byaHna lho yi phyogasu kaM yin to//keng rus ma zhes grags pa yin//mo yi phyogasu hU~M mdzad ma//bden bral phyogasu phaT mdzad ma//rlung gi phyog su Da ma ri//dbang ldan kri
202b7(rgyud): li ki la sngo//de brgyad lha mo chen mo ste//dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol//ji ltar zhal dang gzugs bzhin du//de bzhin 'dir yang 'gyur ba yin//thod pa dang ni
203a1(rgyud): khan+d+ha 'dzin//dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang //spyan gsum pa la sgra grol ba//phyogs kyi glus can g.yas brgyad bzhugs//thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan can te/
203a2(rgyud): phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan//rkyen rnams thams cad yang dag ldan//drag cing gtum la rab 'jigs pa'i//thams cad ro yi steng bzhugs sgom//spyan gsum pa la
203a3(rgyud): tshigs pas myos//dbang ldan zur la ud bal sngon po zhes bya ba//rlung gi phyogs la dra ba'i mchog ces bya ba ste//bden bral phyogs la gsus pa 'phyang ma zhes bya ba//me
203a4(rgyud): yi phyogs la sha bi ra zhes bya ba ste//ser dang sngo bsangs sngo ba dang //dmar ser dang ni bzhi pa ste//thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin//gri gug cang te'u mchog yin te//bzhi pa
203a5(rgyud): rdo rje mdung yino//phyogs kyi gos can chags pas rol//bzang mo lto ba 'phyang ma ste//skye gnas ring la rgya yang tsho//spyan gsum rnam par 'gyur zhing drag/skra grol
203a6(rgyud): ba la rab tu 'jigs//thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spud po'o//shar sgor baM las gtumi ma zhes bya ba'i mkha' gro ma dang //lho'i sgor
203a7(rgyud): raM las rol gtu mo zhes bya ba'i mkha 'gro ma dang /nub kyi sgor sa las 'bar ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha 'gro ma dgod do//byang gi sgor ha las phreng ba rnam par rgyal
203b1(rgyud): ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha'agro ma ste//sngo dang dkar ser nyid te//lcags kyu dang nI cang te'u 'dzin//thad pa kha T+wAM ga bsnams te//bri gug man za bsdigs mdzub dang //dkar
203b2(rgyud): dang sngo dang ldang ba dang //zhags pa dang ni tsa te'u 'dzin//thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing //bsdigs mdzub gri gug mgo ba 'dzin//dmar dang sngo dang ljang ku ste//lcags sgro
203b3(rgyud): cang ti'u gri gug dang /thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing //mgo bo dang ni bsdigs mdzub mchog/ljang dang dkar po 'dres pa dang //ser dang dmer ba'i zhal mchog yin//dril
203b4(rgyud): bu tsang te'u gri gug dang //kha T+wAM gi dang thod pa dang //mgo bo dang ni sdig mdzub phyag/skra grol ba la bdug pa che//spyan gsum rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal//zhal madrangs
203b5(rgyud): ljags ni bskyod pa ste//g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum tshul gyis bzhugs//thad pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste//ro dang pad+ma'i nyi
203b6(rgyud): dbus bzhugs//mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan//thams cad phyag rgya lnga 'chang zhing //mgo ba'i do shal rnams kyis rgyan//mi bskyod pa yi cod pan 'ching //
203b7(rgyud): rnam bsgyur spyan ni g.yo ba ste//yi ge nyi shu gnyis las byung //snying khar mchog ni bsgom par bya//'di ni gsang sngags thams cad kyi//yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis ma
204a1(rgyud): /oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru ka hU DA ki nA dz+wA la shA ba ra hU hUM phaT swAhA//yi ge re re dgod pa ste//mkha' gra mA yi snying de bzhin//hU shrI lha dang lha mo ste//sku gsung
204a2(rgyud): /thugs kyi sbyor ba'o//dbusu rnam dge bcom ldan 'das//sgom zhing rnam par besgom par bya//rnam par thar brgyad sgo sna tshogs//gzugasu lte ba steng pa ste//nang gzugs
204a3(rgyud): med par phyi rol gzugasu lta ba'ang stong pa yin//sdug dang mi sdug mthong bar byed pa lta ba'ang stong pa yin//nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dag tu lta ba'ang stong pa ste//
204a4(rgyud): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dag tu lta bu 'di stong pa yin//ci yang med pa'i skye mched dag tu lta ba'ang stong pa yin//'du shes med cing 'du shes med mi nI skye
204a5(rgyud): mtshad rnams kyang stong pa'o//'du shes dang ni tsher ba'ang 'gog par lta ba stong pa yino//phyag bcu drug pa'ang stong pa ste/nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang
204a6(rgyud): stong pa nyid dang //stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha'
204a7(rgyud): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang //
204b1(rgyud): rang gi mtshan nyid stong po nyid dang //mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang //ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do//ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bzhin du//phag ma yang na
204b2(rgyud): de bzhin te//gnyis med gzugs can bcom ldan 'das//he ru kA dpal rnam par shos//phrag mo na mkha'i lta bu'i// me ba~M ni yis rnam dge pa//gas la byed mkha' gro
204b3(rgyud): ma nyid ni//don rnams so sor yang dag rig/rta gdong ma gang yin pa'o//tshus rnams so sor yang dag rig/rdo rje drag mo mkha'agro ma//des tshig so so yang dag rig
204b4(rgyud): g+hasar mdog can gyi mkha'agro ma//spobs pa so sor yang dag rika/lha mo de dag 'dab ma'i dbus//rton pa rnam pa bzhi po ni//he lI kA ni don la rton pa ste//ruHkI ni
204b5(rgyud): tshig 'bru rton pa yin//ru tsa ka me le ni ye shes rton//keng rus ma ni rnam shes rton pa yin//shar dang byad dang nub dang ni//lho phyogs kyi ni 'khor lo la//chos
204b6(rgyud): gyi mngon bzhi po dgod//hU~M ni 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'o//phaT ni 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o//Da ma ri ni chos thams cad bdag med pa'o//ki prI ka
204b7(rgyud): la ni chos thams cad zhi ba'o//me dang bden bral rlung dang ni//dbang ldan 'khor lo de dag kun//lha mo yis ni rnam par dag/mi 'jigs pa bzhi dngos po'i chos
205a1(rgyud): thams cad rtogs pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni ud pal sngon pa ma'o//chos thams cad ston pa la 'jigs pa ni dran pa'i mchog ga/nges par 'byung bar
205a2(rgyud): lam la 'jug pa la 'jigs pa ni gsus pa 'phyang ma'o//zag pa zad pa shes pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni sa ba ri ma'o//mtshams dkyil 'khor lha mo na//'di yi
205a3(rgyud): zur bzhi rnam par dag/sgo bzhi drug tu lha mo nr-i//gtum byed ma ste dad pa'i dbang po'o//rol gtum ma ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o//'bar mchog ma ni dran pa'i
205a4(rgyud): dbang po'o//rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog ni ting 'dzin gyi dbang po'o//dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ni bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung rdo rje'o//sum cu rtsa gnyis
205a5(rgyud): mtshan rnams ni//'phags pa shes rab bcom ldan 'das ma//rdo rje phag mo nyid yino//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyi
205a6(rgyud): snying po bsgoms pas bskyed pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gnyis pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad bye ba//dkyil 'khror dag ni rnam dag nI//'byung ba kun
205a7(rgyud): gyi sman yin te//rnam por snang mdzad thig tu grags//b+ha gas khyab pa'i rim pa ni//mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig tu shes//dus ni sna tshogs rigs/
205b1(rgyud): shes//mchod pa sna tshogs cho ga bzhin//pu li rim pad+ma'o//dzA lan b+hA ra thugs 'khor lo//ur+yan gsung gi 'khor lo ste//a ra bu da ni sru yi 'khor lo//gro da ba rIr zur bzhi'o//
205b2(rgyud): /rA me shwa ra me phyogs//de bI ko Ta bden bral yen//mA li ba ni rlung gi zur//dbang ldan kA ma ru pa ste//grA bzhi rnam par dag pa ni//'di la the tsom med pa yin//oM dre dag ni
205b3(rgyud): shar gyi sgo'o//tri sha ku ne lho phyogs sgo//ko sa la ni nub kyi sgo'o//ka ling ka ni byang sgo ste//shar gyi rta babs lam pA ka/kAM tsi lho yi rta babs yin//he mi la ya
205b4(rgyud): nub phyogaso//pre ta phu ri byang yin te//gr-i ha de bu lha snam bu//so so shA Sh+Ta ni rin chen sa//su bar dI pa dra ba phyed//na ga ra ni rnga yab dang //dril bu rgyal mtshan ba dan no//
205b5(rgyud): sinA d+h+r-i rdo rje thig zlum pa//ma ru tI ni sgo khyod do//ku lu tA ti rdo rje dang //rin po che dang //dkyil 'khor gyi//thig ni bla na med pa yin//zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//rta babs
205b6(rgyud): bzhis ni rnam par rgyan//dra ba dra phyed kyis na rkyen cing //dar dang phreng bas rnam par rgyan//zur gyi cha ni thams cad dang //sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnamasu//rdo rje rin chen gyis
205b7(rgyud): rgyan cing //sku yi 'khor lo'i sku nyid ni//don yod grub pa rnam par spyod//gsung gi 'khor lo 'od dpag med//thugs kyi 'khor lo mi bskyod pa//pad+ma'i dbus ni rin
206a1(rgyud): chen 'dzin//phyi yi dkyil 'khor tshul can ni//rnam par snang mdzad rnam par sgom//tshor ba spu yi 'khor lo ste//'du shes gsung gi 'khor lo yin//
206a2(rgyud): thugs kyi 'khor lo 'du byed de//rnam shes pad+ma gdon mi za//ri mo lnga pa mchog gyur pa//de yis rnam dag rang bzhin can//sa dang ri mo thams cad kun//dpa' ngos
206a3(rgyud): ying su dag par sgom//ri mo nyi shu rU bzhi pa//de dag dpa' bos rnam par dag/'khor lo mnga' gro ma yis dag/lte bar phag mo'i sa ngon kA/he ru ka dpal mchog yin/
206a4(rgyud): myad dz+nyA mu mkha' bri ma yis dgang//dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog dag ni//sum du rtsa bdun rnam par dag/dkyil 'khor snying po mdor bsdus na//dkyil 'khor dang
206a5(rgyud): po yi ge ste//dkyil 'khor gnyis pa phyag mtshan yin//dasum pa lag pa'i phyag rgyar bshad//bzhi pa gzugasu gyur pa ste//lnga pa me tog mchod pa yin//
206a6(rgyud): drug pa tshobyas kyi dkyil 'khor nyid//dbus ni rab tu dpa' ba'i sa//pad+ma'i lto ba dang bcas pa//thugs kyi 'kho lo dri ma med//gsung gi 'khor lo 'ong byed pa/
206a7(rgyud): klu yi 'khor lo 'od byed pa//sku yi 'khor la 'od 'phrog/zung she pa ni sgying dka' ba//ring du song ba sgo bzhi yin//zur ze che ni me g.yo ba/legs pa ni
206b1(rgyud): blo gros rdo rje'i thig/chos kyi sprin ni rta babs yin//'di lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni//rtag tu sgom dang mchod par bya//dngos brung rgya chen thob par 'gyur//sdom pa'i 'khor la
206b2(rgyud): sdom pa yi//dkyil 'khor mchog gi de nyid ni//he ru ka dpal ye shes mchog/b+ha ga'i pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor ni//phag mo'i sku lus mchog gyur pa//de ni dkyil 'khor 'dus pa
206b3(rgyud): ste||dkyil 'khor bde chen mchog yin//dkyil 'khor dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma//gnyis med kha sbyor dkyil 'khor yin//bdag gi de nyid ting 'dzin yin//lha yi de nyid de
206b4(rgyud): bzhin te//sngags kyi de nyid phyag rgya yin//de lta'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'i mchog/yan lag kun bsgoms las 'das shing //rtogs dang rnam rtog rnam par spangs//
206b5(rgyud): phyi mo'i thig le las 'das shing //de ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin//chos rnams thams cad brtag tu med//chos dang chos min rnam par spyod//de lta'i dkyil 'khor
206b6(rgyud): bshad pa ni//rnam dag na mkha' dang mtshungs pa//chags dang chags med chags par mnyam//pad+ma rA gre chu mnyam byung //rang sems tshogs pa dmar po'i mchog
206b7(rgyud): de dag dkyil 'khor mchog yin te//yid ni khams rnams thams cad de//gzugs dang gzugs med dri ma med//bskul zhing sad pa yid yin te//sems ni
207a1(rgyud): thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yin//dkyil 'khar lusu bshad pa ste//dkyil 'khor b+ha ba yin par bshad//dkyil 'khor byang chub sems yon te//rgyu ba dang na/
207a2(rgyud): ni rgyu gags 'gas stengs sa blar khyab//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla mA'i bla ma las dkyil 'khor gyi sgrim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gsum pa'o///de na
207a3(rgyud): gsang ba bshad bya la//sems can kun la phan stsol pa//a li ki li las thung ba//chos kyi dbyings kyi grong khyer mchog/dri ba phra phyed kyis rgyun pa//dar dang phreng bas
207a4(rgyud): narnam par rgyun//de yi dbusu rdo rje che//zhal bzhi pa lA rnam par 'gyur//de la lte ba'i dbus no//sna tshogs 'khor lo lte bar bac+doMs//thugs kyi 'khor lo brgyad
207a5(rgyud): pa ste/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni//'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus dag tu//sna tshogs pad+ma mdab brgyad pa//sna tshogs rdo rjes rnam 'dres pa//lha yi bzhugs
207a6(rgyud): gnas nyi shu pa//lte ba'i dbus bsten pa ste//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni//hUM las he ru kar byas te//zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa//spyan gsum sku lus
207a7(rgyud): dkar po ste//rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas//phag mo yi ni ku tsha'ang tshor//stag gi lpags pa gosu banabs//phyag rgya drug gis sku la rgyan//gdug
207b1(rgyud): kun gyi klad pa la//zhalas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis mnan//'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/brgyal zhing rnam par myos pa yis//klad pa yi na zhabs kyis mnan//gcer bu'o dod
207b2(rgyud): 'bod pa mnan//rgyal ba'i lpags pa'i lpags pa steng du ste//lcags kyu phyag gis 'dzin pa dang //gzhan yang cang te'u de bzhin te//thod pa kha nA ga yang 'dzin//gzhan du
207b3(rgyud): yang ni mgo bo 'chang //sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mnan//zla ba phyed pa dbu la 'chang //thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//mi bskyod pa yis spyi gtsug rgyan//tshangs pa'i de
207b4(rgyud): shul 'dzin pa ste//bdag gi khro bo bdun spros nas//ji ltar bcom ldan mdog bzhin du//phag mo mchog dang de bzhin te//sku lus nag po dmyur ba'i mdangs//gzi byin mdang
207b5(rgyud): kyis mdzes pa ste//gri gug thod pa kha D+ho ga/dril bu tsang te'u mdung dang ni//lcags kyu zhags pa de bzhino//lha mo phyag ni brgyad pa ste//dkar zhing sngo la ldang ba'o//steng gi zhal
207b6(rgyud): ni dmar po mdzes//g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal gdong ni//ser zhing ldang ba'i gzugs can te//gzhan du bdag po ji bzhin du//phag me yang ni de bzhin gyur//gtsir bu skra
207b7(rgyud): ni grol ba ste//ma nyams dum bu'i ska rags can//pad+ma bzhi la mkha 'gro ma//zur la bum pa thong ba ste//thugs kyi 'khor lo sngar bshad pa'o//dpa'
208a1(rgyud): //mkha' bro ma de bzhin//gzhung dang sku yi 'khor lo gnyis//shar dang byang nub lho ru'o//sgo rnamasu ni sgo srung te//khwa gdong la sogs thams cad do//
208a2(rgyud): zur la gshin rje sreg la sogs//ji ltar 'dod pa'i khyad par ni//rdo rje snying pos bshad pa ste//kha cig rnal 'byor ma ru 'dod//bla ma'i gnas kyi rjes rim pa//
208a3(rgyud): sngar bshad sna tshogs rigs rnams ni//ji ltar 'dod pas bsgom par bya//gzhan yang zhab dang mdog rnams ni//mkha' gro ma yi mdog bzhin dang //phyag mtshan phyag
208a4(rgyud): rgyur sngar bye shing bzhin//gnas sogs rim pa de ltar dgod//sngar bshad pa yi cho ga bzhin//gsang sngags ji bzhin rim par dgod//sum cu rtsa bdun rnam dag
208a5(rgyud): don/ni sgom pa mchog ni bsgom par bya//A lI ki li'i nang byung ba//sgrom zhing rnam par bsgom par bya//chos dbyings grong khyer rnam dag par//sems can khams
208a6(rgyud): ni rab tu 'jug/rnal 'byor 'di ni gsang ba ste//su la yang ni bstan mi bya//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las chos kyi dbyings kyi grong khyer sgom
208a7(rgyud): pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o///de nas gzhan yang bshad bye ba//b+ha ga pad+ma sgom pa ni//rdo rje snying pos zhus pa las//bcom ldan 'das kyis
208b1(rgyud): bka' stsal pa//yang dag gsang ba des gsang ba//A l-i ka lo zur gsum gnas//pad+ma mdab gsum rnam par sgom//rdo rje phag mo he ru ka/lte ba la ni rnam par skem//rdo rje
208b2(rgyud): mkha'agro lA ma dang //gsum pa dum skyes ma nyid do//bcom ldan 'das ni dmar la sngo//phab mo yang ni dmar sngo ste//mkha 'gro sngo la ser ba drang //lA ma ldang lA ser
208b3(rgyud): ba ste/dum skyes ma ni dmar la sor//zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa//bcom ldan mgon po zhal bzhi pa//zhabs bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa//thod pa dang ni khA
208b4(rgyud): nAM 'dzin//dril bu rdo rjes legs par mtshon//thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa ste//zhi ba zla ba phyed pa 'chang //mi 'khrugs pa ni spyi
208b5(rgyud): gtsug 'ching //rtag par gsang ba'i gos pan bas shing //thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par rgyani//phag mo'i zhal mtshan de yin to//byin pa gnyis kyis legs 'khyud
208b6(rgyud): shing //gcer du dbu skra grol ba la//spyan gsum pA la legs chags 'khril//'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan nyid//zhabs kyis rnam par gnon pa ste//g.yas brkyang ba ye
208b7(rgyud): gnas ngas bzhugs//sku lus phyog rgya drug 'dzin cing //mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang //thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par myos//g.yas pa dkar zhing g.yon
209a1(rgyud): ljang ku//steng ni sngo sgyu sku lus dkar//gzugs can ma ni b+ha gang brtag/A li ka ya~M b+ha ga'i mchog/gzhan yang chur gsum dbus dag tu//pad+ma'i 'khor
209a2(rgyud): la rnam par sgom//thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su ni//sna tshogs pad+ma dag tu brtag/dbusu he ru ka phig mo//mdab mar mkha'agro ma sogs dgod//zur du thod pa dkar
209a3(rgyud): po dag/thugs kyi 'khor lo mkha' la spyod//shar gyi zur la sku 'khor lo//rlung gi zur gyi 'khor lo la//khwa gdong la sogs rnam brgyad do//gsung gi 'khor lo bden
209a4(rgyud): bral zur//'khor lo bzhi po zur gsum la//shang ni sku yi mkha' phro ste//rlung phyogs gshin rje'i mkha' gro'o//daden brel gsung gi mkha'agro ste//dbusu rdo rje
209a5(rgyud): he ru ka/sto zhing dkar po dud ka dang //sngo zhing dmar ba bzhi po yin//rang gi phyag mtshan mnyam par ldan//gzhan du rang bdag mdog de bzhin//thugs kyi
209a6(rgyud): 'khor lo'i mkha 'gro ma//dmar ba'i mdog can rnam par bsam//dpa' bo'i mdog ni nag po la//gnyis med 'khyud pa'i sbyor ba'o//sku yi 'khor lo'i
209a7(rgyud): dpa' bo dag/sku lus dkar po rnam par bsam//mkha'agro ma ni ser po mdog/dpa' bo gnyis ni rab tu sbyor//khA gdong gshin rje bstan la sogs//gzugs
209b1(rgyud): gnyis phyed ni dud med nyid//rang gi thabs dang lhan cig tu//dgyes shing chags pas rnam par myos//gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dmar//mkha' gro man ljang ku'o//sngar bshad
209b2(rgyud): rim pa'i mtshan pa rnams//de yang rigs kyi dbye bso//thams cad yi dgas gdan lo bzhugs//mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan//thams cad phyag rgya lnga 'ching zhing /
209b3(rgyud): phyag rgya drug gis bdag po bgod//thams cad rang rigs cod pan can//ji lta ba yi rim pas sgom//mkha 'gro'i dus kyi sbyor ba yis//ji lta'i rjesu rnam bsgoms
209b4(rgyud): nus//gi chu'i gsang sngags dgod par bya//sku gsung thugs kyi rim pa dag/sngar bshad cho ga'i sbyor ba yi//dpa' bo'i yan lag rim pa sgom//gsang zhing sba ba'i
209b5(rgyud): zhi gnas ni//mkha 'gro mA yi bde 'khor lo//rtag tu mnyam par bzhag nas//sbyor ba'i mcho go ni rtag tu sgom//'di ni su la'ang mi bstan te/de nyid su la'ang
209b6(rgyud): brjod mi bya//dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba dag/rtag tu bsgoms na dngos grub 'gyuraro//dam tshig rtag tu bsrung bya zhing //bza' dang bca' ba'ang spyad par bya//'gro zhing
209b7(rgyud): 'gro zhing dus kun tu//'char nub dag tu rnam par sbyang //gang zhig ye shes 'di nyan pa//sngags pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur//mngon par brjod de'i rgyud bla
210a1(rgyud): ma'i bla ma las gsang ba sgyur s+ho pA pa'i ste lnga bcu rtsa lnga parba//de nas gzhan yang bshad byur//gsang ba'i ye shes mchog gyur pa//rigs
210a2(rgyud): lnga gsang sngags rgya che ba'i//sgom pa bdag gis bshed pa yin//log pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can//gang la'ang khyod kyis bshad mi bya//bla ma'i rim las ji ltar
210a3(rgyud): dasten//bung gis myur du shrIs 'gyur ba//skye ba bye ba stong phrag tu//sgyu 'phrul ye shes kyis bskul zhing //dad pa yang dag bskyed pa dang //rnal 'byor spyod tshul
210a4(rgyud): gnas pa yin//skyug cing drin lnga sdig ngan can//byis pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can//sems can yongasu ma smin dang //phyi rol bstan bcos kyis 'tshal ba//de
210a5(rgyud): dag kun gyis mi shes te//mi shes mun pas khebs pa dang //khengs pa la ni rtag par dga'//nga rgyal la sogs gdug sems ldan//de kun gyis kyang
210a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi//spyod yul gsang ba mi sheso//hUM ru ka dpal yang dag 'jug/slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yis//myur du dngos grub skyed byed de//'phral du yin
210a7(rgyud): ches byed pa yin//sna tshogs sdom pa shes pa yis//cho ga'i bya ba bstan par bya//srid pa gsum po ma lus ni//de ni kun ma khyen bstan pa shes//mthong
210b1(rgyud): dang ni reg pa dang //thos pa dang ni dran pa yis//sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur ba//de ltar de ni the tsom med//lha rnams bzlog ste bkod pa dang //sngags kyi dbye ba bzlog pa dang //dkyil
210b2(rgyud): 'khor kun yang bzlog pa dang //so so bsgom pa'ang mi bya ste//bzlog pa'i yo ge btus nas ni//sgom pa gsang ba bzlog pa de//snying po thams cad sgrub pa yin//rtog pa tham
210b3(rgyud): cad bsdus pa dang //rgyud rnams kun gyi spyi yi ni//sems ni yongasu smin pa dang //'dir ni sbyor sogs sngags rnams kyi//dam tshig de ltar bstan pa yin//bde gshegs/
210b4(rgyud): dbugs 'byin gsungs pa yin//dag pa'i lus ni skyon med pa//bsod nams chung ba'i sngags pas kyang //de dga' bas ni rnyed par 'gyur//de na srung med bza' ba med//
210b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor bdag po med//bzlas dang brtul zhugs sbyin sreg med//mdor na sems bsdus tshul can yin//gzung byas rnam shes ye shes ni//bla mas
210b6(rgyud): bstan las brtson las te//phyi rol gyi ni bstan bcos la//lam+ba de shin tu ring ba yin//rnal 'byor pa rnams thabs kyis ni//bla ma'i bsnyen bkur la brtson pa//
210b7(rgyud): ston pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang //dpa' ba'i de nyid bstan pa yin//skad cig rnam par rnal 'byor bdag/skad cig rnam par phyag rgyar ldan//kun nas thams
211a1(rgyud): cad skad cig te//skad cig gis ni gsang sngags brjod//dbus mo sa lnga btsugs na su//bdag nyid kyis ni gsol ba gadrab//bcom ldan lha mos
211a2(rgyud): zhus pa ni//go 'phang rgya che gnyis med pa//'di ni 'byung po kun la gnas//rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu rol//rdo rje snying pos gsungs pa ni//ci rigs bshad kyis legs
211a3(rgyud): par nyon//brtags pa'i yid kyis gzung bar gyis//thams cad bdag nyid rtag bzhugs par//gang zhig sngar ni bshad pa nyid//dkyil 'khor lus ni yin
211a4(rgyud): par bshad//da ni sgo dgu dag tu 'gyur//de la lte ba'i 'khor lo che//thams cad mkhyen pa zhes byar bshad//rdo rje can ni der zhugs pa//cha med cha ni rnam
211a5(rgyud): spangs pa//lus can rnams kyi nang na rol//lus las 'das shing gos pa med//la l-ir gzugs can dag tu bzhugs//la lar sna dang ngag dag dang //la lar
211a6(rgyud): rna bar sgra dag dang //la lar dri chen rdo rje chu//la ltar tshor bar bcas pa'i sems//la ltar sgom dang la lar bkres//la lar khro dang la lar zhi//la lar
211a7(rgyud): bde la rnam par gzigs//le lar bud med 'dod chags te//la lar gsod dang 'joms pa ste//la lar rol mo rdung bar mdzad//la lar me tog 'bras
211b1(rgyud): bur gnas//la lar rol cing spyod par 'gyur//lA lar srog tu rnam par gnas//la lar sa dang chu dang me//la lar 'byung ba chen po lnga//la lar rigs kyi bye brag gis/
211b2(rgyud): bram ze dang ni gdol pa dag/la lar ma dang sring mo ru//la lar chung ma bu mo ru//la lar tshangs dang dbang ldan dang //khyab 'jug dang ni nyi ma nyid//l-i lar zla ba skur
211b3(rgyud): mes bcas//la lar nyan dang mtshan mor gyur//la lar khams gsum pa rnams kun//byed pa po dang mi zad rgyal//la lar zhi ba'i dbang gis zhum//mi gsal stong
211b4(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje can//la par byang chub chen por gshegs//la lar pha rol bdud las rgyal//la lar byis pa'i rang bzhin nyid//la lar rgas shing 'khogs pa'o//la
211b5(rgyud): lar nad chen gyis zin po//la lar rgyu dang mi rgyu ba//la lang sngo dang leb rgan dang //la lar dkar dang ser ba'o//la lar sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad//la lar
211b6(rgyud): sgrol ma gos dkar mo//la lar spyan dang mA mya ki/la lAr dka' bzlog zhi ba mo//la lar mdab chags mkha' lding dang //na mkha' dang ni mkha'agro nyid//
211b7(rgyud): le langar klu dang sbrul chen po//la lar smad 'tshong spre'u dang ni//la lar rmi lam mthong ba dang //la lA gnyid kyis log pa nas//la lar rlung dang mkhris pa dang //
212a1(rgyud): la lar khrag dang lpags par 'gyur//la lar mya ngan du ba dang //la lar sreg pa'i me drug yin//ya lar mtho ris skye ba ste//
212a2(rgyud): rnam par 'phrul pa 'di lta bu//thams cad bdag nyid bzhugs 'di la//lha bang cha ni rnam spangs pa'i//de yi sgyu ma'i sna tshogs 'di'o//rtag pa min pa
212a3(rgyud): rdo rje can//gzugs med par nai b+ha ga'i nang //lte ba'i nang na pad+ma che//bcu drug thig gis thig gdab par//yi ge dang yang mnyam sbyor bas//kha sbyor bya ba byas
212a4(rgyud): pa yin//de dbus rtag tu gsang ba che//'byin dang sdud par byed pa'o//de nyid rang nyid rdo rje can//gcig pu rang byung che ba'i lha//de ni sangs rgyas kun dngos zhes//
212a5(rgyud): mtshan ni rab tu bshad pa yin//gsang ba'i mchog bri dgyes pa na//thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs//thams cad mkhyen pas 'di bshad pa 'am//mi
212a6(rgyud): 'gyur ba yi lam bshad pa//skra ni nyag ma brgya yi cha//mchog gi gzugs can bA sa ma ste//stong pa ma yin dmigasu med//yi ge med cing stong pa'ang med//
212a7(rgyud): gos pa med cing sa bon med//gzugs med mtshan ma'ang med pa ste//rnam shes rang gi dngos po ni//rnam shes ye shes dag tu bzung //thams cad gsal byed
212b1(rgyud): sgron ma ni//dang dro'i mtshan ma dag tu blta//gsal byed klog gi cha tsam ste//mtshan ma gnyis pa dag tu brtag/dkar po'i 'od kyi tshul can ni//phyogs bcu dag tu blta
212b2(rgyud): byas te//nyon mongs 'byin pa gsungs pa yin//rnal 'byor pa yis rnam par brtag/'dod pa'i lha yid longs spyod ni//bzhi pa rnam shes dag tu bstan//gzugs dang
212b3(rgyud): reg sogs lha mo ni//phyogs kyi ye shes lnga po yin//drug pa gzugs med ye shes te//bdun pa dag ni chos kyi dbyings//brgyad par rang nyid 'dod bzhin du//sangs
212b4(rgyud): rgyus 'bras bu dag yin//sbas pa lha dang lag pa dang //'khyud dang gnyis gnyis la sogs pa//de bzhin gshegs pos dbugs 'byin gsungs//dgu pa bla ma bla ma
212b5(rgyud): ste//thams cad 'dir ni bstan pa yin//rnam par gzhan dag rtswa dang 'dra//de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog/de nyid mi 'gyur dam pa yin//dri nyid thams cad khyab byed///
212b6(rgyud): lus kun la ni rnam par gnas//de nyid sangs rgyas ye shes te//he ru ka dpal yin par bshad//skyes pa ma ning la sogs nyid//phra ba'i snying po'ang 'dzin po yin//
212b7(rgyud): ye shes dag tu 'byung de la//gang zhig sa la gnas rnams dang //bstan bcos dag ni ma lus dang //rig byed grub mthar gnas pa rnams//'jig rten 'di dang gzhan//
213a1(rgyud): dag tu//de med par ni 'grub mi 'gyur//rig byeng grub pa'i mtha' rnams la//'di ni snying po rab tu bdang//'dug dang ldang ba nyid dang ni//'jug
213a2(rgyud): pa rdzogs pa nyid dag dang //byin gyis brlabs dang dbang bskur dang //ting 'dzin mchod pa bsdus pa yin//de nas chog ming gzhan pa//thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa//de nyid du
213a3(rgyud): ni kun skyes pa//'byin dang sdud par byed pa yin//a A/i I/u U/r-i r-I/lo lI/e e/oM au/aM aHka kha ga g+ha nga /tsa tsha dza dz+nya nya/Ta tha DA D+hA Na/ta tha da
213a4(rgyud): d+hA naM/pa pha ba b+h+ra mo/ya ri la wa/sha Sha sa hA k+ShaHoM hUM hUM phaT/'di ni bcom ldan lha de yin//mchog nyid lhag par gnas pa yin//lha kun gyi ni bskyed pa dang //
213a5(rgyud): sgrub byas de bzhin shes byas nas//don dam mchog kyang de bzhin te//brgyad cu rtsa bzhi thog pa ste//sngags kyi spyod pa la gnas na//des ni 'di ni nges rgyal to//thams
213a6(rgyud): cing shes rab thabs kyis 'gro//thog mar gsang sngags brjod par bya//dge dang mi dge gang yin pa//da ni lha tshogs rgyan yin te//sku rags gnas rnams thams
213a7(rgyud): cad yin//rtag tu 'di ni 'dzin byed pa//chos rnams thams cad rtogs pa yin//A li ka li mdun bsams na//rnal 'byor chen po de la gsos te//bsam
213b1(rgyud): gyis mi khyab sems nyid de//sems kyang rtag par mi bya'o//sems de nyid kyang mi bsam ste//des na 'dzin pa thab par 'gyur//gang gis rgyud kun las gsang ba//khyod la yang ni bshad/
213b2(rgyud): pa yin//'dri ni 'bad pas sra bya ste//gnyis med gnyi su med pa'i sdom//rnal 'byor ma sogs thams cad dang //dpa' bo'i yan lag thams cad kyi//rnal 'byor pa yis 'bras
213b3(rgyud): bu thob//srid pa'i nang nas 'byung ba yin//bla ma'i rgyud kyi thabs la ni//bsnyen bkur med pa la mi bshad//gal te bshad na sdug bsngal zhing //sdug bsngal gyis ni sems
213b4(rgyud): kyi 'khor//sems ni rnam 'khor rnal 'byor pa//mya ngan 'das pa mi mthong ngo //ji ltar bud med byis gtam rjes yi rang //kun smre bsten pa'i gtam yang brjod par byed//
213b5(rgyud): lam yang ma bshad 'ching bar 'gyur pa yin//rnal 'byor lam ngan de dang 'dra bar bshad//he ru ka dpal sku'i yan lag/sku kun brten g.yo bdag nyid can//gnas ni rab
213b6(rgyud): tu dga' ba'i sa//de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med//zhing ni 'od byed shes par bya//nye ba'i zhing ni 'od 'phro ba//'dun pa mngon du 'gyur ba nyid//nye ba'i 'dun pa sbyar dka' ba//
213b7(rgyud): 'dus pa ring du song ba yin//nye bar 'dus pa mi g.yo ba//dur khrod legs po'i blo gros nyid//nye ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sprin//shrI he ru ka'i gzhung spyod pa//'di ni nang gi/
214a1(rgyud): bdag canas//pha rol phyin bcus rnams ni//rnal 'byor ma ni brda yi skad//mtho ris sa steng pa sa 'og tu//dpa' ba'i yan pag bstan g.yo'i bdag/
214a2(rgyud): thogs med dus su gang bstan pa//phyi nang bdag nyid can du gnas//dpal ldan khrag 'thung rgyal po che//'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug gtso//kun tu phyag dang zhabs ldan
214a3(rgyud): zhing //kun tu mig dang mgo bo'i zhal//kun tu thos ldan 'jig rten na//thams cad g.yogs te rnam par bzhugs//de nas dngos grub sgrub bya ba//bsam gtan
214a4(rgyud): ldan pa'i sems kyis te//sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir//gsang ba'i de nyid gsungs pa yin//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//man ngag shin tu rnyed dka' ste//da
214a5(rgyud): brda' yi skad du ni//nga yis rgyud du sbas pa yin//gos ni phyag rgya lnga la sogs//shes rab yan lag phur bu dra//A li kA li zhes brjod pa//rgyu la sogs stong
214a6(rgyud): sngon 'gro yin//'jug pa sgra la sogs pa nas//ji srid bsdus pa'i sbyor ldan nyid//bdud rtsi 'tsham byed mya ngan 'das//lag pa'i mchod pas dbang bskur ba//
214a7(rgyud): gi tshe chen pos yang dag srung //sngags rnams kun gyis mchod pa yin//de ltar de nyid bcu bzhi ni//mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa yin//mi mchog gang
214b1(rgyud): zhig kun spyod pa//sdig pa thams cad rnam dag bdag/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa thob cing //skye dang dga' bar bde gshegs kyi//rigs skyes rgyal po chos ldan 'gyur//de ltar
214b2(rgyud): cho ga ldan byas nas//dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol//zla ba nya la sa steng du//'di ltar rnal 'byor pas sgom na//de yi bsod nams gyur pa yin//lha klu maM la sogs pa
214b3(rgyud): kun//de yi bsod nams gang gyur des//bdag gzhan yang dag ye shes ldan//bsam gtan sems pa tsam gyis sam//klog cing 'don dang bris pa yas//mtho ris
214b4(rgyud): yod spyod thob 'gyur ba 'am//yang na 'khor los bsgyur ba 'thob//rnal 'byor ma rnams 'pho ba'i tshe//dpal ldan khrag 'thung sogs mkha' gro//lag na me tog sna tshogs
214b5(rgyud): thogs//rgyal mtshan ba dran sna tshogs dang //rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang //sna tshogs glu yis mchod pas mchod//'chi ba zhes bya'i rnam rtog 'di//mkha' la 'gro
214b6(rgyud): nga'i gan su khyer//de 'dra'i dpal chen rnal 'byor pa//sa stengs su ni rnyed par dga'//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gsang ba'i yi ge bskyed cing sgrub pa'i
214b7(rgyud): le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa drug pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//cho ga'i rim bzhin sngags btu ba//gcig tu dben pa'i sa phyogasu//mkhas pas sa ni
215a1(rgyud): mnyams na su//bshang gci yis ni byug par bya//man+ta rak+ta byugs nas kyang //bdag nyid he ru kar byas nas//rigs ngan shan pa mo blangs nas//ma
215a2(rgyud): tog la sogs gdab par bya//dpa' bo chen po'i bdug spos dbul//zhag la sogs pa mar me sbar//cang te'u dril bu brdung bar bya//glu dang gar gyis mchod par bya//
215a3(rgyud): lha yi rol mo'i bye brag dang //phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba//lus ni phyag rgya drug dang ldan//A li ka li mnya ma byas te//sde mtshan la ni thim par bya//bzhi bzhi
215a4(rgyud): ru ni shes byas la//thub pa'i mchog gis rgyas par bya//drer gnas dpa' bo btu bar bya//doni 'dod thams cad grub byed pa//bzhi pa'i lnga pa gang yin dang //
215a5(rgyud): lnga pa yi yong lnga ba dang //lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang //dang po'i gsum pa gang yin dang //de bzhin nyi shu rtsa dgu pa//bzhi pa'i dang po gang yin dang //mthar gnas
215a6(rgyud): pe yi bzhi pa dang //de nyid kyi ni gnyis pa dang //sum cu pa ni yang dag blang //nyi shu drug pa nyid dang ni//de bzhin brgya yi phyed phyed dang //de nas sum cu rtsa gsum
215a7(rgyud): dang //dang po'i dang po nyid dag dang //mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang //lnga pa yi ni dang po dang //dang po yi ni gsum pa nyid//sum cu rtsa gnyis pa nyid ni//bzhi
215b1(rgyud): pA yI ni lnga pa dang //lnga pA yi yang bzhi pa dang //mthar gnas pa yi dang po dang //gnyis pa yin gsum pa dang //gsum pa'i dang po gang yin dang //lnga pa yi yang lnga pa dang //dang
215b2(rgyud): yi ni dang po dang //de bzhin bcu gcig pa nyid dang //de bzhin mkhas pas bcu drug pa//gsum pa'i dang po gang yin dang //de bzhin nyi shu rtse drug pa//bzhi pa'i gsum
215b3(rgyud): pa gang yin dang //uSh+ma yi ni gnyis pa nyid//dang po'i dang po gang yin dang //de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bdun pa//nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa yang ngo //dang po yi ni gsum pa dang //lnga pa/
215b4(rgyud): yi yang bzhi pa dang //de bzhin sum cu rtsa gcig blang //bco lnga pa ni nyid dag dang //de bzhin nyi shu rtswa lnga pa//dang po'i gnyis pa gang yin dang //de bzhin nyi shu rtsi
215b5(rgyud): drug pa//yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis pa//uSh+mA ye ni tha ma nyid//sum cu gnyis pa nyid dang //lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang //gnyis pa yi ni bzhi pa dang //lnga pa ya ni bzhi pa/
215b6(rgyud): dang //uSh+ma yi ni gsum pa dang //gzhan yang nyi shu rtsa bdun pa//an+tas+tha yi dang po dang //de bzhin nyi shu rtsa gcig pa//an+tas+tha yi gnyis pa dang //de bzhin yang nI
215b7(rgyud): sum cu pa//lnga pa yi ni dang po dang //uSh+ma yi ni dang po nyid//de bzhin yi ge d+ya nyid dang //bzhi pa'i dang po gang yin dang //uSh+ma'i dang po gang yin dang //de bzhin nyis
216a1(rgyud): shu rtsa brgyad pa//dang po'i gnyis pa gang yin dang //gsum pa'i dang po nyid dag dang //dang po'i gsum pa gang yin dang //bzhi pa'i bzhi pa gang yin//
216a2(rgyud): dang //an+ta s+tha yi gnyis pa dang //gsum pa'i yang ni lnga pa dang //yi ge bya ni de nas blang //dang po yi ni bzhi pa dang //mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa dag/de nas brgyad
216a3(rgyud): pa nyid dag dang //bzhi pa'i lnga pa gang yin dang //lnga pa yi yang lnga pa dang //nyi shu rtsa gsum pa yang blang //de bzhin nyi shu rtswa bdun dang //bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang //
216a4(rgyud): slar yang nyi shu rtsa bdun pa//de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa//nyi shu rtsa lnga yang dag blang //sum cu rtsa gsum nyid dag dang //bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang //lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang /
216a5(rgyud): mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa blang //bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang //bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang //dang po'i dang po nyid dag dang //de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bdun pa//an+ta s+tha yi
216a6(rgyud): bzhi pa dang //de bzhin nyi shu rtsa gcig pa//uSh+Ta yi ni gnyis pa nyid//de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa//thog ma yi ni dang po dang //mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa nyid//
216a7(rgyud): gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang //drug pa ya ni gnyis pa nyid//thog ma yi ni dang po dang //mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa dang //gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang //bdun pa
216b1(rgyud): yini gnyis pa dang //drug pa yi ni gsum pa dang //bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang //ba ni pra yis ni sbyar bar bya//mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang //lnga pa yI nI lnga pa la//bzhi pa/
216b2(rgyud): yi ni gnasu bya//lnga pa yi ni thog ma la//steng du sbyar zhing me dang bcas//uSh+ma yi ni gsum pa dang //mthar gnas pa yi thog ma dang //bzhi pa yi ni theg ma la//gzi//
216b3(rgyud): brjid can gyis gdun du byas//bdun pa yi no gsum pa dang //drug pa yi yang dang po ste//ka dang sha yi yi grwa ni//thog ma dag ni blangs na su//lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang //
216b4(rgyud): mthar gnas pa yi dang po ste//dri bzhin yang ni bsdus te blang //drug pa yi ni bzhi pa dang //bdun pa yi ni dang po dang //uSh+mA yi ni bzhi pa blang //bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa
216b5(rgyud): dag/rdo rje sems dpas phye ba yin//ut+ma na yi bzhi pa nyid//nyi ma yang ni gdan du byas//bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa la//me yi 'og tu sbyar bar bya//gshegasu
216b6(rgyud): gsol dang yang dag ldan//lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa dang //de bzhin nyi shu gnyis pa nyid//drug pa yi ni gnyis de bzhin//bcu gcig pa dang nyi shu gnyis//gsum pa'i
216b7(rgyud): dang po byangs nas ni//bzhi pa yi ni gsum pa dang //uSh+ma na yi bzhi pa nyid//lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang //bdun pa'i bzhi pa blang bar bya//nyi shu rtsa gcig de blangs
217a1(rgyud): nas//gnyis pa yi ni drang po dang //lA pA yi yang thog ma dang //gnyis pa yi ni yi ge drug/lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa la//klu yi yi ge de bzhin//nyi shu rtsa
217a2(rgyud): bzhi de blangs nas//slang yang bsdu ba bshad pa yin//lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang //suny+dza na ni gsum pa dang //mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa nyid//lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang //
217a3(rgyud): nyi mas slar yang gdab par bya//yi ge nyi shu btab nas ni//bcu drug pa yis stan du byas//'og tu me yi gzi brjid can//lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang //mthur gnas pa yi

217a7(rgyud): yis blangs//bzhi pa yi ni theg ma dang //mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang //gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang //bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang //lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang //

224a1(rgyud): bar+Na//dam bzhin 'byung dang rim min sa//b+h+ya m+b+ha dang yi ge sgrub pas//thub pa de lta'i grangs 'gyur la//ren+d+ra mig sum cu gnyis pa drang //
224a2(rgyud): sde pa yi ni khyad par bya//brgya phyed phyed pa yang dge blang //nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa yis phye//re'u mig sum cu drug pa blang //gsum pa yis ni khyad par //de nas sum cu
224a3(rgyud): gnyis pa blang //lnga pa yis ni khyad par bya//de nas nyi shu lnga pa bzung //nyi shu bzhi pa dag dang sbyar//sum cu rtsa gsum yang dag blang //re'u mig bco lnga la yir
224a4(rgyud): ldan//lnga pa dag dang yang dag bcas//de nas nyi shu gnyis pra bzung //bcu gcig pa yang de bzhi no//mdzes pa mchog ni yin par 'dod//re'u mig gi ni bcu dgu
224a5(rgyud): pre//maM yi bu dang yang dag ldan//re'u mig gsum par rnam par dbye//ya mtshan brgyad pa'i sa bon la//re'u mig sum cu drug pa dang //yang dag ldan pa'i yi
224a6(rgyud): ger 'gyur//slar yang yi ge de dag nyid//'dod pa'i don kun grub byed yin//de nas rang byung blangs na su//re'u mig la nI lnga par sbyar//spyi bor thig le dag
224a7(rgyud): dang sbyar//de nas nyi shu gnyis pa bzung //bcu gcig pa yang de bzhin//don kun grub byed ces bya ba'i//tshig ni gnyis pa yin par bshad//re'u mig bcu
224b1(rgyud): dgu pa nyid lnga//nyi shu rtsa bdun pa yis phye//gsum pa dag dang yang dag ldan//sum cu gsum pa legs blangs te//de'u mig ni gnyis par sbyar//nyi shu pa dang yang dag ldan//
224b2(rgyud): mdzes pa'i mchog ni yin par 'dod//de bzhin nyi shu gcig pa nyid//de bzhin nyi shu drug pa yin//lan gnyis bzlas pa'i tshig tu ni//shin tu mnyam par gzhag
224b3(rgyud): ste btu//de nas go rims bzlog pas gzung //re'u mig las ni dang po nyid//bzhi pa'i mtha' dang yang dag ldan//de bzhin bcoM lnga pa dang sbyar//de nas nyi shu
224b4(rgyud): gnyis pa gzung //bcu gcig pa yang de bzhin//chos don 'dod dang thar pa yi//tshig ni gsum pa yin par bshad//re'u mig gnyis pa'i sa bon dang //
224b5(rgyud): reru mig sum cu drug pa nyid//de bzhin nyi shu drug pa dang //sum nu gsum pa yang dag zung //re'u mig bcu gsum pa yir ldan//re'u mig lngas ni bcu pa nyid//go rims
224b6(rgyud): bzlog pa sgrub pas blang //re'u mig las nr-i bcu dgu pa//re'u mig nyi shu gsum pa la//gnyis pa dag ni yang dag ldan//steng du thig les brgyan par bya//de nas chu
224b7(rgyud): yi sa bon gzung //brgyad pa yang ni de bzhin te//mi yi bu yis khyad par gyi//yi ge d+hU phaT mtha' ru sbyar//'di ni khams gsum rgyal zhes bya//sngags chog
225a1(rgyud): bzhi yis rnam rgyan pa'o//oM ni sku la gsal byed yin//hUM dang phaT ni mtha' ru sbyar//rig rgyal 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sngags//'di ni ma byung 'byung myi
225a2(rgyud): 'gyur//de nyid bsdus dang dpal mchog dang //pad mchog rdo rje 'jig byud du/khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan//sku brgyad dang ni bcas pa re//dkyil 'khor srung ba'i don du ni//
225a3(rgyud): gdug pa kun la khyad par du//'di ni rnyed pa tsam gyis kyang //brtag mi dgos par 'chi bar 'gyur//sha chen dag gis thams cad kun//rdo rje yang ni med par bshad//rnal
225a4(rgyud): 'byor thun mire brjod pa ni//dngos grub kun gyi 'bras bskyed pa'o//oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha huM hUM phaT/oM gr-ihrI hrIhrIhu~MhUM phaT/oM gr-ih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya hU~Mdz+dzaH/oM A na ya ho b+ha ga br-i badz+ra huM hUM phaT/
225a5(rgyud): 'di ni gdug pa thams cad du//'jigs byed mi bzad par bshad//na mkha'i khams kyi sa yi mchog/pad+ma'i lte ba'i dbusu ni//rdo rje hUM mdzad rnam par sgom//gdug pa
225a6(rgyud): thams cad nges par gnon//phyag ni bcu drug yang dag ldan//zhal brgyad pa la bzhin rnam bsgyur//zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs//thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par
225a7(rgyud): rgyan//sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can//thams cad kun gyis rnam par spyad//rdo rjes mtshan pa'i phyag rgya drug/sku lus drug pa thugs rje'i nyams//g.yas brkya/
225b1(rgyud): ba yi gnas pa yis//dbang ldan gyi ni thod pa gnon//u ma mchog gi ku tsa gnan//khros pa'i spyan gyis rnam par gzigs//sku dang mgo yi do shal can//mgo bo'i phreng ba dbu la bcings//
225b2(rgyud): rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya can//'jig rten gsum rgyal de bzhin te//lcags kyu bsdigs mdzub 'ching ba ste//dpral ba'i steng du yang dag gnas//thugs kar dpral ba phyag rgya ste//
225b3(rgyud): dgegs ni rnam par gnon pa yin//thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin//ral gri lcags kyu 'chang ba ste//mdung dang mgo bo cang te buM dang //na ra'i lpags pa'i steng du ste//phyag ni
225b4(rgyud): bcu drug de bzhi no//stag gi lpags pa gosu banabs//rang rig gnyis med bde ba'i sku//sngo dang dkar dang sa ra ba dang //dmar po de bzhin g.yon pa mdzes//dkar
