225b5(rgyud): dang sde dang sar pa dang //steng gi zhal ni dmar po ste//spun gsum pa la dmar ba'i sman//khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan//las rnams thams cad byed pa dag/'dod
225b6(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje rdo rje sngon//bskyed pa'i rdo rje nyid dang ni//mi g.yo ba yi rdo rje ste//sngo dang ljang dong dmar ba dang //dud ka dur smrig bsres pa ste//mchi ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i
225b7(rgyud): zhal//thod pa'i phred bas rnam par rgyan//g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis ni//bdud bzhi po ni rnam par gnan//na re'i rus pas skra rgyan cing //sna tshogs khro//
226a1(rgyud): po'i rigs kyang 'gro//thod pa dang ni khan+d+he 'dzin//rdo rje gardzogs mdzub brkyang bste//rang gi rigs dang gnyis med 'khrung //phra ba'i lta ba gzigs mdza/
226a2(rgyud): tsi//dril bu phyug mtshan yang dag ldan//'dzin pa'i phyag rgya 'ching ba ste//'jog rten gsum rgyal phyag rgya yis//khro ba thams cad bcings pa yin//stag gi lcags
226a3(rgyud): pa gos na pos//spyan gsum mi bzed 'jigs pa ste//tho ba dbyug ti mda' dang ni//ril gri dril bu de bzhin te//yang na rdo rje dril bu dang //thams cad khu ba'i rlo
226a4(rgyud): rjes 'gro/'khyud pa'i phyag kyang de bzhin te//zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa//thams cad spyan gsum dngos grub mchog/sku gsung thug su sbyor ba yis//d+hAkyil
226a5(rgyud): bya khar dngos grub mchog dmya pa//sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag/yi ge'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//oM suM b+ha ni su b+hai hU~M hU~M phaT/oM gr-ih+Na gr-id+d+ho d+hI hUM phaT/oM mas
226a6(rgyud): rlo la la la hU~M d+ha swA.An li d+haSh+Ti gu ts+tsha bAhrIn+da d+hu d+haH/rab sngon sa byo ma maH nas//rnams cad skyed pa rnam par rnam/dkyil 'i chen pa'i
226a7(rgyud): / ShAM mas ba da//rgol 'gyur ba me kyi mi 'khor yin//slong po mchog gi rnam pa men//de la ni khye ban kau shA/mangs kyi gtsug zung
226b1(rgyud): bzhin/mngon spyod kyi ni bya ba la//bzla' dud sbyin bsreg gtor ma bya//ma lus lus pa med grub cing //rgyal sred thams cad rab grub 'gyur//dung dang nya phyis mu tig ste/
226b2(rgyud): gsum char rgyur los byung ba yin//chos kyi ye shes lus can gyi//thod pa la nI su zhig smod//dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba 'chang //zla ba phyed pas rgyan du byas//dpa' po
226b3(rgyud): dpa' dbang yin par bshad//khrag 'thung rdo rje can rnam pa//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla mo'i bla ma las srung ba zhal bzhi par byin gyis brlabs pa khro bo bzhi'i dkyil
226b4(rgyud): 'khor rdo rgyus kyis bris pa rdo rje hUM mdzad bskyed pa'i le'u ste drug cu pa'o///de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//sde tshan brgyad ni rnam sgom pa//mkha' dbyings pad+ma'i
226b5(rgyud): dbus gnas par//khrag 'thung rdo rje rnam pararo sgom//zhal lnga pa la phyag bcu pa//spyan gsum shin tu dmar ba ste//g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs//zhal
226b6(rgyud): rnam bsgyur zhing 'jigs pa ste//mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal//thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan//drag po zla ba phyed pa 'dzin//sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu laM mnan//ral
226b7(rgyud): pa'i cod pan 'ching ba ste//phyag rgya drug gi mtshan gyis rgyan//stag gi lpags pa gosu brnabs//rig pa gnyis med bde ba'i nyams//sku la thod rlon de shal can//thugs
227a1(rgyud): rdo'i nyams kyis khyab par mos//dkar dang sngo dang sprin gyi gzugs//sku ni skrag cing ldem pag can//g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal dag ni//ser dang dmar dang
227a2(rgyud): ldang ba dang //dud pa yi ni mdog cano//rdo rje dril bus mnyam ldan pas//rang gi rigs dang yang dag 'khril//tshangs pa bshus nas brnabs par mdzad//rgyab tu nges par 'dzin
227a3(rgyud): pa yin//thed pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing //mdung dang cang te'u gri gug dang //thod pa dag ni 'dzin pa ste//bcom ldan baM hUM nges 'byung ba//'jigs byed rang gi chung mar bcas//
227a4(rgyud): zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan par sbyar//sher mang ba lha mor dgod pa ste//ji srid lho phyogs de bzhin te//me la sogs pa'ang dgod par bya//de srid dbang ldan sogs de bzhin///
227a5(rgyud): A yi mkha'agro ma dang ni//kA yi mkha 'gro ma de bzhi//tsa yi mkha 'gro ma dang ni//Ta yi mkha 'gro ma dag ste//dkar dang dmang dang ser ba dang //sngo ba'i mdog can
227a6(rgyud): lho phyog so//dmar dang dud ka ldeng ku dang //ser po dbang ldan yang dag gnas//ta yi mkha' gro ma dang ni//pa yi mkha' gro ma de bzhin//de nas ya yi mkha'agro ma//
227a7(rgyud): sha yi mkha 'gro ma brgyad pa//de dag kun ni spyan gsum ste//zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa//'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po yi//rkang pa g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis/
227b1(rgyud): gnan//rnam bsgyur mtsho ba rnam gtsigs zhal//phyogs kyi gos mchag 'dzin pa ste//phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan//sgra grol thugs rje khro bo bzhin//drag po yul 'khrug
227b2(rgyud): byed pa ste//'dod pa'i don kun grub byed yin//'gro ba thams cad smon byed de//thams cad ci 'dod rdzogs pa yin//thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin//drim bu cang yas
227b3(rgyud): rgyun pa//sde tshan mkha' 'gro bde bu ste//'di dag rnal 'byor pa yis sgom//yang na phag mo dgod bya ste//bdag mo yang ni bzhag par bya//rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag
227b4(rgyud): bo ste/mkhas pas kyang ni bsgom par bya//sku gsung thugasu sbyar ba dang //sa 'og sa steng rab tu 'khrug/oM a ka tsa Ta ta pa yA shaM hu~M hUM phaT swA hA//brtan pa dang ni
227b5(rgyud): g.yo ba'i bdag/ma lus ji srid 'di yis 'grub/sde tshan mkha'agro dam pa mchog/b+haM ga'i dbusu bsgom par bya/a she/kA kaM/tsarma tsi/Te taM pre ka/tA pa sa ta
227b6(rgyud): tha/pa ba na dza yaM ma b+ha haM tsa/sha ra b+ha tsa ta thA/sbrang rtsi mAr dang bcas pa ni//rtag tu dusu 'di brgyad bza'//rgas dang nad dang 'tsho med par//skye bo 'di la dngos grub
227b7(rgyud): 'byung //chang gi btung ba dang bcas pa//zos pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur//de ma rnyed na'ang so lus bya//skye ba bdun pa'i nang gnas shing //phyugs ni zas sa
228a1(rgyud): rta smad na//skad cig gis na mkha' spyod 'gyur//'di la yid gnyis dpyod pa myed//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las sde tshan gyi sbyor ba /
228a2(rgyud): le'u sti drug r+b+hartsa gcig/de na su gzhan long bshad byug//rnal 'byor mchog gis gur de ga/dpe' bo dong ni rnal 'byor ma//ma mo'i dkyil la
228a3(rgyud): sngar bshad do//mkha'agro ma sogs mkha 'gro ni//gar da wa yi gzugasu bya//phrag mo'i gzugs ni de nyid kyang //zhal ni gar da wa ru bya//sngar bshad gnas dang
228a4(rgyud): phyag mtshan dang //zhal ni gzhan yang rtogs par bya//sngar bshad mtshan ma'i rim pa yis//mkha' gro ma ni lag mdung thogs//thugs kyi 'khor lo thams cad/
228a5(rgyud): kun//mkha' lding gdong ni 'jigs pa tsan//gsung gi 'khor lo rma bya'i gdod//sku yi 'khor lo seng ge'i gdong //khyi dang phag dang 'ug pa dang //khA yi zhal gdong
228a6(rgyud): de bzhin te//zur la gshin rje sreg sogs kun//ma he ri dgas zhal gdong yin//dkyil 'khor ma lus can rnams kyang //spyan gsum mig ni shin tu dmar/
228a7(rgyud): 'di ni rnal 'byor mchog dam pa//sdug bsngal thams cad zad par byed//rnal 'byor blo gros dngos grub dag/rnal 'byor mchog ni ster bar 'gyur//rdo rje theg pa'i
228b1(rgyud): pa'i man ngag dang //ngag gi dngos grub rab tu ster//ma thos pa yi chos bstan pas//sems can rnams ni srid las grol//bla na med pa nyid bstan pas//mi snang la sogs
228b2(rgyud): dngos grub 'gyur//su yang rung bas 'jig rten gsum//de kun de ma thag tu mthong //sngar bshad dpa'i bo rnal 'byor ma'i//gsang sngags rnams kyang de bzhin te//
228b3(rgyud): mkha' gro ma mo de bzhi no//sngar bshad sngags kyi bdag po rnams//bzlas na dngos grub rab ster cing //rtag tu bde ba thams cad 'thob//rnal 'byor nye snying bzlas na ni
228b4(rgyud): ga ra dwa'i dngos grub mkha' la 'gro//brtul zhugs med pa'ang brtul zhugs 'thob//mi gtsang ba'ang gtsang bar 'gyur//dbul po'ang nor gyi bdag por 'gyur//nad yod pa
228b5(rgyud): yang med par 'gyur//long ba yis kyang mthong bar 'gyur//mngon par shes pa lnga thob 'gyur//bong bu'i sha dang rta sha dang //khyi dang ba lang glang po mi//rnga mo lce spyang de bzhin
228b6(rgyud): te//brgyad po'ang mnyam pa mchog yin//rnal 'byor bdag gis de brgyad bza'//dri chen chu dang sbrang rtsi mar//bsam gtan bsgoms te bza' byas nas//yang ba'i dngos grub
228b7(rgyud): thob par 'gyur//gzugs yongs bsgyur ba'i dngos grub cing //rang gi gzug su'ang 'gyur ba yin//rnal 'byor gang dang gar gnas par//bza' ba yang ni bza' bar
229a1(rgyud): bshad//'gro dang mi 'gro de bzhin to//btung zhing btung zhing dngos grub 'gyur//mchog 'di yang na gsang ba ste//su la yang ni brjod mi bya//
229a2(rgyud): mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las ji ltar 'dod pa'i bong bu'i mdzad pa dngos grub kyi rgyu sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa gnyis pa'o///de nas gzhan yang
229a3(rgyud): bshad bya ba//mkha' gro lnga yi rnam sgom pa//rigs las brgyad pa'i cho ga yin//gdan dang phyag mtshan sa bon te//'di ni sa bon mchog gyur pa'o//nga nya Na na ma
229a4(rgyud): zhes pa//'di ni sa bon mtshig grub pa//nga ni rdo rje mkha 'gro ste//nywa ni sangs rgyas mkha'agro yin//Na ni rin chen mkha'agro ste//nA ni pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro yin//ma ni sna
229a5(rgyud): tshogs mkha 'gro ste//mkha' 'gro lnga ni mchog yin te//zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal dang //chags dang phrag dog dri bzhin to//rigs ni lnga po 'di dag gis//'did
229a6(rgyud): las grol ba'i 'bras bu stsol//rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang //pad+ma ral gri lnga pa yin//sngo dang dkar ba nyid dang ni//ser dang dmar po ljang ku dang //rdo rje'i phyag rgya
229a7(rgyud): byang chub mchog/rin chen phyag rgya'ang de bzhin te//pad+ma'i phyag rgya bzhi pa ste//ral gri'i phyag rgya lnga pa yin//glang po seng ge rta dang ni//rma bya mkha' lding
229b1(rgyud): bzhin to//khya ba 'jab tshangs pa nyi ma drang //dbang phyug cha dbang po lung de//rang rig yan lag dang bcas pa//gnyis med bad bas yang dgra gnas//shAr dang lha dung nub dang ni//khyung /
229b2(rgyud): du yang ni de bzhin 'dir//dpa' bo'i 'khor dang bcas par dgod//lnga po yang dag lnga sangs rgyas//lnga po bdag nyid lnga yino//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbusu ste//zla ba'i dkyil
229b3(rgyud): 'khor shar du'o//lho dang nub dang de bzhin te//byang na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro//yang na dbusu zla ba ste//shar du yang ni nyi ma'i gdan//de dag dpa' bor gyur pa ste/'di lta
229b4(rgyud): ste/rdo rje thod pa dang /rdo rje mkha' mnyam dang /rdo rje snying po dang /rdo rje sra ba dang /bzhi po de dag ni rdo rje mkha 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te/glang po che'i gdan khri bya'o//rdo rje zla
229b5(rgyud): dang /rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang /rdo rje rgyal po dang /rdo rje sgra dang /de dag ni sangs rgyas mkha 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te/seng ge'i gdan khri'o//'dod pa'i rdo rje dang /rdo rje sbyin
229b6(rgyud): dang /rdo rje Ta ha ra dang /rdo rje bzhud pa dang /de dag ni rin chen mkha' gro'i dkyil 'khor ste/rta'i gdan khri'o//rdo rje me dpal dang /rdo rje 'joms pa dang /rdo rje sreg byed dang /
229b7(rgyud): rdo rje dri bral dang /de dag gi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor ste/rma bya'i gdan khri'o//rdo rje ba dan dang /rdo rje glu dang /rdo rje dpa'o dang /rdo rje 'jigs byed dang /de dag ni las kyi
230a1(rgyud): mkha'agro'i dkyil 'khor te//mkha' lding gi gdan khra'o//dpa' bo de dag kyang rang gi rigs dang /thod pa'i phreng ba can spyan gsum pa/rang gi shes rab
230a2(rgyud): dang 'khyud pa/rdo rje skyil mo krung gis yi dgas kyi gdan le bzhugs pa'o//mche ba rnam par btsigs shing rnam par 'gyur ba/stag gau lpags pa gosu ban ng+ga/
230a3(rgyud): zhal gcig pa/phyag bzhi pa/thod pa dang kha T+wA~M 'dzin pa/cang te'u'i sgra hUM dang bcas pa/mgo bo'i phreng ba'i do shal gyis rgyan pa/phyag rgya lnga 'chang gA
230a4(rgyud): rang gi rigs kyi dbu rgyun can/ral pa dang zla bi 'dzin pa'o//rdo rje mkha' gro'i shar dkar po//byang ljang ku/nub dmar po//lho sor po//lbos kyi mkha' 'gro'i
230a5(rgyud): shar ser po//byang sngon po//nub dkar po//lho dmar po//pad+ma'i mkha' gro'i shar dkar ba/byang ljang ku/nub sngon po//lho sar po//rin chen mkha'agro'i shar
230a6(rgyud): ljang ku/byang ser po//nub dkar po//lho sngon po//sangs rgyas mkha' gro'i sher sngon po//byang ljang ku/nub dmar po//lho ser po//'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis//
230a7(rgyud): rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri dang //pad+ma rin chen phreng ba yin//chas ni yongasu bskor bar bya//grwa bzhi mo mo bzhi sgom ste//ma mo rmongs byed ma dang ni//ma mo zhe sdang
230b1(rgyud): nyid yin to//chags pa yi ni ma mo dang //phrag dog ma mo de bzhin te//me yis phyogs la sogs par dgod//dkar dang sngo dang dmar dang ldang //skra grol ma la bzhin rnam bsgyur//
230b2(rgyud): spyan gsum pa la gcer bu ste//phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa yin//phyag bzhi pa la zhal gcig pa//yi dgas gdan la rnam par bzhugs//dbang chen me dang chu dang ni//rlung gi
230b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dag tu gnas//rigs kyi gdan la bzhugs pa yin//'khor lo rdo rje pad+ma dang //ral gri thod pa khe T+wAM ga/gri gug yang ni phyag na 'chang //ma ning las byung
230b4(rgyud): lha mo sgom//thod pa yi ni phreng ba can//skyil mo krung ni phyed pa'o//rdo rje gnod sbyin dang /rdo rje srung ba dang /rdo rje 'byung ba dang /rdo rje rta gdong dang /rdo rje dreng gdong dang /
230b5(rgyud): bde mchog dang /rdo rje dam tshig dang /rdo rje rta mchog ste/khro bo'i rgyal po de dag ni/sgo rnams dang ni mtsham su te//sngo dang ljang dang dmar ser po//dmAr dang sngo dang dud ka dkar//
230b6(rgyud): lcags kyu zhugs pa lcags sgrogs dang //dril bu thod pa kha T+wAM ga/cang te'u yang ni de bzhin te//thod pa dbyig to mdung drang ni//dgra sta thod pa kha T+wAM ga/mgo bo phyag na
230b7(rgyud): bsnams pa'o//zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa//dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes//phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa ste//stag gi lpags pa gsu banabs//thod pa yini phreng
231a1(rgyud): /'chab//mag par de shal rnam par rgyun//nyi ma pad+ma'i steng du ni//g.yas brkyang ba yis zhabs kyis bzhugs//phyogs spyod brgyad kyi khri la bzhugs//
231a2(rgyud): mched rnam gtsigs rnam sbyar zhal//spyan gsum rang rigs cod pan can//rang gi rigs dang gnyis med sbyor//snying rje yi ni nyams can te//phyi rol rdo rje yi dgas kyis
231a3(rgyud): yongasu bskor bar bsgom par bya//thog mar gas pa byed ming dang hUM//mtha' ru phaT dang sbyar bar bya//sngur bshad cho ga'i bsrung ba bya//phung po khams dang skye mche dang
231a4(rgyud): lus ngag yid las bsgom par bya//mkha'agro zhal drug phyag bcu gnyis//rang gi mtshan ma dril bu yis//gnyisu med par mnyam par ldan//mdung dang lcogs kyu
231a5(rgyud): thod pa dang //kha T+wAM ga dang mgo bo dang //cang te'u dang ni gr-i gug dang //nu ra'i lpags pa 'dzin pa yin//sngo dang ser dang dmar ljang ku//dud ka dang ni dkar ba dang //dkar dang /
231a6(rgyud): sngo dang ser dmar dang //ljang dang thal ba'i mdog lta bu'o//ser drang sngo dang dkar ba dang //dmar dang ljang ku pad+ma'i mdog/dmar dang dIkar dang sngon po dang //ser dang lda
231a7(rgyud): dang na mkha'i mdog/ljang deng dkar dang dmar ba dang //sngo dang ser dang dkar ba'i mdog/de dag mkhe 'gro lnga yi ni//zhal mdog gi ni khyad par yin//yang na zhal
231b1(rgyud): gcig phyag gnyis sgom//phreng ba'i gsang sngags ming dang bcus//mkhas pas zur bzhi mtshams na so//mthar ni tsu hUM phaT dang sbyar//oM mA hA su kha badz+ra DA ka hU~M Da kI nI dzA la
231b2(rgyud): shaM ba ra AHhUM phaT swAhA//oM ma hA su kha bud+d+ha DA ka bruM DA ki nI dzA la shaM bA ra AHhUM phaT swA hA//oM mahA su kha rak+Sha DA ka traM DA ki nI dz+wA la shaM ba ra AHhUM phaT swAhAM//oM mahA su
231b3(rgyud): kha pad+ma DA ka hUMHDA ki nI dzI la shaM ba ra A hUM phaT swAhA//oM ma hA su kha bi shra DA ka khaM TI kaM nI dzA la shaM ba ra AHhUM phaT swA hA//de dwag ni mkha'agro lnga'i snying po'i gsang sngags/
231b4(rgyud): te//'di ni ye shes kyi snying por gyur pa yin no//oM badz+ra DA ka daM hUM phaT swA hA//oM bud+d+ha DA kA nyaM hUM phaT/oM rat+na DA ka NaM hUM phaT/oM pad+ma DA ka naM hUM phaT/oM bi shwa DA ka mi hUM
231b5(rgyud): phaTaye shes dam tshig ro gcig pa//mkhas pas sgom par byas na su//dam tshig gis ni legs dbang bskur//sna tshogs mchod pa rnam par sgom//dkyil 'khor dag ni
231b6(rgyud): thams cad kyang //go 'phang dran nas dbang yang bskur//sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa'i mchog/de bzhin 'khyud dang tsum pa na//b+ha ga'i ling ka'i sbyor ba dag/ye shes rnam
231b7(rgyud): smin dpa' ba'i mchog/shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya drug/rnam par lta zhing nges par brtag/dga' ba dang po shes rab te//mchog tu dga' ba monyam par sbyor//bde bar
232a1(rgyud): dga' bar grub pa che//lhan cig skyes dga' bla med yin//sbyor ba dang ni shin tu sbyor//sbyor ba che dang ye shes sbyor//de dag cho ga'i rim pa'o//thig le'i
232a2(rgyud): gzhung gi sbyor shes na//phra ba'i sbyor bas blta bar bya//thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgyu//chos kyi dbyings kyi go 'phang thob//cho ga nges par bsgrubs nas ni//myur du
232a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub//'di ni nges pa kho na'o//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gsang ba'i ye shes kyi le'u ste drug cu rtsa gsum pa'o///
232a4(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//thugs kyi snying po mchog gyur pa//mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par//ye shes zla ba rnam par sgom//A yi yi ge las byung ba//rdo rje
232a5(rgyud): sems dpa' bde ba che//kho ba kun dri'i mdog lta bu//dag pa'i shel dang mtshungs pa'o//zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste//spyan gsum pa la thugs rje'i nyams//sna tshogs
232a6(rgyud): pad+marI zla dbus bzhugs//stong pa'i ye shwel+la byung ba//zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'ching //thod pa yi ni dbu rgyan can//rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs//rdo rje skyil mo//
232a7(rgyud): krung gis bzhugs//rang gi lus dang sbyor bar gnas//snying rje chags dang mngon gyur pa//dkar zhing sngo la dmar ba'i zhal//rnam pa gsum gyi rang bzhin con//
232b1(rgyud): rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan//lha mo mchu ni rnam 'char to//rdo rje mdung dang thod pa dang //kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa 'dzin//yi ge U dang nye dbus bzhugs//rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom/
232b2(rgyud): I las rdo rje zla ba ste//I las rdo rje sgyu 'phrulo//e las chos kyi rdo rje ste//oM las sna tshogs sgyu 'phrul ma//lha mo bzhi po de dag ni//de yi zhal mdog 'dzin pa'o//skra grol ba la
232b3(rgyud): mig po che//snying rje chags pas rnam par myos//rang gi thabs dang lhan cig bcas//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbusu ni//sna tshogs yi dgas steng du sgrom//gtso bo shes rab skyil
232b4(rgyud): mo krung //thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//phyag rgya lha yis rnam par rgyun//rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan//mdung dang gri gug phyag na bsnams//thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing //
232b5(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol//ji ltar dpa' bo'i rnal 'byor bzhin//de yi mdog dang phyag mtshan 'dzin//lha mo bzhi yi kha sbyar gsang //snying po sbyor ba mchog yino//
232b6(rgyud): gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na//thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs//gsang ba kun gyi mchog de nyid//mkha'agro ma yi snying po mchog/gsang po'i ye shes dam tshig
232b7(rgyud): ste//chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin//u ni snying kar sgom pa ste//U ni mgo bor de bzhin//oM ni spyi gtsug dag tu ste//oM ni mig tu dgod par bya//oM ni go char
233a1(rgyud): dgod pa ste//aHni mtshon du rnam par dgod//sku gsung thugasu sbyor ba yis//bdag nyid kyang ni sgom par gnas//ye shes dam tshig sbyor ba yis//
233a2(rgyud): bla med mchog dang dbang yang bskur//mnyam pa'i dam tshig sbyor ba yis//chos kyang de bzhin mnyam pa yis//dngos po kun ni ro gcig ste//gnyisu med po'i mchog grub
233a3(rgyud): pa/dam tshig thun mtshams bzhin du ste//dus bzhi dag tu rnam par sgom//kha sbyor bzhi yi sbyor ba ni//thun bzhi la ni rnam par bsam//snying rjes kun la 'gro bya zhing //
233a4(rgyud): cha med par ni rnam par sgom//thams cad rdo rje sems dpa' ste//shes rab che mod rjesu 'gro//rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug sbyor//bdag nyid rdo rje bdag po yin//bgrang
233a5(rgyud): du med pa'i rus pa yin//ye shes bzlas pa yin par bshad//bzlas pa ye shes sgom pa ste//sprul pa drug ni spro ba'o//de bas dam tshig bzlas pa yin//cho ga
233a6(rgyud): bzhin du bzlas pa bya//u o o u/AM aHaM AHa AMHi I/u U/e ai/o au/aM aHhUM swA hA//dung chen phreng ba blangs nas ni//rtag tu gsang
233a7(rgyud): sngags rgyal po bzla//dag byed bsod nams chen po ste//dge zhing nyes pa 'joms pa yin//sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms byed cing //dge ba kun gyis 'bras
233b1(rgyud): bu ste//gsang sngags kun gyi ston pa ste//rnam par dben pa'i sa phyogasu//mkha' gro ma yi snying po yi//dgyes pa'i bde ba las byung ba//lha mo bzhi po dga' ba ste//rnal 'byor dbang
233b2(rgyud): phyug mchog tu bde//rigs kyi bde ba bcom ldan 'das//rang byung rdo rje sems dpa' yin//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las lha mo bzhi'i gsang ba kha sbyor gyi
233b3(rgyud): le'u ste drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o////de nas sbyor ba'i mchog bshad pa//gdug pa thams cad zu byed pa//ma rungs phyi dang nang 'joms pa//na mkha' stong pa lta bu las//
233b4(rgyud): yi ge k+Sha las mngon byung zhing //mkha'agro 'bri ba bde mchog ni//phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa//spyan gsum pa la 'jigs pa'i zhal//g.yas brkyang ba yis
233b5(rgyud): bzhugs pa la//ma rungs bdud kyi dgra gnon cing //phyag rgya chen po mnyam ldan pas//thod ba dril bus yang dag 'khyud//thod pa'i dbusu yid 'ong ba'i//rdo rje mchog gis
233b6(rgyud): rnam par mtshan//ye shes bdud rtsis yongs gang ba//lag pa g.yas par bzhag nas ni//sna tshogs pa yi sku lus la//phyag rgya drug gis sku yang rgyan//zhal gdong/
233b7(rgyud): mche ba rnam btsigs shing //spyi gtsug thod pas rgyan du byas//sna tshogs rdo rjes spyi bor mtshan//zla ba phyed pa rol pa 'chang //rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan can//
234a1(rgyud): /dza d+hA jigs byed sgom pa yin//dogs pa rnam par spangs shing yongasu dag dri'i blos//rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma'i khyad par med par byed//byams
234a2(rgyud): drang snying rje'i rgyun du byas//'dzum med bde ba'i rnal 'byor legs par bslabs pa'i bdage/shin tu 'jigs pa'i dur khrod chen po na//ro langs srin po sna tshogs
234a3(rgyud): sgra rnams sgrogs par byed//pheM gyi sgra byed pa yi 'jigs pas khyad par byed//gzhan yang sgrub po rnal 'byor 'thun pa'i yul du sgrub//yang na zhal ni bzhi pa dang //'di
234a4(rgyud): ye phyag rgya de rnam par sgom//dkar dang sngo dang dmar ser po//zhal dgo bsgyur zhing 'jigs pa mdzad//mdung dang rdo rje kha T+wAM ga/cang te'u mgo bo gri gug thogs//
234a5(rgyud): sna tshogs phyag la bskyod pa'i ljags//hUM hA hI hI hUM hUM phaT//phaT ces bya ba'i sgra sgrogs shing //dpa' bo'i gcig pu 'jigs mdzad pa//gdul dka' thams cad
234a6(rgyud): 'dul mdzad cing //sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis//khro bo'i sprin na mkhas pas spro//bsam gtan dga' ba bsgrub pa'i phyir//khro bo yi nI sku ru sgrub//dam tshig
234a7(rgyud): bza' zhing bzlas pa bya//dam tshig kha sbyar byas nas bzla//mnyam par gnas shing bzlas na su//chos rnams ma lus bsgom par bya//oM ak+Sha hU~M phaT/srid gsum/
234b1(rgyud): sdig pa zad byed cing //mtshams med lnga yang zad byed par//sdug bsngal thams cad zad byed cing //srid pa dag kyang sbyong bar byed//sbyor ba yi ni mchog dam pa//bklags nem gyis
234b2(rgyud): ni nges par 'grub//gdug gcig gnod byed sems can dang //ma rungs las la chags pa dang //log par lta dang bcas pa laso//'di dgu nges par bza' bar bya//sangs rgyas
234b3(rgyud): sprul pa'i rgyun rnams spyi//khams gdum dag ni sgrol bar byed//sngags pas sngags kyi mchog de ni//ming dang bcas pas lhan cig bzla//oM pAT che ge mo b+hak+Sha ya phaT/k+Shu hUM phaT/
234b4(rgyud): bdag nyid khro bo'i sems kyis ni//mr-i sa bza' zhing gcer bu dang //skra grol rol la mnan pa dang //zhags pa lcags kyu phyag gis 'dzin//gsang sngags cho ga
234b5(rgyud): bzhin du ni//khri phrag stong du bzla zhing sgom//rnal 'byor cho ga bzhin du ni/kha sa gsum po dag bsod par 'gyur//mkha' gro ma ni 'khor bcas pas//bza' bar yang
234b6(rgyud): ni rnam par bsam//bdag nyid rdo rje khab thogs pa'o//khro bo snying du bzhugs par bya//snying dang sgyu ma rkang dang rus//sha dang khrag rnams 'dral byed cing //mtshams
234b7(rgyud): mdo lnga rnams byed pa dang //gdug pa can rnams bza' bar bya//mkha' gro lte bar bzhugs nas ni//mkha' gro ma dang lhan cig sbyor//rdo rje blo ldan rab sbyor bas//
235a1(rgyud): zhag bdun gyis ni phongs par 'gyur//ngas ma gad+hAn byas pa tsam gyis ni//gdug pa bdag gis zos par 'gyur//nyi ma phyed dang mtshan phyed dang //las
235a2(rgyud): 'di dag la 'jug par bya//gcer bu skra grol byas pa yis//gshin rje'i phyog su kha bltas te//khyim bya'i stan gyi sbyor ba yis//me yi gsang sngags bzlo bar bya//hUM phaT
235a3(rgyud): raM r-I raM/mtshams med pa 'dis zhes bya ba//raM raM raM hUM phaT/ji bzhin bzlas pa byas tsam gyis//nyin zhag bcu pa dag gis ni//rdo rje 'dzin pa mngon sum pa'ong //
235a4(rgyud): 'chi bar yang ni the tsom med//gal to sdig can slar l-ig ni//'di la zhi bre'i las rnams bya//gsang sngags bzlas pa tshar byas nas//'dis kyang zhi bar 'gyur ba
235a5(rgyud): yin//oM swAhA/a A baM a mu ka pA pe bI ra ho b+ha bi Sh+ya ti ta sa s+yai ba shAn+ti b+ha baM tu/baM au a oM swAhA//'o me btung zhing gos dkar gyon//zhi ba'i sems kyis
235a6(rgyud): stong nyid gnas//dkar po'i dri yis lus byug go/bya rog khyi dang byi la dang //na ku la yi sha rnams bze'o//thams cad rab tu gnas gyur te//'di la yid gnyis
235a7(rgyud): dpyod pa med//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las khro bo rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i bdag po kha sbyar gnon pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa lnga pa'o///
235b1(rgyud): denas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//sred pa'i nang na skye ba bdun//sna tshogs pa shu'i dam tshig ni//lha yi gzugs can yid 'phrog pa//lha yi gzugs can gzi brjid da pa la//
235b2(rgyud): pa shu'i nang na rgyal po yin//skal bzang yid 'ong badri bar 'gro//sgra yi myu gu de bzhin ring //mig ni dkyus ring mig kyang dmar//pad+ma'i mdab ma 'dra ba'i gzugs//de yi
235b3(rgyud): lus la rdul rab 'byung //lus las lha yi dri 'byung zhing //kha yi dbugs ni ga bur dri//ldan pas sbrang ma rtag tu 'khor//gcin dang phyi sa gla rtsi dri//tshig ni 'jam
235b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba dang //lag pa dang ni rkang pa 'jam//ud pa la yi dri dang ldan//skra dkar gnyer ma las rnam grol//lus kyang snum zhing mnyen pa dang //snying dang thod pa
235b5(rgyud): lte ba ste//des na ro tsa na ru 'gyur//grib bdun dang pa'i 'gro su 'gro//snying rje'i bsam pa can yin te//dkon mchog gsum li rtag tu dad//sbyin dang tshul khrims
235b6(rgyud): drag dang ldan//'di 'dra rnal 'byor pas rtogs na//mi gsod ma yis tshig mi 'gyur//srog chags sna tshogs gdug pa dag/gang yang rung ba zo mi nus//de ni mtshan
235b7(rgyud): mo mi mthong ste//mi snang ba yi dbang phyug mchog/'di 'dra sngags pas rtogs nas ni//bdag gis blangs te sbyin pa spyad//dri tshun chu dang byang chub sems//mkhas
236a1(rgyud): pas blangs te rol bu \u0f7f//lcags gsum gyis ni rnam dkris te//blo dang ldan pas bsgrub par bya//dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyar nas//nye ba'i snying po lan 'bum
236a2(rgyud): bzlas//de 'di lag tu byin nas ni//sbyin pa 'di las bdag la byin//de 'di de ma thag tu yang //mi bskyod pa yi bya ba rnyed//de ni dben par khyer na su/mnyam par bzhag
236a3(rgyud): ste bsgrub par bya//gzhan yang lngas rnams rab bshad bya//dngos grub sgrub pa'i mchog dam pa/de yi spyi bo'i sgra bcad nas//gzhan yang dud 'gro'i spu dang ni/
236a4(rgyud): dri bsros the gur byas nas//gang gi mgul du bcing byas pas//de 'dra ba yi gzugasu 'gyur//sna tshogs gzugs kyang byed pa yin//de yi lpags pa blangs nas ni/
236a5(rgyud): de la he ru ka dpal bri//mngon sum khro bo'i dngos glob ni//he ru ka dpel byed pa yin//rkang la gi lpags pa blangs nas ni//'byung ba'i skra dang bcas bsres nas//
236a6(rgyud): phyi ma'i ril bur byas nus//mngon par bsngags te cho ga bya//mkhas pas rgyal gyi nyi ma la//lcags gsum gyi ni rnam dkris nus//lag pa g.yon/
236a7(rgyud): pas de blangs te//mthe bong sbas pa'i khu tshur gyis//zhu tshur de ni mgor bzhag na//de ma thag tu rkun ma rings//rang gi lag gis dpung gnyis blangs//
236b1(rgyud): rang sbra zhags pa blangs nas thogs/bayas pa lcags kyu thogs nas ni//the gu lnga yis rnam par dkri//phyogs gar nor gyis gang pa yi//de yi phyogs mthong blangs par bya
236b2(rgyud): khyim du bkod cing steng 'dug nas//sngags bzlas nas ni mkha' la spyod//oM dzI a baM a paM hUM ho bai ra ha raM to//khe tse ra di dzaM hri swA hA//nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin gos//yid la
236b3(rgyud): gang 'dod ci yang rung //de dag thams cad myur du 'gugs//khyimo ni gdang bar yongasu mthong //mAM sa ngag ni zos nas//lha yi lu su gyur pa yin//rnal 'byor rdo
236b4(rgyud): rje'i lus gyur te//des ni shi ba dbang du 'gyur//chu ba tshi ga bzhin blangs nas//sgra dang bsres nas de sgril te//the gu cho ga bzhin du ni//bsgral nas zhags pa dag du bya//
236b5(rgyud): gre yas brkyang gnas shing khro gnas par//gang gi ming gi bzlas brjod kyis//zhags pa btab na do ma thag/lha mo 'gugs shing de mdun gnas//de yi rus pa'i
236b6(rgyud): bye ma yis//mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bris nas ni//'di la dkyil 'khor dngos grub ni//ci 'dod pa ni de la gnas//gzhan yang rgyun tu byas pa dang //rdo rje mtshan
236b7(rgyud): gyis mdzes par bya//chub dag gis mchod phyir thogs//de ru bdar ba'i tsan dan gyis//byug pa'i brtul zhugs 'dzin pa ni//mkha' la spyod par 'gyur ba yin
237a1(rgyud): /sgrub pa til mar cher po yi//mig sman nges par byas nas ni//grib ma yang ni mthong mi 'gyur//rnal 'byor zhag gis bskus na no//mtshan mo'ang /
237a2(rgyud): nyin par lta bur 'gyur//rnal 'byor rkang dag zos nas ni//tshim par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min//ji srid gnas par mi bkres shing //yid gzhungs dran pa 'phel bar/
237a3(rgyud): 'gyur//rnal 'byor sngon gyi skye ba dran//rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur ba yin//sgyu ma phye mar byas na su//mkhas pas grib ma la yang skam//gang gis mgo la
237a4(rgyud): bzhig pa na//de mi thug tu dbong du 'gugs//sngags pas glo ba zlos nas ni//de ma thug tu nad med 'gyur//rkang pa blangs nas su snun na//char gyi rgyun ni
237a5(rgyud): 'bebs par byed//blo ldan gsang ba blangs nas skam//tsan dan dmar po dang bsres nas//de ni phra mar byas nas//bud med gang la byin na ni//'dod pas bdungs
237a6(rgyud): pa'i bu med gang //dbang du gyur te mngagra gzhug byed//pus mo'i rus pa kI la ya//sor ni bcu gnyis tshad tsam zhig/gang gi ming bcas sbas pa yis//de yi/
237a7(rgyud): rigs rgyud med par 'gyur//rnal 'byor ji hA zos na ni//ngag gi dngos grub dag tu 'gyur//rnal 'byor hri da zos na ni//sems ni thub pa nyid du 'gyur//so yi rgyal
237b1(rgyud): blo bzhi po dag/skyong 'og dag ni blangs nas kyang //bung ba yi ni bshog pa dang //chub ma'i mdab ma rdul dang ni//rdul 'dis sgrub pa byas nas ni//rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu rmongs//rtswa rnams//
237b2(rgyud): phye mar byas pa yi//bud med thams cad bskams par 'gyur//rang byung me tI gi ro tsa na/a lig ta dang gu raM gum gyis//thig le sngags pas sbyar na no//'khor los bsgyur/
237b3(rgyud): ba'ang dbang du 'gyur//rnal 'byor mig 'bras che ba yis//pha rol sde ni 'byed par 'gyur//'byed nu ma zos pa tsam gyis ni//de ma theg tu 'o ma 'gugs//rnal 'byor
237b4(rgyud): mtshan ni zos tsam gyis//bud med sa bon mod la 'gugs//rnal 'byor sau dang sen mo byes//gang gis gang gis mgo la gtor//grub pa brgyad po 'grub pa yin//pha
237b5(rgyud): dang bu ni yin na yang //rnam par sdung bar byas par 'gyur//mchu phyir byas pa'i sbyor ba yis//kha ni gnon par 'gyur ba yin//sna phyer byas pa'i sbyor ba yis//dbugs
237b6(rgyud): ni gnon par 'gyur ba yin//rna ba'i sbyor pos 'on par 'gyur//mgo bo'i lpags pas mngon btags te//kha yi drung du mngon bzlas no//lho rnams kun gyi gtsa bor/
237b7(rgyud): 'gyur//thod pa yi ni sbyor ba yis//r-ik+ta 'gugs par byed pa yin//thod pa kha ni sbub pa yis//gnod par byas pa kha na yin//en+d+ra ba ru r-i tsa na//de gnyis gcig tu
238a1(rgyud): bsres byas nas//gang la thig le gcig gyur na//dbang po'i gnas ni mthang bar 'gyur//ra can dang myang spras dang//lhan cig tu ni byug pa yis/
238a2(rgyud): thub pa med pa stebs 'gyur te//pha rol dag ni gnon par 'gyur//pu tran dza li ro tsa na//lhan cig tu ni phyer byas nas//dud mod gang la phyis gtor na//dri ni 'dod pas
238a3(rgyud): myos gyur na//ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du gnas//ro tsa na dang pu tras gnyis//lhan cig tu ni bslus pa yis//'byung po kun dang 'byung mo rnams//ci bgyi zhes ni
238a4(rgyud): smra bzhin du//de yi drung du 'khod par 'gyur//ci 'dod pa dag ster bar 'gyur//ro tsa na dang dzI ban te//lhan cig tu ni phyir byas te//shi ba'i mig dang mig sman
238a5(rgyud): sbyar//bskal par gnas kyi bar du ni//'tsho bar yang ni 'gyur ba yin//chu srin lag ni ro tsa na//lhan cig tu ni phyir byas nas//nA grA ma do lhan cig tu/
238a6(rgyud): blo dag tu byas nas kyang //rdo rje gzi brjid dang bsres nas//mig gi sman no byas gyur na//nor skyong gi ni glang po yong //mngon sum du ni gnas nas kyang //de la
238a7(rgyud): bdag gis zhon na ni//glang chen 'khor ni mang po dang //gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur//pha rol sngo ni 'joms byed cing //gzhan gyi yul la dbang byed pa'i//
238b1(rgyud): ci 'dod pa ni ster bar 'gyur//'bram mA daN+Di ro tsa ni//lhan cig tu ni sbyor ba yis//rig byed rgod pa med par 'gyur//rma bya'i mkhris pa'i ro tsA na//ri bong khrag dang lhan cig tu//
238b2(rgyud): ril bu dag tu bsgrub byas nas//rme bya'i 'jug mas btsongs na ni//bong ba bzhin du 'phur 'gyur te//lha rnams 'gugs pa'i dngos grub cing //rig pa 'dzin pa 'ongs par
238b3(rgyud): 'gyur//de yi li ni ni 'ga' tsam gyis//ji ltar 'dod pa ster bar 'gyur//lha yi gzhal meng khang 'phrog cing //lha yi bu mo'ang 'gugs par 'gyur//'dod na dbang du sdod
238b4(rgyud): byed cing //mi 'dod sems can don yang byed//mjug ma thur bltas byas na ni//gter rnams kyang ni mthong bar 'gyur//blangs pas sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin//yongasu rdzogs
238b5(rgyud): par 'gyur ba yin//sa 'og gter gyi sgo dag la//mjug ma bskor ba byas na ni//sgo dbye bas ni 'jug par bya//lha min bu mo lhan cig rol//lha yi bcud dang bcud kyis
238b6(rgyud): len//'phrog cing des ni zos gyur te//'dod pa'i lha ye gzugasu 'gyur//grub pa'i rdzas ni blangs pa yis//sems can de na rnams byed cing 'gro//de nas yan lags
238b7(rgyud): lnga pa yi//cho ga dag tu 'gyur ba ni//spu dang lpags pa sha dang ni//rus pa rkang pa blangs na su//dri chen chu dang shu kra dang //mtshal rnams dag ni lhan cig tu//ril
239a1(rgyud): bu b+hAs nas bsgrub par bya//lcags gsum gyis nI rnam dkris nas//kha yi nang du smras nas no//na mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur//ro tsa na dang lhan cig
239a2(rgyud): tu/khams gsum du ni rgyal cher 'gyur//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las skye ba bdun pa'i phyugs chen sgrub bya'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa drug pa'o///
239a3(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//rang gi chos kyi yig sgom pa//rang gi chos kyi yi ger sbyor//bdag med chos ni yang dag sgom//rang ches yi ge mchog dga' ba/
239a4(rgyud): chos kyi sku lus rang byung yin//yi ge he las nges 'byung ba//he ru ka ni rnam par sgom//yi ge hi las nges 'byung ba//rdo rje mkha'agro rnam par sgom//hUM gi
239a5(rgyud): ye shes las byung ba//rdo rje hUM mdzad rnam par sgom//hUM gi yi ge las byung ba//mi bskyod pa ni rnam par sgom//bai gyaM ye shes las bskyed pa//rdo rje sems
239a6(rgyud): dpa' rnam par sgram//AM b+h+r-i au b+h+yAM las byung ba/sangs rgyas mkha 'gro rnam par sgom//aM twA raM s+phu las byung ba//rin chen mkha' gro rnam pAr sgom//hrI hrI a
239a7(rgyud): las nges 'byung ba//pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro rnam par sgom//kha~M ha ho haM las byung ba//sna tshogs mkha' gro rnam par sgom//DA las mkha' gro ma nyid//yaM las rnal
239b1(rgyud): 'byor ma de bzhin//b+h+rUM las lha ma sa la spyod//baM las mkha' la spyod pa yin//maM las ma mo nyid yin te//dpa' bo'i btsun mo snyan grags ma//he ni thugs kyi gtso bo ste//
239b2(rgyud): ru las dag ni byung ba yin//ka ni lus kyi rdo rje ste//yig gsum las byung he ru ka/mAM las 'jam pa'i rdo rje ste//sa~M las kun tu bzang po yi ni//lo las 'jig rten
239b3(rgyud): mgon po ste//k+Shi las sa yi snying po'o//baM las phyag na rdo rje ste//mo las byams pa nyid yin te//khaM las na mkha'i snying por grags//gaM las na mkha'i mdzod yin//
239b4(rgyud): sa las sgrib pa kun sel ba//ga las spros kyi glang po yin//dzA las ye shes rtogs kyang yin//a las blo gros mi bzad pa//pra las spobs pa brtsegs pa ste/
239b5(rgyud): sa las ngan song kun 'dren pa//sa las ngan song kun 'joms pa//dza las dra ba can gyi 'ang //tsa las zla ba'i 'od yin te//ra las byung ba'i rin chen 'od//sU las nyi ma'i
239b6(rgyud): 'od yin//ba las rdo rje 'od kyang yin//ma lus mthu chen thob pa ste//su ni su d+ha na yi no//b+hU las bzang skyong nyid yin te//sa las blo gros rgya mtsho'o//kun tu bzang po'aja
239b7(rgyud): pa'i dbyangs//'jig rten mgon po sa snying po//phyag na rdo rje byams pa dang //na mkha'i snying po na mkha' mdzod//sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang //spos kyi glang po nyid
240a1(rgyud): yin te//mi nad pa dang ye shes tog/skyob pa brtsegs pa mchog yin te//mya ngan kun 'joms nyid yin//ngan song kun 'dren nyid dang ni//dra ba zla ba
240a2(rgyud): rin tshan dang //nyi ma rdo rje 'od mchog ste//su d+ha na dang rin chen thob//rgya mtsho dang ni bzang skyong ngo //de dag sngon nyid grub pa ste//phreng ba'i gsang sngags rnam par sbyar//de
240a3(rgyud): dag dam tshig du bA shad//dngos grub kyi ni grub pa stsol//rdo rje pho nyam nyid dang //bskul byed dang ni rin chen sprin//rdo rje nyi ma de bzhin te//ro langes rdo NAM gzhon du ma/
240a4(rgyud): ka bai dzi dang de bzhin te//sangs rgyas byang chub ma de bzhin//ye shes sgron dang rdorare 'jigs ma//ye shes sgron dang rgyal byed ma//sgrol ma dang ni gos dkar mo/
240a5(rgyud): spyan dang mA ma ki mchog dang //rgyal mtshan sor 'brang ma dang //rma bya drong ni ri khrod nga //lu gu rgyud dang phyir bzlog ma//lha mo gtsug ter rdor 'jigs ma//sngon grub
240a6(rgyud): pi yi lha mo ste//'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad stsol//gsal byed ming dang bcas par ni//mthar ni hUM phaT sbyar bar bya//tha mar swA n+d+ha mnyam par sbyar//sngags
240a7(rgyud): kyi dngos grub rab tu stsol//gshin rje gshed dang rta mchog rgyal//bgegs ni gnon par mdzad pa yin//shes rab mthong byed bzhi po ni//'dod pa'i don kun sgrub
240b1(rgyud): byed yin//'dod rgyal dbyug sngon stobs po che//brgyad par mi g.yo grags pa ste//khro bo chen po sngon grub pa//gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon//dkar mAM sogs dam tshig lha mo//
240b2(rgyud): khrag 'thung lha mo brgyad pa yin//sngar bshad mkha'agro ma rnams te//khro bo brgyad dang gnyis med gnas//rtsa ba'i brgyad dang ldan pa'i sngags//ming dang yang dag sbyar bar
240b3(rgyud): bya/gsal byed oM ni kun tu yang //mthar ni hUM phaT swAhA rA sbyar//gsal byed ming dang hUM dang ni//mthar ni phaT dang swAhA ra sbyar//gzugs dang sgra yi lha me dang //dri dang re//
240b4(rgyud): yi lha mo ste//mdab ma bzhi la rnam par sbyar//phyogs kyi gos can skra grol mo//reg pas reg pa'i rdo rjer grags//gnyi su med par yang dag gnas//dbusu khrag 'thung
240b5(rgyud): rgyal po ni//lha mo'i reg pas bde bar bzhugs//snying po chos kyi dbyingasu grags//shes rab pha rol phyin las byung //ye shes sems dpa' gnyis med bzhugs//
240b6(rgyud): rdo rje chos kyi dbyings ma ste//gnyis med mnyam pa'i ye shes ni//chos kyi dbyings de mi dmigs pa'o//de ni gsang ba de nyid mchog/rdo rje can ni yang dag stsol//che
240b7(rgyud): ba'i mchog ni 'dus pa ste//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/sbyor ba rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs pa//bgrod dang bgrod min rnal 'byor ma//rig pa'i rgya mtsho mchog yin
241a1(rgyud): /rdo rje mkha 'a gro nyung zad cig/sgyu 'phrul sdom pa'i rgyud min//rnal 'byor ma ni 'byung ba'i rgyud//gsang ba'i rgya mtsha rgyud yin//nges brjod rgyud na
241a2(rgyud): bla med pa//'dus pa mchog ni bshad pa yin//ji ltar bsam pa'i khyad par gyis//sems can rjesu bzung ba'i rgyur//'dus pa mchog gi dam pa 'di/sangs rgyas byang
241a3(rgyud): chub 'bras bu ste//rigs ni rnam pa lnga bshud pa//byang chub sems dpa' du ma dag/ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar ni//bdag po nyid du bya ba yin//ji ltar ming gi rjes 'thun par//
241a4(rgyud): desaM brjid rgyud kyi rim pa dag/rdo rje sgrub pa po yis ni//nges brjod rgyud kyi las rnams bya//yid kyis dogs pa kun spangs te//gnyi su med pa'i sgom pa nyid//theg pa
241a5(rgyud): chen po'i dam pa mchog/dngos grub tshe dang ldan par 'gro//de nas phyag mtshan mchog bshad bya//gzugs dang mdog gi cho ga'i rim/yi ge he las des 'byung ba//bdag
241a6(rgyud): nyid he ru kar bsgom bya//sku lus dkar la drag shul che//mtsho ba rnam gtsigs 'jigs pa ste//spyan gsum pa la zhal lnga pa//phyag drug zhabs ni bzhi pa ste/thod
241a7(rgyud): pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//ral pa zla phyed dbu la bcings//sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbu rgyan can//phyag rgya drug gis sku lus rgyan//stag gis lpags pa gos su
241b1(rgyud): nabs//mgo ba'i do shal gyis rgyun pa//dkar dang sor dang de bzhin dmar//ljang ku stong zhal spro ba'o//bzhad dang dpa' dang sgeg pa dang //rngam dang zhing drag po ste//dza
241b2(rgyud): dril bu mnyam ldan pas//rdo rje reg pas gnyis med gnas//rgyal ba'i lpags pa mchog krung 'dzin//bdo ba kun gyi 'bras bu stsol//rdo ba dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin//rdo rje mdud na
241b3(rgyud): phyag mchog ste//g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis//bdud bzhi po ni zhabs 'og gnon//reg pa'i rdo rje ldang ba dang //dkar ba'i mdangs kyis gzugs can po//ljang dang sar
241b4(rgyud): drung dmar ba dang //dkar ba'i g.yod pa'i zhal gdong sde//steng gi zhal gdong sngo la 'jigs//skra grol po ni rnam par myos//seng ge'i rnam grol phyag rgya can//byin pa gnyis
241b5(rgyud): ni legs par 'khril//thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//spyan gsum shin tu dmar ba ste//rdo rje thod par mnyam por ldan/dril bu cang te'u yis rgyan//mdung dang kha n+ta
241b6(rgyud): phyag na bsnams//rmugs pa chen po me yi 'od/thogs kyi gros can zhi ba'i nyams//gradus dka' thams cad 'dul mdzad cing //sna tshogs sems can 'dus pa
241b7(rgyud): mdzad//thugs rje'i nyams ni yongasu rdzogs/zla ba nyi ma'i dbus yeng sna tshogs pad+ma'i dkyil na bzhugs//'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/zhabs kyis
242a1(rgyud): /gu non par rnam par sgom//'khor kun+da dag ni zhal gsum pa//thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//drag cing zhi ba nyid yin te//rigs gsum gyis na
242a2(rgyud): phye ba'i gzugs//rigs gsum gyi ni phyag mtshan 'dzin//lha mos phye ba'i gzugs can ni//dam tshig glanyi su med par sbyor//thams cad yi dwags gdan la bzhug
242a3(rgyud): g.yas brkyang bya yas zhabs kyis gnon//byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khrel/shes rab thabasan+d+hi rnam par sgro mo//mtshams rnams ni bum pa dag/
242a4(rgyud): thod pa zla ba yongasu gang //zur rnamasu ni sgo bsrungs te//ji ltar mdog gi cha rnamaso//g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs//'jig rten skyong ba zhabs 'og
242a5(rgyud): gnon//thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//thugs rje khro bas rnam par myos//dkar po la sogs mdog sbyor ba//ji ltar g.yas pa'i zhal ri mo bzhin//phyag
242a6(rgyud): rgya rim pa'ang de bzhino//lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog par ni//'khor sogs mchog kyang dgod par bya//rdo rje pad+ma'i dbusu ni//rigs kyi 'khor lo gsum
242a7(rgyud): dkyil na//rang gi byin rlabs 'chang ba'i mchog/sangs rgyas mu stegs can la sba//'di ni rab tu gsang ba ste//bla ma'i ngag la gnas pa yin//rnal 'byor ma
242b1(rgyud): yi dri na yo no//gnas la sogs pa'i rim sbyor ba//sum cu rtsa bdun rnam dag dgod//shes rab thabs bdag 'gro ba yin//sa bcu pa yi mchog kyang 'gugs//pha rol phyin
242b2(rgyud): pa bcu la gnas//sbyor ba gsum gyi rnam dag don//'di ni dri med sgom pa mchog/mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las bdag nyid chos kyi yi ge las bskyod
242b3(rgyud): pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgom pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa bdun pa'o////de nas mchog tu bshad bya ba/bdag nyid cho ga'i sgom pa'i mir/mA ma ki dang spyan
242b4(rgyud): da nau//lha mo sgrol ma gos dkar mo//'od zer tsan dang dzI b+hai lA//lha mo skul byed sa 'dzin ma//rang gi sa bon las byungag/phyag bcus kyis rnam par rgyan//spyan gsum
242b5(rgyud): pa la g.yas brkyad bzhugs//sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs//rdo rje skyil mo krung gis gnas//rigs byed bzhi yi zhal gdong ste//phyogs kyi gos
242b6(rgyud): can ro yi gdan//skra grol ba la 'jigs pa ste//thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//khro bas lta zhing thugs rje'i nyams//shes rab pha rol phyin lho mo//de nyid
242b7(rgyud): ye shes mchog las byung //so so yang dag sbyor ba'i bdag/de nyid ye shes gdon mi za//khro bo sna tshogs gzugs can ni//dpa' bo rang nyid las byung ba//
243a1(rgyud): khro mchog mkha 'gro 'byung ba yang //glos pa med par nyams pa yi//bdag po sgom pa nyid yino//mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba yis//sgom
243a2(rgyud): zhing rnam par bsgom par bya//pra ba'i khro bo'i rdo rje can//snying ka'i pad+ma'i dbus ni//rdo rje mkha'agro thugs brtse can//'di nyid du ni gnas mdzod cing //rdzogs
243a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun byang chub sems//'gro ba gsum po 'di la gnas//'di nyid kyis mchod pa nyid kyis//mchod 'os thams cad mchod pa yin//gang zhig
243a4(rgyud): 'di la rtag lta ba//de ni rgyal bas mchod par bzhed//nang gi sbyor ba rdo rje yis//rnal 'byor rdo rje can du 'dod//de bas rdo rje mchod pa yis//yid 'dod rnams/
243a5(rgyud): kyis lus la 'dod//mchod pa lnga yi sbyor ba yis//myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob par//gang 'di rgyud las gsungs pa dag/de ni pha rol gzhan du 'dod//dngos med
243a6(rgyud): bzhi la dgod pa yis//lha yi gzugasu sgom pa yi//mnyam nyid mchod pa chen po ste//sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgrub pa'o//sngags dang de nyid bstan pa yi///
243a7(rgyud): bstan pa tsam du legs 'byung ba'i//rgyud ni don dam ma yin te//don dam yang dag skyes pa na//ston pa med cing bstan pa'ang med//nyi shu rtsa bzhir phye ba yi//
243b1(rgyud): gnas sogs 'di nyid la gnas te//de bas de ru 'khor ba nyid//smyo bya de nyid can gyis min//gal te de nyid med gyur na//de yi 'khrul pas ci zhig bya//'on te de nyid ldan gyur
243b2(rgyud): na//de la 'khrul pa ci zhig yod//gnas dang nye ba'i gnas mchog rnams//bstan pas dri ma med par 'gyur//yang na mi nus bag med pa'i//mi yi gnas ni bsgrags/
243b3(rgyud): par bya//da las 'di ltar bya shad pa ni//sems can bsam pa'i da gis te//byasam gtan las gzhan bad med byed//de ngas bsam gtan mchog gzhol /
243b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa ni phyi rol 'khor//nga yi khams rnams zad par 'gyur//de bas phyi rol spangs nas ni//rnal 'byor rol pas gnas par bya//dpal ldan rdo rje rnal
243b5(rgyud): 'byor can//rnam dag ye shes spyan gyis ni//thugs rje thugs gdungs ring po nas//rdo rje rnal 'byor can dag gzigs//de rnams dgyes pas dngos grub mchog/
243b6(rgyud): tsI 'dod par ni stsol bar 'gyur//des ni rje btsun ye shes kyang //rab tu 'bad de bsgrub par bya//sna tshogs spyod pa yang dag ldan//spyod dang brtul zhugs spyad pa
243b7(rgyud): yi//spyod dang brtul zhugs 'dir spongase la//de nyid brtul zhugs la dgar bya//gang yang rung ba'i zas gnas pa//rnam pa des byas brtul zhugs can//
244a1(rgyud): bas su gtan rdzas mchog gzhol 'gyur bas/blun pacwa spyad pasmra gnas par rgyas//btsad bu pA ya na ba du man//gang rung dz+nyA d+hA ltar 'gyung//
244a2(rgyud): rang gi lhag pa'i lha dmigs la//de nyid gcig pu rnam par bsam//lkugs pa'i dngos por gyur pa yis//zla drug tsam gyis nges par ni//rnal 'byor can gyis nyer bsten /
244a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen mo 'dri gas lnga 'gyur//ye shes sgron ma'i mchog mthong na//rnal 'byor ma rnams legs 'dus te//pad+ma'i 'byung gnas nyams dga' bar//dang pa
244a4(rgyud): tshichags 'dus ji bzhin//mig 'phrul mkhan ltar 'jig rten du//'gro kun den ni pyod pa'o//dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin par ni//mngon 'gyur 'di la the tsam med//spyad ba
244a5(rgyud): 'di la nges pa mI//ji skad ba shad po der 'gyur bar//sems ni dag par gyis shig ces//sems can rnams la bdag gsol 'debs//gang gis rmad 'byung skyong rdur
244a6(rgyud): ldan//gang gis gsung ba de nyid 'gyu /rdo rje drag po'i sbyor ba las//mkha 'a gra ma ni skyung kar dgod//snying kar rdo rje lcags kyir sgyur//thugs kyi rno dz+haiMs n+na sgyur
244a7(rgyud): te/nigazhan yang rdo rje dgang bya'o//chos kyi dbyingasu rnam par brtag/pha gos na mkhar sbyor na su//gzi brjid gzugs ni 'dzin par ska ma//rajig chos kyi yi dgod do//
244b1(rgyud): rang drod radra bzhin dri ma med//rang gi sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis//rang gi chos kyi yi ge sgom//ji lta ji ltar rtogs pa yi//gzhan nyid gzugs kyi sgom pa lnga//yid kyi gti mug
244b2(rgyud): grub pa yi//dbang po gzhan ma sgom par bya//rnga lta ji ltar mos pa yis//gzhan nyid gzugs la blta bar bya//mngon par brjed pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las bdag
244b3(rgyud): 'dul ba'i mchod pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa brgyad pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegaso pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i ye shes gsang ba 'di
244b4(rgyud): gsungaso//rang bzhin bdag med chos rnams ni//na mkha' lta bur dri ma med//sbyong nyid ye shes rdo rje yis//stong nyid rtag tu bsgom par bya//legaso bya ba rnams byin
244b5(rgyud): nas rgyud skyes pa yi sbyor ba las//legaso leg so ye shes tsha//nges par brjod pa mchog gi mchog/legs rdo rje tshul drug po//srungs rgyus byang chub bka' don
244b6(rgyud): ragra/logs gnyis mdo sbyor ba ni//mchog dang mchog ni grub pa la//leg so zhes bya nges par sbyor//'dod pa med pa'i sgom pa ni//log so thams cad 'gro
244b7(rgyud): ba'i mgon//theg pa chen po bstan pa 'di//gnyis med so shes mchog dang ni//mno dag thob de'i dang po ste//legaso rdo rje bla ma kun//de la bstan pa rnal 'byor
245a1(rgyud): ma//legaso 'khor dkyil 'khor la//dngos grub bla na med pa byin//rdzogs te cad mu gsung bar gyur to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsha
245a2(rgyud): pas de skad ces bkar sprul nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro ba'i rdo rje rnams nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla na med pa'i mkha' gre me'i dra ba'i sdom pa
245a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla me zhes bya ba gsong ba'i yang gsang bas bde mchog rgyud kyi rgyal po
245a4(rgyud): chen po the tsom med par de kho na sgom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa dgu pa'o////mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma lngas gsang ba las gsung ba'i 'de
245a5(rgyud): mchog gi rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba rdzog so///rgya bar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po pad+me ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang /bod kyi lots+tsha ba chen po dge slong rin chen
245a6(rgyud): bzang pos bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa//phyis paN+Di ta chen po dz+nyA na shrI dang /lo ts+tsha ba khung po chos kyi brtson 'grus kyis kyang zhus pa'o//phyis paN+Di ti A nan+da
245a7(rgyud): dang /lo chung gis chad lcug rnams bsabs nas zhus dbu byas nas legs par btsas tau gtan la phab pa'o//rgya gar skad du/shrI mahAs
245b1(rgyud): ra taN+Da nA dza s+tha nA ma/bod skad du/dngal bde mchog sdom pa 'thung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po/dang l+ya t+tA ru ka la phyag 'tsha'o//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
245b2(rgyud): na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /gsungs dang /thub rdo rje'i btsun mo'i b+ha ga l-i nga'ugs te/'phags pa dga' bo la sogs pa
245b3(rgyud): 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyis bskor cing //'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i dbusu phyag
245b4(rgyud): na rdo rje la gzegs nas 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang /phyag na rdo rje ston las langs te/bla bos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
245b5(rgyud): te/lag pa thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la gsal ba btab pa/kye rnam pa kun mchog sdom pa yis//bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor mtshan nyid drang //rdzogs pa
245b6(rgyud): yang ni ji ltar ljags//bcom ldan lce las mnyan par 'tshal//rlung dang mi dang chu dang sa//dri bzhin na mkha' ji ltar lags//rnam pa lnga ni ji ltar lha//gtso bo
245b7(rgyud): yul drub de bzhin ci//phyi dang nang du gnas pa yi//sku gsum byin rlabs ji lta bu//lha yi sku ni ji ltar lags//gtso bos de bzhin lha mo gsungs//zla ba nyi ma
246a1(rgyud): n+ya/ zhig+sa l+ma//ldum lA ba na dz+hawAr lags//lus kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu//de dz+nyAn rtswa mo gzugs ni hI/rtswa gri blangs kyi tshad na du//de bzhin lus
246a2(rgyud): kyi gong bu ci//sbas pa'i dam tshig gi ni brda//gtso bos bdag la bshod du gsol//phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi//bla nas la sogs pa'i brda du zhig/ji ltar sa la
246a3(rgyud): sogs pa 'thob//mtshan ma ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur//khyed kyi las ni bcu gnyis gling //sngags kyi bzlas pa ji ltar 'gyur//bgrang phreng dag ni ji ltar rigs//
246a4(rgyud): bzlas pa'i grangs ni du zhi ba lags//lha yi rnam pa'i rnal 'byor ci//dkyil 'khor bri ba du zhig mchis//sngags kyi dngos grub ci zhig lte//gzhon nu mA yi mchod
246a5(rgyud): patsi bya dang bya min nyi mu gang //gtso bo myos byad gter ma ci//bdud rtsi lnga sogs ji ltar lha//lcags kyi lha sogs ji ltar 'gyur//dkyil 'khor bri ba b+ha shadu
246a6(rgyud): gsol//thig gdab pa ni ji ltar 'gyur//ji lta r-I se na yongasu sbyang //srung ba'i 'khor lo ji ltar 'gyur//slob dpon gyi ni bya ba gang //ji ltar skyob ma yongasu
246a7(rgyud): bzu /dbang bskur ba yi grangs ni du//bzhi pa yang ni ji ltar 'gyur//dus kyi nges pa ji lta bu//de bzhin 'chi ba bslu ba gang //dus bzhi'i ming ni zhig
246b1(rgyud): marjes//gling bzhi ba ni rdo ltar lugs//dus dang dus min dngos grub ni//spyod pa ji ltar spyad par bgyi//rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud du ni//rnal 'byor rgyud na ji ltar 'gyur//ma
246b2(rgyud): sde'i grangs ni ji lta bu//de bzhin pha rol phyin pa du//rab gnas sbyin slob mchod sbyin dang //sngags kyi dngos grub ji ltar 'gyur//bcud kyis len ni ji ltar lha//myos
246b3(rgyud): byed btung ba ji ltar 'gyur//gsang sngags ji ltar 'byung 'gyur lho//sngags btu ba ni ji ltar 'gyur//tshar bcad pa ni ci zhig lha//gtso bo rjes bzung ji lta bu//bcom
246b4(rgyud): ldan de nyid rnams ni ci//stong pa nyid dang snying rje gleng //stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ci//ji ltar de bzhin nyid rang bzhin//chos rnams thams cad yongs shes pa'i//sgrom
246b5(rgyud): bya'i mtshan nyid gtso bos gsungs//dpral bde mtshab 'byung ba'i rgyud lasmra zhus pa'i lde'u ste dang po'o///bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa phyag na
246b6(rgyud): rdod+hA gsang ba 'byung ba 'di zhus pa lags lags//de nas de'i phyir bskyed bu yi//rim pa'i skem pa yang dag bshad//sna tshog sa las kyi rang bzhin gyis
246b7(rgyud): bzhi bo rnamasu 'gyur//skyod skyes mngal nas skyes pa dang //dred gau sher dang ni badz+ras skyes rnams//ngang pa khrung khrung na bya dang //ne tse bzhad tshogs sbeng skyes to//glang
247a1(rgyud): yang /da sum stogs m+b+ha smA m+b+has//sbyin du 'bru dang b+h+yo mA la shAl snongs brnyadun shu smros//sgyu dang myal tu sdom pa
247a2(rgyud): rnams//de bzhin par de'i sgyid pra drang //bskul pa dang bya ba la sngags//'di rnams pardzus skyes sems dz+nyAn//shar g+hi lus 'bigs pa ling spyod//de bzhin byeng
247a3(rgyud): mi spya//gling gsum pa yi mo rnams ni//long stod chen pos yang dag mamo//dz+nyAn rmongs kyi brag mi phyed cing //ga med rnam par spyod mod pa'o//d+him+b+ha'i
247a4(rgyud): gling du legs smras pa//las kyi sa par rab tu grubs//legs byas nyes par byas pa'i las//mchog dang 'bring dang tha na rnams//skye ji sngon gyi rnam smin 'did/
247a5(rgyud): skye bo rnams l-I snang bar 'gyur//rmugs dang sIr sna gdug snyomos rnams//gro gro sgyu mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang //rgyags snang gaN+DI srog la sogs kyis//rims
247a6(rgyud): dod nade la sogs pas gzir//'dzum gleng pa'i \u0f7fba mtsha//yul dbus nI skyes pa ste//sngon po dge ba la ltos nas//dbang po ni 'bring rtul por 'gyur/
247a7(rgyud): nr-i skyes pa 'bras bu'i dam pa dang ba s+ho//rang gi khyim nas ngas 'byung da kyi gnyis pa yin//rab tu byung nas dag pa sgrub pa gsum pa ste/
247b1(rgyud): thob par gyur pa bzhi par gsungs//sgyu mu lta bu'i ting 'dzin//me rnams kyis rab mi shes te//thog med dus kyi nyon mongs kyi//bag chags rab tu bsags byas pas
247b2(rgyud): daphyir sngon byas las kyis ni//skye dang 'chi ba yang dag 'byung //tshogs pa ma rnyed de srid du//zhag bdun par do'i sred par gnas//srid pa bar de'i sems can ni//'gron
247b3(rgyud): pa'i bgrod pa ji bzhin du//'di ltar las kyi zhags pa yis//'gro ba drug tu rab tu skye/pha ma'i kun skyer sogs ni//srid pa'i skye bos mthong gyur nas//rta la zhon bzhin
247b4(rgyud): rnam shes ni//rlung gi gzhon pa zhon na su/skad cig thang cig nyid lnga ni/shin tu myor bar 'ongs gyur nas//shin tu dga' dang bcas stobs kyis//kha yi lam nus
247b5(rgyud): 'jub par 'gyur//rtsa ni stong phrag bdun cu gnyis//rab bskul de yi skad cig la//A li ka li zhu byas pas//mchog tu dga' ba yang dag thob//khu ba khrag de'i
247b6(rgyud): dbusu ni//thig le'u gzugs kyis yang drug gnas//drang po'i rnam pa nur nur po//me mer po ni gnyis pa yin//ltar ltar po skyes gsum pa ste//de bzhin bzhi pa
247b7(rgyud): bor gor po//rlung rnams kyi ni bskul tsam gyis//sha yi rnam pa lta bur 'gyur//zla ba lnga gyur sa bon las//yan lag lnga ni rab tu skye//zla ba bdun na skra dang
248a1(rgyud): s+phu//sen mo rtags ni skye bar 'gyur//zla ba brgyad na dbang po dang //lus kyi yan lhag 'byung bar 'gyur//zla ba dgu na yang dgu rdzogs//zla ba
248a2(rgyud): bcu na sems dang ldan//nur nur rang bzhin mo bskyod pa//mer mer po nai rIn tshun 'byung //'od dpag med mgon ltar lhur po//bor go raM bo ni don yod grub/mkhrang
248a3(rgyud): 'gyur rnam par snang mdzad do//rnam pa lngar ni bston pa yin//dri cha khrag ni mi bskyod pa//sa bon rang bzhin 'od dpag med//gong bu rin chen 'byung ldan te//re/
248a4(rgyud): cig 'dres pa rnam snang bzhugs//skye gnas dbu su rtsa gnyis ni//g.yas dang g.yon na de bzhin gnas//g.yon nas khu bu zhes bshad de//g.yas nas de
248a5(rgyud): bzhin khrag yino//de dag gcig tu 'dus gyur pa//chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhino//las kyi sa bon dbang thob pas//rlung gis yang dag bsgyur na su//chos kyi
248a6(rgyud): 'byung gnas sgo ru ni//gdod ni nges par phyogs par 'gyur//dauku ga yA su nI brten nasu//tsog pur mngon par phyogs te gnas//dku ga smon yang dag brtan nas
248a7(rgyud): ni kau shes rab ltar ni mngon phyogs 'gyur//mkhas pa sa ba ni lhung ba'i rim//dus kyi skad cig yang dag mtshan//g.yas nas rlung ni rgyu ba gang //thams
248b1(rgyud): cad du ni skyes bur 'gyur//g.yon nus rlung ni rgyu ba dang //nges par bud med rnamasu 'gyur//gnyis ka'i dbus rgya'i sa bon gang //rtag tu ma ning 'gyur ba'o//chu khams pa
248b2(rgyud): yid shes par bya//mime yi khams ni ma yi'o//lpags pa sha dang khrag rnams ni//ma las skyes shes bshad pa ste//rgyus pa rkang dang khu ba rnams//pha las skyes shes
248b3(rgyud): bshad pa yin//drug po 'di dag bsdus pa'i lus//rdo rje sems dpas gang gsungs pa//gzugs drang tshor ba 'du shes dang //'du byed rnam shes de bzhin to//sangs
248b4(rgyud): rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin du//phung po nges par skye ba yin//srid pa bskyed pa'i rim shes pas//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob pa'i phyir//'di ni phung po yongs mkhyen pa'i//
248b5(rgyud): de nyid gsungs pa rnams kyis bshad//'di ni bskyed pa'i rim pa nges par bstan pa'i rim par dbye ba ste gnyis pa'o//de nas gang zhig gshes tsam gyis//myur du
248b6(rgyud): dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'i//rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgom pa ni//yang dag rab tu bshad par blo//lus kyi dkyil 'khor la rten nas//chos dang long spyong rdzogs
248b7(rgyud): pa'i sku//rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim bsgrubs pas//lus kyi dkyil 'khor zhes gsungs//dbang po dman pas bskyed rim gyi//dkyil 'khor sgom/
249a1(rgyud): zhing bsam par bya//dbang po rnon pos skad cig ni//rnam pas sems ca dkyil 'khor sa//skad cig rnam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis//rdzogs pa'i/
249a2(rgyud): rim pa bsgoms pa ni//khams gsumo gzhal yas khang bdag nyid//srog chags rnams ni dkyil 'khor pa//de dbus skad cig rnam pa yis//dkyil 'khor bdag
249a3(rgyud): po rnal 'byor pa'o//oM AHhUM gi sngags kyis ni//sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor te//mtho ris sa steng sa 'og tu//skad cig gis ni sku gcig 'gyur//skad cig
249a4(rgyud): rnam pas rnal 'byor te//skad cig rnam pas gsang sngags 'don//dbang po kun dang mnyam sbyor ba//mkha' gro dra ba'i bde ba mchog/khams bzhi pa dang phung po lnga//
249a5(rgyud): de bzhin yul drug bdag nyid ni//khrag 'thung lha mo'i ye shes te//de la the dad mi brtag go//dkyil 'khor de bzhin nyid rgyus btag//de bzhin mkha' mnyam
249a6(rgyud): stong pa nyid//sna tshogs de bzhin nyid bdag nyid//thabs ni snying rje'i stobs yin te//zung du 'jug pa rnam rtog bral//dkyil 'khor snying po mchog yino//
249a7(rgyud): rnam par mi rtog sbyor bsams kyang //de tshe mi rtog bsam mi khyab//de yang rnam pa kun gyi mchog/bde ba'i dbang po rnam pa med//de nyid dngos dang dngos
249b1(rgyud): min 'dag/rtag tu srid pas 'byung bar mdzad//sna tshogs smyos pa'i rtog pa med//rtag tu 'byung ba bde ba che//skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin gyis//de las skyo ba yang dag 'byung/
249b2(rgyud): bems po min+da phyir bdag nyid rig/mi shes rnam par mi mthong bas//gzugs mod gang du'ang mi gnas shing //'gyur ba med cing brtan pa'o//kun rdzob skye ba 'byung bas
249b3(rgyud): na/chad pa mi ni phyir dngos med min//lhan cig skyes dga'i rang dngosu//chos thams cad lhan cig skyes//bdag byin rlabs par rab 'byung ba//mi shigs 'jig pa
249b4(rgyud): med pa ste//skye bo med pa'i ro myong bas//sbom po yang ni de nyid//stong nyid so sor rtogs pas no//bsam gau ta ni shes rab du yang 'gyur//chos kun yongasu shes
249b5(rgyud): pa yi//sgom po de nyid sgom med pa'o//rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde ba che//phyag rgya chen po mchog de bzhin//de nyid chos la 'jug pa'i phyir//de rnams dbye bas rab bstan pa//
249b6(rgyud): bla ma dam pa'i man ngag gis//gsal bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du min//sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni//e ba ma yi ge la rab gnas//sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi las//
249b7(rgyud): rnam kun mchog gi sdom pa'o//sdom pa byang chub bde mchog te//bltar med brjod du med pa'o//sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ni//'dus pa chen po'i mchog yin te//
250a1(rgyud): bdag byin rlab pa'i rim pa 'di//bla ma'i dran gyis gsal bar 'gyur//'di ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste gsum pa'o///
250a2(rgyud): de nas de phyir 'byung ba bzhi'i//mtshan nyid yang dag bshad par bya//dngos po dag ni ma lus gang //de ni 'byung ba'i rang bzhin te//sI de la ni dngos po rton//mes ni thams cad
250a3(rgyud): 'tshed par byed//chu yis 'ju bar byed pa ste//rlung gis lhan cig bskyod par byed//nam mkha' yul gyis stong par gnas//der ni thams cad de las skyes//gang du
250a4(rgyud): gcig ni gnas pa der//bzhi po kun kyang nye bar gnas//rtsa shing ljon pa 'khril shing sogs//bems po lta bu'i rnam shes tsam//gang dag 'gro drug sems can
250a5(rgyud): rnams//rnam shes bcas pa lta bur gnas//de ltar srid pa'i dngos po kun//blo dang ldan pas shes par bya//sems can rnams ni 'chi ba na//yan lag nyid lag
250a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi//rlung ni thams cad bskyod par 'gyur//skad cig de la mi drod 'dor//chu ni rtag tu bskams gyur nas//de nas tshor ba med par 'gyur//lus la sogs
250a7(rgyud): pa'i sa khams kyi//sra ba nyid tsam gnos par 'gyur//skye ba dang ni 'chi ba dag/thams cad du ni 'byung bar 'gro//lha dang lha min mi rnams ni//'byung ba med par skye
250b1(rgyud): mi 'gyur//wA yi 'jig rten skyong la sogs//rnams cad la ni sman+da g+sa blanas//rig byed grub mtha' thams cad kyis//rtag tu 'dod rjid rlom pa ste//gad phyir thams cad
250b2(rgyud): kun tu gro//sa sbrengs skyes kun la gnas//'byung ba zhi pa gtso ba mchog/bsnyen ba cos rkyen las yang dag bshad//rlud ni srog tu yang dge ba//me ni 'tsho ba
250b3(rgyud): mtshan nyid de//chu ni bdud rtsi'i ngo bo nyid//sa ni zhing tsam nyid du gnas//de la rtag tu gnas de'i lha//rnam shes mchog gi dbang phyug ste//lce lnga yi ni rnam pa ru//rnam
250b4(rgyud): shes de ni yongasu 'gyur//gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang //de bzhin 'du byed rnam par shes//me long lta bu mnyam nyid dang //so sor kun tu rtog pa dang //de bzhin
250b5(rgyud): bya ba sgrub pa dang //chos dbyings shin tu rnam dag ste//ye shes 'di dag rab tu gnas//rnam snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung //'od dpag med dang don yod grub
250b6(rgyud): de bzhin mi bskyod pa nyid de//rnam ltar ro cig rdzogs byang chub//gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri//ri dang reg bya chos de bzhin//yul drug tu ni shes b+ha ste//'di dag
250b7(rgyud): rnam par dag por bshad//khams ni bco brgyad shos bya ste//de dag phung po'i rang bzhin nyid//yi go mchog ni bsgom par bya//sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob
251a1(rgyud): bya'i phyir//mi la sogs pa bsgom bya ste//mig gi dbang po'i rnam shes ni//thugs kyi rdo rje'i rnam 'phrul yin//ngo ba nyid gsum rnam dag don//rang
251a2(rgyud): gsal ba yi go 'phang 'gyur//sgra dang rna ba rnam shes ni//dmigs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid//sna dang dri dang rnam shes kyang //de bzhin rnam dag shes par bya//ro dang
251a3(rgyud): lce dang rnam shes ni//don dam nyid du rnam par dag/lus dang reg bya rnam shes kyang //sgyu ma lta bu'i ngo bor skyes//yid dang chos dang yid rnam shes//snying po nyidadu/
251a4(rgyud): rnam par dag/rnam shes drug ni kun gzhi ru//'jug pas de bzhin gshegs pa yin//'od gsal ba yi go 'phang thob//he ru ka dpal yang dag gnas//
251a5(rgyud): yul dang yul can sbyor ba yis//rnam rtog med pa'i go 'phang 'gyur//rnam dag kun gyi mchog gnas pas//yul ni rnam dag shes par bya//sangs
251a6(rgyud): rgyus chos dang dge 'dun te//gcig la de bzhin gsum du brtags//skyabs gsum dang ni de nyid gsum//sku gsum rnam par grol ba gsum//zhal gsum
251a7(rgyud): yig gsum lnga gsum te//khams gsum pa yi rang bzhin nyid//dkyil 'khor gsum dang rnal 'byor gsum//lam gsum du ni bstan pa ste//dam tshig
251b1(rgyud): gsum dang dge ba gsum//de bzhin sku dang gsung drang thugs//shes rab dang ni thabs nyid dang //de yi sbyor ba gsum pa ste//chos kyi 'byung gnas rang bzhin gyis//ji
251b2(rgyud): ltar gsang sum mthong ba dang //'khor sum mi dmigs sbyor ba yis//sngags gsum gyi ni rang nyid nyid//phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi//rtsa gsum gyi ni rang gi
251b3(rgyud): dngos//phyi rol 'jig rten pa yi chos//lha la sogs pa'i bdag nyid nang //phyi nang dag pa nyid kyi phyir//rnal 'byor pas ni sangs rgyas thob//chos kyi dbyings kyi rang
251b4(rgyud): bzhin du//lha ni mngon sum dmigs par bya//rnam pa kun gyi mchog rang bzhin//lha mor yongasu brtag par bya//dang po'i lha yi rang bzhin du//rdo rje sems dpa'
251b5(rgyud): rnam par bzhugs//gnas dang zhing la sogs pa'i brda'o//dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma 'dus pa//dri bzhin gnyis med mnyam sbyor la//lha rnams yang dag 'phro ba ste//
251b6(rgyud): chad med lha ni 'phro ba las//dkyil 'khor tshad can rnam par brtag/lha yau rnal 'byor bsdam mi khyab//sangs rgyas rol po'ang bsam mi khyab//mkha 'gro dra ba'i///
251b7(rgyud): gzugs kyis ni//he ru ka dpal yang dag sbyor//de dag mi phyed ngo bo nyid//sgom par nga yis bshad pa yin//de dag thams cad gnyis med thob//gzung dang
252a1(rgyud): 'dzin dang rnam bral ba//rags pa sgra zhes bshad pa ste//phra ba sems kyi rang bzhin 'gyur//bsam dang bral ba'i de nyid ni//go 'phang mchag ces
252a2(rgyud): yongasu grags//'di ni 'byung ba bzhi dang rnam pa lnga dang /yul drug lha'i rnam par dag pa rim par phye ba ste bzhi pa'o////de nas zla ba nyi ma yi//rab tu phye ba yang dag
252a3(rgyud): bshad//g.yas dang g.yon du sbyor ba yis//rim pa ji bzhin rgyu ba ste//g.yon du rgan nas bzung nas ni//lte ba'i dkyil 'khor rab 'jug pa'i//zla ba'i rtsa ni 'og
252a4(rgyud): bltas byar//U li zla bar yang dog 'bab//g.ya su lte ba nas bzung nas//rkan gyi gan su rabu 'jug pa'i//nyi ma'i tsau nI steng gnas te//kA li nyi mar rtag tu 'bab//
252a5(rgyud): sna yi sgo ni gnyis po nas//rtsa gnyis rgyu ba'i mtshan nyid ni//rtsa g.yon 'jug pa'i lam yin te//g.yas pa 'byung ba'i lam yin//nyi shur nas brtsams ji srid de/
252a6(rgyud): da kyi bAr ni nyin mo ste//nub pas nas brtsams ji srid de//shar bya'i bar ni mtshan mor 'gyur//nyin dang mtshan mo zhag yin te//mel tse thun zhes brjod pa yin/
252a7(rgyud): thun bzhi nyin mor shes bya ste//de bzhin mtshan mo'ang thun bzhi po'o//zhag gcig la ni 'pho ba yi//yan lag bcu drug rnams yin te//thun ni phyed phyed rtag
252b1(rgyud): rgyutu rlung //sna yi bu grwar yang dag rgyu//yAdro'i tshe sa gcig nas bzung nas//nyin zhag gsum gyi thun phyed la//zla ba'i rlung ni rgyu ba ste//de nas zhag gsum nyi ma'i rlung //
252b2(rgyud): go rims 'dis ni ji srid du//yad ches beco lnga'i bar du'o//mar ngo'i tshes gcig nas bzung nas//nyin zhig gsum du sde dro ni//nyi ma'i rlung du grags pa rgyu//de bzhin
252b3(rgyud): tshes ni bco lnga'i bar//thun re yI nI bzhi chu rnams//chu tshod du ni brjod pas na//nyin zhag gcig la rtsa rnams ni//sum cu rtsa gnyis shes par bya//nyin zhag gcig
252b4(rgyud): la dbyug gu yi//drug cu rtsa bzhi'i tshad kyis ni//rtswa dang chu tshod phyed dbyug gru//thun gyi brgyad chu zhes bshad//sna sgo'i rlung ni 'byung 'jug la//dbugs gcig
252b5(rgyud): tu ni rab tu grags//rlung gi sbyor ba la mkhas pas//dbugs drug srog tu shes par bya//srog ni lnga bcu tham pa dang //dbugs gsum rkang pa'ang dri dang ldan//
252b6(rgyud): nyi ma byung du rgyu dus kyi//nyi mo dang po'i dbyug gu yin//nyi ma lhor ni rgyud dus kyi//mtshan ma'ang ni de bzhin 'gyur//dbyug gu rI re'i 'brel 'grib ni//dus
252b7(rgyud): dbyibs su shis par bya//dbugs ni drag po bzhi char bcas//'pho ba so so'i 'phel 'grib yin//dbugs kyi sum cha de'i bzhi cha'i//drug chas nyi mo re ring
253a1(rgyud): /9/rgyun rmA /rgyun ga rgyu'agasu b+hU na//rlud pa la sogs sa 'gyur ba/ma sa ngas das nga smra sa mdang/
253a2(rgyud): gnyis gsum dang bzhi//rtswa dang d+h+r-ig tu gong po rlung //byin gyi ga tu d+haka ts+tshi na//demachod pa chen por 'gyur//zla byed rtag tu log byu na//na ni chen po yang dge 'jug
253a3(rgyud): gcig tu loka/par rgyu//sgying sdig gnyin ni banag bar 'gyur// dang kau ny-i log par rgyu//zla ba drug na 'ardzi bor 'gyur//thun mong du su shus bur bya//gzhan yang khyad par
253a4(rgyud): bshad bya ste//mnyam po bdun du nyi ma song //gang tshe skye ba'i nyon zla ba//de tshe rgyas pa zhes bya'i dus//'chi ba'i nges pa'i dus yin//mi ni khyim gong las skyes pa//gang zhig/
253a5(rgyud): gzhan yong bdun de'i phyir//de ni ny+tsi mA mnyam bdun so//mnyam po bdun zhes bya bar bshad//nyi ma'i lam nas thams cad du//rlung ni rtag tu rgyu ba dag/rgyun mi 'tshod
253a6(rgyud): par yang drung yong //mkhas pas dus ni mtshon pad+mo bya//dus kyi skad nig klung lnga rlud //bskyod pa gzhan du 'jug 'gyur na//dus de'i skad cig rdzogs pa no//
253a7(rgyud): 'gyur 'di la the tsham med//ti byid dang bar byis te nyi ma sdigs deng de tsazhin nyon zhig gcig gi bar//de sa zhig gnyis zhig gsum da ni de bzhin
253b1(rgyud): yi bar dag tu//rlung ni gang zhig rtsa lnga brten te g.yas pa min pa'i nyi ma'i lam nas rgyu//de las pa dang nyi ma phyogs dang bkra shis drug bzhi 'di drug shes par bya/
253b2(rgyud): lnga nas nyi shu rtswa lngar nyin zhag 'di dag lnga lngar spel bas bgrod par 'gyur//de las re res sbrel bas bcu ni sum 'gyur ji srid gsum gyis lag pa'i bur/
253b3(rgyud): de las rgyas pa'i dusu gsum mig zla ba'i lho deng drug gsum zung zla'i zla//lcug mu tshes dang phyogs mda' yon tan zung dang zla ba'i zhag tu 'tsho ba yin//re'u
253b4(rgyud): mig sum nu bdun ban+das pa'i//'khor lo rim gsum bris nas ni//tshe dang srog gi rlung dag dang //nyin zhag mtshan ma rim bzhin bri//zhag lnga nus ni nyi shu
253b5(rgyud): lnga'i//bar bar gyi ni nyin zhag la//grangs ni bcu drug ma bshad gang //de rnams tshong bar brjod par bya//zhag ni drug bdun brgyad dgu yi//rim pas gal
253b6(rgyud): te rlung rgyun//yon+d+ran+da ldan yang nyin zhag ni//nyer bzhis ma tshang lo gsum na'o//drag po nyi ma yan lag sa'i//zhag ni rim+bi pAs rgyu na ni//yon tan ldan pa'ang nyin
253b7(rgyud): zhag ni//nyer bzhis ma tshang lo gnyis na'o//zhag ni bcu drug de bzhin du//bcu bdun dang ni bco brgyad dang //bcu dgu yi ni rim pa yis//rlung rgyu yon tan can
254a1(rgyud): yang zhag/bcu gnyis gnyis 'gyur mu tshang ba'i//lo gcig nu ni skyabs med gang //de ni gla shin rje'i grong khyer du//the tshom med par 'gro bar
254a2(rgyud): 'gyur//nyi ma nyi shu gcig gnyis gsum//nyer bzhi'i rim pas rlung rgyun//yon ton ldan pa'ang zhag drug ni//mched zla ba drug+ni na 'chi//re'u myig sum cu
254a3(rgyud): gnyis ldan pa'i//rim gnyis 'khor lo bris nus ni//der ni tshe yang yan lag rlung //grangs kyi mtshan ma rim bzhin bri//'chi ba'i rtags ni 'di drag kun//
254a4(rgyud): rnam pa thams cad shes byas nas//blo ldan 'chi ba bslu ba yis//gal te brtan pa'i go 'phrang 'dod//rtsa ni yang drag spyang byas pas//de srid rlung ni sbyangs
254a5(rgyud): 'gyur te//so so'i rimi bzhin rnal 'byor pas//yang dang yang du mnan par bya//g.yon pa'i bu gar bcug nas ni//rtswa ni bsdams nas mnan bya zhing //
254a6(rgyud): de bzhin du ni g.yas par rlung //bkug de drul bus mnan par bya//sems can+da rnams kyi zhug gcig la//rgyu ba'i dbus kyi grangs kyi tshul//brgya phrag drug
254a7(rgyud): gis lhag pa yi//stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig/dbang chen gyis ni rgyal srid de//chus ni don rnams yang dag 'byung //me yi rlung ni rnam rgyus pas//bkreng
254b1(rgyud): skom dug dang sdug bsngal nad//bya ba thams cad nyams 'gyur zhes//rdo rje 'dzin ma mchog gis gsungs//rlung gis rtsod dang skyo dang rmongs//nor nyams nyoni mongs par
254b2(rgyud): byed//dbang chen nor dang 'bru la sogs//rnyed pa thob dang sdud byed pa'o//chu yi rlung ni rnam rgyu bas//'dod pa'i dngos grub kun byed pas//de yi sbyor ba mchog gtso /
254b3(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' gang gsungs pa'o//rlung ni bcom ldan he'u ka'o//rang bzhini nyid de sum du 'gyur//g.yon pa shes rab rang bzhin te//g.yas pa snying rje'i bdag nyid//
254b4(rgyud): gnyis po mi phyed sbyor bar yang //gnyis ka nas ni rnam par rgyu//de bas de nyid rig pas der//dag mi dge sogs shes par bya//dug sogs gzhom dang lhag ma ni//
254b5(rgyud): bkra shis dpal n-i bskyed pa la//shes rab bdag nyid rab tu bsngags//rab tu dpal ldan snying rje'i stobs//g.yul ba sham rol rtsed ston mo dang //bcad pa dang ni
254b6(rgyud): dpag pa dang //sreg par bca ba'i lus la ni//snying rje'i bdag nyid rab tu bsngags//gzhan yang gnyis bdagA rdo rje can//the tshom 'gyur ba shes bya ste/
254b7(rgyud): dge dang mi dge nges med par//rlung rig pas ni 'di re me tshon bya//mgon po ji ste a lir rgyu//'ga' zhig ka li ra gnas 'dri 'am//ka la'i rgyu la a lin//
255a1(rgyud): gnas//de yi 'dod don nyams par 'gyur//glang nas mgon po du rgyu ba//dor gnas 'ga' zhig 'dri byed na//de yi don kun yang dag
255a2(rgyud): 'grub//gnyis kar gnas las the tshom 'gyur//rlung gi bdag nyid kyis mgon po'o//sku gsum por yang shes par bya//'jug pa chos kyi sku yin te//
255a3(rgyud): gnas pa long spyod rdzogs pa'i sgra//'byung ba sprul pa'i sku zhes bshad//'di dag sku ni gsum por bzhed//'dri ba po 'am rang gi'ang rung //chos skyes thams
255a4(rgyud): cad dge ba ste//longs spyod rdzogs pa the tshom 'gyur//sprul pas 'thab mor ston pa'o//rnal 'byor pa yi srog rtsol ni//sangs rgyas lnga yi ngo bor gnas//g.yon dang
255a5(rgyud): g.yas kyi gnas gang na//rim pa ji bzhin rnam par rgyur//g.yas nas rnam par rgyu ba'i 'od//me yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te//nas kyi mye tog lta bu'i myadog
255a6(rgyud): de ni 'od dpag med pa'i lha//g.yon nas rnam par rgyu ba'i 'od//rtag tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor te//kha dog ljang ku ltar snang ba//lha ni don yod mchog yino//
255a7(rgyud): gnyi ga nas ni rgyu ba'i 'od//gser gyi 'odi ltar snang ba ste//dbang chen dkyil 'khor gyi ni rlung //rtag tu rini tshon 'byung ldan rgyu//'og nas ngal bar rab rgyus
255b1(rgyud): byas//kun da zla ba s+t+ya byur dkar//mu yis dkyil 'khor rgyu ba ste//'od rkyen rdo rje mgon po'o//lus kun la ni rjes 'gro'i rlung //sems kun rab tu 'jug byed pa//mgon
255b2(rgyud): po rnam par snang mdzad ni//'byung bar rab tu grags pa yin//rnal 'byor ma ni mnyam gzhag pas//'jug pa'i rlung ni bgrung bar bya//ji srid 'bum la sogs pa'i
255b3(rgyud): grangs//sgra dang bral bar rtag tu bzla//sgrub po sgra dang bral bar ni//'bum bzlas yongasu rdzogs pa na//tshe nyams pa yang lo lnga ru//'tsho bar 'dir ni the tshom med//
255b4(rgyud): rtag tu nang par langs nas rlung //stong phrag gcig tu bgrang bya ste//dri bas rlung gi rnal 'byor la//rtag tu mnyam gzhag gnas par bya//yang na bum pa'i rnal 'byor
255b5(rgyud): gyis//rtag tu 'chi bdag las rgyal bya//bdag nyid rig pas rkang mthil ba re//kun tu rlung gi dgang bya ste//bum pa can la brtan byas nas//dbye ba gsum gyis
255b6(rgyud): gzhom par bshad//tha ma sum cu rtsa drug tsam//de yi nyis 'gyur 'bring de bzhin//sumi 'gyur tshon por shes bya ste//bum pa tsan des rgyal por bya//bum pa can
255b7(rgyud): lngar shes byas nas//bdag nyid skyil mo krung bcas te//lag pa lan gsum mnyes nas ni//de nas lan drug so gal brdab//ji srid sum cu rtsa drug par//de srid
256a1(rgyud): bum pa can gyis bya//sum 'gyur tshon thos gzhom pa ni//rgyu las rtsa brgyad lhag paso//brtan pa'i go 'bang 'dod pas ni//brjod pas de nyid kyis rgyal
256a2(rgyud): /a pA'i sbyor bas rgyal bas na//'chi bdag lngas ni ring du 'jug/bum pa can nA shes byas nas//'gag la brtan par gnas pa na//de la bskul pa stong du
256a3(rgyud): yang //'chi bdag nye bar 'ong mi 'gyur//snying gi chu skyes dbus sen rlung //hUM yig dkor po'i rnam par ni//glang gis mnyam par gzhag bsams na//
256a4(rgyud): yul sogs dmigs mi 'gyur//rlung gis 'khor ba'i stong du 'gro//mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og tu bgrod//snying kA yi ni chu skyes la//mi gnas mya ngan 'das par gnas/
256a5(rgyud): steng dang 'og du rgyu ba'i rlung //kha sbyar du na yid kyis byas//de yi sbyor bse goms byed na//des ni brtan pa'i go 'bang 'thob//rlung gi rnal 'byor mi shes pa 'am//gang zhig
256a6(rgyud): shis kyang mi byed pa//de ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chags//dri mas gtses de'i srin dur 'gyur//gang zhig 'gro dang 'ong ba'i rlung //blo dang ldan pas rtag bya ste/
256a7(rgyud): rlung gis thams cad byin gyis brlag/gi rlung ni kun tu \u0f7f/'gyur ba'o//'din zla ba dang nyi ma'i man ngag gi rim par phye ba sti lnga pa'o///de nas lam
256b1(rgyud): lnga bzang po mchog/rnam par nges par rab bshad bya//bdag gzhan don ni phun tshogs pa'i//sgrub pos dge dang mAM dge brtag/me dang rlung ni nyid dag dang //de bzhin dbang chen dang
256b2(rgyud): ni chu'i//dkyil 'khor yang dag rgyu ba las//zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang dgug/de bzhin bsid dang bskrad pa yi//mtshan nyid mkhas pas brtag par bya//de yi sbyor ba
256b3(rgyud): mi shes pa//de ni ngal ba don med 'gyur//mas ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba ste//rlung gis nor rnams nyams par 'gyur//dbang chen gyis ni rgyal sred 'gyur//chus ni nor
256b4(rgyud): dang 'bru rnams bsten//g.yas pa na ni rgyu ba'i khams//byin za'i dkyil 'khor nyid yin te//kha dog dmar zhing gsal ba ni//pad+ma'i mgon po'i 'byung ba'o//
256b5(rgyud): g.yon pa nas ni rgyu ba'i khams//rlung gi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te//kha dog ldang zhing gsal ba ni//las kyi mgron po 'byung ba'o//gnyi ga nas ni rgyu ba'i khams//
256b6(rgyud): gser gyi mdog ltar gsal ba ni//dbang chen dkyil 'khor nyid yin te//rin chen mgon po'i rgyu ba'o//dal zhing rgyu ba med pa'i khams//chu yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin
256b7(rgyud): te//dag pa'i shel ltar snang ba ni//rdo rje mgon po'i rgyu ba'o//khams rnams kun ni yang dag bsdus//rten dang rten pa'ang yang dag 'dzin//rnam snang mdzad ni rlung chen
257a1(rgyud): /'chi ba'i lus las rnam par rgyu//rlung gi de nyid mi shes par //las dang las min mi 'grub te//rlung ni thams cad bzod 'gyur bas//rta
257a2(rgyud): ga pa yis mi sheso//rlung gi de nyid sngon 'gro bas//sngags kyi de nyid bsgrub par bya//sems can rnams kyi srog gyur pa//rlung zhes bya ba las kun byed//'di ni rnam
257a3(rgyud): shes bzhon pa ste/sangs rgyas go 'phad 'thob byed pa//rgyud rnams kun gyi gsang ba ste//byang chub rgyu yi thabs yin//'di ni lam ldo ngas par brten pa'i rim par
257a4(rgyud): phye ba ste drug pa'o////de nas rtsa yi 'khor lo ni//rim pa bzhin du rab bshad bya//lus kyi rje su 'gro ba'i rtswa//stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis 'gyur//
257a5(rgyud): rnams dang ni nye ba'i rtsa//de dag gnas la bsten pa ste/brgya las nyi shu lhag pa'i rtsa//gtso bo zhes ni bya bar brjod//tsa yi gnas dang yul rnams ni//nyi shu
257a6(rgyud): bzhi'i grangs yin te//de rnams dbus kyi rtsa gsum gang //thams cad khyab cing brten pa'o//mgor ni pul+lI ru yin te//so dang sen mo 'bab par gnas/
257a7(rgyud): spyi gtsug dzA lun d+ha ra te//sgra dang spyi ni 'bab par gnas//ur+ya rna ba g.yas pa'i rtsa//lpags pa dang ni dri ma 'bab//mgo rgyab ar bu de yin te/
257b1(rgyud): yang dag 'babru pa na//gang+ga ban+d+ha R+sha pa g.yon//rgyus pa yang dag 'babru pa'iH//smin dbus ra ma shA ri s+t+rai//rgyug tu rus pA 'babru ba'o//m-i gnad pa kau T+wA~M glan sa//mtshan
257b2(rgyud): pa 'bab pa'i rtsa yin//m+b+hal ba ni dpung pa gnyis//snying 'bab pra s+ye rtsa gnaso//mtshan khung k+Sha ma rU pa ste//rtag tu mig mi 'bab pa'o//nu ma gnyis ni o trA s+t+waM/
257b3(rgyud): rtag tu mkhris pa 'bab pa'i rtsa//tri sha ku ne lte ba s+yai//tsar ni glo ba 'dab pas gnas//sna rtsi ko sA la yin te//sgyu ma'i phreng ba 'bab bos gnas//kha na kI ring
257b4(rgyud): sbyin te//rtag tu gnye ma 'bab pas gnas//mgrin pa lam pa klu yin te//rtag tu lto ba'i bab pa'i na//kaD+D+h+ya swA ka'i gnas yin te//bshad ba 'bab pa'i
257b5(rgyud): yin//'doms par ti mA lA ya te//mtshugs ma'i mtshams ni 'bab bla'i//p+lu tr-i p+pa ri mtshan ma ste/'dr-i kan 'bab pa'i rtsa yin//grI ha de pUSh+Ta shang lam+b+ha ste/
257b6(rgyud): rtag tu gnag ni 'bab pa'o//bad+ma gnyis so raSh+Ta yin te//rtag tu khrug ni 'bab pa'o//byin pa gnyis ni gser gling gnas//rdul 'bab pa yi rtsa yin//rkang du
257b7(rgyud): sir mo na ga ra//rtag tu tshil 'bab rtsa shes bya//rkang pa'i bal ni son d+hu ste//mchi mo 'bab pa'i gzugs can mo//ma ru de sha mthe bo ste//rtag tu mchil ma
258a1(rgyud): 'bab pas gnas//ku lu ta ni dbus mo ste//rtag tu sna chu 'bab pas gnas//de dag dbus na gnas pa'i rtsa//lA lA nAr ni si la hA 'bab//g.ya su/
258a2(rgyud): khrag ni 'bab pa'i rtsa//ra sA nA zhes grags pa yin//dbus kyi char ni yang dag 'jug/snying ka'i chu skyes dbus son pa/chu shing ste ma'i me tog bzhin//'phyang ba
