258a3(rgyud): kha ni thur du bltas//til gyi mar me lter 'brar zhing //byang chub sems ni mnyam 'bab ste//a bad+hU tir shes bya ste//lhan cig skyes pa ster byed pa'o//la lo nA la
258a4(rgyud): sogs pa'i rtsa//rtswa rnams kun gyi gtso bo ste//de bso 'dir ni gzhan bsten pa//gang gi sin d+hung gzhan 'jug bzhin//cig gyur kau ka mu kha ste//de nyid skye gnas
258a5(rgyud): gzhan ma yin//longs spyod rdzogs sku'i rang bzhin gyis//lus la brten par shes par bya//bud med rnams la'ang gtso bo gsum//la la n+d+ha sogs rtso rnams
258a6(rgyud): yin/shes rab rang bzhin la la nA//ra sa nA ni thabasu gnas//dbus nas a ba d+hU te ni//gzung dang 'dzin pa rnams spangs pa'o//longs spyod rdzogs sru lu larmA/
258a7(rgyud): ra sanA ni sprul pa'i sku//a ba d+hU ti chos sku ste//sku gsum por ni bshad pa yin//rtsa rnams de dag thams cad ni//lus ni dge bar byed pa ste//de yi chog
258b1(rgyud): las yang dag byung //gong bu lha yi bdag nyid//gzugs las 'das pa gong bur 'gyur//gong bu las 'das lha nyid do//de phyir bsam mI khyab sbyor bas//de bzhin nyid bdag
258b2(rgyud): kun tu 'gro//sgrub pos cho ga gang gang gis//gong bu las 'das gro 'phang gnas//des ni de yi bdag nyid du//gyur pas sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur//'do ni rtswa yi 'khor
258b3(rgyud): lo'i thabs rim par phye ba ste bdun pa'o////de nas gang zhig shes tsam gyis//myur du dngos grub 'gyur ba yi//dam tshig rnams kyang rim pa bzhin//yang dag
258b4(rgyud): par ni bshad par bya//rang gi khyim 'am gsang ba'i gnas//dben zhing yid ni dga' ba dang //ri bo tshang tshing ri sul dang //rgya mtsha chen po'i 'gram dang ni//ma mo'i
258b5(rgyud): khyim dang dur khrod dam//chu bo 'dus pa'i dbu su ni//bla med 'bras bu 'dod pa yis//dkyil 'khor yang dag bri bar bya//yon bdag dad pa chen po yis//zhing skyes gnas/
258b6(rgyud): skyes grags skyes ma'i//rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor pa//slob dpon lha kun spyan drang bya//khyim pa 'am ni dge tshul 'am//de bzhin dge slong slob dpon te//slob dpon
258b7(rgyud): kha cig 'jig rten pa//bstan la go nas pa'i dge slong 'am//kha cig yon tan ldon pa 'am//de bzhin mngon shes thob pa'ang rung //'di rnams nang na yon bdag ni/
259a1(rgyud): /gung la rudu pas gtso mchog bya//slob dpon sngon du 'gro ba yis//dkyil 'khor dag pa bri byas te//slob dpon dbang bskur yon tan ldan//'jig
259a2(rgyud): rten rnams kyis ma smad cing //mi dge bcu yongasu spongs pa ni//tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i gtso bor bya//rtag tu yon bdag blo ldan gyis//snying rje med cing khro dang
259a3(rgyud): gdug/khengs dang brkam chags bdag nyid bstod//mnyam par ma gzhag gis mi bya/gang zhig khyim gnas longs spyod bston//gshol 'dzugs dang ni tshong
259a4(rgyud): pa dang //rmongs pas dam chos 'tshong pa ni//tshigs kyi 'khor lo'i gtso bor min//'di ltar yon tan kun ldan zhing //thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal mtshan
259a5(rgyud): dzin//dul zhing brtson 'grus yang dag ldan//sred pa med cing nga rgyal med//rtag tu sems can bsten par ni//ltos banas rgyun gyis brgyan pa dang //thod pa'i rgyun
259a6(rgyud): la dga' ba dang //rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan+da de'i//mkhas pas g.yon gyi phyogasu ni//g.yon pa'ang rab tu bzhag par bya//'di ltar yon tan ldan slob dpon//las
259a7(rgyud): rnams kun la rab tu bsngags//rim pa ji bzhin slob dpon dang //lha rnams spyan drang byon pa la//ji ltar rnyed pa'i dri chu yas//zhabs bkru bas ni gtsang byas nas/
259b1(rgyud): sa yongs brtag pa'i gnasu ni//slob dpon sngon du 'gro ba yis//rgan dang gzhon pa'i dbye ba bzhin//zhugs nas gdun la gnas par bya//skal pa med dang dra rgyal can//
259b2(rgyud): de bzhin bla ma smod pa dang //dam tshig ma mthong rang gi bu//de bzhin skyes pa bud med rnams//sgrub po dngos grub 'dod pa yis//dam tshig der ni gzhug mi bya//gal
259b3(rgyud): phyugs ni dri rnams zhugs//dngos grub ring du 'jug par 'gyur//dmo tshig smad pas lus sems ni//sdug bsngal de bzhin gnas nyams dang //dpa' lus ring zhing sna
259b4(rgyud): tshogs pa'i//sdug bsngal gyis ni nyer 'tsher 'gyur//de ltar shes nas spang bya ste//mchod pa'i spyod yul can rnams bsdu//rgan dang gzhon pa'i rim bzhin du//me tog
259b5(rgyud): bdud/spos mar me dang //tsan dran dris ni khyad par du//blo dang ldan pas rtag mchod bya//gdugs dong rgyal mtshan gyis rgyan pa'i//gtor ma slob dpon gyis rab brtag
259b6(rgyud): lho ni bsnyen phyir mchod bya zhing //yon bdag yid la 'dod pa yi//gang zhigro zhi dang rgyas pa'i las//dngos grub don du bris nas ni//grang gang mngon par 'dod pa
259b7(rgyud): yi/las do byin gyis brlab par bya//sbrang chang gur chang khu ba'i chang //ji ltar snyed pa dbul bar bya//gtsang zhing dul dang dpa' ba'i sems//srid dang gti mug
260a1(rgyud): /rnam pa smra su//rnams ng+yas du smra bar /rdzun//bs+t+war+b+bad+hA r+dz+dza ba tu ga/ba dang 'dung do bzhon gyung//sartswa dang no smos da na//m+b+ha/
260a2(rgyud): lakhor gyi ni mdun nyid de//smon dag gis na d+hI rnyed //sbyinas las hU~M hU~Md+hi ni//mkhas pas rdzas rnams yad su spyad//theg par skyugs kyus mnyam
260a3(rgyud): dam tshig yong su spyad par bya//de nas thams cad yongs rdzogs par//slob dpon gyis ni byin gyis byerlug//gnas dang nye gnas zhing dang ni//'dus dang dur khrod
260a4(rgyud): gnas pa'o//dpe'i me'i dbang phyug ma kun la//bdag gi gus pas phyag 'tshalo//lha mo rnams kyi ched ma dam tshig tshad ma dang //des bshad gsung ni mchog
260a5(rgyud): tu chud mar gyur pa ste//bden par gyur pa des na lha mo rnams kyis 'dir//bdag ni rjesu gzung ba'i rgyud ni gyur par shog/gzhan yang dkyil 'khor mdun
260a6(rgyud): duni/snying kAr thal mo rlab sbyar te//yon bdag gis kyang smon lam ni//yongasu bsngo ba nyid du bya//srid dang zhi ba mnyam par rmugs pa bcom zhing yang dge
260a7(rgyud): rtog pa 'joms//khyed kyis dngos po thams cad mkha' dang minyam pa'i bdag nyid gzigs par ljon//mgon po thugs rje chu yi ljid kyis brlan par gyur par//
260b1(rgyud): thugs kyi chus//bdag la mchod cig lha mo rnams kyis shin tu rjes brtser mdzad du gsol//rnal 'byor bdud rtsi ro gcig gsol byas thugs ni rnam par dag pa ste//gnas
260b2(rgyud): la sogs pa'i yul du bgrod pas sku ni rnam par dag pa yi//dpal ldan gnas kyi dbus kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo mchog ma mgon po ni//bla ma mchog la rtag tu mdo//
260b3(rgyud): byos btud de gus pas phyag 'tshal//dpa' bo kun gyi sku ni rtag tu mdzes pa ste//lha mo rnams kyi rin tshun sku yis 'khyud pas rgyan//'khor los gnas mgon lhan
260b4(rgyud): cig skyes dga' dri med pa'i//rnal 'byor snying po bde mchog la yang rtag phyag 'tshal//sangs rgyas kun mkhyen shin tu rnam par dag pa'i gnas//lha mo rnams ni lhan
260b5(rgyud): cig skyes pa'i gnas kyis mdzes//'dren pa lhan cig skyes pa'i draga'o ba 'byung ba ste//dri mod lhan cig skyes pa mchog bdag la phyag 'tshal//tshogs bshad
260b6(rgyud): gsum gyis yang dag bstod//ji ltar de bI ru phyag kyang btsa la//yid spro ji ltar bde bar ni//ca co'i spro ba chen po yis//me tog phreng rnams kyis rgyan cing //sna tshogs
260b7(rgyud): me tog gis mchod lus//chang gi ston mo'i dga' bcas pas//rdo rje glus ni dga' bar bya//mchog tu dga' bas gar bya zhing //gnas kyi mtshan pa'i stengs
261a1(rgyud): stabs par//phyag rgya sngags kyis gar bya'o//der ni paT hA sogs dang //tsang to'u dang ni bAkra shisA rnga//rnga rings la sobs sna tshogs pa'o//rom
261a2(rgyud): mo yid 'ong bsgrag par bya//he ru kra bcas dpa' bye dang //rnal 'byor ma mchog g.yon pa ste//de rjes tshogs kyi gtso bo yis//yon bdag gi ni dge ba bsam//rnal 'byor/
261a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma 'das paso//skad cig shis pa brjod pa sbyin//bde ba phun tshogs ldan pa dang //nad med pa dang dge ba'i sems//'dod dang grol sogs yang dag 'thog//
261a4(rgyud): dngos grub phun sum tshogs par 'gyur//dkyil 'khor rnam par spros pa ni//che ba bshad bzhin bsdu bar bya//lhag ma'i gtar ma bsdus nas ni//'byung ngo
261a5(rgyud): 'tshal ba rnams lnga sbyin//gnas dang zhing gnas rnal 'byor ma'i//tshogs la dri zhing tshim par bya//spyan drangs dpa' bo thams cad ni//bde ba chen por gsha
261a6(rgyud): su gastsol//'di ni dom+b+ha tshig gi brda'i cho ga rim par phye ba ste brgyad pa'o///de nas lag pa g.yon pa'i bArda//cung zad tsam ni bshad bya ste//sgrub pos
261a7(rgyud): gang zhig shes tsam gyis//myur du dngos grub 'gyur ba'o//gang zhig sor mo gcig ston pa//de la gnyis bstan legs 'ongs pano//gang zhig g.yon
261b1(rgyud): pa'i snor mo sdoms//bde 'am zhes pa'i rgyur shes bya//gang zhig ming med ston byed pa//de la mthu'u chung bstan par bya//gang zhig gung mo snyan byed pa//
261b2(rgyud): de la mthe bong bsten par bya//gang zhig srin lag ston byed pa//de la mgrin pa rab bstan bya//gang zhig pa ni sa sten pa//de la rtse gsum bstan par bya//gang zhig nu ma ston
261b3(rgyud): skyed pa//de la sgra mtshams bstan par bya//gang shig sa ni ston byed pa//de la 'khor lo bstan par bya//gang zhig khri ga nyer smyan dpa//de la gtsug dud bstan par /
261b4(rgyud): gang zhig dpral ba ston byed pa//de la rol pa bstan par bya//bud med gang zhig g.yon nas 'gro//rnal 'byor ma rtag g.yon nas te//skad cig chen po sde rab tu smra/
261b5(rgyud): g.yon pa'i lta bas rnam blta zhing //bud med rnams la dgar smra ga/de ni dam tshig ldan shes bya//bud med rnams la gsol btab na//rigs kyi sa boni rab sgra
261b6(rgyud): zhing //rigs kyi bya ba mi 'dor la//rang gi rigs kyi rig pa zlos//gang zhig rig pa rnam par 'dra//lag pa g.yon pas rang gi mgor//mgo la 'phrug par
261b7(rgyud): byed pa dang //sgrub pa pos ni khyad par du//de yi rang rigs dran par 'gyur//'khur ba 'am ni kos ki 'am//sna dag tu ni sor mo ston//zur gyi lta bas dus rtag tu//
262a1(rgyud): rang gi rig la rnam par lta//bden 'byung 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor ma//rnyed dka' nges par dam tshig can//rlung gi khyim du thod pa dang //dgra sta ral gri rgyal
262a2(rgyud): mtshan dang //'khor lo dang ni rnga yab dang //rtse gsum bris nas dga' byed cing //rtag tu sha dang chang la dga'//'jigs dang ngo che 'joms byed gang //mkhe 'gro ma'i
262a3(rgyud): rigs yang dag 'byung //lhan cig skyes ma zhes byar bshad//yul dang yul du mngon par skye//sgrub po rnams kyis rtag tu ngasten//gnas dang nye 'i gnas dang ni//de bzhin
262a4(rgyud): zhing dang nye ba'i zhing //tshan de nye ba'i mtshan do ha//'dus pa nye ba'i 'dus pa dang //dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod ste//'dzam+bu'i gling na yang dag gnas//gnas ni pu l+li rar
262a5(rgyud): grags te//de bzhin dz+nyA lan+ta ra'ang gnas//ur+yan de bzhin gnas yin te//de bzhin ar bu da yang gnas//nye gra nas god bar+ya ste//de bzhin rA me shwa ra'i ming //de bi ko/
262a6(rgyud): rdzir mngon brjod dang //mA yaM be yang nye ba'i gnas//zhing nI kA ru'i ming can te//oM trer mngon par brjod pa'ang zhing //nye shring tr-i shwa ku ni ste//ko sa la yang nye ba'i zhing //
262a7(rgyud): ka ling ka dang lam ka'ang //de bzhin tshan do ha yin te//kany+tsi hi ma la ya ni//khyad par nye ba'i tshan do ha'o//'dus pa pre ta ba si ni//gri ha de ba yang de bzhin//sau rASh+Ta dang
262b1(rgyud): sor gling gang //nye baSh+Ti 'dus pa bla nyis yin//pa titI la pu tA dur khrod de//sin tu'ang de bzhin dur khrod do//ma ru ku lu t+ta gnyis ni//nye ba'i dur khrod gan su bshud//de ltar bya rol
262b2(rgyud): gan su grags//nang gi gnas nyid lu su brjod//rang lus rtse yi gzugs la 'dor//gnas kyi maud du rab tu grabs/de gzugs l-I yi nem pa ste//des na na gi bdag tu gnas/
262b3(rgyud): de phyir de yi gong bu'i dngos//lus 'di sangs rgyas kun mtshungs pa'o//gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa//de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med//zhing ni 'od byed sa yin te//nye ba'i
262b4(rgyud): zhing ni 'od 'phro ba//mngon du gyur pa tshan dor shes//nye ba'i mtshan do sbyang dka' ba'o//'dus pa ring du song ba ste//mi g.yo bar grags nye 'dus pa//dur khrod de bzhin
262b5(rgyud): legs blo gros//nye ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sprin/gnas sogs sa yo rnam dag pa//rim pa ji bzhin bshad pa yin//gnas dang nye gnas sogs bsten pas/mi
262b6(rgyud): rnams dri ma med par 'gyur//blo ldan rnam rtog med pa ni//rgyu zhing mtshan ma yang dag brtag/sna tshogs gzug dang 'jigs gzugs ma//drag cing mi bzod dgod
262b7(rgyud): brtags la//rang 'dod lha yi rnal 'byor gyis//hUM gi sgra ni bsgrags par bya//the tshom thams cad rnam spangs nas//sgrub pos seng ge bzhin du spyad//mthong
263a1(rgyud): /dam+ba rAg la thos pasna kyang //myur du dngos grub rab 'gro 'gyur//'di ni brda dang gnas la sogs pa'i bzlas//sa rnams nges par bstan pa'i/
263a2(rgyud): rim par phye ba ste dgu pa'o//de nas gang zhig bris nr-im gyis//sgrub pos dngos grub thob 'gyur badz+ri//zhi ba la sogs rab sbyor ba//yang dag rab tu bshad par bya/
263a3(rgyud): bur gum tsan dan bsres pas gang //yang ngo yi ni tshes la bri//'khor lo rtsibs drug bris nas ni//yi ge bdun pa'i sngags sbyar zhing //phyi rol rdo rje'i phreng blo
263a4(rgyud): bskor//dbus ming ni rnam spel ba'o//dur ram ras ni gtsang ma 'am//yang na kham phor khA sbyar la//gas m+b+hi las ni bris nas kyang //srid bu dkar pos dkri
263a5(rgyud): bar bya//kha dog dkar bris sher bltas te//me tog dkar pos mchod par bya//mdun du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bsgrub bya gnas par bltas la/bum pa
263a6(rgyud): dkaro bo zla ba'i bdud ni chus gang pos dbang bskur bar bya'o//tha cham med pas thun gsum du//yi ge bdun pa'i stegs bzlas na//de mAM thag tu zhi byudang /
263a7(rgyud): bde legs sgyid dang tshe ring 'gyur//rims nad dug dang mche ba la//lag pa g.yon bair ba sgom par bya ste//'khor lo tsan dan gyis bris la//me ta
263b1(rgyud): bdug pas mchod par bya//bsgrub bya shar du kha bAstan to//mkhas pa yAs ni sbyar bya ba//gtor mu chu dang de bzhin mo//de yi dbu mu dur bA 'am//rma bya'i sgro 'am ku sha'i chus
263b2(rgyud): khyad par du ni de la bya ba//gsang sngags 'di ni gtso bo mchog/zhi so gas cho ga rim bzhin byed//gur gum dri bzang bsres pa yis//rgyas pa'i 'khor lo br-i bya ste//
263b3(rgyud): sAr+tha'i yi ge dang spol bar//kham phor gnyis la bris nas ni//srad bu ser pos dkri byas la//mar dang sbrang rtsi'i nang du gzhug/byang du kha bltas thun gsum du//kha
263b4(rgyud): dog ser po'i sgom byas la//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ser po la//bsgrub bya gnas par mkhas pas bsam+b+ha//bdud rtsi ser pos dbang bskur zhing //me tog ser pos
263b5(rgyud): mchod par bya//rnam par mi rtag sems kyis ni//rgyas pa'i bsim pas bzla bya ste//che ge mo puSh+TiM ku ru swAhA//b+h+r-i ShaT sngags kyis sbrel bar bya//nor dang 'bru
263b6(rgyud): rnams 'phel ba drang //dpal dang bkra shis mnyam par 'jug/las kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni//rgyas par 'gyur te gzhan du min//tsAn dan dmar dang senra rtsi
263b7(rgyud): dang //ming med kyi ni khrag bsres te//ras sam gro ga'i mdab ma 'am//kham phor so ni ma btong bzung //yi ge ho dang spel ba yis//'khor lo gnyis ni/
264a1(rgyud): mnyam pa /smang du ma su stong na na a /dmang smras mchod par glu/mA dang rgyudabus gnag sa//nub kyi phyogs //
264a2(rgyud): bstus+yA te//kha dog dmar po sgom d+ha si las//dmyal 'khor dam po la gnas pa'o//bam+b+hi'i tshogs pa rnam de bas ma//rtag tu yig bdun 'byung na//
264a3(rgyud): rgyun mi 'chad par bzlas bya ste//myos par 'gyur bas zhabs drung lhung //de ni grub par rnam par bsam//gal te dbang du 'ong bar ma gyur mar dang spyad rtsing
264a4(rgyud): ba'i 'khrul la khor song ldeng kau med pa m+b+ha la gdung ba d+hAs ni//nga skye sbrul pa ngan pa yang sgrul pa bad pa 'gyur te//gzhan du me na//du
264a5(rgyud): nas sam/zlu mtshan 'jig ras la/smrigs khu ba dang ldan du sa b+h+rUM dang la 'i 'khrul la buM ba dam/kham par ma/drud myi
264a6(rgyud): kyi thod pa la grub pa'i 'khor lo bris la sru buM dmar pos dkris te/me tog dmar pos mchod la/bsgrub bya'i snying kA nasA lcags kyus bkug cing mgrin
264a7(rgyud): pa nas zhags pas btsang bar bya'o//gang gis de ltar bas ma kyang bsgrub byan ma yang 'ongs par ma gyur na seng sdong gi shing las mau sbyar l-i bsros pas
264b1(rgyud): 'khrul 'khor char bcad par bya zhing /che be mo A kAR+Sha ya hI dzaHzhes bya ba des bsgrub bya skad cig tsam de nyid la dgug par bya ste/rkang pas dgug pa bla na med du'o//
264b2(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang mnan pa yi//cho ga bla med bshad par bya//ri mo brgyad brgyad minyam sbyar bas//re'u mig bzhi bcu rtsa dgu ste//mkhas pas de yi bar gyi ni//re'u
264b3(rgyud): mig bcu gsum stong par bya//zur dang zur du ri'u mig dgu//gru bzhi la ni yang dag gnas//grwa bzhi kun gyi dbus kyi ni//ri'u mig stong pa nyid byas la//dur khrod ras la
264b4(rgyud): zhal bzhi pa'i//sngags ni yang dag sbyar ti bI//yung ba ldong ros bsres pa'i chus//'khor lo gnyis la bsgrub bya'i ming //yi ge lam dang spel te bri//ri rab
264b5(rgyud): brgyad gnas bris pa yi//khyam phor kho sbyar nyid du bya//ri rab steng du dbang chen gyi//dkyil 'khor dbusu lam gyis ni//mtshan cing sna tshogs rdo rje yis//steng
264b6(rgyud): nas mnan par rnam par sgom//srad bu si rA pos rnam par dkri//he ru ka ni phyag gnyis pa'i//rnam par bdag lus yang dag sgom//rnal 'byor pas ni lhor bltas te//
264b7(rgyud): kha dog dmar por rnam par sgom//bsgrub bya ri rab dbus gnas shing //ri rab kyis ni mnan par sgom//de stengs sna tshogs rdo rje yi//yongasu mnan par rnam par
265a1(rgyud): sgom//rang gi gan su dA byas na//dgra yi kha ni gnon pa dang //dpung rnams kun kyang gnon par byed//dgra yi snying yang gnon pa'o//au suM b+ha ni sr-i b+ha/
265a2(rgyud): ni huM hUM phaT//laM lhas byin staM b+ha ya/oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na huM hUM phaT/laM lhas byin staM b+hA ya/oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya huM hU~M phaT/ldem sa byin staM b+ha ya/oM A na ya hi
265a3(rgyud): d+hAd+harA dzi/huM hUM phaT/le lhas byin staM b+ha yaM/sngar bshad rim bzhin 'khor lo ni//de nyid kyis ni nges par bri//me tog ser pos mchod bya ste//ngag gnon pa yi
265a4(rgyud): mchog yin no//rtag tu dur khrod ras la ni//'khor lo gnyis ni mngon bris te//yi ge baM ni bsgrub bya yi//ming dang spel bas kha bcings pa//dbang chen dkyil
265a5(rgyud): 'khor dbus ni//ga'u kha sbyor byas pa yis//lug gi snying khur bsgrub bya ni//rab tu zhugs pa rnam par bsams//sngags ni rgyun mi 'chad par bzla//nges
265a6(rgyud): par lkugs pa nyid du 'gyur//de nas gzhan yang nges par ni//bsod pa'i cho ga mchog bshad bya//lan tshwa skye tshe tsha ba'i mar//nim pa'i lo ma de bzhin dug/
265a7(rgyud): dur khrid sol ba d+ha du ra//rang gi sdig mdzub khrag kyang rung //rdzas 'di dag ni snag tshar bya//lho phyogs kha bltas sbyor bas ni//khwa yi bshog pa'i myu gu
265b1(rgyud): yAs//bsgrub byed de yi ming bzung ste//yi ge hUM dang rnam spel ba'i//'khor lo gnyis ni yang dgra bri//khro zhing drag po'i nga ro dang //g.yon brgyad pa yi zhabs kyis ni//nyi ma'i
265b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa//bskal pa'i mi 'dra zhal rnam 'gyur//sngo zhing mi bzad hUM gi sgras//mgur ni gang bar rnam par sgom//gyo mo khrod kyi sar bsams pa 'am//
265b3(rgyud): du khrod sol ba yi ni dbus//'di la sogs pa'i sa phyogasu//bsgrub bya gnas par mkhas pas bsam//rid cing dri ma dang bcas pa/gos hrul gyon par rnam bsam ste//
265b4(rgyud): yan lag kun dang mgo bo dang //snying kha dang ni dpung par yang //sngags kyis phug par bsam par bya//bsgrub pa'i lus la gnas pa'i lha//rang gi lus la rab
265b5(rgyud): tu gzhug/khyim stong lta bur bltas nas ni//phyag na sna tshogs mtshon cha nan//khro bo'i tshogs ni spro byas la//mtshon chasra bsod par rnam bsam ste//dum bu
265b6(rgyud): drug tu btubs nas ni//tshil dang rkang dang zhag dang shi/za dang 'thung bar byed pa dang //de bzhin du ni khrig kyang 'thung //ral gri dbyug tho gtun shing dang //dgra sta
265b7(rgyud): 'khor lo tho ba yis//bsgrub bya la ni rdeg cing 'thug/dum bu brgyad ni bshog par byed//khra dang 'ug pa bya rgod dang //lce spyang srin po mkha' 'gro ma//de rnams
266a1(rgyud): khros pa'i yid kyis ni//za ba dang ni 'thung bar byed//yi ge hU~M phaT dang sgrol ba'i//sngags dang de yis bzlas byas te//dkon mchog gsum
266a2(rgyud): la gnod byed pa'i//dgra yi tshogs rnams bsad par bya//oM ma ho gang phyir bsad pa'i las//bsad par gyur kyang ma bsad de//'khor ba'i rnam par rtog pa
266a3(rgyud): tsam//de bzhin nyid du yid kyis rtogs//de nas yi ge phaT spel ba'i//'khor lo gnyis ni bris byas te//bsgrub bya'i ming ni yang dag blang //sngags kyis sbyar te/
266a4(rgyud): brI bA ra bya//rta dang ma he maM ny+dzam zhon pa'i//bsgrub bya bltas te yang drag bris//thod pa kha sbyar nang bzhag ste//srid bu sngon pos dkri bar bya//khro ba'i sems kyis
266a5(rgyud): nyi byed dam//mtshan mo de yi khyad par la//rab tu gtum pa'i bzhi mdo 'am//dur khrod 'jigs pa'i dbusu ni//gesang nas bsgosau te gzhug par bya//sngar
266a6(rgyud): bA shad cho ga bzhin du mchod//rta dang ma he dag 'thabs pas//de yi mod la 'byed par byed//gnyi ga khro zhing khro bas 'jigs//g.yul 'gyed po yi bdag
266a7(rgyud): nyid tshe//phan tshun rtsod pa byed pas ni//rnam par sdang 'gyur gzhan du min//yi ge hU~M phaT rnam spel ba'i//cho ga 'di nyid kyis 'dir bri//sngags dang bsku
266b1(rgyud): byA mnyam ldan pas//dur khrod ras la bris na stan//thod pa kha sbyar nang bzhag s+ho//srad bu nak+Sha bos dkris nas nI//he ru kAr ni bsgoms nas//ro bslebs su brkos smra bar/
266b2(rgyud): bya//mdun du yaM las byung ba'i rlung //gzhu yi dbyibs can dbugs gnas shing //kha dog sngon po rnga mo zhen//skye phyogs ni bskyod pa dang //khro bo'i tshogs kyis khrid/
266b3(rgyud): byas na//sa stengs smyon pa bzhin du byed//yi ge hU~M phaT sbyor ba yi//sngags ni rgyun mi 'chad pas bzlas//gang gi cho ga ci byas po//de yi mod la skrod par 'gyur//sgrub
266b4(rgyud): bo lhor bltas khros po yis//ra khrog dur khrod thal ba dang //dug dang lani tshwa 'bru mor che//myos byed madrib ma'i khu ba ni//ske tshe mnyam par yang dag sbyar//dur khrod ras mi
266b5(rgyud): de bzhin du//'khor lo gnyis po nyid rim bzhin//cho ga rdzogs par bri bar bya//bsrad po gshin rje'i lus la gnas//dbye ba rta dang ma he la//bskrad pa rnga mo la gnas
266b6(rgyud): pa//zhi ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la//mi mo rnams kyi snying kar dbang //rgyas pa glang chen rgyab tu'o//lkugs pa lug gisau lus la gnas//mnan pa ri rab dbus te
266b7(rgyud): dgug/shi ra d+ha yi seng ger gnas//'di ltar las ni brtag par bya//las 'di dag dang bral ba'i las//pad+ma bas kyang des ni mi 'grub ste//bla ma'i man
267a1(rgyud): dgra med pa'i las//stong pa bzhin du 'bras med 'gyur//'di ni lus rab 'byam 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcu pa'o//
267a2(rgyud): de nas sngags kyi bzlas pA yIs//mtshan nyid gsang ba bshad par bya//ri bo tshad tshong ri sulA dang //rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram dang ni//bzhi mdo dang ni mdun khang
267a3(rgyud): gnas//dur khrod de ma ni yid dga' ba//sngon du dkyil 'khor bris nas ni//phyi nas lha yi bdag nyid kyis//sngar bshad chogs yang dag par//sngon du bsnyen
267a4(rgyud): pA la sogs bya//ri 'am ri bo'i gan su ni//snying po'i sngags ni bzla bar bya//oM shrI badz+ra he ru ka huM hUM phaT//'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas nas nI//bcu cha yi//
267a5(rgyud): ni sbyin bsreg bya 'ji snye na 'jig rten 'das dngos gru ba//myur du 'grub te gzhan du min//tshang tshed ljon shing bshams par ni//rtag tu dkyil 'khor bris na su//
267a6(rgyud): nye bo'i snying po'i sngags rtag tu//rgyun mi 'chad par zla zhing sgrub//oM hrIHha hA huM hUM phaT/'bum phrag gsum du bzlas nas ni//bzla sa pa'i bcu cha'i smin
267a7(rgyud): bsreg bya//char dbab pa dang gter dang ni//ngag gi dngos grub 'grub par bya//ri sul dri med chur bcas par//dkyil 'khor dge ba bris nas ni//rgyun mi
267b1(rgyud): tu mum+WA sa sun smra/na du ts+tsha g+sa sma dun na /
267b2(rgyud): sa pan+d+ha 'bum stenas/ma yin sbyi smye /da nan ma can de /ni 'i'igram med na/
267b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor yang drug bros nas ni//lha ma'i sngags ni khyad par du//'brim phrag gsum ni bzlas nas//ji skad gsungs bzhin tshi ga ni//rdzogs pas bcu
267b4(rgyud): sbyin ba skyeg b+ha//oM bAdz+ra hU~M hU~M ben swA//'jig rten dngos grung thams cad dang /na mkha' snyid dngos grub bo//dur khrod du ni sngar bshad pa'i
267b5(rgyud): rnams pasu dkri/ lakho g+h+ri/yi ge dun gas sa sa //hrIm phrag gsuM ma du bas la sprug/hrIm+b+ha'i skyes na snams//rnam pa
267b6(rgyud): m+bu b+hU b+h+ya// nga ni bla pa'i //da pe dzin sa seM sa smrang sa / sa kyis m+bu y+YA du ts+tsha /
267b7(rgyud): bzhi mdo dkyil 'khor bris nis na//mnan pa'i tshi gr-i bsgrub par gyi//mkha 'gro mi yaM gsang sngags ni//shrI bai rnaMs pas ni 'grub par 'gyur//mi n+di kin+ti mo hU~M hrI/
268a1(rgyud): phaT/bcu tshwa'i sbyin sreg bsgrubs na no//'byung po ro langs 'grub byar 'gyur/gtsug lag khyud ngam mdun khang du//dkyil 'khor
268a2(rgyud): mchog ni bri bar bya//sgyu ma'i sngags ni nges por yang //'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas nas ni//lha mo bcu char sbyin pasreg bya//oM lA ma hu~M hU~M phaT swAd+d+he//mig sman dang
268a3(rgyud): ni rgyud mgyogs dang //de bzhin dbang du byed pa ni//'grub pad+mo 'dir ni the tshom med//dben zhing nyams dgu'i glan su ni//rtag tu dkyil la bru~M byas pa//N+Da
268a4(rgyud): ro hi sngogs sngags kyis//cho ga sngon bzhi ni bsgrub par bya//oM khaN+Da ro haM huM hUM phaT swA hA//'bum phrag gnyis ni bzlas nas kyang //bcu cha yi ni sbyin bsreg bya//
268a5(rgyud): rgyun mi 'chad par sngags bzlas te//gnod sbyin gnod sbyin mo rnams skyug/gzugs tsun mr-i yo gsang sngags ni//nges par 'bum phrag bzhi bzlas
268a6(rgyud): nas//lha mo bcu che'i sbyin bsreg bya//'grib par 'gyur byar the tshom med//oM rU prid+d+hi yai huM hUM phaT swAn+d+he//me tog dang ni spos dang dri//lha bshos gtor ma
268a7(rgyud): de bzhin to//bzo' dang btung bas khyad par du//dkyil 'khor mchog ni mchod bya zhing //glu dang ge raM gyi khyad par gyis//phyag rgya sngags ni bsgrags par bya
268b1(rgyud): yid 'od dam tshig rnyed nas ni//phyogasu bzhag nas bsgrub bya ste//lasa? ni gang gis khyad par gyis//de yi rigs sogs brtag par bya//lha yi rnam par la gnas te//cho ga
268b2(rgyud): dzaMji dezhin bzlas shing mchod//dus gang tshwa na mi smra zhing //der ni sngon du bsnyen pa bya//myos byed gtor mar mnyam ldan pas//sngags kyi nus pa bsgrub bya ste//brgya
268b3(rgyud): dang spyod dang 'bum gyi byur//dA n+ti grA sa TI masbyin pa du bya//grang /med b+hU d+hum+bu ni de d+g+has pa yos//blun me pa'i dge ba 'byung //de dag ngas ra byu sa
268b4(rgyud): dngos grub thob par 'gyur//'di ni sngags kyi bzlas pa'i nges pa bstan pa'i rim par ba ste bcu gcig pa'i///yang dag cho ga glang gis 'dir//grIbi pUr
268b5(rgyud): rlom med pa yi//bzlas pa'i phreng ba'i mtshan nyid ni//gnod sbyin bdag po legs pa ro nyon//gsur dang dngul dang zangs ma dang //de bzhin shil dang dung la sogs//
268b6(rgyud): zhi dang rgyas pa dag la sbyar//zhi la ril bu brgya pa ste//ri la bu brgya rtsa brgyad pa ni//rgyas pa'i las lnga rab bsngags te//mkhas pas rgu m+b+ha snying tshid dam dpal
268b7(rgyud): bde spro phun sum chog sau phyir bzlas//dbang dang dgug pa'i rab sbyor lo//gur gum la sogs dri'i ril bre//b+hu ru tsan dan dmar po'i 'bru//rtag tu rim
269a1(rgyud): bu lnga bcu'o//ru ra k+Sha dang lung tAng 'bras//de bzhin mi rus rnga mo dang //bong bu ma ha'i rus pa ni//drag spyod lkugs dang mnan pa dang //dbye byasa?
269a2(rgyud): dgu ni tshar bcad dang //gsed dang bskyed li sgyur+ya bya ste//las kyi khyad par ji lta bar//bzlas pa'i phreng ba'ang bya ba yin//khang bu rnga mo'i sku dang ni//khwa yi sgron
269a3(rgyud): bsre byas lA//mAnan dang bskrad pa'i las lo ni//dri yi srad buso brgyu bar bya//rta dang me he'i spu yis ni//rnam par sdang la srad bu bya//dur khrod sgra yi srid bru
269a4(rgyud): dang /khyi yi spu ni bsre bya ste//de yi srad bu drag po yi//lus la bsngags phyiro sbyar bar bya//dge ba'i lus la gzhon nu mA se//bkal ba'i srad bus rgyu bar bya//zhi ba
269a5(rgyud): la ni mdzub le bzhag/rgyas pa rtag tu gung mo yis//ming med kyis ni dbang zhes gsungs//tha ma yis ni mngon spyod yin//mthe bong lha yis rang bzhin gyis/
269a6(rgyud): las kun las ni sbyar bar bya//ril bu dgra bcom mdo 'dzin ni//chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin te//bzlas pa'i phreng ba'i khyad par gyis//mnyam gzhag sgom zhing
269a7(rgyud): bzlas par bya//rdzogs ldan dusu gcig bzlas pa//gsum ldan du su gnyis 'gyur bzlas//gnyis ldan dus na sum 'gyur bshad//rtsod dus bzhi 'gyur du
269b1(rgyud): ni blazla//sngags kyi rlangs ni bzhi po yis//rgyun mi 'chad par glas sngags bzlaste//bzlas pa'i phreng ba sogs smras pa//'di ni ngag gis bzlas pa ste//lha yi gzugs
269b2(rgyud): dmigs pa yis//sgo dang bsdu ba'i bdag nyid ce na//sngags kyi de nyid brda' yis ni//'gro dang 'ong ba yang dag bsam//mtha' gsum las ni rnam grol ba//drin dam
269b3(rgyud): de bzhin nyid kyi don//'di rnams sngags kyi bzlas pa yi//cho ga'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa yin//'di ni sngags kyi bzlas pa'i 'grang phreng nges par bstan pa'i rim
269b4(rgyud): par phye ba ste bcu gnyis pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//b+hU yi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba ste//gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa can//dngos grub yon tan
269b5(rgyud): kun gyi gnas//'dod pa'i yon tan kun khyab pa'i//sku phyogs mkhas pas yang dag brtag/khrag 'thung phyag gnyis sbyor ldan pas//phung po lnga stsogs du rgyu
269b6(rgyud): b+h+yo/zhal bzhi pa yi sngags badz+rod b+h+yAM sau//phyogs ni bcing zhing rab ste//A~Mm+me b+hA n+ni su~M hU~M hU~M phaT/shaur du'o//oM gr-in+d+he gr-ih+na hU~M hUM phaT/byung //oM g+hod+b+ha pa
269b7(rgyud): yaM gr-ih+NA pa ya huM hUM phaT/nub tu'o//oM A na mau ho bi d+yA rA dz+nyA huM hUM phaT/lho ru ni/phyog su sa~M gi la~M brdebs pa yis//gdug po bdud ni bsgred por bya//snying ka'i chu
270a1(rgyud): rgyus cu yib pas//'od zer phreng bsgo bar bya//de yi snang byas mdun du ni//tha ma sangs rgyas sogs bltas la//phyag btsal me tog bdug sogs pas//
270a2(rgyud): mchod de rjes la sdig pa be shags//dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro zhing //byang chub sems ni rnam par bskyed//gzhan la phan pa'i sems ni byams bya ste//
270a3(rgyud): gzhan gyi sdug bsngal 'joms byed snying rje yin//gzhan gyi bde bsnga tshim pa dga' ba ste//sems can kun snyoms btang snyoms rnam par bsam//oM swa b+hA
270a4(rgyud): ba shud d+ha/sar+b+ba d+har+m+maHswa b+hA bra shud+d+ho haM zhes bya bas//sems tsam nyid la rnam ga nAs shing //byang chub tshogs ni sgom par bya//au shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA bra At+ma kaM/
270a5(rgyud): haMHrten dadrang rten pa'i gzugasu ni//b+hi raM b+hai le sogs pa bsam//yaM las byung ba'i rlung dkyil 'khor//gzhu 'dra kha dog sngon po ste//de yi steng du raM las ni//me yid kyil
270a6(rgyud): 'khor gyi ni gzugs//kha dog dmar po zur gsum pa//rdo rje rtse gsum gyis mtshan pa'o//de yi steng du baM byung ba'i//chu yi dkyil 'khor zlum po dkar//de yi
270a7(rgyud): steng du'ang laM byung ba'i//sa yi dkyil 'khor zur bzhi pa//kha dog ser po grwa bzhir ni//de bzhin rdo rje rtse gsum mtshan//de yi steng du sum byung ba'i//zur
270b1(rgyud): babazhi pA ni rI rangab ste//rin chen bzhi yi bdug nyid mdzes//rtse mo brgyad kyisku rgyan pa'o//de yi steng du hU~M byung ba'i//sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par sgom//de yi steng du
270b2(rgyud): pad+ma nI//lte ba go slar ldan par sgom//dri dbus A li ka li yi//dag pa'i sbyor ba bsgom par bya//de yi dbu su yi ge hUM//rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin las//
270b3(rgyud): nyi m+bu'i dkyil 'khor dbus bzhugs pa'i//dpal he ru ka rnam par sgom//dba' bo zhal gsum phyag drug pa//g.yas brgyad pa yis gdan la bzhugs//
270b4(rgyud): ba'i zhal ni nag po ste//g.yas pa kun da lta bu ste//g.yon pa dmar po cher 'jigs pa'o//ral po'i cod pan gyis rgyan pa'i//'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag
270b5(rgyud): mnan cing bde ba chen por bzhugs//rdo rje rnam snang mdzad mas 'khyud//thugs rje'i chags pas shas cher dgyes//phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu ni//mnyam par ldan pas
270b6(rgyud): yang dag 'khyud//gnyis pa'i phyug ni mchog gnyis kyis//glang chen lpags pa go su 'jig/g.yas kyi gsum pas cang te'u ni//chos kun ngo bo nyid skye sgrogs//
270b7(rgyud): gdon gyi phyag ni gsum pa yis//kha T+wAM ga rten thod pa bsdams//thod pa'i phreng bas thod du mdzad//zla ba phyed pas rnam par rgyan//dbul sna tshogs rdo rjes
271a1(rgyud): mtshan//rigs kyi bdag pos rjod pa na mdzod//zhal ni rnam 'gyur tshor 'jigs pa//sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'o//stag gi lpag snga
271a2(rgyud): pa'i na bza' can//mi mgo nyi shu byed kyis rgyan//lha ni phyag rgya lnga 'chang zhing //gar gyi nyams ni dgu dang ldan//de la 'khyud pa'i bcom ldan ma//zhal cig
271a3(rgyud): phyag gnyis spyan gsum ma//gcer bu ban du ka yi mdog/dum bus rgyan pa'i sku rags can//skra grol ba dang rnam par gtsigs/khrag la dgyes shing 'dzag
271a4(rgyud): pa'o//phyag gro yon 'khyud pas bdug pa yi//bdud sogs khrag can thed pa 'dzin//g.yas pa sdig mdzub rdo rje can//bskal pa'i me 'dra'i sku chen ma//
271a5(rgyud): byin pa gnyis ni mnyam 'khyud cing //rtag tu bde ba cher dgyes pa'o//mkha' gro de bzhin lA ma dang //khaN+Da ro ha gzugs can ma//dngos grub kun gyi bde
271a6(rgyud): 'byung ba//pad+ma'i phyogs kyi gnasu dgod//nag dang lhung dang dmar ba dang //ser skya'i mdog can spyan gsum mA//zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis ma ste//kha T+wAM thod
271a7(rgyud): pa'i phyag ldan ma//g.yas pas rdo rje gri gug ste//gcer bu g.yas brkyang ba yi zhibs//skra grol mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal//phyag rgya lngas ni rnam par
271b1(rgyud): rgyun//mtshams kyi mdab ma bzhi lnga ni//byang chub sems las stsogs pa'i snod//bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa dang //glu dang gar gyi dga' badres mchod//sgo bzhir lha tshogs
271b2(rgyud): gnas pa ste//rtag tu lha rnams bsgom par bya//shar gyi sgor ni khwa gdong ma//phyag gnyis sngon mor bsgom par bya//byang gi sgor ni 'ug gdong ma//ljang ku sgra ni
271b3(rgyud): grol ba'o//de bzhin khyi gdong ma ni dmar//nub kyi sgor nu yang dag gnas//phag gdong me ni ser mo ste//lho sgor yi dgas gdan la gnas//mAM dang dri bzhin
271b4(rgyud): bden bral dang //rlung lha dbang ldan mtsham su ni//gshin rje brten ma pho nya mo//gshin rje mche ba 'joms ma ste//de bzhin zur gnas lha mo ni//yid
271b5(rgyud): 'phrog gzugs ni gnyis ma ste//yi dgas la gnas drag mo che//phyag rgya lngas ni rnam rgyan pa'o//g.yon na thod pa khA T+wAM ga/g.yas na rdo rje gri gug ste//
271b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma ni de rnams kun//dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba'o//de nas go tshwa gnyis shes nas//ye shes 'khor lo rnam par sgom//sngags dang phyag
271b7(rgyud): rgya'i sbyor ba yis//dam tshig 'khor lir mnyam par gzhug/de nas tshig gnyis gshad par bya ste//oM ta snying khar ro//na moHhi mgo bo la'o//s+thAn+na n+tu/
272a1(rgyud): smyi ga naka d+hA/baSh+TAn+datI phrag pa gnyis la'o//dz+nyAd+hUd+hi mig gnyis la'o//phaT tA yan+d+ha lag thams cad la s+ho//mAtshan na'o//dang rdo rnga rje
272a2(rgyud): sems dpa' ste//gnyis pa rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs//g+hasum pa pad+mo gar dbang ste//dpalA he ru kA bzhi par grags//lnga pa rdo rje nyi ma yin//drug pa
272a3(rgyud): bzhin rta mchog ste//go cha drug po rnams kyis gsungs//oM baM ni rdo rje rnam snang mdzad pa'o//oM ha~M yi ni gshin rje ma'o//oM d+hI mo ni rmongs byed ma'o//oM hUM hUM
272a4(rgyud): ni bskyod byed ma'o//oM hUM hU~M ni skrag byed ma'o//phaT phaT ni gtum mo lus thams cad la mtshon cha ste//lte ba dang /snying ka dang de bzhin du kha dang mgo bo nga /
272a5(rgyud): spyi gotsug la de bzhin du ni mtshon cha yino//oM yo ge shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA yog shud+d+ho haM/lag pA g.yas pa dang g.yon pa snying kar bzhag ste//pad+ma'i rgyas pa'i
272a6(rgyud): gaur bya'o//snying po'i phyag rgya la sogs lha//bskor ba mkha'i gro drwa ba'i sdom//rnal 'byor 'di ni gtso bo mchog/lha yi rnal 'byor rnam par sgom//chos dang
272a7(rgyud): longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa//bde chen 'khor lo sbyar bar bya//nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i rtse rnams ni//lus kun dag par byed pa ste//gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis//
272b1(rgyud): skyes ni spyad cing 'dzin pa yin//lus 'di dpa' boSh+Ti rang bzhin to//'di do sangs rgyas kun mtshungs pa'o//gnyis med rnam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis//bsam gyis mi khyA
272b2(rgyud): glo 'byung bstan//rjes 'thun rnal 'byor sems kyis ni//go 'phang ma rgyag ni bsgrim pa ste//'di ni A haM ru kA'i bskyed pa rim par b+hu bu s+t+waM btsug du ma 'o//
272b3(rgyud): denas rdo rje rnal 'byon ma//mched pa yang dag rab tu shad bya//gnas sgrog sa bkrid dbyar mo nus ni//b+h+yo rnal 'byor ma mchod bya//rang gi khyim du rnam gyur ma/
272b4(rgyud): mchod de sngon du bsnyen sogs bya//sngon du bsnyen pa med po las//de yis rlon myed yong su ngal//mdong yi ni tshes bcu 'am//yair+ya do yang ni de bzhin te//rgyus
272b5(rgyud): dang gtsung skye steg+sas ldan pas//dad pa'i sems kyis spyan drangs te//rang gi khyim du shar bltas par//yang dag gnas pas sgyu mo mchod//gurA gum+b+ha ma~Mg+ni mAr
272b6(rgyud): de bzhin du//li khri yiswA ni mgo le byug/lag pa rkang pa gdong de bzhin//zlog pas byug cing mchod par bya//mag la me tog phreng ba dbyungs//dri zhim pa'i
272b7(rgyud): bdug pas bdug/gcig dang gsum dang bzhi dang rdza//khyad par du ni dun dang dag//ji srid nyi shu ba ni yi ba//son bdag nges par dadu pa yis//bza' dang myos
273a1(rgyud): byu nga 'ang //nywadang shA la sogs ldan pas/D+ha pyug+sa ban+d+ha d+h+yan sa danangs nas mchod//dpa' bos parna yas bstan pa d+d+ha//dzA
273a2(rgyud): rnam snang mdzad pa'i tshogs//lha yi bdag nyid rtag tu mchod//gtor mi'o bye ba sngon 'gro bas//mAr me lnga dang bza' ba dbul//glu dang bstod par rang ldan
273a3(rgyud): pas//rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams mchod//'dir ni brtson pas rdo rje lha mo rnams//myos byed sha yis rab tu mchod byas te//dpal ldan rdo rje theg par mos
273a4(rgyud): gyur de'i//dad pas ston mos de rnams mchod byas na//thugs ni mnyes pas mchog ni stsol 'gyur te//gang phyir mchog ni de yi lag ni gnas//rnal 'byor ma
273a5(rgyud): ni mchod nas//zhi rgyas mtshan ma brtag bya ste//gzhon ma mchod skad cig la//dge dang mi dge'i las 'bras bu rtag/gang zhig lag gnyis nyed pa na//yid
273a6(rgyud): ni mnyes par ma gyur nas//des na nad rnams 'phel ba dang //sdug bsngal thob pa nyid du 'gyur//mchod byas de yi skad cig pa//gad mo'i sgra ni phyung gyur na//
273a7(rgyud): nad med pa ni mi 'grub cing//'chi ba nyid du the tshom med//mchid pa'i mod la 'du byed cing //mig gnyis nyed par byed na ni//skad cig la ni 'tsho zhes
273b1(rgyud): brjed//bsgrub pos rtag tu mchod byas bus//so so so sor zung rer ni//phan tshun gdong ni phyogs gyur na//thams cad du ni brtsod 'gyur bar//gzhonu mas ni rtag tu ston/rnal
273b2(rgyud): 'byor mi ni rgyab phyogs blta//so yis sen mo 'cha' byang na//sha yi bza' bas mtshim ste//slar yang las ni dgos par 'gyur//bza' dang btung ba thams cad kyi//
273b3(rgyud): ston mos mnyes par ma gyur na//mchod la sogs pa blo bur ba'i//nang ni 'phrul du skye bar 'gyur//'di ltar glu dang rol ma byed//yang dang yang du rgod pa na/rgyal
273b4(rgyud): po chom kun 'jigs pa dag/gzhon nu de ston mkhas pas brtag/myos byed 'thungs nas yang dang yang //rnam pa du ma so gar byed na//de rnams la ni nad tshon
273b5(rgyud): 'byung //mchod pa'i dusu brtag par bya//ston mo'i bza' ba thams cad ni//dor nas phyogs blta byed na//sprod pa nyams par byas pa'o skyon//lha rnams bdag la
273b6(rgyud): 'khrugs pa'o//phan tshun gtam lo 'jug pa dang //gal te phan tshun rgod byed na//gtso bo'i tshi ga nyams par ni//gzhon nu de bstan shes par bya//zos ma
273b7(rgyud): thag tu skyug byed na//skye ba'i nang ni 'byung bar ston//mdzes ma gal te 'gro ba'i tshe//rgyab kyi phyogasu blta byed na//slar yang las ni dgos pa dang /
274a1(rgyud): yun ring zhig nas nad 'byung ston//sa la rkang pas nyed pa na//gnas ni 'aza ba'i don du 'gyur//mchod dus byabs par gyur na ni//phan
274a2(rgyud): tshun g.yul ni 'gyed par ston//rnam 'gyur 'di dag phral bas ni//mchod pa 'grub par mchod par bya//de bas brtson pas mchod nas ni//sgrub pos rtug
274a3(rgyud): tu brtag par bya//rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams mchod//'dod pa'i 'bras bu kun rab ste//'di ni rdo rje rnal 'byor ma mchod pa'i cho ga nges par bstan pa'i rim
274a4(rgyud): pa phye ba ste bcu bzhi pa'o///de nas de phyir snod kyi ni//mtshan nyid mchog ni yang dgra ba shad//'jim pa 'am de bzhin dus sbal snod//bAr ba
274a5(rgyud): 'amo zangs sam lhags las byas//gser rim+bi dngul lus byas pa'am//dung ngam de bzhin nyi phyis te//bal po selu yi 'bras bu mchog/de bzhin
274a6(rgyud): gzhan yang gsar byung ba//r-I las byung dang shing snod sogs//gzhan yang rdo snod khyad par ro//dum bu gcig dang dum bu gnyis//de bzhin gsum dang
274a7(rgyud): bzhi dang lnga//dum bu drug dang drim bu bdun//dum bu brgyad par rab tu grags//bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs sem//dmangs rigs bud med rig
274b1(rgyud): mthar skyes//dkar dang dmar dang ldang sgyu dang //ser dang de bzhin ser skya ste//thal ba'i mdog dang mdog ngan dang //sna tshogs mdog tu rab tu grags//lhag pa dman dang
274b2(rgyud): tha ma ste//de bzhin dbyibs ni sna tshigos dbye//gshong gnyis glang po'i rgyob lta bu//de bzhin rdo rje 'am khwa yi rkang //so ni ljang dang sor ba 'am//lto ba'am srin bus
274b3(rgyud): zos te bzhin//'di kun rnam par bltas nas ni//de la yongasu brtag par bya//sa gzhi mnyam pa'i yul rnams sam//thang ngam bye ma'i gshongs dag tu//sngags
274b4(rgyud): pas dar ni sgrub byas la//de yi ltung ba brtag par bya//lhor bltas bram ze 'jigs par 'gyur//bden bral lhung bas ba long dang //rigs med pa dang rigs
274b5(rgyud): ngan 'jig/rlung bltas sdug pa ni 'jigs pa ste//byung du bltas na phyug por 'gyur//dbang ldan sngags kyi dngos grub ste//brtul zhugs rgyun ni nyam par byed//
274b6(rgyud): mer bsdus nye bar 'phrog pa ste//de bzhin 'og bltas chom rkun ma'o//steng gnas gnas pase bud med 'joms//log su lhung bas gtum me ste//snod
274b7(rgyud): mtshan nyid rnam shes bya//dum bu gcig po gnas la dbang //dum bu gnyis pa dkyil 'khor dang //dum bu gsum sgrub po'i dngos grub 'gyur//dum du
275a1(rgyud): bzhi pas sngags dngos grub//lnga pa yos ni zhi dang rgyas//dum drug slong mo rnyed par shes//dum bu bdun pas dbang du byed//dngos grub
275a2(rgyud): sgrub pa 'brus med phyir//de bzhin dum bu brgyad pa sbeng //bu ga gcig pa bram zer 'gyur//bre ga gnyis pa rgyal rigs 'gyur//bu go gsum pa rje'u
275a3(rgyud): ribris shes//bu go bzhi pa dmangs ri/rnams//bu ga mang po 'am bu ga med//mkhas pa yis ni spyang bar bya//bud med thod pa'ang mi bzung ste//khyad par
275a4(rgyud): du ni mdog nyams dang //so med pa'am so nyams pa//dge ba 'dod pas bcang mi bya//so ldang bas ni sdug bsngal mang //khwa yi rkang 'dras rtsod par 'gyur//
275a5(rgyud): gshong bu gnyis pas rgud par 'gyur//de bzhin glang po'i rgyab kyi nang //dbus kyi gnasu gshong bu bzhi//'dod 'jo'i bar ni blta bar bya//mdun phyogasu
275a6(rgyud): ni gshong bu gnyis//yid bzhin nor bu zhes byar bshad//dung dang kun da zla ba yi//mdog mtshungs snum pa shes par blta//sngags rnams kun gyi dngos
275a7(rgyud): grub ster//sgrub pos dngos grub thob par byed//che zhing mdog ni ser po 'am//pad+ma lta bu pad+mas mitshan//rgyas la sngags par gsungs pa ste//nor ni
275b1(rgyud): phun sum tshogs pa 'grub//snod ni gang zhig kha dog dmar//gzhan yang thig le dmar por mtshan//rtag tu dbang dang dgug po yi//dngos grub ster snod mtshan nyid do//ba lang
275b2(rgyud): kha lta bu yi dbyibs//shin tu sra zhing mu tig bcas//bsad dang bskrad dang dbye ba la//khyad par du ne rab tu bsngags//snod ni rab bsngags yang dag thob//'dod pa'i
275b3(rgyud): 'bras bu kun rab ster//gnas dang zhing du bgrod nas ni//sgrub pos lha mo bsgrub par bya//mtshan nyid 'di dag yongs rdzogs pa//bcangs nas dngos grub 'grub
275b4(rgyud): par 'gyur//'di ni snod kyi mtshan nges bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste bco lnga pa'o////de nas de phyir bdud rtsi lnga'i/sgrub pa yang dag rab tu bshad//yang
275b5(rgyud): drag cho ga gang gis ni//dngos grub kun gyi 'bras 'byung ba'o//cho ga sbas pas bram ze yi//mngal nas skyes las yang dag blang //des na rnam snang mdzad pa'i
275b6(rgyud): ming //grags te dngos grub yang dag bzhed//kha dog ldang zhing rab bzang lus//mig gi 'bras bu gnog pa yi//rin chen rigs ma rnyed nas de'i//dri chus/
275b7(rgyud): bsangs te bsgrub par bya//yongasu rdzogs pa'i lus ldan zhing //yan lag mdzes gzhon pad+ma'i rigs//bza' dang btung bas yang dag mched//mkhas pas/
276a1(rgyud): mdzad yin nas na du yimyed la snyamam+b+ha 'jug g+hu/na dz+nyAnaD+han+yA Tuka rlung //sbyin pa ma na gas myod rgyan// na ga
276a2(rgyud): pade bzhin grags//snar ba sha pa yis//dades rgyub yongasu rdzogapa bad de//chos mang+ge zhes ni ra grugs de'i/ me tog 'a
276a3(rgyud): bsdug ste//dumache bye can ma'i gdol pa ma//gas tu rgyud ni rtag bsten te//sha dang tshi lnga dang de bzhin khrag/mkhas pa yis ni bzung bar bya//sgrub pa nga
276a4(rgyud): zla ba 'dod pa yis//lcags kyu wa ni ji snad pa 'am//'dir nI bsad pa gtsor bshad pas//ji ste yang drug rnyed na gzung //ba lang sha dang rte shA dang //glang po'i
276a5(rgyud): shi yang de bzhin te/mi yi sha drang khyi yi she/mkhas pa yis ni bzung bar bya//rdo rje sems dpas gling gsungs pa'i//skyon mAny+dza zhes grags pa'o//rnyed nas/
276a6(rgyud): chos bcu'i dus no//dngos po byede dag yang dag bsdu//dri zhim pa dang bsres nas ni//rab tu gus s+yAM sbyar bIr bya//sku pa po yis gsang ba yis//rol du
276a7(rgyud): rnam pa yang dag rgyu//de yi modo la yongs rdzogs pa'o//bza' dang btud pa'i khyad par gyiso//tshogs kyi de su byin brlabs nas//phyis nas las ni
276b1(rgyud): yang dag brnam//sngags bzlas de bzhin bsam gtan dang //'dod pa kun gyi 'bras 'byung zhing //lus kyi bcud kyis lon dang ni//mtshon tu grol ba'i dngos grub
276b2(rgyud): steng //rtag tu rol bu bsten byed pa//'dod pa kun gyi 'bras rab ster//las rnams kun la rab sbyar na//mkha' spyod go 'phang thob par 'gyur//'di ni bdud rtsi lnga sgrub pa des
276b3(rgyud): par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu drug pa'o////de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba yi//cho ga mchog ni yang dag bshad//'di ltar 'ga' zhig gsol 'debs pa'am//rang
276b4(rgyud): nyid bsod nams 'dod pa yis//dang bir rang lha'i bdag nyid gyi//'khor lo la gnas sngon bsnyen bya//sngon du bsnyen pa'i dbang byas nas//der ni gtor ma sbyin par bya//
276b5(rgyud): brtan zhing zab mo'i chos shes pa//rab gnas gtor ma'i pha rol son//sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor de nyid shes//rig pa'i gnas ni thams cad rig/gsang sngags
276b6(rgyud): tshul la dad cing mos//gzugs bzang blta na sdug pa dang //bla ma la guso brtser ldan na//sdom pa 'byung bar rab bshad bya//gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten
276b7(rgyud): gnas//gnas khang mdung khang sa phyogs gtsang //gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod du//der ni dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya//sngon du las ni byas pa'i sar//brko ba la
277a1(rgyud): sogs mi bya ste//lag pas reg nas hUM yi gi/sngags bzlas pas nis ts+tsha bya//dkyil 'khor gyis yi cha//nyis 'gyur sa ni sbyang bar bya//rang gi sem
277a2(rgyud): ni yongs dag pa//de nyid kyis ni sa dag 'gyur//slob dpon sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin//lha yi sku yi bdag nyid can//dpa' bo rdo rje dril 'tshong ga/mkha'agror
277a3(rgyud): bcas la gsol ba gra pa//blo ldan rdo rje gsor byed cing //dril bu 'khrol bar brtson pa yis//lha dang lha min bu sang ba dang //rab tu gdug pa'i bgegs
277a4(rgyud): tshogs bslad//nga ni dpal ldan snying rje'i stobaso//srung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyor bas//lus srul la sogs gang ci'ang rung //bgegs kyi tshogs rnams gzhan du
277a5(rgyud): dengs//ji ste ngas bsgo su zhig 'da'//rdo rje'i bdag po'i sa yis ni//lus gsum las byung dgas bya ste//'dir ni brlag 'gyur gzhan du min//sa ni yongasu
277a6(rgyud): bzung byas nas//ra bas mtshams ni bcing bar byas//lag g.yas dam bcas phyag rgya yis//yi ge bai byung sa'i lha mo//mdog ser gser gyi bu ma 'dzin la//
277a7(rgyud): bstod nas rab tu bskul bar bya//che ge zhes bya bdag dkyil 'khor//'dri la lha mo khyed dbang gyur//me tog bdug pa sogs pas mchod//mkhas pas
277b1(rgyud): mchod don/'bul byes la//bcom ldan khro mchog rdo rje can//de bzhin gshegs la gsol ba gdab//rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams dgongasu gsol//slob rnams la ba
277b2(rgyud): ba dang //khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir//mgon po lhan cig skyes 'byung ba'i//dkyil 'khor 'dri bar 'tshal legs la//de bas bcom ldan grus bdag la//bka' drin
277b3(rgyud): dganang bar mdzad du gsol//gang gzhan gsang sngags lha rnams dang //'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang //rdzogs pa'i byang chub la brten pa'i//'byung po bstan la mngon
277b4(rgyud): dga' ba//gang su rdo rje'i spyan ldan kun//dkyil 'khor bde mchog 'byung ba yi//dkyil 'khor 'dri bar bgyid lags pas//bdag dang de bzhin slob ma la//rjes
277b5(rgyud): brtse ba bskyed du gsol//snod bu ye shes lnga ldan zhing //nyi shu rtsa lhur rnam dbye bas//chos kun dro bo nyid kyis ni//srad bu phan tshun bsgril bAr bya//sgrub pos yi ge
277b6(rgyud): hUM brjod do//bdud rtsi lngas ni byug par bya//dkyu su 'khor lo'i nyis 'gyur lo//sbom su skr-i yi nyi shu tshe//\u0f7fgsum brjod nas lte bar ni//g.yon pa'i khu tshur
277b7(rgyud): gyis bzung nas//blo ldan na mkhar thig gdab ste//de bzhin sa la'ang gdab par bya//gsar zhing mdzes par ldan pa dang //tshad ldan gtsang ma'i srad bu yis/
278a1(rgyud): dA lnga ldan lhan skyes 'byung dkyil 'khor//shes rab can gyis thig gang ba bya//khru byed la sogs nas brtsams nas//ji srid khru ni brgyu
278a2(rgyud): yi bar//dang por tshangs pa'i thig yin te//gnyis pa la ni zur thig gang ba//nub dang lho yi gan su ni//slob dpon nges par yang dag gnas//shar dang byang gi phyogs
278a3(rgyud): gan su/slob ma gnas te mnyam gzhag pas//dang por bzhi 'gyur bdag nyid du//re'u mig gcig ni thig gdab bya//de nas brgyad 'gyur bdag nyid du//ri'u
278a4(rgyud): mig gcig gi thig rab gdag/gzhan yang brgyad 'gyur nyid du ni//re'u mig gcig ni thig gdab bya//de nas gzhan lnga nyid 'gyur nyid/re'u mig gcig ni
278a5(rgyud): thig rab gdab//de nas bzhi 'gyur nyid du ni//re'u mig gcig ni thig gdab bya//gzhan yang nyis 'gyur nyid du ni//re'u mig gcig ni thig rab gdab
278a6(rgyud): dri nas mkhas pas bzhi 'gyur nyid//re'u mig gcig ni thig gdab bya//de nas gnyis 'gyur bdag nyid do//ra'u migu gnyis ni thig grang ba bya//de nas phyed
278a7(rgyud): ne rim gnyis bri//'di ni dkyil 'khor theg yino//thig skud mtshan ma drug cu bzhi//dkyil 'khor thig gi mtshan nyid//'khor lo'i phyi rol mthar thug par//
278b1(rgyud): cho ga gsungs bzhon thig gdab bya//rin chen lnga yi phye ma 'am//yang na 'bras la sogs pa ste//dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar//ljang kun nag po'ang de bzhin te//slob dpon dbang //
278b2(rgyud): ldan phyogs na//song ste mnyam por gzhag na su//logs sras g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis//ri mo lnga ni dgyes par bya//phan tshun bar du nas re tsam//shod pa'i ched du bri ba ste//
278b3(rgyud): ri mo skems na nad du 'gyur//phra bas nor ni nyams par 'gyur//yon pos 'di ni rtsod par 'gyur//chad pas 'chi bar 'byung bar 'gyur//shar phyogasasu ni dkar po che//
278b4(rgyud): sbyor ni ser po yang dag ldan//nub kyi chu ni dmar po ste//byang du mar gang yang dag ldan//dbus kyi sa yi cha nyid ni//in+d+ra nI la 'od 'bar ba'o//grwa yi cha ni thams cad dang
278b5(rgyud): sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams//rdo rje rin tshan gyis spros par//mnyam par gzhag te yang dag bri//rdo rje ra ba'i nang du ni//dur khrod brgyad kyis rgyan pa ste//gtum drug
278b6(rgyud): de bzhin chad chid dang //rdo rje 'bar ba keng rus can//dbang ldan du ni mi bzad bzhad//byin za ru ni bkra shis mchog/mun pa drage po bdun bral du//rlung phyogs ka
278b7(rgyud): ki po'i sgra//shar gyi shing sha a shrad shing //ked kai la khyed per tsu ta'i shing //baT de bzhin ka ran+de/yatA parka pad+mo ga/dbang po de bzhin sbyin byed do //klu yi
279a1(rgyud): dbang dung gshin rje'i bdag/dbang ldan dA nas byin zla dang //srin po'i dbang ldan rlung gi bdaka/b+hU s+yA k+Shi dang 'jog po nyid//karlo Ta dang pad+ma nyid/
279a2(rgyud): pad tshun tu lu hu lu dang //rigs ldan dang ni dung skyong ngo //sgrogs padang ni cher sgrogs dang //dge dang g.ya dang brtan de bzhin//gadra ba dang ni de bzhin 'bebs//gtum
279a3(rgyud): pa 'di dge spyon dbang phyug/gzhan yang sna tshogs du ma yi//khwa dang 'ug pa bye rgod dang //lce spyang lce spyang mo dang ni//'ol ba dang ni 'ol ba mo//srang ge'i gdong dang
279a4(rgyud): stug gi gdong //drug cing 'jigs pa'i gdong can mo//sbrul ne bA lang mgo can dang //gdod gnyis lo sogs phyog su rgyu//keng rus dang ni mdung gis phug/'byud dang
279a5(rgyud): byed cig pa dang mgo/thod pa byin pa mgo rngam dang //gtsigs pa'i mgo dang rus pa dang //rig 'dzin grub pa sna tshogs dang //dam tshig spyod pa'i rnal 'byor po//rnam
279a6(rgyud): 'byor ma yi tshogs rnams dang //gnod sbyin ro langs srin po sogs//ki li ki la'i sgra chen bdag/dngos grub rdzu 'phrul yang dag par//thob pa'i slob dpon gyi ni
279a7(rgyud): tshogs//dur khrod dbusu blta bar bya//'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu bdun pa'o////de nas slob
279b1(rgyud): na mtshan nyid na//yang dag rab tu bshad par phyu/zhwa shing dul ba'i cha lugs can//sems canu kun rab mi 'jig par//sngags dang rgyud kyi rab sbyor shas//bstan
279b2(rgyud): bcos rig cang snying rjer ldan//sems can kun lo bu bzhin paste//thams cad du ni snyan par smra//sbyin la sogs la rtag tu dga'//bsam gautAn rnal 'byor mngon par bcom
279b3(rgyud): kun la mi 'tshe daden par skye//snying rje dang ni phan sems ldan//mnyam sems dang ni phyag rgyar ldan//sems can rnams kyi mgon 'gyur zhing //sems can bsam
279b4(rgyud): 'i khyad par shes//mgon med pa ni rnams kyi gnyin//dbang po yongasu rdzogs pa'i lus//gzugs dang ldan zhing blta na sdug/dbang bskur don gyi de nyid shes/
279b5(rgyud): tshig gsal yon tan rgya mtsho ste//rtag par rgyun tu gnas brten pa//de ni slob dpon rig par bya//slob ma rigs bzang chos la spro//slob dpon gyis ni yang dag bsdu/
279b6(rgyud): snying rje med cing khra dang gdug/khengs dang brko mi chags rnam g.yeng can//drag dang rmongs dang snyoms las can//gzhan gyi srog la snying brtse med//gzhan gyi
279b7(rgyud): ni la sred pa ni/bla mas rtag tu spang bar bya//brtan zhing dul la blo gas ldan//bzod ldan drang zhing g.yo rgyu med//mi dge btsu ni yang su sbyangs//sems
280a1(rgyud): can rnams la byams par bsta//'bar ba'i ma dang dugu bzhin du//gzhan gyi na ral mi rig cing //rtag par rgyun tu bla ma mchod//dam chos blta bar smra za
280a2(rgyud): dang //rtag tu sbyin pa la sogs dgu'o//'jig rten pha rol mngon por 'dod//de dge slob mar rab bsngags te//dkyil 'khor dge ba brtan par bya//thal mo sbyar ba byas
280a3(rgyud): nas ni//gus pa'i yid kyis gsol gdab bya//rnal 'byor ma mchog khe sbyor ba'i//dpa' chen khyod dadag ston pa byas//byang chub chen ngo'i tshul bstan pa//mgon
280a4(rgyud): po chen po bdag 'che'o//dam tshig de nyid 'dag la sto'o//byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol//dpa' bo dada'i me'i dbang mo dang //de bzhin phag mo hA ra~M ka/gas
280a5(rgyud): pa'i gnas sogs yang dag dgang //lus la rnam gnas bshad du gsol//sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te//skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol/
280a6(rgyud): thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu//mgon po bdag ni 'jug par mdzod//du tshur shog theg pa chen po yi//khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te//gsang sngags sbyod
280a7(rgyud): chul cho ga ni//khyod la yang dag bshad par bya/rdo rje gsang sngags mthu yis ni//mnyam med ye shes yang dge thob/de bas kun mkhyen tho de bya'i phyir/
280b1(rgyud): bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig/bla ma mchod dang de bzhin byams//sangs rgyas la gus 'gro la brtsi//rtsa ba'i ltung ba yongs spangs shing //sbom po'i ltung ba rnam
280b2(rgyud): par spangs//sems can rnams ni bsten par bya//theg pa du man la 'dod mi bya//mi rgal ba rnams rgal bar gyis//ma grol ba rnams grol bar gyis//'khor ba'i
280b3(rgyud): sdug bsngal gyis dkrugs pa'i//snyoms can dbugs ni dbyung bar gyis//bslab pa de dag yang drag ldan//slob ma rnams ni lhag gnas bya//cho ga ji bzhin
280b4(rgyud): khrus dang ni//gsang byas so shing sbyin par bya//srad bu dmar pos khyad par du//dpung par bcings te rtag tu srung //yI ge d+hIHyi sngags bzlas pa'i//ku sha
