280b6(rgyud): dr-ir nI gdod g.yogs bcings na su//dkyil 'khor du ni rab tu gzhug//skye ba sngon bsagaso sdig pa rnams//dkyil 'khor mthong bas byung bar 'gyur//
280b7(rgyud): kye khyod su zhes dri bya zhing //bdag ni skal bzang zhes kyang smra//dam tshig chu dang mna' bsgrags dang //me tog dkyil 'khor dor ba ste//gang dang gang
281a1(rgyud): du me tog babs//de dang do yI rigasu 'gyur//chu dang cod pan rdo rje dang //dril bu dang ni ming dbang bskur//de bzhin gshegs lnga'i bdag nyid dbang //brtul//
281a2(rgyud): zhugs dang ni lung bstan nyid//rjes gnang dang ni dbugs dbyung dang //phyir mi ldog pa'ang sbyin bya ste//gdugs dang gdan dang rig pa sogs//rdo rje dri ba sogs yang dag
281a3(rgyud): ldan//slob dpon dbang bskur yang dag rdzogs//bum pa las ni byung ba'o//gnyis pa gsang ba mchog yin te//gsum pa shes rab ye shes yin//bzhi pa de/
281a4(rgyud): ltar yang de bzhin//dbang bskur 'di dag yang dag ldan//de ni dam tshig can shes bya//gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du//mchog tu rab zhugs mthong bas
281a5(rgyud): na//deng khyod sdig pa thams cad las//rnam grol bzang por gyur pas gnas//sangs rgyas kun gyis mnyam gsungs pa'i//rjes gnang mchog tu dbugs dbyung
281a6(rgyud): ba//dngos grub dam tshig sdom pa ni//'di dag rtag tu srung bar gyis//slob ma dad pa'i stobs kyis ni//bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas//gtso bos ji
281a7(rgyud): ltar bka' stsal pa//de ltar bgyi zhes smra bar bya//de nas de bzhin gshegs gsungs pa'i//sna tshogs rgyan dang na bza' sogs//khyad par du ni rang gi lus//
281b1(rgyud): bla ma la ni yon du dbul//dbang bskur gtso bo thob pas na//bya ba byas pa'i blo chen gyis//gzhan yang rab dgas 'di skad du//smra zhing mjug ni rdzogs par bya//deng du bdag
281b2(rgyud): tshe 'bras bu yod//bdag gi gson par 'bras bur bcas//de rang sangs rgyas rigasu skyes//sangs rgyas sras bor bdag gyur to//sbyin sreg gis ni rdzogs byas shing //
281b3(rgyud): dge 'dun la ni ston mo drang //de nas tshogs kyi 'khor lo bya//nud pa 'am mgon med rnams la'ang sbyin//phyi nas man ngag ji bzhin du//dam tshig spyod pa la brtson pas///
281b4(rgyud): spyod du byas pa'i rgyun gyis ni//'khor lo la sogs sgom pa'i rim//yang dag man ngag phun tshogs paso//dngos grub 'gyur gyi gzhan du min//'di ni dbang bskur
281b5(rgyud): ba'i rim par phye ba ste bco brgyad pa'o////de nas 'chi bar nges pa yi//mtshan nyid mchog tu bshad par bya//rang gi lus sam phyi rol gyi//ltas ni mkhas pas
281b6(rgyud): brtag par bya//rkang mthil dag tu phug snyam dang //gang tshe lta bar phug snyam 'gyur//de tshe nyin zhag gsum pha rol//lnga yi gong du 'gro bar 'gyur//bshang dang
281b7(rgyud): gci ba'i dus dag tu//dus mtshungs spyod pa byung gyur na//lo gcig ni dus de nyid kyi//dus chod la ni 'chi zhing brlag/mtshan nyid mnyam par sbyor ba yi//ba
282a1(rgyud): dang ma spyod pa no//dus mchus hru na du mAH//zla ban ni ngos par na//stong ka lkog ma'o dbus dag tu//dus ma chung smugal te zug zor gyum/
282a2(rgyud): daMsti chos la mi brtan na//zla ba phyed drung gnyis nu 'tsho//gal d+hI mig ga yon 'bras bu yi//gzugs brnyan ma long la ma mthong //tsa ste bzlog par mi byed na//
282a3(rgyud): dA nan ni nges pararnartswa dong ni smin ma'i dbus//spyi bo'i rtse mer zug pa ste//dran po mtshu sa pa zug gyur na//de tshe 'bral du 'tsho bar 'gyur/
282a4(rgyud): duni cher gyur cing //rnyed dang khri drung 'jigs bsdu 'khrugs//gal te chos ni mi bsnyen gang //de ni lo gcig drug na 'chi//yang ngo yi ni chos gcig la//gal
282a5(rgyud): zla ba nag por mthong //de ni zla ba drugan 'a chi//dmar pos nad kyis 'debs par g+h+nAn//mig las rtag tu 'dzeg pa dang //gzugs mthong bya yang rnam
282a6(rgyud): khrul dang //me lcong dam ni chur gang zhin/rang gi grib ma ma mthong dang //mtshan ma'i chen dbadra po'i gzu//nyin par skar mo'i dkyil 'khor mthong /
282a7(rgyud): sbyin med par ni sgo phyogs//brten pa'i klog 'bru mthong ba dang //ni ni par grib mo'i lam dang ni//de bzhin skur mda' sbyang ba mthong //rang byarag/
282b1(rgyud): bya na//gcig tu 'dres pa mthong ba dang //zla ba gnyis dang nyi ma gnyis//de bzhin rang gi mgo bo 'bar//shing rtse ri yi rtse la nI//dri za'i grong khyer mthong ba dang //yi dgas
282b2(rgyud): sha za 'jigs rung ba//gzhan dag kyang ni mthong ba dang //blo bur du ni rab 'dar dang //yang dang yang du brgyal ba dang //de yis gcig cig mthong gyur na'ang //zla ba
282b3(rgyud): gcig gis 'tsho bar 'gyur//zla ba ra ri med pa dang //nyi ma 'od dang bral ba dang //mtshan mo nyi ma nyin par ni//zla ba de bzhin rang mig 'bar//skar ma ri rab dag gi
282b4(rgyud): tshad//rgya mtsho chu bo lta bu dang //khu ba dang ni bshang gci rnams//dus mtshungs par ni 'bab 'gyur na//gal te chos la ma rten na//zla ba gcig la 'chi bar 'gyur//
282b5(rgyud): dar yang nyin mo grib ma ni//skya bo gzugs can blta bya ste//de yi ma go ma mthong na//lo gcig gi ni nang du 'chi//lag pa g.yon pa ma mthong na//bu dang chung ma
282b6(rgyud): nges brlag 'gyur//lag pa g.yas pa ma mthong na'ang //pa dang bu sogs tshegs chen 'chi//gcin ni rgyun lngar 'gyur ba dang //g.yon nas 'khor zhing dri nga
282b7(rgyud): dang //skyur ba la sogs gcin byung na//zla drug nang du 'chi bar 'gyur//gang zhig gi ni rmi lam mthar//bye ma 'am thal ba'i phung po 'am//lha khang ngam ni
283a1(rgyud): mchong sdong 'dzeg/de ni sngon bzhin 'chi bar 'gyur//gal te bong bu 'am spre'u zhon nas//brog mkhar phyag dar phung po la//mngon 'jog lha
283a2(rgyud): phyogs 'gro bar ni//gang gis rmi lam mthar mthong na//bud med gang zhig glos gnag cing //mdog gnag mi ni 'dod spyod pa//de ni dus mtshan yin zhes bya//
283a3(rgyud): pro shin rje'i lto bar 'gro bar 'gyur//bya rgod lce spyang khyi dang khwa//dred dang yi dgas shra za yis//za bar rmi lam mthong na ni//lo cog na ni nges par 'chi//gos
283a4(rgyud): nI dmar pos g.yog pa dang //phreng ba dmar pos rgyan pa dang //til mar gyis bskus rmi lam mthong //zla ba drug na gson me 'gyur//man ngag ji bzhin ldan pa
283a5(rgyud): yis//'chi ba bslu bar 'gyur ba ste//de nyid kyi ni 'chi las rgyal//chos kyis 'chi las rgyal ba ste//rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim sgrub pas//de bas chos ni
283a6(rgyud): mchog tu bsam//gzhan yang sgom pa'i khyad par ni//mdzes pas yang dag bshad par bya//dbugs ni skad cig 'chad pa dang //sna tshugs ltas ni yang
283a7(rgyud): dag mthong //'thor dang dgang ba'i sbyor ba yis//lus kyi dkyil 'khor sbyang bar bya//'tsho ba'i dus la yang dge bab//'phro ba'i rnal 'byor mchog bya ste//
283b1(rgyud): bu ga dgur ni son pa'i rtsa//pU rI kas ni dgar bar bya//ri tsa kas ni dbugs mnan bya//kum+b+ha kAs ni bsdam byas te//bu ba'i sgra ni sbyang bar bya//rab tu zhi bas zhu
283b2(rgyud): 'gyur//rnam shes dgrog pa'i sbyor ba dang //gzhan yang pha rol bgrod pa la//A li ka yi mnyam ldan par//mkhas pa yis ni sbyar bar bya//snying khar yi ge hUM sbyar//
283b3(rgyud): te//yi ge phyed dang gnyis pa ni//'og dang steng du bzhag par bya//de yi 'og gi char rlung gi/sa bon 'og tu bltas pa'o//rlung gi sa bon gnyis byas te//rnal 'byor ldan pas///
283b4(rgyud): kha sbyar bya//nyi shu rtsa gcig rim pa yis//yi ge phyed dang gnyis sngags brjod//rnam shes bzhon pa rlung yin te//gang dang gang du bgrod pa yis//rlung gi sgor ni bsam
283b5(rgyud): byas na//grol ba'i dngos grub ster byed pa'o//mchog dang tha ma'i dbye ba ni//bshad kyis gsang ba'i bdag pa nyon//lte bas 'dod khams bde 'gro ste//thig le las/
283b6(rgyud): ni gzugs can lus//steng nas gzugs med khams te//dUr ni bode bar 'gro byed pa'o//sna las gnod sbyin rnams 'gyur//rna ba las ne mi 'am ci//lha me gapa/
283b7(rgyud): te mig las ni//mi yi rgyal por 'gyur ba yin//kha yi sgo las yi dgas rnams//gtso las de bzhin dud 'gro'o//bshang lam nas ni dmyal bar 'gro//grol
284a1(rgyud): ba las ni gzhan du 'gro//dus la bad na 'pho ba yis//dus min lha rnams gsod par 'gyur//lha rnams bsad pa rtsam gyis ni//mi ni dmyal
284a2(rgyud): bar 'tshed par 'gyur//des na mkhas pas 'chi ba yi//mtshan ma yang dag shes par bya//'di ni 'chi ba'i ltas blta ba dang 'pho ba'i rnal 'byor rim par phye ba ste/
284a3(rgyud): bcu dgu pa'o////de nas de phyir dus bzhi yi//tshad ni yang dgra rab bshad bya//gang zhig rnam par shes tsam gyis//bskal pa myur du shes 'gyur ba'o//
284a4(rgyud): nyi khri dang ni brgyad stong dang //sa ya phrag gcig bdun 'bum ste//de dag la ni rdzogs ldan gyis//bskal pa zhes ni grags par bshad//rdzogs ldan
284a5(rgyud): gsum ldan gnyis mtsham su//de bzhin stong phrag brgyad yino//sa ya phrag gcig phraganyis dang //dgu khri dang ni drug stong ste//gsum ldan bskal pa
284a6(rgyud): zhes grags pa//der ni mkhas pas shes par bya//gsum ldan gnyis ldan par mtshams//stong phrag drug ni shes par bya//drug khri dang ni bzhi stong dang //
284a7(rgyud): 'bum phrag brgyad ni gnyis ldan te//bstan bcos kun las bsdus nas ni//gnyis ldan bskal par yang dag gragaso//gnyis ldan rtsod pa'i bar mtsham
284b1(rgyud): swA//de bzhin stong phrag bzhi yin te//sum khri dang ni nyis stong dang //bzhi 'bum rtsod dus shes par bya//rtsod dus rdzogs ldan gnyis mtshams//stong phrag dgra ni bzhi dang
284b2(rgyud): ljin+da//de rnams dus shes grags pa ste//'grub par 'dir ni the tshom med//gling bzhi pa yi dngos po ni//mgon po yis ni bshad du gsol//shar gyi lus 'phags
284b3(rgyud): sgra mi snyan//de bzhin nub kyi ba lang spyod//gling ni gsum po de dag rnams//'bras bu'i sa par yang dag gnas//'dzam+bu'i gling du legs skyes pa//dngos grub sa
284b4(rgyud): par shes par bya//gling gsum por ni skye ba yi//'bras bu 'byung ba'i bsod nams gnas//'dzam bu'i gling pas grol ba dang //dngos grub nyid ni sgrub pa ste//de dag
284b5(rgyud): sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis//gsungs po'i gling du shes par bya//'di ni dus bzhi po nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu pa'o////de nas spyod pa pha rol
284b6(rgyud): sin//mchog ni yang dag rab bshad bya//sgrub pa dngos grub rgyu nyid kyis//gang gis dngos grub mthar bgrod pa'o//thun mongs rnal 'byor rgyud rnams//gsang ba
284b7(rgyud): rnam par ma bshad pa//dngos grub rnams las mchog dngos grub//brtul zhugs rnams las mchog brtul zhugs//bla mo dam pa bsnyen bkur nas//
285a1(rgyud): tha med rgyud na mang thos te//de nga bzhin tham mos//sbrul las sa nas rtag tu ma//nar dang rlung ma de bzhin sgo//smyon pa nyid du btang
285a2(rgyud): b.rabya//mdud pa 'di gsum las grol na//rtag tu spyod pa spyad par 'gyur//spro ba chen pos rig pa bzlas//de bzhin bden par smra la dga'//dam bcas pa la
285a3(rgyud): rab gnas to//ji ltar dod pas sngon du datsam//'did dang khro ba 'dzegs pa dang //sred dang gti mug nga rgyal sbyang //slob mi brtag dang 'ashad de bzhin//cu
285a4(rgyud): rnams bsdu ba rtag tu spang //gnong dang mi gtsang dag phye dang //btung dang bdung min brtag mi bya//smang dang bstod la khro ba dang //mngon pa'i nga rgyal rnam par
285a5(rgyud): sdu rtog tu mi chags dga' med par//thams cad las ni mnyam par gnas//sbyin srog med cing mchod pa med//phreng ba med cing bzlas pa med/
285a6(rgyud): mu gza' dang sker ma dang //ches grangs kyang ni bar+d+hak+ki mi bya//bdag gzhan bdag nyid gzugs kyi ni//the tshom med par gnas par bya//'dod pa med par
285a7(rgyud): mi spyad de//kun la 'dod pa cung zad spyad//sdug gi lpabs pa gsu byas//phyag rgya lnga pa ni rnam par rgyan//shes rab thabs po dag rnal 'byor pas//
285b1(rgyud): dpas rnam par rlom//kun bzang zan spyad pa yis//yid ni dadu bar gan sa par b+ha//glang du mtshan ma gci gnas shing //grong khyor du ni lngar gnas bya//da
285b2(rgyud): dod rjesu 'thun sbyar yis//sa yi steng du gnas par bya//yang na rlung zhes bya ba yis//spyod pa 'di zhing dga' bar spyad//rtag tu grags bo med paragacig
285b3(rgyud): bu yod ni ma ga bo pas//sbyin pa'i brtul zhugs la bodz+nyAn nas//la mi rlung gis bskyod bzhin 'khyam//dur khrod dam ni mtshan gcig gam//shing gcig gam ni nags chal
285b4(rgyud): lam/der yi rtse 'am tshu ba'i 'gram//rgya mtsho chen po'i 'brum yang rung //bskyed mos tshol la mi rI phug gam//khang bzangs so ni khang stang dam//nga ni mdo dang
285b5(rgyud): nisku mdun nam//de bzhin rgyal po'i pho brang sgor//gdol pa'i gnas sam phyugs lhas sam//bzo yi khang par sbas pas gnas//tshong srong dor ba'i me tog phreng //
285b6(rgyud): me tog rnying pa gang ci 'ong rung //dur khrod mchen cig me tog phreng //de dag gis ni lus rab mchad//rang gi mgrin par me tog phreng //khyad par du ni tshangs skud dang //
285b7(rgyud): ska rigs dag kyang bcing bar bya//rkang pa gnyis la rkang gdub bya//smra ba bzlas pa'i bdag nyid grags//leg pa bskyod pa phyag rgya ste//rnam par mi rtog ra
286a1(rgyud): sbyor byas//rnal 'byor dan ci 'der gnas//dog pa thams cad rnam spang ste//sgrub pos seng ge bzhin du spyad//yang na g.yo med su
286a2(rgyud): zhugs la//brten nas rnal 'byor spyod pa spyad//bskyed mos tshal lam khyim stong gnas//grong dman ngan po'i khyim du ni//ji srid nus po thob de srid//mi smra'i sbyor
286a3(rgyud): bris gnas par bya//ji ltar ga nyid log 'gro dang 'dug/dad dam yod na mi smad pa 'am//ci rnyed pa tsam za ba dang //mi bkres pa ni bzang bar gnas//gal te
286a4(rgyud): slong snga mas gnas pas ni//lag pa'i snod du za zhing gnas//rnam par mi rtog rang bzhin gyis//'dir ni 'grub 'gyur the tshom med//gsum po de drag na
286a5(rgyud): nAs ni//gang 'dod brtul zhubyas la brten nas//cung zad nus pa rab thob pas//ji ltar 'dod pa'i spyod pa spyad//lus ni sbyin par byin nasu//phyi nas
286a6(rgyud): spyod pa yang drug buMd+d+ha mispyod pas rgyu ba rnal 'byor gA/nges par dri mA mang 'gyur ba//'di la 'khrul par mi bye n+te//sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul ba
286a7(rgyud): mo khyig/'din spyod parjes por bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//de nas gzhan yang ba shid byag/rnal 'byor rgyu
286b1(rgyud): nges pa dang //rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud kyi tshad//bshad kyi gsang ba'i bdag pa nyan//rnal 'byor rgyud rnams kyi tshod//bye ba phrag ni drug nges te//de bzhin rnal 'byor
286b2(rgyud): ma rgyung grags//bye bo phrag ni bcu drug grangs//theg chen las gzhan mdo sde rnams//dung phyir phrag brgyad gsungs pa yin//de bzhin pha rol phyin pa'i tshul//sau ya
286b3(rgyud): dang ni dung phyur lnga//'di dag thams cad thub dbang po//sku gsum bdag nyid can gyis gsungs//bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa'o//'dul ba'i gnas la sogs
286b4(rgyud): pa kun//nyan thos bdag nyid la bstan pa'o//sna tshogs mdo sde'i rnam bshad tshe//byang chub sems dpa'i bstan pa'o//rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma ya rgyud//
286b5(rgyud): gsang ba sangs rgyas spyod yul te//shes rab thabs bdag rnal 'byor gyis//bde ba chen po bsgoms pa yi//chos dang long spyod rdzogs sprul pa'o//sangs rgyas mya
286b6(rgyud): du thob pa'i phyir//sems can bsod nams dman rnams la//lha yi dge nyid can gyis gsungs//de nas gzhan yang rab gnas kyi//cho ga pha rol son bshad bya
286b7(rgyud): sngor bshad mtshan nyid dang ldan pa//slob dpon du ni yongasu brtag/lug pa'i mngon par 'dus byas pa'i//sku gzugs la sogs pa rnams ni//rab gnas//
287a1(rgyud): don du sa sbyang zhing //zla ro rgyal mtshan ba dran rnams//rgyan cing sa ni yongasu gzung //su gzugs sam ni glegs bam mam//bris sku
287a2(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs pa rnams//mdun rol du ni bzhag par bya//dkyil 'khor 'khor lo na mkhar gnas//nyer spyod lnga yis yang dag mchod//sa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma
287a3(rgyud): lan gsum du ni brjod par bya//ji ltar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun//dga' ldan yang dag bzhugs nas ni//lha mo sgyu 'phrul lhums 'jug ltar//dri bzhin
287a4(rgyud): 'dir ni bzhugasu gsol//tshobre mo zhes bya'i don du ni//byang chub sems ni yongs 'phel phyir//me tog la sogs 'di bzhes te//mgon po 'dir ni rtag
287a5(rgyud): bzhugs mdzad//tshig 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams//lhag par gnas par byas nas ni//mkhas pa yis ni bstod byas nas//yungs ka ra gyis ni bskor na su//
287a6(rgyud): ldan gsum du ni sbyang bar bya//dri zhim ldan pa'i mar gyis byug/'dag tshal gyis ni khrus kyang bya//slar yang bum pa so so yi//sku gzugs rnams ni khrus kyang byas
287a7(rgyud): phyi nas na mkhar gnas pa yi//dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bcom ldan 'das//lugs ma sogs la rab gzhug bya//yul chos la sogs ji bzhin du//las bcu yi ni
287b1(rgyud): bya ba bya//spyan ni dbye ba byas nas//rdo rje spyan ni byin gyis brlab//de bzhin me tog spos mar me//byug pa zhal zas de bzhin te//de ltar las ni kun byas phyir//sbyin srog las kyis
287b2(rgyud): rdzogs par bya//lha kun zhal ni me yin pas//mkhas pas rab tu gnas par bya//rab gnas yang dag rdzogs dusu//bstod dang bkra shis brjod bya zhing //mi dang ga sogs
287b3(rgyud): sil snyan sgri//ji ltar rnyed pas rab tu mchod//ston mo dang ni yon 'bul bso//skye bo tshim zhing rgyas par bya//rgyas pas skye bo skal pa bzang //bkra shis zhi bar bcas
287b4(rgyud): 'gyur te//zhi ba'i sbyor ba la smod pa//sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'tshe bar 'gyur//ji ltar rab tu mi gnas lha//rab tu gnas par bya ba 'jug/slob ma dang bas gsol
287b5(rgyud): 'debs pas//bsod nams phyir ni bya bru ste//rnam rtog med pa'i rang bzhin gyis//rab gnas lha ni bzhugs pa yin//'jig rten skyong ba'i lha la sogs//gang tshe/
287b6(rgyud): rtag tu gnas gyur pa//mchod dang mchod bya mnyam ldan par//de tshe lha yang yang dag bzhugs//'di ni lha rnams rab tu gnas pa'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o///
287b7(rgyud): de nas me thab la sogs pa'i//mtshan nyid yang dag bshad par bya//sa ni sbyang ba byas rjes la//me thab dag ni bya ba ste//sor brgyad pa nas brtsams pa ni//ji srid khru
288a1(rgyud): ni stong gi bar//sor brgyad pas ni dgra rnams gsod//sor bcus de bzhin rgyas pa ste//bcu gnyis sor gyis dbang dang dgug/bcu bani de bzhin zhi ba'o//thab
288a2(rgyud): khung sor ni bcu drug pas//rigs ni mngon par 'phel bar byed//sor ni bco brgyad bdag nyid kyis//yul dang ba lang rigs 'phel 'gyur//thab khung sor ni nyi shu pas//yama?/
288a3(rgyud): kyi nad ni zhi bar byed//'di dag thab kyi nges pa ste//bsreg bya'i rdzas kyi tshad rnams ni/las dang rje su 'thun bya bar//mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya//rgyu yi tshad kyi cha gsum
288a4(rgyud): gyi//chu gnyis zab su bko bya ste//me thab dag ni thams cad kyi//bko nga'i thun mong mtshan nyid//thab khung gI ni brgyad cha yis//kha khyer nyid ni mtho bar bya//kha khyer
288a5(rgyud): dpa kyi phyed tshad nyid//de nyid du ni dma' bar sbyar//ji ltar phyi rol dma' ba'i tshad//de bzhin kha khyer nang nyid//de yi phyi yi kha ra na yang //dpangs kyi tshad ni ji bzhin bya//thab khung
288a6(rgyud): nang gi khyad par du//rdo rje yis ni mtshan par bya//dkar dang ser dang dmar ba dang //de bzhin gnag dang ldang ba ste//ji ltar las kyi rjes 'gro bas//thab kyi kha dog mtshan
288a7(rgyud): nyid yon//'on kyang las kun byed pa'i thag/zhi ba'i thab kyi khyad par mtshungs//kha khyer pad+ma'i rnam par ste//dma' ba rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor//de yi phyi rol kha
288b1(rgyud): // d+ha/ga b+h+yo sa nad//rdo la sa na papa s+ho//shAng brdzus 'dag drukang por 'gyur//rgyus pa ldan byu na s+ho//byang du bsdus pas sor 'os bya/
288b2(rgyud): bskrad dang mngon par spyod pa la//zla ba phyed pa nubi bltas bye//dbye dang bsad pa'i las la ni//zur gsum lho ni bltas te bya//dbang dang dgug dang dbye ba gsum//kha drog
288b3(rgyud): dmar po zur gsum po'o//mnan dang rmong pa'i las la ni//bden bral du ni bltas te bya//skad la dud pa'i mdog lta bu//de bzhin rlung phyogs bltas te bya//rims kyi gdungs
288b4(rgyud): sogs dman pa'i las//rtag tu me phyogs bltas te bya//lha dang gdan dang mdog rnams ni//las kyi gzugs kyis 'gyur ba yin//yi ge hUM gau sbyor ba yis//phyag
288b5(rgyud): gnyis pa yi rnam par sgom//skad cig rnam pas gsong sngags brjod//skad cig rnam pas lha'i bdag nyid//rgyas la dga' ba'i sems kyis bya//zhi la zhi ba'i sems
288b6(rgyud): kyis bya//dbang la rjes chags sems kyis//khro ba'i sems kyis gsad pa ste//rnam 'gyur drag po'i sems kyis ni//bskrad pa dang ni mngon spyod 'gyur//mtshar
288b7(rgyud): yon zhabs sil la sogs bzhag/de nas me ni spyan drangs bya//rang snying tshwa skyes hUM yig las//rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom//yig gsum las byung //
289a1(rgyud): shu'i rnam pa//der dbus r-i gyi sa bon las//kha dog dmar po mdzes pa'i zhal//dbyug gu ril nga sti drug g.yon//g.yas kyi bgrang phreng mi 'dzag
289a2(rgyud): sbyin//gsus 'phyang ral pa'i cod pan can//rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan du ni//sngags pa mkhas pas baMlta bar bya//aM dza hUM ge yi geswa ni//thag dung
289a3(rgyud): gsu blta bya ste//gsang gtor 'thor 'thung mched yon sogs//byin nas thab kyi dbusu bzhag/dam tshig sems dpa' bsams nas ni//ye shes sems
289a4(rgyud): dpa' bzhug pa'i bya//me tog spos dang mar me dang //de bzhin dri dang zhal zas mchod//lag gnyis dbus mo'i nang bzhag ste//dgang gzar dang ni blugs
289a5(rgyud): b+hazlar bzung //oM ag+na ye swAdz+dza//zhes pas//dgang lugs bdun nam gsum byin na//de nus me ni tshom gyur nas//mi 'jig sna pa ni chen po ston//me tog
289a6(rgyud): sa n+yai na bza sogs//bstod pas kyang ni mnyes bya ste//de nas 'thor 'thung byin nas ni//mA nI yang drug gnas par bsam//oM br-i d+hI brIk+ShA ya swAhA/
289a7(rgyud): Sh+Ta'o//oM badz+ra la~M tA ma swAts+tsha//blo ga sh-i /9/a badz+ra ya dz+wa ya dAn+da/u dus par che'o//se badz+rA~M kr-i bai rA ya swAH/ ma can rnams
289b1(rgyud): oM s+'urba pA pe da ha nA badz+rA ya swAhA//til rnams kyi'o//oM badz+ra duSh+Ta ye sAny+dza/'bras mu grugs pa rnams kyi'o//oM sarba sam+ba de swAhA/zho dang zas kyi'o//oM badz+ra A yu khaM swAt+ma/
289b2(rgyud): /du ba'o//oM a pra ti ha ta badz+ri ya swAhA/ku sha rnams kyi'o//de nas skyeng ka'i pad+ma'i gdan la rang gi lha'i sa bon dang mtshan ya yongasu gyur pa las rdzogs pa'i dkyil
289b3(rgyud): 'khor gyi 'khor lo rnam par bsgom par bya ste//de nas dam tshig gi 'khor lo la ye shes kyi 'khor lo gzhug par bya'o//me yi snying ka'i dbus ni//skad cig rnam pas
289b4(rgyud): rnam par bsam//gsang gtor 'thor 'thung sogs mchod dang //mchod yon zhabs bsil bstod pas mchod//rang lha'i sa bon bzlas pa yi//the tshom med par sbyin sreg
289b5(rgyud): bya//lha rnams sde skor phul nas ni//phyi nus ci 'dod sbyin sreg bya//gsum dang bdun dang lhag par ni//ji srid ba rgya stong bar de bzhin//ji ltar las kyi rjes 'thun par
289b6(rgyud): mkhas pa yis ni sbyin sreg bya//de bzhin zhu ba'i rdzas kun ni//de ltar me yi zhal du dbul//ye shing dang ku sha la sogs pa ni 'ad kyi dkyil 'khor la'o//zhe
289b7(rgyud): zas dang 'thor 'thung lo sogs pa ni phyag du'o//me tog ni dbu la'o//bdug pa ni 'od la'o//byug pa ni thugs kar ro//gsang gtor ni sku la'o//zhabs bsil ni
290b1(rgyud): yo ga mi dgo'o//lhas ni nye bar mtshon par bya//mo ni rtso myo gcig tu 'bar//phun sum tshogs ma kun byed pa'o//rtse mo gnyis rab mi g.yo bA ra//mtshungs par 'bar na
290b2(rgyud): bAr shis//rtse mo bzhi ni mnyam du 'bar//rgyus shing dngos grub bstan par gnas//kun da zla ba lte bu'i mdog/snum zhing bai DUr+ya'i 'od//dri med me ni du ba med//nad
290b3(rgyud): med rigs ni 'phel bar byed//zla ba chu shel nor bu'i 'od//khu ba yi ni mdog lta bu//nor bu puSh+pa rAM ga'i mdo/sdig pa thams cad 'jig byed yin//me tog ban du
290b4(rgyud): ka lta bu//nas kyi me tog+ma gi ni mdog/btse ma gla ser gyi mdog lta bus//dbang phyug rgyal srid rab tu stir//tsam pa pad+ma ut+pal dri//u shir dang ma la ti//shi d+ha gan+d+hi'i dri mtshung/
290b5(rgyud): gA N+Dig pur a ga ru yi d+his//dge zhing gnas kyi bdag po mchog/pi wang rgyud mas rdzu rnga dang //dung drung zangs dung ltar sgra snyan//shin tu zab pa'i sgra snyan pa'i//me
290b6(rgyud): mthong bde ba 'byung bar byed//dpal be'u gdugs dang dung lta bu//gang zhig rtse gsum bum pa'i dbyibs//rgyal mtshan rnga yab rdo rje bzang //gri yung drung rta dang glang
290b7(rgyud): po'i dbyibs//sgra med g.ya su 'khyil ba dang //me lce gcig 'bar don cher ster//'di dag dge ba phun sum tshogs//tshe dang nad med rab ster ba'o//g.yo zhing
291a1(rgyud): man+ta gyi phyugasu 'bar/ gsum du ba'i tshogs mang dang //'kho zhing ma stag dang bcas pa//rnam par 'phyo bas nAd 'phel byed//mo ni gang yang rab
291a2(rgyud): tu 'drar//yang yang rtsub par rgyud pa dang //yang yang gi yon du 'khor ba dang //yang yang sa laM mye lce reg thig len ka po sol ba'i mdog/myur du rigs ni zad
291a3(rgyud): 'gyur zhing //gang zhig rgyal po'i rlung gnas pa'i//sde dang bdag po 'joms par ston/mdog med du blo'i mdog ltar gnag/mdog ldang sna tshogs mdog rtsub
291a4(rgyud): pa/pa la sha dang 'bru marare mdog/'dis ni don rnams nyams par byed//ra yi dri nya'i dri ltar ngan//chu skyes srog chags dri dang ldan//ji ste me ni 'di ltar
291a5(rgyud): mthong /gtso bo rnam par ltung zhes ston//cig cog zhes pa'i sgra 'byung zhing //rdur ngur gyis hU~M sgra gang ldan//sim sim g+hi ni sgra bdag nyid//rdo rje'i sgras
291a6(rgyud): nidur nyams byed//mdung dang m+b+ha g+h+ri myed de dang stsam//rnam pa lang gyi 'dra gang //'gas pa'i rnam pa 'di ltar mthong //de'i mdun bzod pa mdzad cag
291a7(rgyud): 'di ltar lan gausum brjod nas ni//yon bdagi khyim du zhi bde dang //bde legs tsha ga'i rim pa byi//de nas gzhan yang sbyin sreg gi/yan lag kun 'gyu
291b1(rgyud): 'bras rab bshad//sa dang sa pa'o zhing byos pa'o//thab kyi yan lag yon padag rgyus//rim gyis 'byor pa thams cad byeng //ye shing gzi brjid rnam 'phel ba
291b2(rgyud): dud shing lhag par dpa' bar byed//ku shos thams cad srung bar byed//yungs kar dkar mos zhi bar byed//'bras kyis rgyas par byed par bshad//til gyis sdig pa 'dzams
291b3(rgyud): rig bya//so bas nor dang 'bru rnams 'gugs//ma shAs stobs ni chen por byed//nas kyis rlung gi shugs rab ster//dur bas tshe ni 'phel bar byed//gro yis nad
291b4(rgyud): ni 'joms par byed//'o ma sbrang rtsis shes rab 'phel//lag pan gyis ni bde kun ster//mes ni 'dod don dngos grub ster//rang 'dod lhas ni grol bar rtsol//lhag ma las
291b5(rgyud): kyi rjes 'thun par//zhe sogs las byas shes par bya//dgang gzur shes rabaM blugs gzar thabs//de gnyis sbyar ba gnyis med sgom//de las nges 'byung mar gyi
291b6(rgyud): rgyu ni//ye shes chen po rje bdud rtsir 'dod//rgyu dang mi rgyu'i bdag nyid kyi//mi ni de yis yang dag mchod//'di ltar sbyin sreg gang byed la//skal bzang dngos grub rab
291b7(rgyud): tuM ster/'di ni sbyin sreg nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o////de nas las n-i rab 'bya mo 'byung //dngos grub sna tshogs
292a1(rgyud): /go 'phang bsngags//sna tshogs las kyi 'bras 'byung ba//yang dag pur ni rab tu bshad//oM nA maHsmA shAM b+h+ra sri na/ma hA kA la a nu tsa rA ya/tad+ya thA/
292a2(rgyud): oM tsa lA pra tsa la/la lA lA lA ye/de bi paM swA hA/bsnyen pa khri byas te/mtshan phyed na ling ga gzugs la ji srid 'ongs kyi ba ra de srid du bzlas par bya ste/gong bu dgug pa'o//
292a3(rgyud): oM tsa muN+De/d+hu ma ke shaM bi d+hu dz+nyA tre/ta na ha na/pa tsa pa tsa/de ba dat+ta/A nA yaM swAhA//rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthil du sen rtsis ri rab bris la/de'i nang gi cha la yi ge hrIH
292a4(rgyud): bzhi/dbu su sngags kyi tshig bris te/gnon cing bzlas na dbang du byed pa'i mchog yi no//oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hA na dA ha pa tsa bi d+haM sa ya/yo sU mA sa ra ya hUM phaT/
292a5(rgyud): glog mkhar gyi sa pa'i rnam pa lnga dang bsres pa las mtho gang tsam phyi b+hA su kI byas te/ka ra bI ri ri lcug mas chu gtor zhing /gu gul gyis bar ma chad par bdugs te/
292a6(rgyud): dkar gsum gyi gtor ma byin na nyi ma bdun na chu'i rgyun 'bebs par byed do//ji ste mi 'babs na nyi ma bdun bu dum bur byas te bum par bcug naso//chu bo la bskur na
292a7(rgyud): char 'bengs par 'gyuraro//char dbab pa'i cho ga'o//oM ga ga a rig ga swA hA//sngags 'dis gdong bkrus te/rdo ba la lan bdun bzlas pa byas na su yang rung
292b1(rgyud): bA'i sgo'i bu gar bcug na//kha bcing ba byed par 'gyuraro//oM mu kha tiSh+Than+ti/mu kha gats+tsha ti mu kha kA d+haM ti/wA ga wA/mu khyA na/mu tra pu re She na/dwe ba dat+ta s+yA mu khaM ban+d+ha mI so//khyu mchog
292b2(rgyud): gi lci ba sa la ma sbyang ba blangs te/gang su yang rung bu gar gzhug pa byas na tha snyad brjod pa'i kha cing bar 'gyur te bklag pas 'grub pa'o//oM na mo ni khaM b+hai ra b+hU ya/tsi
292b3(rgyud): tsau ri ka rA tA rU be NaM/muSh+Ti kA nAM tur+N+Na bi d+hA mi/a ra k+ka To/shrI gai la/sa ro p+tA/r-i k+Sho/b+hu ra hA dI NAM/si ri sau ri/khyi li khyi li swAhA//sngags 'dis lag pa yaM gcig gam/
292b4(rgyud): rdo ba la len nyi shu rtsa gcig yongasu bzlas nas khyim ma/zhing ngam/ldum ri'i zur bzhir rdo bo bcug na nye bar 'tshe ba med par 'gyuraro//yang dug dang lan tshwa dang /skye tshe dang /

292b6(rgyud): dag par gnas bcu bzhi'i nyi ma la me tog dang /bdug pa la gtor ma byas te/de'i rjes la lag pa g.yas pas yang dag par bzung ste/g.yon pas bsdigs mdzub
292b7(rgyud): byas nas khro bo'i ngag gi bzlas te/phyogs bzhir sbas na mtshamos bcad pa dang ra ba byas par 'gyuraro//oM hUM brI hUM phaT ba Ti ba Ti swA hA//sngags 'di ba lang gi
293a1(rgyud): /rA/skye ba la mngon par bsgrags te chu'o gnas brlag na na rnams rnam par chud zos par 'gyur to//ma gtor bas ni grol bar 'gyur/
293a2(rgyud): ro dI ta swa ma nI/twem+l-i kyA A d+hi pa tA ye/ku ru ku ru/gats+tsha gan+d+haM/b+hAk+Sha yA b+ha k+Sha ya/nai tA ro g+hA si ri swai rau/nA sha ya nA sha ya/phaT phaT/hiM hai swA hA/mig

293a6(rgyud): rin gyi thun dang lham bu chug sher dang stang zil dang gu gul dang //shing tshe dang /chu srin sen mo dang ru rta dang gA ser shing gi 'bras bu ste/'di rnams de bzhin du bu ram da

293b1(rgyud): sha mAn+ta ya swA hA//ru ta shu thag dbang po'i gnas//yungs ka ra ta ra'i me tog/sug smel de bzhin klu'i me tog/sar+dz+dza ra sa cha mnyam byas//de dag gis ni rdzas la
293b2(rgyud): bdugs//cho ngo ni myur bar 'ong bar 'gyur//yi ge ya gnyis kha sbyar byas//dbus ming ni sbyar byas te//rlung gis khyer ba'i shing lo bzung //de yi lo ma la bri bya//khA yi
293b3(rgyud): smug gu dang //snag tsha dug dang ske tshe dang //dur khrod spel ba mnyam ldan pas//legs par bsang ste bris nas mchod//skrag dang mig dmar nyin mo la//chub ma'i rlung

293b6(rgyud): bris le/de'i nang du bcug ste/khro ba dang bcas pas de'i kha zan gyis bkag la/ro'i skra'i srad bus dkris te/yang khro baMs lan bdun bzlas pa'i gtun shing

294a1(rgyud): pa'i cho ba'o//rlung gi phyog su mAN+DalA nye bar byugs te/bro ga'i mda' ma l+ya ltas byin gyi ming dang spel ba bris la zan gyi grong bu'i dbusu bcug/

294a3(rgyud): du bzhig na/grang brtan par 'gyur/de nas dgra bsad par 'dod na spra tshil lam bag zin la/gzugs brnyan byas la chos gos kyis ras kyi gzugs brnyan
294a4(rgyud): de'i gdang nas brtsams te rkang pa'i bar du dkris la legs par sbas te/de'i steng du lag pa bzhag la ming spel ba'i sngags stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba bzlas
294a5(rgyud): nas//lha'i khang pa'i phyogs gcig tu bzhog ste/snying kar seng ldeng gi phur bu btab la//phur bu'i steng du dus gsum chu tshan rmugs shing khro bas yongasu
294a6(rgyud): bzlas na brlag par 'gyuro//yungs kar lnga rnams khrig dang bsgres pa dang /'bru mar tshwa ba dang b+ha la ta ke bsres pa dang /lcags kyi phye ma rnams bsres
294a7(rgyud): shing sbyar te/dgra'i ming nas bzung nas sbyin sreg stong phrag gcig byas na de skad cig la bsod par 'gyuraro//yungs kar ser skya khrag dang bsres pa dang /
294b1(rgyud): 'bru mar tshwa dang /b+hU tA la kA bsres la dgra'i ming nas bzung nas/dur khrod kyi me la lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na bsgrub bya brjod khyod kyis bsod par 'gyur te/khrag
294b2(rgyud): skyug par 'gyur zhing ram+bes sa gzir nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyuraro//dur khrod kyi thal ba las dgra'i gzugs brnyen byas rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la/skra grol zhing khros pas
294b3(rgyud): lhor bltas te/gang gi ming nas bzung nas lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na dgra myur du 'chi bar 'gyur//til dmar po me tog pri ya ku mar dang bsres te/lan brgyad stong

295a1(rgyud): cha mnyam du ni byas nas//rgyal dang nyi ma la sbyar nas//bA yi rnam lnga dang btags te//hU~M 'dod rol bu byas nas na//nyi ma la ni bskam par bya//mar

295a5(rgyud): la mgo la byug pa byos na ni rims med par 'gyur//mang po'i dbusu rtsod pa'i tshe 'am rgyal po'i sgor 'gro ba na/dpral bar thugs na de rgyal bar 'gyur//sgra'i rtse mo
295a6(rgyud): la byugs na bud med dbang du 'gyur bas/gzhon ma rnams 'dzin cing skal ba bzang por 'gyur//bud med bu mi phyin pa rnams kyi lte ba dang /skye gan su thugs na
295a7(rgyud): myur du 'byung bar 'gyuraro//mdza'i nad thams cad la ba lang gi chu dang lhan cig 'thungs na bde leg su 'gyuraro//mngal me chags pa rnams la/dpyid kyi
295b1(rgyud): dusu pa'i rnam lnga dang lhan cig 'thungs na/mngal chags shing bu dang ldan par 'gyuraro//khrag gis gzer ba la 'bras kyi chu dang lhan cig 'thungs na zug gzer rab tu zhi bar 'gyur

295b3(rgyud): dang dom la sogs pa nags kyi bdag po rnams dang /sdig pa dang rta bla mo la sogs pa dang /gdon thams cad las yongasu thar bar 'gyur te/thams cad du srung ba'i mchog

296a1(rgyud): bang /de yi me tog rab bsngags te//mar gyi ngo'i dus 'tshal ni//mngon 'dod dngos grub thams cad ster//yang ngor 'jug pa mi bsngags te//rgas pa
296a2(rgyud): la sogs byed pa yin//thog ma tha ma rnam spangs po//dag pa'i shel dang mtshungs shing drag/ri dag lte ba rab bsngags te//mdzes pa'i gla rtsi yang dge blang //gsad par//
296a3(rgyud): gyur pa yang dag gtso//mchog gi sman ni bzung bar bya//'o ma'i ston mo sogs skyes pa'i//tsan de na ser po yang dag gzung //mar ni gsum ste mgo skyes dang //sbubs
296a4(rgyud): las skyes dang sha skye so//mgo skyes mar ni mchog yin te//sbubs las byung ba bar ma yin//sha las byung ba tha mra ste//bcud kyis len gyi cho gro mchog/zla ba
296a5(rgyud): lus ni rgyas par byed//du ru skas ni thams cad srung //ri dgas lte bas nad 'joms te//sman gyis zhi bar byed pa yin//rtag tu bzhi mnyam pa ni//snga dro'i ngasu
296a6(rgyud): rgyun tu bsten//zla ba'i rlung na rgyu ba na//zla ba'i rgyu ba btung bar bya//nyi mu'i rlung ni rgyu ba na//nyi mas nyi ma btung bar bya//rdzas 'di dag nA mnyam sbyar byas/
296a7(rgyud): rtog tu sgra ri ni thugs par bya//zla ba drug tu sbyar byas na//rtag pa'i tshe ni 'phel bar 'gyur//sgra sgro g.yon du rab blugs na//las ni yongasu dag gyur pas//
296b1(rgyud): yang ngo zla ba ji bzhin du//nad kun med cing 'tsho bar 'gyur//gnag dang ser bu dang bral zhing //dri ma dri med rnam par spangs//drang pa'i chu ltar gang gyur la//skyon bzhi dang na
296b2(rgyud): rnam bral ba'o//rang mdzes dri ma med cing dge/cung zad shel dang mtshungs pa'i 'od//dag pa'i shel les gyur pa nyid//lus ni bcing po'i mchog yin te//nya drong sha dang de
296b3(rgyud): bzhin chang //bud med nyal po rnam par spang //brtan zhing dul la sbas pa yis//rang gi lus ni yongasu srung //slob ma dang ldan lhan cig bcas//dben pa'i phug tu rab
296b4(rgyud): zhugs der//myos byed gtor ma mnyam ldan pas//lha rnams la ni mchod par bya//rang gi lhag pa'i ltung sbyor bas//sngags ni rgyun mi 'chad par bzla//sbyin dang
296b5(rgyud): bsod nams bya ba bya//slob ma rnams ni tshims par bya//kha na ma tho med pa'i gnas//rnyed nas bgegs med byas te gnas//bde ba'i stan rab thob na su//blo dang
296b6(rgyud): ldan pas smra mau bya//ji srid nyi ma bdun gyi bar//rang lus yang dag dag par bya//de rjes lo ni bcu sogs kyi//bar du las ni bsten par bya//dngos grub du su lo
296b7(rgyud): gnyis kyang //mkhas pas rtag par yang dag bsrungs//lo bcu gnyis ni yong dag rdzogs//gnyer ma skra dkar rnam par spangs//sna tshogs nad las rnam par
297a1(rgyud): b+hag zla bsgyur ma yod par //rtswa dang lha min mo rnams kyi//bud yod rnams lnga yod 'ong 'gyur//dzas no lnga po 'don mas stod//rtag par//
297a2(rgyud): rgyun tu bza' zhing btung //las 'di dag ni yang dag rdzogs//'dod pa'i dngos grub rab tu 'jug/'dod brdo'i ba dang mnyam pa'i lus//mkha' spyod dngos grub thob par
297a3(rgyud): rgyu//so p+lag chos 'gyur mda' dgu dang //nir gun thA dad bal kun ni smyo byed mad ba dang ni n+yas//bla rtsi tsan dan ldan pa dang //b+hA li klu dang tse bar ldan//
297a4(rgyud): ra g+h+ri lus ni dril byas na//nad rnams spyan las rnam grol zhing //dog yid mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur//'bras bu gesum dang can dan gyi//kye mar bcas dpa
297a5(rgyud): g+hu rtsi ni//bsil dang lhan cig lo gcig 'thungs//nad med rgyas pa'ang med par 'gyur//'bras bu gsum dang tsan dan phye//glu rtser lhan cig bsten byas te/
297a6(rgyud): zos na zla ba drug tsam gyis//tshe ring gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur//glu rtsi 'bras bu gsum dang bcas//rje yi sted du song dag byinagr-i/bgrangs te gang
297a7(rgyud): rtag 'thungs ni//rgas dang nad med yang dag 'byung //tsan dan ka sa yi sman gsum//mi gang gis ni zla drug zas//de la 'dod pa'i dngos grub ni//'gyu
297b1(rgyud): par 'dir na the tshom med//'di ni bcud kyis lan gyi cho ga rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o////de nas gzhan yang myos byed dang //btso ba yang dag rab bshad bya//
297b2(rgyud): rgyud rnams kun tu gsang chog/ji bzhin gzhan la brjod mi bya//bdud rtsi bskyed pa'i ched du ni//bshad kyis gnod sbyin bdag pa nyin//ye shes rdo rje man da rar//grags
297b3(rgyud): mkha' dbyings 'o ma'i mtsho//'o ma'i rgya mtsho mdzes pa yi//bdud rtsi bsrungs pa tsam gyis ni//de las skyes po'i lha mo chang //bu mo 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma//
297b4(rgyud): nyi ma 'cha rI ka'i mdog 'dra zhing //rgya skyegs khu ba lta bu'i 'od//rin chen kun gyi brgyan pa'i lus//pad+ma'i mdog dang mtshungs pa'i 'od//yi ge maM las byung ba'i sku/
297b5(rgyud): mdzes pa'i phyag ni bco brgyad de//lha mo sna tshogs bcud 'dzin cing //'jig rten gsum po dbang bdud ma//g.yas pas ral gri mda' lcags kyu//thod pa rdo rje rgyal
297b6(rgyud): mtshan dang //de bzhin mu tig phreng dril bu//dgu pas mchog ni rab ster ba'o//g.yon pa'i phyag gis phub dang gzhu//zhags pa dang ni khaM T+wAM ga/ril ba spyi blugs
297b7(rgyud): mdung dang ni//tho ba pi wang bgrang phreng bcas//gzhon zhing lang tshe phun sum tshogs//lha mo mdzes pa'i spyan gsum can//man da raM yi dbus phyung nas//chu ba
298a1(rgyud): kumatu gyur nas ni//'o ma'i rgya mtsho zhes bya bar//mar dang sbrang rtsi lta bur 'bab//zhi ba'i bad pa'ang lha mo de//rdo rje rnam snang mdzad gzugs can//
298a2(rgyud): rnam snang mdzad ma'i sku'i dbus//he ru ka ni zhu bor 'gyur//dpa' bo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i//mkha' gro ma yi du mchog bde//thams cing ro gcig gyur pa yi//
298a3(rgyud): bdud rtsi drag po'i gzugs can ma//'phrog dang bya ba long spyod la//de phyir snying po bdud rtsi yin//de bzhin thab ni chos dbyings grags//glu ma ni bdud rtsir bsgrags
298a4(rgyud): pa ste//chang glang rdo rje rnal 'byor ma//gang zhig dreg te he ru ka/mdog ni pad+ma'i dbang phyug bdag/gang zhig dri de rin chen 'byung //ro gang de ni yod grub pa ste/
298a5(rgyud): gang zhig rlung gi shugs bdag nyid//chang med bya la ye shes ci//rnam shes kyang ni ci zhig 'gyur//rnam shes ye shes phun tshogs pas//chang gis 'gro kun
298a6(rgyud): rmongs par 'gyur//gnas dang shing dang tshan droha//'dus pa dang ni dur khrod du//mched bya mchod byed 'brel ba yin//bdud rtsi mchod yon mchog yin te//
298a7(rgyud): rgyud dang rgyud gzhan gsungs pa yi//bkra shis bde ba'i dga' ba'o//mtshun gyi lha dang mi rnams dang //bag ma blang dang mchod sbyin las//mkhas pa'i
298b1(rgyud): mchod sbyin dag la'ang ste//rgyal rigs g.yul ngor 'jug pa dang //rje'u rigs bkra shis don du ste//dmangs rigs rnams ni dngos grub skyug/rab 'byung mchod pa'i dus
298b2(rgyud): dag la/yun ring bshad pa'i spyod yul dang //rab gnas sbyin sreg dus dag tu'ang //gnas rnams rgyu ba'i spyod yul du//rnal 'byor pa rnams spyan drangs te//mchod
298b3(rgyud): gnas gsang sngags sgrub de'i dus//'di ltar sna tshogs shes nas//de yi skyon rnams mi rtag go//shing du bya ba bshad par bya//gosang ba pa yi badrug po nyon//bra ma
298b4(rgyud): dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma//mchod cing rje su spyod par b+ha//oM U d+d+hiHzhes bya sngags kyis//rtag tu byin gyis brlab par bya// hU~M zhes bya sngags kyis//sbyang ba dang ni
298b5(rgyud): rtogs bya ste//yI gra has ni kha dog 'phrog/ho yas dri ni 'joms pa ste//yi ge hrI sa yis nus pa'ang bcom//bdud rtsi'i rnam par bston par bya//lha gosum la sog
298b6(rgyud): rlung byal phyir//ji skad ma tshig can gyis 'thungs//de las dug 'gyur the tsham med//sngags kyi dngos grub mi skye'o//sku zhigu chang gis myos 'gyur ba//de la bzheg sa
298b7(rgyud): ni mang po 'byung //sngags pa chang gis rnam 'gyur bas//'dod la brkam zhing 'khrig par srid//rgod cing rgyun de bzhin yin//thab mo la spro rnam par 'khrul/
299a1(rgyud): smad cing nyams par byed pas kyang //du 'bod dmyal bar 'chad par 'gyur//rnal 'byor ma rnams khros nus ni//de la nad mad mya ngan 'jigs//'jigs
299a2(rgyud): pabar byed pas rnam gtses nas//sdig can dmyal bar khrid par 'gyur//bla ma la 'khu bla ma smod//sems can 'khu la sbyin mi bya//bdud rtsi de nyid dug de nyid//dngos grub sgrub
299a3(rgyud): pa 'bras bu med//sngags pas 'di dag sbyong bar ni//sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs//tsa ru'i bza' bar ldan pa dang //cho gar yang dag ston ngas spyad//rnal 'byor
299a4(rgyud): nA'i 'dus pa//cho gar gsungs bzhin mi slu ste//dngos po thams cad mnyam pas na//skal dang skal min brtag mi bya/des na 'dus pa zhes gsungs te//dngos grub dang
299a5(rgyud): ni rjes gnang 'thob//shes rang blo dang stobs dang ni//bde dang skal bzang 'bras rang ste//dbang phyug brgyad kyi yon tan kun//bla med 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur//rdzas skyes
299a6(rgyud): de bzhin rtsa ba skyes//go rni peSh+Ti chad gri rigs//shing skyes de bzhin bur shing skyes//sa stengs gang dag skyes rnams te//maT+wAM rnam pa ltar bshad//pe shrI rnam pa
299a7(rgyud): brgyad du brjod//gi D+hi rnam pa bdun yin te//rim pa 'di dag shes par bya//rno dang /ba dang che ba dang //mdor dang 'jam par skyoskye ba ste//sna tshogs yul du rnam skyes
299b1(rgyud): na/tshang mi du rab tu grags//rgyul dga' ba bsu/ lkog du rmAm d+huts+tsha/ma hAg drangan pa sum 'dag t+tA ma sbyin sa bad+d+ham+ba par //rmo ga rdzun du
299b2(rgyud): pas byas nA ni//myis byed ma chog ni skye bar 'gyur//de'i tshe grub de'i chang sems dpa so//nyin re nyin ri bya ba yin//sbyor ba 'di ni mchog tu mdzes//grub pa
299b3(rgyud): myos byed yid dugar bri//shri glu'i smon ni zhe gnyis dang //skyu ru ra yang cha bcu dang //de bzhin tshun br-i gang nyid//pho ba ris ni drug cu gsum//bu ram snang ni
299b4(rgyud): gcig bzung ste//'di dag gcig N+DI sbyar byas la//'di ni grub pa'i chang zhes brjod//nyi mo'i 'di la btso par bya//skyu ru ra~M yaM myos byed de//d+hA da ka yi maM
299b5(rgyud): tog bzung //tsU tA'i me tog so bdang //mo la yang dang sre ra~M ba//rje drug byi grA ba li ka la ma//'di dag cha ni mnyam pa 'am//bzhi tshwa rno ni rab tu bar+d+hag/chu
299b6(rgyud): nga sum d+hu n+yA gnyis dang //buram srang ni brgyud du 'gyur//nyi ma gsum ne rmed rgyu nyid//'byung ba du ni shes pad b+ha//mr-i tash+ma d+hU tA kA'i chang //gan da pa tA po
299b7(rgyud): ras//ngo tsang dang nA ga ge sar bzung /da rna mo 'bras bu de bzhin che//pi be li dang 'o mir bcas//bu ram srang ni gcig nyid de//chu ni bdun 'gyur sbyin par bya//
300a1(rgyud): rgyas kyang dkris pa da //bsom pa'i bdag /nyid dun 'gyur//bang ka chung //shad rtswa oM ldan lo sa//logs mthong /mA lA r+yA ba tA/
300a2(rgyud): kAr dang ldan ga sgyur//seM pas gcigad+hA skyes byas nime la lan bdun dz+nyAH//thub bu'i mang ni blan med//khara'i chud//bri g-i'i rtsa ba las

300a5(rgyud): ni zhug bzhir ni khyad par du//'dre'i dbus bzhig par bya//tshong ni sbyin par b+h+yor ngo ni/myangs nA k+ku ni 'drir 'gyur//saM dz+nyAn dza na'i shu m+bI ba~M dang /
300a6(rgyud): 'gyur 'gyu'o 'gyur// bri gnyis par glu zung dang /la la so//dri dgas dge par ngas pas ni//cheng ni dri ma ma

300b1(rgyud): dpa tra snang phyong ni//ngargya cha dang ni sbyar bar bya//'di ltar 'di nyid pa yis//zla re d+hu rer sbyar dar bya//sna rdzogs chung pi dbye ba ni//yul dang rjes 'thun 'gyur zhes bya//'di
300b2(rgyud): ltar chang gi dbye ba ni//rgyu dang rgyud gzhan los shes bya//myos byed las gzhan mchod pa med//mar me sbyin sreg mchog ma yin//bla ma dang bral chos med do//chos
300b3(rgyud): dang bral ba 'i grol ba med//myos byed las gzhan dmo tshig ni//gar yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin//bdag nyid bsod na mas dbang gis sam//la lar bla ma mnyes pas
300b4(rgyud): rnyed/'di ni myos byed nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu drug pa'o////de nas gzhan yang sngags btu ba'i//cho ga mchog ni rab tu bshad//sa yi
300b5(rgyud): tshon yid 'ong bar//dri yi chus ni nye bar byug/dben pa'i gan suM legs sbas te//me tog spos kyis nyams dge' bya//sngags pas tsa ru'i bza' ba spyad//de bzhin bdud
300b6(rgyud): rtsi btung bar spyad//rang gi lhag pa'i ltar sbyor bas//sngon du brad+mor ma sbyin bya ste//mkha' gro ma kun mnyam sbyor ba'i//slob dpon legs par mnyam gzhag pas//
300b7(rgyud): gru gsum dkyil 'khor mnyam dag pa//ri mo gsum gyis phyi rol bskor//chos 'byung bskyed mos tshal chen po//sna tshogs me tog gis rnam mdzes//der ni A
301a1(rgyud): li ka li dbye//sngo tshan brgyad po rimA bzhin bri/'dod pa drag po de bzhin nyid//thub pa mda' dang gzugs med nyid//ri'u mig bzhi bcu rtsa
301a2(rgyud): dgur ni//man ngag bzhin du dgod par bye//a sogs yi ge nas brtsams te//yi phe ha yi bar du sngags//bskor ba'i rnam par sbyar bar ni//gsang ba'i bdag pos
301a3(rgyud): shes par gyis//ri'u mig dang po'i lnga pa bzung //der ni ri'i'u mig bcu pa nyid//steng du yang dgra sbyin par bya//ri'u mig dgu po'i gsum pa yis//steng du thig
301a4(rgyud): lirA rnam par rgyun//re'u mig bdun pa'i drang po bzung //me yis swa bon 'og tu rgyun//dang po yi ni bzhi pa yis//rgyun pa 'dod pa mo yi mchog/bdun pa'i
301a5(rgyud): gnyis pa'i yi ge bzung //re'u mig dang po'i bcu gcig blang //ri'u mag dgu pa'i lnga pa bzung //yi ge u yis 'og tu rgyun//ri'u mig bdun pa'i bzhi pa
301a6(rgyud): bzug/re'u mig dang po'i bcu gcig pa//mgo bai la ni brgyan par bya//ri'u mig dgu pa'i lnga pa bzung /dang po'i lnga pas 'og tu rgyan//ri'u mig lnga pri lnga pa bzung /ri'u
301a7(rgyud): mig bdun bI bzhi pa blang //'u mig bcugacig pas rgyan cing //lnga pa yis ni 'og tu rgyan//re'u mig dgu pa'i gsum pa yi//steng du thig las rnam par rkyen//lan
301b1(rgyud): gnyisu ni bzlas par bya//ri'u mig lbu pa'i gnyis pa bzung //ri'u mig gi bcu gcig pa'o//bzhi pa dang ni yang dag ldan/snying po'i sngags ni rtag bzlas na//dngos grub yan/
301b2(rgyud): kun gyi gnas//rI'u mig dag ni bdun pa yi//yi ge bzhi pa bzung bar bya//reru mig dag ni dgu pa yi//lnga pa yis ni 'og tu rkyen//dang de'i bzhi pas rnam par
301b3(rgyud): rgyan//bdun pa yi ni bdun pa yis//log su thig le gnyis sbyin bya//r-i'u mig dag ni bdun pa yis//yi ge bzhi pa bzung bya ste//lan gnyi su ni bzlas par bya//slar
301b4(rgyud): yang yi ge de nyid bzung //dbyangs kyi lnga pas 'og tu rgyan//ri'u mig dgu pa gsum pa yis//thig le yis ni rnam par rgyan//lan gnyisu ni bzlas par bya//
301b5(rgyud): re'u mig dag ni lnga ba yis//yi ge gnyis pa bzung bar bya//re'u mig gcig pa dag gi/bzhi pa nyid ni bzung bar bya//sngon du phyag 'tshal sbyin par bya//rtog par
301b6(rgyud): rgyun tu bzlas na ni//skal bzad dngos grub byed pa'o//re'u mig ni bdun pa yi//yi ge gnyis pa yang dag bzung //bcu gcig drung po'i yi ge ni//me yi bus ni
301b7(rgyud): 'og tu rgyan//bdun pa'i gnyis pa'i yi ge bzung //dbyangs kyi bcu gcig pa yis rgyan//re'u mig dag ni dgu pa yi//yi ge lnga pa yang dag bzung //dbyangs
302a1(rgyud): na tshu sma smo rgyumyu/dun du ba /na/nga chag nga shA //du na da no pa so//yo bad+mo pa /

302a3(rgyud): bang //dbyings kyi lja bas mdzes par bya//dgu pa yis ni gsum pa yi//de bzhin mi l-I mdzes par byas//don lan gnyis brjod par bya//yi ge mchon na
302a4(rgyud): grol ba ste//lnga pa'i yi ge gnyis pa bzung //ri'u mig bcu gcig pa yini//bzhi pa nyid ni sbyar bar bya//re'u mig drug ni bdun pa yi//yo ga gsum pa bzung bar

302b1(rgyud): gnyis pa bzung bar bya//de nyid la ni gsum pa yis//mgo la rgyun du byas pa yin//re'u mig dag ni lnga pa yis//yi ge bzhi pa yang dag blang //dbyungs kyi gsum par rgyun

302b3(rgyud): mig dag ni bdun pa yi//yi ge gsum pa bzung bar bya//dbyings yig lnga pa 'og tu sbyar//dku pa'i gsum pa'i yau phreM yis//thig le ru ni rgyan pa yin//de ni rim

302b6(rgyud): bzhi pa sbyar bas mdzes//sna gr-Is ni lan gnyis brjod par bya//re'u mig dag ni bdun pa yi//yi ge bzhi pa bzung bar bya//dbyangs ni lnga pas 'og tu sbyar//zla ba
302b7(rgyud): phyed pa thog les rgyan//de yi tshig ni lan gnyis brjod//re'u mig dag ni lnga pa yi//yi ge gnyis pa bzung bar bya//ro'u migo dag ni bcu gcig pa'o//bzhi pa
303a1(rgyud): sbyar bas bde mchog ster//bsapa byed dang po yang dag bzhag/re'u mig gcig yi ge bzung //dbyangs kyi bdun pas sbyar bar bya//re'u mig dag ni
303a2(rgyud): bdun pa yi//yi ge bzhi pa bzung bar bya//re'u mig dog ni lnga pa yi//bzhi pa yis ni sbyar bar bya//dbyangs yig gnyis pas rnam par rgyan//re'u mig lnga pa'i
303a3(rgyud): dang po bzung //re'u mig drug pa'i dang po blang //tshig ni lan gnyis brjod par bya//re'u mig dag ni bdun pa yi//yi ge bzhi pa bzung bar bya//dbyangs kyi lnga pas 'og
303a4(rgyud): tu sbyar//zla ba phyed pas thig las rgyan//thams cad lan gnyis brjod par bya//re'u mig dag ni bzung ba yi//yi ge gnyis la bzung bar bya//re'u mig dag ni bcu
303a5(rgyud): gcig pa'i//bzhi pas sbyar ba dbang phyug mchog/thog mar gsal byed yang drag sbyar//yi ge mchog ni sgrub par byed//re'u mig bcu gsum pa nyid kyi//dbyangs/
303a6(rgyud): yig dang po bzung bar bya//dbyangs yig gnyis pas sbyar bar 'gyur//re'u mig dag ni lnga pa yi//yi ge bzhi pa bzung nas ni//bzhag pas go 'phang mchog tu
303a7(rgyud): 'gyur//re'u mig dag ni dgu pa yi//yi ge bzhi bzung mchog dbang phyug/re'u mig dag ni bdun pa yi//yi ge bzhi pa bzung bar bya//dbyangs kyi bcu gsum
303b1(rgyud): pa yis ni//mgro bo la ni rgyan par 'gyur//mkhas pas bdun pa bdun pa ni//log su thig le gnyi su bzhag/ri'u mig dag ni bdun pa yi//yi go gnyis po bzung bar bya//
