303b3(rgyud): yin par brjod//re'u migo dgra ni dgu pa yi//yi ge lnga pa bzung bar bya//dbyangs ni gnyis pas mdzes par bya//re'u mig bdun pa'i dang po ni//bzhog pas dngos grub
303b4(rgyud): thams cad ster//re'u mig ni bdun pa yi//yi ge bzhi pa blang bar bya//dbyangs ni lnga pa sbyar bya ste//zla bo phyed ni thig les rgyan//lan gnyis brjod pa mchog dbang
303b5(rgyud): phyug lnga pa'i yi ge gnyis pa bzung //re'u mig bcu gcig po nyid kyi//bzhi pa yi so ni sbyar bya ste//yang dag go 'phang mchog yino//bla ma'i man ngag lam gyi/
303b6(rgyud): ni//sngags btu ba ni shes par bya//yang dag bstan dang rnam bral ba'i//glegs bam glags tso mo gyi sngags la//bskal pa bye ba brgya ru yang //dngos grub go 'phang
303b7(rgyud): 'byung mi 'gyur//tshes bcu yi ni dus dag la//sna tshogs me tog la sogs dang //bza' dang btung ba mnyam ldan pas//rdo rje rnal 'byor ma mchod bya//sngags
304a1(rgyud): nyid rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs//rnal 'byor ma nyid sngags kyi gzugs//dz+riM ste go 'phang mchog thob na//de dag dbye bar mi bya'o//ji ste dngos grub mtsha
304a2(rgyud): 'dod na//srog ni yongasu gtong yang bla//'chi bar mnyam par 'gro yang bla'i//rtag tu dam tshig bsrung bar bya//'jig rten gsum pa rgyu mi rgyu'i//'gro kun gi yon
304a3(rgyud): las byung bas na//rnal 'byor ma rtag g.yon la spyod//rkang pa g.yon pa mngon du 'dor//lag pa yon gyis mchod par bya//g.yon pa yis ni tshom dang za//rigs/
304a4(rgyud): lnga la ni kun spyod pa//rigs cig tu ni rnam par rtag/kun rtog kun las rnam grol zhing //gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spongs//bla ma sangs rgyas bla ma chos//bla
304a5(rgyud): mi dge 'dun de bzhin te//sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i//mkha' gro ma yi dra ba sdom//de'i phyir sangs rgyas go 'phang ni//'dod pas bla ma mnyes par bya//
304a6(rgyud): 'di ni sngags btu ba'i cho ga rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o////de nas de phyir sbyin sreg go/las kyi khyad par rab bshad bya//sgrub pos rgyal srid ched du ni//
304a7(rgyud): sngags ni stong phrag bcu ru bzlas//sngar bshad pa yi cho ga yis//sbyin sreg las ni brtsam par bya//bsgrub bya'i ming dang rnam spel te//sha chen 'o mar sbyar
304b1(rgyud): bA yis//rnam rtag med pos sbyin sreg byas//yongs rdzogs rgyal po nyid du 'gyur//ba ljang mi dang lce sbyang sha/chung dang 'o mar mnyam bsres pas//srog blugs mchog na
304b2(rgyud): sbyin b+h+yas te//rtag tu 'bum gcig sbyin sreg byas//grong khyer mchog ni thob 'gyur te//dpal lji n-i rgyal po chen por 'gyur//tshur mya'i me ni rab skur waM//dug khrag
304b3(rgyud): b+hU mar dzI ba dang //de bzhin skra dang sgrub mor ldan//mau yaM rus pas sbyin sreg bya//skra grol khros pa'i dbang gyur pas//b+h+yo phyogs kha bltas gcer bu 'am/
304b4(rgyud): sngags pa gos ni nag po g+hun+tu//drag pa'i las le nyin phyed dam//mtshan byed na sti gdol ba'i mer//bsgrub byar ming dang sbyar ba'i sngags//da ro drag pas brjod
304b5(rgyud): bye zhe/rtse gcig sems kyis sbyin sreg byas//dpung bcus stobs kyang blanag 'gyur na//gzhan rnams lo ni smras ci dgaste//de nas stobs kyis dregs pa yi//
304b6(rgyud): dgra bo bskrad pa bshad par bya//rlung gi phyogasu kha bltas te//shwa za'i me ni rab sbar la//kha yi bshog pa zhag nim pa//ni ra ya sa yi 'bru myur bsreswa//las+sa ni
304b7(rgyud): mtshan mo bdun sbyar na//the tshom med par spro bar 'gyur//dbye ba'i las zhes grags pa ni//smyo byed shing la me sbar la//bsang sngags rig ngas nim pa ni//
305a1(rgyud): \u0f7fla mo sprul gyi shun par bcas//khwa dang ldog pa'i tshang bsros te//brgya rtsa brgyad ni sbyin sreg byas//'jig rten thams cad 'byed 'gyur te/
305a2(rgyud): snying sdug smra bo'i gnyen gyis spyang //de nas dgug pa bshad par bya//li khri mtshungs pa'i 'od sgom ste//baing+ge'i bya gtsor bu rlung phyogs nas//steng bltos g.yo
305a3(rgyud): dmigs nas//stan la rol pa'i gnas pas gi nas//gsang sngags yi ge rje bzlas te//zhugs pa lcags kyu rab sbyor bas//bsgrub bya'i snying gi pad+mar dbug/
305a4(rgyud): skye gnas pad+ma dbug byas na//nges par khams gsum dbang du 'gyur//thod pa dum bu cig pa 'am//mchog sdug cing mdzes pa lo//bsgrub bya'i gzugs
305a5(rgyud): ni rnam par bri//de nas bsgrub byani ming brjod de//daM duM ra ye shing nyid dang //ke ra bai ra khrag tu ni//yang dag sbyar gis sbyin sreg bya//gro ba kha~M na sgrub
305a6(rgyud): gzugs//rang khrag gi wang ba sres pas bri/bsgrung+ge bya gos kyis g.yogs nas ni//gsang sngags bzla zhing sbyin sreg bye//sngags kyi de rer bcos lus
305a7(rgyud): kyis/me tog re re rab bzung nas//nyi ma bdun du skyon sreg byas//gang zhig yid la 'dod pas 'gugs//de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya//tsan dan dam
305b1(rgyud): ba'i shing las ni//gzugs brnyan byas nas rang khrag dang //gi wang gis ni ming bris te//de bzhin bsgrub bya'i snying khar gzhug/tsha ba gsum gyis lus la byug/zangs mtha
305b2(rgyud): khabs kyis dbug bya ba//snying kho lte ba gsang ba ste//bsgrub bya'i gnas gsum du ni dbug/gang zhog yid la 'dod pa de//mtshan phyed na ni 'gugs par 'gyur//gas
305b3(rgyud): mdog can gyi brtsag gis skye gnas kyi mtshan ma mngon par bris la de'i steng du lag pa g.yon pas bka' nas brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya ste/gang gi ming nas brjodade
305b4(rgyud): sngags bzlas na skad cig dri nyid la 'ong bar 'gyuraro//chub mas khyer ba'i shing lo blangs pa khwa'i sgo rtsa dang mchims bsgrub bya'i ming bris te//rgyun du langs pa'i chu
305b5(rgyud): me la skur na de'i mod la skrod par 'gyuraro//spri'u'i rus pa la sor drug pa'i phur pa byas te/sngags lan bdun mngon par bzlas nas gang gi sgor smras pa de'i rigs
305b6(rgyud): rgyud chad par 'gyur//ba ling dang glang po dang /rti dang tong bu dang /rnga mo dang /mA ho gnas rnams sgrasan+na de dag brlag par 'gyuraro//yi dwags kyi gos mi ltung
305b7(rgyud): blangs la mar khru chen po dang lhan cig zhi nye'i snod du sbyar te/mar ngo'i bcu bzhi'i yis khyad par mo/snying po'i sngags bzlas zhing /mig sman dbab pa byas la
306a1(rgyud): na/mig+na la thugs pa des mkha 'grom thams cad mthong bar 'gyur//oM b+hU tA la~M ga~M swAH/mo dpal byab pa'i sdug so//glang d+ha cha'i sgra ba thu/
306a2(rgyud): te//rus sbrul gyi khyog pa'i nang du bzhag la khyim du 'dug par byin nA 'dis ni 'dri shig la stsogs pa yid nges par rab tu zhi bar 'gyur//oM u da ke ma sha
306a3(rgyud): t+tha/ dAk+Sha saM b+hASh+Ta/dr-i sh+nu bak+Sh+yayi da gauD+ha ti mad+hA ba la/ma shr-i ka ai drab+d+ha shA daM Da ai dra ba shaM ga r+b+ha gar+m+ma n+ti/s+thAn+ta oM d+b+ha yA swAH/
306a4(rgyud): bzhi mdo'i rdo'i dum bu blangs//'di yis len ni nyi shu bzlas//phyogs bzhi ru ni gzhug par bya/sbrang bu mchu rings bzlog byas pos//yid can
306a5(rgyud): nams ni bde bar 'gyur//byede bas chos ni thob 'gyur te//chos kyis kyang ni bla med 'gyur//'di ni sbyin sgeg gi cho ga rim por phye ba ste nyi shu rdza brgya
306a6(rgyud): de ni s+yA dzA dz+nyAzhin dus//ma pa yang+ga dag ra shad/skem pa dngas myed 'dzi rten te//dngas med sras dang dul bya na/
306a7(rgyud): rang rin midag nyid na rgyalas//zlum pa'i'i rlom du med pa'o//gcig dang dum rnams bral 'dra//slad cig/de nyid rab tu skye/ye shes 'drin
306b1(rgyud): pa//ngag gi spyod yul las 'das shing //kun mkhyen ye shes de yi dngos//rmad du byung ba'i rnam par skyes//srid pa thams cad dngos mdo mnyam//yangs shing gting dpag dka'
306b2(rgyud): byab ste//rgyu dang rnam par bral ba ni//lhan cig skyes pa'i snang brnyan tsam//rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsol ba//rnam par spyad pa'i spyod yul 'das//kha na ma tho med cing zhe//
306b3(rgyud): nges par bskul du med pa ste//brjod du med cing pograng du med//stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa ni//dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gnas//sgra sogs yon tan kun rnam bral//sgra la sogs
306b4(rgyud): pa'i yon tan bral//gnyis pa las ni rnam grol ba//rnam pa kun tu cir yang gnas//dngos med dngos po la rten nas//brten pa med par dngos por bya//yid med yid
306b5(rgyud): ni byas na su//cung zad tsam yang mi byas mo//sten la gnas nas bla ma yi//brgyad par brtan par byas nas ni//de bzhin mkha' dang mtshungs pa yi//ro gcig sems ni
306b6(rgyud): bsgom par bya//bsam gtan gsum las rnam par grol//rtag ge'i sbyor ba rnam par spangs//sems byung sem su brtan gyur pa//'gro la'ang rang bzhin tshul de bzhin/
306b7(rgyud): mkha' mtshungs na mkhar yang dag gnas//shel gyi nor bu dag pa bzhin//thog pa tha ma med pa'i gzugs//sgrol bral dbang po'i spyod yul min//'gyur pa med
307a1(rgyud): cing snang ba med//thams cad stong pa nyon mongs med//'gro ba'i sgron mu srid pa yi//'ching ba 'joms shing tshig brjod bral//yid kyi'ang smad
307a2(rgyud): yul ma yin te//gnyis lis rnam grol nyon mongs med//don dam grol ba rab stsol ba'i//'phro med de nyid la phyag 'tshal//ji ltar de nyid la reg na//bsam
307a3(rgyud): kun gyis bsam du med//gang tshe bsam du med sems dpa'//de tshe bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur//sems can ji bzhin bsam med de//bsam med ji bzhin
307a4(rgyud): rgyal ba'ab de//gang phyir bsam bral sangs rgyas kyis//bsam pa 'di ni rab tu bshad//bsam gyis mi khyab sems de la//bsam pa kun gyis bgrod pas 'das//
307a5(rgyud): sna tshogs rtogs pa'i rtog pa med//chags med bde ba chen po ste//rnam pa thams cad kyi ni mchog/dbang po kun 'das rnam pa med//dngos dang dngos med bdag
307a6(rgyud): nyid te//dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs//bems po min phyir bdag nyid rig/mi shes rnam par mi mthong ngo //gzugs med gang yang mi gnas pa//'gyur
307a7(rgyud): ba med cing bstan pa'o//dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la//blang dang dor ba ga la zhig/blang bya dang ni dor bya yi//chos kun rmi lam ji bzhi no//dga' ba yongasu
307b1(rgyud): sa pa las//shes ra pha ral sbyin pa mchog/dga' bya'i 'bras sbrul gnas pa/'dun dngas mad byung chu /nyis shAr rA gtsug dbyor myed pa//dka' ba'i 'ang
307b2(rgyud): chen pa nyid//shes rab snying rje'i hU~M ba ni//smyon ma dang ni 'od zer bzhin//'di gnyis mi byed bdag nyid ni//gcig dngos po'i sems yin//shes rab thangs ni
307b3(rgyud): mnyam sbyor bas//rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub byed po//de nyid la ni bla med pa'i//sangs rgyas kun rnams rab tu bzhugs//dbyer med rnam par yang dag rig/gang zhig
307b4(rgyud): gnas rdo rje sems//ji srid rdzogs pa hU~M chung rgyur//bde bas sdom pa sa na ni//sgrung gi bde mchog rdzogs par du//de srid de ni myong bar 'gyur//mdzes
307b5(rgyud): pa'i sgyu m+b+ha rnam 'phrul dag la de shes ji bzhin nyid//dga' dang skyo ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rab tu spyad//'jigs par byed pa'ang med cing bde 'i 'byung ba'ang
307b6(rgyud): yod ma yin//de nyid kyis ni sgrub po de bzhin nyid bdag rjesu 'gro//e ma to bde chen 'dod pa yis//saM gsum po ni gang bAste//e ma ho zhi ba'i bde ba 'bag//sgra
307b7(rgyud): tshogs mngon par byang chub rgyas//e ma'i 'ang ba'i bde chen po/e ma 'o ji lta ji ltar bza'//e ma'o ston skyes bdag nyid chen//chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo nyid//
308a1(rgyud): 'gro ba chu'i zla ba bzhin du mthong ba dang //thos pa brag cha dang ni mtshungs par yang dag 'jug/sems kyang smig rgyu lta bur blta bya zhing //'di ltar
308a2(rgyud): bza' dang brdung ba na mkha' lta bu ste//dri ni na mkha' me tog mtshungs par mnam pa dang //yid ni nyi ma zla ba bzhin du khyab par bya//yang dag gnas de'ang ri rab dang ni
308a3(rgyud): mtshungs pa yin//gzhonu ma yi rmi lam de bzhin dmigs par bya//tha snyad dag ni sgyu ma mig 'phrul lta bur bgrang //'di dag ji bzhin lhan skyes bde 'byung de bzhin te//
308a4(rgyud): sred parang bzhin bral zhing bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs//rtag tu 'char ba bde gshegs lam mchog phyag 'tshal bstod//mchod pa thams cad yongs spangs te/
308a5(rgyud): bla ma mchod par yang dag brtsam//de mnyes pas ni kun mkhyen pa'i//ye shes mchog ni thob par 'gyur//bla med mdzad pa'i slob dpon ni//rdo rje sems dpa' ra
308a6(rgyud): mchod na//de yi bsod nams ma byas ci//dka' thub mo bsten ci zhig yod//'jigs dang sdig ma spangs pa dang //'di ni sangs rgyas bde 'byung ngo //byang chub
308a7(rgyud): gnas ni dpe med pa//gang zhig 'gro la rnam gnas pa//la lar ngas ni ma bshad//sor mnyam pa'i de nyid ni//rgyal ba yis ni gsungs pa yin//gnyis pa'i
308b1(rgyud): rnam pa las 'das gsal bar rig cing skal ba bzang //sna tshogs na mkha'i dkyil khyab ro ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i stobs/tha~Md sems kyi nang son sna tshogs rnam pa'i gzugs
308b2(rgyud): 'phro ba/'jig rten gsum phor na mkhar thim ltar yid la snang bar 'gyur//rnam kun gcig pa'i bde mchog gi/rang bzhin lhan cig skyes zhes brjod//rnam kun mchog/
308b3(rgyud): ldan mtshan nyid kyis//de nyid dkyil 'khor shes par bya//rtsa kun mkha' bro ma rnams te//skye mched yan lag dkyil 'khor yin//thams cad ro gcig thob pa
308b4(rgyud): yis/he ru ka dpal rang bzhin rgyas//snang ba med cing thogs pa med//gnas med lus la med pa ste//dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin phyir//dngos po kun la rtag tu
308b5(rgyud): gnas//rnal ma nyid du shes bya ste//gang la sgom pa'ang rnal ma nyid//ngo bo nyid kyis dga' byas pas//'di ni rang 'byung 'char ba'o//de bas bsam mi khyab bsam
308b6(rgyud): pas//sna tshogs gcig tu shes par bya//gang la dngos dang dngos med kyis//bye brag rnam spangs bdag nyid ni//dga' ba'i bdag nyid brtan gsal bas//na mkha'i/
308b7(rgyud): mtha' klas khyab par ni//bdag nyid chen pos rtogs par bya//rnam pa sna tshogs dri med pa'i//dkyil 'khor dag ni 'phro bar snang //lhan cig skyes dga' bzhi pa'i
309a1(rgyud): myong//dro ba kun+daHgnas de yon//yang dag de nyid rog pa la/'dor ni thabs med shes rab mod//stong pas dkyil 'khor dbusun/
309a2(rgyud): ges med mya ngan 'das pa'o//mdzes pa'i yon tan legs thob pa//ye shes ldan zhing brtson 'grus ldan//de nas bla ma'i skye bo la gus sangs rgyas dang rna
309a3(rgyud): mnyam palta zhing //rgya la ba'i chos ni shin tu rtogs shing brtan la legs par rab dang ba//de 'dir snod du gyur pa yin phyir de la bko' drin sbyin par bya//de nas
309a4(rgyud): gzugs sogs drubye med cing //khams gsum gcig tu shes pas na//rgyun mi 'chad par sgrub pa des//dga' bas kyang ni mched chen //ji srid byung
309a5(rgyud): chub tshigs ldan po//de srid dri ma med nyid 'gyur//sgrub po thabs dang shes rab dag/bla med 'bras bu thob par 'gyur//'di ni de kho na nyid bstan pa'i rim pa
309a6(rgyud): phyi ba ste nyi shu rtse dgu pa'o//de nas yang dag bai shad bya ba//ri mo'i lha'i gzugs rnams kyi//sku yi tshad kyi mtshan nyid ni//gsang ba paM yi bdag po
309a7(rgyud): nyon/tshangs pa'i ri mo sogs gzugs kyi//che snga yang ni gdan yin//dum bu gsum can sku lus kyis//cha mnyam pas ni zhal byas te//zhal ni bcu
309b1(rgyud): gac+doMs cha yin//mgrin pa sar ni bzhi pa ste//mkhas pas sku mtshams dbu dang nI//snyan gnyis la'ang de nyid sbyar//dpral ba zhal dang shangs kyi tshad//cha gsum zhal bya
309b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khar//smin ma'i dbus dang zhal gyi steng //spyan gyi zheng yang sor gnyis//de dag dkyus ni sor bzhi yi//tshad nyid du ni shes par bya//mgrin pa'i rtsa ba'i dbus
309b3(rgyud): kyi tshad//dpung pa gnyis kyi'ang cha yin//thams cad du ni thugs kha dang //lte ba'i gnas kyi tshad gcig go/nu ma'i bar gyi ched kyis ni//nu ma dpung pa'i bar gyi tshad//
309b4(rgyud): lag ngar gnyis kyi tshad kyis ni//dpung pa gnyis kyi'ang ched de nyid//brla dang byin pa'i mtsham su ni//sor bzhi pa dang yang dag ldan//pus mo'i lha nga sor bzhi'i tshad//
309b5(rgyud): zhabs kyi bol gyi'ang de nyid do//cha ni bcu gnyis tshad kyis ni//lha yi sku gzugs bri bar bya//lhag ma sor ni bzhi pa ste//gdan ni gtso bo'i brgyad cha yin//gdan gyi
309b6(rgyud): dgu cha nyid kyis ni//sor ni gnyis gnyis bya ba ste//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor snying por ni//phyag mtshan na bza' la sogs bya//zab mo rdo rje can gyi lha//cha ni bcu gnyis
309b7(rgyud): mtshan nyid//dman pa'i cha sogs cha rnams ni//nye bar mdzes bzhin legs par bri//der yang zhal gyi tshad mtshungs pa'i phyag gnyis cung zad bri bar bya//sor
310a1(rgyud): gnyis dor ba byas nas ni//zhi ba'i lha ni bri bar bya//der yang zhal ni mtho gang tshad//byas de phyag ni rtag mdzes bri//yan lag nyid lag thams cad
310a2(rgyud): la//sor ni gnyis gnyis dor ba byas//khro bo khro mo'i dbang phyug ma//bran po bran mo tsa bgyid dam//drag cing 'jigs pa'i gzugs rnams ni//cha bcu pAr ni
310a3(rgyud): rnam par bri//yid du 'ong ba'i rang gzugs ni//cha dgu par ni mngon par bri//dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i lha rnams ni//rim bzhin rim gyis sbyar bar bya//dbus kyi rdo rje/
310a4(rgyud): rgyal po ni//mtshan nyid gcig tu rnam par bri//kos kau mgrin pa byin pa rnams//gsum po ring na skyon chen po//sngags pa rang nyid nges par ni//gnas las nyams shing
310a5(rgyud): bskrad par 'gyur//shangs dang snyan dang phyag sor rnams//gsum po thung na skyon chen po//dngos grub nges par 'joms pa dang //de bzhin dpal yang nyams par
310a6(rgyud): 'gyur//byin pa zhal dang khur tshes te//gsum po sbom pa skyon chen po/sgrub po bdag nyid nges par yang //dpal las ring zhing bdud bgegs 'byung //'gram pa brang
310a7(rgyud): dang rtsibs logs te//gsum po zhom na skyon chen po//don ni nyams par 'gyur ba dang //'dir ni bgegs 'byung the tsom med//nu ma snyan dang dpral ba rnams//
310b1(rgyud): gsum po yon skyon chen po//sgrub pa po nyid myur bar ni//dgra yi rtsod pas gdung bar 'gyur//bla dang dku dang nam tshod gnyis//gsum po nyams na skyon chen po//chom rkun rnams//
310b2(rgyud): kyis 'jigs pa dang //'chi bar 'gyur bar the tsam med//snyan dang mchu dang dal ba dang //shangs nyams spyan ni yo dUr na//sngags pa bdag nyid nges par yang //sna tshogs
310b3(rgyud): bgegs 'byung 'chi bar 'gyur//gyen du gzigs shing dbugs bskyod tshul//gdan las yi zhing bskyod lta bus//rang gi gnas las rtag 'phro zhing //don rnams 'joms
310b4(rgyud): pa nyid du 'gyur//mgrin pa nam tshong la sogs sku'i//skyon ni grangs mod zhig tu brags//'dir ni spyan tshigs yo ba 'am//phyag rgya phyag mtshan nor gyur na//mya
310b5(rgyud): ngan sdug bsngal gyis rab gdung //sna tshogs skyon sogs brtag par bya//rgyab yol gdugs dang gaudan rnams te//gsum po chung zhing dog pa'i skyon//mdza' bos
310b6(rgyud): mi sbyin brjod pa dang //dang la nyams 'chi bor 'gyur ba yin//skyon no 'di dag skyon chen pos//mkhas pas legs par blta bar bya//dul zhing bzo rnams kun
310b7(rgyud): shes la ke cho ga mthang zhing mnyam bzhag pas//mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs shing //gzugs mdzes pas ni bri bar bya//shing la zhi nga'i tshul gyi rgyu/
311a1(rgyud): drag la drag cing 'jigs byed pa//dpa' la dpa' zhing nga rgyal sku//sgeg pa la ni bzhad pa'i zhal//mtshan nyid 'di ltar mtshon nas ni//sngags pa
311a2(rgyud): rnams kyis bris sku bri//sngags pa lngas ni dang po bas//gzugs brnyan la sogs bya ba ste//bris sku bsgrub na myur bar ni//dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur//'di ni
311a3(rgyud): ri mo la sogs pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu'o////de nas rnal 'byor ma'i mtshan nyid//dge ba yang dag rab bshad bya//
311a4(rgyud): mkha' gro ma ni pad+ma ni//lA ma ha sti ni nyid 'gyur//khaN+Da ro ha shang ki ni/gzugs can tsi tri ni nyid 'gyur//rigs ni bzhi po rang dngo su//mkhas pa yis ni brtag par
311a5(rgyud): bya//pad+me ni yi mtshan nyid bshad//bzhin ni dkyil 'khor lta bu ste//sna ni til gyi me tog mtshungs//sen mo zangs 'dra rus sbal rgyab//rkang pa'i mthil ni mnyam
311a6(rgyud): par gnas//nu ma ta la'i 'bras bu bzhin//de bzhin ba spu khyil ba dang //khrem gnyer gsum can skye gnas mchog/de yi brang yang shin tu mdzes//glang chen+da//
311a7(rgyud): myos pa lta bu'i 'gros//pad+ma'i dri ldan ngang pa'i dbyangs//reg bya pad+ma lta bu ste//pad+ma'i bcing ba 'dod bsten bya//skra dang nu ma nas bzung nas//mchu ni so yis gci
311b1(rgyud): b.rak+Sha//b+ha gar sor mo gzhug de ltar//pad+ma la ni 'dod par bya//de nas has+t+ri na'i mtshan nyid//de bzhin yang dag bshad par bya//chang gi dri can byin pa sbom//sna yon+da bA sU
311b2(rgyud): 'khyil bu yang //'dod pas myos shing srid pa dang //lus ni sbom zhing mi srun pa//u ra spo ta'i bcing ba yis//de la rol par bya ba ste//ril bu'i rnam pri ha sti ni//mgor
311b3(rgyud): ni ser mos bstan bya zhing //drag tu 'khyud cing nu ma mnye//kha la reg cing sos gdaba' bya//mkhas pas srin mos drang bar bya//bzhad kyi nga ro hAsti ni//glu dang rol mo//
311b4(rgyud): mngon par dga'//mtshan nyid 'di dag yang dag ldan//ha sti nir ni shes par bya//shang ki ni yang bshad bya ste//skra ring sna yang ring ba ste//ha cang skem min sbom pa min//
311b5(rgyud): nu mra na rang ka'i 'bras mtshungs//zho dang 'o ma'i ston mar dga'//lag po g.yon pas ska nas ni//bzung bas dga' ba skyes bya zhing //so yi mchu ni btsir bar bya/
311b6(rgyud): shin tu dga' bas drag par ni//gzhi pa dang snying kar sen mos byung //bong bu yi ni dri ldan dang //ba lang lce ltar rtsub pa ste//bya rog sgra can shang ki ni mtshan nyid
311b7(rgyud): 'di dag yang dag ldan//rtag tu shang ki ni zhes bshad//de nas tsi tri ni yang bshad//lus thung de yi brang rnams mdzes//nu ma dpal 'bras lta bu ste//shin tu
312a1(rgyud): khro zhing ngo che spangs//rtag tu rtsod pa la dga' zhing //byin pa phra zhing gan tshul nyal//mchu 'phyangs phrag ron gyi ni skad//sha yi dro dang ldan pa dang //
312a2(rgyud): dpung pa rgyas pa tsi tri ni//dga' bas rol pa bshad bya ste//thog mar lag pas b+ha ga btsir//'o bya nu ma mnye ba dang //mgo la sor mos bsnun bya zhing //lus ni
312a3(rgyud): bskum pas dga' ba dang //drag pa nyid du 'khyud par bya//mchu ni 'jim tu gzhug par bya/sdeb sbyor tshigs bcad las bshad pa'i//mtshan nyid 'di dag yang dag
312a4(rgyud): ldan//tsi tri ni ti gzugs can 'gyur//de nas gzhan yang 'pho ba yi//dbye ba'i mtshan nyid yang dag bshad//phyi yi 'pho ba rags pa ste//nang gi bdag nyid
312a5(rgyud): phra bar bshad//spyi bor bde chen 'khor lo ste//pad+ma mdab ma bzhi pa ni//phra ba byang chub sems kyi gnas//thams cad brten pa'i gzugs yin pas//
312a6(rgyud): byang chub snying pa'i dri bo nyid//sa bon gyur pa'i pha rol tu//pad+ma mdab ma sum cu gnyis//de yi dbus kyi yi ge ha//'og tu bltas pa bde ba 'dzag/byang chub
312a7(rgyud): sems bdag zla ba ni//cha ni bco lnga'i bdag nyid can//rtag tu bde ba chen por 'bab//rnal 'byor ma ni cha bcu drug/de yi logs ni gnyis po ru//l-i la nAM
312b1(rgyud): dang ra sa n+ta//A li ka li rang gi dngos//rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis//dga' ba bzhi yo gzugs can ma//lhan cig spos dga'i rang bzhin dang //gnyis med mchog
312b2(rgyud): dbang phyug ma//kun rngub kun de m+b+ha bu ste//daM na dam brda ba'i gzug sa can mA//sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi//na du rdo rje 'dzin pa'i//mgrin par 'a phyung
312b3(rgyud): 'khor lo ste//dmar po mad dam bcu drug pa//de yis dbusu yi ge oM//nga yi skyeng gi sne'u chung gi/bu ga'i lam nas bdud rtsi ni//rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab pa yin//
312b4(rgyud): snying kar chos kyi 'khor lo ste//sna tshogs pad+ma mdab ma brgyad//de yi dbus yi ge hU~M/'og tu bltas pas gnas pa ste//de'i steng phra ba'i pad+ma ni//tshangs pa'i gnas kyi
312b5(rgyud): rnam pa 'dra//de yid dbus kyi rnami shes ni//rtag tu 'char ba thams cad khyab//rang 'byung ye shes kyi ni rten//rnam shes mchog gi dbang phyug/lte bar bad+ma mdag sbyin
312b6(rgyud): gi//mang pe ma drug r+b+ha bzhi pa//de yi dbus kye+e yi gu ye//nor bu bzhin du 'byur ba yin//de 'ag+sa brnyan//mdud pa'i phanas zhag pA~M rAH/snod 'i
312b7(rgyud): bdun du rtsa gnyis kyi//rnyan dang rtsi bar brjod pa yin//shes ri pa zhin la san+tu//thathes nai ra~M sanA tsu ga nas//de dag dbu sa sani lha ma//ma yig
313a1(rgyud): tshogs gzugs can na//sgyu mo sgra bzhi'i bdag nyid can//dos snang thams cad rang stsol ma//kAn+d+hal du tshun rab stsol la//nag tu 'ang dag
313a2(rgyud): bdag byug 'tsha//dngos po gling dang glang gis ni//mi rnams yid ni yang dag sbyor//des de'i bdag nyid 'gyur sgyu mo//sna tshogs gzugs can no buM bzhin//nas
313a3(rgyud): rab mi yis bskyod pas yul gyi dngos po rnam par dbyung ni rgyun dang bral//gtum myi 'bar zhing rnam par 'phra bas dri med nyid yang dag rig ba gsal//phung po'i rnam
313a4(rgyud): bar NAg+sa pA bAsuMmasu shing du migs pa med pa'i rang rig 'jig pa dang //dngos po thams cad ma ma nyid 'dadu nA m+b+ha pa khyang byed yang dag glo 'phang ldan//nas
313a5(rgyud): bskrun yang thig le'i gzugs//'gro ba yang dag bshad par bya//yar de'i ches gcig nas bzung nas/ si n+ti ma'i bor du ste/ra ngo yi chis gsal//
313a6(rgyud): song me yi ge sa//tshwaste gnyis byin par yi ge s+yA//chos gsum brtu la yi ba oM//bzla pa skyes gnas yi ga s+t+waM//lnga ba smr-i dUr yi ge sa//drug pa snying
313a7(rgyud): gaM ya//bdun pa nu mar yi ge ri//brgyad pa mgrin par yi ge rI//dgu pa lag mthil yi ge lo//bcu pa mkhur tshes ye gau l-I//bcu gcig mig tu yi ge me/
313b1(rgyud): 'bu ga r+b+has sna Tar yo ba a//bcu gsum dpral bA ra yo ga yo//bcu bzhi mchog mar yo ga o//nyal spyi gtsug g.yas g.yon du//yi bo oM AHngo bo nyid//mar po
313b2(rgyud): chos gcig nas bzung ste//ji srid gnam stong gi ni bar//de nyid kyis ni 'pho bar 'gyur//g.yon par oM li zla ba ste//phra ba yi ni rang bzhin nyid//g.yas par ka la'i
313b3(rgyud): nyi ma ste//rags pa yi ni rang bzhin//byang chub sems bdag dbye ba yis//de bzhin 'pho ba bcu drug yin//thun byed kun spyod dbye ba yis//'pho ba bcu drug dag tu
313b4(rgyud): bshad//zla ba 'dzin dang nyi ma 'dzin//thig le 'grog dang na mkha' 'gog/'di dag dang ni yang dag ldan//'pho bo bcu drug shes par bya//rnam par mi rtog bde ba che//
313b5(rgyud): mngon 'dod ye shes kyu na gzug/'dri ni dga' zhing bde ba'i khyim//sgo'i them skas dang mtshungs pa'o//'di ni rnal 'byor ma bzhi dang //'khor lo ba'i yi rim pa da
313b6(rgyud): rlung chu kyi sems 'pho ba bstan pa'i rim par phye bas so gcog pa//de nas gtar ma'i de nyid ni//dri bzhin gsal bar rab tu bshad//dkyil 'byor
313b7(rgyud): sbyin sreg bzlas pa dang //rab gnas dang ni zhi rgyas dang //dbang dang smad dang bsad pa dang //'byung po gnod sbyin mo sgrub dang //gnas kyis sgrub pa'i dus dag ste/
314a1(rgyud): /las rnams kun la mchog yin//chang dang gtor mu mod par no//las rnams myur du 'grub mi 'gyur//des na gtor ma rab bsngags te//sngon gyi/
314a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyisaM gsungs//dang por bde mchog phyag gnyis pa'i//lha yi rnam pa'i rnal 'byor ldan//srung ba gnyis kyis yang dgra bsrungs//hUM gi sgra ni bsgrags//
314a3(rgyud): par bya//nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i gnas kyis ni//lus kyi yan lag brgyan par bya//skad cig rnam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis//skad cig gis ni gsang sngags brjod//drang
314a4(rgyud): por r-i shig bza' ba dang //btung ba dang /stan mo la sogs pa mdun du yang dag par gzhag la rnam par sbyangs bya ste/de la mdun du yi ge ye las rlung gi
314a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor de'i steng du yi ge raM las byung bri ma'i dkyil 'khor/der yi gr-i a dkar po las byung ba'i pad+ma'i snod thod pa gsum gyi sgyid bu la gnas pa/dri'i dbus
314a6(rgyud): kyi bza' ba la sogs po rnams la/oM aM traM khaM hUM/lAM mAM pAM twe gi yi ge las byung ba'i bdud rtsi lnga dang /sgron ma lnga'i gzugs rdzogs par byin gyis brlabra/
314a7(rgyud): la//rlung gis bskyod pas me rab tu sbar te/bskal bas sa bon gyi yi ge la sogs pa zhu ste/nyi ma shar ka lta bu'i bcud kyi gzugasu bltas la/de'i steng du
314b1(rgyud): dngul chu'i mdog can gyi hUM las byung ba'i kha T+wA~M ga dkar po bdud rtsi'o rang bzhin can thur du bltas pa rnam pad+ma byasams te/da bcud kyi rang bzhin du ro gcig par gyur
314b2(rgyud): par brdzes la//A li ka li yongasu gyur pa las oM A hUM gi yi ge rtseg mar yang suM gnas pa ste//de dag las dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i lha rnam spros la//'gro
314b3(rgyud): ba'i don byas te/mnyam par sbyor ba sngon du 'gro bas zhu bar gyur cing je lta ba'i sa ngan la rab tu bcug ste//yi ge gsum ce 'dod par brjod par byin gyis brlabs par
314b4(rgyud): bya'o//mdzub mo mdud byas gung mo nges par sbyar//mthe bong rdo rje brtan par rab tu sbyar//de ni dpral ba'i dbus rab bzhug nas//bskor zhing bskor bas kun tu bskor ba
314b5(rgyud): bya//rkang pa mnan cing steng du blta//gyen du phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing //phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i//dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams 'gugs//de nas
314b6(rgyud): yang lag pa g.yas pa dang g.yon pa skor ba byas te/saM ma ya s+t+waM/sa ma ya hA sa m+me ya ho//zhes pa ldan gri sum brjod cing //g.yas dang g.yon du bskor zhingar
314b7(rgyud): bas//mchod bya dang mchod kyidabye ba med cing shin tu gromache sngon du 'gro ba yis//mkha' gro ma'i dra ba'i bde ba'i dam pas lha rnams la mchad par byas te//shar du/
315a1(rgyud): in+d+ra sa pa ri bA ra A kaR+Sha ya dza//lhor ya ma sa pa ri bA ra U kaR+Sha ya dza//nub tu ba ru Na sa pa ri bA ro A kaR+Sha ya dza//byung du ku be ra sa pa ri bA raM//
315a2(rgyud): A kaR+Sha ye dza//dbang ldanaM du ma hA b+hU ta sa pa ri bA raM A kaR+Sha ya dza//mer ag+ni sa pe ri bA re//A kaR+Sha ya dzaHbden bral du rAk+Sha sa sa pa ri bA ro a kaR+Sha ya
315a3(rgyud): rlung du yu bA saM pa ri bA rai A kaR+Sha ya dzaHsteng du tsan+d+ra sUr+ya brah+ma U d+haM de ba tA saM pa ri bA raM A kaR+Sha ya dz+r-iHsa 'og tu baM ma tsai tr-i pre thi bI de ba trA sa pa ri bA raM A kaR+Sha
315a4(rgyud): ya dzaHdzaHhUM baM hoHsai tri p+te sarbe de ba tA s+yAd+b+ha ka s+ya shAn+tiM ku ru/puSh+TiM ku ruM/sarba kAR+Ya tu sit+tid+d+hit+te ba ti/ya thA su khaM mu khre/oM ka ra ka re/ku ruM ku ru/ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/
315a5(rgyud): sa ya tA sa ya/k+Sho b+ha ya/k+Sho b+ha ya/hr-i hr-i/hra hraHphi pheM/phuT pheT/da ha da ha/paM tsa pa ts+ra/b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ba su ra d+hi rA aM tra mA lA ba laM bai nai gr-ih+Na grih+na sap+taM prA tA/
315a6(rgyud): la ga taM b+hU dzaM gA stiR+YA b+hU tAr+N+Na yaM tAr+N+Na ya/A kaD+D+h+ya A kaD+D+h+ya/hI tAM/dz+r-Idz+dzi/k+ShI k+tAM/hAM tAM/hI hI hU~M d+h+waM/kI li kr-i li/si l-i sr-i l+r-i/hI li he lI/d+h+r-i l-i d+hi ri/
315a7(rgyud): phaT/zhes bya ba 'di lan cig brjod pas bcom ldan 'das shes rab dang rtsis pa dang /mkha' bre mo la sogs pa nas gshin rje 'joms ma'i mthar thug
315b1(rgyud): rim bzhin du bskor byas te/oM A rap+l-i hU~M dzaHhUM ba ho badz+ra DA ki ni sa ma ya s+t+waM dri shA to//zhes bya ba 'dis lan gcig gam gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi 'am ltar brjod de dngul
315b2(rgyud): bar bya'o//de nas nyo reg dang so N+Di la sogs pa phyug tu phul la pad+ma'i lag bskor sngon du 'gro bas yang dag par mched de bstod nas/srid dang zhi ba mnyami pas chags pa
315b3(rgyud): bcom zhing yang dag rtog pa 'joms//khyed kyis dngos po thams cad mkha' dang mnyam pa'i bdag nyid gzigs par ldan//mgon po thugs rje'i chu yi ljid kyis brlan/
315b4(rgyud): par 'gyur ba'i thugs kyi chus//bdag la mdzod cig lha mo rnams kyis shin tu rjes brtser mdzad du gsol//zhes bya ba 'dis dngos grub blang bar bya'o//de nas dur khrod
315b5(rgyud): brgyad kyis phyogs skyong la stsogs pa rnams la sngon bzhin bskor bur byas te//oM kha khA khyA hI khA hi/sarba yak+Sha/nA~Mk+Sha sa~M/d+hUta/pra tA/bi shU tso/Un+ma da/A pam+WAr
315b6(rgyud): DA ka DA ki n+yo yaHi maM ba li gr-ih+na tu/sa ma ya rak+Sha tu/sarba sid d+him+me pra yAts+tshana?/ya thai baM/ya theSh+TaM/b+huny+dza tha/dzaM g+h+na \u0f89\u0fa4\u0f7f/mA ti kra ma the/ma ma sairba kar+yaM sa?
315b7(rgyud): su kham bi shud+d+ha ye/sahA yai kaM b+ha baM tu huM hUM phaT phaT swA hA//rkang pi brgyad kyi sngags kyis yang dge par bstod la mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub bslang bar bya zhing
316a1(rgyud): brda'i lag pas brda bstan par bya ste/oM yo ga shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+ho/zhes bya ba brjod cing /pad+ma bskor ba'i phyag rgyas mnyes par bya'o//
316a2(rgyud): nye bar bsdu ba'i phyag rgya mi phyed par 'khyud pa sngon du 'gro bas mthe bong dang srin lag saM gol brdab par bya ste/oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad//rje su 'thun par
316a3(rgyud): dngos grub stsol//sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //ji ltar bde bar bzhugasu gsol//oM badz+ra muHzhes parjod pas gshegasu gsol bar bya'o//dkyil
316a4(rgyud): 'khor ba'i lha rnams thams cad bdag nyid la gzhug par bya'o//de'i rjes la lhag ma'i gtor ma bsdus pas dam tshig bsgrub pa bstan par bya ste/kha ni myos
316a5(rgyud): byed kyis bkang nas//'byar ba'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya//hU~M gI sgra ni drag po yis lhag ma'i snod du sbyin par bya//me tog spos la sogs byin pas/mnyes byas
316a6(rgyud): sngags ni brjod par+ra bya/oM sarba khaM kha khA hi khA hi/uts+tshi b+hU baM li/uts+tshib+d+ha b+ha kle b+h+yA swA hA/snying rje laM sogs nyams ldan pas/de bzhin bkra shis glu blang bya//
316a7(rgyud): rnam kun don ni yongs dag cing //rnam pa med pa'i bde bo che//sgrub pa shes rab thabs bdag nyid//las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//'byor ni nyi ma
316b1(rgyud): /da bzhin zla bya ma la rar na//rdog pa pa'i byang chub sems kyi gnas//de gzhon spyod du yang su //smyon pa la sogs thams cad kyis no 'gro ba yang sa/
316b2(rgyud): 'dod pa mchog ni kun rdzogs mdzad//he ru ka dngal ma/ 'gro ma sogs rnam rtog gti mug grong khyer thams cad phyi mer 'dug/gang zhig 'khor lo rab tu bsgo
316b3(rgyud): ba zlu ma rgyal ba'i ye shes 'byung gan ste m+b+ha thAr sbyin mdzad/don hU~Mng nunga'i dbang gyu 'phags pa rna pa N+Di rtag tu myuram yin//'di ni gar mi
316b4(rgyud): sbyichud pa bstan pa rnam par byu ba~Ms sa ga sa pa/nas ye shes 'ab+h+ri b+hU y-i//ngas zla zlum shad par \u0f7f//skye chags nas zangs rnams na/
316b5(rgyud): dngos grub rnams kyi rgyu yi mchog/phyi dang nang du bcas pa'i lus//na mkha' lta bur dri ma med//'di ltar bdag nyid mkha' mtshungs par//rtag tu grol ba'i bdag
316b6(rgyud): nyid mthong //lus med thog ma thu ma med//bden pa dang ni ldan pa nyid//dam tshig spyod pa srung byed pa//de la rim pa rab bstan bya//he ru ka dpal mngon brjod
316b7(rgyud): rgyud//klog gis 'chang ngam bris pas ni//dngas grub rje 'phrul rnaM/bzang dag//byang chub sems dpa'ang thob par 'gyur//dpa' bo kun dang ma
317a1(rgyud): sbyor ba'o//mkha' gro ma yi dra ba sdom//dpal sdom 'byung ba'i rgyud la ni//gang tshe sgom zhing sems byed na//long spyod che zhing bde ba che//dbul
317a2(rgyud): ba'i sdug bsngal 'joms par 'gyur//mos pa du ma'i sems can la//spyod pa sna tshogs ston mdzad de//sna tshogs tshul gyis 'dul ba tshe//thabs kyang yang dag
317a3(rgyud): bstan pa yin//zab mo'i chos ni bstan pa la//gang zhig mos par ma gyur kyang //smad pa dag tu mi bya ste//stong nyid snying rje mi phyed pa'i//chos nyid thams cad bsam
317a4(rgyud): mi khyab//sangs rgyas rol pa bsam mi khyab//mkha' gro ma yi tshogs brten pa'i/he ru ka dpal yang dag sbyor//sems can mos pas 'jug pa rnams//de dag
317a5(rgyud): kun la dga' ba ste//mkha' gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i//he ru ka dpal go 'phang gnas//'di ni rim par phye ba ste so gsum pa'o////dpal he ru ka mngon
317a6(rgyud): par brjod pa'i rgyud chen po 'bum phrag gsum pa las lhan cig skyes pa 'byung ba'i rtogs pa las btus pa//rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi gsang ba bklags
317a7(rgyud): pas 'grub pa//dpal sdom pa 'byung ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzog so////shes rab dman zhing sbyangs pa chung mod kyi//rgyud kyi gzhung la dad pa brten
317b1(rgyud): skyes pas//rang don tsam du bsgyur ba gang lags pa/'phags dang mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod pa mdzod//rgya gar gyi mkhan po gzhan la phan pa mtha' yas dang /bod kyi lo myang
317b2(rgyud): rgyus bran de smon lam grags kyis bsgyur zhing zhus te/gtan la phab pa'o////rgya gar skad du/shrI badz+ra DA ka nA ma mahA tan+t+ra rU dzA/bode skad du/
317b3(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha 'gro zhes bya ba/bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug le phyag 'tshalo//mkha'agro kun
317b4(rgyud): dngos sems dpa' ni//rdo rje mkha'agro bde ba'i mchog/gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na//thams cad 'dog nyid rtag tu bzhugs//'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das//
317b5(rgyud): lhag pa yi ni lha gsal nyid//'byung glenas sgra tshul nges 'byung rnams//dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul yin//'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba//thog ma dbus mthar
317b6(rgyud): yang dag gnas//'dod chags ma yin chags bral min//dbu mar yang ni mi dmigaso//bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgyu//'di ni gnyis me ye shes mchog /nyid dang /
317b7(rgyud): bde ba kun mos pas//ngan par spyod pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur//na mkha' kun tu rgyu grub pas//mkha' grom zhes rab tu grags//sna tshogs kun tu phyag rgya ni//sna
318a1(rgyud): kun gyis sdom pa yis//mkha' blo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba//rdo rje mkha' gro zhes byar grub//de nyid med sems rnal 'byor pa//lha la dmigs par byed
318a2(rgyud): pa dang //kun tu gzugs brnyan yid kyis ni//lugs sogs rnal 'byor skyo ba min//byang chub sems tshan rnal 'byor gang //rnal 'byor dbang phyug rang nyid gtso//
318a3(rgyud): byang chub sems 'di rdo rje ste//sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin//'gro bI'o rtsa lag rang bzhin gyis//sna tshogs g.yogs te rnam bzhugs pas//de phyir 'byud pa
318a4(rgyud): thams cad kyis//sna tshogs tshul gyi mchod par bya//bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dang //dpa'i bo thams cad bdag yin te//rang gi lha yi sbyor ba
318a5(rgyud): yis//bdag nyid rab tu bsgrub par bya//'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang //dpa' bo thams cad nyid dang ni//rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du//tshe 'od nyid du 'grub
318a6(rgyud): 'gyur zhes//mkha' gr-i kun dang mnyam sbyor du'i//rdo rje mkha 'gro bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje sems dpa' dri bzhin gshegs//dpal ldan bcom ldan 'das kyis
318a7(rgyud): gsungs//de thams cad ni mkha'i mtshan nyid//na mkha' la ni mtshan nyid med//khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa'i//'gro kun sgyu ma lta bu yin//brtan pa
318b1(rgyud): dang ni g.yo bo yi//'gro ba dmigasu med pa ste//mthong ba dang ni reg pa'i dngas//thams cad sgyu ma ji bzhi no//gang gis blun po 'ching 'gyur ba//'dir des mkhas rnams
318b2(rgyud): rnam par grol//phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni//sa gsum ma lus bza' bar bya//gzhan du gal te sbyor ba ni//ma tshang mar me lta bur 'da'//gzugs ni sbyangs
318b3(rgyud): rgyas rnam snang mdzad//tshor ba rdo rje nyi ma yin//'du shes pad+ma gar dbang ste//'du byed rdo rje rgyal po yin//rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' ste//'di dag dngos kun
318b4(rgyud): rang bzhi no//rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes byar grags//yang dag chen po gcig pu'i lha//bde ba thams cad rab ster ba//sgyu ma chen po'i rang bzhin gyis//chags bral
318b5(rgyud): chags pa zhes byar bshad//sa khams ltung byed ma yin te//de bzhin chu khams gsod ma'o//me khams 'gugs byed ma yin te//de bzhin rlung ni gar dbang ngo //
318b6(rgyud): na mkha'i khams ni sgyu mche//rang nyid 'gro ma zhes byar bshad//sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba//mkha' gro ma ni 'bar bi'i mchog/'byung ba lnga yi rang
318b7(rgyud): bzhin gyis//de ni rdo rje gtso mor gnas//mig gnyis gti mug rdo rjer bshad//nyan pa zhe sdang rdo rjer brjod//sna na ser sna rdo rje ste//kho na 'dod chags rdo rje
319a1(rgyud): glusas//skrun smya ///smyo sas dus m+b+ha d+hA//dzA / //gtsug su d+mo rnams cad /
319a2(rgyud): /spyong ba'i tshul gyis mig gas s+ho//dgas me tha~Mng / 'i rgyus gyis sa gas ni//de ni
319a3(rgyud): cad nas 'i dngos//dgus pa med pa'i sgom+b+ha par ldan//rnam par mi rtog skyel/re zhes//rdo rje sems da de bzhin ga shegs//bcom ldan rje rgyun gyis
319a4(rgyud): gsungs//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zlums gas pa myed cing na myi te bde ba chen brnyi ma tshig ce sa bya ba'i rim de'i
319a5(rgyud): la snyoms phyur zhug se na sna di rmAn rjes gsung sa//ji srid 'khang gnas ni//mi chog 'a bA b+hair ba'i byung//de spyod sems can ma rgyangs
319a6(rgyud): med don//mya ngan mi 'dar bar ni mdzod//de ltar sems can dam pa rnams//srid pa'i zhags pas 'jigs med par//mi skyo bar ni brjon 'grus kyis//
319a7(rgyud): rtag tu sems can don rnams mdzad//na mkha'i gnas kyi mthang thug par//smon lam rnam par spyod byed cing //sems can den brtson sems kyis ni//
319b1(rgyud): da' bo srid pa spyong bar mdzad//rtag tu 'dod pas myo pa yi//l+h+wam+bI bu 'di rnams dang no//gzhan yang skye bo chags can phyir//'dod chags thams cad dag par mdzad//
319b2(rgyud): chen shin tu grub bya'i phyir//rtog pa rgyas par sbyin pa dang //thobra ma tha myi med pa'i mchog/rtog pa thams cad dang por bshad//'das pa'i dus ni sngon byung ba
319b3(rgyud): rtog pa dang po bde bi tsho//der ni rdo rje sems chen g+ho//lhag pa yi ni lha gcig bzhugs//'jig rten khams rnams mtha' yas kyi//sems can kun don 'byung
319b4(rgyud): 'i phyir//glu dang rol mo sogs pa'i gar//srid pa kun gyi gtso bor gyur//sems can thams cad 'byung ba yi//dga' ba yang dag bsdus pa dang //de nas sems
319b5(rgyud): n+dan skyo 'gyur ba'i//'dod pa'i chags pa rnam spung sU te//des 'dul bar ni mkhyen nas//yi ge las byung rnam spangs shing //na mkha' lta bur ba ga med par//dag
319b6(rgyud): nyid du de nas son//de nas sems can sangs rgyas kyi//bla med de ni ni nus med pa'i//stong pa nyid la rtag bzhugs pas//'gro kun stong pas bcom nas ni//thams
319b7(rgyud): bde dbyal bar lung mthong ste//slar yang bdog dang gzhan don la//mos pas gus pa nyid du gyur//de nas 'jig rten khams kun na//bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas
320a1(rgyud): kun+da bsdus te//myur ba nyid du bdag la bskul//oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa dz+nyAHd+hU ba ho su ra tA ste//'dis ni bskul ba tsam gyis kyang //dag pa'i bde ba
320a2(rgyud): kun ster ba//'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed cing //'gro kun bde ba bskyed par gyur//nga ni 'dod pa'i gzugs kyi mchog/sangs rgyas kun gyi byin rlabs pa//nga nyid chos
320a3(rgyud): kyi sku yi mchog/sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag po yin//sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyor 'phrog cing //sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba che//sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung snyan pa//sangs/
320a4(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi thugs chen yin//sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che//sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal po che//rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi bdag/'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi gtso//rin
320a5(rgyud): chen 'dzin pa kun gyi dbang //mkha' gro kun dang mnyam sbyor bas//sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur//sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pas na//rdo rje mkha' gro zhes
320a6(rgyud): byar 'grub//dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba yis//de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad bri//de yi dbu su tshul bzhin du//rdo rje sems dpa' bzhag par bya//zla ba'i
320a7(rgyud): mdog can 'dzum dang bcas//'od zer dmar po 'khrugs pa las//sangs rgyas phreng bas mdzes pa ste//rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par klubs//zhal bzhi phyag bzhi
320b1(rgyud): spyan gsum dang //ral pa'i thor chugs kyis rgyun cing //lha mo bzhi dang yang dag ldan//sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nye ba rgyan//na zhal zhi zhing g.yas dkar min//de bzhin
320b2(rgyud): gzhan yang g.yon pa dmar//rgya ba zhal ser po gser bsregs 'dra//thod pa la bzhugs par drang ldan//sum cu gsum pa 'jigs par mdzad//rdo rje dang ni ral gre
320b3(rgyud): drang //dril bu thod pa bsnams pa nyid//mkha' gro ma yi 'khor los gang //skyob pa sna tshogs bri bar bya//mkha' gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba//rdo rje mkha' gro bde mchog
320b4(rgyud): zhes//rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//ma dang sring mo bu mo dang //de bzhin nye du mo rnams ni//dngos grub thams cad
320b5(rgyud): rab sgrub pas//'dod pa'i sbyor bas chags par bya//ba glang sha dang rta sha sogs//dogs pa med par bza' bar bya//'jig rten la rtag g.yon la spyod//brtan pa
320b6(rgyud): drang ni g.yo ba yis//'gro kun g.yon las byung bas ni//g.yon gyis bza' zhing g.yon mchod bya//pho nya ma gtogs gzhan rnams la//'dod la rmongs pas bgrod
320b7(rgyud): mi bya//pho nya mo rtag zhen thar bya//'gyur ba nyid du the tshom med//sgrub pos mchog tu 'bad byas te//brtul zhugs min spangs brtul zhugs rdzogs//dam
321a1(rgyud): tshig rigs la skyed pa dang //tsa ru'i bza' ba lhan cig bya//rigs lnga la ni kun spyod par//rigs gcog nyid du brtag par bya/spyang tse khrag dang ga dur
321a2(rgyud): bcas//tsan dan dmar po sbyar byas la//rdo rje chu dang bsres pa ni//dngos grub thams cad sgrub byud pa'i//de dag bdud rtsi lngar ni 'gyur//mthe bo sprin lag sbyar ba yis/
321a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu bza'//zhi ba'i brdung ba bzhin myangs na//dngos grub rtag pa thob par 'gyur//'di dag dam tshig dam pa ste//mdzes many+dzi gdong can+da
321a4(rgyud): khyod la bshad//las rnams kun la thabs bcas shing //dogs pa med par gang spyod dang //rnam par mi rtog sgom pa ni//brtul zhugs rnams kyi mchog gi
321a5(rgyud): mchog/las rnams kun la kun tu ni//rnam par mi rtog sgom byed cing //dogs pa med par kun tu spyod//de ni dka' thub rnams kyi mchog/the tshom med pa'i
321a6(rgyud): sems kyis ni//sgra zla la sogs rjes dngos kyi//yul rnams ma lus sbyin byed pa'i//dka' thub shin tu 'dara' dka' ba'o//gang yang las rnams thams
321a7(rgyud): cad la//shes rab dang ni sbyar byas te//de yang stong pa'i gan su sbyar//de 'dir bdag chen dka' thub yin//rnam par mi rtog sems kyis ni//shes rab
321b1(rgyud): dang na mtshungs gzugs la//dgas med spyod pa'i kun spyod pa//de ni bdag chen dkar thu yin//shes rab thabs ni ma gtogs parla//dang tsho byams gzhan mo g.yon//
321b2(rgyud): byang chub chen po ni//nges par ster ba nyid du bshad//rnam par mi rtog rjes 'jug lnga//rnal 'byor pa ni mngon par brtson//de ni thams cad 'byung ba yi//shes rab pa
321b3(rgyud): rol phyin pa yin//gang tshe 'dus byas tshul rnams ni//rnam par mi rtog sems kyisu//me long lta bur rab shes pa//de ni shes rab sten pa yin//glog dang chu bur
321b4(rgyud): lhur smin pa//gang tshe 'dus byas tshul rnams ni//gang gis ji ltar mthong 'gyur ba//de ni shes rab ston pa yin//me long nang gi gzugs brnyan dang //rmi lam sgyu ma
321b5(rgyud): dri za'i grong //mig 'phrul mtshungs par gang gis mthong //de ni gtso bo yin par brjod//de ni gang du'ang mngon zhan dang //gang du'ang gnas pa yod ma yin//de
321b6(rgyud): yang dag 'byung mod kyi//sgyu ma lta bu'i dngos dag ni//long spyod khyad 'phags skye 'gyur ba//bde ba yongasu 'gyur bzhin pas//'bras bu khyad 'phags thob 'gyur bar//
321b7(rgyud): ci yi phyir na 'dod mi bya//brtan g.yo'i dngos po yod min to//'on kyang snang ba tsam mtshan nyid//sgom pa khyad par can gang zhig/goms pa'i stobs ni rdzogs pa na/
322a1(rgyud): yod 'ong bde ba'i 'bras bu ni//bla mod gsal ba'i blo yi mthu//'bras bu don gnyer rgyu bsgrubs na//dor ni lha mo su zhig 'gog/de bas 'bad pa thams
322a2(rgyud): cad kyis//kun tu 'gro ba mchod par bya//dka' thub sdom pa mi bzad pas//lus ni bskams shing sdug bsngal 'gyur//sdug bsngal gyis ni sems g.yengs na//g.yeng
322a3(rgyud): pas dngos grub gzhan du 'gyur//lus dang sems ni brtan gyur na//bde ba thams cad brtan par 'gyur//sdug bsngal gyis ni g.yo gyur pas//shin tu 'gog par
322a4(rgyud): 'gro bar 'gyur//des na lus dang ngag sems rnams//brtan par byas nas byang chub thob//gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang //dmyal bar nges pa sreg 'gyur
322a5(rgyud): zhes/mkha 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i//rdo rje mkha' gro bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyi gsungs//rgyud
322a6(rgyud): kyi rgyal po dpal rdo rdza mkha' 'gro las de kho na nyid snang ba dam pa'i yul la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi rim par phye ba dang po'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das la
322a7(rgyud): btsun mo rnams kyis slar yang mchod cing phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das snying po gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
322b1(rgyud): kyi bstan pa 'dral ba'i lha la sogs pa'i gdug pa can rnams dang /skye bo gdug pa can gzhan dag kyang gdul ba dang /'joms pa dang /zhum par byed pa dang /ltung ba dang /
322b2(rgyud): zhi bar byas te/byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur ba'i snying po sdang ba thams cad rab tu 'joms pa lha yis bshad du gsol//de nas bcom ldan
322b3(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung dang /thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos gler blangs te 'di skad ces gsung so//dang por rnam par snang mdzad gnas//der ni
322b4(rgyud): sde tshan rnams kyi mtha'//ta dang po yi d+ha b+ha'i mtha'//dbyangs kyi gsum pas spyir rgyan pa'i//sa yi mtha' ni rang gis blta//se la'i dbus kyi stan bzhugs
322b5(rgyud): pa'i rna sa yi mtha' ni sbyar bar bya//mda' gnyis kyis nau rnam par sbyang //a ston gnas pa sa yi mtha'//slar yang sa mtha' mda' lnga spyan//zla ba'i dum bu
322b6(rgyud): thig les rgyun//sa la'i dbus gnas sa bon ni//mda' bcu yis ni yongasu sbyangs/sha dang sa yi dbus gnas la//zhal gsum gyis ni rgyan pa dang //rlung gi
322b7(rgyud): gnas sa bon la//ru tra yis ni rnam par rgyan//hUM hUM ha ni bzung nasu//dbyangs kyi dgu pas yang dag dgang //phaT ces bya ba dgod par bya//lhag ma ha yi rkang pagod
323a1(rgyud): m+b+ha sh+ma dngas panas rjod //dAsh+tsat+yAd+yaSh+Ta b+h+ya//rAs+thA nA la gnasas seM sh+tsahA/U zhes da da/dang tha~Mr//slad snang ba s+yA
323a2(rgyud): mda' ni sar pa sa yong su srung so+o//sa maH/dir nAr mig zhon//sa bya ba'i rlung rgyu/e zla dum thog 'du rgyun//yi ger gnas
323a3(rgyud): maH//sgrar yang su mthar b+hU k+Shi ldan//zla dum thig las cad pan d+hun//skur yang de nyid mgon pa baH//na chen ma ma phaT kyis rdum//rnam par sna ma
323a4(rgyud): sna tshogs kyis//tshig rnams kun la dgang bya zhes//rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//dnga' ba drug dang munyam
323a5(rgyud): 'i/mkha' gro ma yi dri ba'i sdom//sna tshogs pa nye dkyil la//der ni hUM lus byung ba yi//las kyi rdo rje'i dbus gnas par//hUM gi de nyid rnam sgom pa'o//
323a6(rgyud): 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba las//mkhri 'gro ma'i tshigs spro da'o//zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa'i//sku mdog dmar mo drag chen mo//mdung gi dbyings
323a7(rgyud): can 'jigs pa'i gzugs//spyan dmar khams sgra gyen du brjes//lang tsho phun sum tshogs par ldan//stag gi lpags pa'i na bza' can//ljags 'brel ba
323b1(rgyud): ni tshor 'dzegs te//'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par mdzad//mkha' gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba//rdo rje mkha 'gro rab grags zhes//rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//bcom
323b2(rgyud): ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//sngon bsags las ni mthar byed pa//me dang bcas te lan gaunyis bzla//ku ru ku ru sems dpa' bral//ral ba gya gyu banA d+hA gsal//da ni skAr ya
323b3(rgyud): bzlas par bya//'jig rten gzugs dang bral ba yi//tAM sa ya zhes bya ste brdzun//dam pa de ni lan gnyis bzla//ka Sha zhes bya o sgrar ldan//blo nA b+ha ya yang dag gnas/
323b4(rgyud): de yang slar ni bzlas par bya//sa yi mtha' ni nyi stan gnas//mda' bcu zla dum thag las dgang //de yang slar ni brjod par bya//'od byed sbyangs pa'i sa yi mtha'//gshegasu
323b5(rgyud): gsol ba glo na gnas//gnyis 'gyur du ni bya ba yin//zla zhon thig gsal pheM zhes bya//de yang slar ni bzlas par bya//phaT ces bya ba bsgyings te bsgrags//rnam par rtog pa
323b6(rgyud): kun gyi shing //da ha da ha mkha' gro'i sdom//lnga sde'i thog ma gnyis dang ldan//sde gcod de ni slar bzlas bya//b+ha k+Sha b+hak+Sha zhes bya dang //ba su ru d+he ra an+d+ra//mA lA ba la bi ne dang //
323b7(rgyud): gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na sap+ta ste//pA tA la ba te b+hu dze ga/sarbe bA tardza ya nyes 'gyur bya//A dang ka yi yi ge dang //gsum pa yi ni gsum par sbyar//bzhi pa dang ni rlung
324a1(rgyud): gnag nag na / man na ma ngan//mug zhan pas g+sa / yang dun ldan pa sa // m+b+ha
324a2(rgyud): spyan 'azhugs pa/ka la dang zin par ldan//sa don du ni gnyis 'azlas bya/sa mi mad gnyis dang ldan pa//slar yang sa mtha' mda' gsus s+t+wa~M/na
324a3(rgyud): mtha' yos lta bA s+thAn//dwe kun zla ba'i dum bu dang //thig la yis ni cod pan rgyun//de dag yang yang bsgyur bar b+ha//ka sarba dang d+ha rnams ni//oM sgra yi ni
324a4(rgyud): sa bzung //mi mi maH nai r-i rirI sgyur//ng+ge dag ni yang yang bsgyur/ma zhan su yi maHla/sgrar yang zla dum thig laste sbyangs//phyan chos
324a5(rgyud): na sgye/rad min sna tshogs pa'i//me tog mang bas nga/de da/ b+h+ramA//du m-i g+hu rnam seM sbyar //'di na gsus
324a6(rgyud): ma gyis snadang //'jig rten khams kun gang+ya sar ga//de bzhin gshegs pa /nas//slar yang de bzhin gshegs pagasachu
324a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas//ro bya thams cad 'dar zhing las//sa mo'i tshogs dang 'byung ba'i tshogs//gdon dang rams dang dbyig dug dang //gnod sbyin srin
324b1(rgyud): smyon stobs//snang ba thams cad brtul zhing bcom//zho 'gyur bkug ste dkyil 'khor gyi//dbus su 'jug ste dam chog gis//bcings nas kyang ni dbang du mdzad//dmyal ba pa/
324b2(rgyud): sdig pa kun//dul tA des ba com bAN+Dal lo zhes//ma Sha kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'o//rdo rje mapa 'gro bye pa'i mchog/rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs///
324b3(rgyud): ldan rdo rje can+da gyis gsungs//glu bzhi pa la sna bzhi bya//sgo sbyong dang nI yang dag ldan//de dbus pad+ma bro bye ba//'od zer dmar chen gsal ba'i mdangs//phyi rol rim
324b4(rgyud): zlum por bskor//de yi dbusu bcom ldan 'das//khro bo chen po zhal bzhis brgyan//zhal ni mi che ba cung zod gtsigs//khri dang bcas shing bzhad pa'i zhal//g.yas pa
324b5(rgyud): dkar zhing zhi ba ste//g.yon pa dmar po cher 'jigs pa//rgyab ni 'od zer ser po'i mdog/phyag bzhi yis ni rgyan pa ste//dpa' bo g.yon na kha T+wAM dang //de bzhin du
324b6(rgyud): ni thod pa bsnams//g.yas na 'bar ba'i rdo rje dang //khyad par du ni gshor gyis rgyun//rig pa bzhi dang yang dag ldan//sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nye bar rgyan//
324b7(rgyud): dpa' bo'i shes rab dga' mdzes ma//mda' dang gzho ni bsnams pa ste//sems dpa' sngon pa 'bar ba'i dngos//'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po can//dur
325a1(rgyud): khyod me lhur gsang mtho zhing //'jig pa yi ni dus ltar drag/me ltar 'bar ba'i sgra la ni//thod pa yi ni dpya rgyan bcings//ro langs dang ni lhan cig
325a2(rgyud): rol /he ru ka yi gar gyis spyod//ma mo'i grong khyer nyams dga' bla//sa yi dbang phyug rol par mdzad//thams cad du ni thams cad kyis//kun tu thams cad kun
325a3(rgyud): bdag nyid//mkha' gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba//rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/bsam gtan bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis//'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshomA med//
325a4(rgyud): dus bzhi ru ni rab sbyor bas//bde mchogo bla ma sgom byas te//rdo rje chen po 'bum bzlas na//khro ba'i rgyal po mtshungs par 'gyur//rdo rje che 'dzin tshe dang ni//mdog
325a5(rgyud): dang na so stobs dang rtsal//dngos grub rdzu 'phrul chen por ldan//mi zad 'gro don byed mthur ldan//yang ni ma bsgrubs par yang sngags pas lan gcig
325a6(rgyud): bzlas pas las brgya tham pa byed par 'gyur ba ni/'di lta ste/rgyu dang maM rgyu ba thams cad nges par gnon pa dang /ltung ba dang /bskyod pa dang /skrag pa dang /rgya
325a7(rgyud): gdab pa dang /rmugs pa dang /rengs pa dang /bzlog pa dang /rmongs pa dang /bcing ba dang /dgas pa dang /gtor ba dang /brlag par bya ba dang /smyo bar bya ba dang /
325b1(rgyud): btub pa dang /spyug pa dang /dbye ba dang /dmig med par bya ba dang /nor dbrog pa dang /bsdu ba dang /lkugs pa dang /bcing ba dang /bdag nyid brdungs pa dang //gsod du gzhug pa da /
325b2(rgyud): long bar bya ba dang /sa bon brlag par bya ba dang /rims dang /dug dang /dbyig dug gis bzung ba dang /sa g.yo ba dang /dmyal bar btang ba dang /byol song gi mngal
325b3(rgyud): du spro ba dang /skyed pa bud med du bya ba dang /mngal na gnas pa dbyung ba dang /chu bsgag pa dang /ma ning du bya ba dang /'dod pa'i chags pa bskyed pa dang /bsad pa dang /
325b4(rgyud): gzhan gyis gsod du gzhug pa dang /mtshon bcing pa dang /byas pa chud gsan pa dang /gcer bur bya ba dang /b+ha ga dang /bshang ba'i lcagaso sgrogs pa dang /b+ha ga dang /
325b5(rgyud): bshang ba'i smra ba dang /rgod du gzhug po dang /khrag dang khu ba dbab pa'i nad dang /gzhom pa dang /khrag dang mdze la sogs pa'i nad bskyed pa dang /mya ngan dang /sdug
325b6(rgyud): bsngal dang /btag pa dang /bcing ba rnams dang /dum bu dum bur bya ba dang /lus thams cad phye mar bya ba dang /gzer ba dang /thams cad tshogs pa dang /dgug pa
325b7(rgyud): dang /gzhug pa dang /bskyod pa dang /gar dang /glu dang /rgod du gauzhug pa dang /mang du smrar gzhug pa dang /ltas ngan bstan pa dang /thob pa dang dbang du bya ba'i
326a1(rgyud): las thams cad la sbyar ba dang /bkol ba dang /sgra dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /log 'dren dang /'byung po dang /ma mo dang mkha 'gro ma
326a2(rgyud): la sogs pa thams cad gdul ba dang mchog sbyin dang /sa dang /chu dang /mau dang /rlung dang /na mkha' rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i las bya ba dang /tshangs pa dang /
326a3(rgyud): khyab 'jug dang /dbang phyug chen po las rgyal po dang /chags pa thams cad gzhom pa dang /rims dang /dug dang /dbyig dug dang /mkha' gro ma las dgol ba dang /
326a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba dgas pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i skyo ba bsal ba'o//las rnams
326a5(rgyud): thams cad sgrub byed par//'di ni lha mo bshad pa yin//sngags kyi rgyal po 'di nyid ni//ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhes//sgyu ma kun dang mnyam sbyar ba'i
326a6(rgyud): mkha' gra ma zhes rab grags pa//rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha'
326a7(rgyud): 'gro las las thams cad kyi cho ga la sgyu ma chen pos rnam par 'phrul pa'i sngags kyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste gnyis pa'o////de nas gsang ba bshang /
326b1(rgyud): byug/mdor bsdus pa ste rgyus par smin//sgyu ma kun gyis mnyam sbyor bas//las rnams thams cad rnam 'phrul pa//sgyu ma kun gyi rdzu 'phrul gyis//dbyung phyug /
326b2(rgyud): rlob sgrub cing //byung b+h+r-i gdon gyi riHche//gang gis sdud tsong spro byed pa'o//haM ma ban d+hA s+ya ut+tA ro NaM/b+ha bi bo na maM/ma hI ma s+ho//so ba ai a d+hA ma
326b3(rgyud): baibi hi ma saM hi be ti bud+d+ha aM/i so ni do/ma hin+na do kum+b+ha katA/sen+na d+ho sni ga ra/saM sr-i t+ye/pa Da bo si na san+ni daM ban d+hA maM/ku ru ra sas+sa bi Da las/tuN+Ta ban d+ha mi/dz+nyA ba su ra u da naM/dza
326b4(rgyud): ra di/pa b+ha a d+hi a ta to baR+Sha/a nu ba da na/sI d+hu na/ma mi ri a/sar+b+ba sid+d+ha na swAhA zhes/rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//
326b5(rgyud): sngags ni 'di lan bdun mngon par bzlas te/khang thog tu bzhag na khyim gyi me rnams dran pa med par 'gyuraro//pra sa ha do la i/mi dz+nyA a/ba sa ba dza na mo ha i/e
326b6(rgyud): saM badz+dzi tsA ha i/na ma na ta ai/a d+hA na/ha a bA i/dzaM be na dit+ta Ni d+ha ta bi ha/ma hA swa ba a na na/bA to si/rA dzA ku la khaN+Da/DaNi Da/dze bA i ba d+ha/ti d+hi Na ta Na/
326b7(rgyud): na maHsi d+ha na/na maHpu pa tse dza dzaM/pA da na/ba glang gi gdong zhes bya ba'o//ma sa ra ba Ne/tad+ya da ro/ma hA daN+Da da ha he dun ha ha swA hA//sngags 'di bye ma la
327a1(rgyud): lan bdun mngon par bsngags te nod la gtor ma ri dgas la sogs pa'i srog chags thams cad kyis za bar m+b+hi 'gyur//de nyid kyi bka' tsam gyong
327a2(rgyud): sprin bzlog par 'gyuraro//rat+na re ti/oM a lI le/ba ra tsu li la/tsau ra bag g+he/kA na dA/sa b+h+ra mu he/dan d+ha mI swAhA//sngags 'di shing sor bzhi pa la lan bdun bsngag
327a3(rgyud): tIR+Sha gong g.yas par btsugs na/rtswa ra ba thams cad bcings par 'gyur//ai drA si A ti Na~M dza ha A/kai lI l-i hi dI/pI ga lpA mA/me ga b+ha na i/A haM sa~M lA u sa
327a4(rgyud): ri maM/a ba ra b+ha na i/a haM d+hA daM u sa raM mi/u ba ra/b+ha Na mi/au haM/duha mi b+hi to ba dza dza pa/mi lo lo ka li/lo hI di/baM gi li hUM phaT/khyu mchog gi rwa gong du
327a5(rgyud): chags pa'i sa sa la ma lhung ba blangs te sngags 'di ldan bdun du bzlas par byas na/bAs mtha' dang 'brog dgon po'i lam dang /rgyal po'i pho brang du yang 'tsho
327a6(rgyud): thams cad 'byung bar myi 'gyuraro//ba glang gi gdong gi cho ga la yang 'di nyid//ka ra bi rI lcug ma la sngags bzlas pa'i cho ga 'dis rlung dang char pa dang /ser ba
327a7(rgyud): bzlog par 'gyu ro//au dzi bi li a/pi dza dza su ti tha da si i su b+hA de o/sa Na o/a tsa la hi/suN+Da pa da ne/hi si la ba da/baR+Sha ba/dza he swA hA/
327b1(rgyud): zhib mA'i nang du chu blugs la sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas te rlung phyogs nA mkha' la gtor na/rlung dang char dung ser ba la sogs pa bzlog par 'gyur//na ya mo d+he/b+hu gla ba
327b2(rgyud): tAM/kled+d+hi ku ri N+Di shr-I tra~M ya/tha me ki hA thA ka ra la hU~M ki ni to sa~M ma ru bi ti bi t+r+ya tu ya/ru tshaM re Ta ramA/Ta ku ki ti lA rbi kukle ti liT yu ya/su hU~MSh+Ta roka sir ma~M la~M tIrmA
327b3(rgyud): le b+hi Shi Sha le NA si mu le kha/a ya the sAr+tha ha de sra na b+hu dza ku b+ha nA su the rA Sha ya/na pa la ra ti Shu d+hA ya na sho pa d+yu ti ta ka su se la ka kha so TuM b+he g+ha swe d+hA g+ha ri sa Ne/
327b4(rgyud): ma byA ha g+hA b+ha dz+ri sen g+ham ba sa ra/g+ha d+h+ya se ra sa a ha/a au ha bi ru ga aM bra la an+ta k+Sha ka ai ra hUM hUM hUM ba pha pu Ta ShA ya//zla tshes thi lerare ldan pa'i os//rkang
327b5(rgyud): pa brgyad pa mdzes par bya//swA hU zhes byas rgyun pa ste/mtha' dang mthar ni phaT mchog bye//'di ni gsungs pa tsam gyis kyang //klu rnams skrag cing brgyal bar
327b6(rgyud): gyur//sngags kyi rgyal po 'di'i sbyor ba ni 'di yon te/sngags pa bdag nyid rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor lo gnas pa'i rdo rje hU~M mdzad/zhal bzhi pa phyag bzhi pa/
327b7(rgyud): 'dam skyes sngon po lta bu mdog can sangs rgyas lnga'i me tog gi phreng bas dbu rgyan pa/bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba yan lag gi cha shas thams cad nas rdo rje
328a1(rgyud): mkha'agro ma spro zhing zhal bzhi nas hUM bzhi sgrogs par mdzad par bya'o//de nas kham por gnyis bzung ste/kham por gnyis po dI ba blas rlung
328a2(rgyud): dang me'i dkyil 'khor rang gi mtshan mas mtshan cing 'bar dz+wa la/klu brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor re'u mig dgu par bris te/dkyil 'khor gyi dbusu klu lhag ma can/marga
328a3(rgyud): la gdengs kA bdun gyis rgyan pa/cung zad bskums pa'i phyed krung can du bri/de'i brla g.yon pa la gnas par klu mo gdengs ka gsum pa dang ldan pa g.yon gyis
328a4(rgyud): 'khyud par bru~M de ltar phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor rnamasu mtha' yas la sogs pa bris la/gdengs ka rnams la hU~M dang spel ba'i phu bkod de thams cad kyi lag pa g.yas
328a5(rgyud): nA ral gri thogs pa'o//dpral ba rnams yang hUM phu hUM/rkang mthil rnams la dza br-i/rkang pa rnams kyang klu gzhan gyis bcings pa ste/de dag gi gdengs ka la yang
328a6(rgyud): hUM phu hUM br-i'o//de nAs au d+hI a ni l+yA ta ra baM ga di thi bai bA ra She She ya hi ru sar+b+ba nA ga ku la bya na ya phuM/sa ma ye du pe Sha ya phuM/sar+b+ba nA sA d+hA ya phuHphuHphuHphuH
328a7(rgyud): zhes bya ba 'dis dkyil 'khor bskor la yang sngags 'di dang /phyag rgyas so so'i lus la bkug ste gzhug par bya'o//phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/mthe bong
328b1(rgyud): sbyar te bcings la phyi rol du bzhag ste/sor mo lhag ma rnams gdengs ka ltar bya ba'o//dzaHhUM ba ho zhes bya ba sngags kyi mthar bzla zhing dgug pa dang /gzhug pa la
328b2(rgyud): sogs pa byas la/de de nas kham par de mar nag tsha bas bkang ste/sdong bu la me slar la/khams phor gzhan gyis bkab la/kham pho de ri rab tu bsgoms nas de'i
328b3(rgyud): steng du hUM gis khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms la/rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te cho ga bzhin du bzhag par bya'o//de nas kham phor gyi steng du bsgoms
328b4(rgyud): 'i rdo dz+ha hUM mdzad la sogs pa'i khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ba'i lus kyi gzar bu las byung ba'i chu rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la mthong bar bsams la/bdag nyid rdo
328b5(rgyud): hU~M mdzod kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas zhal bzhi nas hUM bzhi sgrogs shing rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings pa'i mdzub mo'i rtse mor hUM gnyis bsgoms te/de las byung ba'i me
328b6(rgyud): lho'i phreng bso sprin rnamaste bzlog par bsams te/dpal rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sngags kyang rung ba bzla'o//sbyor ba 'dis ni dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol khru brgyad kyi bar du
328b7(rgyud): char bzlog par bya'o//dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba yis//phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya//de yi dbus gyur pad+ma ni//kha dog dkar po mdzes pa la//nyi ma'i
329a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i//ye shes sa b+h+yon bsgom par+ya b+ha//rlung drang me yi dbus gnas par//chu yi dkyil 'khor bsgoms par bya//dpung chen/
329a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbusu ni//gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor rab bsgoms te/zla ba rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis//rdo rje mkha' glo bsgom bya ba/zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa ste//glang chen
329a3(rgyud): stan la g.yas brkyang bzhugs//spyan gsum skra ni grol bas rgyan//gzugs bzod bzhon pa phun sum tshogs//thod pa'i phreng ba rnam par klubs//kha dog dmar
329a4(rgyud): bo gsal ba'i mdongs//shin tu mdzes pa'i ni bza' gsol//'bar ba'i ral gri thod pa dang //mad dang gzhu ni 'grengs pa ste//khrag la dgyes pa'i hrI las
329a5(rgyud): byung /'od zer dmar po'i phreng 'khrugs shing //'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par mdzad//gru bzhi po la sgo bzhi pa'i//mkha'agro mya yi 'khor lo sgom//
329a6(rgyud): b+hu re dam pa bres pa dang //rlung bskyod pa dran bsgrengs nas ni//sna tshogs gos ni rnam dbyangs par//dur khrod so phag la sogs pa'i//tshon rtsi rnam pa lnga yis
329a7(rgyud): ni//khru bzhi pa yi tshad tsam du//dkyil 'khor dge ba'i las tsam sogs//de nas rdzing bu bya ba ni//tshon rtsi sngon pos gcal bkram ste//rba rlabs chu
329b1(rgyud): gnyer la sogs bri//chen chen gyis ni gang bya'i gzugs//nywa dang nya ming lu sogs pa'i//srog chags rnam pa sna tshogs bri//phyi rol bya rog sogs par rgyun//de nas cha/
329b2(rgyud): g+ha 'dri yis ni//rig pa tshwa dang klu brgyad dgod//sgo bzhir mgo gnyis bsnol ba la//mjug mas grwa bzhir dkris na su//shar du kru rgyal mtha' yas ni//'dam skyes
329b3(rgyud): sngon po lta bu'i mdog/gdengs ka bdun ni bsgyings pa la//klu mo dang ni bcas par dgod//phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa'o//byang du nor rgyas ser po ste//nub tu 'jog po dmar
329b4(rgyud): paM yin//lho ru stobs rgyu ldang skya ste//dbang ldon du ni dung skyong yin//rlung mtshams pad+ma bden bral du//pad+ma chen po dgod par bya//mo mtsham su ni rigs ldan te//cho ga snga/
329b5(rgyud): mas bri bar bya//klu ni brgyad po thams cad kyang //rin chen cod pan lta sdug ldan//rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par klubs//gde oM ka'i nor bu'i 'od kyis ni//mun pa thams
329b6(rgyud): cad sel byed pa//thal mo sbyar zhing skrag nasu//gdengs ku las ni chu rgyun 'bebs//sprin gyi dbang phyug rgyal po rnams//phyogs brgyad nas ni dgug par bya//sgra
329b7(rgyud): grag dang ni rmugs pa dang //drag po 'gugs byed de bzhi no//rgyal po bzang po dpal dga' mo//char 'bebs dang ni sdug mo dang //myur ba dang ni dbyangs can ma//gtun
330a1(rgyud): dang 'bebs dang glang dang g.yo//'di dag sprin rgyal brgyad po zhes//mkha'agro ma dang mnyam sbyor bya'i//rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/bcom ldan
330a2(rgyud): rdo rje can gyis gsungs//bud med gnyis kyi thod pa ming dang ldan pa la be ro tsa na dang khrag gis me'i dkyil 'khor gnyis bris te/me'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnamasu
330a3(rgyud): yi ge k+ShiM dang hrIHbkod la/dbusu bsgrub bya'i bu mo'i ming bris te/ri mo gsum gyis bskor nas/mo dza'i sa bon nam/re phas dkyil 'khor gsum rim du bskor
330a4(rgyud): te/thod pa'i steng 'og gi bye brag shes par byas la//seng ldeng gi me la dus gsum du bsos na/phyi de nyin par 'ong ba 'am bskams par 'gyuraro//gnas dben
330a5(rgyud): pa'i sa phyogasu b+ha gab med par rdo rje sem sau dpa'i sku gzugs mar nag tshe bas byugs de shing stogs mdzes pa la bzhag la khrus chab gsol nas/bskams
330a6(rgyud): te/sgrub pa'i grogs dang bcas par char dbab par dmigs nas kha shar stod du bltas la sngags bzlas nas rgya byin gyis char 'bebs//min na dpal phyag
330a7(rgyud): nirdo rje'i sngags dang spel te bzlas na rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab bo//yang ni kha maM bair la sbrul mgo gnyis pa'i sha dang /khrag gis snga ma ltar bris te
330b1(rgyud): skyes ma rig par na mkha' la bzhag la char dbab pa la sngags bzlas na 'bab par 'gyuraro//char gcod par 'dod na rdo rje can la phul ba'i me tog gi bdug pa khang steng du gan
330b2(rgyud): hU~M/gcer bur byung la sprin la bdugs shing stegs bzlas ni bzlog par 'gyur//kham por se ma btang ba la dug las shes pas nud la sogs pas dkyil 'khor gsum
330b3(rgyud): te/de sa dz+nyAn las gyur pa bsams le chu'i snying du yang pad+ma mda' mi brgyud bris nas lte ba la hUM gnyis kyis gzir ba'i nA bri/mdab ma brgyad la yang klu brgyadakyi
330b4(rgyud): snying po gzir ba bris la stobs po che'i sngags dang /hU~M dgus cho ga bzhin du mtsho skyes bskor te/sngags bzlas zhing ji ltar 'byung ba bzhin du mchod pa byas la/kham
330b5(rgyud): bor kha sbyar te gan su bcug na/klu thams cad char gyi rgyun 'beb so gal te des sdang ba'i klu rnams cher mi 'bebs na der sbyor ba 'di ltar gyi ste/gtum po'i sa don
330b6(rgyud): la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/klu'i mtshor sbyin sreg byas na char 'bab par 'gyuraro//gal te des kyang char 'bad par ma gyur na//de'i tshe yungs kar dang /tsha bor
330b7(rgyud): mar nag dang /sbrang rtsi dang kar mo ma nyig rnams sun cig phyi mar byas te rim bu rgyas la//de nyid la lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bad+ma te/klu'i mchir 'dun
331a1(rgyud): na 'bab par 'gyuraro//gal te klu rnams sdang bas char mi 'bebs na mgo 'gas par 'gyur//gal te yang mi 'bab na dur khrod kyi thal ba bzung ste/

331a3(rgyud): ba bla dang zangs kyi phye ma dang /yungs kar dang /dbang po'i lag pa dang /pA la sha rnams las ril du rgya shugs kyi 'bruM gu tsam byas la/ril bu re ri zhing lan bdun mngon

331a5(rgyud): 'dzin pe chen pos sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gsungs te//oM na mo nI lAmA ra d+ha rA ya/badz+ra pAM Na ye/ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/a ne ka gaM gA na dI bAM la ko saM ma bud+d+ha

331a7(rgyud): ta/ka ra tsa ra NA ya/kr-iSh+Na b+hu dza gA ya/yadz+nyo pe wI tA ya/dz+wa li ta b+hu dza ma Ni ma ku nA ya/pu ri ta Ta pa/bA da nA ya/saM kr-i tsi ta b+hu la ta ya da sha na SheN+Di
331b1(rgyud): ShatA ya/kr-i tan+ta ru pA ya bid+yA dza ya/ma ho rA ga th+yak+Sha NA ya/ka ra s+pho Tat+t+ra san ka rA ya/su bar+Na kA na ka ra dza me kha lpa ya/hU kA ra n+tad tra sa na ka R+Sha ya/a shI ti yo dzo na s+yAn+tu//
331b2(rgyud): sra gastA raM/sAM gai ra dza mu mi nAd pA ya/tsak+tha d+yo d+h+r-i kaMm r+d+ha d+h+ya ha n+te yai/daMSh+TA ka ra wA ya/hi sI d+h+weH/hA sa na dan+tA drA yaM/mait+ma stAM k+Sho d+h+ye ka rA ya/kA lo rU pA yA/tr-I
331b3(rgyud): b+hak+Sha Na'i ka ru NA ya/nA gA nAM mr-i t+yu kI lA ya/oM maM gaM gA ni ba li ka sa mau bud d+he b+ha gI bad bi b+h+r-i Sho taM/man+ta me b+hu tra yI Sh+Ti mi/b+hI b+ho ban+d+ha g+hu d+hi pa tA yAM/i daM nI lAH/
331b4(rgyud): ra d+ha rA sha rI rau badz+rA pA No hr-i da ya/ye sa mA ti kra ma tha/mA ku let+sA da ni/b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/t+yAd+ya thA/bud+d+ha bud+d+hi/bi bud+d+ha bi b+hed+d+ha/maM hAM lA'i l-i ka pA li nI dza hA ra dzA hA raM/
331b5(rgyud): n+yA gA nAM/pra ha rA pra hA ra/sar+b+ba nA grA nAM/tshin+da tshin+den+na ga hI da yA ni b+h+r-idz+dza b+h+r-in+di/nU b+h+ra mar+m+ma Ni bi shrIr+Yanra/nA gaM hri da yA ni/s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/nA ga na yau nA ni/l+r-in+d+ra
331b6(rgyud): n+yai tuM/nA ga sha rI rA NaM/tad+ya thA/hUM hU~M phaT/nAM ga bi dA ra NA ya peTaM/nA gai tshin+da nA ya phaT/nI laM ba se nA ye dzaT/e pri ti ha ta/pa la pa ra kra mA ya phaT//
331b7(rgyud): kr-i tAn+ta ya phaT/kr-itAn+ta rU pA yaM phaT/ro she NA ya phaT/tA sa nA ya phaT/kuSh+mir+b+hat+sA da na ka rA ya phaT/pre ta bi shwe tsa di nA sha ka rA ya phaT/pre te bi shA
332a1(rgyud): D+han+d+ha shwa kAR+Sha ya /k+Sh+ma yA bsgyur rdzun kAk+ShA s+ya hA/ta t+ta gad+hA d+hur/mA ra yAm+b+ha r+yA ya/dz+nyA sha ya n+ta sha ya/sarba rbats+tsha ban+d+hA sha kA rA ya pa//
332a2(rgyud): nI wAskA ra d+ha ro badz+ra pA Ni nA dz+nyA pa ye te swA //gnod sbyin dang srin pa la sogs pas zin pa la ni tshul bzlas te gtong na grol bar 'gyur//char bzlog pa la ni thal ba
332a3(rgyud): bzlas nas sprin la bltas te gtor bar bya'o//chu la bzlas te gtor na ni/char 'bab par 'gyur//rims la no skud pa sngon po la bzlas te lag pa la btags na grol
332a4(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro//zla ba dang nyi ma gzas zin pa'i dusu go ro tsa na la ldan stong mngon par bzlas te/dpral bar thig ler byas ni mi snang bar 'gyur//don la dmigs te
332a5(rgyud): gtsang zhing gtsad pa'i gos gyon la nyin mchin du kun tu ru bsregs te lan brgyad bzlas nu/rmi lam du dge srog thams cid ston par 'gyur//sa la lan bdun
332a6(rgyud): grus te chom po la bsdus nas bus ni tsha mu bai d+h+waM sa mi mthong zhing bzlog par 'gyur//mye tog gi 'bras bu le ldan bdun bzlas te gang la byin pa de dbang du

332b1(rgyud): gsungs//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' gro las klu thams cad 'gug pa'i rim par phye ba ste gsum pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'dus la lha mo rnams kyis slar
332b2(rgyud): yang mchod pas mchod cing phyag gsum byas te 'di skad ces gsol to//las thams cad kyi tshogs bcom ldan 'das lha yis bshad du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das
332b3(rgyud): kyis rig pa'i rgyal po 'di mgurA du bzhes to bka' stsal pa/g+hi li b+hi li badz+ra dza ba ri pa sha sa ba a tha i ni sha pa ri sha pa a/hUM hUM hUM/ho to ho/bu sa tha/bu sa thA/
332b4(rgyud): bu sa the/ha sa ha sa/ha ha/oM ni zla phyed thig les rgyan//de ni chu 'dzin brgyad la gnas//mkha'agro ma yi rigs sngags te//skye mo chen po'i rang bzhino//'di ni
332b5(rgyud): gsungs ma thag tu yang //klu rnams thams cad brgyal 'gyur zhes//rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyis gsungs//na maH
332b6(rgyud): sh+ma sA na bA se ni/mA hA ka laM/a nuts+tsha ya/tad+ya thA/au tsa le tsa le pra tsa laM/la lA la lA ya/daM bi lam gA swA hA/sngags 'di bsnyen pa khri byas te mtshan phyed
332b7(rgyud): ni ling ga'i drung du ji srid 'ongs kyi bar du bzlas pa byas te gong bu dgug pa'i cho ga'o//oM tsa muN+De d+hA ma ke she be d+hu dze he/b+he ha na ha na/da ha daM ha/pa tsa pa che//
333a1(rgyud): /de ba dan+ta mA ra ya swA hA//rang gi rgung mthil g.yon par seMn mIs ri rab bris la/de'i nang rol gyi prA baniSh+Ta yi gu hrib zhi brisa?/dbusu sngags//
333a2(rgyud): kyi tshig bris/rdog pas mnan te bzlas ni khugs shing dbang du 'gyuraro//skyes bu'i byin pa g.yon pa'i rus pa'i thur me la steng gi tshar tshogs kyi dab phyug
333a3(rgyud): phyag bzhi pa zhal 'og tu gzigs pa/lag pa g.yas pa dang /g.yon par thod pa dang /dgra sta dang /zhags pa dang /mdung rtse gsum bsnams pa byas la/dug dang //
333a4(rgyud): khrag dang /ske tshe dang /lan tsha dang /lce myang tshar bcas pa'i mar nag gi nang du phur bu de bcos te stobs po che'i sngags bzlas la gang gi khyim sgor sbas
333a5(rgyud): pa de la gcong nad chen po 'a byung bar 'gyur la/gton na thar bar 'gyur ro//oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA bo la ha nA da ha pa tsa/bri d+hI sa ya ut+p+ra dA ya mA ra ya hUM phaT/grog
333a6(rgyud): mkhar gyis dang /ba'i rnam lngar bcas pas klu b+hA su ka'i gzugs brnyan mtho gang tsam pa byas te/ka ra bi ra'i lcug mas bkra ba la gu gul bdug pa rgyun mi 'chad
333a7(rgyud): par bdug cing /dkar gsum gyi gtor ma bya ni la/ka ra ba ra'i lcug mas rgyun mi 'chad par chu gtor zhing bzlas na/zhag bdun gyis char gyi rgyun 'bebs
333b1(rgyud): bar byed do//ji sto drub par ma gyur na nyi ma bdun pa la dum bu dum bur byas te/bum pa'i nang du blugs la/hUM bzhi pa'i sngags bzlos shing chu bo chen por bskul na nges par 'bag/
333b2(rgyud): par 'gyuraro//oM ga ga a ri gA ga swA hA//sngags 'di nang par sngar gdong ma bkrus par/rdo'u la lan bdun bzlas te gang yang rung ba'i bu gur bcug la che ge mo'i kha
333b3(rgyud): chings shig ces brjod na kha chings par 'gyuraro///mu kha tiSh+Thi ti mu ka gats+tsha ti//mu kha DaM ta laM gaM laM mu ka na mu dra pu ri ShA Na/de ba dAt+te s+yA mu kha baM d+hA mi
333b4(rgyud): swAhA/glang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung ba byi ba'i khang bu sgo gnam du bltas pa'i nang du bcug la/bzlas shing kha chings shog ces brjod na rgyal po'i pheM blang la sogs pa

348b1(rgyud): gnyis rlung gis brgyan par bya//ru sbal gyi ni stan bzhugs pa'o//rlung po phyi rol zla dum drang //thig las rgyan pa bcu gsum dgod//bcu bzhi pa yang des brgyan bya//dbus ma
348b2(rgyud): yin dang po yis//re'u mig bco lnga spras par gzhod//gti mugaM bris ni rgyan pa yi//dbu ma'i dbu ma bcu drug par//dbu ma'i dbu ma stan bzhugs pa//bzang po
348b3(rgyud): yis ni mgor rgyan pa//lho mtha' bcu bdun par ni dgod//lho yi dbu mar rlung gis ni//stan sbyin ga ti mug brgyan par bya//re'u mig bcwo brgyad pa la dgo
348b4(rgyud): re'u mig bcu dgu par gnas pa//me ni AM yis rgyan pa yin//ru sbrul dang ni ldan pa yin//rlung gi phyi rol zla dum dang //thig les rgyan pa nyi shur dgod//dbu
348b5(rgyud): ma'i gnyis pa phan pa'i mchog/re'u mi gya nyi shu gcig par dgod//lho mtha' yi ni stan bzhugs pa'i//rlung gi phyi rol bzung nA su//gr-iti mug ldan pa nyi shu gnyis//
348b6(rgyud): dang po yi ni gsum pa yis//re'u mig nyi shu gsum pa rgyan//du mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa//nub phyogs dang ni ldan par bya//re'u mig nyi shu rtsa drug pa//byang gi
348b7(rgyud): dbu mar ldan par 'dod//re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bdun pa//dbu ma yi ni gnyis pas rgyan//re'u mig nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa//nub phyogs kyis ni mdzes par byas//dang por
349a1(rgyud): dbu ma bzung nus ni//ri zhes bya ba 'ob tu sbyin//rI'u mig nyi shu dgu pa dgod//dbu ma yi ni bzhi pA yis//re'u mig sum cu pa l+yA rbAn+tu//
349a2(rgyud): de nyid kyi ni gnyis pa yis//re'u mig sum cu gcig pa rgyan//ru sbal thig ler ldan pa yi//rlung gi phyi rol bzung nas ni//re'u mig sum cu gnyis par dgod//ri'u
349a3(rgyud): mig sum cu gsum pa yang //de nyid kyis ni rgyan par bzhed//re'u mig sum cu rtse bzhi pa//nub phyogs kyis ni mdzes par bya//oM ni thig ler ldan pa dag/re'u
349a4(rgyud): ni ga sum cu lnga par dgod//re'u mig sum cu drug pa yang //yi ge'i draba'i phyog de bzhin nyid//rlung gi phyi rol bzung nasu//'bugs dang ldan pa sum cu bdun//
349a5(rgyud): rlung gi mdab ma la gnas pa//re'u mig sum cu brgyad la dgod//re'u mig sum cu dgu pa ni//lho yis mtha' yis brgyan par bya//re'u mig bzhi bcu thams pa
349a6(rgyud): yang //'phel ba yis ni brgyan par bya//re'u mig bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa//'bugs pa rmi lam thig les rgyan//shar mang po dbu ma bzung nas ni//shar
349a7(rgyud): gyi phyi rol 'og tu sbyin//re'u mig bzhi bcu gnyis par dgod//re'u mig bzhi bcu gsum pa ni//nub phyogs kyi ni dang por ldan//re'u mig bzhi bcu bzhi pa yang //
349b1(rgyud): dbu ma yi ni gnyis pas rgyan//rlung gi phyi rol bzung nasu//ru sbrul dang ni thig ler ldan//re'u mig bzhi bcu lnga la dbod//slar yang rlung gi phyi rol bzung //ru sbrul thig lor/
349b2(rgyud): ldan pa dag/bzhi bcu drug la'ang dgod par bye//rlung gi phyi rol bzung na su//lho yi mtha' dang ldan par bya//re'u mig bzhi bcu bdun par gnas//shar gyi phyi rol stan
349b3(rgyud): bzhugs pa'i//shar gyi mdab ma'i gsum pa ni//re'u mig bzhi bcu brgyad par dgod//rlung gi phyi rol bzung na su//lho yi mtha' yi spyan bzhugs pa//bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa la
349b4(rgyud): dgod//dgra rnams thams cad bcing ba dang //khyad par gyis ni rmongs pa dang //sgrol ba'i cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di//gzhin mdzes ma ni khyod la bshad//slar yang re'u mig
349b5(rgyud): dang po la//'bugs pa rmi lam zla ba yis//brgyan pa dag ni dgod par bya//bden bral phyi rol bzung nas ni//ru sbal gyi ni stan bzhugs pa//re'u mi gnyis par
349b6(rgyud): gnas par bya//dbu ma'i mtha' ma bzung nas ni//de nyid kyis ni bzhi par gnas//re'u mi gu sum par dgod par bya//rlung gi phyi rol bzung na su//ma kar rmi lam
349b7(rgyud): zla bas rgyan//re'u mig bzhi par dgod par bya//ru spal rmi lam mchod pa yi//rlung gi phyi rol bzung nas//re'u mig lnga par dgod par bya//re'u mig drug par
350a1(rgyud): gnas pa ni//dbu ma yi ni gnyis pa dang //nub phyogs kyi ni dang por 'dod//'byugs pa rmi lam thig ler ldan//re'u mi bA bdun par dgod par bya//

350a3(rgyud): kyi dang po yin//lho yi mtha' me bzung nas ni//bzang po yis ni mgor rgyan pa//re'u mig bcu pa la gnas pa'o//bcu gtsug pa la yi ge de/rlung gi phyi rol bzung
350a4(rgyud): nas ni//ru sbal rmi lam ldan par bya//re'u mig bcu gnyis pa la bris//re'u mig bcu gsum la gnas phye//dbu ma yI ni gnyis pa dang //de bzhin du ni nub
350a5(rgyud): phyogs sbyin//shar gyi gsum po bzung na su//shar gyi ma ning spyan gnas pa//ri'u mr-ig bcu bzhi pa la 'dod//rlung gi phyi rol bzung na su//ru sbal rmi la mi

350a7(rgyud): sten gnas pa'i//bden bral phyi rol bzung nas ni//re'u mig bcu bdun par gnas bya//ma kar la zhon pa yi//rlung gi phyi rol thig les brgyan//re'u
350b1(rgyud): mig bcwo brgyad pa la bri//b+ho yi mtha' yi stan bzhugs pa'o//rlung gi phyi rol bzung nas//bcu dgu pa la bro ba bya//re'u mikla nya shu la gnas pa//rI yi stan la gnas pa yi//
350b2(rgyud): dang ba yi ni gsum pa bzung //myo yi mtha' y-i bstan bzhugs pa//rlung gi phyi rol bzud nas ni//re'u mig nyi shu gcig par bri//re'u mig nyi shu gnyis gnas par/
350b3(rgyud): makA ra la zhon pa yi//rlung gi phyi rol thig les rgyun//nyi shu gsum pa la yang de//re'u mig nyi shu bzhir glanas pa//ma kar thAg le zlas brgyan pa'i//rlung gi
350b4(rgyud): phyi rol skur yang bzung //nyi shu rtsa lnga cho ga bzhin//nyi shu drug par gnas pa ni//mA~M ka ra dang thig le yis//steng du rgyan pa'i rlung phyi rol//nyi shu bdun la

350b6(rgyud): 'bugs dang lhan cig ldan pAr bri//dbu ma'i bzhi pa bzung nas ni//der ni dang po gsum pa'ang sbyin//mkhas pas re'u mig sum cu rkyen//dbu ma'i dbu ma
350b7(rgyud): bzung nas ni//gti mugs ni mdzes byis pa//sum cu gcig par gnas par bya//makar zhi ni rmi lam dang //rlung gi phyi rol zla bas rgyan//sum cu gnyis par

351a2(rgyud): stan bzhugs gti mugs//rgyan pa sum cu bzhi la dgod//re'u mig sum cu lngar gnas par//dbu ma'i dang po bzung nas ni//rlung yang dor ni dgod par bya//'phel ba
351a3(rgyud): dIng ni b+h+rU~M mtha' dang //rlung yang de re ni sbyin bya ste//re'u mI ga~M sum cu drug pa rgyan//re'u mr-ig sum nu bdun par gnas//dbu ma yi ni gnyis pa la//nub phyogs
351a4(rgyud): kyis ni mdzes pa blo//re'u mig sum nu brgyud pa la//lho yi mtha' ni bzung na su//dbu ma'i dbu mi stan dang ldan//bzang po yis ni spyi bor rkun//slar yang yi
351a5(rgyud): dbu ma bzung //gti mug dang ni ldan pa yi//rlung gi 'og tu sbyin par skye//sum cu dgu pa la yang de//ri Ta mi ge bzhi bcu par gnas pa//dbu pa'i dang po bzung nas ni//

351b1(rgyud): par no//rlung gi phyi rol bzung nus ni//ru skal rmi lam can nyi zla//bzhi bcu lnga la gnas pas ni//ra zhes bya ba byang phyogs kyi//dbu ma dang ni ldan par na//bzhi bcu drug la

351b3(rgyud): mtha'i stan//re'u mig bzhi bcu brgyad par ni//ri dang ldan par dang po yi//dbu ma yis ni rgyan par 'dod//bzhi bcu dgu la gnas por yang //'bugs pa rmi lam
