351b7(rgyud): kyi gan su sbyin par bya//re'u mig de dag dbusu ni//myos par 'gyur ba'i bsgrub byi ni//sgrub pa po yis 'dri ru ba zhugs//ye shes rdo rjes gzhom par bya//grong
352a1(rgyud): mA yang ni brlag par bsam//dpa' bo'i 'phrul gyi bum pa 'am//bram ze'i bum pa skam por ni//'khor lo gnyis ni bcug nasu//cho ga bzhin du bris
352a2(rgyud): byas te//'byung po kun gyi gtor ma sbyin//sgrub pos de ltar byas nas ni//phyi nas las ni brtsams byas na//rdo rje thugs kyi bka' bzhin du//las rnams thams
352a3(rgyud): cod byed par 'gyur//slar yang re'u mig dang po la//'bugs pa rmi lam zla bas rgyan//re'u mi gnyis pa la gnas par//bzang pos spyi bor rgyan pa yi//
352a4(rgyud): lho yi mtha' ni bzung bar bya//re'u mi ga sum pa la gnas par//rlung gi phyi rol bzung nas ni//ru sbal rmi lam zlas brgyan bya//re'u migo lnga pa la gnas par/
352a5(rgyud): slar yang 'bugs pa zla bas rgyan//re'u mgri drug pa la gnas pa ro//ri yi stan la gnas pa yi//sher phyogs kyi ni gsum po gzung //re'u mig bdun pa

353a1(rgyud): ma dang po bzung nas//der ni rlung yang sbyin par bya//sum du lnga pa nyid dag kyang //de nyid kyis ni rgyan par bshad//sum cu d+hAg la gnas par no//ma na
353a2(rgyud): a dang ldan par bya//byang gi dbu ma bzung na su//de nyid du ni bri bar bya//sum cu brgyad la gnas par yang //a zhes bya ba bri bye zhing //lha yi mtha' ni bzung bya ste//

353a7(rgyud): bzung bya ste//gti mug dang ni ldan pa yi//rlung ni de yi stan du bya//de nyid du ni mkhas pas dgod//re'u mig bzhi bcu bdun pa la//gti mugs ni rgyan pa yi//rgyu

353b3(rgyud): ni sdang gyur nas//khyad par du ni g.yul 'gyed byed//rta dang ma ho bum par ni//cho ga ji bzhin bzhag par bya///'bugs pa rmi lam bzlas rgyan pa'i//slar yang

354a1(rgyud): la ni rgyan par bzhed//dbu ma yi ni gnyis pa bzung //nub phyogs kyi ni dro ru sbyin//bco lnga pa ni shin tu rgyun//rlung gi phyi rol bzung nasu//ru sbrul dang na ma
354a2(rgyud): lam dang //zla bas rgyan pa lan gnyis kyis//bcu bdun pa ni mdzes par bya//ru sbal rmi la mo zlas rgyan pa'i//rlung gi phyi rol bzung nas ni//lan gnyisu ni bzlas pa

354a6(rgyud): mu gis ni mdzes pa ste//a dang ldan pa'i me yang ba tu//byang gi dbu ma bzung ba dag/nyi shu dgu pa la ni bri//rlung gi phyi rol bzung nas ni//ru spal-i rmi lam zla/

354b1(rgyud): bzung nas//skurar+ya yang nub kyi dang ngo tsan//snum cu lnga pa rgyun par banod//'dugs pa mo lam zla ba can+da//dod na 'phel ba'ang sbyin b+h+ya s+ho//b+h+yo yi mtha' ni bzung nas/
354b2(rgyud): slar yid de bzhin rlung dang ni//rlung gi phyi rol bzung nas ni//'bugs pa mi sa~M ni n+dan pa dag/den ngan pa lA b+h+ri dAr+yA b+ha//dbu mo'i gnyis pa bzung nas+ya//nud kyi dang
354b3(rgyud): rgyan pa yis//sum cu lnga pa mdzes par b+ha//ri zhes bya ba'i stan gnas pa'i//dang bau yi ni gsum pa dang //lho mtha'i stan la gnas pa yi//rlung gi phyi rol bzung ba la//

354b5(rgyud): ba bzung nas//ri zhes bya ba'i 'og tu sbyin//lho mtha'i spyan la gnas pa yi//rlung gi phyi rol de nas bzung //gti mug g-is ni mdzes par bya//dbu ma'i dang po brdung

354b7(rgyud): byed//mar ngo yi na chos bcu dang //de bzhin yang de'i de nyid dam//yang na 'byung po'i mtshan mo la//thod pa'i stan la gnas na su//lho phyogasu ni kha bltas nA//
355a1(rgyud): dug dang khrag dang gtum pa yi//sa bon gyis ni snag che bya//bar snang la ni thod par thugs//mi yI rus pa'i smyug bu yis//'jig byed
355a2(rgyud): 'jigs pa'i sngags rnams btu//dang po sha tshan gtor byin te//de nas las ni brtsom par bya//dmar po 'am ni sngon po yi//gos ni khyad par dag tu bgo//mchod
355a3(rgyud): pa rdo rje'i cho ga dang //de bzhin bsam gtan bzlas pa dag/ji ltar sus kyang mi rtogs pa//da ltar sngags pas rtag tu bya//bsad la gshin rje'i rgyal po ste//yi
355a4(rgyud): dgas la ni yi dgas gzugs//ro langs la ni ro langs dang //srin po srin pos mnan par bya//stong la stong pa'i pad+ma ste//nges par 'joms pa'i grwa ru ni//sdugs
355a5(rgyud): sngags//ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//'khrul 'khor chen po bcu gnyis ni//bzhin mdzes ma ni khyod la bshad//'di ni sdang ba thams cad kyi//de bzhin 'jigs byed
355a6(rgyud): mi bzad yin//yang dag cho ga gang gis ni//dngos grub myur du 'jug byed pa//bza' dang ston mo 'dus pa yi//sgrub thabs cho ga de nas bshad//phyugs rnams
355b1(rgyud): dgan dbus pa nyid//sgrub pas rtswar rgyu nA ma smras s+ho//rgyu spyod pa yis blags nams no//rnamatshan mong pas gzhos par //sgyogs rnams dang na de bzhin sa//blang bu mi dang /
355b2(rgyud): ru sba la dang //rnga ma rtsi spyang rta le sogs//b+hi dang phag gi she dag dang //zangs kyi gtsu ka~M dud can de bzhin//bzla 'do sbyin sreg gi mni//me dpyid par ni byas sbyar
355b3(rgyud): nu/ma lus lus pa maud 'grub cing //rdul srid thams cad rab 'grub ces//mkha' kun dang mnyam sbyar ba'i//rdo rje mkha 'gro bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje sems dpa'
355b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs//'dum ldan rdo rje dran gyis gsungs//rgyud kyi rgyal ba sbyin po dang la rdo rje ma 'gro lus 'khrul 'khor khrims cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rlom par bye ba

363b7(rgyud): skyes pa bud med dag gi ni//mchod pa'i gnas 'di 'thob par 'gyur//e yi mtshan ma la lhung na//dgra dang rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang //lus con rkun pos gzir

364a2(rgyud): yid 'od rim pa de bzhin//oM'i mtshan ma la bab na//'thub mo dang ni drugs 'che zhing //gnas las nyams dang brdeg btsog dang //byas pa chud ni zlos par 'gyur//
364a3(rgyud): yi ge aM la ba 'gyur na//bran gza' dag ni rnyed 'gyur zhing //bu dang rig pa'ang rnyed 'gyur te//de bzhin grogs po rnyed par 'gyur//ji ltar sngon gyi a zhes pa//
364a4(rgyud): de bzhin mtha' ma'ang bzung bar bya//drug 'gyur du ni bzhag nasu//snga ma de bzhin sum 'gyur bya//sum brgya drug cur bsres nas//sa gzhi ru ni bcad nas kyang //
364a5(rgyud): yi ge lhag ma bzung byas te//dge dang mi dgra mtshon par bya//yung ne ri mo kyag kyug bri//dbyangs kyi dang po la sogs bgrang //yang na me tog gtor nas ni//
364a6(rgyud): de bzhin sa ni mtshon por bya//yang na snga dr-i ra hi ta'i//dusu rtsi ba po yis dalta//rnal 'byor bston bac+doMs rab rgyas pa'o//bicu gnyis kyi ni gnas dag tu//sems
364a7(rgyud): ni bskyed pa'i cho ga bshad//ro ti ta'i dus bdag nyid bsam//sa dbang phyug la de bzhin khyim//rmi lam la ni spun gyis bsam//bya ku la la nye du ste//ji dzI/
364b1(rgyud): la ni bu yi bsam//spro ba lnga ni dgra yir bstan//ran da la ni sbyar ba bsdam//ma ka ra la gso dpyad don//ru sbal la ni chos kyi don//khyu mchog la ni drag po'i las//bzang
364b2(rgyud): po la ni nor shes bya//gti mug la ni kun tu 'khrug/'phel ba la ni reg byed na//don rnams 'grub par 'gyur ba dang //nor dang 'bru dang phrad pa dang //grogs po sdug
364b3(rgyud): dang phrad par 'gyur//dus ni ring por mi sdod cing //myur du phrad 'gyur gdon mi za//sa dbang phyug la reg tsam gyis//lam du 'gro ba nyid dang ni//kha zas sems dang
364b4(rgyud): bu dang nor//las kyi bsam pa ston par byed//rmi lam la ni nor rnyed cing //mchod pa thob cing grogs dang phrad//gnyen bshes yid ni dga' ba dang //zhi zhing dgos
364b5(rgyud): pa'ang 'grub par ston//bya kun la la mya ngan dang //khyad par can gyi don nyams shing //gnyen 'dun dang ni 'bral bar 'gyur//bi tI skyes ni ster ba dang //byams pa
364b6(rgyud): smra ba rnyed 'gyur te//bu ni skye ba mthong bar 'gyur//mi kai ri la rtsod pa dang //ca cos kun tu nyon mongs shing //chom po bkra ni mi shes dang //gnyen 'dun nad kyis
364b7(rgyud): thobs par 'gyur//ran de la ni btung dang bza'//gos dang rgyan la sogs rnyed cing //stor ba slar yang rnyed pa dang //bud med sdug dang phrad par 'gyur//ma ka ra
365a1(rgyud): la sems bral dang //don gnyer 'bras bu med par 'gyur//yid 'ong nor dang 'bral 'gyur zhing //'dod pa rnams dang phrad mi 'gyur//ru sbrul la na
365a2(rgyud): skal bzang zhing //zhi dang srung dang bkra shis 'gyur//stan dang nor dang btung ba rnyed//khyu mchog la ni las rnams la//rgyal po'i chad pas nges par 'jigs/mya ngan dang ni gnas//
365a3(rgyud): 'gro//bye bral dag ni mthong bar 'gyur//bzang po la ni long spyod dang //don rnams thams cad nges par 'grub//mchod pa'i gnas 'gyur grogs dang ni//bkra shis dag
365a4(rgyud): ni 'byung bar 'gyur//gaN+DI mug la ni don rnams kun//snying po med pa'i rtsa dang mtshungs//gnas ni bcings dang lam gyi ni//'du shes dag ni mthong bar 'gyur//
365a5(rgyud): nyon cig lha mo skal chen mo//yan lag gi ni mtshan ma rnams//'phel ba'i nyi ma la mig g.yon pa//mgul na pha dang ma skrag par 'gyuraro//sa'i dbang phyug la
365a6(rgyud): ni mdzes par snang //rmi lam la ni gos rnyed//'phyo ba la ni nor rnyed//'bugs pa la ni ma dang pha la nyes don 'byung //smai ba le ni cir yang mi 'gyuraro//yugs sa mo
365a7(rgyud): pa ni gnyen 'dun 'ong ngo //chu srin la ni bge ba rnyed//ru sbal la ni 'thab rtsed do//khyu mchog la ni byang phyogs nas 'dron po 'ong ngo //bzang po dang /gti
365b1(rgyud): mug lnga de bzhin du bgo ba'o//'phel ba'i nyi ma la mig g.yas pa 'gul du'i 'bras bu yang snga ma bzhin//sa'i dbang phyug 'di ci'i mtshan mar yang mi 'gyuraro//rmi lam/

365b3(rgyud): la ni du ber ston no//chu srin la ni cir yang mi 'gyuraro//ru sbrul la ni bgo ba rnyed//khyu mchog la ni stor ba rnyed par 'gyuraro//bzang po la ni 'gron po 'ong bar 'gyuraro//
365b4(rgyud): gti mug la ni pha nya dang phred do//yang ro hi ta'i nyi ma la rna ba g.yas pa dun bud med dang blud//sa'i dbang phyug gis ni mdzes par 'gyur//rmi lam gyis ni mgu bar 'gyur
365b5(rgyud): byubyA kA lAs ni btung ba rnyed//bid tIs+ya ni cung zad skrag par 'gyuraro//mi kA ras kyang de bzhin//ra nAdas nI mya ngan gyis 'dzin//ma kA ras ni mdzes par 'gyuraro//kur mas/

365b7(rgyud): g.yon pa du na bza' ba dang btung ba 'ong bar 'gyuraro//sa'i dbang phyugs ni dge bar 'gyur//rmi lam gyis ni sngon ma mthong ba cung zad mthong bar 'gyuraro//byan/
366a1(rgyud): par gyur//smra sa la mya dun gyis 'dzin//TISh+Te t+pa la dge 'a gyur//bzung pos ni gtam ngan thos par 'gyur//gaN+DI mugs ni cir yang myi 'gyur

366b2(rgyud): dbang phyug kyang de bzhin//rmi lam gyi ni gtam 'dri ba dag 'ong ngo //bya ku lis ni 'thab rtsid do//bi tris ni bdag po mdzes par 'gyuraro//mi kaM rus kyang 'thab rtsod do//ran das

371b1(rgyud): rnamasu//rdo rje na chen rnam smras parla//mi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya//shes rA can gyis de'i nang du//'khor lo'i phreng nas rnam D+yan to//de yi dad pra pad+mA ni//dkar ngos
371b2(rgyud): ni mdzes par bya//slar yang de yi dbus gyur par//'od ldan pad+mo dmyur po b+hI//de nas sngags pas de'i nang du//rdo rje phreng ba kun la drugs bri//slarI yang dad chen mang
371b3(rgyud): brgyad pa//oMn+d+ra nI la'i 'od 'bar bri//rdo rje ka ba'i nang lags//dkyil 'khor lngas ni rnam rgyan+d+ra pa//ri rang lhun po'i steng du ni//sna tshogs pad+ma yid 'ong bsam/
371b4(rgyud): mkha' gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i//rdo rje mkha'agro dadre ba'i mchog/rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//rgyud kyi rgyal
371b5(rgyud): chen po rdo rje mkha' gro las rdo rje mkha' gro 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcu gnyis pa'o////de nas yang da bI sha bya ba//dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pa/
371b6(rgyud): gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni//sgrub pos dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'o//a ni stA re rjer bsams nA su//zla ni ling ge'i lte bar bsam//de nas mnyam par sbyar
371b7(rgyud): byas te//rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor lo kun//pad+ma'i lte ba rnamasu sbyar//a ba d+hU tI gnas de bzhin//smin ma'i bar du bzhag par bya//dbyangs yig dang
372a1(rgyud): yang dag ldan//bsgoms nA skad cig do la 'bar//de nas 'bar brong /mtsharanan//gnas sgyu yo 'khor lo bsam//lte ba skyed kha khA dang ni//dpral steng
372a2(rgyud): gtsug 'khor lo ni//dang po sngags tshogs byin gyis brlag/lte ba snying khar rnal 'byar mo//lce gnyis dpa' des byin gyis bad+mab//dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma//gnyis
372a3(rgyud): mi N+Do ga ji bzhin su/'ag le/ma'i 'khor la la gnas pa//mkhaM 'gra mA ni de bzhin 'khor//klog sna bud+d+hA nI gsal ba'i//yid shugs chen pos rnyeg
372a4(rgyud): na la 'byor du su ni//togas+yA tAn+ya rnams smra bar bya//shin tu phra ba'i rdul tshogs ni//shin tu phra ba'i das por snyam/'gyur ba med cing snang ba med//
372a5(rgyud): mi khyen 'bras bu s+thi ba'o//me tog la ni gnas bsamos te//ga la b+him+bit+ti rgyus 'debs 'gyur//byA DU dang+ka'i 'di mdzad pa//ltung byud ma yi sbyor ba
372a6(rgyud): bsgrub bya khe n+ya btsug nas ni//ljang rnying bzlas na ltung bar 'gyur//de nas nyi ma la gnas pa'i//mthu tshul nyi ma'i 'od can ni//bskum po'i me sbyar rob 'jigs
372a7(rgyud): pa'i//gsod mo bsams te yid kyis//bsti'i byar lhan cig cig gyur nas//steng du bltas na 'chi bar 'gyur//de nas rlung dang mi yi ni//dkyil 'khor
372b1(rgyud): gnas mo stag gi/phung po 'phro ba'i 'gugs ma bsam//yid kyis bsgrub bya'i snying zhugs te//da yi snying ni rtsa nas dbyung //'gugs ma'i sngags bzlas 'gugs par
372b2(rgyud): 'gyur//rlung gi dkyil 'khar sems kyis ni//rlung mdog bsgrub bya rlung nang bsam//slar yang bdag dang bsgrub bya ni/gcig tu gyur te gar mdzad pa'o//sngags zlos
372b3(rgyud): shing ni gar byas na//gar byed byed du 'jug par 'gyur//mchod pa rdo rje rab skor gyis//de nas las rnams kun bsgrub bya//snying kha nyid dang de bzhin kha//mgo dang spyi
372b4(rgyud): gtsug motshon cha ste//lte ba snyid kha rnams ni//dbugs mi g.yo bas bsgoms par bya//dang po rdo rje sems dpa' ste//gnyis pa pad+ma gar dbang rgyal//gsum pa rnam
372b5(rgyud): par snang mdzad//de bzhin bzhi pa rta mchog rgyal//lnga pa rdo rje nyi ma ste//drug pa he ruM kar ni brjod//slar yang lte bo snying kha dang //de bzhin kha dang mgo dang ni//spyi gtsug
372b6(rgyud): mtshoni cha nyid dag ste//rdo rje phag mo gshin rje ma//de bzhin rmongs ma bskyod ma ste//skrag ma dang ni gtum mo rnams//drug po 'di dag rig pa che//pha rol phyin pa rnam pa
372b7(rgyud): drug/de nas dbang bskur bsgoms nas ni//phyi nang mchod pa brtsam par bya//bdag nyid he ru kar byas nas//dpal ldan he ru ka dran bya//dam tshig ye shos gcig gyur
373a1(rgyud): pas//des 'di rdo rje can du brjod//rnal 'byor 'di ni mchod chen dang //de bzhin sngags kyi dgod pa ste//de nas dpa' bo mtshad shes nas//lus ni 'bad pa
373a2(rgyud): nyid kyis bya//sngags pas rang dgar dbye bya ste//phyin ci log tu nges par sbyar//tsher gcod pa dang phan 'dogs pa'i//las kyi mdog tu rnam par sgom/de nyid dbye bas phye nas ni///
373a3(rgyud): rtsa yi lam du sbyar bar bya//sbyor ba yi ni don+da rnams la//dga' ba chen po 'dris bsgrub bya//cho ga 'di yis bsgrubs na ni//lha dang lha min mir bcas 'grub//mkha' gro kun
373a4(rgyud): dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/rdo rje mkha 'gro bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje
373a5(rgyud): mkha' 'gro los dpa' bo gnyi su med pa'i mchod pa dang /las kyi tshogs rnams 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcu gsum pa'o////de nas sku gsung thugs kyis
373a6(rgyud): ni//'khor lor gnas pa'i bye brag dang //gnas kyi rab tu dbye ba dang //yul gyi dbye ba bshad par bya//mgo na me la ya yul te//spyi gtsug/dzA lan+d+ha ra yin//
373a7(rgyud): ur+yan rna ba g.yas pa ste//a re bu da ni rgyab phyogs yin//gnas kyi ming can rnam bzhi'o//go da ba ri rna g.yon te//rA me shwa r-i smin dbus gsungs/
373b1(rgyud): mig ni de bI kro Ti ste//dpung pa mA la ba zhes brjod//'di dgra nye ba'i gnas yin//gnas kyi khyad par tshul gyis ni//mkha' spyod thugs kyi 'khor lor gnas//kr-I na 'chun
373b2(rgyud): khung de bzhin du//nu ma o trer rab tu grags//de dag zhing ste lte ba ni//tr-I sha ku ni zhes bya yin//sna yi rtswa maM kro sa la//dri dag nye ba'i zhing du brjod//kha ne ka ling+ga ka
373b3(rgyud): yin te//mgrin pa lam pa kA ru brjod//tshan do ha zhes bya bar grags//snying kha kany+tsu zhes bya ste//chu so hi ma la zhes bya//nye ba'i rol sar brjod pa yin//gnas kyi
373b4(rgyud): khyad par tshul gyis ni//sa spyod gsung gi 'khor lor gnas//mtshan ni yi dgas gnas pa ste//bri he de ba bshang ba'i l-im//de dag 'dun sar brjed pa ste//baR+Ya ni so
373b5(rgyud): r-ISh+ma zhes bya//byin pa gnyis ni gsar gling ste//nye ba'i 'dun sa nyid yino//sor mo rnams ni na ga ra//rkang pa'i dol ni sin+d+hu ste//dur khrod ces ni bya ba brjod//mthe bong ma
373b6(rgyud): ru zhes bya ste//pus me ku lu tA zhes brjod//nye ba'i dur khrid sa 'og ni//mu yi 'khor lor yang drag gnas//rang lus skyes pa'i yul 'di dag/mkha' spyod ma
373b7(rgyud): gnasu brjod//phyi dang nang dang yang dag gnas//nyi shu rtse bzhir phye ba yis//sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo yin//gnas rnams dag ni thams cad du//rtse rnams
374a1(rgyud): /kun na yang dag bshad//yul 'di rnams ni bu mo gang //ye gzugs kyis gnas zhes//dpa' bo kun dang mnyam sbyor du'i//mkha' gru ma
374a2(rgyud): yi dra ba'i sdom//rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs///slar yang bsdus te bshad bya ba//de ni bdag gis bshad kyis
374a3(rgyud): nyon//prA l+lI ra ma la yer thod pa'i dum bu can dang rab tu gtum mo ste/so dang sen mo 'bab pa'o//dzA lan+d+ha ra ra keng rus chen po dang /gtum mig ma ste/skra dang
374a4(rgyud): spu 'bar pa'i//o rA ye nAr keng rus dang 'od ldan ma ste/lpags pa dang dri ma 'bab pa'o//ar bu dar mchi ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang sna tshan ma ste/shaM 'bab pa
374a5(rgyud): sti gnaso//go dra ba rIr lha'i ngag dang dpa' mo'i blo ma ste/thams cad du ni rgyus pa 'bab pa'o//rA me shwa ra ra dzod dngagra med pa dang mi thung ma ste/rus pa'i phreng ba
374a6(rgyud): 'bab pa'o//de bI ke Tir-i rdo rje'i 'od dang lang kA'i dbang phyug ma ste/rtag tu mchin pa 'bab pa'i//mA la bar rdo rje'i lus dang ljon grib ma ste/snying phrag 'bab pa
374a7(rgyud): ste nye ba'i gnas//de ltar bstan pa 'di dag ni//thugs kyi 'khor lo mkha' spyod de//snyoms par zhugs pas yang dag gnas//kA ma rU paM ni myu gu can dang sa srung
374b1(rgyud): m+b+ha/rtag tu TIg 'grub pal//shA ni rdo rje ral pacan dang 'dzugs byung rnon moste/mthos pa 'dab par grags pa ste zhing na/dz+ra shA ku na dang ba chen pa dang rlung gi shugs ma
374b2(rgyud): 'byung ma/ko sa lar rdo rje hUM mdzad dang nang 'bred ma ste/b+h+yo re'i phreng 'drab bya'o//nye bar zhing ngo //kA l-ing kAr nI shin hU~M zeng ba dang snrubs ni sti mo ste/
374b3(rgyud): rtsib logs kyi snal ma 'bab pa'o//lam pa gA rA ni rdo rje bzang ba shin tu bzang mo ste dong bu rnams lto 'ang 'o//rol sa'o//kuny+tsi ni 'jigs byed chen po dang rtswa snu ma ste/
374b4(rgyud): bshang ba 'bab par grag so//hi ma la yar ni mig mi bzang dang kha gdong ma ste/mtshogs ma'i slebs 'bab pa'o//nye ba'i rol sa'o//gsung gi 'khor lde spyod de/
374b5(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs pas yang dag gnas kr-i ta pu ring ni stongos po che dang 'khor lo'i shugs canA ma ste//thams cad du bad kan 'bub pa'o//gr-i t+ya de ba t+tAr ne rin chen
374b6(rgyud): rdo rje dang dum skyes ma ste/rtag tu nag 'bab pa'o//'dun snu'o/sau nASh+Ta ra ni d+hu mgrin dang glang sna mA ste/rtag tu khrag 'bab par gragaso//su bar+Na d+b+ha par na mkha'i snying
374b7(rgyud): dang 'khor lo'o ga cha ma ste/de bzhin du rdul 'bab po'i/nye ba'i 'dun sa'o//ne ge re re ni lha'i dgra dang shin tu dpa' mo ste/tshil 'bab pa'o//sin+d+hu'i yul du ni
375a1(rgyud): pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ma dang stongs tshon ma ste rtag tu mchi ma 'bab pa'o//dur khrod do//ma rung ni rnam par nga mdzad dang 'khor lo sgyur ma ste/
375a2(rgyud): mchil ma 'bab par gragaso//ku lu tA ra ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang brtson 'grus chen mo ste//snabs gzhonu 'bab pa'o//nye ba'i dur khrod do//sku yi 'khor lo sa
375a3(rgyud): 'og spyod//snyom par zhu las zhugs yin zhes//mkha'agro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'o//rdo rje mkha' gro bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//bcom
375a4(rgyud): ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' gro las//dpa' bo gnyisu med pa'i gnas bstan pa zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcu
375a5(rgyud): bzhi pa'o////de nas las kyi rab mchog ni//sbyor ba kun gyi dam pa ste//gang yang grub par byed pa'i sngags//de yi dbye ba rim bzhin bshad//yi ge ro
375a6(rgyud): nya la sogs sngags//mnga' yi shugs kyis yongasu 'khor//sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i dbusu ni//sde tshan brgyad kyis yongasu bskor//sngags rnams thams/
375a7(rgyud): cad 'byung ba ste//gzhan yang ci yang rung ba skye//chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba//lus can rnams kyi snying dga' byed//sgra lnga dang ni yang dag ldan//ya ra la
375b1(rgyud): bas rnam par klubs//long spyod 'khor lo zhes bya ba//ro rnams kyi ni rten rang bzhin//cha rnams bzhi po dag gis ni//kun nas yongasu bskor ba'o//bde ba chen po'i 'khor ya tshe//
375b2(rgyud): byang chub sum cu gnyis dang ldan//zla ba nyi mo zhes bya ba//g.yon dang g.yas kyi ngos gnyis//dpa' bo mkha'agro ma rnams kyi//'gro dang 'ong bar nges par brjod//
375b3(rgyud): gnas gnyis la ni mnyam par zhon//'og dang steng du yang dag brten//g.yon dang g.yas kyi ngos gnyis//dbyangs yig bcu gnyis steng bltas bris//ka sogs 'og
375b4(rgyud): tu bltas pa ni//ngos gnyis dag tu spel ba ste//dbus des ni sbyar bar bya//de ltar bstan pa 'di dag ni//tso dang sgra yi rang bzhin ni//gnyis med ye shes rdo rje ste//
375b5(rgyud): mkha' gro sgra yi rang bzhin//des 'byung sangs rgyas thams cad //gang du skye ba zhes byar grags/shin tu rnam dag ye shes che//lha mo kun gyi rang bzhin gang
375b6(rgyud): sems dpa'i zhes bya ste//mchog tu bde bar brjod pa yin//rang byung gi ni gzugs 'od nyid//spro dang sdud par byed pa'o//yi ge pho nya la sogs sngags//der ni cha dang
375b7(rgyud): dral ba gang //b+ha ge'i dbu su gzugs med pa//de ni rtag tu gnas pa yin//smin dbus pad+ma'i zla bi ru//bcu drug skud pas bskor ba yin//shes rab thabs kyi
376a1(rgyud): mnyam sbyor gyis//kha sbyor zhes byar brjod pa yin//lag gnyis kun tu 'khyud pa yin//rdo rje lu gu rgyud bcings brjod//slar yang rnam par grol ba'i/
376a2(rgyud): lam/ 'bab pa'i tshogs ni mchog tu dga'//sbyor ba kha sbyar nyid dang ni//rdo rje lu gu rgyud du bzhed//rdo rje pad+mo dbye ba dang //sgro chun sbrang rtsi byed par bshad//bskor
376a3(rgyud): ba gang phyir bskyod pa ste//bde de'i thabs kyis kun rig pa'o//dga' dang bde ba'i rang bzhin gyis//zhags pa pad+mor bcug pa yin//chags pa lcags kyu kho na
376a4(rgyud): ste//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgug/mi 'khrug rdo rjes dkrug par bya//de ni gsal zhing zhes byung brjod//de nas chag sogs nyon mongs kyi//bag
376a5(rgyud): chags dum bu nyid du bya//shin tu rgya cher dmigs pa yi//kun rdzob de bzhin brdung ba dang //dngos kun rdo rjes med par bya//rdo rje zhes bya de bzhin gshegs//
376a6(rgyud): ji ltar bstan kyang de dbu su//rtag stong 'byin dang sdud pa po//de ni de nyid zhes bya ste//rang byung gcig gis khyab pa'o//gang ming sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//sgyu ma zhes
376a7(rgyud): byar grags pa ste//gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na//thams cad bdag nyid gang gnas pa'o//'di ni kun mkhyen zhes bya ste//kun tu 'gro ba mi shigs pa'o//
376b1(rgyud): d+hU yain swA tsa ru//rgyu dang ma rgyu kun bskum b+ha//phyi rol yi b+h+yo smang stanas//spyong bzlas dang ldan par bya//sa rgyu 'bang rtag tu gnas//brtan bac+doMs kyis sa///
376b2(rgyud): tsub+h+rU~M bAng+ga lce dang brel ye shes suM sto d+ha ma mod//gsal de chos kyi che bzhin shes//mya ngani 'a slo pa dU shA shA rdul// n+da r+m+mar mdu bre kas sbubs ni//
376b3(rgyud): nAM phyi na sa//sa bon phreng ba de nas sgom//hUM gi skud pas rgyu bar bya//bsgyur b+hU 'gog par gyur na ni//gom pa gnyis kyang mi 'gre'o//'di yi shes rab ldan skyes te/
376b4(rgyud): de yi gzugasu gyur pas gnas//las kyi rlung gi sa brgyad nas//lte ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di nas 'bar//sgyu mchen po zhes byung bshad//las rnams thams cad ra
376b5(rgyud): sgrub pa'o//sgra rtsi brgyar gyur pa yi cha//s+yA da TIg klog 'od zlar tsa naM//lha yo rnal 'byor dus ni//ba spu rnams kyi bu ga gnas//phyogs bcu rnamasu spros nas ni//
376b6(rgyud): ded m+b+ha min+da kun bsdigs te//snying kha'i chos kyi 'khong po ni//bsregs te long spyod 'kho lo song //sde bug g.yas nas byung nas ni//slar yang zhugs te spyan
376b7(rgyud): mtshams kyi//mdzod spu'i khung nas byung na su//phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang //byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi//sna sgo g.yon du zhugs nas
377a1(rgyud): ni//spyi bo'i 'khor lo bsregs na su//sngon gyi lam nus slar byung ste//slar yang spyi gtsug du ni zhugs//bsregs par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas//dga'
377a2(rgyud): ba bskyed nas lte ba yi//dkyil 'khor du ni song gyur nas//sngon bzhin du ni gnas par gyur//dus min 'chi ba las rgyal nyid//yan lag khaM T+wAM ga dang sbyar//thod pa'i
377a3(rgyud): mchod yon snod du ni//zhal du mchod yin nges sbyar zhes//mkha' gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i//rdo rje mkha'agro bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//
377a4(rgyud): bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha'agro las//sku gsum dang sngags dang rgyud kyi 'byung ba dang /'chi ba slu ba zhes bya ba'i rim
377a5(rgyud): par phye ba ste bco lnga pa'o/////de nas dngos grub kun gyi gnas//gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa ste//yid 'ong bcud ni kun gyi brten//sems can kun la bde
377a6(rgyud): ster ba//'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis brgyas//bla re dam pa bris pos 'bab//mdab stong ldan pa'i pad+ma che//sbyor ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa la//der ni lha mos
377a7(rgyud): zhus gyur pa//'khor lo kun gyi nges pa dang //dbyings rnams kyi ni bye brag dang //yi ge dbye ba mi 'tshal te//'khor lo'i grangs ni ji lta bu//de rnams las ni
377b1(rgyud): ci zhig lags//sna tshogs glu yi sngags dang ni//'phrul 'khor dag ni mdor bsdus dang //'khor lo'i dbang phyug dus dang ni//de bzhin dpa' bo rnams kyis bstan//'di dag
377b2(rgyud): la ni tha tsom mchis//bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//rgyud rnams kun tu sbas pa gang //de dag thams cad zhu 'dod pa//legaso
377b3(rgyud): legaso lha mo che//blo gros chen mo legaso legs//mkha' 'gro ma ni thams cad kyang //the tsom skye na gzhan ci smos//sgyu ma kun tu rnam 'phrul ba//nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che//
377b4(rgyud): gang zhig bris pa tsam gyis ni//sgrub pos dngos sgrub thob 'gyur ba//mdor bsdus nas ni brjod b+h+yo ste//de ni bdagis bshad kyis nyon//gnag dang dmar bar rtag gyur nas//
377b5(rgyud): khyad par du ni gtor ma sbyin//tsa ru'i bza' ba lhan cig bya//sgrub pa po yis g.yon nas bskor//'di yis sgrub po kun la ni//ma mo dga' 'gyur the tsom med//de nas mkha'/
377b6(rgyud): 'gro ma rnams ni//sa rnams la ni rnam rol po//brtson chen 'khor lo sgyur ma dang //stobs chen ma dang ra'i dpa' mo//'khor lo'i go cha glang snu ma//khaN+Da ro hA 'khor lo'i
377b7(rgyud): shugs//bya gdong ma dang rta rna mo//shin tu bzang mo sngo bsangs mo//chang 'thung ma dang rlung shugs ma//de bzhin 'jigs byed chen mo dang //sa srung ma dang
378a1(rgyud): ljon grib ma//lang ga'i bdag mo mi'u thung mo//dpa' bo'i blo ma sna tshon mo//'od ldan ma dang gtum mig ma//rab gtum ma ste sgrub byed yin//
378a2(rgyud): mkha 'gro ma ni nyi shu bzhi//'di dag sngon nyid grub pa yin//rang ming brjod pa'i sngags la ni//mthan na hUM hUM phaT dang sbyar//oM ni thams cad bsal byed//grub
378a3(rgyud): gsol 'dod pa thams cad la//rnal 'byor dam mchog 'di mthong na//gzhan dge snying po med rtswar mtshungs//dpa' bo nyid gyur grub pa ni//dpal ldan hA ru ka yi
378a4(rgyud): ni//dkyil 'khor dam pa mthong ba yin//de nas de shes rtag sgom pa//dngos grub de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs//nyon cig lha mo shes rab can//rig pa'i
378a5(rgyud): rgyal po sgrub pa'i thabs//'khor lo chen po rmad gyur pa//gdengs ka'i dbang phyug zhes bya ste//thos pa tsam gyis sreg byed na//ming dang ldan par bris pa yis//gdeng
378a6(rgyud): ka thams cad smos ci dgos//dbang ldan nas ni brtsams na su//klu rnams sa bon las byung ba//rin chen dang ldan gdengs gsum mtho//gzhan yang phyogs ni
378a7(rgyud): kun tu bsam//de nas mgur ni 'di bzhes te//shar du k+Shi ma ba bor du bri//nub tu hi ste byang du ho//gshin rjer hUM zhes bya ba bris//ki li kI li yau dag su/
378b1(rgyud): rje rnyed pa//rlung ni so la sa li gri//mAM ts+tsha phyog su du ny-id//dang por rab gtus ma nas no//brtson tshon ma yo mAthar thug pa//sngags 'di dag na byin gyis pan/
378b2(rgyud): khyor lo 'di ni skal tshe ni ldan//dgra rnams kyi ni bcad gcod pa//hU~M phaT zhes bya sbrel ba yi//bsgrub bye yi dbu su bri//lan gcig bzlas pa'i gu gul gyis/
378b3(rgyud): gdug pa nyid du sbyar byas la//klu rnams thams cad 'bebs par 'gyur//lag po g.yon pa la 'khor lo 'di dngo su 'am yid kyis bris la sngags lan gcig bzlas pa
378b4(rgyud): byabs na 'chi bas dusu zin pa slong bar byed//ka ra bi ra'i mdab ma'i khu bas ka ra bi ra'i smyug bus bris te//len gcig bzlas pas reg na mngal gang du 'dod pa dar/
378b5(rgyud): 'pho bar 'gyuraro//dug dang lan tshwa dang skye tshes bris te//khros na bsod par 'gyu ro//ro bsregs pa'i 'gal ba da du ra'i khu bas bsad de 'byung po'i nyi ma la de nyid kyis
378b6(rgyud): 'khor lo bris la lan gcig bzlas pa des gang la bsnun pa lhung bar 'gyur ro//sang ko ta'i smyug gus sngags cho ga snga ma bzhin bris la//thal ba la mngon par bsngags
378b7(rgyud): te/gang la bsnun pa de sha zas bzung bar 'gyuraro//dur khrod kyi sol bas shi leb bam rtsig nges la 'byung mo'i mtshan mo gang gi snying khar ming bris pa de gdon chen
379a1(rgyud): pos bzung bar 'gyuraro//bsgrub bya'i gzugs byas la/de'i snying khar 'khrul 'khor bcug ste/zhag bdun gyi bar du dri'i chu'i nang du bzhag nas/
379a2(rgyud): A ti mug ta'i lcug ma la lan bdun bsngags te dr-i l-i bsnun na/zhig bdun gyi mthar rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur//'khor lo de nyid bye brag tu dur khrod kyi ras la pho
379a3(rgyud): nya'i kha dog gis bye brag tu gyur ba brisi la las kyi pho nya dang lhan cig tu bsgrub par bya'o//ka ra bi ra'i lcug ma khru phyed dang gnyis kyi tshad dang ldan pa la gang la mngon
379a4(rgyud): par phyogs te sngags bris nas ro bsregs pa'i me 'bar ba la dor te/ji srid ma tshig pa dang myur du blangs la rig pa'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas nas gang zhig dran te//
379a5(rgyud): glad la bskor na/de de'i mod la rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyuraro//skyes pa'i ro'i kham phor la ba bla dang yung ba'i khu bsre gang gis ming bris pa de de'i mod la
379a6(rgyud): bcings pa 'gyur ro//dur khrod kyi ras sam zla mtshan gyi ras la shing a shau ga'i smyug gus klu rnams spangs pa'i 'khor lo 'di bris la/de'i dbu su sngags pas cho
379a7(rgyud): ga bzhin yi ge aM dang spel ba bris na mkha' gro ma'i khyad par thams cad dang /lus srul po thams cad bcings par 'gyuraro//thod pa la skyes pa'i khrag gis gang
379b1(rgyud): gi ning bris la sngags pa khro ba dang byacas pas sngags bzlas na/de'i khrag 'gugs par byed la yid zhi ba dang ldan pas zhi pos sngags bzlas na slar btang bar 'gyur//'khor la da nyi
379b2(rgyud): zla bas+yA brtan cid bas lte bar gar tsa nas gro ga le sgyur rgyal gyi sbyin par bris te/bud med gang gis rtagA tu bcas na rig de'i rgyal po nyid de'i snyoms 'jug
379b3(rgyud): 'gyuraro//bud med dang zhi ba'i 'dus pas kun tu spyod pa'i mchog de'i lag mthil na yod pa'i dpal gang gis kyang dgrag par mi nus la/rnam pa de lta bu'i tshi ga dang
379b4(rgyud): ldan pas ni dngos grub thams cad kyi 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das 'di la ni brtul zhugs dang spyod pa dang bsnyung ba dang /cho ga med par yang cho ga zhi ba
379b5(rgyud): mo'i sbyor ba'i tshul 'di nyid kyis las thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin byed//na mkha' dbyings kyi dbus bsam pa//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste//'od zer
379b6(rgyud): tshogs ni gsal ba'i mdangs//'khor lo'i phreng ba rnam par klubs//de dbus 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dang //pad+ma'i phreng bas shin tu mdzes//slar yang 'khor lo bri brar
379b7(rgyud): bya//rdo rje phreng ba shin tu mdzes//slar yang 'khor lo bri bar bya//rdo rje phreng ba rnam par 'phog/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje mi//dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor lta bu yin
380a1(rgyud): namakha' thams cad ga lag byed pa//rang gi lus lus spro bar bya//dkar dang dmar dang sbyin po ste//kha dgu mchog gi bye brabru bya//bya ba'i cho ga 'di me/
380a2(rgyud): nI//dpa' bo'i dbang phyug de bzhin bri//dbusu bsgrub par bya ba'i ming //ji ltar 'dod bzhin sbyar bar bya//phyi rol rdo rje'i phreng ba ni//'di zer 'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs
380a3(rgyud): br-i//'di ni srung ba chen po ste//thams cad srung ba bla na med//rims dang nad dang dug dang ni//mkha' gro ma yis 'che ba dang //gdon dang bdud dang log 'dren dang //
380a4(rgyud): gang yang lus srul la sogs pa//grib ma yang ni mi 'god na//de yi lus lta smos ci dgos//bla gzugs lta bu'i yi ge blta//phyogs bcur rnam par 'byerab
380a5(rgyud): byed//dkar po yis ni zhi 'gyur te//nag po skad cig dag gis bsod//dmar po yis ni dbang byed de//de nyid kyis ni nges par 'gugs//ser pos nges par 'ching /
380a6(rgyud): 'gyur te//dmag gi dpung ni 'ching bar 'gyur//zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te//las thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i srung ba'i 'khor lo'o//bka'
380a7(rgyud): yi 'khor lo'i khyad par ni//de nas yang dag bshad par bya//las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis//sems can kun gyi don byed pa'o//nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas
380b1(rgyud): / la Sh+T+r-i k+ShaT / la la ba lta nu bsam//da bus pad+ma b+h+yoHga/bcu drug mod ma sa mo par//dod bus pad rgyan mA ga brgyud ga/
380b2(rgyud): nyams dga' bar//tsan den das rabs thug nas ni//2zhing shin tu 'jam pa yi//stan la skye gnas //sngags pasdu bska na
380b3(rgyud): brgyan brnyad du bas pa //yan lpag nus pas rgyan ci nga /ra pa blo//mau dgas kyis mayin// sa
380b4(rgyud): dag la yang // dgas sbyin rje zhag dang ni//de bzhin can dan dmar bas m+b+ha/2oM ma snang ba dadi bzhin du na gsunas/ ldan ma
380b5(rgyud): chung bskyod nas ni//bram ze gsod pa 'ang nyin bdun 'brug/tsan dan dmar po'i rdul las ni//baMsgru par hU~M ba'i gzugs byas la//tsha ba gsum gyis sras thugs
380b6(rgyud): nas//sgra tshil gyis kyang thug par bya//zangs me'i khab kyis hUM gnas dbug ni seng ljang medab mi du mdal//blo dang ldan pas nyin bdun 'gro//sgrub pab ma
381a1(rgyud): brgya bzlas na//rgyal po blon bcas mdun na 'don//btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas par ni//myur du 'gugs par byed pa yin//gro ga yi ni mdab ma la//
381a2(rgyud): ro yaM sen rtsi ro tsa nas//mi yi bdag po 'khor bcas pa//ming dang spel te bri bar bya//mngon par phyogs te bzlas bzhin du//seng ldeng dang ni dur khrod mer//ji srid spra tshil ma
381a3(rgyud): zhu bar//me yi steng du gdung bar bya//bsgrub bya mngon par gdungs tsam gyis//lha dang lha min 'od 'gyur na//sa steng skye bo smos ci dgos//yi dgas sen rtsi skyes pa yis//
381a4(rgyud): khrag dang gi wang bcas pa yis//bsgrub bya'i ming spel gro gar bri//bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang rjes sa//tsan dan dmar po nyid dang ni//dur khrod zas lhag thal ba rnams//grub pa po
381a5(rgyud): yis gcig bsdus nas//seng ldeng mo ni du med la//rdul de lag pa gnyis kyis ni//mnyes nas sbyin sreg byas pa yi//thal ba de ni bzung nasu//bsgrub par bya ba'i
381a6(rgyud): gzugs bya ste//snying khar 'khor lo bcug nas ni//zlos bzhin du ni mer gdungs na//brgyal zhing sems dang bral 'gyur la//rmongs shing rab tu myos nas ni//
381a7(rgyud): rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur//tshe ga'i bya ba 'di yis ni//yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis bzhed//lha mo sngags chen 'di dag ni//mkha' gro ma yi snying 'joms
381b1(rgyud): yin//de nas de bzhin gshegs kun gyis//yid 'ong zhi ba skyed pa mo//bka' yi 'khor lo bshad par bya//mkha' dbyings dbus gyur bsam pa ni//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
381b2(rgyud): dam pa ste//rdo rje rtse gsum kha bzhi pa//des ni de nas bri bor bya//de dbus pad+ma mdabargyad pa//shin tu mdzes po bris na su//bai ro tsa na'i rig pa che//sems can
381b3(rgyud): kun byed sdud pa mo//rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//nAd thams cad med par byed pa zhes bya ba'i srung ba'i 'khor
381b4(rgyud): lo'i sbyor ba'o////de nas bcom ldan kun mkhyen pas//ye shes mngon par shes pa yi//'khor lo zhes bya bka' stsal pa//ge sar lte bar ldan pa yi//
381b5(rgyud): pad+ma mo ba ma drug par bri//zla ba bzang pos nye bar rgyan//rdo rje phreng bas rnam par klubs//de yi phyi rol 'khor lo ste//ston ka'i zla ltar dri med pa//yi ge'i
381b6(rgyud): mchog ni rnam pa bdun//lha mo chen mo phan pa gcig/bdud thams cad kyi las 'joms par byed pa 'khor lo'i rgyal po zhes bya'o//tsan dan dkar po ro tsa nas//
381b7(rgyud): gro ga la ni bris ni su//'khor lo lag pa g.yon par bcang //'khor lo 'di ni lha mo che//las kyi 'od kyis rgyan pa yin//de nas bsgrub bya nyid dbu su//bsams te
382a1(rgyud): stong du bzlas nas na//yi ge shal gyi rnam pa ltar//dang mas te nad kyis gdus la bstan//mthong ba tsa mu byis mod la ni//nad rnams kun lus
382a2(rgyud): rnam grol bar//'gyur ba nyid du the tsom med//lag pa g.yon par 'khor lo 'di//zla ba'i dbu suM rnam bkod na//ston ka yi ni zla 'drar 'gyur//'khor lo 'di ni
382a3(rgyud): lha mo tshe//las kyi 'od kyis rab rgyan na//lus kyi cho ga mthong ba yis//bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyur//dur khrod ras sam thod pa 'am//A ga yi ni mda'
382a4(rgyud): ma la//sngar bstan pa yi sal ba dang //skyes bu'i khrag gi snag tsha yis//sgrub pos mi rus skyug gus bri//nyi ma'i dbus gyur khro sems kyis//gzugs
382a5(rgyud): brnyan byas la bsgrub bya yi//dbusu de na bcug nasu//ske tshe yis ni byugs nas ni//yang dang yang du bsro ba re bya//sngags kyi rgyal po bskul ba yis//bya ba thams cad byed/
382a6(rgyud): par 'gyur//'di yi nad rnams thams cad ni//'phel dang de bzhin sbyor byed pa'o//rims la yi dgas snying khar bri//'ga' ri yi dgas klad pa ste//brjed byad rlung
382a7(rgyud): dang sprin la bri//gzer bar bya ba mdung la ste//dug dang mdze nad lto 'phyo la//gza' la gza' yi mtshan mar bri//mdor bsdus nas ni 'khor lor dgod//shal
382b1(rgyud): dang b+ha ba'i 'dra 'dra ba'i//yi ge bdud rtsi rgyun 'bab pas//stan ka'i zla zer lta bur /so gtan sam bcan gyis ni//'tsho ba'ang nges par slong bar 'gyur//sbrul tshon brgya yi/
382b2(rgyud): zinas na//'chi ba'ang myur du slong bar byed//dug gis brgyal bar byur ba dag/bsten pa tsam gyis slong bar 'gyur//rims dang gdon dang brjed byed dang //lag pa mthong
382b3(rgyud): bas brlag par byed//grib ma yang ni mi 'god na//de yi lus lta smos ci dgos//zangs ma yi ni mdab ma 'am//lag pa g.yon par 'khor lo 'di//ba bla dang ni yung
382b4(rgyud): bas bri//de nas chu mi nang bzhag la//ji ltar 'byung bzhin 'bad de mchod//mtshams kyi dusu mnyam gzhag pas//de bzhin du ni sngags bzlas bya//chu yi nang nas bton
382b5(rgyud): na su/'o mas bkrus la rgya mtshor gzhugs//g.yul du khu tshur bcings nas ni//rgyun rnams kun gyis rnam rgyan te//yi la rtag tu zlos byed na//ji srid khu tshur
382b6(rgyud): ma dkrol bar//myur du thams cad rengs 'gyur te//dgra bo grol te lag na ni//mtshon cha byar te thogs pa yang //ji srid khu tshur me dkrol bar//mtshon cha
382b7(rgyud): gtong bar mi nu so//yi ge bdun dang rnal 'byor ma//drug gi yi ge 'di dag ni//'khor le drugau la gnas par ni//lag pa'i dbu su dgod na su//cho ga rig pas
383a1(rgyud): btsung par bya//kha nas gsang sngags rgyal po zlos//de yi gzugs gyur bzung nas ni//de ni 'gug 'gyur the tsam med//tsan dan dmar po'i rdul dang ni//
383a2(rgyud): lan tshwa ske tshe de bzhin te//bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes rdul dang ni//gcig tu byas nas brtag par bya//lan brgyar bzlas te rab bsgoms na//sa dag skye bo'i nor dang ni//
383a3(rgyud): bcas te dbang du 'gyur ba 'am//de ni 'gug 'gyur the tsom med//sbyor ba 'di ni 'grub pa ste//gzhan dag tu ni nga mi smra//rdul de nyid ni bzung no su//lcags phyed
383a4(rgyud): dang ni bsre bar bya//dur khrod ras la btums nas//lan bdun ni bzlas par bya//lam gyi bzhi mdor sor brgyad tsam//brkos te dgra yi ming nas ni//bzung nas
383a5(rgyud): sa yi dgab par bya//gang gri ming bzung de bcings 'gyur//phye ma de nyid bzung nasu//'o ma yis ni 'bad de bkru//slar yang 'gro la 'gyur the tsom med//phye ma de nyid
383a6(rgyud): bzung na su//smyo byed lnga dang ldan par bya//ro yi gos las bsgrub bya yi//ming bris nas ni gtum par bya//lan brgya bzlas te dur khrod du//sbas na skyes bu 'phral du
383a7(rgyud): ni//smyo 'gyur 'di la the tsom med//phyung nas pa yi 'o ma yiso//'bad de slar yang dkrus na ni//'grol 'gyur 'di ni the tsom med//rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin//
383b1(rgyud): gshegs//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//de nas bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs//rdo rje dpa' bo'i 'khor lo gsungs//zla ba'i dbus gyur rdo rje ni//rtse gsum de bzhin
383b2(rgyud): kha drag pa//slar yang zla bar pad+ma ni//mdab drug legs par gnas pa bri//de yi dbus gyur sa bon ni//'dod don thams cad sgrub byed pa'o//sngags pas lte bar ba
383b3(rgyud): bar bya//bsgrub bya'i ming ni sbrel bar bya//rdo rje sems sogs lha rnams ni//thams cad sna tshogs bla na med//sangs rgyas kun gyi go cha che//mdzes ma'i gdung can
383b4(rgyud): khyed la bshad//dbusu snga ma'i gsang sngags bri//pad+ma'i mdab mar de bzhin gzhan//ri bo drug ni yongs spangs pa//rdo rje yi ni lte bar bri//gur gum sen rtsi rang
383b5(rgyud): khrag dang //ro tsa na yes gro ga la//cho ga bzhin du bris nas ni//dus gsum du ni bzlas byas la//mchod tshan byas nas gzung ba bya//lan bdun du ni mngon zlas te//gos
383b6(rgyud): kyi tha mar bcing bar bya//lam du 'gro na rkun po dang //stag sogs 'jigs par mi 'gyuraro//thams cad du ni srung 'gyur ba//'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med//lte ba
383b7(rgyud): der ni thig le yis//bskor ba'i thig le dag kyang bya//a ri tAM ta ka bcud dang //yung ba dag gis khyad par du//a sho ka'i smyug gu yis//dpa' bo yis ni ras
384a1(rgyud): mar grI//bsgrud rgya maung dang spel ba yi//sngags 'di stong du de nas ban+d+ha//sgrung bya'i rkang rjes sa dang ni//zang po che yis rmya rjes rtul//dur khrod tha
384a2(rgyud): bar bcas pa las//sgrub pos gzugs brnyan byas nasu//bcing bas bciras te de yi ni//snying kha ru ni gzhug par bya//me tog ser bas mchod nas ni//gsang ba'i
384a3(rgyud): gan su sbas gyur na//dgra rnams thams cad 'ching 'gyur zhing //brlag pa byed pa mi bzad par//rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis
384a4(rgyud): gsungs//mkha' gro mi'i snying po'i sngags//de nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs//namakha'i dbyings gyur sa bon ni//kun tu 'od zer rab 'phro ba//ston ka'i zla
384a5(rgyud): ltar dri med pa'i//'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu gnyis bya//rtsibs de rnams las ban gyi//yi ge mchog tu phan pa dgod//de yi lte bar dgod bya ba//rig pa chen mo
384a6(rgyud): yi ge tshe//srung ba rdo rje'i cho ga rigs//mkha' gro ma kun cho ga bya//sngags kyi rgyal po bskul ba yi//dbusu bsgrub bya'i ming bri bya//rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan
384a7(rgyud): pa ru/despro ba'i bdag nyid can gyis spro//gur gum dang ne ro tsa nas//gro ga 'am ni ras dkar la//snying stobs can gyis bri bar bya//las kyi cho ga mthong ba
384b1(rgyud): yis//thams cad du ni smyung ba dang //sgrub pa po yos sngar bstan bzhin//gdug pa rnams ni tshwar gtsung byed//dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'i//las mchog de nas//
384b2(rgyud): bshad par bya//gang zhing baisgrubs pa tsam gyis ni//'jig rten gsum po dbang byed pado//skye gnyis rdo rje'i rigs dang ni//gzugs bzang bu mo gzhan yang rung //kA ra
384b3(rgyud): bi ra'i me tog dmar//rgyal gyi sbyor bas bsgrub par bya//gau ra~M tsa nas bsgrub na sa//me tog dar ni chur gnas la//sgrub po shin tu mnyam gzhag pas//lan brgya ru na
384b4(rgyud): bzlas par bya//chu bo chen por zhugs nasu//lte ba man chad chur bcug ste//lag pa thal sbyar dbus bzung nas//rig pa stong du bzlas par bya//snyim pa chu yis bkang
384b5(rgyud): ba dang //bcas pas sgrub pos btung bar bya//de nas de ni 'grub 'gyur te//sgrib pos ngag ni grub pa yis//rgyal po chung mar bcas pa dag/yid kyis 'gugs 'gyur gdon
384b6(rgyud): me kye/kar bar ro me tog ni//dmar po med dge bcung nas ni//ri//ba~M lan 'dun bzlas byas la/mye gnas dbusu gzhug bA ste/me de ni khri sbyar nas//sa
384b7(rgyud): ba'i gan su bzhag par bya//gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor pas//brgya phrag gcig tu bzlas par bya//sgrub po rtse gcig yid kyis ni//me tog de ni blangs nasu//
385a1(rgyud): tog gis ni gang bsnun pa//de yi modado la dbang du 'gyur//brgyal zhing sems dang bral ba dang //yan lag tshigs kun gzhan dbang ste//mngon gyur sems
385a2(rgyud): ni ldog pa ru//skad cig gis ni dbang byed 'gyur//'di ni mngon sum grub pa yi//don yod dbang du byed pa yin//zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs//rnal 'byor ma
385a3(rgyud): rnams 'gugs pa'i cho ga 'khor lo'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'o//gang zhig bris pa tsam gyis//rdo rje sems dpa'ang brlag 'gyur zhing //dngos grub myur du ster 'gyur ba//
385a4(rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad par bya//zla ba'i dbus gyur rdo rje ste//de bzhin gzhan yang pad+ma'o//kun nas rnam par 'phro bya yi//mkha' gro ma yi sa bon dgod//dbu su rdo rje
385a5(rgyud): phag mo ni//shin tu drag cing gsal ba'i gzugs//yi ge'i dgod pas dgod par bya//rim pa de ltar brjod pa la//zhi la zhi ba'i yid kyisu//ro tsa na yis gro gar/
385a6(rgyud): bri//ma mo'i gnas dang dur khrod du//gos chen de bzhin khro dang bcas//chags pa la ni dmar po'i gos//rgyas la gos ser de bzhin te//de dang der ni skyom byas nas/
385a7(rgyud): ci rigs par ni sprul par bya//bu mo gzho nu'i ro yi ni//gos ni 'bad de blangs na su//tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi la//de nyid las byung sol ba yis//sna tshogs rdo rje
385b1(rgyud): kha bzhi la//sngags dang spel bar bris nas ni//lan bdun du ni bzlas nas//gang gi khyim du sbas gyur pa//de nI gAshin rje'i grong khyer du//nyi ma bdun gyis 'gro bar 'gyur/
385b2(rgyud): de yi rkang pa'i sbubs dang //bum pa la sogs drug kyang ring //rus pa'i phur bu'i smyu gur ni/'khrul 'khor 'di ni bcug bya ste//cho ga'i sbyor ba 'od yis ni//'a 'gyur
385b3(rgyud): 'dir ni gdon mi za//las rnams kun la sgrub pa pos//cho ga dang ni ldan par bya//rang gis gzung ba'i sngags kyis ni//bskal pa bye ba brgyas mi 'grub//las 'di mchog tu shes
385b4(rgyud): bya ste//sngags gzhan rgyas pas ci zhig bya//de dag thams cad spangs nas//'di ni 'bad de bzung bar bya//gang dang gang gi bsam gtan gyis//sgrub bos bzlas pa brtsam
385b5(rgyud): par bya//sbyor ba de dang de dag gis//'dod pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur//ji ltar nor bu dag pa ni//rdzas gang la rten de gzugs 'dzin//de bzhi ni rdo rje mkha' gro yang /
385b6(rgyud): yang drug bsam gtan mchog 'dzin 'gyur//bsam pa gang dang gang gis ni//mi rnams yid ni yang dag sbyor//de dang de yi dngos 'gyur te//sna tshogs gzugs can nor
385b7(rgyud): bu bzhin//de nyid bsdus dang 'dus pa ste//gzhan yang sngon dang tha ma yan//de nyid sbyor ba'i cho ga can//bya ba'i rgyud rnams thams cad du//ji srid ma yis 'jig ga
386a1(rgyud): bar//de der 'phro ba ston rmongs 'gyur//thams cad du ni spangs pa ste//brtson 'brus pha rol 'joms pa'o//rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam ldan pa'i//rdo rje
386a2(rgyud): slob dpon bdag nyid che//myur du dngos grub skye 'gyur ba//'phral du yang dag yid ches byed//sgrub pos phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis//snyon mi rmongs par 'grub par 'gyur//
386a3(rgyud): dam chis mi ldan mi dag la//klog gam gal te byin gyur na//dam pa'i bdag nyid bcom nas ni//ngan 'gro rnamasu ltung bar 'gyur//g.yon gyi rgyud ni dmigs na su//skye bo
386a4(rgyud): g.yon gyi spyod pa bya//thams cad g.yon pas byas nas ni//myur du dngos grub 'grub 'gyur zhes//sgyu ma kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i//rdo rje mkha' gro bde ba'i
386a5(rgyud): mchog/rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal rdo rje mkha' bro las/dpa' bo thams cad dang
386a6(rgyud): mnyam par sbyor ba'i 'khor lo 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcu drug pa'o////de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//snying po thams cad bsdus pa
386a7(rgyud): ste//sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir//sgrub po'i bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i mchog/ga bur dang ni gur gum dang //gan d+ha gan d+ha pa ta ste//shing cha dang ni sug
386b1(rgyud): smel bcas//ku sum dang ni ngo bzhin chu//bi si ta dang kun du ru//de bzhin ri yi zhags dang ni//ri skyes dang ni sbu gu'i zhang //dri yi mar khu so dang ni//de bzhin lag skyes kyi
386b2(rgyud): ni rdul/dra gangs kyi chu dang snying po dang //rgya mtsho las skyes de dag ni//lus can rnam la phan byed pa//gang gang la ni gangs chu bzhin//de ltar bco brgyad rdzas rnams ni//
386b3(rgyud): bcud kyis len mchog phan byed yin//de nas brtag pa'i las dang ni//yon tan yan lag cho ga bshad//tsam pa ka dang bai ku la//na gaM ge sar ku mu da//ut+pal she
386b4(rgyud): pA li ka dang //sbrang rtsi 'dzog dang bri yang ku//ku su ma ni nyid dag go/shrI pha la dang bo so 'cha'//ka pi ta dang la ku tsha//sku ba dang ni brta kiM/a ru ra dang ba ru ra//
386b5(rgyud): ba la ta ka skyu ru ra//e la tsi dang phu na ka/a ran da dang ma ri tsa//de bzhin du ni pi pi ling //bca' ba dang ni shu dag dang //yung ba dang ni ru rta dang //bca' sga dang ni
386b6(rgyud): thob skya dang //rlan can gyi ni do ba dang //nA ga pha la dkar po dang //de bzhin rgan po gzhon nur byed//gleng tshan dgra dang ri mdzes dang //'dzag dang byis pa stug
386b7(rgyud): dang /ral pa dmar po smyo byed dang //mtshan mo'i shing dang myur 'gro dang //kA tam pa dang gosar shing ste//de bzhin du ni she ri sha/ka rany+dza dang shri khru dang /
387a1(rgyud): rnam pa dang ni pi las//de bzhin gdu ma dza ro//pa la sha dang can dan gnyis//de bzhin a gor nag po dang //gur gum gur shing byar ka/sbrang
387a2(rgyud): mok+Sha pus ka ra//me tog 'bras bu rtsa ba dang //shun pa shong dang ro nyid do//khu byug zangs kyi gtsug pud can//bya rog dang ni ga ra ra dang //rma bya ti byi pug ran dang //
387a3(rgyud): drang srong bu stobs 'phel bar byed//rwa dang ri blong ri dgas dang //sa li grwa dang phag dang ni//khyad par du ni byi ba rnams//nad rnams thams cad 'joms par byed//
387a4(rgyud): me tog 'bras shunaSh+Ti tshang //de bzhin du ni 'bru yi chang //gzhan yang chang gi bye brag dag/mdor bsdus nas ni btung de'i mchog/'di dag skyes pa bud med kyi//stobs
387a5(rgyud): rnams bskyed pa'i sman yin te//bza' dang btung dang gzhib pa dang //bldag pa dang ni mur ba dang //sna sman mgo bor bsku ba dang //bkru ba dang ni dril phyis dang //
387a6(rgyud): daza' dang btud sogs de dag ni//rnal 'byor pa yi sbyor ba mchog/de ltar drug cu rtsa bzhi yi//rdzas dang bco brgyad dag tu sbyar//sbom po phra mo'i sbyor ba rnams//
387a7(rgyud): skyes pa dang ni bud med kyang //chung ngu la sogs dbye ba ste//rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan sogs//re re zhing yang gsum du 'dod//nag po dkar po sngo bsongs te//
387b1(rgyud): 'dzag dang de bzhin 'pho bA la'o//dak+Sha dang mdzu' bshes par ma skye//khams kyi sde tshan bsdus pa yin//dpa' bo gcig dang skye gnyis rtsa//'bras bu chen po ska ba gsum//lhung
387b2(rgyud): tsher dang ni dngul chu bzhi//bdud rtsi yi ni snying po pa//dus drug de bzhin gya cu ste//bdun po yal go mdab sogs bcas//skam saM dang ni brla can yul//mar dang mar nag dkyu sman
387b3(rgyud): ni//rno dang dngul tshwa'i za su sbyin//rang skyur dang ni yung ba dag/tshe mnyam dngul chu'i 'bras bu ste//nyi ma'i 'od zer bsros nas ni//sbrang rtsa yi ni thigs pa glugs//thil
387b4(rgyud): sman lan tshwas bu gar stu go/ro ni skra bo rnams dang yang //lhad tsher dkar po'i skyo ma sbyin//dngul chu drug char bya ba mtshig/skyed byed don ni rga ba 'joms//tshe ni tshad ldan
387b5(rgyud): 'ching byed de//'bras bus bya ba byed par 'gyur//sngon du gser shog sgrub pa yis//rang skyon 'joms pa'i cho ga yin//de nas chu dang lan tshwa dang //thal ba 'am
387b6(rgyud): rdul ni byugs par bya//rlon mo blugs nA skra dkar skye//gling chen mgo yo bcud blangs la//seng ge'i tshad du btso bar bya//de nAsA slar ni phyung na su//Arga'i shing gi
387b7(rgyud): khu ba glugs//tshos pa'i 'od kyis snying mig 'joms//tsan+d+ra dang ni ra sa ni//sgog skya dang ni ke ra sa dang //a tra pa ti'i rus pa dang //de bzhin du ni mi
388a1(rgyud): rtag gzung //rtswa mr-i da ni kun dus//sar ba dang san mo dang //nor lha zla 'don gsar//thogs pa'i rgyun dang kA ta ma g+ha/tsa ba kI ri so bad+ma/
388a2(rgyud): shi shu bil ba ud pa la//rang sgyur dang ni bcas po ru//'dzag dang dngul chu kha tshes bya//byung nu sbrul gyi gzugs ltar 'gyur//khrag dang smyo byed mtshan shing zlu rma//
388a3(rgyud): sgra dkar gyi nI nyes pa 'joms/krorgas dang mdzend sel bar byed//rnon po thal sman bcas pa yin//bkrus shing bskus na gzhang 'brum 'joms//lto skyes ma
388a4(rgyud): stongs rdzas kyi las//bcud na len mar zhag bsngags//shau ri sha yi rtsas kyang gi zag/mgor gnas la skyes ldan par bya//mdog dmar dngul chu rmongs pa gso//
388a5(rgyud): gsol te 'khrul na 'bras bu'i lam//tshad las 'das na dug tu 'gyur//de nas lpags pa shun pa dang //me tog dang ni 'bras bu sogs//kha dang skra dang mngar ba
388a6(rgyud): dang //tshwa dang skyur po lnga sogs pas//khyad par du ni brdo bye ba//kha med rtswar ni btse bar bya//kha dang bcas par sreg pa ste//char bcad pa dang mnan pa yis//
388a7(rgyud): kha med pa dang zod pa'i dbyibs//'od ma dang ni bya rog mchu//de dag bco ba'i ni kha rtsa//btso ba yi ni tshad bzhi ni//yib dang khros dang 'thor ba dang //bzhi pa chu
388b1(rgyud): ru 'bros pa'o//shin tu chos par gyur na ni//'dar dang rmongs dang du ba dang //khrol khrol smra ni sgrogs pa yin//btsar dang mnyo dang dkrug pa dang //de bzhin du ni brdung ba'o//
388b2(rgyud): sbrang rtsir btso dang bu bar btso//glang chen btso dang seng ger btso//rnon por byas te btso bar bye//mnyes pas dri ma'i rdul 'thor 'gyur//blo gros 'khrul pa med pa
388b3(rgyud): yis//rim gyis rim gyis mnye bar bya//cha yi tshad byas gso ba ni//sbyar nas 'gyur gyi gzhin du min//de nas cha gzhan bcas pa la//gi ri ka ri nA'i phye ma ni//
388b4(rgyud): lugs las bzlog pa'i lam btsugs la//tshad ldan cho gra bzhin du btso//du ru ka dang bA li ka/tsa ka kra mar dre'i sa bona? dang //ba la ta ka shi kru'i 'bras//pa ri tsa ta ku su ma//
388b5(rgyud): ud pa la ma li ka sa bon//bar dar rus pa ka si dang //si ri sa sku sa bon dang //sbrang rtsi po son pa la sha/zhi gA rdze'u ni tshos pa dang //de dag skyo ma bskyed phyir glugs//
388b6(rgyud): de dag ni rtogs byas la//yid la sems pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyis//bu mo'i bcud ni drangs te glugs//'di yis rab tu bsgrub par bya//gzhan du nam yang ma yin//
388b7(rgyud): bu mo gcig dang gnyis dang ni//mang po'i bar du brtag par bya//lhang tsher dngul chu shing chen ni//de tshe 'bras bu smin par 'gyur//bya ba kun gyi lam gyis ni//
389a1(rgyud): byed pa po dang za bor 'gyur//lha yis rgya mtsho srubs pa bzhin//nyi shu rtsa lnga'i cha yo bar//stobs ldan bzung ba gan su 'gyur//rdzu 'phrul gyi
389a2(rgyud): ni tshad dang ldan//dngul chu rmu bya'i mgrin 'dra dang //sbrul gyi gzugs dang sprul pa'i gzugs//chu 'dzin dbyibs dang rnam pa bzhi//sa li'i dri dang dri zhim dang //
389a3(rgyud): de bzhin chad dang chang min dri//cha gnyis dang ni cha gsum dang //bud med mdog nyams snang 'gyur zhing //bong tshod ran dang ring ba dang //yan lag rtsub 'dod mgrin pa
389a4(rgyud): ring //mig ni zangs ltar dmar ba ste//stobs ldan sde bsangs nu ma med//rked pa'i khyad par sngar bshad dang //sbrang rtsi lta bu'i dri dang ldan//sgrub pa dbang po'i/
389a5(rgyud): yon tan byed//de rnams thabs kyis sbyangs yin te//rtsub dang gnyen dang yan lag ma khrang //stobs ldan zhes ni bye ba yin//de dang 'khyud las byung ba ni//rdzas/
389a6(rgyud): ni yongasu sbyor byed de//rnon po dang ni lhung cher la//thun mong du ni bsten na su//zhe nye blugs pas 'joms par 'gyur//ro ni kha dang ska bar 'gyur//de nas rang
389a7(rgyud): skyur nad du ni//lci bas bcos na nyes pa 'byang //de nas gci ba'i lan tshwa dang //phag gi zhag dang tshil dang khrag/bcas par mnyes na'ang nyes pa 'byang //
389b1(rgyud): slang yang tsu ta dza ton//tshwa dang dmar po nyid dang ni//pin dza ra dang tsam pa dang //smyo byed cha mnyam dngul chu cig/de dang mnyam pa'i sbrang rtsi chu//mnyes na nyes pa zad par
389b2(rgyud): 'gyur//de nas ma he'i rmig par ni//char pa'i chu dang bcas pa la//zangs kyi phyi ma mkhar phye dang //smin sman phye ma blugs shing btso//chos nas sbrang rtsi'i nang du gzhug/
389b3(rgyud): de yis bcings par 'gyur ba yin//de nas khrag ni cha bdun gyis//sbyangs na snumo zhing stobs ldan la//slar yang cha mnyam khrag dang ni//mnyes pas snum zhing rtsu bar
389b4(rgyud): 'gyur//ra gan tsu ta'i shing dang ni//zangs dang yungs pa la sogs drug/byin pas nyes pa tshar gcod 'gyur//de nas tsan+ta'i shing dang ni//sbrang rtsi 'jig dad sen mo
389b5(rgyud): dang //thal sman 'bus zos shing phye dang //ma hA ha ta mo klu dang //pus ka ra dang brta gi/sku ba sin du ba ri phye//bcas par mi ya rkang du gzhug/cung zad bzhag ste phyung
389b6(rgyud): na su//rdo yi gtun du mnye bar bye//'od ma'i nang du blugs nas ni//btso dza rgod ma'i kha 'dra dang //ka raun da yi chu yi dbyibs//bong bu'i gdong dang rnga mo'i gdong //kha
389b7(rgyud): chen 'di dag bcing ba dang //tshar bcad pa la bsngags pa yin//gang yang 'khrul 'khor khe che ba//rdza rnga yi ni dbyibs 'dra dang //'o ma'i dbyibs 'dra la sogs
390a1(rgyud): dang //mtshon cha ral gri'i shugs 'dra ba//kang ka yi ni mgrin pa 'dra//nyes pa tshar gcod pa la bsngags//gzhan yang dngul chu bcings pa la//
390a2(rgyud): bshad pa de dag r+b+he su gzung //bzhi cha lus pa btso yin te//phyed lus stobs chen btso ba yin//dngul chur rten pa'i dri ma ni//de bzhin du ni sbyar bar bya//sbyang ba dang ni
390a3(rgyud): rtogs pa dang //rmongs pa de bzhin gsod pa'o//de nas lhang tsher rdul phye dang //bcas par rtsi yi nang du blugs//ban du zhes bya'i phyi ma ni//sgyu mar bcas pa'i nang
390a4(rgyud): du btung //lhang tsher dngul chu rnon po yi//cho ga yis ni so sor bcing //de nas cung zhig ngal bso bya//bzhag pa me yi gnas sam no//chu yi shed la brten par bya//
390a5(rgyud): lci ba 'am 'bras kyi phung po'ang rung //rdo ba yi ni nang dag dang //ba lang ma he sogs pa'i lhas//bye ma yi ni phung por sba//de nas ngal bso phyung nas ni//gzugs
390a6(rgyud): dang sgra dang dri ro sogs//tshad dang mtshan ma ji bzhin brtag/la la'i 'bras bu la la'i rtsa//kha cig me tog madrab ma dang //shun pa dang ni rus pa'ang rung //rnal
390a7(rgyud): 'byor pa yis long spyod ni//rnam pa sna tshogs blta bar bya//bcos pa'ang bcos min yo byad ni//rnyed na rdo rje 'dzin 'drar 'gyur//de yang stobs can bcud bral na/
390b1(rgyud): sngon bzhin nyes pa sna tshogs 'gyur//dngul chu sbyang tshor kha dog ni//sna tshogs dang ldan skyon yin te//khrag dang mkhris pa skyed byed yin//dmar pos khrag kyang skyed par byed//dkar/
390b2(rgyud): bos zug zer skyed 'gyur zhing //srog ni 'joms par byed pa yin//ldang ser dag ni ma smin dang //ser skya lam ni 'gog 'gyur zhing //nyis 'gyur tsha nau shin tu 'ching //
390b3(rgyud): nyes pa dag ni brgyur ldan pas//blo dang ldan pas dpyad de bza'//sngo dang nag po bcud chen yin//de ltar bcud len rnam dpyad na//chu skyes chen po'i yon tan ldan//
390b4(rgyud): dngul chu'i 'ol so cig dang ni//rgya mtsho las byung nyis 'gyur ldan//bzhi 'gyur gyi ni me tog bcas//sna stan blag pa'i mchog yin te//khrag dang dngul chu bcu 'gyur du//
390b5(rgyud): rim gyis spel te bza' bar bya//de phan chad ni 'bras bu med//dngul chu bso bas rmongs pa dang //khyad par du ni bsad kyang rung //sngar bstan pa la me tog dang //byang
390b6(rgyud): chub sems dang bcas te bza'//thams cad du ni snga dro bza'//che ga'i rim pa 'di yin//lhang tsher chu dang dngul chu ni//dgongs mo'i du su blag par bya//zla ba la
390b7(rgyud): ni zla ba'i lam//nyi ma la ni nyi ma ste//de dang de nis sbyin par bya//da ltar yul dang dus dang ni//rdzas rnams rgya cher bsten pa dag/yid bzhungs la sogs 'phel byed
391a1(rgyud): yin//mkha' gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i//rdo rje mang 'gro dade pa'i mchog/rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis
391a2(rgyud): gsungs//rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las bcud kyis len gyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste bcu bdun pa'o////de nas yang dag bshang bye ba//rgyud du sbas
391a3(rgyud): pa nges par bya//yang dag bsdus pa'i cho ga ni//bshad kyis sgrub pa po rnams nyon//bde mchog bla ma'i gnas la sogs//mkha' gro mas ni thams cad khyab//
391a4(rgyud): ye shes ldan pa'i rang skyes gnas//yul dang yul du mngon par skye//'di ni mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya//rdo rje dkyil 'khor gtso mo yin//rnal 'byor ma drug sgrub po//
391a5(rgyud): l+ya/brda yi skad kyis bshad pa yin//ku lu ta dang ma ru yi//yul du gnas pa ma mi ste//sin+d+ho dang ni ne ge rar//rigs kyi gtso mo rnams yin//lam pa ki dang
391a6(rgyud): sau raSh+Ta ra//gang gnas rigs kyi lha mo yin//kha ba'i ri dang kany+tsi na//gang yod byis bcas mo zhes bya//prAny+tsa la yi yul dag dang //gri ha de ba tA dag na//
391a7(rgyud): lhan cig skyes pa'i bu mo gnas//ka ling ka dang ko sa ler//brtul zhugs 'dzin ma sha chen za//pre ti bu ri zhes bya dang //tri sha ku ni ra sbom dbang phyug
391b1(rgyud): rAt+ta zlas pa gnas//dUk+ShI ra da dz+nyA wAr+d+ha ra/AN+Dak+Sha yi drad mod gnas//oMt+ta d+hA n+na kA r+ya lo//yul du bu mo chen na k+Sha/d+hAkrAD+D+h+ya zhes bya dang //nA s+pho h+nA raH/
391b2(rgyud): ma'ang 'di// me bud de//'am ye d+h+r-ig ma ga/gasbya b+h+ri de m+b+hi rgyun pa na mdzin du ldan ni//sum 'di rnams kyi
391b3(rgyud): gang //dpa' bo gnyis med khyab pa ste//kun kyang 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma//yid kyi shugs kyis 'jug ma yin//de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mos slar yang
391b4(rgyud): mchod cing phyag byas te//'di skad ces gsol to//mkha 'gro ma yi khyad par dang //zhing skyong 'jigs pa chen po yi//ming dang zhing gi ming dang ni//gnas rnams kyi ni khyad
391b5(rgyud): par dang //gang du sgrub pa pos thos na//the tsom med par 'grub 'gyur ba//de dag thams cad mdor bsdus te//gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol//de nas
391b6(rgyud): bcom ldan rdo rje can//rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//de yis gang la'ang ma bshad pa'i//gsang chen shin tu rnyed dka' ba'i//gang yin khyod ni du
391b7(rgyud): 'dod pa//legaso lags lha mo che//sgyu ma chen por rang 'gro ba//bshad kyis rtse gcig yid kyis nyon//an+d+ra ta sa'i yul gnas pa//zhi ba'i gdang
392a1(rgyud): zhes thab snang ste//rgyal 'i l+h+wa m+bu'i sgyu gnas 'byung //rdo man nats+tsha bsnams//yul der kunas pa'i spyan da//kA ta~M pAsmr-i nga
392a2(rgyud): la rten//dril bu chen po zhes bya ba'i//b+h+yo tra pA la stobs po che//kau la kar ni dpal chen mo//gtsigs pa'i skye gnas las byung ba//gtsigs pa'i gzugs can lha mo ste/
392a3(rgyud): rnam par 'gyur zhing 'jig su rung //grong khyer baidz+re gnas drag shul can//r-i yi rtse mor brtan te gnas//me yi gdong pa zhes bya ba//k+She tra b+hA la mdzes pa'i gdong /
392a4(rgyud): der nar ni bde byed ma//spyi brtsegs chen po'i skye gnas byung //sna mo ga yi mtshan cha bsnams//chos kyi dbyung phyug gsol ba mo//zhing dang gnas pa
392a5(rgyud): grags pa ste//ta la'i shing la brten te gnas//gyen du 'bar sgra zhes bya ba/kle tra pA la gtsigs pa che//de bI ko Tir rna mo che//stobs po che yi skye gnas 'byung/
392a6(rgyud): lha mo lag ni mdung can te//rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun gyi mchog/gnas der lha mo drag chen po//b+ha Ta'i shing la brten te gnas//k+Shi t+yA b+hA la lus chen po/
392a7(rgyud): mchog gi dbang phyug rgyu zhes bya//bau ra dzar ni phyi mo ste//ba dan gyi ni phyag na bsnams//zhi ba'i gzugs can lha mo che//'dod pa'i dbang phyug rab stsol ga/
392b1(rgyud): zhing dor gnas pa me 'byar ma//a mra'i shing la brtun te gnas//hA hAr dgod pa sgra chen go//sems can thams cad 'jigs par byed//oM ru darang ni me lce'abar//thod pa dag draN+Da/
392b2(rgyud): skye gnas byung //lha mo rdo rje shag tI bsnams//zhing der shin tu myos pas gnas//grong khyer der gnas lha mo de//gser shing lo ni brtan te gnas//dril bu sgra zhes bya ba yi/
392b3(rgyud): k+Sho tra pA la dpa' bo che//pra ta bu rir dI mar sarA te//'jigs pa chen mo'i spyan dang ldan//lha ma gtan shing mtshon cha bsnams//gtsigs pa'i skye gnas las
392b4(rgyud): byung ba'o//zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo der//dza ti'i shing la brten te gnas//byin chen zhes bya'o zhing skyong ni//shin tu gtsigs shing 'jig su rung //e la bu
392b5(rgyud): ring bong zhon ma//rab tu gtum pa'i skye gnas thung //phyag na zhugs pas 'jigs chen mo//zhing der mos pas yang dag gnas//phyogs der gnas pa'i lha med//
392b6(rgyud): stobs chen pha rol gnon pa mo//glang tshan rna ba zhes bya ba'i//zhing skyes mcheg tshan las skyes pa'o//kha che'i yul du ba lang rna//gtum pa'i skye gnas las
392b7(rgyud): byung ma//rdo rje lcags sgrogs thogs nas ni//sgra rnams 'joms la mchog tu brtson//gnas der gnas pa'i lha mo de//ri yi rtse la brten te gnas//
393a1(rgyud): sbu gu'i byin pa can zhes bya'i//k+She tre pA la 'jigs chen po//ma ru'i yul du rim pa mo//'jigs gdong dpa' blo'i skye gnas 'byung //
393a2(rgyud): lcags kyu zhags thogs lha mo do//zhing der shin tu myos pas gnas//yul der gnas pa'i lha mo de//dbye chen la ni brten te gnas//gtsigs pa zhes bya'o zhing
393a3(rgyud): skyong ni//rmongs par byed pa'i bzhin yangs pa'o//nu gau rar ni thong gshol ma//sme brtsegs yan lag skye gnas byung //ro langs can ni 'od chen ma//dpa' bo kun
393a4(rgyud): lo dngos grub stsol//gaunas der gnas pa'i bzang mo de//spa yi shing gi ldum rar gnas//spu yi byin pa zhes bya ba'i//k+She tra pA la gtsigs pa che//puN+Da bar+N+Na'i yul
393a5(rgyud): du ni//tsa mur+t+ti zhes bya ba ste//stobs po che yi skye gnas byung //kha T+wAM ga yis lag pa rgyan//lho ma spyod dang grol bar byed//sdig pa ma lus zad byed pa//bum pa
393a6(rgyud): ces bya'i zhing skyong ni//zhing de na ni yang dag gnas//dzA lan+d+ha ra ni bzhin dang ma//chags pa'i rigs kyi skye gnas 'byung //rdo rje lcags sgrogs thogs nas ni//
393a7(rgyud): bde ba'i mchog ni kun la ster//grong khyer mchog der gnas lha mo//khang pa brtsegs mar brten te gnas//ral pa gsum zhes bya ba yi//zhing skyong shin tu
393b1(rgyud): gtsigs pa che//pre ta bu rir glog gi gdong //gtsigs pa'i skye gnas yang dag byung //lha mo dbyig pa shag ti thogs//bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed ma//zhing der gnas/

393b4(rgyud): gnas//bya ba kun mdzes zhes bya ba'i//k+She tra pA la 'jigs chen po//tsa ri t+ta yi yul du ni//ka rany+tsa gnas zhes bya ba//shag ti gtsigs pa'i skye gnas byung //

393b7(rgyud): gzugs//k+Shi tra pA la stobs po che//gnas mchog der gnas lha mo de//a sho ka yi shing brten gnas//dza lan+d+ha rar gtum mo ni//zhi ba yi ni skye gnas/
394a1(rgyud): byud//lag na zangs kyi phyar te thogs//dbang phyug thams nad ster ba mo//gnas der gnas pa drag chen mo//gser shing la ni brten te gnas/

394a3(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad ster ba mo//lha mo chen mo gyen skra 'bar//saM la'i shing la brten te gnas//lhun po chen po zhes bya ba'i//k+She tra pA la zhing der gnas//

394b1(rgyud): lcags kyur yang dag ldan//pha rol g.yul las rgyal bar mdzad//zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo de//dzo li'i sgra 'byin 'jigs par byed//rna chen zhes bya'i zhing skyong ni//

394b4(rgyud): yi ni phyag rgya thogs//sgrub pa po la rtag tu brtse//grags dang dpal dang bkra shis ster//zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo de//mngar ba'i shing la brten te gnas//skyes

395b2(rgyud): g+hA ta ya/e mu ka s+ya kAr+yaM ku ru hUM hUM hUM phaT phyiT phaT dzaHswAhA///bdud rtsi yaMs ni kha bkang ste//lha rnams thams cad tshim par bya//rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma yis ni/

397a1(rgyud): 'byung po chen po'i khams rnams dang //mkha'agro ma dang mar me ma//'jib byed 'phrog byed bcas pa'i gtso//'byung po las kyang 'byung ba'i gzugs//

399a1(rgyud): rim pa bzhin du yang su bsgyur//dri dang me tog de bzhin du//mar me dang ni dr-i yi chu//dri ba chu yis bkang ba yi//bum pa 'du gos kyis mdzes par /

400a1(rgyud): drag ma yi ni sa bon gyis//gzir te 'bum du bzlas par bya//sa bon gyis ni gzir tsam gyis//mar me ma yi spyi bo 'grems//rtag tu sems can don brtson
400a2(rgyud): pas//'bar ma chung mar bsgrub par bya//nyon cig lha mo shes rab che//gzhan yang mkha' bro sgrub pa'i thabs//thang ka khrus gnyis byas na su//lhag par gnas taM

400a4(rgyud): na bsdigs mdzub lcags kyu thogs//smre grol bas ni rnam par mdzes//me 'bar 'od zer shin tu gsal//ha haMr dgod cing mig yon ma//sa la khrag gis
