400b1(rgyud): pa mdun du snang 'gyur te//bzhi pa la ni bka' nod do//bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyis//dam tshig 'bad de byin nas ni//g.yog mo ru ni bsgrubs pa yis//ci 'dod bka' ni bsgom par
400b2(rgyud): bya//dgra rnams bsod cing smad pa dang //yan lag gzir ba gang 'dod pa'i//las la sogs pa'i thams cad ni//g.yog mo'i las kyis sgrub par 'gyur//gal te 'bum/
400b3(rgyud): gyis gdon za na//rdo rje ma yI sa bon gyis//sngon du bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin//mkhas pas gzir bar byas te/bzla//ra dwa gi ni lpags pa la//'bad de thad ka brkyang
400b4(rgyud): bar bya//'jib byed ma ni 'dri ru gzhug/kha dog dmar po shin tu mdzes//lus la rgyan gyis rgyan pa dang //mdzes pa'i gos ni gyon par bri//g.yon pa bsdigs
400b5(rgyud): mdzub zhags pa dang //g.ya su dgra sta dgod par bya//lam gyi bzhi mdo yid 'ong bar//mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub bya ste//lci ba yis ni byugs bya la//me tog
400b6(rgyud): sna tshogs dgram par bya//me tog bdug pa mar me sogs//'byung blo kun gyi gtor ma sbyin//khrag dang nya dang sha dang btsong //bza' ba dag ni sna tshogs dang //bdud
400b7(rgyud): gyi lnga yis bkang la sbyin//'bad de bsam gtan gnas par bzla//oM A kaR+Sha yaHphu phaT//lag gnyis mnyam par byas nasu//zhags pa'i tshul gyis gar
401a1(rgyud): bskyod bya//snying po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o//rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum bzlas pas//'jib byed ma ni 'grub 'gyur te//dang po khyi ni du ba'i sgra//
401a2(rgyud): gnyis pa la ni gsal bor dgad//gsum pa la ni mtshon thogs nas//bsdigs pa'i phyir ni 'ong bar byed//bzhi par mdun du gnas nas ni//bdag gis ci bikye
401a3(rgyud): bka' stsol smras//bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyi//dam tshig dag ni byin nasu//sems can rnams la phon pa'i phyir//dbul po bdag gis khyod bsgrub so//de nas nyi
401a4(rgyud): ma re re zhing //gser srang phyed phyed ster bar 'gyur//gal te 'bum gyis ma grub na//ro langs snying pos gzir te bzla//sa bon 'di yis gzir tsam gyis//
401a5(rgyud): 'jib byed ma yi mgo 'gemaso//chu 'bram gyi ni sa phyogasasu//kam po dzi ni bsgrub par bya//ba glang la sogs ko ba ni//brkyang ste 'phrog byed ma 'drir gzhug
401a6(rgyud): lus ni sgal gyis rgyan pa ste//kha dog sngon po 'bar ba'i 'od//skra grol bas ni rnam par rgyun//gos dmar bgos shing phyag gnyis mdzes//ral gri dang ni
401a7(rgyud): zhags pa thogs//ha har dgod cing rnam par gtsigs//khrag gis maN+Dal byugs nas ni//dri dang me tog bdug pas bdug/sha dang nya dang btsong la sogs//
401b1(rgyud): nye bar mchod pa'i gtor ma sbyin//bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yi//sngon bzhin lha yi gtor ma sbyin//rnal 'byor pa ni sgom zhing zlos//'bum gcig gis ni 'grub 'gyur te//dang po/
401b2(rgyud): chu ni g.yo bar 'gyur//gnyis pa la ni char chen 'bab//gsum par thog ni 'bab 'gyur te//bzhi po la ni bdun du gnas//bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyis//dam tshig de nas/
401b3(rgyud): 'badra de sbyin//oM kr-i kruM phuHphuHswA hA//lag gnyis khu tshur bcings nA su//de yi sngags ni brjod par bya//snying po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o//mdun na thal mo sbyar nas ni//
401b4(rgyud): ci zhig bgyi zhes brjod par 'gyur//ti se'i gangs kyi rtse ru ni//brtse phyir khyod kyis de khrid la//slar yang 'drir ni 'ong ba dang //rgyal po'i bu mo 'am gzhan yang rung //
401b5(rgyud): nga 'dod pa ni khrid de shog/gser dang dngul dang zangs la sogs//bza' dang bgo dang btung ba dang //ji ltar 'dod bzhin khyer te'o//lha yi bu mo 'am mi'ang rung //ti se'i gangs/
401b6(rgyud): kyi rtse ru ni//ji ltar 'dod bzhin khrid par byed//bstan pa'i las kyis ma grub na//las gzhin gyis ni bsgrub par bya//bdag nyid ye shes mkha 'gro ru//mkhas pa
401b7(rgyud): yis ni bsgoms na su//de ni rkang pa g.yon pa yin//mnan te lnga brgyar bzlas na ni//gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur//gal te des kyang ma grub na//dpa'
402a1(rgyud): sa sa/gnas no//dum na dumathar brgya par // nas bya dang gsad pa dang //dz+ha gas ngan bskams pa yis//thams cad dus
402a2(rgyud): bang bsam// stani skye bye na sbyi mo//sems cad kyi ts+li do nga phyun mang //gas par 'gyur//bsnun pa'i las kyis mi g+hAd+hA
402a3(rgyud): bA lA tA kA nA ga pa'i shing //m-i sbyor ba yi dbus ni//thag dung sa pa'i yung sa kar ni//tem 'dren d+hA sa pa//rjod cing sbyin basmrig byas nAs ni//ma'
402a4(rgyud): nAmA ni 'chi 'gyur bas//gdon mi za bar 'gro gyur//de nas shang kar sgrub pa'i thabs//nyon cig b+h+rUM ste skal tshun ma//dur khrid dang ni shing gcig dang /
402a5(rgyud): rgyu 'gram lam gyi bzhi mdor sgrub//dam tshig can gyi 'dri mkhyen gyis//chen gyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya//ser ni bcu bzhi'i tshad drug tu//dpa' bo mi ni ras la bri//
402a6(rgyud): g+ha gsum dkyil 'khor dge ba ste//dkyil 'khor zlum po'i tshul du //sku mdag sngon po blang la zhon//lus la thal ba'i rdul gyis byugs//be mtshan rkyen
402a7(rgyud): phreng zhi ba'i gzugs//ram pa'i cod pan mdung dang ldan//nol bzhi pa la phyog/bzhi pa//sbyin pa'i phreng bas rnam par klungs//khaM T+wAM ga dang thod pa nyid//
402b1(rgyud): snron gzhan nog shor dang stan//bshad 'tshar ldan pas mdzad bya s+ho//'brang bkun mo gtor ma spyan//sngags 'di yos na bgag nas//'dum du bzlas par bsgrub par//
402b2(rgyud): la te grub par ma gyur na//de nas de ni bsreg par bye//grub nas bya ba thams cad ni//rnying par 'gyur te gzhan du med//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//nor m+b+ha yi nI sgrub pa'i
402b3(rgyud): rab dang /'i 'gram//'bab chu 'das pa'i med drugar+b+ha//sngar bstan pa'i cho ga yos// 'khor mchog ni bsgrub par s+ho//sor na bcu ga sa rgyud
402b4(rgyud): dag /byung bar du ni bsgrub par bya//kha dag nAg zi shin tu mdzes//zhal gcig+sa phyug ni bzhi pa'akhor lo dang ne+e dA TIg pa bsnam s+ho//zad pa bad+mo ban na/
402b5(rgyud): na gyini cad de ni dang//rgyun rnams kun gyis rnam par klungasashang gtso nga ni Sh+Ta na//mchod pa nyid du spyon bya zhing //ma y-i shi yis 'dug sa/
402b6(rgyud): ngas phrun nye bar byed pa'i 'gyur//oM AHbadz+ra nA rA ya nahU~M dz+nyA swAH//spyan drang ba'i sngags//maM ma ma tsakra sA d+ha ma~M saurba oM su rad man hUM swAH//stong phrag pa
403a1(rgyud): /ni bzlas pa yis//lha ma yin ni kun gyi skor//'jug pa'i nus dang ldan 'gyur zhing //sgyu ma thams cad ston byed do//dgra rnams thams cad 'dul nus
403a2(rgyud): shing //rgyal srid dag kyang thob par 'gyur//cho ga'i rim pa 'di nyid kyis//de nas tshangs pa'ang bsgrub bya ste//chu yi 'gram ni dben pa dang //byed par pad+mo'i tshal du sgrub
403a3(rgyud): kha dog sor ngo phyug bzhi pa//gdong bzhi yis ni mdzes par byas//zhi ba ral pa'i cod pan 'chang //mchod phyir thogs kyis rnam par rgyan//pad+ma dang ni bgrang phreng dang /
403a4(rgyud): dbyug pa dang ni thed pa bsnam s+ye//sgrub pa po yi gtso bo yis//bris sku dag ni dmigs nasu//yid 'ong sna tshogs dri zhim nI//gur gum tsa na dan la sogs pa//dri
403a5(rgyud): chus yang yang bsgo bya zhing //rtag tu sgom dang ldan pa yis//mchod pa'i cho ga rim de dag/b+ha ga'i dbus sbyin par bya//oM prah+ma gAts+tsha hUM AHswAhA//spyan drang ba
403a6(rgyud): sngag so//oM b+hun+d+ha baM sta tA bi durba ru NA b+ha rgo daM be sa d+ha ma hi d+hi yo yo na pra tso da ye ta//'bum du bzlas pas 'grub 'gyur te//zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang //dgug
403a7(rgyud): dang dbang du bya ba dang //nor bskyed pa dang mngon spyod sogs//las rnams thams cad nus 'gyur te//bzlas dang sbyin bsreg kun gyis 'grub//khyod la yang ngan
403b1(rgyud): s+ho//myu ston sa//ban sa rgyam padu na s+ho//pats+tsha nyam sa / nga // na sa/ na ts+tsha brdzun 'grus/
403b2(rgyud): pa ba sa pa g-i/shA dang ni d+ma//ma n+da ni/ban+d+ha kA
403b3(rgyud): /khrig gi blang ba'i thod pa dang //de bzhin rdo rje ste//blan na ya ga/rkyen thong bsnams//mA sun de dang bud+mad+ma ga su /shAg tu dang na sa
403b4(rgyud): swA d+h+yan+tam+me s+yAd+d+hA yad+d+ha ldan so//oM A kAr+b+ha swAH/rnaMs pa'i sngags 'gyur bar 'a/
403b5(rgyud): nas na ni sa pa / tshig zlas nas thaMg mye gi/sngags pas sa nAgs bzang 'gyur//rdul po sgra ya mad gyub s+ho//da rnams thams cad
403b6(rgyud): 'gyur//thegags rnams ma lus bskyed pa dang //'dod kyi kun gyi 'bras sbyor bag//'gyur ba 'di la the tsam med//cho ga'i sbyor ba de nyid kyis//ma mo rnams kyi
404a1(rgyud): thabs mchog/sbyor ba'i rim pa de nyid kyis//gza' rnams kyang ni sgrub par 'dod//oM sarba to thi nak+Sha tA gra h+Na mang+ga l+ye b+h+yaHswAd+ma//gza' thams
404a2(rgyud): cad kyi sngag so//oM zhes bya ba dang po sto//swAng+ka'i mtha' can byin rlab ces//mkha' gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i//rdo rje mkho 'gro bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje sems dpa' de
404a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha'agro las 'byung po dang gdon thams cad kyi sgrub thabs 'byung ba'i rim par
404a4(rgyud): phye ba ste bcu dgu pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo rnams kyis mchod cing phyag byas te/'di skad ces gsol to//ye shes de nyid khyad par dang //lus
404a5(rgyud): kyi mtshan ma ji ltar lags//rtsa rnams gang la brten gyur dang //de rnams dbye ba mi 'tshal te//bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal//bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol//
404a6(rgyud): nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che//sgyu ma kun tu rnam 'phrul pa//rtswa chen po ni sum cu gnyis//de dag gzhan las shin tu gtso//bcu dang gnyis ni de bzhin du//dbyings rnams
404a7(rgyud): 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid de//yar ngo mar ngo'i bye brag gis//nyi shu rtsa bzhir brjod pa yin//dus ni myur dang ring ba dag/yan lag mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid ni//gang
404b1(rgyud): zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni//'chi ba'i dus la bab pas gnas//dbugs ni rnam par rgod gyur na//lus can drug dang gnyis kyis 'chi//snga dro ro hI ti'i du bu//de yi mtshan ma mtshon
404b2(rgyud): pAr bya//sna dang mig gi gnas dang //'gram pa dang ni rna ba'i rtsa//lce dang so yi mtshams dang ni//de bzhin mgrin pa'i phyi rol dang //snying khi'i dra ba lte ba dang //brla drang
404b3(rgyud): byin pa de bzhin gzhan//chu so dang ni mtshan dag dang //mgo dang spyi gtsug gi ni phyogs//dbugs ni chad cing chad gyur pa'i//lus kyi mtshan ma myur ba ru//'chi ba'i dus ni
404b4(rgyud): ston par byed//nyi ma'i grangs kyi tshad kyis ni//'khor los dus kyi bdag nyid brtsi//sgo gcig nas ni nyin drug tu//gang tshe dbugs ni rgyu gyur pa//yon gsum gyi lo dag ni//zhag
404b5(rgyud): ni sum brgya drug cu ru//bgos pa yi ni tshad dag ni//mdor bsdus nas ni bstan par bya//lo gnyis dang ni zla ba dag/dus kyi grangasu bstan pa dang //nyin zhag dag ni ba
404b6(rgyud): brgyad du//de yi ched ni yang dag brjod//nyi ma dgra ni bdun dang mtha'//gal te rlung ni rgyur gyur na//lo gnyis dang ni de bzhin du//zla ba drug tu 'tsho 'gyur zhing //de bzhin/
404b7(rgyud): lo gnyis zla ba ni//rig byed kyi ni grangs dang ni//nyi ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru//'tsho 'gyur dus kyi grangs yin//gal te nyin dgu rgyu gyur na//lo gnyis zla ba bzhi dang ni//nyin
405a1(rgyud): zhan nyi ma'i grangasu ni//lus can nams kyi sbyor ba yin//gal te nyin bcur rgyu gyur na//lo gnyis las ni mi 'tsho'o//gal te nyin zhag bcu gcig tu/
405a2(rgyud): sgo gcig nas ni rgyu ba dang /lo gcig zla ba dgu dang ri//nyin zhog bco brgyad dag las ni//mi 'tsho mdzes ma khyod la bshad//nyin zhag bcu gnyis rgyun ni//lo gcig
405a3(rgyud): dang ni zla ba ni//dbyangs kyi grangs dang nyin zhag ni//dus kyi grangs las mi 'che'o//gal te nyin ma bcu gsum du//g.yas kyi lam nas rgyu ba ni//lo gcig dang ni zla ba dag/
405a4(rgyud): rig byed kyi ni grangs dang ni//nyi ma dgu las mi 'tsho zhes//mdzes ma'i gdong can khyod la bshad//gal te bdun phrag gnyisu ni//g.yas kyi lam nas rlung rgyu de//lo
405a5(rgyud): gcig zla ba gnyis dang ni//nyi ma bcu yi phyed dag las//'tsho bar mi 'gyur de yi ni//tshe tshad nges par ldan pa yin//gang zhig nyi ma lnga gsum du//g.yas kyi sgo
405a6(rgyud): nas rlung rgyun//lo gcig na ni gdon mi za//gang zhig brgyud phrag gnyi su ni//g.yas nas rlung ni rgyu ba dag/de ya tshe tshad des pa dag/zla ba bcu dang nyi ma ni//nyi shu
405a7(rgyud): rtsa bzhi dog las ni//mi 'tshe bar ni nges bshad//gal te nyin zhag bcu bdun du//g.yas kyi lam nas rlung rgyu na//de nas de yi tshe tshad ni//zla ba dgu dang nyin
405b1(rgyud): zhag ni//bco brgyad dag las mi 'tsho bar//gdon mi za bar bshad pa yin//nyin zhag btso brgyad rgyun ni//zla ba dag ni brgyad dang ni//nyin zhag nyi ma'i grangasu ni//de yis dbus
405b2(rgyud): ni bshad pa yin//bral te nyin zhag bcu dgu ru//dri yi bzhon pa rgyu ba dag/ji srid 'tsho bar bshad par bya//zla ba dag ni bdun dang ni//nyin zhag dus kyi grangs las ni//'chi
405b3(rgyud): bar mi 'gyur gdon mi za//gal te nyin zhag nyi shur ni//rgyu ba zla ba drug na ni//de yi srog ni 'gro bar 'gyur//gal te nyin zhag nyi shu gcig/nyi ma'i lam nas rlung rgyu ba//zla ba lnga dang /
405b4(rgyud): nyi ma ni/nyi ma'i grangs las mi 'tshe'o//nyen zhag nyi shu gnyis rgyun//zla ba rig byed grangs dang ni//nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bzhi las//mi 'tsho bar ni yang dag brjod//gal te
405b5(rgyud): nyin zhag nyi shu gsum//sgo gcig nas ni rlung rgyu na//zla ba bzhi dang nyi ma ni//dus kyi grangs las mi 'tsho brjod//nyi shu rtsa bzhir rgyu ba dang //zla ba gsum dang nyi ma ni//bcu/
405b6(rgyud): gcig dag las me 'tsho'o//nyin zhag nyi shu lnga rgya na//zla ba gsum las mi 'tsho'o//de las gong ma sngar bstan pa'o//grangs las mdor bsdus shes par bya//bcu dang
405b7(rgyud): gnyis kyi rtsis las ni//bar bar gyi ni bstan pa yin//cha dang cha yis rim bzhin du//bar bar nyi ma gsal bar byas//blo dman rnams kyis rtogs bya'i phyir/
406a1(rgyud): dus de dag ni bshad pa yin//rnal 'byor pa rnams la ni dus//shin tu phra ba ngas bshad pa//khams rnams snyoms pa'i lus la ni//de dag blta zhing /
406a2(rgyud): yid ches bya//sgo ni steng du ltas 'bab pa//sna yi bar sha chad gyur na//nyin zhag bdun gyis the tsom med//cha shas dgu ni yang dag gnas//de bzhin sgo ni steng bltas las//
406a3(rgyud): mig gi chu ni chad gyur na//nyi ma ldan 'chi bor 'gyur//cha shas bcu ni shes bya ba//steng du bltas te 'gro ba las//rna ba g.yon dang 'gram pa yi//ngos kyi mtshan ma
406a4(rgyud): dag las ni//nyin zhag gcig las mi 'tsho'o//cha shas bcu cig gnas pa yi//gsal bar steng du 'gro ba las//rna ba g.yas par brten pa yis//nyin zhag
406a5(rgyud): bco brgyad dag na 'chad//cha shas bcu gnyis de bzhin gnas//lci yi skud pa nag mthong na//lus can dus kyi nyin zhag 'chi//cha shas bcu gsum brtun pa yi//de bzhin
406a6(rgyud): steng du 'bar ba yi//ste 'og so ni 'thams gyur no//ba byung ba dag ni ma lus 'dren//srog ni dus grangs nyi mas 'gro//dbyangs yig bcu bzhi brten pa ni//mgrin pa'i
406a7(rgyud): bla na gnas pa'i rtsa//steng du bltas pa zhes grags kyi//nyin zhag lnga las mi 'tshe'o//cha shes bco lnga gnas pa yi//steng du bltas pa'i mchog de la//brang gi dra ba
406b1(rgyud): zhom kyang na//zla phyed na ni gdon mi za//cha shas bcu drug rdzogs pa'i bdag/lte ba'i dbus gyur steng bltas pa//sen mo'i khrag na med gyur na//nyan zhag bcu na yang dag nyal//slar
406b2(rgyud): yang tsha sheshas bcu bdun ni//gnas pa'i brla yi mtshan ma las//nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bzhin//'chi 'gyur 'dir ni gdon mi za//cha shAs bco brgyad gnas pa yi//byin pa la ni
406b3(rgyud): gnas pa'i rtsa//de bzhin steng du bltas pa yis//nyin zhag nyi ma'i grangs kyis mchi//bcu dgu yi ni che shas gnas//chu so de bzhin steng bltas pas//de dang mnyam pa'i nyin
406b4(rgyud): zhag gis//'chi 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med//tsha shas nyi shu gnas pa yi//pho mtshan la ni gnas pa'i rtsa//steng du bltas pa mchog dbang phyug/mtshan mas nyin zhag dus
406b5(rgyud): kyi ni/grangs kyis 'chi 'gyur the tsom med//re'u mig bcu gnyis brtsis pa la//bar bar nyi ma bstan pa dag/lo yi rim gyis de sbyangs te//bdun cu rtsa gnyis rim pa
406b6(rgyud): dang //sum cu rtsa drug bco brgyad kyis//zla ba la sogs go rims bzhin//rims kyis rim gyis dbye bar bya//lhag mar gang zhig gyur pa ni//bsdus te 'tsho ba'i dus mi
406b7(rgyud): skye mo chen mo shes bya zhes//mam 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i//rdo rje mkha 'gro bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//bami ldan rdo rje can gyis
407a1(rgyud): gsungs//rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal rdo rje mkha' d+mo las rgyu dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i dbugs 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu pa'o//
407a2(rgyud): sgro dgu po yi mtshan nyid dang //rkye ni gang byar gnas pa yi//yon tan skyon sogs ji ltar bsti//de rnams bye brag mi 'tshal te//ye shes dbang la nyan par 'tshal//bde ba
407a3(rgyud): chen pos bshad du gsol//gong du 'pho ba'i sbyor mtshan nyid//bshad kyis lha mo mnyan par gyis//sngon du bdag nyid sbyang byas la//phyi nas las ni brtsam par bya//gzung
407a4(rgyud): med gnas pa mdog sngo ba'i//bad chen zla ba lta bu 'dzag/slar yang gzugasu gnas pa ste//rnam pa kun gyis rgyan pa'o//cha shas bzhi dang yang dag ldan//khra ni thur du
407a5(rgyud): bltas te 'phyang //go 'phang gnas pa'i gnas ni//kun da zla 'dra rtag tu dag/rnam shes ye shes bdud rtsi ni//lha mo chen mo 'bab pa'i mchog/rten du gyur pa'i pad+ma gang/
407a6(rgyud): zla ba'i 'od kyis rnam par rgyan//de ni cha dang cha yi gzugs//gang bu gnas pa zhes byar brjod//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//gnas kyi mtha' ni dag par bya//
407a7(rgyud): drag nas srid pa 'pho bya yi//gzhan du na ni don med 'gyur//dgang ba yis ni lus bkang na//dug drang rims kyis tsha ba 'phrog/bum pa can gyis sgo bcings ni//sgo
407b1(rgyud): yi smyu bu dag par 'gyur//'thor bas sna tshogs rdul du bya//rab tu zhi bas zhi bar 'gyur//rnam shes ra brog pa'i tsho ba dang //gzhan du 'gro ba'ang bshad par bya//de nas phyi rol sbyor/
407b2(rgyud): ba ni//mkhas pa yis ni sbyang bar bya//gnas gnyis dag ni bsams na su//rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//rlung gi dbusu mi yis ni//yang dang yang du dbye bar bya//a li
407b3(rgyud): ka lir ldan pa yi//sa bon der ni sbyar bar bya//rnal 'byor pa yis khyad par du//'byung dang 'jug pas bzlas par bya//'byung ba ye shes sa bon gyis//bsnun dang ldan par
407b4(rgyud): bsam par bya//'jug pa snying gi rnam shes la//me tog lta bur bsnun par bya//rnal 'byor pas ni 'byung bzlas te//bdag nyid las ni phyi rol bya//'jug pa 'byung bar 'tsho
407b5(rgyud): bya ste//de kho na nyid mnyam par sgom//mnyam gzhag dngos po bsgom na ni//'grub 'gyur 'dar ni the tsam med//de nas phyi rol lus la ni//sgrub pa po yis rnam par
407b6(rgyud): sprul//nyi ma'i lam nas dang phyung ste//lha mo cha shas ldan par bya//bsgrub bya'i skyeng khar zhugs nas ni//rlung dang me yis 'bar ba dag/de yi rnam shes bzung nas ni//
407b7(rgyud): lus kyi dkyil 'khor du ni gzhug/bsgrub bya'i rnam shes bsdus nasu//'og gau 'khor lo sbyar bar bya//ji srid zad par byas par du//de srid du lkugs te gnas par 'gyur
408a1(rgyud): 'chi ba'i dus la bab gyur na//'chi ba'i mtshan ma ston pa dang //rims la sogs pas ma phog par//gong du 'pho ba mchog yino//de nas gzhan lus la 'jug
408a2(rgyud): pa//mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya//seng ge rnam rol phyag rgya yis//rnal 'byor pa yis bcings na su//rtag tu srog dang rtsol bar bya//khyod kyis gan su sbyar nas ni//
408a3(rgyud): rang gi lus ni yongs btang ste//rim gyis sbyor bas phye nasu//cho ga 'di ltar byas pa yis//sngags pa gzhan gyi lus la 'jug/sbyor ba'i rim pa de nyid kyis//rang gi
408a4(rgyud): lus la sbyar bar 'dod//'gro dang 'ong ba'i bye brag gis//mnyam par gzhug ste gang byed pa//dpa' bo'i dbang phyug thams cad dang //mkha' gro ma dang sbyor bas
408a5(rgyud): mchod/gang gi ring nas thos gyur pa//de ni yang dag bshad kyis nyon//de bzhin mkhas pas gzhan sems kyi//bsam pa rjesu shes par bya//sgom dang bzlas pa'i
408a6(rgyud): khyad par gyi//sbyor ba'i dam pa skye bar 'gyur//gang gis lam nas bsams na ni//'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med//'khor lo gang zhig sngar bstan par//zhugs
408a7(rgyud): to nyan pa gnyisu ni//'jig rten gsum dang 'dres nas ni//me stag bzhin du rnam par 'khor//rlung gis bskyod pa'i me yis ni//shes rab ldan pas zhugs
408b1(rgyud): sams na//zla drug tsam gyis nges par ni//ring na gnas pa thos par 'gyur//sgom pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni//ye shes mig gis mthong gyur pa//shin tu ring na gnas pa yang //
408b2(rgyud): sgrub pos skad cig gsal bar mthong //bstan dang ma bstun gang ci'ang rung //de kun do yis yang dag bshad//nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che//dge ba'i sgo nas 'gro ba dang //gang
408b3(rgyud): gos lam nas 'gro ba yis//thar pa'i dngos grub rab ster ba//mchog dang tha mi'i bye brag rnams//mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya//lte ba las ni 'dod khams lha//thig
408b4(rgyud): ler gzugs can mtho ris te//steng nas 'gro bar steng gi ni//myur du 'gro ba byed par 'gyur//sna nas gnod sbyin gnasu ste//rna ba dag ni grub pa'i lha//gal te mig las ye
408b5(rgyud): shes 'gro//mi rnams kyi ni bdag por 'gyur//srid pa'i sgo las yi dgas te//de bzhin chu las dud 'gro'o//chu min gyis ni dmyal bar lhung //thar pa'i lam las
408b6(rgyud): gzhan du 'gro//sngon du bum pa brtsams pa yis//sgo rnams thams cad bcing bar bya//rgyal ba lnga yi mchod rten gyi//sgo yi bu gar bsgrim par bya//de la 'og gi sgo ru
408b7(rgyud): ni//chu yi sa bon dkar po bsam//chu dang chu min sgo la ni//me yi sa bon 'bar ba ste//de la shin tu mnyam gzhag pas//dbugs ni bumo pa can du sgom//lus ni
409a1(rgyud): /rlung gi mdog tu ste//rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//rlung gi mtha' ni rtsa ba can//rlung gi sa bon 'bar ba ste//thig lo sgra dang ldan pa yo//rtsa ba'i
409a2(rgyud): sa don dang bar bya//'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis//sgra dang sgra yis 'phrul bar byed//dus la bab ni 'pho bya ste//dus min lha rnams gsod par 'gyur//lha rnams bsad pa tsam
409a3(rgyud): gyis ni//dmyal bar nges par sreg par 'gyur//de bas 'chi ba'i mtshan ma ni//mkhas pas 'bad do shes par bya//rnal 'byor pa yis sngar bstan pa'i//sngon chen bad
409a4(rgyud): ba phun sum tshogs//sgrub pa rnams kyis smin pa la//steng gi rtsa ba bza' bar bya//chu dang skya reng ldan pa dag/g.yon pa'i bdud rtsir sbyar byas la//zos na zhi dang
409a5(rgyud): rgyas pa ste//dug dang rims kyi tshe ba 'phrog/cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni//brlings dang smin pa 'joms par byed//lha mo slar yang po zlog pa yis//na mkhar
409a6(rgyud): 'gro ba brjod par bya//rlung dang me yi bye brag gis//rkang pa'i 'khor lor sbyar byas te//yid kyis rab tu zhir sbyar nas//na mkha' la ni 'gro 'gyur zhing /
409a7(rgyud): mkha' gro kun gyis bskor na su//lha yi lus kyi kun tu rtse//ji srid zla nyi yod kyi bar//de srid na mkhar gnas por 'gyur//slar yang lugs las bzlog pa yi//
409b1(rgyud): khadog dkar ba'i pad+ma bAs ma//bsgrub bya'i dbusu sbyar na nAM//rtag tu ngag gi dngos grub byed//rang gi lus dbus bsgom bya ba//rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'khrug pa ltar//rang gi kha nas
409b2(rgyud): byung na su//bsgrub byi'i kha ru thim par bya//nyi me bdun gyis dngos grub tu//'gyur te gzhan du yang ma yin//rlung gi lam nas bsgrub bya yi//lus la thim par gyur pa dang //
409b3(rgyud): de yi sems ni bzung na su//bdag la gzhug ste me la ni//bsams te rlung dang me sbar bas//de yi lus ni 'khrug par 'gyur//tshogs dgu las ni steng gzhan gyis//mod
409b4(rgyud): lo 'pho bar shes bya ste//nyin re bram ze gsod pa dang //mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang //chu 'phrog 'dod la spyod pa yang //lam 'di yis ni dag 'gyur te//sdig pas
409b5(rgyud): gos par mi 'gyur zhing //srid pa'i skyon las ring du 'gro//ji ltar 'dam las skyes pa yis//pad+ma dri med yid 'ong ba//de bzhin lus kyi 'dam las ni//ye shes
409b6(rgyud): sku ni 'dod bzhin 'gro//mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i//rdo rje mkha' phyo bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis
409b7(rgyud): gsungs//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' gro las//gong du 'pho ba'i bsam gtan dang //seng ge rnam par rol pa'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'byung ba'i rim par
410a1(rgyud): pye bag+h+na nyi shu gcig pa'o//ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni//de nas yang dag bshad par bya//g.yas kyi cha ru rnal 'byor pa/g.yon du
410a2(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma nyid de//sor mo khar ni 'jug byed pa//ma nga 'gro ma yi mtshan ma'o//b+ho b+h+yAM//thal mo spyi bar 'jog byed pa//'bar byed ma'i mtshan ma'o//gu g+hu/mthe
410a3(rgyud): bo 'chir bar byed pa ni//'jib byed ma'i mtshan ma'o//mu g+hu/lag pa rnam par rdebs pa ni//blo ldan 'phrog byed rtags yin//lu g+hu/sna rtser sbyor mi rdabs
410a4(rgyud): pa ni//thugs bde mi bde 'dri bu yin//daMSh+T+wA/sha ba'i mgo ltar ston byed pa//rnal 'byor byed pa'i mtshan ma'o//gan+d+ho daM/gang zhig smin ma'i dbus reg pa//nga yi
410a5(rgyud): snying sdug grogs po'o//a li nI da ha/so yis lce ni 'tshor byed pa//'dus nang gtor ma bza' zhes pa'o//b+hak+She yo//lag pa rtse la 'ju byed pa//khyod kyi khyim
410a6(rgyud): du ngas phyin pa'o//dra ra~M t+ti/lag pa snying khar nyed byed na//da ni nga yi yid 'ong ba'o//ru tsaM ba ta ba tA/sna rtsa khu tshur 'chang ba ni//med do zhes ston pa'o//shU n+ya tA/lag
410a7(rgyud): pa brkyang ste ltor rdebs ni//phun sum ldan par yod zhes pa'o//tri ka sa ha/lte ba ru ni nyid byed ni//kha zas za bar 'dod pa'o//tsiN+DA l-i kre/mdzub mo mdun
410b1(rgyud): du ston byed no//zho gnag gtum la drag pa'o//ni la dan+ta ba ta/smin ma la ni reg byed na//'dir 'dod pa ni da lta ston//a no ga yu ta/lce ni 'gril bar byed pa dag/da ltar 'chi
410b2(rgyud): zhes bya ba'o//dur ga ti/kun tu lta bar byed pa ni//chos grangs shes par 'dod pa'o//ta ra ga na/tshes gcig nas ni brtsams na su//mthe bos ri mo bri bar bya//nyi tshod yi
410b3(rgyud): gi la sogs pa//sngar bstan bzhin du mdun du reg/gi ri/steng du lta bar byed pa ni//nyin phyed dga' bas rol pa'o//sa ma tsha ya/'dzum dang bcas par lta byed cing //
410b4(rgyud): lag pas lag pa bzung na su//rgya mtsho lta bur ston byed pa//ner zas byin zhes bya ba'o//dzi rna ba ta/lag gnyis khu tshur 'chang byed na//da ltar grogs la 'dong zhes
410b5(rgyud): pa'o//salpa ta/mthe bong yis ni srin lag la//reg pa 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba'o//so ma/mthe bong khro bo bza' la sogs//sUr+ya/mkha 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i
410b6(rgyud): rdo rje mkha' gra bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha'agro laso//
410b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi ngag gi phyag rgya'i brda yis rol pa'i cho ge'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//lha mos slar yang gar mdzad
411a1(rgyud): gru 'di yis ni mnyes par byas//e ba se ta ya/ru Na ni b+ha dza ni te ma d+h+ya ma/ga ma a ga ma d+ha d+ha mA ya ne sa/nau grA ma sA/ri gI ma b+hU pa tI sI re re sa ri rI
411a2(rgyud): sa ni sa ma d+h+yA/ma ser su ta ni sa ra sa ni//ra b+ha ga ma ya/d+ha mA d+ha ma/sa ra ba pA ma a a pa pA ad na mi te/mo zhes bya'o//shar du me'o//gshin rjer ni bre'o//
411a3(rgyud): nub tu na mi'o//byang du ni ku'o//me mtsham su d+hi sa'o//bden bral du ni ma ka'o//rlung mtsham su ni tu ku'o//da ldan du nr-i bi mo'o//i ni chur po'o//a ni zla ba la skye
411a4(rgyud): 'o//A ni l+yA'i bla mo'i'o//e ni pe dza sangs kyi'o//o ni nyi ma'i bu'i'o//a di gza'i bdag po rI bong cano//a ni nyi ma'o//gza' rnams kyis ni che ga las//
411a5(rgyud): zla ba nyi ma'i brjod par bya//zla ba ka ka ra la dadang //nyi ma gdong lnga pa la ste//gza' rnams lhag ma ji snyed pa//rA si gnyis gnyis la ni spyod//sgang gshong 'khor lo khyod kyis
411a6(rgyud): bshad//skar ma dus dang nyi ma yi//bye brag dag ni mi 'tshal to//bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol//bka' stsal palug dang ro hI ta sogs pa//gang
411a7(rgyud): gi 'che ba bshad kyis nyon//mngon bsdus nas ni brjod par bya//zla ba dang ni tshes grangs dang //skar ma yi ni dus dang ldan//gdon dang nad ni de bzhin te//spang
411b1(rgyud): gshong rje so tshad ma ni//gang zhig las ni skyes par brjod//ba tra yi ni nyi ma la//dgun zla ra ba'i zla ba yi//bza' ni mig dmar dag dang ni//rgyu skar smin drug ldan
411b2(rgyud): gyur pa//de ni de yi 'chi dus yin//sus kyang bskyab par mi nuso//khyu mchog gi ni nyi ma la//lus kyi mtshan ma la sogs dang //skyo zhing 'gul ba'i nad kyis ni//
411b3(rgyud): 'chi bar 'gyur ba bshad par bya//de bzhin dgun zla 'bring po yi//gza' lag dang ni snar mar ldan//nyi ma bzhi pa de la ni//dgongaso mo'i 'chi 'gyur the tsom med//
411b4(rgyud): dgun zla tha chungs lha mo che//skar ma mgo dang ldan pa dang //gza' ni gza' lag bcas pa la//'khrig pa'i me ni gang yin pa//nyi ma drug la 'chi bar 'gyur//
411b5(rgyud): dpyid zla ra ba'i chos brgyad la//skar ma mgo dang ldan pa dang //gza' ni pa ba sangs 'dzem zhing //nyi ma snga gro'i dus la ni//ka sha Ta ni 'chi bar 'gyur//dpyid zla 'bring po'i
411b6(rgyud): gnyis lnga la//skar mA mchu dang ldan pa dang //gze' ni spen par ldan pa la//seng gre'i mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur//dpyid zla tha chung bcu gnyis la//skar ma nag par
411b7(rgyud): ldan pa dang //gza' ni nyi ma dag la no//skran dang gzer da'i nad kyis ni//bu mo'i mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur//dbyar zla ra ba'i bcu bzhi la//skar ma lha mtshams
412a1(rgyud): ldan pa dang //gza' ni mig dmar dag la no//snang gA mau ni 'tsho bar 'gyur//dbyar zla 'bring po'i bcu gcig la//nag pa dang ni dmar la//
412a2(rgyud): sdig pa'i mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur//dbyar zla tha chung tshes dgu la//skar ma gri bzhin ldan pa dang /gzhu yi mA~M nAM 'chi bar 'gyur//de dag nges par ldan b+har na/
412a3(rgyud): 'gyur bden par nga yis bshad//ston zla re ba'i bdun pa la//skar ma rgyal dang ldan pa dang //gri za' ni zla bar bcas pa la//chu srin mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur//skyon
412a4(rgyud): zla 'bring po'i bcu gsum la//skar ma tha skyed ldan pa dang //gza' ni zla bar bcas pa la/bum pa'i me ni zad par 'gro//ston zla tha chungs skye ma che//nyi ma dag ni brgyad pa la//
412a5(rgyud): skar ma nam grur ldan pa dang //gza' ni sbyin par bcas pa la//nya'i mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur//sngon du skyes dus shes bya ste/phyi nas dus ni brtsi bar bya//
412a6(rgyud): gzhan du dus na smre ba dag/thams cad don med nyid du 'gyur//skye dus shin tu mnyam ga zhag ste//zhi dang drag po dpyad par bya//tshe dang 'chi dus la sogs
412a7(rgyud): /de nis de ltar lung bstan zhes//mkha' gro ku ni dang mnyam sbyor ba'i//rdo rje mkha' gro bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/
412b1(rgyud): bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//rgyud kyu rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha'agro las gza' dang nyi ma'i nges par 'chi ba cher bcad pa'i dbang du byas pa'i rim par phye ba ste
412b2(rgyud): nye shu rtse gsum pa'o////ltas kyi mtshan nyid dge ba ni//rab tu bo shud kyis lha mo nyon//A lI ka li mnyam byas la//sde tshan du ni bsdeb par bya//dbyangs dang
412b3(rgyud): gasngal byed dang po sogs//bltas te ming ni bzung bar bya//cha shas ldan la snying stobs can//de yi rigs ni shes par bya//mtha' yul so/klu rnas dang //nyi ma la so/de bzhin gza'
412b4(rgyud): pa 'gro la sogs ma mo rnams//de yi rigasu rab tu grags//lha rnams thams cad nyid dang ni//sngags rnams tham pa cad de las skyes//skye bo thams cad skyed byed ma//des
412b5(rgyud): na mo zhes bya bar brjod//a yigA dang ni de bzhin A//ka tsa na pa yang dag ldan//ta pa dang ni ye sha staM//sde dbu yi ni yi ge'o//i dang slar yang lha mo I//de bzhin
412b6(rgyud): gzhan yang / tsha tha//tha pha dang ni re Sha nyid//sde chen yang dag yin par brjod//u dang lha mo de bzhin u//gai dza Da dang yang dag ldan//dra ba dang ni las te//d+he
412b7(rgyud): sde tshan gsum pa yin//yi ge e dang de bzhin ai//de bzhin slar yang b+ha dz+nye D+ha/d+ha b+ha wa ha slar de bzhin//'di dag sde tshan bzhi pa yin/o yig dang ni au yig
413a1(rgyud): dang //oM zhes bya dang chog drug bcas//slar yang nga nya Na na mA/'di dgu sde tshan lnga pa yin//kun tu bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi dang //lhag ma lnga dang bcas
413a2(rgyud): par bya//de dag skye bo thams cad kyi/skye dang 'jig par yang dag gnas//yi ge bcu gnyis sgyu 'phrul che//'tsho dang dus kyi rang bzhin brjod//de dag nI si zhes
413a3(rgyud): bya ga/skar ma kun dang yang dag ldan//zla ba nyi ma'i bye brag gas//de bzhin 'og dang steng du brtse//brtan pa nyid dang g.yo ba nyid//gnyis po gnyi su brjod pa yin//
413a4(rgyud): rkyang ba dang ni sbyar ba ste//ridA dang thung ra pha ma dang rgyalnga//de las steng gi rgyal ba ste//'og ni 'chi bar shes par bya//nyi ma'i rgyu bar 'gro ba yi//bza' dang rA yis
413a5(rgyud): skar ma rnams//nyi ma la ni gnas te 'char//rA si gza' dang gsum par 'dod//dbugs rgyu ba dang yang dag ldan//thams cad rI sir shes par bya//karka
413a6(rgyud): tha dang glang po'i dgra//de bzhin gzhonu ma dang sra/cha shas drug dang yang dag ldan//gza' yis bskul nas 'char bar 'gyur//sdigs pa dang ni chu skyes dang /
413a7(rgyud): rgya mtshig dang ni bum par bcas//cha shas wa yi tshad dang ldan//gza' yis bskul nas 'char bar 'gyur//nya dang lug dang de bzhin du//gan+d+he dang zung
413b1(rgyud): smod pa dag/cha shes bzhi dang yang dag ldan//snga ma bzhin du 'char bar 'gyur//slar yang ltas dang bcas pa yi//gza' rnams 'char ba dashad par bya//'bras bu'i ming/
413b2(rgyud): dang ldan par bya//ltas chen 'byung ba mnyam par gyis//nag mo dang /gtsigs ma dang /'jig su rung ma dang /rga las 'das ma dang /log 'dren ma dang /gtum mo dang /
413b3(rgyud): drag mo'i gzugs can ma dang /dkar zlog lha mo dang /rgyal ma dang /rnam par rgyal ma dang /mi thung ma dang /gzhan gyis mi thub ma dang /nag mo bzang ma dang
413b4(rgyud): nag mo chen mo dang /nab mo sbom mo dang /dbang mo dang /zla ba mo dang /drag mo dang /sdang ma dang /'phyang ma dang /sum cu'i dbang mo dang /'phrog byed ma dang /'bar ma dang
413b5(rgyud): 'jib byed ma dang /lha mo 'di rnams ming dang ni/ltas chen nyi shu rtsa bzhi yi//ming ni mtshungs pas 'bras bu ste//nyis 'gyur du ni byas na su//dbang po'i cha dang yang dag ldan
413b6(rgyud): blta ni lhag ma bzung nasu//ltas ni shes pa nyid du bya//nag mo dang ni 'jigs rung dang //drag mo'i gzugs dang dka' zlog nyid//dag sbom ma dang rgyal ma dang /
413b7(rgyud): drag po sum cu'i dbang mo dang //'phrog byed ma dang 'jib byed ma//bcu po 'di dag rtsub par grags//ngag ma len dang bkris dang //grong dang tshong 'dus gar+b+ha
414a1(rgyud): padang /lam du phrag dang thabs dang //chen po'i spyang ni dbyung ba sags//lces dA las ni 'bras myed pas//dge ba'i las rnams mo b+h+ya sa//rog su don ma/
414a2(rgyud): la sgyu ma che//bzang po'i las ni spang bar bya//dge bas kyang ni gsod 'gyur na//drag mo'i las kyis smos ci dgod//lus la gnas pa'i dbugs dang ni//phyi ro
414a3(rgyud): gzo' dang rA si ste//phyi dang nang du bcus dA yi//rgyu ba shes na 'grub par 'gyur//gza' gang yin pa dbyings zhes bya//dbyangs gang yin pa de nyid kyang //rA si nyid
414a4(rgyud): du shes par bya//dbyangs dang rA si de bzhin du//skar ma'ang dbyangs kyi gzugasu dralta//phan tshun sbyor ba ma gtogs par//'bras bu 'grub par mi 'gyuraro//g.yo ba
414a5(rgyud): char la g.yo ba'i las//brtan pa la ni mi ga yo bIr//'dren ma yis ni 'dren mo ste//byi drang nong du bcas pas gsal//mkha' blo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i//rdoH
414a6(rgyud): mkha'agro bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' gro lus
414a7(rgyud): gza' rnams kyi rgyu ba dang snga tshan gyi ltas kyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o///de ni gza' dang skar ma ru//bcas pa'i rgyu ba bshad kyi nyon//
414b1(rgyud): A ts+tsha/ nga smra/ sa smra na shA / s+yA don du mya //9 \u0f88\u0f90 nas du na
414b2(rgyud): ma par 'dzums m+me 'i dang TI m+b+ha / shin nas par+b+hu b+h+ya/
414b3(rgyud): nadang po dang //drub pa san+ti 'tsho bA b+hU //rigs pa dag ga 'char ba so//dus ni yongasu chud pa da snyam//de dag rdzun mang panyid//rnal 'byung ba mi gzhan ba
414b4(rgyud): b+h+yasnyas pa di dashin de /dadun na ba ngas ma margyangs gas
414b5(rgyud): b+h+yad+hak+Sha/kAsar+b+hu k+ShiSh+T+rI nAr+dz+dzakA Ni s+ye b+hAgs ma na dag de nyi pa /skye dri ma pa na basbyin
415a1(rgyud): slar yang nyi tshod zla ba bsnan//drug cu ru ni bsgyur byas la//mashA dang sreg byed ro yi ni//dbang por bcas pas de bzhin bcad//bcu gnyis dag gi nang
415a2(rgyud): nas ni//lcug ma'i cha shas gzung bar bya//lhag mo'i che shes de yi ni//sgyid sdug gnas skabs myong bar 'gyur//nyin dang mtshan gyi sbyor ba yis//lhag ma'i
415a3(rgyud): chu chod du ni mi brjod//dang po'i zla ba'i bar gnas pa//de yi bya ba nyams par 'gyur//gnyis pa bkra shis shis pa ste//gsum pa'i tshe ste gsod par 'gyur//
415a4(rgyud): bzhi pa rgod de tshim par 'gyur//lnga pa nor te rnyed par 'gyur//drug pa rims te lus 'jig 'gyur//bdun pa la ni dga' ba ste//tshim pa nyid ni 'thob par 'a
415a5(rgyud): brgyad pa 'jig rten brlag par 'gyur//zla ba dgu par gnas pa yis//lus ni dgra dang bcas par 'gyur//bcu pa dga' mgur rtse 'gyur zhing //sna tshogs pa/
415a6(rgyud): nirgya lta bar 'gyur//bcu gcig sna tshogs 'jigs pas gdung //bcu gnyis pa ni long spyod//bde ba chen pos brgyal bar 'gyur//lug la sogs pa bstan pa
415a7(rgyud): yis//zla ba rim pa bzhin du rgyu//mkha' gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i//rdo rje mkho 'gro bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//bcom//
415b1(rgyud): ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' gro las thams cad rgya zan rim par bya ba nyi shu na lnga pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mas
415b2(rgyud): mchod cing phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to//skra gshong 'khor lo khyod bshad pa//de rnams dbye bo ci 'dra dang //dus kyi grangs ni ji bzhin gsungs//rgyu ba yi na
415b3(rgyud): khyad par dag/'di la bdag ni the tsom skyes//bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol//sgyu ma kun gyis rnol rol pa//nyon cig lha mi sgyu ma che//dus kyi bgrang ba lus med
415b4(rgyud): cing //thams cad du ni thad gnas//dngos po kun la khyab pa ste//lus la gnas kyang lus mi skye//dus nyid dus ni med pa dang //'jig rten nyid ni 'jig rten min//bden
415b5(rgyud): pa dang ni brdzun pa min//lha khyod kyis ni sngar bshad pa'i//bsam gyis mi khyab dus mtshan nyid//gang zhig khyod kyis bshad pa de//don dam shin tu rnyed dka' ba//lus las
415b6(rgyud): 'das shing dri med pa//rnal 'byor pa yis ji ltar rtogs//skye bo kun la sman sla du//dbugs kyi nges pa bshad du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//nad med rlung
415b7(rgyud): dang bral ba dang //khams ni snyoms par gnas pa dang //ron par za zhing tshul bzhin rgyu//de yi mig bcums bzung bar bya//mig btsums mig ni brtsams pa ste/
416a1(rgyud): /TIg btsums drug la tshwa shas na//gcig ces bya bar brjod pa yin//spyad tsam drug ni skad cig ste//skad ci ga drug ni zad gcas ston//zung nag drug
416a2(rgyud): ni cung zad yin//dus kyi go rims bye ba 'dis//sum cu thams por bskur ba la//yaM gi lci ba'i dus zhes brjod//yi ge lci bo bcu pa ni//srog gcig zhes bya/
416a3(rgyud): dusuM bshad//de ni be cu gsum sbyar ba las//de yang gnyi su bsgyur ba ni//srang gcig zhes ni brjod pa yin//srung ni drug cu tham pa la//chu tshod gcig tu bzhed pa
416a4(rgyud): yin//de brgyad thun cig zhes bya'o//de bzhi la ni nyin gcig/nyin mtshan dus ni mnyam pa la//mtshan mo'ang dri dang minyam par bshud//chu srin nas ni sprul pa'i
416a5(rgyud): bar//nyi ma 'brel bar brjod pa ste//lha mo srang ni gsum gsum gyis//nyin ri bzhin ni spel bar bya//chu srin las ni 'das na su//mtshan mo srung ni gsum gsum 'di//tshad ma
416a6(rgyud): de dag bstan pa'i phyir//zangs ma sred nI bcu gnyis so//snod ni dbang su sor brgyad dang //rgyu ni ser mo bcu gnyis bri//legs pa nyid du brjing par gyi/gis ni/
416a7(rgyud): ngoms sum tshu mos//sor drug pa mtshan tsam pu/bu me lebs par brjongs nas mo//thung ma de yis bro ga ni//zangs ma'i snod la mekhas pas dbus
416b1(rgyud): chu ni rnyog ma med pa las//spang ni drug cu'i tshad du bya//srang 'dis chu tshod tshad yin te//skye ba rnams la phanra phyir bshad//chu tsho du de ni yud tsam ste//thun phyed dang ni thunA gtsig
416b2(rgyud): dad//nyin dang mtshan mo'i tshad kyis ni//ri mo bzhin zla phyed zla bar spel//zla ba gnyis ni dus yin te//de gsum nyi ma 'phro ldog brjod//nyi ma 'gro sdog gnyis la ni//
416b3(rgyud): lho gcig nyid du brjod pa yin//mkha' gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i//rdo rje mkha' gro bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan rdo rje can
416b4(rgyud): gyis gsungs//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' gro las dus 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste//nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o////de nas skar ma'i rigs gdang
416b5(rgyud): yin//mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya//tha skar dang ni mgo dang rgyal//de bzhin du ni na mo so dang //me bzhi lha mtshams de bzhin du//nam gru sa ri gro zhun
416b6(rgyud): bcus//rgyu yi tshogs zhes brjod pa yin//snar ma bri dang chu stod dang //khrums stod dang ni bla nye dang //lag dang mgo dang chu srid dang //khrims slad ma
416b7(rgyud): yi tshogs yin//smin drug dang ni mchu dang ni//mon gru dang ni min gre dang //sgeg dang nag pa snron dang ni//sa ga dang ni snrums rnams ni//srin po sa ni rigs
417a1(rgyud): /yin papa//bzhin mdzes ma ni khyod lnga bshad//smin drug rgyal nir yin te//mgo drung sna mu klu yin//lug dang sgyums ni khyi yin te//U mtshams/
417a2(rgyud): nab so phag gi rigs//mchu dang gle ni byi ba'o//skag ni byi lar ba sha dri ba ste//nag pa sa gr-i stag yin//dbo dang khrums stod gnyis po ni//khyu mchog zhes nI
417a3(rgyud): bshad pa ste//stobs 'dod pas ni shes par bya//me bzhi dang ni sa ri gnyis//ma her shes bya stobs kyi mchog/tha skar dang ni khrums smad gnyis//rta yi rigs//
417a4(rgyud): zhes bya bar+ya brags//chu stod rlung ni gro zhun gnyis//spre'u'i rig su brjod pa yin//bra nye dang ni nAm gru gnyis//glang po'i rigs kyis byin rlabs pa'o//mon
417a5(rgyud): gru dang ni mon gre dag/mi yi rigasu yang drag gsungs//stobs chen pha rol gnon pa ru//lha mo ngas ni ba na phrar bshad//chu smad dang ni byi bzhin dag/ne'u
417a6(rgyud): lo'i rigasu grags pa yin//mang po nyid kyi ci zhig bya//mdor bsdus pa ni bshad kyis nyon//rang gi skye ba'i skar ma ni//bye bo kun la dpyod mi dgos//skar ma
417a7(rgyud): mi yi srog yin te//gzhan du ngas ni ma bshad//skar ma'i cha ni bzlog pa dang //bzung na nges par 'chi bar 'gyur//lug dang srad dang karka Te/chu srin dag ni gas
417b1(rgyud): bdU / ba du ma song go dang //khyu mchog dag ni brtanA pA ste//nywadang granyis sbyor bcu dang ni//bu mo rnams ni 'dron ma'o//b+hU yi tha ma nyi ma dang //mig du mar skyes
417b2(rgyud): pa'i gzugs yin to//pa ba sangs dang sgra gcan dang //zla ba mi yi gzugs yino//gzo' log dang ni spen pa gnyis//me ni nga nyid du bstan pa ste//na mkha'i 'khor lor gnas
417b3(rgyud): pa'i gza'//mkha' gro kun+da dang mnyam sbyor ba'i//rdo rje mkha'agro bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/rgyud kyi rgyal
417b4(rgyud): chen po dpal rdo rje mkha'i blo las skur mi rnams kyi stongs la dbang ba'i cho ga'i rim bur phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o///chos dang skar ma gza' 'char gwa/ra tu
417b5(rgyud): bshad kyis lha mo nyon//ro hi ta'i tshes la ni//sprin drag dang ni mig dmar la//'dron po la mu du 'jug par bzung //chos de rnyed pa 'thob 'gyur ba'o//ma ka ra yI nyi ma la//
417b6(rgyud): mchu dang mig dbang ldan pa la//gzir dang 'joms sogs 'byung bas nA//tshes de yongasu spang par bya//sba ba ni yi nyi ma la//lag drang spen par ldan pa'i tshe//
417b7(rgyud): 'i nyid du shes bya bas//tshes de'ang yongasu spang bar da/ te mi nyi ma la//mchud nga 'apa'i log ldan pa la//bkra shis dang ni 'arjod bar byed //
418a1(rgyud): sa klu la/sa pad+mag/rgyun tu mas da sa /spyo sa dang da//sa spyong du/ /
418a2(rgyud): mi kau sa chos /nr-i r+m+mA seM ma ga/ts+tsha ts+tshina'i gyur ni/ na d+hA sa myed papa// ni ma yi/sa
418a3(rgyud): sgyu drug la ni//dadu n+d+he s+yai b+hUm+b+ha b+h+ya/g+hu mun nu 'i ng+yas/sa pa sbyin gyi skye 'jigs pa b+h+ya pa~M/hrISh+TaSh+Te mr-i rnaMs la na/ ng+ge d+hA
418a4(rgyud): blon po da //gam mas spyod 'adz+nyAm+ban+ta na//ches dri rgyas kyi skyed 'gyur da //du ni bu'i grog sa rnams thams ca //b+h+rUM ti kA si nyi ma ni//chu srid
418a5(rgyud): rje'i mche ba ste//chos de yong su spong bar//kr-ir ma yin nyi ma la//srin drug dang ni sngon pa chu/ 'dzem par gyur na ni//rnyed dang grags pa la brir+m+ma
418b1(rgyud): dang //bsod nams kun gyi 'bras bu 'thog/bya ku li yi nyi ma ni//skag dang spen par ji zhig ltar//'dzo ma na gdung byar byed pas nA//nyi mA de la'ang 'gro ba sbyang ///
418b2(rgyud): zla ba nya yi nyi ma la//mchu dang spen b.re ldan gyur na//'chi ba dus la drub pas ni//tshes de shin tu spang bar bya//me'i mtshams mye kir bri//gshin rje ru ni ran da ste//srin po ru
418b3(rgyud): ni kur ma bri//chu yi phyog su khyu mchog ste//'jigs byed du ni bya ku la//gter gyi phyog su swa pa na//mig su me phyogasu bzang po bri//shaR+Ya gyi phyogasu 'du khyu
418b4(rgyud): mchogo/zla ba nyi ma'i bye brag gis/shrIde rnam su ni rgyu bar bshad//ba tra nas nI raN+Da ro ste//bye ku li dang bri Sha b+ha//'di dag nyi ma rgyu bar ni//rigs mchog ma
418b5(rgyud): ni khyod la bshad//khyu mchog dang ni mi kI ra//swa pa na dang kur ma ni//zla ba'i rgyu bar bshad pa ste//rim pa de ltar brjod pa yin//nya la me mtshams gnas pa
418b6(rgyud): skye//stong la rlung gri phyogasu gnas//de ltar de dag dbusu ni//gnas pa de dag gdud par 'gyur//zla ba nyi ma las byung ba'i//ri mo mnyam du lta bas na//
418b7(rgyud): des na shes rab can gyis spang //zhi dang sdig par lta bas na//lta ba'i chad pa 'byung ba ste//myur du gsod par byed pa yin//skra gcan gyis ni rgyu ba yi//
419a1(rgyud): dus ni mang du bsdus pa yi//yUng dmar ngon bye brag gis/blo ldan 'brad de shes par bya//mkha' gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'o//dAN+Da
419a2(rgyud): mkha'agro bde ba'i mcheg/rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' gro
419a3(rgyud): las chos grangs dang skar ma'i nges pa rim par phye ba nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o////nyon cig lha mo sgyu mi che//sgyu ma kun gyis rnam rol pa//lus
419a4(rgyud): can kun ni rnam shes te//lus las 'das shing dri ma med//lhun po dang ni taM sa dang //de bzhin du ni 'bro gas byed so gas//shar gyi lus 'phags
419a5(rgyud): ban glang spyod//byang gi sgra mi snyan dang ni//'dzi m+bu'i gling dang bcas pa dang //lan tshwa can dang 'o ma yi//rgya mtsho la sogs chu tshogs dang //'og dang
419a6(rgyud): steng du gang gyur pa//khams gsum ma lus zad par bya//gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po dang //skye mched khams rnams zad par bya//'byung po la
419a7(rgyud): gas phyogs bcu yi//'jig rten khams kun zed bsams te//dngos dang dngos med 'dres par na//bdag nyid du ni bsgom par bya//gzugs la
419b1(rgyud): sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnams//mnyam nyid stong pa nyid du lta//thams cad na mkha' thim nas ni//ba glang rmig par grong khyer sgom//rnal 'byor can gyis chog bzhin//
419b2(rgyud): sems ni me mar lta bur sgom//de dbus yid kyis bltas nas ni//der ni mtshan ma brtag par bya//me mer lta bus zhi bar gyur//dmar pos rgyun na rgyas pa ste//nyi ma'o//
419b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ltar snang na//chags pa'i la sogs 'grub par 'gyur//mtha' mar du ba 'am gnag mthong na//mngon spyod du ni grags pa yin//rlung gi mdog ltar
419b4(rgyud): rab 'khrugs na//de ma thag tu bskrad par 'gyur//'od zer dkar po long long pos//blo ldan sngags kyi dngos grub ni//rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub zhes bya//bkra shis
419b5(rgyud): kyi ni lam ston yin//cho ga 'dis ni gzhan gsal dang //gzhan gyi gzugs sogs dbu ma rnams//de 'og rnal 'byor bskyed par bya//ye shes la sogs sems
419b6(rgyud): kyis ni//gang zhig stong nyid shes byas na//sems ni myur du thar par 'gyur//ye shes kyis ni shes bya ba rtag/shes byas 'gro ba brtag par bya//pha dang ma ni
419b7(rgyud): bsad byas shing //bram ze gtsang ma gnyis bzung nas//rgyal po yul 'khor bcas bcom ni//ma de dag par 'gyur zhes bya//ye shes rang bzhin kun dang sbyor///
420a1(rgyud): rdo rje mkha' gro bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rje//
420a2(rgyud): rje mkha'agro las ye shes 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtse dgu pa'o////ye shes khyad par gang gis ni//ye shes thun mong byin rlabs pa//bye brag
420a3(rgyud): can ni ji lta gu/lta las rol mo mnyan par 'tshol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//lci bar gyur pa sum cu pos//dge dang sdig pa'i 'bras 'byung ba//nga
420a4(rgyud): rgyal gyis ni byin rlabs pa//sems kyis byas pa'i las tshogs kyis//sgom par gyur pa'i rang rig pa'i//sems ni 'gro ba de ru 'gro//srid pa'i zhags pas
420a5(rgyud): rtag 'jigs pas//de yi 'gro ba mi mthong ngo //'du shes rnam pa lnga dang ni//lta ba lnga yis pha rol 'gro//lha yi ye shes gsal bar blta//lha min ye
420a6(rgyud): shes khro ba'o//yi dgas ye shes zhan pa ste//dmyal ba'i ye shes 'jigs bus non//byol srong ye shes blun pa ste//brtan pa rnams ni sems med pa'o//
420a7(rgyud): rgyu ba'i ye shes rnam pa lnga//glen pas bsgribs dang lkugs pa dang //byis pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can//sems can yongasu ma smin dang //bla ma'i lam ni
420b1(rgyud): sun 'byin pa//de dag kun gyis mi shes te//gsang chen sangs rgyas spyod yu'o//ye shes de nyid bye brag dag/bde ba chen pos bshad du gsal//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
420b2(rgyud): shos de nyid bye brag dag/nyon cig yang dag sgyu mche//las rnams kyi ni bye brags//ye shes bye brag sprul pa yin//dman dang rab dman dman pa can//gnod sbyin lha
420b3(rgyud): min grub pa go/klu dang byol song gsang ba ba//lto 'phye dang ni mi 'am ci//mi dang yi dwags mkha' gro ma//dmyal ba la sogs gang gyur dang //gsal ba'i gzugs
420b4(rgyud): mngon brjod dang //bu mo sgo nga las byung ba//chu dang mi dang rlung dang ni//de bzhin du ni sa yi khams//brtan pa la sogs thams cad dang //rtsa dang mdab ma phra ba dang //
420b5(rgyud): sa dang rdo dang brag la sogs//thams cad ye shes byin rlabs pas//thams cad snang ste gzhan du na//ye shes med par smra mi 'gyur//skye ba bye ba stong phrag tu//sangs
420b6(rgyud): rgyas ye shes kyis bskul bas//de nas rnal 'byor bstan bcos la//'bad de dad pa bskyed par bya//gar gyi gnas dang mtshungs pa yi//phyi rol bstan bco su 'byin pa/
420b7(rgyud): rnal 'byer bstan bcos rjes 'brangs na//spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras bu 'thob/snying po las kyang snying po mchog/rnal 'byor bstan bcos mtshon par bya//mkha' grwa
421a1(rgyud): kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'o//rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchod//rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal
421a2(rgyud): rdo rje mkha' gro las//rdo rje sems dnga'i rnam par 'phrul par 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu pa'o///5/de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//rdo rje dril bu'i
421a3(rgyud): mtshan nyid de//rdo rje sems sogs lha rnams//rdo rje'i blos ni shes par bya//zhi dang rgyas dang mngon spyod kyi//rdo rje dag ni thams cad kyang //gser la sogs la
421a4(rgyud): legs par brdung //rdo rje kun gyis shin tu rgyun//cha gsum du ni bzung na su//tshwa brgyad ska rags legs par brgyan//phyogs dang phyogs mtshams brgyad dang ni//
421a5(rgyud): dbus ma nyid dang sangs rgyas dgu//rtse mo dgu ni lha nyid de//lha dgu yis ni byin gyis brlabs//chu srin las ni byung ba yin//rtse mo pad+ma zla bar gnas/
421a6(rgyud): rje dgu zhes ni bya ba ste//rdo rje ye shes 'gro ba sgrol//cha gsum gyis ni tshad dag la//dbu ma cung zad ring yang rung //'di ni thun mong chad yin//rtse mo kun
421a7(rgyud): gyi dbu ma zlum//phyogs sogs rtse mo 'dud pas gnas//dbus ni zur brgyad dag tu bya//dbus kyi cha yi chad ldan pa//gnas pa lte ba zhes bya ba'o//
421b1(rgyud): rin chen mA ra ga ta sbyar//de yang cung zang zur brgyud bya//stong dang 'og dang dbus dag ni//so sor tshwa nA gsum gsum 'dod//steng gi pad+ma zla ba ni//drug tshe kun nas zlum por bya/
421b2(rgyud): de dag la ni seng ge'i sna//nas phyed tsam du mtho bor bya//mtsha ba yi ni mtha' ra gnas pa//de ni drug cha zhes byar grags//cha ni nyi shu rtsa bdun la//so so ru ni dgu dgur/
421b3(rgyud): 'dod//cha gsum bla ma'i mtha' ma ni//steng gi cha gnyis spangs nas ni//dbus kyi mtha' yang de bzhi no//mdab me la ni gnas gang ba'i//chu srin cha gcig nyid yin
421b4(rgyud): te//de yi phyed du ska rags 'dod//rdo rje kun la blo ldan pas//mchu dang zheng ni mnyam por bya//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//dam tshig rdo rje'i mtshan nyid de//gser
421b5(rgyud): la sogs pa las brdungs pa//cha las sogs pa sngon du ni//ji ltar bstan bzhin ldan par bya//pad+ma zla ba la gnas pa'i//chu srin gyi ni mche ba'i gzugs//'og gi/
421b6(rgyud): chu srin las byung ba//chu zheng ji ltar bstan pa bzhin//rtse mo ye shes rang bzhin 'byung //kun gyi dbusu rnam snang ste//shar phyogasu ni mi bskyod pa'o//lho ru
421b7(rgyud): rin chen bstan pa ste//'od dpag med pa nub tu dgod//byang du don yod grub pa ste//rtsa bzhi la sogs lha yino//pad+ma byang chub yan lag brgyad//sa la ji
422a1(rgyud): bzhin dgod par bya//phyag na pad+ma byams pa dang //mkha' snying kun tu bzang po dang //gnod sbyin bdag dang 'jam pa'i dpal//sa snying sgrib sel de
422a2(rgyud): bzhin te//lha ni brgyad po 'di dag nyid//mdang ma brgyad la ji bzhin brtag/dbu su ye shes sems dpa' ni//bcu gsum gan su thim par bya//gzhan yang med pe brgyad lha mo
422a3(rgyud): brgyadaji bzhin gnasu sbyar bar bya//rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa dang //rdo rje lcags sgrogs dril bu nyid//lha mo dag ni bzhi po 'di//phyogs kyi pad+mar yang dag gan+da//
422a4(rgyud): mtshams ni bzhi po dag tu yang //slar yang de bzhin lha mo bzhi//skul byed rin chen sgron ma dang //de bzhin rdo rje lcag sgrog dang //de bzhin gzhan gyis mi thub ma//
422a5(rgyud): pad+ma'i mdab maM kun la dgod/rtse mo dag ni rnam lnga la//mkha' gro me ni lnga nyid de/shar du rdo rje mkha 'gro ma//byang du drag mo zhes bya ba//ro langs ma ni nub
422a6(rgyud): tu/nas//lho ru de bzhin tsaN+Da li//dbus ye shes mkha' gro ste//dam tshig rdo rje bsgom par bya//gdug la rdo rje rtse gsum ste//rtse mo dag ni gdengs par bya//
422a7(rgyud): de bzhin rtse mo gcig pa ni//klu rnams skrag par byed pa'o//khro bo'i rdo rje gdengs po ste//lhag ma rnams ni 'dul byed pa'o//zhi la zhi bA lha nyid de/
422b1(rgyud): rigs kyi rim pa'i cho gas dbye//las kyi cho ba mthong ba yis//bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyur//de nas gzhan yang ba shad bya ba//gsang ba'i rdo rje mtshan nyid de//cha
422b2(rgyud): lnga'i tshad dang ldan pa ni//spyi gtsug rdo rje zhes byar grags//rna cha cha drug chad du bya//mgul de cha ni bzhi pa ste//snying khar cha lnga pa ni bzung //gsang ba dang ni lag
422b3(rgyud): bar yang //cha drug par ni bzung bya ste//ji ltar mdzes par brtag par bya//rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan nas ni//rnal 'byor pa yi ye shes 'phel//che ga'i bya ba 'di nyid
422b4(rgyud): kyis//rnal 'byor rigs byas rtag tu bsgom//de nas dril bu'i mtshan nyid kyi//chu zheng la sogs bshad par bya//rin chen sna tshogs 'bar ba dang //rdo rje'i ska rags
422b5(rgyud): phreng gnyis bya//shel sgong dri ma med la ltar//dra ba dra ba phyed pas rgyan//cha gsum mtshan nyid ldan pa la//rdo rje la sogs mtshan mas rgyan//dbus kyi khog
422b6(rgyud): ba zab pa dang //thams cad dga' byed bcud kyis gnas//de nas pad+ma rin chen dang //ud pa la ku mu da yis rgyan//phyogs dang phyogs mtshams cha brgya du//
422b7(rgyud): lha mo la sogs brgyad du grags//de yi steng du lha mo ni//sa bon brgyad las bsam par bya//shar phyogasu ni sgrol ma ste//de bzhin byang du gos dkar mo'o//
423a1(rgyud): nub du bdag mo'i ming can te//lto ru sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya//mdog mdzes sbrang rtsi yid 'ong ma//de bzhin rin chen 'khyil ma'o//na mkha'
423a2(rgyud): phyogs kyi dbus ni//gzugs rdzogs bskor bas yang drag gnas//pad+ma rgyas po lta bu'i dbyibs//gzugs med srid pa'i phyogasu ni//ye shes bdud rtsi dum pa
423a3(rgyud): 'dra//shes rab bdud rtsi'i gnas yin te//de yi dbus kyi stan la ni//steng du pad+ma rdo rje ni//rtse mo dgu par bsam par bya//dbus kyi dbyug pa ye shes te//thams cad sgro
423a4(rgyud): zhing sdud pa mo//i ltar mchog ni stsol bar 'grub//bya ba thams cad rab sgrub ma'o//ye shes rdo rje'i dril bu ni//rtse mo dgu pa de bzhino//so ro mo bcu gnyis chad
423a5(rgyud): du ni//rdo rje'i phreng ba ske rags byas//pad+ma mchog gi mdab ma dang //dra ba dra ba phyed pas rgyan//sngon bzhin mtshan nyid thams cad ldan//lha mo yi na mtshan
423a6(rgyud): mdzeswa//shararA gyi phyogasu pad+ma ni//kha dogri dkar pos mdzes par bya//gshin rdor pad+ma sngon dmar te//nub kyi phyogasu pad+ma dmar//byang du ud pa la byar ni//
423a7(rgyud): bdud rtsi gnas kyi dbus na no//lha mo yi ni zhal gcig bri//shes rab pha rol phyin ma'o//gzugs mdzes bskor bas yang dag gnas//steng gi pad dang rdorje
423b1(rgyud): //snga ma bzhin du bsam par bya//dbus kyi ma shos dazlog pa no//zur brgyad pas nI mdzes par bya//dril du 'don lha man//ma dang nad mod phun num tshogs//de nas dpa' ba'i dra
423b2(rgyud): Ta ste//rdo rje'i phreng ba'i ska rigs ldan//de bzhin du ni shes rab dang //'dud rtsi yi ni bum par ldan//mtshan nyid thams cad yong su rdzogs//dra ba dra byed spang brda bya//sor dgu
423b3(rgyud): ru ni yangs pa ste//kha dog sor lnga'i tshad du bya//de las cung zad lhag bya min//rtse lnga pa 'am rtsi dgu pa//skal pa bzang po thams cad dang //dbang phyug dang ni sngags rnams kyi/
423b4(rgyud): 'bras bu thams cad rab ster zhing //mkha' gro'i stobs dang rdzu 'phrul ster//de bzhin phun tshogs thaMd dang //de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi//dngos grub mchog ni/
423b5(rgyud): gsal bar ster//da ni de bzhin gshegs pa yi//dril du'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya//khar ba las byung sgra snyan byed//khong stong dang ni bum par ldan//rdo rje rin rjen
423b6(rgyud): pad+ma dang //rAH gri lA sogs mtshan ma can/da bde ba phyed pas smras//chu sprin las ni thung ba yin//ye shes lnga yi rnam dag pas//rtse mo lde dang bcas hA swA/
423b7(rgyud): spyi rags gnyis gnyis dbus ni//'khar lo'i phreng ze gnyis dang ldan//de bzhin skra rags gnyis dbus//pad+ma la ni bad phreng gnyis//rin chen la ni rin
424a1(rgyud): cha//de bzhin ska rags ldan par bya//don yod grub pa zhes bya la//ska rags gnyis dbus ral bris rgyan//kun la shes rab gdang
424a2(rgyud): ldan pas//dpa' bo kun gyis rgyal bar 'gyur//kun la'ang khar ba'am yad na ni//lcags gsum las byung dril bu ste//cha gsum dang ni ldan par bya/
424a3(rgyud): rdo rje'i rigs la ba glang gdong //ska rags rdo rje'i phreng las bskor//bum pa'i steng du gnas pa yi//kha khyor cung zad gru bzhir byed//ba glang gdong ni myur
424a4(rgyud): ru//nor dang 'bru rnams 'phel bar byed//nad med stobs ni rtag stor zhing //sdug bsngal thams cad 'jog par byed//sngar bstan rje su 'brang nas ni//
424a5(rgyud): rdo rje mtshan nyid mtshon par byed//rin chen dbang sogs thod pa dang //rang rang mtshan ma shes par bya//snor brgyad dmA nI bcu drug kam//nyi shu las ni sgyu
424a6(rgyud): mi bya//ji ltar nus shing rjes 'thun par//bsgrub pa'i dbang pos de dag bya//kha yang cho ga'i rim pa yis//sor mo lnga las gzhan par spyang //lha ma
424a7(rgyud): 'od ni dril bu yi//sgrub thabs rgya cher bstan pa ste//thun mongs gi ni rgyud kun las//dpa' bo rnams kyis bsngags pa yin//mkha' gro kun dang
424b1(rgyud): mnyam bya'o//rdo rje mkha' gro bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsus//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' gro//
424b2(rgyud): las rdo rje dang dril bu'i mtshan nyid dang chad kyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o////rdo rje slob dpon mtshan nyid ni//rab tu bshad kyis lha ma
424b3(rgyud): nyon//dul zhing cha lugs mdzes pa dang //sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin//sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes//rnal 'byor bzo yi cha la mkhas//thams cad
424b4(rgyud): du ni 'jam par smra//sems can kun la bu bzhin ste//rtag tu gdong la dga' ba dang //bsam gtan sbyor la mngon par brtson//snying rje phan pa'i sems kyis ni//
424b5(rgyud): bden par smra zhing tshe mi byed//rtag tu mnyam pa'i sems bskyed pas//sems can kun gyi mgon skye bo ste//sems can bsam pa'i bye brag mkhas//mgon
424b6(rgyud): med rnams la gnyen ltar brtse//mdzes sdug gi ni legs pas ste//sngags kyi tshul la shin tu goms//dam tshig spyod la rab tu gus//phyag rgya brda yi sbyor
424b7(rgyud): ba rig/rnal 'byor ma rnams dam tshig la//brda' yis sbyor ba ston pa dang //gnyis med sbyor ba mi phyed gnas//sngags kyi 'khor lo spyod la gus//dbang
425a1(rgyud): bskur don po yon tan 'byung //gnas sogs mthong ba dang dul //de nyid btsun yongasu shes//'don slo da na 'a byung brjod//san
425a2(rgyud): ba de lta bu'i slob dpon la ji ste ltar bar tha gyi/bka' stsal pa/sangs rgyas kun gyi rangs bzhin sku//yan log byang chub sems dpa' ste//ba spu rnams ni
425a3(rgyud): dge detsam nyid//spyi gtsug rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas te//'jig rten pa ni zhabs kyi gdan//'od zer gnod sbyin gobang la sogs//de ltar yon tan rang bzhin
425a4(rgyud): thos//rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu skye//ji lta'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ra//ye shes can gyis mtshan shes nus//da lta'i bla ma 'badude bstan//
425a5(rgyud): nga khyod tu sgra can dang //ngag nI shin tu rtsub pa dang //yon tan dag gis chog shes pa//de ni bla mar bsten maH//gzhan yang slob ma'i spyod pa dang /
425a6(rgyud): mas kyi shAkyis ts+tshin//khro dang bcas shing rtog ger gus//na so dag ni yol ba dang //gang yang dge slong dngos gnas dang //zhen dang chags pas bcings
425a7(rgyud): na mdo rjedzin chen na//des bshad par mi bye'o//gang yang rgyal med pa dang //sgyu med bdag tu mi 'dzin cing //de bzhin mos la mngon pa
425b1(rgyud): /dol san dag sbyin pa dag/ kunan kunan srung bar 'gyur//blo ba dpon gyono gsung ba dang //nas 'byung ma dang rgyun cig /A ma dum chog spyod pa dang //gat+ta /
425b2(rgyud): ma la sogs gsang sgyur //skrod pa dag hU~M gang pyod pa//smyig bzhin dang bcos bzhin du//mnung med po nI myur dwe byung //smin drican gyi ne ma la sbyin dang//sgyus
425b3(rgyud): dadu gdugs dang na parji sogs1 li spyod rnams tha~Md dang //grub pa 'gos pa de mi b+hA zhing // ba~Md+hA ni mi bye//gal tes mdus kun tu//de na bAn+d+ha
425b4(rgyud): ra 'gyur zhing //don nyams da m+b+ha lam ring hU~M 'byur //bdud dang snang bas gzir 'asgyur te//mchod rten pa shig dang sdug mtshungs pas//de bas grub ma 'gros/
425b5(rgyud): myi bya/slob dpon spyod byed gang yin pa//rmi lam du yang dngos grub med//slob dben gyi ni yon gzung //skyon rnams nam yang bzung mi bya//sngags dang phyu
425b6(rgyud): '-i sbyor la sngags//dri yi lam gyis 'grub par 'gyur//maN+Dal tsho ga sogs rim pa yis//sngon du bsgre ba smyon par bya//dngos po rang bzhin med par ni//mtho/
425b7(rgyud): byang chub mas//rang bzhin dag pa'i chos n-i/de'i med 'das mthong bay-i/spos kyi la sani mos sum dang //ngagi rnam pa na rnams
426a1(rgyud): yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ste//do ltar rnam bcur phyo ba las//dkar po yis ni dkar 'gyur pa//nas pos de bzhin 'bras gnag
426a2(rgyud): 'byin//des na de dag spyang bya ste//sems can rnams la tshig rtsub dang //tshig 'khyal smra bar spang bar bya//snying yi ni sems kyis//'tsho dang gnod pa
426a3(rgyud): spong bar bya//bdag ni shi bar gyur kyang bla'i//srog chags gsod pa de ltar min//rab tu 'bar mer mtshungs pas ni//gzhan gyi nor la reg mi bya//rnal
426a4(rgyud): 'byor pa yi rdzun srung zhing //bla ma'i bka' stsal thams cad bya//rnal 'byor pa yin rnal 'byor pa//brdzun tu smra ba thams cad dang //sems can kun
426a5(rgyud): la sbyor sngogs min//gzhan gyi bud med spang bya zhing //log pas 'tsho dang rnyed la sogs//de bas thams cad spang bar bya//dga' ba dag la spyod par
426a6(rgyud): dang //betor ma dag gis dus sogs la//dam tshig spyod par byed pa yang //bza' dang bca' sogs chod zin bya//rnal 'byor dngos grub 'dod pa
426a7(rgyud): rnams//sems can mgu las dngos grub 'byung //de la dang por re shig slob mas bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar te//dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha
426b1(rgyud): du sa la btsugs la lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar to/'di skad ces brjod par bya'o//sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la//rtag tu bdag ni skyabasu mche//rnal 'byor/
426b2(rgyud): gsang sogs mkha'agro ma//theg pa gsum po thams cad dang //dpa' bo dpa' mo dbang lha mo//bdag nyid chen mo rnams dang ni//khyad par du yang slob dpon lo//
426b3(rgyud): rtag par bdag ni skyabasu mchi//oM pany+tsa DA ki nI pA dza u bas+thA nA ya At+ma naM nir+yA ta yA mi hUM/sarba A tsUr+yA pu dza u pas+thA nA ya At+ma no nir+ya ta yaM mi hUM sarba satwA pa ri
426b4(rgyud): d+hA NAn+tA ya At+ma naM nir+yA ta yA mi hUM//zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs la//slar ying 'dra skad ces brjod par bya ste//khro dang ba dag tu 'dzin pa dang //tshig
426b5(rgyud): rtsu bo zhe gcod spang bar bgyi//sdig pa'i grogs dang srog gcod dang //rku 'phrog dag ni spang bar bgyi//long spyod rgya che spang bgyi zhing //nges dang bcas pas
426b6(rgyud): chog shes bgyi//glar dang gnas dang mtshungs pa yi//phyi rol bstan bcos spang bar bgyi zhes//de nas yang dag bshad par bya//sdom pa'i cho ga bla na med//
426b7(rgyud): dang po tha ma dam tshig ni//thob pa rgyu dang 'bras bu 'byung //bstan dang de bzhin nges par bstan//sku gsungs thugs kyi rang bzhin te//bstan pa dag ni/
427a1(rgyud): long spyod yin//nges par bstan pas mya ngan 'dus//bshang gci la sogs bza' ba dang //rigs dang rigs min de bzhin gzhan//sngags
427a2(rgyud): rnams kyi ni man shis//ming sngogs cho ga bzhin dbang bskur//slob mas dngos po bsgoms na su//mya ngan 'das pa bstan par bya//khyod kyis srog chags
427a3(rgyud): bsad bya zhing //brdzun du yang ni smra bar bya//ma byin par ni blang bar bya//gzhan gyi dud med bstan par bya//mchod rten las ni mi bya zhing //glegs baM klag
427a4(rgyud): pa'ang mi bya'o//lag pa'i phyag rgya mi bcings shing //sngags kyi yi ge bzlas mi bya//bstan bcos dag ni rnyed sla ste//de yi sbyor ba rnyed par dka'//bla ma'i
427a5(rgyud): bsnyen bkur brtson pa yi//thobs kyis rnal 'byor pa yis rnyed//bdag nyid lus dang gzhan gyi lus//bdag nyid bde mchog byang grol te//bdag gi lus la ma
427a6(rgyud): chags shing //gzugs brnyan sogs 'dra'i lho ru brtag/mkha' gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i//rdo rje mkha'agro bde bI mchog/rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/
427a7(rgyud): bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' gro las bla ma'i bsnyen bkur dang //dam tshig dang sdom pa'i cho ga'i rim par bya
427b1(rgyud): bsto sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o////de nas mkhru 'gro ma rnams na//sa rnams la ni rnam rol pa'i//sngags kyi 'byung bar rol pa ste//da ni yang dag bshad par
427b2(rgyud): mi k+Sh+mAM k+Sh+mI phaT phaT/ka ra ka ra ban+d+ha ban+d+ha//patsi pa tsa hi hi/hai haM/da ha da hA/ku ruM ku ru/trA saM ya trA sa ya/b+hak+Sha b+hA k+Sha hUM hU~M/ki li ki li byA s+yA ru d+hi rA An+ta mU lpA ba /
427b3(rgyud): na gr-id+d+ha'i gr-id+d+ha k+Sho b+hA ya k+Sho b+hA ya/hra hAM/A kaD+D+h+ya A kAn+d+ha tsi li tsi li/si li si mi/sap+ta pA tA lag taM b+hu dzaM ga san+tim+b+ha/tairdza ya tar+d+ha ya/tr-i dz+r-i pheM pheM hr-i hre/d+hi mi d+hi mihwA/
427b4(rgyud): hUM phaT/oM na ma~M b+he gr-i ba ti bA re shwA ya ma drA kArl-i k+Shi sin+do b+ha ya/dza Ta ma ku ko TA ya/daMSh+Ta kA rA lo b+h+r-i lA NA mu khyA ya/sa ha sra b+hu dza b+hU su ra ya/bA ra shu pA sho d+hAt+ta
427b5(rgyud): shul kha nAM gA d+hA ri Ni/b+hA g+hA dza nIm+b+ha ra d+ha rA yA/mAny+dzi d+hu mAn+ta kA l+ye buSh+ma yaM hUM hUM phaT/oM hUM phaT/oM badz+ra bai r-I tsa hI ye swA hA//oM hrIHha ha huM hUM phaT/oM ha na maH/
427b6(rgyud): swAt+ma d+hA/ l-iHhAM/ts+tshat+s+yataM/pan+tha hAM swAd+b+h+yAM/aun+d+ra nI /au br-I/hwA yo/d+h+r-i maM//huMtrUM phaT phaT/oM sar+b+be bud+d+ha badz+ra bar+N+Na nI paM/badz+r-in+dok+Shi ni yas+yAhA/
427b7(rgyud): ma su~M t+te ni su d+hun hu~M hU~M dzaT/ma~M gr-ig+h+ra~M kr-its+tsha hU~M dza Ta oM br-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA ba ya tsu d+hu dzaT/mai sU na yai te thA ga ba na//bid+d+he rA dza ts+tsheb+h+rU~M phaT swAhA//oM badz+ra nAka na/
428a1(rgyud): /9 stung+gar+m+ma ts+tsha r+m+ma stu/na rgyu su na su tArat+ma/snro snrok+Shak+Shan+d+ha k+Sha/
428a2(rgyud): in+ti hA ri Ni/d+hI bit+taM/mr-i gats+tsha kAM ka yaSh+Ta su kha~M Ta/oM sarba ti thi nik+Shetra gr-i ha~M ma~M gra lai b+h+yaHswAt+su/oM mU nai kr-i sa mu naM ha thA la~M gI laM hI phaT Te'i a mo g+hA sa
428a3(rgyud): tha banad+hamI s+t+raihA//oM rAt+na badz+ri dza~M phaT ya~M grA swAH/oM a rbob rjen kwin+da nr-i \u0f7f ka Tha ke thar/ rmen ka l-i su uts+tsha le tI liShi lo si li a thai ba~M thenA
428a4(rgyud): kuna~M the a na pa~M ti dz+nyA na bai tIka sau ka s+ye k+Sh+ma si g+hA sa mAng+ga b+h+yA se mar+d+hag+hA si swAn+ta//oM bi kA lpAk+Sha yan+nat+tA hUM pheMT phaT swAhA//sngags 'di yis ni sgrub pa'o//lasu rnams thaMd
428a5(rgyud): byed 'gyur te//sngags kyi cho ga ji bzhin du//nyon tsog lha me bshad par bya//oM na ma~M b+he ga bi ta~M badz+rI g+h+nAn+te ti An+ta e pa rA dzi te trai lo kya mU te mA hA bir+ye shwa ri sa
428a6(rgyud): d+hU t+taSh+Tha y+YA ba~M te/ma hA badz+re bAdz+nyA sa ni/ya Ni te u bA rU dza~M te dAts+yai ka ri ni tra thA maNi biSha shoSha ni roSha Ni kr-i d+ha ni kai rA la ni san+na s+yA nI mA sbyi ni de d+hed ni pa nA dza
428a7(rgyud): ma~M dza d+h+waM ni k+te b+ha ni mata ni/badz+ri thA nA ne/madz+dza ma ki ni/kA ma tha ra kha ka~M/taHthA/br-i ti ge pro tiga~M/tan ta ne/nAMd+h+r-i kai kiNa~M khi kha~M na/d+hun d+hu na brje
428b1(rgyud): sho Sha ya khan+d+haM ga ka pU la m+ba l+yA d+hA ra Na ma hA bi si ti m+b+hi sA sha ni mA nu Sha an+ta pra br-it+taM san+ni d+h+ya na ra shri ro mA mA gr-I thi ta d+ha ra Ni/sr-i d+ha ni suM b+he ha na ha na prA NAM/sarba pA pa sat+kA naM sarba/
428b2(rgyud): pa shU nAM man+di mAM san+d+haM da ni kr-i d+hi rmAr+t+ti daMSh+TaM ka rA li ni mahA mu dr-i shrI he ru ka da ba s+yaM a gr-i ma hI ShI sa ha sra shai re sa ha sra bA ha baM sha ta saM ha sr-i An nai dz+nyA si tA t+yai dza s+ya dz+ha la ma?/
428b3(rgyud): khi pai gA lA lo tsa ne/badz+ra shra r-I ra badz+ri A sa ne mi li mi li ti mi li ti mi li//hwe he ha ha tAM hUM kha kha/d+hu d+hu/d+hu ru d+hu ru/mu ru mu ru/e dr-i tAM many+dza yo gi n+di pa tri tI sId+d+hi
428b4(rgyud): dr-ir+t+ti rI da gr-i/he hI ha ha/b+hI ma hA sa ha saM bI re ha ha t+to&d+b+ha hUM/NAM lokyA bi nA sha naM/sha taM saM ta s+yA kau nr-i ti thA gr-i ta pa raM b+hA r-i tit+sAd+d+haM phaT/si ta rU pe khaM rdeg rdor+Ya
428b5(rgyud): \u0f7ftrai lakyaM u da re sa mu d+h+waM me khaM lo gra s+ya grA sa hU~M d+h+r-i phaT/bI rA dwai te t+yaM hUM hA hA ma hA pa sh+yA me ha nAM yo gaM shwe ri tAM DA ki nI sar+b+ba mAM kr-I nAM ben+d+ha nI sad+d+haHpra d+ha ya kA r-i
428b6(rgyud): hUM phaT//b+hA tA trA sa ni mahA bI re pa ra ma sid+d+hi gai shr-i rau phaT huM hUM phaT hUM d+h+yaM hUM phaT swA hA//a A/I I/u U/ri rI/lo wAM/e ai i au/aM AHkA kha gaM k+tA da//
428b7(rgyud): tse tsha dzaHnyaM/Te thai DaM D+ha Na/ta tha da d+ha na/pa pha ba b+ha me/yaM ra la waM/she ShaM sa ha/k+Sha/'di ni bcom ldan lha de nyid//lha rnams kun gyi mchog gi gnas/
429a1(rgyud): sngags rnams thams cad skyed byed pa//rgyud rnams kyang ni de bzhi no//mkha' gra kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i//rdo rje mkha'agro bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje
429a2(rgyud): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' phro las sngags kyi cho ga rim par phye ba ste sum cu rtsa
429a3(rgyud): gsum pa'o////de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//rgyud du sbas pa nges par bya//de nas thams cad chos 'byung bar//sna tshogs ste bar mi shigs dag/
429a4(rgyud): bris nas cho ga bzhin du sngags//chos kun gcig tu bsdu bar bya//A li ka li mnyam byas nas//sde tshan la ni thim par bya//dir gnas pa las dpa' bo ni//'dod
429a5(rgyud): pa'i don kun sgrub byed btu//ye shes long spyod rdzogs pa dang //sprul pa thob gyur gdon mi za//'og dang steng 'grub rtag tu ster//bdag gi pho nya mo kun 'gro//
429a6(rgyud): pho nya mo de grub kun ster//mthong dang de bzhin rag pa dang //tsum pa na dang rtag par 'khyud//sbyor ba'i gnas kyi khyad par nyid//ji snyed rnal 'byor chags
429a7(rgyud): rnams ni//thams cad dngos grub byed par bshad//bden pa thams cad sbyin bya ste//gzhan du nim yang ma yino//ma dang sring mo bu mo dang //chung ma phonya
429b1(rgyud): mor gnas la//gang zhig rtag tu sngags ston pa//rlung gi cho ga de bzhin bya//thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang //de bzhin sangs rgyas gtsug nor bu//pad+ma dpal gyi nags
429b2(rgyud): rtsa ba/brda' yis sangs rgyas phyag rgya yin//dbang po gang dang gang lam nas//rang bzhin de dang de 'gre ba//mchog tu mnyam gzhan sbyor ba yis//sangs rgyas kun tu
429b3(rgyud): rang nyid 'gyur//mkha'agro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i//rdo rje mkha' gro bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//
429b4(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' gre las rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o///de nas mkha' gro ma rnams kyi//dngos grub zang
429b5(rgyud): rib ster ba'i//ye shes 'byung ba bshad par bya//bong bu'i tshe byad rnal 'byor bdag/yid shugs kyis ni bzlog par byed//mkha' gro ma dang mdzes ma dang //dum skyes
429b6(rgyud): gzugs can rnal 'byor ma//rnal 'byor ma ni 'di dag nyid//brda yi tshul gyis bstan pa ste//bsam gtan phyag rgya 'dod gzugs can//bong bu'i cha byad khrag 'jog
429b7(rgyud): zhal//sbrul gyis dkris pa'i mdung rtsi ni//gsum pa mkha' gro'i lag na thogs//kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa ni//steng du bstod de thogs pa dang //mi ro'i stan bzhugs
430a1(rgyud): cher 'bar b+ha//skra ni kham pa gye nu brdzes shing //spyan gsum gyis ni mdzes par byas//rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs//phyag na zangs glu

430b1(rgyud): byas legs bris pa//thams cad kun spyod sbyin par bya//sgra yi rgyan dang yang dag ldan//phyag rgya'i mtshan mas rnam par klubs//sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom skyes pas/

434a1(rgyud): pA bzung nas ni//mkhas pas sngon bzhin mchod byas nas//grub pa'i rdzas kyi bud dag ni//khyad par du ni bla myur dbul//sgrub pos de ni khar

434b1(rgyud): nang du bzhig gyur na//cho gas ji ltar bsams pa bzhin//de dang de yi gzugs 'gyur te//de bzhin 'di yi mthu yis ni//mi snang bar ni thams cad 'gyur//sa bon ma nyams
