436b7(rgyud): bya//de ltar sngags brgyad byas pa yis//rkyen gyis brlabs pas byas na su//sa sau re re dag la yang //brgya rtse brgyad brgyad bzlas byas la//log pa g.yon no/
437a1(rgyud): btags na no//mda' dang yA gr-i la sogs pa'o//mtshon cha thams cad bcings par 'gyur//sgyu ma chen mo'i rig pa 'di//rab tu 'bad gsang byar//
437a2(rgyud): bya//de nas cho ga gzhan bshad pa//nags kyi shal ma la yi ni//bal ni skar ma rgyal la blung //bu mo yi ni gci bo yis//btags te deng du bsre bar bya//bu mo yi nI
437a3(rgyud): bkal bar bya//gza' dang skar ma dge ba dang //zla ba stobs can dag la ni//mdud pa'i sbyor ba byas na su//so so zhing ni re re la//sngar gyi rim pa'i sbyor ba yis//
437a4(rgyud): shin tu mnyam par gzhag ste sgrud//'di yis bcings pa tsam gyis ni//sum cu gsum pas kyang mi 'ching //lus kyi cho ga mthong ba yis//mtshon cha thams cad
437a5(rgyud): 'ching 'gyur te//'di ni ba gling lta su sgrub//su ragA ta dang seng ldeng dang //nim pa dang ni arga'ang rung //skar ma rgyal dang nyi ma la//shing bu de gnyis bzung nA
437a6(rgyud): ni/namyos par byed pa'i rig pa che//rig pa kun gyi gtso mo ste//lan brgya ru ni bzlas na su//shing bu phan tshun drung gyur na//dgra bo nang ni 'thab par 'gyur//
437a7(rgyud): rdo rje yi ni chu dang ni//mdzub mo'i khrag dang bcas pa la//mos par byed pa'i rig pa bzla//sngags kyi bzlas pa sngon 'gro bas//dpral bar thig le byas
437b1(rgyud): na/chom po dang ni rkun po dang //'chi bar byed bu gzhan yang rung //skye bo thams cad rmos par byed //mkha' gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'o/rdo rje mkhan 'ang+ga nga/
437b2(rgyud): /rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin bshegs/ ldan rdo rje rkyen rnaMs gas pa//rgyud kyi la po chen po dang la rdo rje me 'phrul sa//snro sa skyed 'i chog
437b3(rgyud): rim par bye ba s+t+rai sum rgyun dgu gang gis sgrib pa po 'grub pa'i//denas sbyor ba gzhan bshad \u0f7f//ras stair gyis nas ban dag/hUM m-i'i rtser gnas
437b4(rgyud): blang par bya//sngon bzhin cho ga'i sbyor ba yis//'byung ba'i nyi ma gza' bzang la//gau r-I la sogs mkha'agro mar//bcas pa'i he ru ka mgon mchod//bud med kyi
437b5(rgyud): ni me tog g+hi/yid dang yang du spro bar bya//bsgregs pa 'am ni mtshon gyis bsad//spyang ki la sogs ma zos pa'i//bud med thod pa mdzes pa ru//cha ga de yi bskyed
437b6(rgyud): pad+yAH//de yang rnga mo dag gis ni//'khrul lakhrir la ni bskyon nas//da yi rtse mo zang por \u0f7f//sngags pas mchod pa rgyas na sto ni//bu mor bsgrims shing de na rje
437b7(rgyud): tshun 'bad dang bcas te gtor//bud med ro bsregs sa dngon//thal bar bcas pas de bkang le//ras ster gyi ni so bon nyid//thod pa der ni bskyed par bya//bges/
438a1(rgyud): dgra dang ni gshon gshod tu/sngags na mngon par bzlas pa yis//mchod dang gtor ma phul nas na//ci rigs no bsrung bar bya//zhi ba'i tshogs
438a2(rgyud): bca sngags kyis ni//na rtsa brgya du bzlas pa'i chus//der ni bcu ste bskyed par bya//gzhan du yi dgos 'chi bar 'byung //'bu la sogs pa bskyo ba dang /
438a3(rgyud): rig bzhin du bya//de ni 'bad sbyin pa yi//ras dril dag ni bzung nas//gno ma yi lag gis ni//bsgos pa sngar gyi nu ma mos//rtswa dang bcas pa buM mos bkal//d+hUd
438a4(rgyud): pa de yis bcings gyur na//de ma thig tu skyes bu ni//'dod chags gdungs pa'i bud med 'gyur//bkrol na slar yang rnal mar 'gyur//bsgrigs pa'i ro yis khrag dang ni//
438a5(rgyud): zhag gis yungs kAr yang yang bsgo//gsang ba yi ni zhing sa ru//tshes brgyad skar ma rgyal la ni//lam dang rigs mchog thod pa nu//ro bsregs sa bkang ro dang
438a6(rgyud): sa//nyi mu shes pa dag la gzugs//de ni shin tu smin pa blang //ci rigs 'khrul 'khor btsir pa'i mar//bskrad pa la sogs bya ba kun//blo ldan
438a7(rgyud): ltar 'dod bzhin byed//sa mtha' lnga yang yang dag ldani//rlung gi sa bon las bying ba//de yi mod la bskrad 'gyur te//bsgrub bya de ni slar mi ldog/
438b1(rgyud): bsgrags nas bsad pa'i skyes bu'i ro//cho ga'i rim bzhin mchod byas la//sngar ni ji ltar bstan pa bzhin//mar des yan lug kun tu byug/he ru ka yi spyod pa yas//sngags
438b2(rgyud): ni zlos shing kun tu gnas//sbyor chen des ni dgegs bskrad bya//sngags pa chen pos de dusu//bgegs ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa//ro yi lus las byung mthong ste//dri
438b3(rgyud): nas der na de \u0f7f/rjes kyi bar chud byung //zhal klu dang bcas pa'i bsgyu pa bas// rgyu cing byaste// gnas byug+sa rgyu dpral ba yi//spyod du kyi
438b4(rgyud): la bstan bya zhing //drag po yi ni gzugs kyi su//dpa' de'i dam tshig ci rigs bstan//sha dang khrag tu bcas pa yi//gtor mo yi dgas rnams la sbyin//de
438b5(rgyud): yi lus las 'jigs pa'i mar//blangs te slu ba la sogs blugs//de yis lus la byugs tsam gyis//na mkhar rgyu ba 'grub par 'gyur//gzhan yang ral
438b6(rgyud): gri mig sman dang //rtsi la sogs pa rab tu 'grub//khrag dang mi yi zhag gis ni//yungs kar la ni bsgos na su//mi ro yi ni khur bcug la//bsrungs pa lnga sogs/
438b7(rgyud): 'bad de bya//de nas snga ma bzhin bskyed pa'i//yungs kar gang la bsnun pa yi//bsgrub bya de ni rims nad kyis//'dzin te de ma thag tu 'chi//so bya yi ni dran/
439a1(rgyud): dang na//zhag gis snum stor bsgo byas la//de yi thod par rlo ba sregs pas//bkadu ba ru ni bskyod par bya//mchod dang gtor ma la sogs pa//sngar
439a2(rgyud): dastan bzhin du ci rigs bya//smin pa'i 'bras buM khar bcug na//skyes bu bya yi gzugasu 'gyur//de ltar sa don gzhon dag kyang //dog pa la gnas 'bras bu
439a3(rgyud): bzung //de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs 'gyur te//kha las bton na sngon bzhin 'gyur//bya rnams kyi ni tshe dang mtshungs//glang po'i gzugs sogs de bzhin bya//
439a4(rgyud): bi da re yi sa don no//mar ngo skar mya rgyal dang ni//gza' ni nyi ma dag la bzung //ma tu lung ga yar ngo la//mi ro'i zhag gis byugs na su//zla ba gzas ni
439a5(rgyud): zin pa'i tshe//de yi yan lag mchog tu gzugs//zin pa de yi gzugasu 'gyur//de yi rus pa rkang dang ni//shu la sogs pa bskyed par bya//de yi
439a6(rgyud): lpags pa rus pa yi//phyag rgyas yan lag rgyan byas la//blo dang ldan pas sngar bstan bzhin//mchod sogs byas te thal ba gtong //sngags dang
439a7(rgyud): bcas nga'i chu yis ni//mkhas pa yis ni rtag tu bcug/bgegs mthar byed dang gshin gshed kyi//sngags ni sngags pas rtag tu bzla//sha za la ni gtor ma sbyin//
439b1(rgyud): gzhan du na ni bton te khyer//sa dron da ni srin po bzung //lcug ma gsum gyis bkros nasu//khar bcug na nI skrod 'gyur te//nyi ma zla ba sogs pas kyang /
439b2(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum 'dor mthong mi 'gyur//ma du lung ga gcig pu ni//khar bcug mA du lung gar 'gyur//gton na slar lnga snang 'gyur te//'bras skyed thun mong cho ga'o//
439b3(rgyud): de nas sngags kyi cho ga bshad//spyan ma'i sngags kyis gzugs par bya//mA me ki yi sngags kyis bcu//sgrol ma'i sngags kyis bskyed par bya//de bzhin gos dkar
439b4(rgyud): mas ni srung //'di dag sa la sogs pa ste//thams cad 'dzin cing gso ba yin//des na 'bad pa thams cad kyis//spyan la sogs pas bsrung bar bya//de nas
439b5(rgyud): dgongs mo'i dusu ni//sku ba kha na de'i sa bon dag/mi yi zhag sogs kyis byugs la//bzhi mdo'i sas bkang thod par bskyed//de yi dpal bar thig le bya//
439b6(rgyud): bza' dang bcu'i sogs rnam pa lnga//mthong ba tsaM gyis khu bar 'gyur//de nas thig le phyes na ni//de yi mod la rnal ma ro 'gyur//'ol ma se yi sa bon no//
439b7(rgyud): bram ze yi ni thod pa ru//skar ma rgyal la sngags pas bskyed//de nas phyung ste slar yang ni//tha mal skyed bu'i thod par bskyed//sa bon de ni 'grub 'gyur na//
440a1(rgyud): kha ru 'dug pas de gzugs 'gyur//skyes pa bud med ma nang sogs//bya ba'i cho ga bzhin du 'gyur//kha las bton na slar yang ni//tha mal
440a2(rgyud): gzugs 'gyur the tsom med//sor ba 'di ni grub pa ste//gzhan dag du ni du mi smra//sngags pas bung ba'i rgyal ba'i sman//gsal shing bsad pa'i thod par bskyed//
440a3(rgyud): zhag dang khrag gis gtor bar bya//de yi rtsa ba blangs na su//srin lag gi ni khra ga dang ni//zhag tu bcas pa bsre bar bya//spyi bor bzhag na rgyal bar 'gyur//b+h+yo la
440a4(rgyud): sogs pa dbang du byed//ba gling rna ba'i lcug ma ni//rnyed nas de yi sa bon ni//smin par bzung ste khur bcug nas//g.yul du zhugs na rgyal bar 'gyur//b+h+ring gA
440a5(rgyud): rA dza bzung na su//shan pa'i bu mo sngon mi yi//khrag gi zla ba mar ngo le//yang yang byugs te sbyor bar bya//bla glang rna ba'i lU dang ni//skyes pa'i thod par bskyed
440a6(rgyud): dang bcas//'bras bu chen po ster bar 'gyur//de la sogs pa'i rtsa ba dang //'bras bu tshul bzhin bskyed pa yis//bgegs rnams thams cad brlag byed pa'o//
440a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas nges pa'i rgyud las gsungs//bsgrub par mi bya ba dang ni//'grub par mi 'gyur ci yang medo//man ngag dag ni ma gtogs par//dngos grub snang
440b1(rgyud): bar mi 'gyur//ko ka na ta'i 'bras bu ni//sna tshan gyi ni thod par bskyed//dur khrod skyes pa'i b+h+ring gi ni//thod par bskyed pa'i rtsa dang bcas//yar ngo mar ngo'i bcu bzhi la//bdud rtsa
440b2(rgyud): lnga dang lhan cig btab//ril bu mdzes pa byas nasu ni//grib ma la ni bskam par bya//de yi thig le byas nas ni//'gro kun bran bzhin dbang du 'gyur//aM ba'i shing
440b3(rgyud): gi rus pa ni//mar khu chen pos byugs pa dang //de bzhin pa yi rnam lngas byug/log par khu ba byuglau na su//'bras de gang la byin pa ni//de dbang 'gyur te gzhan du
440b4(rgyud): min//ngal po se'u'i 'bras bu ni//khrag gis byugs te bud med kyi//thod par btsugs pa smin pa yi//'bras bu de ni mi dbang la//rgyal la byin na rtag dbang 'gyur//
440b5(rgyud): sku ba kha na da'i sa bon ni//nim pa la sogs 'bras bus byug/ro bsregs sa dang ldan pa yis//chags can kham phor sa bon bskyed//shin tu mnyam par gzhag
440b6(rgyud): ste srung //mAr ngo yi ni nyi ma la//nyin phyed nyi ma tsha dus sgrub//de ni blugs pa tsam gyi su//chang sogs brlag 'gyur the tsom med//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//
440b7(rgyud): yungs kar smin pa brgya dang ni//rtsa brgyad blangs nas zhag gis ni//bsgos te legs par thum por bya//bud med ro yi lto bar gzhug/nyin bdun bzhag ste phyung
441a1(rgyud): na su//de yi mchin par bcas pa'i sas//de yi thod pa bkang bar bskyed//gtor ma dang ni srung ba dang //'dug pa dang ni chus bcu sogs//shin tu
441a2(rgyud): mad dang bcas pa yis//las rnams thams cad sngon bzhin bya//ji srid sman gyi bar du bskyed//de nas sngar bzhin 'bad pas blang //bud med kyi ni khrag gis byug/
441a3(rgyud): mdab ma dang ni sa bon sogs//de yi yan lag ci yang rung //bud med ging dang gang bskyon pa//de ni phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur//'ol se'i sa bon 'bad de bzung //
441a4(rgyud): dmar ser thod par bskyed par bya//de yi lcug ma bzung na su//blo dang ldan pas sgong nga bya//de yi nang du chang blugs na//snod der gnas pa'i rdzas rnams ni//ji srid
441a5(rgyud): ma zad bar du ni//don gnas pa'ang zad mi 'gyur//chu 'gram sa dang rdza mkhan sa//de bzhin thong bar chags pa'i sa//greg mkhar gyi ni sa dag dang //mtshan
441a6(rgyud): ma gcig pa'i sa rnams ni//bskyed pa kun la shin tu bsngags//gci ba'i shul gyis bzung la//sngags kyis mngon par byin gyis brlab//bong bu'i gcin dang
441a7(rgyud): bcas pa las//mkhas pas mo yi gzugs brnyan bya//gser shing sngar bzhin sbyang byas la//sngags pas de yaM khar bskyed bya//de yi yan lag lnga bzung ste//
441b1(rgyud): ril bu dag ni mdzes par bya//las rnams thams cad byed 'gyur te//khyad par du ni dbang du byed//yungs kar la sogs 'bras bu ni//blang po che yi sha dag dang //khrag dang rus du'o//
441b2(rgyud): zhag la sogs//de yi thal ba sogs pas byug/de yi thod par bskyod pa dag/de yi kha ru bcug tsam gyis//glang po che yi gzugasu 'gyur//'di ni thun mong cho ga ste//

441b4(rgyud): ni/grub pa'i gza' la sogs dang sbyar//rtag tu sgom dang bzlas la dga'//dam tshig spyod pa srung ba drug/de yis rtag pa 'grub 'gyur te//gzhan du na ni 'bras
441b5(rgyud): bu med//rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' gro las 'bras bu bac+doMs ma'i
441b6(rgyud): phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi rim par phye ba ste bzhi bcu pa'o////de nas A li ka li gnyis//de nyid las ni kun bskyed cing //smyo zhing sdud par byed pa po//tha snyad
441b7(rgyud): ni cho ga ste//sngags kyi mtshan nyid thun mngag/cho ga 'di dag ji bzhin nyon//oM zhes bya ba mdog dmar ga/mgo dang thig le springs po ni//bsgrub bya
442a1(rgyud): snying kha mag bo dang //gsang ba dang ni lto bar bsam//a zhes bya bar thig ler ldan//mtshal dang 'ol ma se dang ni//ku su ma ni lta bu'i mdog/bsgrub
442a2(rgyud): bya'i mgor ni bsam byas la//myos shing sems dang bral ba dang //lkugs shing rnam par nyams par bsams//de yi lus ni rang nyid kyi//sa bon gyis dkrugs rmongs
442a3(rgyud): bsgoms na//ring por mi thogs dbang 'gyur te//rtag tu thams cad ster bar 'gyur//I zhes bya ba sgras lta bu//dbyangs yig gsum pa thung ngu ni//bsgrub bya'i
442a4(rgyud): snying kha lte ba dang //de bzhin du ni mgrin par sgom//I zhes bya ba'i dbyangs yig bzhi//li khri yi ni mdog lta bu//bsgrub bya yi ni dpral bar dgod//gang gi lus
442a5(rgyud): pa gsum pa dang //bzhi pa'i mchog ni bkod pa yis//myos shing cha lugs nyams pa dang //sems dang bral bar byas na su//ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni//lkug
442a6(rgyud): pa bzhin du dbang du 'gyur//de nas dbyangs yig lnga pa yi//dbang po'i mtshon cha lta bu'i 'od//u zhes bya ba'i bsgrub bya yi//mgrin par zhags pa lta bur bsams//
442a7(rgyud): glog dang mtshungs par 'bar ba yi//dbyangs yig mchog ni drug pa ste//u zhes bya ba bsgrub bya yi//snying gi dbusu bsgom par bya//lkugs shing myos par

443a4(rgyud): gnyis ni tsheg drag bcas//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//yi ge mchog gi phyag rgya ste//sangs rgyas pa'i mor yang dag gnas//'di ltar A li ka li zhes//
443a5(rgyud): bcud len thams cad zhes byar brjod//gtso bo la ni thim byas nas//rdo rje sems dpa' sogs drang sbyar//de yi 'og tu phyin nas ni//yi ga thams cad gzhug
443a6(rgyud): par bya//ji srid snang ba yod kyi bar//'dis ni srung bar byed par brjod//thig le zhes bya skyems yin to//sems kyi rang bzhin stong pa yin//zla ba gnyis dang yang
443a7(rgyud): dag ldan//mi 'gyur mchog gi phyag rgya'o//de las dbyangs yig rnams kyi ni//sgrub po bdag nyid chen po yi//las ni lha dang lha ma ni dang //mir bcas myur
443b1(rgyud): du dbang du byed//oM zhes bya ba nyi ma ltar//'od zer 'bar ba stong dang ldan//bsgrub bya yaM ni mgo bo dang //dpral ba khyad par snying khar sgom//oM zhes bya ba rtag 'bar ba//nyi ma
443b2(rgyud): bye ba'i gzi brjid can//bsgrub bya yi ni lus kun la//khyab pa nyid du bsgom par bya//bskal pa yi ni me dpung ltar//dbyings kyis khyab nas sgom pa dang //dbyangs kyi me
443b3(rgyud): yis bsgrub bya yang //rab tu 'bar bar bsgoms byas nas//dge za lo brgyar 'tsho ba yang //de ma thag tu ltung bar 'gyur//a ni thams cad sdud pa ste//'tshe ba bzlog
443b4(rgyud): par byed pa'ang yin//a ni gshegasu gsol ba ste//ji ltar 'dod bzhin lta yang byed//bud med kun gyi mngol tu ni//bsams na khu ba 'jog par 'gyur//khyad par du
443b5(rgyud): ni gzhan dag la'ang //dkar po dmar po'i ting 'dzin bya//A la sogs dang yi ge rnams//lus la bkod na spyad mi dgos//de ltar dbyangs kyi las rnams ni//khyod
443b6(rgyud): la bdag gis gang bstan la//dbyangs yig dge ba bcu drug ni//lus la go char bkod de bya//a zhes bya ba rkang gnyis dgod//oM ni byin pa gnyis la bas mi//
443b7(rgyud): i ni brla la dgod bya ste//A~M zhes bya ba gsang bar gnas//u ni lte ba'i rtsa ba ste//U zhes bya ba lta ba'i dbus//r-i ni lte ba'i steng du dgod//r-I zhes bya
444a1(rgyud): snying khar yin//s+ya zhes bya ba mgrin par dgod//de bzhin lnga ni rkan la'o//o zhes bya ba kha la ste//de bzhin a ni sna la'o//oM ni rna ba dag la/

444a3(rgyud): du ba lta bur bsams nA ni//bklad ba nyid 'gyur the tsom med//dbyangs yig kun gyis byin rlabs 'di//bdag gi de nyid gsal ba yin//sgrub pa bdag nyid dam pa yis//
444a4(rgyud): de ltar go cha bgos nas ni//sgrub pas dpyad dang yi ge yi//phyi nas las rnams shin tu sbyar//de nas rig pa'i de nyid 'byung //lus rnams drag tu byas pa ste//ka nas ma yi
444a5(rgyud): mthar thug pa'i//laswa ni blo gros chen pos nyon//lha dang lha min mi dang bcas//gang gis sa gsum thams cad ni//sgrub bo shin tu rgyas pa yi//dbang du de dag
444a6(rgyud): thams cad 'gyur//yid la 'dod pa'i 'bras ster bya//de ni nga yis bshad par bya//dbyangs yig bcu drug po rnams kyi//mdzes ma khyod la ngas bshad nas//
444a7(rgyud): da ni ka sogs yi ge yi//las rnams 'dod bzhin byed pa bshad//lha mo yi ge dang po ni//nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang mtshungs shing //li khri spungs pa lta bu yi/
444b1(rgyud): ldan pa mag sgru pas zla gyu kA da //myung ngu rnamag par rlom//de gros bsgrub par sas rkyen//rlu du zag s+ho bar dusam//dri yosasasu na
444b2(rgyud): khrug naH//rmongs shing sa pas dang zlal ba dang //brgyam bdun du mye bang du 'gyu/ji de lus sa gnas kyi ra//de de shing du 'gyur ba ste//ji srid 'a m+b+hi bAr+yAs
444b3(rgyud): dig nyid rlung dang bcas 'gyur sa//khye zhes bya ba 'du brtsini che ma//rgyam bu chu zhe shi d+hA dang / 'i ste ba'i mau ga/ ltung banas pa gci garjing
444b4(rgyud): gsal zhing 'od dang bAHsa pA ste//bsgrub blo yi ni snying ga dang //mgo dang rgung pa kun tu dargod//de yis bsgrub bya phrag nas ni//rmongs shing sems dang brul
444b5(rgyud): bar bsam//rtsub pa pa yi mchog gis ni//de yi lus ni dkrugs pa dang //myos shing brgyal bar bsgom par bya//de yis shin tu brgyal 'gyur zhing //yi gi
444b6(rgyud): dbang pos che bsnun//sgrub pa bdag nyid chen+d+ra'o gi//ji srid 'tsho yi bA du de//nar dang brdas pa dbang du 'gyur//gzhes bya ba'i sku bon no//rang gi
444b7(rgyud): rjel pa ste//chog drug zicas pa gzi marjid che//gos po tshor sbyin//bu'i me ga/bsgrib bya'i mag dang mi grin pa dang //khyad par du ni snying gi bsam//
445a1(rgyud): bsgrub par bya ba'i lus//yi ges kun tu dug bsams na//lus ni rtag tu dkrugs pas na//'dar zhing de yi dbang du 'gyur//bdag nyid dang ni
445a2(rgyud): nor dang bcas//snang ba'i dgra rnams ma lus pa khyim la sogs pa kun tu ni//ji srid nyi zla yod kyi ba R+Sha mA lus par ni 'joms par byed//g+ha zhes bya ba sgyu ma che//bska
445a3(rgyud): nga'i me dang gzi brjid mtshungs//steng du thig les rgyan pa ste//ku su ma yi khu ba 'dra//bsgrub bya yi ni lte ba dang //gsang ba snying ka kha dang ni//mgo bau ru ni bsams
445a4(rgyud): tsam gyis//bsgrub bya dga' bas myos nasu//sems dang bral zhing nyams nas ni//ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni//bdag nyid nor dang bcas pa ru//shin tu de yi dbang du
445a5(rgyud): 'gyur//nga zhes bya ba gzi brjid che//sde tshan gyi ni mtha' mar gnas//de ni 'dod pa'i mda' yin te//'jig rten gsum po dbang du byed//da ni bsgrub bya'i gsang
445a6(rgyud): bar bsam//khu bo dag ni 'dzag par byed//gsang bA ru ni zhugs pa yis//thams cad du ni 'bigs par 'gyur//yan lag gi ni tshigs kun tu//de yis
445a7(rgyud): phug pas myos nas ni//nor dang bdag nyid bcas pa ni//myur ba nyid du dbang du 'gyur//ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni//de la chags dang bral mi 'gyur//yi ge lnga po
445b1(rgyud): kun gyis kyang //bdag nyid go cha bskon par bya//kA zhes bya ba snyeng khar dgod//kha zhes bya ba mgo la ste//ga zhes bya ba spyi gtsug tu//g+ha zhes bya ba go char bya//nga zhes bya ba
445b2(rgyud): sgrub pa po'i//lag pa g.yon la dgod par bya//de nas bsgrub bya dbang dang ni//dgug dang bsad la sogs par sbyar//cho ga de ltar byas na ni//dpyad mi dgos par dngos grub
445b3(rgyud): 'gyur//tsa zhes bya ba du ba'i mdog/rlung gi gnas kyi yi ga ste//sgrub pos de yi snying kha dang //mgo dang rkang par bsams par bya//bsgrub bya rlung lnga gnas nas ni//
445b4(rgyud): kun tu 'phyo bar bsam pa dang //sems dang bral bar gyur nas//na mkha' la ni gnas bzhin du//rlung gis gzhan dang gzhan dag du//khyer bA ru ni bsgom par bya/bsam
445b5(rgyud): gtan sbyor ba 'di yis ni//bsgrub bya shin tu brtan pa yang //bskrad 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med//bsgrub bya'i lus ni 'phangs pas ni//ji srid 'tsho yi khyad du ni//slar
445b6(rgyud): lo 'ong bar mi 'gyuraro//tsha zhes bya ba'i yi ge tsha//gsal zhing mig sman nag po'i mdog/cha gnyis po dang yang dag ldan//bsgrub bya yi ni mgo bor bsam//de yi
445b7(rgyud): mgo la du ba yi//tshogs dang mtshungs pa'i rlung gis khyab//cung zad tsam gyis bsgrub bya yi//lus ni de yis skor bar bsam//slar yang tsha ni tsheg drag bcas//
446a1(rgyud): lto ba ru ni bsams nasu//lan gsum du ni brjod byas na//yi po 'di ni bskrad pa'i mchog/bsgrub bya rmongs shing sems dang bral//dgra ba
446a2(rgyud): madrangs ni nyams ra su//sa steng ma lus pa ru 'khyam//ji sring 'tsho yi bar du ni//slar yang ldog par mi 'gyuraro//dza zhes bya ba'i yi ge rgyal//du ba'i mdog can
446a3(rgyud): gzi brjid che//'od zer ldan zhing shin tu 'bar//rdul phran dag ni stong du 'phro//bsgrub bya yi ni mgo bo dang //gsang bar yi ge zhugs par sgom//yan lag tshigs/
446a4(rgyud): kun phug pa dang //sems dang bral ba bzhin du gnas//yi ge yongasu bkang bas ni//de nas rgyal bar gyur nas ni//nyin dang mtshan du rmongs pa dang //mi sad par ni
446a5(rgyud): bsgoms par bya//sa stengs shing dang nags tshal bcas//thams cad du ni 'gro bar 'gyur//bskrad pa'i no ga 'di dag ni//dge ma khyod la nga yis bshad//ji srid
446a6(rgyud): 'tsho ba'i bar du ni//slar yang 'ong bar mi 'gyuraro//dz+nyA zhes bya ba skyobs po che//bsgrub bya yi ni snying kha ru//nyi ma lta bur 'bar ba dang //'od zer gsal ba
446a7(rgyud): rnam par 'phro//thig le zla ba phyed pas rgyan//bsgrub bya'i mgo dang snying ka dang //lte ba'i steng du yi ge bsam//sgrub pa'i dbang pos bsgrub bya'i lus//'bar bas
446b1(rgyud): drud dang bral bar ngas sgra//de ris bsgrub bya brtul 'byur zhing //bskrad bu'am ni 'tsho la 'an//yang na ston pa nyid du 'gyur//yi ge yis ni ltung bas na//zlar la 'od ra
446b2(rgyud): mi 'gyur te//sa bzhi nApas tshal bcas pa ru//skye zhing 'gro 'gyur ba nam med//d+hA zhes bya ba 'di yis ni//myur du bskrad 'gyur the tshom med//nywa zhes bya ba'i ye ge
446b3(rgyud): mchog/sna tshogs pa yi mdog dang ldan//pA la shi yi me tog gi/'od zer stong phrag 'bar ba ste//chu rgyun stong ni 'ab bya yis//de yi lus la dbo bar bya//de yis
446b4(rgyud): nor dang bcas pa ru//brgyal zhing sems dang bral ba dang //rmongs shing myur du dbang du 'gyur//Ta zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog/dbang po'i mtshan cha lta bu'i mchog/
446b5(rgyud): 'od zer 'bar ba stong phrag gis//yi ge 'bar dang ldan par bsam//bsgrib bye yi ni dpral ba dang //mgrin pa dang ni snying kar bsam//sgrub byi'i steng du na mkha' la/
446b6(rgyud): bdud rtsi sgo mi thig le ni//spyi bo'i steng du rtag tu bsam//cung zad glog na gro mo 'dra ba'i//kha ba dag ni 'bab par bsam//sgrub bri ba yos bsgrub byi no//yan lag
446b7(rgyud): tshogs kun g.yo ba dang //bcol zhing rmongs la myos bsams ni//ji srid nyi zla yod par du//nor dang bdag nyid bcas pa ru//de yis thams cad dbang du 'gyur//
447a1(rgyud): daltar Ta yo rgyal po po//lus ni da lang yis bshad//de nas yag gnyis pa yi//las kyi mchog ni bshad par bya//tha zhes bya ba'i yin
447a2(rgyud): ni//dbang chen dang ni 'dra bar 'dod//spyi bor bdud rtsi thig les rgyan//de bzhin gleg dang 'brug gis brgyan//yi ge'i mchog ni bsgom par bya//bdud rtsi chu rgyun
447a3(rgyud): 'bab pa yis//bsgrub pa'i lus la kun tu gtor//bsgrub bya'i mgo dang mgrin pa dang //skyong kha ru ni gnas par bsam//bsgrub bya'i mgo ni phug pa dang //lus la
447a4(rgyud): kun tu khyab pa yis//bsgrub bya myos shing 'drar ba ru//sngags pas yi ges rtag tu sgom//de nas ji srid 'tsho bAr du//brgyal zhing rmongs pas dbang du 'gyur//de nas
447a5(rgyud): Di zhes bya ba ni//yi ge'i rgyal po gsum pa ste//de ye las kyi mchog rnams ni//rtse gcig yid kyis gus pas nyon//Da zhes bya ba thig ler bcas//rdo rje lta bu'i
447a6(rgyud): dbyings can yin//ud pa la ltar lding ser te//'od zer gsal ba kun tu 'gro//bsgrub bya'i skye bor bsams pa yis//bsgrub bya'i tshigs ni 'bugs shing 'byed/
447a7(rgyud): sgrib bya mi gsor bsgom byas na//lus ni kun tu g.yo bzhin du//jo srid 'tsho yi bar du ni//rmongs dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur//de nas las kyi mchog gzhan na
447b1(rgyud): shin tu gnyer bar byed pa ste//D+hA zhes bya ba yi ge'i rgyul//shin tu rmad byung byed pa po//dbang po'i mtshon cha lta bu'o mdog/nyo ma lta bur 'bar ba ste//bsgrub bya'i snying dang ltung
447b2(rgyud): dang //mgrin par yi ge bsams nas//byang chub sems ni rab 'dzag pas//de yi lus la dbo bar bya//de yis gzi zhing baM rgyal nas//gnyid log par ni sgom byas na
447b3(rgyud): 'di yis ring por mi thogs par//rmongs shing sgrub po'i dbang du 'gyur//cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni//nam yang chags dang 'bral me 'gyur//de nas D+ha mtha' yi ge
447b4(rgyud): las//ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'dad de nyon//Na shes bya ba du ba'i mdog/cung zad 'bor zhing gsal ba ste//dri ma med pa'i du ba las//'od zer gsal ba rnam par 'phro//
447b5(rgyud): bsgrub bya yi ni lus kun la//de yis rnam par khyab byed cing //'od zer glog stong 'khrug 'dra ba//bsgrub par bya ba'i steng du sgom//'od zer brgya yis bkang bsta na//myos
447b6(rgyud): nasu no brgyal bar 'gyur//de yis ji srid 'tsho bar du//da ni de yi dbang du 'gyur//ta zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i mchog/'od zer glog ltar gsal ba ste//mdog ni rma bya'i
447b7(rgyud): mgrin pa 'dra//yi ge 'di ni bsgrub bya yi//snying dang mgrin pa gsang ba dang //lte bar bkod de 'bugs par bsam//yi ge daM yis rmongs pas na//bsgrub bya sems
448a1(rgyud): du//rlung bral ba dung //mau smra shing brtul bar gyur na su/dza smad cha yi du dun//rgyus spyod dbang 'gyur gzhan du min//de yi drung na gnas pa s+yai/
448a2(rgyud): zla zhes bya ba yi ge man+dog/mya men gyi ni mdog 'dri dang //ud pa la ston pa'i med pa ma'i 'ong //bsno b+hu'i snying ka bral ba dang //de bzhin du ni rnyeng bar dgod//bad+ma
448a3(rgyud): bya'i lus la dbang po yi//mtshon cha bzhin du thim par bsam//yi ge'i rgyal pos mnan pas ni//bsgrub bya sems dang bral 'gyur zhing //sa 'dzin gyi ni dbang po bzhin//
448a4(rgyud): 'gro ba dag kyang gcings par 'gyud//reg bye mi shes dri mi shes//sgra mi shes shing gzugs mi mthong //lce yis ro rnams mi myong zhing //dug gis brgyal
448a5(rgyud): bzhin du gnas//gyang dang gang gi steng du ni//nyi 'od lta bu'i yi ge bsam//yi ge'i rgyal po tha yis no//skyes bu bcings 'gyur the tsom mi //de nas gzhan
448a6(rgyud): yAng de yis ni//sdong po'i las kyi cho ga nyin//da zhes bya ba mdog ston ni//chang sbyin nag po'i 'od dadu mtshungs//'od zer 'bar ba rnams 'phro ga/bsgrub
448a7(rgyud): yi ni mgor bsams la//me stag 'phro ba bsgoms pa no//phyogs kun du ni bsams par bya//yi ge'i dbang phyug de yis ni//bsgrub bya'i mgo bo phug pa
448b1(rgyud): bsam//'bar ba'i sprin ni stong phrag gis//de ni kun tu bskor bar bsas//de ni bkod pa tsam gyis//sdong ldog dang ni mtshungs par 'gyur//phyugs te shin tu btsongs pas na//
448b2(rgyud): 'gro ba'ang mi g.yo ba ni 'gyur//ji srid sgrub po 'dod par du//sems dang bral zhing brtan par gnas//slar yang sgrub pas bsams tsam gyis//rmongs pa las ni grol bar
448b3(rgyud): 'gyur//de nas yi ge d+hA ya~M na//las ni rme du gyur pa nyon//d+hA zhes bya ba gzhu yi dbyings//kha dog ser po gser gyi mdog/gser lta bu yi 'od zer 'phro//bsgrub bya yin
448b4(rgyud): mgrin pa ru//zhags pa lta bur 'bar byung bosam//sgrub pa'i dbang pos bsgrub bya ste//khrid de 'ong bar sgom byas na//sgrub pa po ni gar gnas par//rmongs dang bcas te
448b5(rgyud): 'o bar 'gyur//ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du ni/phyugs de sems dang bral 'gyur zhing //nyi ma brgyad pa'i cha la no//rang gi gnas nas 'ong bar 'gyur//de nas yi ge na
448b6(rgyud): yi ni//las kyi cho ga'i sgrub pa nyon//mdog ni du ba'i phung po 'dra//rlung kyi dkyil 'khor 'khrug dang ldan//bsgrub bya'i snying ka mgrin pa dang //lte ba dang nI rkang par
448b7(rgyud): sbyang //de yis dgra rnams reng yul las//bskrad 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med//de ni rmongs pas rang yul du//nim yang phyis ni 'od mi 'gyur//de nas sde mtshan la
449a1(rgyud): pa ni//yi ge rnams kyi dbang phyug mchog/las ni shin tu sgrub pa ste//gzhan dang gzha ni bshad par bya//pa zhes bya ba rlung gi gnas//char sprin gyi
449a2(rgyud): ni sprin gyis bskor//'bar zhing du bas 'khrigs par ldan//bsgrub bya yi ni mig bo dang //mgrin pa snying ka rked pa dang //rkang pa dag tu bsams nas ni//pa zhes bya
449a3(rgyud): ba'i yi ge des//bsgrub bya'i lus ni dkris par bya//bsgrub par bya ba nga rgyal dang //khro bas brtan gnas gtso bo yang //yi ge gtso bo bkod pa yis//skad cig gis ni
449a4(rgyud): bskrad 'gyur te//gal te tshe rabs gzhan dag la'ang //slar zhing ldog par mi 'gyuraro//de nas yi ge pha yi ni//las mchog nga yis bshad kyis nyon//yi ge pad+ma'i///
449a5(rgyud): mdog 'dra zhing //'bar ba bsgrub bya'i spyi bo dang //mgrin pa snying ke lte ba dang //gsang ba'i gan su bkod nas ni//ku su ma ye khu 'dra ba//'dzag pa ru ni rnam pasam+bi
449a6(rgyud): te//bsgrub bya'i lus ni phyi nang du//de yis gang bar sgom byas na//bsgrub bya rmongs shing brgyal 'gyur la//sems med lus ni 'dar gyur nas//rmongs pas
449a7(rgyud): sgrub pa po yi ni//dbang du 'gyur te dpyad mi dgos//ba zhes bya ba'i rgyal po ni//gru bzhi pa la stobs po che//dung dang zla 'dra dkar po'i mdog/zla ba'i 'od
449b1(rgyud): can bsgrub bya ni//dbusu sgrub pos thim par bsam//de lus dug gis mi tshugs shing //nad la sogs pas gzir mi 'gyur//roms dang bkres dang skem mi 'byung //'dre ni
449b2(rgyud): rtag tu bsgoms gyur na//tshe ring nad med rgyal bar 'gyur//bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis ni//zla ba dmar dang bcas pa ru//lhan cig tu ni bzlas gyur na//rtag tu bdud rtsi
449b3(rgyud): rgyun 'drar 'gyur//de nas rgyal po b+ha zhes pa'o//las kyi mchog ni mnyan par gyis//dbang po'i mtshon cha lta bu ste//nyi ma 'char ka lta bu'i mdog/bsgrub bya yi ni/
449b4(rgyud): mgo bo ru//rgyal ba'i mchog ni rtag bsam la//de yi lus ni ma lus par//yi ge'i rgyal pos dbug par bya//rmongs shing sems dang bral 'gyur te//rdo rje yin
449b5(rgyud): yang brgyal gyur nas//mche bas zin ltar skad cig la//ltung zhing 'chi ba nyid gyur pas//de yi srog ni rmongs par 'gyur//dgra ni lo brgya 'tsho ba yang //skad
449b6(rgyud): cig gis ni 'chi bar 'gyur//de nas gze brjid chen po yi//yi ge nyi shu rtsa lnga pa//ma zhes bya ba dam pa mchog/de yis las ni ji bzhin nyon//tsam pa ka ltar
449b7(rgyud): ster bya'i mdog/bskal pa'i mi bzhin gzi brjid 'bar//'od ni glog ltar 'khrug pa bzhin//bsgrub par bya ba'i steng bsams la//de yi 'od kyis bsgrung bya'i//
450a1(rgyud): stong dang 'og ni ma lus par//lus ni kun tu g.yog bsams na//gnod sbyin lha dang klu yi bu//sha za dang ni srin pa dang //khams gsum yi ge'i bdun
450a2(rgyud): bo dang ka lha dang lha min mi drang bcas//sgrub po bdag nyid chen po yi//skad cig gis ni dbang 'gyur bar//mdor bsdus ngas ni khyod la bshad//ya zhes bya ba'i yi ge
450a3(rgyud): mchog/mun pA dang ni du ba'i mdog/rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing //rlung gi gzugs can yi ge che//rlung bdun gyi ni gtso bo dang //gnas zhes bya bar brjod pa ste/
450a4(rgyud): zla byed kyi ni dbyibs can la//ba dan brgya yis rnam par klubs//rnam pa bzhi yi rten gyur pa//phyi rol gos ltar dkris pa ste//ra zhes pa yi yi ge mchog/'bar
450a5(rgyud): bya lnga stong dang ldan//de yi steng du bsam par bya//du ba yi ni phreng bas rgyan//bsgrub bya'i mgo bor bsgoms nas ni//dgra bo lo brgya 'tshe ba yang //sbrul gyis mtshabs
450a6(rgyud): zin pa ltar//skad cig tsam gyis srog dang ni//bral zhing 'chi ba'i sbyor gzhol 'gyur//lha sogs thams cad gang rung gi/steng du yi ge 'di sbyar na//myur du ltung
450a7(rgyud): 'gyur dpyid mi dgos//gdon dang rims rnams thams cad ni//de la 'bab par 'gyur ba dang //sbrul chen brgya yi mche ba 'bab//de yis myur du 'chi 'gyur na//
450b1(rgyud): na du rganan/smras dgas//yazhes pa dang thos pa//rlud dang ma yo phyunags ldan du//nam ngar phyog su bsams nas no//namakha dus ni glu la gus bsams
450b2(rgyud): ster sngags pa'ang rung //chu bdudaname//das mi ga nyis byed//bsgom pa nas nyi ma brgyad pa la//rgyu mchi las gsu thams cad
450b3(rgyud): sa 'bru'i byung po dang / dgas pa gas pa mas /ma skye 'bri mas//dam 'di 'i //ni sri dkyi la
450b4(rgyud): dbus gnas te//rlung gis kun tu bskor ba ni//yi ge mchog ni gnyis bsams ni//los ni kun nu nye bar gnas//de nas gzhan yang yi ge gnyis//stobs chen
450b5(rgyud): na pa shad par ste//dang chen dang ni de bzhin nu//las rnams thams cad rnyed pag/ ni pa b+h+yan po /su zhes ba 'dzin pa'i mchog/dang brdzun
450b6(rgyud): mtshan pa dang //'di zer zlog ltar 'ab ba ste/khadog lnga dang ldan pa //yo 'i dadang pos su sgom//de steng du mi y-i ga ni//ngani pA lags par gnas pa
451a1(rgyud): chu yi dkyi' 'khor dbus gnas pa//spyi bor thig lo dang ni ldan//chur ba'i rgyun ni stong phrag 'bebs//steng du sprin gyi phung ba ni//glog dang 'brug lasarmA/
451a2(rgyud): pas rgyan//bdud rtsi char gyi rgyun 'bebs pa//nam mkha' thams cad khyab pa ru//dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi dbus 'gyur ba//gang gi ma gau yA steng bsgoms ni//sgrub po bdag
451a3(rgyud): nyid chen po yi//las ni ji ltar 'dod bzhin byed//gdengs ka gsum gyis mdzes pa yi//lhag ma can ni zhi gzugs bsam//de yi mig gnyis dbang po yi//mtshon
451a4(rgyud): chas rgyan pa'i dbus ni//bdud rtsi 'bebs pa'i aM yig dgod//grong khyer gyi ni mtha' ma ru//bsgrub byA yi ni steng du dbab//dug dang gdon dang rims la sogs/
451a5(rgyud): skad cig gis ni zhi bar 'gyur//de ni skra dkar gzhom pa yi//cho gar bshad kyis mnyan par gyis//dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur yi ge ni//de ltar rtag tu bsam gyur na//
451a6(rgyud): tshe thung ba yang ring 'gyur na//skra dkar la sogs smos ci dgos//bud med dbang phyug rnams la ni//'bad pas yang dag g.yon bskor zhing //rang gi spyi bo'i steng du
451a7(rgyud): ni//lo gcig bar du sgom byas na//rba ba dang ni 'chi ba 'joms//nad kyis bdung bar mi 'gyur te//gal te klu chen brgyad kyi ni//mche ba'i dug gis zin
451b1(rgyud): g+hu byung //dug rI dag mang byas nas//dug gis brgyal ba spyod par mdzang//'dun pa lam gyis dub pa dang //gdon la sogs ngas ban+d+har bu rnams//kun las thar bar 'gyu
451b2(rgyud): ba yin//bdag kyi skye bar bsems nam gyis//skad cig gos ni byakres sgrom 'joms//nad rnams kun gyis gdudus pa la//yi ge bkod pas grol dur 'gyur//de ltar
451b3(rgyud): lngas rnams sna tshogs ni//lha mo khyod la bshad pa yin//btso mo bzhi yi rnam pa bzhi//las kyi cho ga rgyas pa ste//rlung dang me dang bdud rtsi bcud//de bzhin drod kyi sde ba
451b4(rgyud): ste//gshin rje brtan ma phyag gnyis pa//rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs//lus ni me las byung ba ru//bskal pa'i me lce lta bu de bsam//'og dang steng du wa yis
451b5(rgyud): rgyan//de yi phyogs kun thams cad du//'bar ba gang gi snying kar bsam//'od zer 'bar ba rnam par 'gro//wa dang ldan pa'i yi ge che//namanga' khyab pas bcid
451b6(rgyud): 'gyur te//brtan ma yI ni 'khrul 'khor gyi//yi ge'i rgyal bas bcings pas na//sa 'dzin lta bur brtun par 'gyur//rkang med dang ni rkang gnyis dang //rkang bzhi
451b7(rgyud): las pas sems can gyis//lte ba ru ni sgom byas na//de ma thag tu 'chi bar 'gyur//de yang bskal pa'i me lta bu'o//'od zer 'bar ba 'phro ba yi//wa ni snying du
452a1(rgyud): sgom par \u0f7f//s+yAd yang mo yis 'bar ngosams na//gang gi lag pa ga yon pa la//ga don dgod par byasam//ji srid lhag tu bsams kyi bar//sku
452a2(rgyud): steng gi ni skye bo rnams//rang gi granas ni de nyid nus//'beb shing 'gugs par byed pa'i mchog/'di ni gshin rje brtan ma la//mos pa'i las rnams bshad pa yin/
452a3(rgyud): dbang po thams cad 'bebs pa yi//gshin rje'i pho nya'i las bshad bya//ut+pal sngon po'i madrab 'dra ba//mgo dang thig le spangs pa ni//ut+pal sngon po'i mdab lta bu/
452a4(rgyud): gang gi lce dang rkan bsams na//skal pa bzang po 'joms par 'gyur//snying dang kha dang sna dang ni//myig dang rna bar de bzhin du//yi ge dbu ma bkod na ni//dbang po
452a5(rgyud): thams cad 'phrog 'gyur te//gzugs mi mthong zhing sgra mi thos//dri mi tsher zhing stobs mi 'gyur//de bzhin l-I yis ro me myong //dug gis brgyal ba bzhin du gaR+Sha///
452a6(rgyud): las rnams de dag thams cad la//yid kyis bzlog ni grol bar 'gyur//gshin rje mche ba du ba'i mdog/sreg pa'i bskal pa lta bu ste//thams cad khyad par
452a7(rgyud): 'khyams 'gyur ba//sna tshogs 'od can bsgom par bya//drod kyi sde ba'i yigs//du ba dang ni rlung gi mdog/snying dang lag pa rkang par dgod//khams gsu
452b1(rgyud): yang ni bskrad 'gyur na//sa stongs skye bo slas ci dgos//thog lor bcas shong ha dang no//bcas pa gang gis lho stong du//bsams na phur bu lta bur 'gyur//yi ge dge ba de/
452b2(rgyud): nyi ni//rtag tu rtse steng bsamaso na ni//lan cig bzlas pas zin 'gyur te//de ni snyan dngags mkhan por 'gyur//de ltar sa dang su mtha' yi//yi ge'i tshi ga bshad
452b3(rgyud): pa'o//'jig rten gsum po 'joms byud ma//'od zer dmar po gzi brjid //nyi ma bye bA lta bu'i 'od//cung byed sngo ba 'jigs chen mo//ma he dang ni rta dag gi/'khrul
452b4(rgyud): 'khor sbyor ba kun lnga bsam//de yis smi ge'i rgyal po ni//gzi brjid chen po yi ge ha//de yi las ni sna tshogs mchog/'dod pa'i las ni bshad par bya//de ltar bdag
452b5(rgyud): lus rtag tu ni//yi ge sngar ni bsam b+ha ste na//'gro ba rnams kyi bya ba ni//tshig gos thams cad byed par 'gyur//sa sbyangs lha dang lha min dang //mi dang bcas pa 'bebla
452b6(rgyud): byed cing //sgrub pa po ni dus min par//'chi ba dag ni 'joms par byed//sgrub po yid la 'dod bzhin du//nad rnams thams cad granon par byed//ngag tsam gyis ni
452b7(rgyud): dpung tshogs dang //chu dang rgya mtsho'i 'ching ba dang //gru dang khyogs dang 'khrul 'khor dang //rta dang glang po la sogs 'ching //shing chen sa la sgyel ba dang //so//
453a1(rgyud): can rnams ni dbang du byed//las kyi chog mtho ba yis//bya ba rnams ni 'dod bzhin byed//ha zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog/mgo dang bral zhing thig les
453a2(rgyud): rgyan//de yi las rnams ma lus pa//phan pa bshad kyis munyan par gyis//khyab bya khyab byed stong pa ste//kun tu 'gro ba mi shigs pa//shin tu stong dang stong po che//
453a3(rgyud): de ni sems med pa nyid log pa//sad pa dang ni bral ba ste//de ni cir yang snang mi 'gyur//lha dang lha min gnod sbyin min//mi 'am ci dang dri za min//klu rnams dang ni srin po
453a4(rgyud): dang //rgya mtsho dang ni ri rab min//chu bo'i shing dang nags tshal dang //de bzhin sa sogs ma yin te//'jigs rung dmyal ba la soT min//me dang du ba seM min zhing //nyi ma zla ba
453a5(rgyud): gza' skar min//mi dang sha za la sogs min//mngal skyes dang ni drod las skyes//sgo nga dang ni rlan skyes min//thang la gnas dang chu gnas min//pad+ma las ni skyes pa dang //
453a6(rgyud): dbang po khyab 'jug bde byed min//rlung dang mkhris po bad kan sogs//'byung ba'i tshogs la sogs min te//ha zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog/rtag tu bsams na dmigs
453a7(rgyud): mi 'gyur//lo gcig bar du bsgoms gyur na//rga dang nad kun 'joms 'gyur te//de la dug kyang mi 'phon na//nad kyi 'jigs pa ga la zhig/dug ni khur du
453b1(rgyud): ras sa na 'a ba mi 'gyu//rtag tu spyong nyid du zlums nan//do ni byu 'gyur ba tsam mod//mgo dang dpral bar mi brok+Sha//de nyid mchog tu stos nas//bsgoms//
453b2(rgyud): na sgyid cig mengoni shes kyi/ pa'i sbyor bgyis//na dang TI rje'i la ma du'o//ri ma dag ni zhungs pa sam//ri mam ni rgyuH//de zhi
453b3(rgyud): gzi can bsam//rtag tu rkan ni phug ste gnas//rtog tu sbyor bar gnas pa yis//nyi ma dadun na mthong 'gyur te//'di dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin//bram ze gsod pa 'ang nyin
453b4(rgyud): d+hAdun gyi//rtse mo rgyas par mthong 'gyur te//de ltar mthong ba'i rnal 'byor ngas//gzhan gyi nga stoms 'dod bzhin 'gro//kla mi rgyal po 'di nyid kyi//las ni bsam
453b5(rgyud): mo khyab gnas//'jig rten 'jig rten 'das zug/rtul zhugs ma ni khyod la shwad// de ni ni lasu rnams //bstan pa ru ni nus ma //skye ba dang don byang
453b6(rgyud): pas+ho//yid bzhin na buM l+yA bu yin//m-i hUM chen sa sa y-i/ma b+hi dog nus pa zhing // nga //de cag kyang bai na ru sbya ba bzhon// ma/
453b7(rgyud): bya6//dem grub sems cad pa steg/shes rab sas nim gtogs pa'i//kau ba tshig ni ma 'gyur//sgyum che dang mnyam
454a1(rgyud): mang 'gro bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' gro las
454a2(rgyud): A li ka li'i sngabs kyi sgrub thabs 'byung ba'i cho ga'i rim par bye ba ste bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo rnams kyis mchod cing phyag
454a3(rgyud): 'tshal te slar bsal po/khyod kyis sngar bshad gsang ba dang //thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs//yi ge bcu drug rig pa che//bde mchog bla mar bshad pa dang /
454a4(rgyud): khams rnams dang ni de bzhin rtse//'byung gnas sgra tshul nges 'byung dang //'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba//thog ma dbus mthar dbye ba dag/ji ltar nang du yang
454a5(rgyud): dag gnas//de rnams dbye ba de bzhin gsungs//dka' stsal pa/sgyu ma kun gyis rnam rol pa'i//nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che//sangs rgyas kun la'ang gsang ba ste//
454a6(rgyud): gzhan rnams la lce spros ci dgos//sgyu ma chen po bran drug ni//mo mo nyid du rab tu bshad//de yis nang gid dkyi blo 'khor du//gyur pa nyid du the tsom med//rnal
454a7(rgyud): 'byor po yi 'dud rtsi sbyor//bcu drug char yang me bod do//slar yang 'dud rtsi rdzas rnams ni//da ni bshad kyis mnyan par gyis//r-i ni dmar chen po yi kham/
454b1(rgyud): hA zhes bya ba ri las skyes//so ni gan+da pa tra ste//pa ni lpags par bstan pa yin//ra zhes bya ba dri ru gsungs//me zhes bya ba me tog ste//de bzhin ra ni chu yin//me zhes bya ba po/
454b2(rgyud): sI ta/sa ni kun tu ru nyid yin//rA ni sa ri zhes bya ste//at+ma zhes bya na la dzaM//ni zhes bya ba dri yi mar//sa ni so dang log skyes yin//dA ni rgya mtsho las byung ba//s+thi ni kho ba'i
454b3(rgyud): snying po yin//tA zhes bya ba ga bur te//byang chub sems las byung ba yi//rtag tu ye shes dam pa mchog/rtsa rnams thams cad yang dag 'dus//de dag lha mo khyod la bstan//gsang
454b4(rgyud): sogs rnal 'byor pa yi rdzas//bshang dang gci sogs lnga la bya//khams rnams sdud pa'i sde tshan ni//de ltar bcud len bsten pa yin//mkha' gro kun dngos chags pa yi//
454b5(rgyud): sems dpa' rdo rje las byung ba//pad+ma 'byed pa'i sbyor ba yis//pad+ma gar dbang zhes bya ste//steng du gsal bar 'phro bas na//rdo rje nyi ma zhes bya la//'di ni gsal zhing 'bar
454b6(rgyud): bas na//rnam snang mdzad chen thub pa'ang yin//rlung ni sna tshogs las byung ba//khyad par spyod pas rta mchog yin//rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' ste//phan tshun gnyis
454b7(rgyud): med rang bzhino//gnas der nyi ma nub pa yi//sprul pa'i sku yi gzugs kyi bdag/lho dang mi yi bde ba ni//bsdus byas rnyog pa med pa ste//'khor ba'i lam ni
455a1(rgyud): gad papa/sa pa mas 1 'o//rdo rje sems pa'athos//mdu' bram kun m+bu sh-i //yang na mkha' gram klan nasman sa gtum ma la
455a2(rgyud): sogs pa la byA la/dngos pa ni rang bzhin te//de rnams kyi rdul phyi rab las bsgrubs pa'o//de nyid sems can gyi don la nus pa dang ldan pa'i phyir sems dpa'i skar
455a3(rgyud): brjod de//mi shes pa'i ri bo 'joms pas na//ye shes nyid ni rdo rje'o//sems dpa' rnam pa gnyis gsungs te//snod dang bcud kyi 'jig rteno//bcud ni rgyu ba zhes
455a4(rgyud): shud la//de bzhin snod ni brtan pa'o//re re zhing yang gnyis gnyis te//skul pa bzang dang skal dono//sa dang mu dang me rlung gi/gzugs ni rnam pa bzhi ru ga nas
455a5(rgyud): ni zhes bya ba ni ma ldan 'das denyid rang byung bsta n-i rang byung bamaldan 'das//rang byung zhes b+hA ba ni ni byung ba chen brdzu su dpag pa'i rang bzhin gyi bya/
455a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni dbang phyuglu la so sa pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas//yang na nyan mongs pa'i bdud brtsam pas ni bcom ldan 'das te//rang 'ang
455a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de nyid lhag pa'i lha ni gcig nyid de//lha nyid yin zhing lhag pa nyid kyi phyir lhag pa'i lha ste//lhag pa'i lha yi sgra gang sngar bstan pa'i kham
456a1(rgyud): /ldan 'das ma spyam tshun ma nyid ngan par spyod pa ste/lo bcung ba dang rdo rje bad+mo sbyor bas byung ba'i khrag dang bcas pa'o//lha dang ma'i bde ni//bsdus
456a2(rgyud): byas rdo rje dus kyi ni//bcu drug cher yang mi phod pa ste//de la bcu drug che ni bud med kyi skud pa las byung ba'i khams rnams skud pa bcu drug dang lhan cig tu sgril ste/
456a3(rgyud): tshogs pa chen po zhes bya ba gang yin pa'o//de ltar skud pa bcu drug hU~M/sprul de'i tshe shes bcu drug go//bsdus byas zhes bye ba bdud rtsi lnga'i snying po'o//gong bur byas
456a4(rgyud): pa ste//bdud rtsi sna'i sbyor bar gyur pa'o//dang zhes bya ba ni bslu nga'i don te sde tshan rnams kyis bsdus shing bston pa'i khams ga dang gling yin pa'i rgyun de dang des
456a5(rgyud): bon+da dang spyil te rtog par bya'o//sgra'i bde ba zhes bya ba ni de bdud rtsi ltar yongasu smin pas rang gi sku rdo rjer gyur pa'i skad cig/mi'i yin pas na mi'i ste nges par
456a6(rgyud): gsol ba'i bde ba'o//de yang dngos grub thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtag tu gsal byas mtshan pa'o//chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i sems kyi rdo rje mngon du bya zhing
456a7(rgyud): bde ba btsun pa las bde ba nyid du skye bar 'gyur te//ther zug tu 'de ba steng bso//de yang dper na//mngar pos bsgos pa'i sa bon ni//mngor bo nyid ni basbyin /
456b1(rgyud): radang/gang phyir mngar pos bskyed byas na//de yi ro ni mngar por 'gyur//de bzhin du chos kyi bdud rtsi las byung ba'i bde ba bsten na bde ba 'phel bar 'gyuraro//de dang mnyam pa
456b2(rgyud): dngos po gsum po gang du yang yod pa ma yin te cha shas kun dang mtshungs pa lta zhog/de'i rdul phra rab kyi cha dang mtshungs pa yang yod pa ma yino//rdul phra rab ni rdo rje phra mo'i rang
456b3(rgyud): bzhin te//byang chub kyi sems bde ba'i bdag nyid spros pa'o//mthu dang ngo bo nyid dag dang //rang bzhin gyis ni grub pa ste//de yi rang bzhin gtam dag ni//bzhin mdzes
456b4(rgyud): ma ni khyod la bshad//gang zhig phyi rol sbyor la dga'//bcu drug char yang mi phod do//sbyor ba'i mchog ni 'di mthong ngo //de dag 'bus zos rtswa dang 'dra//da ni chu skyes chen
456b5(rgyud): po'i yon dang ldan pa'i gnas phun sum tshogs pa bshad par bya ste/mi gsal brda yi tshul gyis ni//gnas ni gsang ba zhes byar bshad//mi gsal po yi dngos
456b6(rgyud): por ni//brda yi skad kyis bshad pa yin//'di ni rtog pa la rton nas//gnas ni gsang ba bshad par bya//dgon chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa nI sgra ji bzhi no//
456b7(rgyud): gzhan yang dgon chen zhes bya ba ni shes rab ste//sngags kyi yon tan gyi shing gi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i phyiraro//de nyid rang bzhin gyis lha'i bdag
457a1(rgyud): nyid pas nus phyugs//rogs mtha' yas pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir mang ba'i tshig/bdag dang sems can la sogs par rtog pa dang bral bar rnam par/
457a2(rgyud): dpon du ste//lta ba ngan pa rnams kyis gzhig par mi nus pa'i phyir re ba'o//'jug par dag/ phyi bor te//zab cing rgya che ba'i shes rab kyi chu ba'i gnas gyur pas
457a3(rgyud): meche chen po'i 'gram rnams//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang sbyin pa la sogs po'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pas gdod nas grub pa ste/nyan thos la sos
457a4(rgyud): pa'i byang chub 'dod chags kyi mes bsregs pas drar khrod do//de ltar na me ldong lta bu la sogs pa lnga rnam par dag pas gnas rnam pa lngar bsgrag so//chung ngu ni dang por mi
457a5(rgyud): bcu gcig ma'i pad+ma dang 'ol pas bcud kyis len bsgrub par bya'o//gnyis par lo bcu gnyis me dang rol pas ni dam tshig don du gan+d+her bar bya'o//gsum par lo

457a7(rgyud): dang dbang bskur bar bya ba'i bar du'o//de ltar ni dbugs dbyung mchog dang bar ma dang //zhes bya ba gnas lnga po'i de dag dang rim pa bzhin du sbyor ro//de la
457b1(rgyud): ra nan na gas su sgyu ma la sngags pa nams kyi smonas ma da pa /sa su pa ba d+ma na gyis smra ba rgya sa myu su pa / dang/

457b3(rgyud): rlung gA dang rgyu dang ldan 'ang //skyob pa la brgya ba'o//ga des sbyang sa rgyas do byeng chub snosasu dpa'i rnams mid par ste//gzhan yang dashin paHna

458a2(rgyud): pas de'i rang bzhin du byas pa'o//ni zhes bya ba ni 'dus pa ste de dang ldan pa'i phyir//sna tshogs pad+ma ras kyis g.yogs zhes bya ba la sna tshogs ni rnam pa du ma ste/
458a3(rgyud): pad+ma ni gzugs kyi tshig bla dag so//ras ni gsal bar ma byas te/g.yogs pa ni shin tu mngon par byas pa'o//stan ni rig pa nyid du gdan du byas pa ste dag pa ni 'jam
458a4(rgyud): pa'o//lha mo rnams kyi pad+ma rang gi mtshan ma'i gos kyi rgyan pa'o//bzhag pa ni mchod par bya ba ste/yang dang yang du 'dod pas mnyes par bya ba'o//sdom pa ni bde ba'i

458a6(rgyud): snyan par 'gyur te/khrag chen ga bur bcas pa dang //cin dan dmar por sbyar ba dag/tshigs kyi nang du zhugs pa na//ra sa ya na bla na med//ces bya ba la
458a7(rgyud): khrag chen ni du su 'bab pa'i zla mtshan du gyur pa'o//tsan dan dmar ba ni shau ste de dang bcas pa'o//tshogs kyi nang du zhugs pa ni dbang po thams cad las byung
458b1(rgyud): bad+hA/de dag thams cad kyi bdud nai ra stA ya nu'o//bza' bar bya ba la cho go gang gis bza' bar bya zhe na/sbom po 'am mtha' ltag ces bya ba la sbom pa ni rdo rje'o//mtha'
458b2(rgyud): ltag ni b+ha ga ste/A nA ma zhes bya ba ming gis bsnyad pa'i phyir ro//khang zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi khas rang gi lha'i kha ro//de yang dang po bla ma dbul byas te//de nas sangs
458b3(rgyud): rgya sgra rnams la dbul//phyag rgya la ni byin nasu//zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin du myang //mchod pa bzhi zhes bya ba la byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa pos ni dus
458b4(rgyud): bzhir mkha'agro ma la sogs pa'i lha mo dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi'i bdag nyid can ji srid stong pa nyid kyi nga rgyal nas bzung ste//gzugs yongasu rdzogs pa'i bar
458b5(rgyud): du nges par byas pas mchod par bya'o//dpa' bo dang ni snyoms 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni//gzhan yongasu rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa'i sgom pa po'i ste//dus kyi nges pa
458b6(rgyud): med cang thog ma dang tha ma me po'i nga rgyal gyis rtag tu gnas pa rnams kyis ci zhig bya zhe na/yid ni nang du chud pa'i ste/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skyed ma/
458b7(rgyud): mo'i shes rab ji lta ba bzhin du mnyam par sbyor ba dang ldan pas mchog tu dgang ba rnam par spro ste/gnas pas tshim par bya zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//de ltar mchod
459a1(rgyud): pas mchog dang bar ma ste/tha ma no chags parnyan du rdzug/dang du D+yan chos thams cad bsdus nas bcur ma'i b+hA ba bad pa can du spros la de
459a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bri bar bya zhes bya ba dang sbyar ba ste//gzhan gyi de kho na nyid ji bzhin du bstan pa'o//bar ma ni bdag gi de kho na nyid//rdo rje'i 'dzin pas 'khor lo thams
459a3(rgyud): cad rang gi dbus bsdus la/rdo rje kun gyi rang bzhin du byas pa cho ga des bsgoms pa ni mchog/bud med kun gyi sgyu ma zhes bya ba la bud med kun ni gzugs la
459a4(rgyud): sogs pa'o//sgyu mi nI yon tan tI rang bzhin gyis sgo la sogs pas gnas pa'o//sgyu ma ste yon tan gyi rgyas ma khros pa sgyu ma'i don du gsungaso//ma lus pa rna

459a6(rgyud): kA lo yon tan gsungs//mnyam pa dam tshig spyod yul yin//de nyid ni mtshon ma yin pas na phyag rgya ste//'dzi na zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa po'i blos mngon du byas pa'o//
459a7(rgyud): yon tan ngas rtag tu yon tan dang ldan par gyur pa'i rang ba la sogs pa gnyi su med pa'i tshul nyid mchog ste//bla ni med cing dam por gyur pa'o//de yang lugs ma la so/
459b1(rgyud): pa gzhan dag lus phul du byung bar rang bzhin gyis grub par phyir//rang bzhin gyis grub pa ni 'gyur ba med pa'i mtshan nyid dang nga bo nyid rnam par dag pa ste//ji ltar 'o ma la zhal
459b2(rgyud): sogs pa bzhino//de bas na bcos ma las bye brag tu gyur pa'o//gzhan yang ngan par spyod pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur/rnyed dang bde dang dga' kun gyis zhes bya ba la/
459b3(rgyud): rnyed pa ni byang chub kyi sems rnyed pa ste/de nyid dga' ba kun gyis khyad par du 'phel bso yin gyi//slongs mos 'tsho ba la sogs pa dang /dka' thub kyi sbyor ba
459b4(rgyud): la sogs pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin pas nam yang 'grub par mi 'gyur te/spang bar bya'o//des zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i rdzas kyis te/khyad par ji lta bu zhig
459b5(rgyud): zhe na/rang bzhin dang ngo bo nyid kyis grub pa ste/rang bzhin gyis sngags kyi yi gre yongasu gyur pa la sa rang gau lha'i gzug su yong su rdzo ba ste/sngags bzlas pa dang /
459b6(rgyud): gi sa bon yongasu gyur ba lngas rang bzhin yongasu rdza ba'o//sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni khams kyi rang bzhin te/mkha'agro ma rnam pa bco brgyad du phye ba yin gyi b+hu
459b7(rgyud): ba la sogs pa'i khams ni ma yino//na mkha' kun tu rgyu grub pa zhes bya ba la/na mkha'i sgras ni sems la bya ste//ji ltar na mkha'i khams la sog
460a1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi gan+da su gyur pa bzhin du thams cad kyi go skabs ster ba'i phyiraro//yang na nyan thos la sogs pa'i gnas bsregs pas na na mkha' ste/
460a2(rgyud): nam mkha' der bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gyis rgyu zhing spyod pas na do ni na mkha' kun tu rgyu brub pas/mkha' gro ma zhes rab tu grags zhes//sna tshogs kun tu phyag rgya ste zhes
460a3(rgyud): bya ba la/kun tu ni sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i rigs thams cad//sna tshogs ni rdo rje 'dzin chen po ste/de'i phyag rgya ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya tha~Md do//
460a4(rgyud): des na sna tshog kun tu phyag rgya ste/sems kyi rang bzhin gyis zla ba dang dmar po'i grub pa'i rdzas de dag nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar du rtag tu goms par bya bas stobs gyur pa'o//
460a5(rgyud): sna tshogs sdom pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bde ba grub pa ste/mkha' gro kun zhes bya ba khrag dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i tshogs sngags pa rdo rje mkha 'gro zhes bye bar
460a6(rgyud): bregs pa ste/rang nyid skyes par gyur ba'o//de nyid med sems ni de kho na nyid kyi sems med pa ste/phyin ci log go sems kyis sbyor ba'o//lha la dmigs pa ni 'dud
460a7(rgyud): pa'i lhar sgom pa'o//shin tu de nyid sems zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid kyi sems kyis rgyan pa ste/phyin ci ma log pa'i mtshan nyid do//de yang khrag la sogs pa'i
460b1(rgyud): ng+yas rgyas smra mags na ma gyu dang thab snyed 'i
460b2(rgyud): dam tshig sa napa khyer la ni tig ni d+ma lta / shi mi dru yinaH/
461a1(rgyud): rgyas bya ba stong phrag ni//phyogs bcu dag tu spro ngar byed//thag le bcu drug thog skud kyi//sngags pas thig gis thig btab pa'i//lte ba'i dkyil
461a2(rgyud): 'khor bcu drug par//a sogs k+Sha yi mthar thug rA/tha ma las ni sngags btu bya//phyi nas thig ler cha dang bral//bshang dang gci ba'i rang bzhin pas//'di ru
461a3(rgyud): k+Sha ni spang bar bya//yi ge hA ni yongasu gyur pas//yi ge thams cad yal grwa 'dra//'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das//gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha//sangs rgyas
461a4(rgyud): kun dngos stong pa yi//yi ge nyid ni mkha'agro ma//zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi man dag gro/kA sogs yang dgu gnas pa yi//yi ge lha yi gzugs yin te//a
461a5(rgyud): sogs dbyangs rnams thams cad kyi//sngags kyis sgeg cong rgyan pa yin//lhag pa'i lha ni yi ge hUM//lte ba'i dbusu bsam par bya//lte ba pad+ma zhes bya ste/

478a3(rgyud): bAr bya//mtsham sa rdo rje'i dbyibs lta bu'i//rtse gsum rdo rjes bskor bar bya//sa dkar dang ni lci ba yis//ha~M khung kun tu byug byar bya/brtul zhugs
478a4(rgyud): gyis g+han+ti kAr yang //dri ni dkor pos byugs nas/na tu me ma bA zla 'bru ba yis//mi tig dkar pos pa bar bya//dkyil 'khor khang pa la sogs pa'o//
478a5(rgyud): shAr gyi phyogasu las de bcom//rgyus pa sa gzhi ser po la//rin po che yi dbyibs 'dra'i thag//yang na gru bzhi pa yang rung //khru do zabasu khru gang ba rko//de na
478a6(rgyud): sor brgyad byor nusu//kha khyer sor brgyad tshad du bya//sor brgyad dpangs dang ldan pa la//rin chen phred pas bskor bar bya//ha~M khung nang du 'khor lo ni//bsgrib sa
478a7(rgyud): brgyad sor po bris pa la//'og tu cha drug sor drug pa'i//rdo rje rin chen bri bar bya//sa ser dang ni dri ser gyis//ha~M khung kun tu thugs nasu//me tog ser po la sor+tha
478b1(rgyud): pa'o//mchod pa dag ni ji bzhin bya//'di ni rtag tu grong khyor spobs//byung gi phyogs char bya ba yin//dbang la sa bzhi dmar po la//pad+ma yas ni mtshan ma yi//thab khung sgra
478b2(rgyud): gnas dbyingasu bya//yang na zla phyed dbyibs lta bu//khung bu dang ni kha khyer sogs//zhi ba yi ni chad du bya//sA dmar dri dmar sogs byugs te//me tog dmar po la sogs byatar//
478b3(rgyud): 'di ni grong khyer la sogs pa'i//nub kyi phyogs char rtag tu bya//mngon spyod pha mes nags dang ni//ma ma'i khyim du rtsub pa dang //gas pa'i sa la bri bar bya//gru gsum ser mo
478b4(rgyud): nyi shu ched//sor bcu thur du brko bar bya//rtse gsum khro bro'i rdo rje ni//char sprin gyi ni 'od dang mtshungs//sor brgyad pa yi tshad tsam du//de yi dbusu mtshan par bya//khung
478b5(rgyud): bu sor gsum bor bar ni//kha khyer sor gsum skor bar bya//sa nag dur khrod thal ba sog/ji snyed pa yis byugs byas te//dkyil 'khor khang sogs lho phyogs bya//
478b6(rgyud): lhag ma yi ni lus rnams kyang //las bzhi'i khung bur 'dus mod kyi//slar yang de rnams khyad par gyi//khung bur 'dir ni bshad kyis nyon//dbug pa'i haM khang rdo/
478b7(rgyud): ni//rtse gcig lta bu'i dbyibasu bya//rdo rje lcags kyus bskar ba la//lhag ma dag ni dbang dang mtshungs//bcang ba la ni gru bzhi ste//rmongs la rgyas pa sta bu
479a1(rgyud): yin//dbang ldan gyi ni phyogs cha ru//sa ni dkar dang ser por bya//bad+mad la mngon spyod lta bu ste//khyad par du ni rlung mtsham su//rnga mo'i lte bas
479a2(rgyud): byugs te bya//mdza' bo dag ni nyams nasu//phan tshun sdang bar bya ba la//de yang mngon par skyed pa yi//cho ga ji bzhin lte bar bya//las rnams thams cad bsdus
479a3(rgyud): pa yi//cho ga de nas bshad bya ste//las kun de nyid rig pa yis//bsams pa la sogs bya brag dbye//las kyi rjes 'thun sa gzhi la//las kyi rjes 'thun thab
479a4(rgyud): khung bya//sngags pa'i yid ni gau ri dga' ba'o//swa phyogasu ni sbyar yang rung //khru gang pa yi tshad du ni//pad+ma ud dpal dbyibs 'dra ba//kha khyer pad+ma lta bu ste//
479a5(rgyud): khung dang kha khyer cung zad pa dang //nang du bor sogs zhi bo 'dra//phyogs bzhir rdo rjes mtshan par bya//rgyu ba ni se brgyad tshad tsam la//spangs ni sor tsog tshad tsam
479a6(rgyud): phyi'o//'khor lo rin chen pad+ma dang //ral gri mtshon chas bskor ba yi/dbusu rdo'i mtshan ma bya/ su rdo'i ra ba yis/ha~M khung kun nas zlum po la//'og ni 'khor bar bri bar bya//
479a7(rgyud): ho khung gi ni cho ga'o//yam shed pa la sha dang ni//u dum ba ra a mra dang //n+ya gro dang pa la sha/ka tam po sogs 'o ma can//rtse ma'i cha las byas pa ste//
479b1(rgyud): so ni bcu gnyis chad du bya//rlon zhing mdab mar bcas pa ste//rnying dang rtse mos nyams pa dang //shun pa med cing gas pa dang //thung dang shin tu ring ba dang //phra dang sbom dang
479b2(rgyud): 'khyog pa dang //gas dang chag dang 'bus zos dang //rtse mo cha ni gnyis yod cing //srog chags ldan zhing bskams pa dag/dge ba'i las rnams thams cad la//spangs te
479b3(rgyud): sdig pa'i las la shis//nas dang til dang 'o ma zho//sa li'i 'bras can pri yang ku//ku sha sngon po tsu ta'i mdab//me tog tsan dkar po dang //sbrang rtsi mar dang yos 'og
479b4(rgyud): deng //dur ba dri zhim khu ba rnams//rnal 'byor pa yis zhi ba la//ji ltar rnyed pa bsreg par bya//mchod sbyin gyi ni shing rnams la//bud shing thob pas dma' bar bya//
479b5(rgyud): nags kyi lci skam dag kyang rung //srog chags ldan pa spang bar bya//zhi ba'i yam shing dang bud shing dang 'bro la sogs pa//sreg rdzas kyi tshe ga'o//yam shing zhi ba'i
479b6(rgyud): lta bu ste//dbus kyi cha ni mdzes pa las//srid du bcag khru gang du bya//dri ser chu yis gtor nas ni//zho dang dza ma mar la sbag/mngar gsum la ni brtags par
479b7(rgyud): bya//de nas zas mchog zho zan dang //mor dang ti la ni nag pa dang //sha dang bus pa mar dang bcas//sbrang rtsi dang ni sa la'i 'bras//'bru rnams gzhan dang pad+ma dang //
480a1(rgyud): nA ba ge sar bil ba'i 'bras//de bzhin dur bar bcas pa dag/rgyus pa'i las la bsrebs par bya//bud shing sngar bzhin khyad par du//'bras bu
480a2(rgyud): dang ni bcas pas bya//tsam pa dang ne a sho ka/pu nA nA ga nA gaM ser//shin tu dmar zhing sgyur ba dang //me tog dang ni 'bras bur bcas//yal ga yI ni cha las byas//
480a3(rgyud): sngor lnga pa yi tshad du ni//dbang gi las kyi yam shing bya//bud shing yang ni sgyur ba dang //me tog bcas pa'i shing la bya//me tog dri ngan rnams dang ni//de bzhin 'bru
480a4(rgyud): ni nag po dang //phub ma dag ni gtor bar bya//de bzhin mi rus phye ma dang //dug la sogs pa dbul bar bya//tsha zhing kha dang tsher mar bcas//dur khrod du ni skyes
480a5(rgyud): pra'i shing //rtsa ba'i cha las byas pa ste//sor mo bcu gnyis yam shing tshad//rtse mo rno la rtsub pa ste//rtse gnyis dug la sogs pa spang //'ug pa'i sgro la
480a6(rgyud): sogs pa'ang rung //drag po'i las kyi bud shing bya//de nas mchod yon snod bshams pa//gser dang dngul las byas pa 'am//dung dang nya phyis dag kyang rung /
480a7(rgyud): zangs dang khar ba'i rdzas rnams dang //sa dang shing lo dag kyang rung //ji ltar 'byor par bsham par bya//me tog 'o mar bcas pa yi//oMrga'i snod ni

480b4(rgyud): dang na ba glang gcin//yang na mi yai bci ba 'am//yang na bong bu'i gcin yang rung //phaT dang spel ba'i sngags bzlas pa//g.yas kyi phyogasu bzhag nas ni//drug
480b5(rgyud): pa'i las la sbyar bar bya//arga'i cho ga'o//nad sogs zhi phyir zhi ba ni//sgying rjer ldan pas dgongs mo bye//dpa' bo shar du bltas na su//me tog phreng sogs
480b6(rgyud): rgyan dang ni//bge bo dag ni dkar por bya//'jam pa'i lasa? lA gnas nas ni//pad+ma'i skyil krung btsosan+ta su//dang ldan rnam snang mdzad bsgoms te//da
480b7(rgyud): ldan pas mi smra bar//sgrub bya yi ge oM byung ba'i//chu yi dkyil 'khor dkar po li//seng ge pad+ma zla ba yis//sten la gnas pa dmigs na su//'og/
481a1(rgyud): nas 'byung ba'i rim pa yis//sems can kun pa phan d+ha'i phyir//sku'i mtha' can sngags bzlas la//rtab tu zhi ba'i la sma rna mas /
481a2(rgyud): dbul dang ri sogs rgyas pa'i las//dga' dang ldan pas snga dro bya//gos sor la sogs rgyan nas ni//byang phyogs ni kha bltas te//bzang ba yi ni 'dug
481a3(rgyud): stangs sam//yang na rol pa'i stabs kyis gnas//'bras chen dkar po zho dang ni//bcas bza' de nyid rig pa yis//bza' dang btung bas tshim na su/
481a4(rgyud): rin chen 'byung bar bsgoms nas+tha ni//yi ge laM las byung ba yi//dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor lnga//glang chen steng du gnas pa yi//bsgrub par bya ba dmig
481a5(rgyud): nasu//sngags kyi mthar ni oM brjod cing //rgyas par bya ba'i cho ga sbyar//dbang gi don du 'di gsungs te//mtshon mo chags pa'i sems kyis ni//nub
481a6(rgyud): kye phyog su khe bltas la//dmar po'i rgyan gyis grubs nas ni//sems dpa'i skye ba krung gnas nas//rdo rje chags pa mchog tu sgom//yaM las byung

495a2(rgyud): bcud kyis len ni rab sbyor ba//gnas ni gang du brtsam par bgyi//sde tshan rnams ni sngar bshud pa'i//'brel pa dag ni ji ltar lags//sbyor ba rim pa khyod bshad
495a3(rgyud): pa'i//dgongs pa dag ni ci zhig lags//mar nag btso ba cho ga dang //yul dang 'brel pa'i tingange 'dzin//khams ni bco brgyad bstan pa yi//phan tshun bsdus pa ji
495a4(rgyud): lta bu//'khrul 'khor bye brag bshad pa dag/phyi dang nang ni ji ltar lags//nad rnams sna tshogs byung ba dag/ji ltar smin pas 'bras bur 'gyur//sbom po'i bye brag
495a5(rgyud): du zhig mchis//phra mo yi ni khyad par ci//rdzas dang bcud len mi 'tshal te//khyod kyis sbyor ba gang bshad pa'i//dus kyi khyad par ji lta bu//de rnams bdag ni
495a6(rgyud): the tshom skyes//bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol//bka' stsal pa/sgyu ma kun gyis rnam rol pa//nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che//sbrang rtsi lta bur bcud bsdus pa//
495a7(rgyud): rgyud rnams kun tu gsang ba yin//gnas sogs ji bzhin mchod na su//bde mchog sngags kyi bsnyen par bya//dpa' bo rnal 'byor gnyis med pa//nyi shu rtsa
495b1(rgyud): bzhir cher mchod nas//rnal 'byor chen po de yis ni//bcud len sman gyi sbyor ba rnam//rig pa 'dzin pa'i grogs pa na//sngags kyi bsnyen par gus pa dang //skyo dub med
495b2(rgyud): cing dogs pa med//dam tshig spyod la gus pa ste//dbe' zhing brtan la g.yo sgyu med//'jam zhing bla ma'i bsnyen bkur brtson//de dang lhan cig bsgrub par bya//sgrub bos
495b3(rgyud): gzhan du byas na ni//dngos grub 'bras bu 'byung mi 'gyur//sngar bshad rig po spyang byas te//dang po dam tshig sbyin par bya//gcer bu'i brtul zhugs 'dzin pa yis//
495b4(rgyud): gnyis pas ming sogs dbad ni bskur//dbang bskur nas ni de nyid bstan//stong dang stong min sogs spangs pa'i//ron mi mchog gis rtogs bya//sgo dgu las ni byu
495b5(rgyud): ba'i rdzas//sbom po zhes ni bya ba ste//rdzas ni 'ju bar byed pa yin//bcud ni dngul gyi lhag ma yin//len pa skying stobs zhes byar bshad//snying stobs rdzas zhes
495b6(rgyud): bya ba ste//dngul ni zhu ba zhes byar brjod//de ltar rdzas dang zhu ba ni//bsdus pa len pa zhes bya'o//mun pa phra mo zhes bya ste//phra mo na mkha'i khams mtshan nyid//
495b7(rgyud): phud pa la sogs khyad par dang //khams rnams thams cad 'tshod pa yin//sna tshogs gzugs rnams 'byin pa ni//nga yi ye shes kyis bskul yin//de dag
496a1(rgyud): lha mo skal chen mo//rdzas dang khams ni bsdus pa ste//brtson 'grus dman zhing tha shal dang //bsod nams dman pas mthong mi 'gyur//
496a2(rgyud): brtson 'grus bcud kun gnas yin pas//de bas brtson 'grus brtsam par bya//bzhud ni bcing dang gso ba dag/mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa yin//yongasu
496a3(rgyud): smin pa'i mchog gis ni//mnyam med bcud la brten pa yi//rnam bcing la sogs nyes pa brgya//blo dang ldan pas dpyad de dgag/bcud ni nag po sngon po ste//
496a4(rgyud): bcud ni yongasu grub pa yin//dngul chu lhang tsher cho ga yis//ji srid bcud chen grub kyi bar//de srid du ni 'bade dpyad//'khrul 'khor gang zhig kha che ba/
496a5(rgyud): de ni ka ran rgod ma'i kha//'khrul 'khor gang zhig rdza rnga 'dra//de nyid bong bu rnga mo'i kha//rgod ma'i khA na 'od ma yi//sbu gu yis ni brgyan par bya//ka raN+Da'i
496a6(rgyud): 'khrul 'khor ni//ral gri shugs kyi brgyan par bya//'khrul 'khor bong bu'i kha zhes pa//kad ka'i mgrin pa'i sbu gur sbyar//rnga mo'i kha yi 'khrul 'khor
496a7(rgyud): nI/bya rog mchu dang mtshungs par gyur//tshar bcad pa ni sbal ba ste//'od ma can gyis sbrang rtsir btso//bya rog mchu can bung par bco//rdo leb 'bar
496b1(rgyud): slo ng+gA dang ban+d+has//k+Sha ka'i man+tanan nAng na//das gro shugs can la la lakhor gyis//sad+ma na na ldan pa na//bdud can yob dang khros pa dang //
496b2(rgyud): shin tu tshus pa yis//chu la nad du 'bris par 'gyub/ m+WA dz+nyAn+da mig dang //rtswa bi la sogs byin na na//zhugs pas tshar bcad mnan pa dang /
496b3(rgyud): sh+log tu sa la bor nas//'dar zhing rmongs pa du bar 'thul//khrel khrel gyi ni sgra 'byin no//de nus ya sa gnad dang //ba la tsakr-i mArba dang //pA la ta kA shi khA
496b4(rgyud): bIni tshad ku mu dang //u pal ma li kA sa ngani/rgyu shug rus pa ka sa bon//sU b+ha'i sa bonam du dang //ba son pa la sha be'i shun//bye ma mar
496b5(rgyud): yi//rlung du nas brdung po g+ha//dz+nyA ni des dang bcas pas 'ching //trAs ni d+ha/tshe sbyin pad+maH//dri nas rje yi gtan du mate//dang po re shig snang bar rgyu/
496b6(rgyud): nas gci b+hU'i yan cha dang //phag gi zhag dang khrag du bcas//dkrubs pas nyes pa gzhom par bya//'khrul 'khor gzhug pa bshad par bya//tsan+d+ra tha
496b7(rgyud): sman la sogs dang //bcab pa rkang gi nang du gzhug/dbang po brgya rtsa brgyad par bya//phyi nas lho skyes bcas pa'i bcud//'od ma'i nang du bcug nas//srung
497a1(rgyud): klung shA ga pad+man/rdzu ba byas bu nas sman ngal dgrus padzin pa dang 'brusmras//kA mA dz+wa N+Dal sogs nanam

497a3(rgyud): sa tsho 'ab+h+ya //chu bcus rim gyis sgrub par bya//dri zhim nan+ti /seMd gyis mang+ga ka ne da'ang bar 'gyur//dngul gyi san+ni pagang ba
497a4(rgyud): /mu hUM sa masmin dge ba gyur/nu mA dang lnga phyin//rdo rjes zag ni klog 'gyur/gas kyi sa sa dang ma rgya rnams pa// chags
497a5(rgyud): dang phyug sems dang ni//ltung mtshar gyi ni baN+Di byin dang //me dang gshin+da rje chu lha dang //lus ngan la sregs bgegs kun zlog/nag par ni mangs
497a6(rgyud): da/rgya mtshal na rgyur btsos pa yi//da m+pA ts+li'i b+hu ba mchag 'ang po /sa dang nI mA na sogs//bar+m+ma sbyi sa sbyin dang ni//dang r+m+ma
497a7(rgyud): sa po thugs pa yis//gnang 'brum nad ni sel bar byed//ka ri ke sas gas pa ste//kai ri kar ni ka dang ni//ras paM dam bas gzhu zhing bas /
497b1(rgyud): dag nga y-i sha bad du dang //nAg pal ba sau kaM/nAmanyam gyis na mangs par bya//dadung po khu ba yos//rang ba yon tan ma lus spyod//donas stong blo kun bsdus pa
497b2(rgyud): mang bu'i chag dashad par bya//mar khwa'i rnam pa gnyis gsungs te//rjod dang sems can las thung drug pa dang ba snod kyi ba shud ts+tsha //'bras bu chen po gsum gyis
497b3(rgyud): rgyus/sum sbyar rnams la yang phyung //de ni legs par zlums byas //rdul rdzogs de'i b+han dral ba'i//sa yi tshar ni thugs pas blo skyeng //legs
497b4(rgyud): na cing rdumi pa dang //rgyu bo la sogs sbyin srang su gnag+sa/legs por bdud zhing ba sros nas//skya ror khri tshur chus spangs//skye ba de yi bdug byam na//du med
497b5(rgyud): yis ran par 'dug/de nas 'khrul lakha dag gis bcir//dpyid dang so saM ka ston dus gsum//nyi ma'i 'od la sman mar graH//dgun snyad dgun smad dbyer nga
497b6(rgyud): gsum//mar khu ma yis ran par bcwo//gan drA ba t+tA tAHdang //sug smel nA ga pus par bcas//rul pa dang ni sa li la/de dag phye mar byas pa ni//
497b7(rgyud): tili las byung ba'i nang thugs te//chu ni mang khu'i bzhi 'gyur bya//oM gi drin srang byed dang //sman gyi ba ni 'gyur byas nas//de nas me no ran pas banas

498a2(rgyud): yang sih+la dkar min lha//ru rta dz+wal ba zar r+ya bcas//thams cad bsres pa srang gcig bting //mar khu srung ni brgyad dang bcas//'od ma'i nang du blugs
498a3(rgyud): nas ni//nyi ma bdun du nyi mar bco//yid 'ong skal bzang stobs rab ster//'dod pa'i don ni phun sum tshogs//gal te tshangs pa'i mar khur bcas//rnal
498a4(rgyud): ra nul mchog stir 'gyur//gzhan yang sbrul sug snre pa dang //ti dri gA ra~M dzi dang //seMn mau rUr+N+Na bi sha \u0f7f/so sor cha ba'i tshwa drug bdun//

498a6(rgyud): par 'gyur//de nas sha chen mar khu dang //lhan cig bsres te spring rtsi yi//snod du thugs te nyi mar bsro//nyi ma bdun ni tshun chad kyis//ri dgas lte bu dang
498a7(rgyud): mtshungs 'gyur//sbyor ba 'di na dam pa ste//srung ba kun gyi bla na med//ti tI tsa yi 'bras bu dang //tsan sih+la shing tshar bcas//sngar bshad pa yi mar khu de//
498b1(rgyud): gang go mar dang bskos nas na//sbyar bzhin \u0f7fnga \u0f7frdzu rjud bzhug sa das//don ga tung ma tshus byung /skyo ba thams cad rgyas par rnyed//de nas ro sgyus mar/58
498b2(rgyud): nas//'bras gsu ma zlad she dag dang //sat+ti twAM ka dag sum//saM ba~M la yi da ba dang //gung bum dang ni lhan cig bcas//s+yAng ci'i snod du thugs nas/
498b3(rgyud): nyin bdun nyi ma'i drod la brtse//rgyal bzang stobs 'brel mdangs dang ldan//rtag tu jo ma brdung bya zhing //bsam gtan bzlas la 'bade par bya//chi ste par spyadal
498b4(rgyud): rtag gnas nas//su bdag ni dgag par bya//sbrad rtsi dang ni bcas pa ru//sgrub pas pa mo T+wAM drug bzang//de yi bshing bskrun blangs la//lha mo lhan cig bye moraH/
498b5(rgyud): rdza ma gsar pa bzhug nas//tshe gsam ts+tsho ri'i b+h+ra myA ni//nyes 'gyur du ni byas pa dang //'byin byed khyi ma bcu char skye//bu ram gyi ni ril bu g+ha/sgrub pa shin tu mnya
498b6(rgyud): gzhag pas/r-i ra gnyis gnyis//sa nan nams pan swA da ni//'jug 'a ra spyod par gnod 'dum 'joms//mes bye ma sa ni chu ni da /
498b7(rgyud): dang ni bcu drug bsre//'o ma dang ni spyan ga 'jung //nyi ma ban ni tshun chad kyis//gzong na klad ni de 'jams par 'gyur//sangs pa ni kyis
499a1(rgyud): /ma bzhin du 'thungs na no//nad rnams thams cad sol bar byed//zla drug sbyar ba goms pa yis//sgra dkar dang ni gnyer ma 'phrog/'bras ni dmang /
499a2(rgyud): po'i phye ma dang //ba la'i rtsa du mdab mar bcas//sgrog skya zho gnyis lhan cig tu//btags te ril bu byas na ni//mer r-i mA nag nang du btso//zos nas ni dang
499a3(rgyud): 'tsham par btung //des ni rus pa chag pa dag/'byor zhing stobs dang nyams 'phel 'gyur//b+h+ring ga ra dza tshangs pa ni//rlon pa gci ba dang /bcas bza'//
499a4(rgyud): de yis dug ni 'phrog par byed//yung bya'i khu ba zho gnyis dang //de dang mnyam pa'i gci par bcas//'thungs na rgyu de'i dug dang ni//shu ba dang ni nang kun
499a5(rgyud): 'joms//yungs pa'i khu bo glang gcin dang //de bzhin 'byung po'i gtso bo ste//reg byed grangs dang mnyam pa'i srang //de la zho na gnyis gnyis btung

499a7(rgyud): rtsi cha mnyam phye ma ni//khab len lcogs kyi snod du gzhag/sbyor ba'i rim pa 'di yis ni//srang ni sum brgya bar du bya//bde san ta zhes bya ba ste//

500a1(rgyud): /ma med par 'gyur//yungs bya gnyis kyi cha mnyan bya//bu yo rab bri drongo bcas//bre gang lus kyi bar du bal//zhag bdun du ni du 'thungs na/
500a2(rgyud): de yis lus ni rgyas gyur de//bcud kyis yin gyi sbyor ba 'di//dpa' blo rang nyid bshad pa yin//yungs pa dang ni so phag dang //de bzhin bcig dang sgyu byed khwa//rlung
500a3(rgyud): med gan su gnas nas ni//lus la dril phyis b+h+yas na ni//rtagA tu stobs ni 'phel byed cing //dngul chu brjid bdag la phan//rur+N+Na mur m+mA shrak+Sh+mA~M ka/shr-ing tsha
500a4(rgyud): mnyam phyi dang ni//mdo sim che ni nyir 'gyur bcas//dril phyis ng+yas na 'dod pa 'grug/blag zhun dang ni so bag dang //ner guN+Di dang se la tshe//chu ni mnyam
500a5(rgyud): por byas pa yi//yungs pa dag ni gzhi 'gyur bcas//gser shing khu ba che byed kyis//dril byis byas nas dug 'brog cid//gci bar bcas pa'i dril phyis
500a6(rgyud): kyis//khyi rdo dang ni mdze nad 'joms//khye'u dang bu mo gzho nu'i sha/mar dung bcas pa ci rigs par//rgyun tu zos nu tshe ring 'gyur//mdzes ma las byung
500a7(rgyud): me tog ni//zos na rims kyis rga ba 'joms//rtag tu ga pu tsin dag/bsten na nad rnams sel ba'i mchog/de bzhin pani mnyam gci bar bcas//sna
500b1(rgyud): sman byin na 'ang nad kun srol//sha shung ka dang yungs pa dang //khya ba yi ni snying po dag/pad+ma can gyi pad+ma ni//skyung po yi ni khu ba dang //sems kyi dbang phyug lag+h+ra mthi la//
500b2(rgyud): du//mnyes te rim gyis bsten na ni//nad rnams kun lngas grol 'gyur zhing //bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed par//gdon mi za bar ngas bshad//dpyid kyi dusu
500b3(rgyud): baphrul bar bya//mkhrung ma zhes bya chen po'i chen//de yi gci ba'i lan tsha dang //de yi khrag dang khu bar bcas//dngul chu dang ni sbrang rtsir bsgre//sbyor ba chen po 'di dag

501a4(rgyud): mo'i 'o ma srang brgyad dang //rdo rje'i 'o ma srang brgyar bcas//skyu ru'i khu ba'ang de tsam ste//ba yi 'o ma kham byor gang //yung ba sbrang rtsi tsan dan dmar//srong gcig
501a5(rgyud): dang ni pa tha dag/sngar bshad mtshan nyid ldan pa ni//brgya rtsa brgyad ni bzung bar bya//sngon bzhin ran par btso byas la//khyim gyi me tog dkar por bcas//dpyid

501b2(rgyud): //de nyid sbyin lag 'byung po'i bdag/don yod dbang du spyad pa yin//hUM yi chu ni rtul mtshan gyi//khrag dang ldan cig bcas nas//lag mam lta du ni mnyes la bzal
501b3(rgyud): 'dod don thams cad sgrub byed yin//pad+ma las thung ma rnyed ni//ro mi log pa las byung bzung //rnal 'byor don gnyer dngul po yis//lag pa'i mchod pas yid 'dod
501b4(rgyud): bya//rgyud rnams kun ts+yai grang smras pa//de dag thams cad khyod la bshid //dbang bskur lag tu bkod nas ni//mkhas pas rgyab tu gshegasu gsol//mdzes ma
501b5(rgyud): kun d+hu rI'i sa thonag mche bas mnyes nas//thig ler byas na rgyu mi r+d+ha l+le//'gro 'i dbang du byed par 'gyur//gi ri kar na dkar bye dang //bri yang ku ru bzlas te/
501b6(rgyud): /nyams stobs dag ni 'phel bar 'gyur//bu mo gzhon mig nag dang //ljong ras bcas pa blangs na ni//sna tshogs drug rnams 'joms par byed//bu mo sngo/
501b7(rgyud): bsangs mig rnag dang //klad pa yi ni zhag tu bcas//de ni ljags ba tsem gyi s+ye//skra dkar 'joms par the tshom med//lce dang khrag ni cha snyoms la//bu ram/
502a1(rgyud): 'ol slo ngani chur brnyas//gzhan yang ltung mar dang na//dadu chu sngar no sha bzhin bzung //mu TI bzang por bcas pa ni//blugs na

502a6(rgyud): cad gcig tu spyo ba yi//rdzas ni srong gcig bzung nasu//sngar bshod cho ga bzhin du ni//mar khu dag ni btso bar bya//mi rgyal rta la sa d+ya de//'bras bu yi na
502a7(rgyud): chu dang bcas//bzhi dang lnga dang drug 'dun cha//de dag ji snyed mar de snyed//lcags kyi dri ma pri yang ku//po dang son mo yung bar bcas//de dag slar yang mar
502b1(rgyud): lung ba //gsal zhing nad med 'phel bar byed//mgo bslu ba'i cho ga'o//pr-i yang ku dang tsan+ta dang //kan tI la ba na'i me tog/sbrang rtsi 'dzag dang ku mu da/ut+pal chu yi do bar
502b2(rgyud): ba/skyer bar bcas pa'i skyo ma ni//srang gcig tshad ni bzung bar bya//'dod pa'i mi ni 'bar byed de//skal badzang stobs ni 'phel bar byed//tsam po dang ni gur bum
502b3(rgyud): dang //batha'i khu bar bcas pa bsku//bsgre thug gi cho ga'o//'byin byed gcig dang mar khu gnyis//dbang po gsum dang ldan par bya//sku ba zhes bya g+hA ru ra/
502b4(rgyud): ri ma la e la dzi//tsam pa ka dang tsan dran dang //nA ga ge sar ru d+ho dang //pad+ma rak+ta br-i dar bcas//sbrang rtsi me tog b+h+r-i yang ku/pa no ma la phur mo dang //a pra da de
502b5(rgyud): bus par bcas//chu yi do ba dpa' bo gcig/sha taM puSh+pa dza la gsum//rgya spos dag ni mchog yin to//mA chu btso ba'i tshogs ni//sna sman bdud dang bsdu thug
