511a6(rgyud): bzhes brjod do//gtsug nor bu bde bar bshad//rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang bskor ba'o//slar yang bshad par bya ba ste//thod pa dbang gnyis dam tshig ste//phreng ba
511a7(rgyud): sngags kyi bdag por brjod//bcu drug thig gis btab pa'o//stong pa dbu rgyan zhes byar bshad//a la sogs pa'i ma mo rnams//sangs rgyas zhes bya'o sgra ru
511b1(rgyud): brjod//do na mas dubyas kyi ba pa gang //de na gdukanar byu brjod/rigs rnams kun gyos thams 'du//rtag tu dbang ban+d+ha do bu//dal+yA zhes bya ba dga' ba s+thA//'a/
511b2(rgyud): bskyengs rgyu suni brjod//pad+ma byed+ma nyid sbyin la//nags ni spyi rang zhes byar glags//ba byang chub sems yin//dang ni 'khor lo spro//nags ni oM sogs
511b3(rgyud): ma mo yin//rtsa ba thar pa ster byed pa'i//brda yis sangs rgyas phyag rgya yin//yang na/lte ba mcha skyes zhes bya ste//nags zhes bya ba dag yin la//rtsa ba lus kyi
511b4(rgyud): bla dgas yin//sangs rgyas sems kyi brda yin//gcig pu ngas pa'i rnal 'byor yin//dben pa rtog pa spangs pa ste//sbas pa gsol bar ma byas pa'o//nags ni
511b5(rgyud): sngar bshad khams rnams te//lhan cig mchog tu 'jug pas na//bsdus pa zhes bya bar brjod//wA zhes bya bar ring ming brjod//gza' dang skor ma la sogs smra/
511b6(rgyud): e gra zhes bya'i sgra brjod pa//do na rnal 'byor shes pa yin//a gra gtso bo zhes brjod cing //oM gu dam pa zhes bya la//a gra deng po zhes bshad cing //a grA smai b+h+r-i
511b7(rgyud): gnas pa'o//rang gi ming dang ldan pa yis/sdig pa dag ni sel bar byed//yang nas ne a sogs te//de rnams a gr-i ta zhes bya//mgor gnas 'og tu bsgos nas
512a1(rgyud): na//ya ga tha snyad char du 'bengs//tha skad ces bya ba na dbyangs dang gsal byed rnams te/de rnams kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa'o//dbyangs zhes bya ba la sran rang
512a2(rgyud): nyid kyiso//ra ni mdzes pa ste des na ma~M swa ra'o//ha ni skal bzung yi ge s+ho//rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa dang //rgyun rnams kun gyis klungs pa yin//rdo rje sems sogs
512a3(rgyud): sgra rnams//bdag gi lus ni ngesam par bya//bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis ni//sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing //bsod nams kuni dang ldan pA ru//dngos po gsum
512a4(rgyud): ni yang dag gnas//bris pas bsod nams gang mthong ba//bsams pas kyang ni de bzhin mthong //slob ma bdag nyid chen po la//'di yis dbang ni bskud par bya//dngo
512a5(rgyud): bskur dam pa bsgom byar 'dod//gang dang gang gi lha yi mchog/de dang de ni slob dpon 'gro//gang dang gang la lhag mos pa//de dag kun gyis dbang bsku bya//dbang ni
512a6(rgyud): rnam pa bzhi dag tu//yang drang yang du sor bshad//gang zhig sngar ni bshad pa rnams//de drag kun gyis brjod pa yin//rnal ma'i sbyor ba rtogs bya'i phyiraro//bcos ma yi
512a7(rgyud): ni sgom pa dang /bcos ma yin ni bzlas pa bya//rnal ma'i sbyor ba rtogs gyur na//bcos ma'i sbyor ba phyi rol nas//rnal ma'i sbyor ba rtogs gyur des//bcos ma dag
512b1(rgyud): nAmo b+h+ya / na gra sa smra 'dus nAstan//tshu la par ma 'asgo ba byud//d+mod sbyin nas 'dung bsdu //danas mdag tud du dran da rgyas la la sogs lum ga/
512b2(rgyud): ma sems kyis gang dam sa rnams pasas myed paso/cheni ni mis smra smrags//dngas spyod dkun 'dir gnas pas//rgyam pa'i da
512b3(rgyud): rnye la min//ga yang sgyu shes bstan bcos rnams//rlung srod rnams kyis d+d+ham+b+ha bsgyur//rang gi sang+ges ni 'jug sbyin mi/skyes pa'i bac+doMs ma'i bya ba rnams//
512b4(rgyud): 'brang nas ni//'a ky-i ga smra skyed par byed/depyid dkyil 'khong la sosmras patshig la 'dod ga/thang pa dang bras rol s+ho//sgyus dun+d+ha ni/
512b5(rgyud): rmongs 'ba' shig byed//mi rtog das ni 'tshong mi //rtog dong bcas pas kyang de bzhin//shin tu rnam dag yongs shes na//yid 'dod rnams kyi de nyid 'gyur//
512b6(rgyud): sgyi dang 'phrus rgyu rang bzhin//dam pa nyid du yad min cing//rang bzhin gsal pa nyid / bo nyid kyang ma yin//rang bzhin du skye ba sems cad kyi//rnam
512b7(rgyud): dag ni rnam gnas pa//rgya mtshol ni rin chen bzhin//thog mtha' med pa'i tshul can yon//'jig rten rtag tu tha snyed spyod//'jig rten las 'das de dang ga//
513a1(rgyud): yod dang med ces bya ba ni//rang bzhin nyid du shes pa min//'di yi tshul gyis rab rtogs pa//rdzogs dang bral bas grol ba min//rnal ma'i lam//
513a2(rgyud): la brten nas ni//thams cad byas kyang rnam par grol//skyon drang yon tan 'phel byed pa'i//'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das//bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal dngos//lhan cig
513a3(rgyud): skyes par yang dag gnas//mkha' gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i//rdo rje mkha' gro bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis
513a4(rgyud): gsungs//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' gro las rdo rje sems dpa'i dbugs dbyung ba dang //rang bzhin nyid nges par bstan pa'i rim par bye bre ste lnga
513a5(rgyud): bcu pa'o///rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha'agro rdzogaso///rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po ga ya t+te ra dang /bod kyi zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba
513a6(rgyud): dgos lhas bcas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te/dpe gnyis la ga tugs nas gtan la thob pa'o///
